ka'o/ /k+Shu ta bi dza ni k+Sha pa ka'o/ /a dza sri gi ni kra ga na ta shri ga'o/ /sa dan ni a ti muk+ta ka'o/ /e la pra ni ni ra sna'o/ /a sa pra ni ni tsa dan yin no/ /tsi ta prar+Ni ni pris bar+Ni ka'o/ /ka ka par+Na ni mung+ga par+Ni'o/ /paN t+ya ro ni ma sha par+Ni'o/ /sha ra da ni kra ba sa'o/ /ba ra dwa dza ni pad tra ka pa sa'o/ /

bi ra ru ta ru ni ba ru na'o/ /sho lam ni she ba la'o/ /dan tri ka ni pad kri ri ka'o/ /a bi ru ba tri ni kaSh+Ta pha la'o/ /paN+Tu ra ka ni ra bil la'o/ /ka kA li ni ka kA dam+pa'o/ /da bya dam+pa ra ni e raN+Da'o/ /ka la dza ni ka rany+dza'o/ /ku

mA ra dzi ba ni pu tra dzi ba ka'o/ /ku tse la ni ku the ra'o/ /b+han tig ni na la g+han+d+ha ka'o/ /ma ra shig ni gan+d+ha ri'o/ /ka ra ba ni saR+sha ba'o/ /ma du sha ka ni ka tu la sha ka'o/ /k+Sha ra pa tra ni ba stu ga'o/ /sha la kya ni pa lag kya'o/ /ku the ra ka ni ku rten dza

ra'o/ /bag kya ni ba yu ka'o/ /lo ka sha na ni gu gul lo/ /mad sa ka la ni ud pod ka'o/ /shri ga be ra ni go dzi ga hwa'o/ /bA la la shim+bi ni u da la ka'o/ /tu pa ri ni a da ka'o/ /ka li na da ni kha khod ka'o/ /e ra pa ru ni karka ta'o/ /ku smad ni su tha ka'o/ /a lam+bu ni a lam+bu pha

la'o/ /ba ti gan ni b+ha ta ka'o/ /kus kun+da ni Ta ka'o/ /kus kun ma ni pany+tsa ang+ku la sha la'o/ /ya ru ra ka ni ku la ma'o/ /ba san+ti ni kri shan mang+ga'o/ /shar da ni mung+ga sar po'o/ /hi man+ta ni tsa na ka'o/ /ma yu k+Sha ko ni ma

yaSh+Ta ka'o/ /ha re Na ni sa ti na'o/ /oM ma ni a ta si'o/ /na ni di mu khi ni ka shi ni'o/ /ka ku ni pra ya ku ni kang+ku ni'o/ /shu ra du sha ni ka ta bi tsha ba'o/ /shi tu sha ka ni ya ba'o/ /ba ya nu ni go d+hu ma'o/ /a k+Sha ta ni da mya'o/ /na di bu ka ni ga la gong du ma'o/ /a

shi ka ni shar du li'o/ /dro na yu kha ni gan+d+ha tri na'o/ /na ra yar ni sha ta ba ri'o/ /a kwa sha ni ni bu ka'o/ /pa la la ni ti la kal dang ka'o/ /bal ru ra ni shru ka man sa'o/ /nA ga ba la ni tam+bu'o/ /d+ha ru ra'o/ /ma du la ni ba ga'o/ /ma ru ra su tra ni d+ha ru ra pa

la'o/ /i ti par+Ni so bar tsa la'o/ /pa t+ya l+ya ni pa ta li ka'o/ /eka shi ka ni tri bi ta'o/ /ba ru dza ni b+ha d+hi ni ka'o/ /pri thu la ni briSh+Ta dan du la'o/ /de dag ni sman gcig gi ming gnyis par bshad pa'o// //de nas sman gyi dngos po gcig la

sman gyi ming 'dom pa bshad par bya ste/ pa ya zhes bya ba ni chu dang 'o ma gnyis la zer ro/ /pin ka zhes bya ba ni/ til gyi tshogs dang / du ru ka gnyis la zer ro/ /de dag ni sha ta twa zhes 'dogs so/ /shing 'o ma can zangs ma gnyis la ni/ u dum+bA ra

zhes smra'o/ /bong nga dkar po dang / bca' sga gnyis la ba shwa zhes bya'o/ /am pu dang / ba la ka gnyis la ni chu'i ming yod do/ /bri ha ti dang / ba sha ka gnyis la ni grub pa zhes zer ro/ /yungs kar dang / na li ga

gnyis la ni ka dam+pa zhes bya'o/ /ka sha smrar ta dang / bi la ga gnyis la ni dar ka sha zhes bya'o/ /a ba marka dang / ko sha ta ki gnyis la ni a ba mar+Na zhes bya'o/ /brag zhun dang / skyer khaN+Da gnyis la ni k+Sha ka zhes bya'o/ /na da mU la dang / mi Sh+Ta gnyis

la ni shai le ya zhes zer ro/ /ro hi dang / sa ta la la tsar ma k+Sha zhes zer ro/ /k+Shi ri ka dang / pi ya la la ra dza da ni zhes bya'o/ /byi tsher ba dang / kha sral la dur la b+ha zhes bya'o/ /ka da ka ri dang / a ru bar la dza ya zhes zer ro/ /nA ga ge sar dang /

tsam pa ka la kany+tsan zhes bya'o/ /masma dza ka dang / pu shel tsi la byi kun+da zhes bya'o/ /sle tres dang / ko bid ra la kun+da li zhes bya'o/ /tu la ni ka dang / ba tri ka ro da la gu mu ka zhes bya'o/ /pu nA ga dang / pad+ma ge sar la ltung ga zhes bya'o/ /zer

sna dang / hi ta pi pi li la sri ya se zhes bya'o/ /shal+ma li dang / shi sha pa li pad tsha zhes bya'o/ /pad+ma'i sa bon dang / ri'u bu phul+la a ti sha ma zhes bya'o/ /masma dza ka dang / pu shel tsi la mri na la zhes bya'o/ /da trig dang / a ma bi li ka la

br-ik+Sha am bla zhes bya'o/ /tsi ti ka dang / go bye la d+ha ha nu zhes bya'o/ /grag bu'i rtsa ba dang / kAN+Tu rany+dza la a ga ra bal zhes bya'o/ /pad+ma'i sa bon dang / 'od ma'i 'bras bu la ku lu da zhes bya'o/ /'bu sug hang dang / mur ba la de bi zhes bya'o/ /

la la phud dang / timu sa la di bya ka zhes bya'o/ /la many+dza ka dang / pu shel tsi la la se bya zhes bya'o/ /ting mu sa dang / shu ti la ka ra pi zhes bya'o/ /hing ha mi tri ka dang / a tsa gan+d+ha la ka ra tsi zhes bya'o/ /gze ma dang / bi kang ka ta la swa du gan+d+ha

ka zhes bya'o/ /'bu sug hang dang / ga bra'i rtsa ba gnyis la 'bri mi zhes bya'o/ /chu las skyes pa'i shing mngar dang / mur ba la ru li zhes bya'o/ /mur pa dang / tsim bi la pid lu par ti ni zhes bya'o/ /go bye dang / lang+ga li la ag+ni mu k+Shi zhes

bya'o/ /gur gum dang / le brgan rtsi la ag+ni mu khi zhes bya'o/ /dur byid dang / rgya sran la a lad ti ka zhes bya'o/ /btsag yug snam dang / thal tres la a sbu ta zhes bya'o/ /mu sa li dang / mi sra la ta ma la'i lo ma zhes zer ro/ /pa tha

dang / byi tang ga la ma nu zhes bya'o/ /mi sri dang / tsa na ka mu ni la g+ha la zhes bya'o/ /sti ni sha dang / bany+dza la yan da na zhes so/ /ya ba sha ka dang / seng ldeng la sa'i lo ma zhes bya'o/ /lo mi ni dang / sug smel la ta h+ma zhes so/ /shu

dag dang / la la phud la a gran daM zhes so/ /zangs rtsi ba dang / chu'i pi pi ling la ga ra da zhes bya'o/ /pi pi ling dang / ti la mu pa la ka na zhes so/ /lang+ga li dang / in+d+ra ba ru la in+d+ra zhes so/ /dUr ba dang / man+sa ri hi la gu ha la

zhes bya'o/ /dud pa dang / shu dag la go li mi zhes bya'o/ /pri yang ku dang / tsam pa ka la gan+d+ha phal zhes bya'o/ /dzA ti pha ti ka dang / dzA ti pha la la so ma na shu na ka zhes so/ /gan+d+ha pa la shi ka dang / ga bur la shi shi zhes bya'o/ /in ba ru ni dang / chang gnyis la ba ru ni

zhes gdags so/ /spang spos dang / ma da ga many+dza ri la ta pa sri ni zhes bya'o/ /ku ran+ta ka dang / sa ha tsa ra gnyis la a mra la ni ku ra zhes bya'o/ /yung dang / gi wang la gi ri zhes bya'o/ /dung tsang rdo dang / 'tsho

byed gnyis la ma du ra zhes 'dogs so/ /shing tsha dang / tsa li pa ta la tsho ba zhes bya'o/ /ni rgun thi dang / sin du ba dang / shar la she pha li zhes 'dogs so/ /ku sum+ba dang / pad+ma ge sar la pad+mo dir zhes smra'o/ /l+yam tsha dang / mi sra tsa ni

la shi ta pa zhes bya'o/ /rgya shug dang / ka ko la la ka ko la zhes 'dogs so/ /ka ka dza ga dang / nag tshur la ma la ma sa zhes 'dogs so/ /mo ra ta dang / bir ta ru la d+hirga mU la zhes 'dogs so/ /hing gu ba tri ka

dang / u pa kun zin dang / zir nag po dang / sug smel dang / de dag ni pri to ka zhes bya'o/ /'ol ma si dang / mon sran sne'u dang / dme ru la dang / ka kA ha zhes 'dogs so/ /sa la par+Ni dang / byi tsher ba gnyis la dirga mU la

zhes bya'o/ /dzam+bi ri dang / ba ma ga gnyis la ni mar pa ko zhes 'dogs so/ /ba la ka dang / lcang ma ni dza la ste chu'i ming ngo / /bi sha ni ka dang / me sha shri gyi la zhes 'dogs so/ /dan ti dang / dran can ti la bra tak+Shi ni zhes bya'o/ /shi ta la

dang / ba ta ku dang / cag dang / de dag ni a ba ra bi ta zhes bya'o/ /ka ka dzad na dang / dzo ti sman ti la la ta parti zhes bya'o/ /'od ma dang / dug mo nyung la ba ya pha la zhes bya'o/ /kaN+Da ka ri dang / byi tsher ba d+hu yang zhes bya'o/ /ras bal

dang / bim+bi la Tun+di ka zhes bya'o/ /rgya spos dang / s+yi na ka la na zhes bya'o/ /b+ha ta dang / tsi tra dang / ra ni la bed na ha zhes bya'o/ /ka ku ba dang / dzal pi pi ling la sha ku ta ni zhes bya'o/ /pa ri pel+la pa dang / /ka ka ka la ba dang / ku ta Nan+ta

zhes bya'o/ /btsod dang / Tu ta na Tu li ri la b+han+d+hi ri ka zhes bya'o/ /shre ba sa dang / k+Shi ri ka ru dang / gnyis la ni zho'i ming ni da d+hi da zhes bya'o/ /nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba dang / sardzi ka'i thal ba gnyis ni thal ba ste/ k+Sha ra zhes bya'o/ /te dzo ba ti dang /

dUr ba la te dzi ni zhes bya'o/ /'dam bu dang / ldong ros la te dza na zhes bya'o/ /sha kha na li ka dang / yungs kar sha kha na li ka zhes bya'o/ /pa to la to dang / ku la ka zhes bya'o/ /a pa marga dang / ko sha da ki la dang / d+ha mar la zhes bya'o/ /e

raN+Da dang / ga gon la hang sto par+Ni zhes zer ro/ /nye'u shing dang / mur ba la sha da bir+ya zhes bya'o/ /nye'u shing dang / dUr ba dkar po la sa sra dUr ba zhes bya'o/ /dzam+bi ra dang / ka pi ra dang / ka pid la la dan+tha sha tha zhes zer ro/ /tsang gi ri dang / am byi la dan+da sha thi zhes bya'o/ /tsa ki

ri dang / da trig la am li ka zhes 'dogs so/ /nI la pad+ma dang / rgya shug la ku la ba zhes so/ /ka dan pa dang / ku ra ku ti la nI la pa zhes bya'o/ /chu'i shing dang / a sa ma dza ta la ma du ku la

zhes bya'o/ /ba li dang / ge ri puSh+pa la ba la zhes bya'o/ /ku sman da dang / ka pid thA la pu sha pha la zhes bya'o/ /'dab bu dang / bring ga ra la bring ga dza ru zhes bya'o/ /dan+ta dang / dra tsan+di la tsa tra zhes bya'o/ /da trig dang / pri yang+ku la u pha

b+hits+tsha zhes bya'o/ /ag+ni man+tha dang / tang pa la dang / pad+ma ba du dang gsum la shi par+Ni zhes 'dogs so/ /tun+ti ka ra ka dang / tang pa la dang / gnyis la ni nan tri br-ik+Sha zhes bya'o// //da ni sman gyi don gsum pa bshad par bya ste/ rtsab mo

dang / stang zil dang / rgya shug dang gsum po ni any+dza na zhes bya'o/ /nim pa dang / sgog skya dang / a sa ba'i chang dang gsum la ni a ri ta zhes bya'o/ /byi tsher ba dang / kaN+Da ka ri dang / ka pi kan tshu gsum la d+hung yaR+sha zhes bya'o/ /pri mang+ku dang

dur byid dang / pi pi ling gsum la ni sha ma zhes bya'o/ /pi pi ling dang / u pa kuny+dza ka dang / ni li ni gsum la ni kr-iSh+Na zhes bya'o/ /pa tha dang / mu tsi ka dang / tsaM gi ri gsum la ni a ma Sh+Ta zhes 'dogs so/ /pin+ta ka ra dang / spra

tshil dang / lang tang tshe gsum la ma dam zhes bya'o/ /sle tres dang / skyu ru ra dang / a ru ra dang gsum la a mr-i ta zhes bya ste bdud rtsi yin no/ /yung ba dang / 'bra go dang / ting gu bkri ka la byin ta zhes bya'o/ /ba ku rtsi dang / bra h+mi dang /

sle tres la so ma ba li zhes bya'o/ /shri sha dang / thu ni ya ka dab/ ba lu'i lo ma la shu ka zhes bya'o/ /u pa kuny+dzi ka dang / btsod dang / ni li ka la ka la zhes bya'o/ /bong nga dang / dur byad dang / bku tsi la ka

la mi shi zhes bya'o/ /rgya spos dang / pri mad+ku dang / thal tres la ka la na sa ri zhes bya'o/ /rgya skyegs shing dang / zur ba dang / bre'u sul ba la sha na zhes bya'o/ /chu shing dang / shal ma li ka dang / sa bon la son ka zhes 'dogs so/ /

hi gu la tri ka dang / u pa kuny+dzi ka dang / sug sems la pri thi ka zhes bya'o/ /sug smel dang / thal tres dang / dzo tisma ti la pa ta zhes bya'o/ /sa la go dang / mu ra dang / i la ba lu ka la sur byi zhes 'dogs so/ shri ba sa dang / bil ba

dang / li shi la sti yA hA zhes bya'o/ /brag zhun dang / rdo dreg dang / ldong ros la li la ha zhes bya'o/ /tsa pan+ka dang / nA ga ge sar dang / pad+ma ki na ja la ka la tsa pa lI ya zhes bya'o/ /a pa marga dang / ti mus dang / spangs pa ma lam yU ra ka

zhes 'dogs so/ /rtsal ru tsha dang / ya b+k+Sha ra dang / mching bu la ba kya zhes bya'o/ /sle tres dang / tang pa la dang / ni li kal ma du par+Na zhes bya'o/ /pa ri pe la ba dang / a shwa khur dang / pash+sha bi she shal brta ka zhes bya'o/ /lcim rtsa

dang / sha mi sha dang / ring di dang gsum la shi mi zhes bya'o/ /rgya shug dang / sla ba dang / ma d+ha na la g+hon+ta zhes bya'o/ /u pa kuny+dzi ka dang / ka ra bil la dang / puN+Da rI ka la su shi di zhes bya'o/ /dung dang / ba la ka dang / li shil ba riny+dza

zhes bya'o/ /kha san dang / a pa marga dang / pu ti ka rany+dza la ma ra ka ti zhes bya'o/ /kha a shwa shan da dang / ba ra hi ba ra ra zhes bya'o/ /sla k+Sha dang / aM ba dang / shri shi dang gsum la ni a mra ta ka zhes bya'o/ /seng ldeng dkar po dang / kad pa la dang /

karany+dzal so mang bang ka zhes bya'o/ /star bu dang / shing kun dang / gla rtsi la ha sa sra bi do zhes bya'o/ /ma nu dang / gur gum dang / bu shar la ka mir zhes bya'o/ /lcang ma dang / sap+n+d+ha ra dang / a sho la la b+hadzul zhes bya'o/ /a sa na

dang / pri yang+ku dang / ku ram pa la bri yang+ku zhes bya'o/ /man+da ra dang / bir dza ta dang / thang shing la pa ri b+ha tra zhes bya'o/ /sle tres dang / ri ka ru ha dang / shaka bi she sha la dzi ban+ti zhes bya'o/ /bim+bi dang / du yar sha dang / pi ta yu ti dang

gsum la he ma pu shi zhes bya'o/ /lcim rtsa dang / ga bra'i rtsa ba dang / pad+ma na ti ka la pad+ma zhes bya'o/ /kun ka dang / ras bal dang / yab ka ka la su man+ta zhes bya'o/ /tshwa dang / skyur dang / tsang gar la prig ga zhes bya'o/ /ta trig dang / tshwa dang

star bu la tsu tri ka zhes bya'o/ /bu tri na dang / bu ni ba la ni b+hu ni ti ka zhes bya'o/ /ra sna dang / sa la ka dang / pa tha la nir sa zhes 'dogs so/ /yab sha ka dang / pi pi ling dang / dUr ba la ni ran tra zhes 'dogs so/ /pa ta la dang / ta pal dang

ma sha par+Ni kri sha mri ti ka zhes bya'o/ /chu lcang dang / star bu dang / tad ka ri la na de ya zhes bya'o/ /karka ta dang / ran+na zhes bya ba rin po che'i bye brag dang / de dag ni be ta ka zhes bya'o/ /nI la chus pa dang / gan+d+ha ba shal dang / so gan+d+hi zhes bya'o/ /

rasna dang / she pha li dang / ga dan ku li dang gsum la ni su ba ha zhes bya'o/ /rgya skyegs dang / gu gul dang / gze ma la ni pa laM sha zhes bya'o/ /he ma ba ti dang / a ru ra dang / shu dag dkar po la ni he maM ba ti zhes bya'o/ /a ru ra dang / ma hA

sra ba ni dang / lcim rtsal ni a pa tha zhes bya'o/ /da da ki dang / dur byid dang / pa tal gsum la ni a pra pu sho zhes bya'o/ /shu dag dang / shu ti dang / gi wang dang gsum la ni sham+bi zhes bya'o/ /lang+ga li dang / nan nyi dang / sle tres la bi sha pa zhes bya'o/ /

rma shing dang / seng ldeng dang / tsan+dan dmar po gsum la ni rak+ta sa tar zhes bya'o/ /bong nga dkar po dang / kar sha shring gi dang / mi sha bi shin ka gsum la ni shing gi zhes bya'o/ /ya sho dang / dUr ba dang / ka tsi dan tshu dang gsum

la ni kang tshu ra zhes bya'o/ /b+hush+ma dang / bcod dang / ar+ya lang ke la maN+Da ka par+Ni zhes bya'o/ /tin+tu la dang / seng ldeng smug po dang / tam la gsum la ni ka la skan+da zhes bya'o/ /kha sral phre'u dang / kr-iSh+Na par+Ni dang / sa mang ga la swa yang gul ta zhes bya'o/ /

tri ka dang / sau many+dza na dang / rgya mtsho'i tsha gsum la ni a shes pa zhes bya'o/ /til dang / ko kI lak+Sha dang / gze ma gsum la ni kur zhes bya'o/ /rgun 'bru dang / mur ba dang / tang ba la gsum la ni ma du ras zhes bya'o/ /mi tri ka dang / nye'u shing dang /

pu gtsang sto dang gsum la ni sa du sa zhes bya'o/ /a sa pa marga dang / rgya mtsho'i cha dang / d+ha ti pi pi ling gsum la ni ba sir zhes bya'o/ /mung+ga par+Ni b+ha la dang / de dag ni sa ha zhes bya'o/ /ma sha par+Na dang / ma hA ba la dang / be+e ta ra ni gsum la ni

ma hA sa hA zhes bya'o/ /cha bu chang stong dang / bye'u rug pa'i dang / a ru ra dang gsum la ni ka pa ta zhes bya'o/ /k+Sha yang Sh+Di ki zhes bya'o/ /pa dang / sle tres dang / skyu ru ra gsum la ni arka dang / kun dang / bil ba la ni

d+puSh+pa zhes bya'o/ /k+Sha ra ka ko li dang / ardzun dang / d+harba byi she sha dang gsum la ni bi ra na zhes bya'o/ /a sha ra ka ra na dang / a sa na dang / sa la dang gsum la ni ra sa ra dza zhes bya'o/ /a ri ka dang / shri sha dang gsum la ni ar tra
zhes bya'o// //sman dpyad yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i 'grel pa mdzad pa'i slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas yan lag brgyad pa la sogs pa'i sman gyi ming gi rnam grangs mdzad pa rdzogs so// //

@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ aSh+Ta aM ga hr-i da ya/ saM hit+ta nA ma/ bod skad du/ yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'dod chags la

sogs ma lus pa yind/ /rgyun du 'brel pas lus kun ma lus khyab/ /'dod dang gti mug khro ba sel ba yi/ /sman pa sngon med de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas tshe ring par 'dod pa'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /rgyun shes kyi bu la sogs pa drang srong chen po

rnams kyis 'di ltar bshad do/ /tshe ni ring par 'dod pa yis/ chos dang nor dang bde ba bsgrub/ /tshe yi rig byed lung bshad pa/ /rab tu gus par bya bar gyis/ /tshangs pas tshe yi rig byed dran/ /skye dgu'i bdag la bshad pa yin/ /de yis tha skar

des brgya byin/ /des rgyun shes stsogs drang srong la'o/ /de yis me bzhin 'jug la stsogs/ /de rnams kyis rgyud so sor byas/ /shin tu 'thob pa de rnams las/ /rab ces phal cher btus pa ni/ /shin tu bsdus min rgyas min par/ /yan lag brgyad

pa'i snying po byas/ /lus dang byis pa gdon lus stod/ /mtshon dang mche ba rgas ro tsa/ /gso dpyad gang la gnas pa yi/ /yan lag brgyad du de bshad do/ /rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan yang / /nyes pa rnam gsum mdor bsdus yin/ /de ni rnam gyur

ma gyur pas/ /lus ni 'joms dang gnas pa yin/ /des khyab gyur kyang snying ga dang / /lte ba'i 'og bar steng na gnas/ /na tshod nyin zhag zas zos la/ /de ni mtha' dbus stsogs rtogs rim/ /des ni 'ju ba mi snyoms rno/ /chung dang mnyam pas

mnyam par 'gyur/ /de ni lto ba sra snyi ran/ /mnyam pas kyang ni bar mar 'gyur/ /skye ba'i dang por khu khrag gnas/ /dug can srin bu'i dug dang mtshungs/ /de ni rang bzhin rnam gsum ste/ /chung 'bring chen po so sor lta/ /ma lus pa la khams mnyam pa/ /

mchog yin nyes pa gnyis 'byung smad/ /de la rlung ni rtsub cing yang / /grang zhing sra la phra zhing g.yo/ /mkhris pa smum bcas rno zhing dro/ /yang zhing dri mnam 'khru zhing gsher/ /bad kan snum bsil lci ba dang / /rtul zhing 'jam brtan 'byar ba gcan/ /

de gnyis gsum zad 'khrugs pa las/ /ldan pa dang ni 'dus pa yin/ /lus zungs dngas ma khrag dang sha//tshil dang rus rkang khu chu ste/ /gnod bya bdun yin dri ma gcin/ /bshang brdul la stsogs pa yin/ /thams cad mnyam pas 'phel 'gyur zhing / /de las

bzlog pas gnod par 'gyur/ /ro ni mngar skyur lan tshwa dang / tsha dang kha dang bska ba ste/ /rdzas drug la gnas de dag kyang / /go rims bzhin du stobs chen yin/ /de las dang po'i gsum po ni/ /rlung 'joms tshwa stsogs bad kan sel/ /bska dang kha dang

mngar ba ni/ /mkhris sel gzhan dag skyed pa yin/ /de ltar rdzas ni rnam pa gsum/ /zhi 'khrugs tha mal gnas la phan/ /de la tsha bsil phul byung bas/ /nus pa rnam pa gnyis su bshad/ /rdzas ni khu ba rnam gsum ste/ /mngar skyur tsha ba'i bdag nyid can/

yon tan lci rtul bsil dang snum/ /'jam dang bska ba mnyen dang brtan/ /phra dang bcas shing bska bag can/ /de bzlog pa dang nyi shu yin/ /dus don las kyi sbyor ba rnams/ /dman dang log par lhag pa dang / /yang dag sbyor bas nad dang ni/ /nad med rgyu

gcig yin zhes bya/ /nad ni nyes pa ma snyoms yin/ /nyes pa snyoms pa nad med nyid/ /de la nad ni rang bzhin gnas/ /glo bur cha yis gnyis su bshad/ /de rnams lus sems dbye ba yis/ /gnas kyang rnam pa gnyis yin no/ /'dod chags gti

mug kyang yid kyi/ /nyes pa gnyis su bstan pa yin/ /nad pa blta dang reg pa dang / /dris pa yas ni yongs su brtag /nad kyi gzhi yi dang po'i tshul/ /mtshan nyid nyer bsten 'thob pa yin/ /sa dang lus kyi bye brag gis/ /'di la yul sa rnam gnyis bshad/ /

skams phal cher rlung skyed cing / /rlan can bad kan 'phel ba yin/ /cha mnyam nyes pa mnyam pa ste/ /sa yi phyogs ni gsum du bshad/ /skad cig la sogs nad kyi skabs/ /dus su sman ni sbyor bar byed/ /mdor na sman ni rnam gnyis te/ /sbyang ba dang ni

zhi ba'o/ /lus las byung ba'i nad rnams kyi/ /rim gyis sman gyi dam pa ni/ /mas gtong bkru sman slon sman dang / /de bzhin til mar mar sbrang rtsi/ /blo dang brtan bdag stsogs shes pa/ /sems kyi nyes pa'i sman mchog yin/ /gso ba dag tu bstan

pa ni/ /sman pa sman dang nad g.yog dang / /nad pa yan lag rnam bzhi ste/ /re re'ang rnam pa bzhi bzhi yin/ /sman pa mkhas stegs gzhung don shes/ /las rnams mthong bzhin gtsang ba yin/ /sman ni cho ga mang po dang / /yon tan mang ldan phun

tshogs 'phrod/ /nad g.yog rjes brtse gtsang sbra can/ /sgrim zhing blo dang ldan pa yin/ /nad pa phyug cing bsgo ba nyan/ /shes par nus shing snying stobs ldan/ /sman kun bzod par nus pa'i lus/ /skyes bu gzhon zhing bdag nyid thul/ /gnad du ma song

rgyu sngar tshul/ /mtshan nyid chung dang gnod pa med/ /gnod bya yul dus rang bzhin rnams/ /mtshungs min yan lag phun sum tshogs/ /bza' ni rjes su mthun pa la/ /nyes pa lam gcig gsar gso sla/ /nad ni mtshan stsogs kyis btab cing / /gso

ba dka' zhing de las 'dres/ /tshe yi lhag ma lus phyir 'tsho/ /go bzlog pa la goms phan nyid/ /bcos pa'i thabs med nyid du 'gyur/ /shin tu phyin ci log par gnas/ /'dod dang rmongs dang khro bar byed/ /'chi ltas snang zhing dbang po nyams/ /sman pa rgyal po

la sdang dang / /de dang mi mdza' sdang ba dang / /yo byad mi 'byor brel ba dang / /nyan du mi btub tshe zad dang / /gtum zhing mya ngan la mnan 'jigs/ /byas pa mi gzo sman brnyas spangs/ /de nas gzhan yang rgyud 'di yi/ /le'u bsdus pa bshad bya ste/ /tshe ring nyin re

dus spyod dang / /nad med bya dang btung ba dang / /zas shes bya dang zas bsdam dang / /zas tshod sman dang ro la gnas/ /nad shes bya dang de'i dbye ba/ /de gso ba dang gso thabs gnyis/ /sbyang stsogs snum chos khrus brta bya/ /sman dung khar

dor mig bkru dang / /gso dang dbyung thabs zug rngu mtshon/ /gtar dpyad zug rngu dbyung ba'i dpyad/ /mtshon dang thal sman me btsa'i las/ /mdog nas le'u sum cu ni/ /'di yin lus kyi brjod bya ste/ /mngal du 'jug dang de'i nad dang / /yan lag gnad kyi bye

brag dang / /rnam 'gyur bang chen las byung drug /nad kun 'byung ba'i nad gzhi dang / /rims khrag dbugs mi bde gcong stsogs/ /chang dang gzhang 'brum tshad pa'i nad/ /chu 'gags gcin ni snyi ba dang / /khong 'bras dmu rdzing dag dang ni/ /skya rbab mdze nad rlung

gis gzir/ /dreg nag dag dang bcu drug yin/ /rims nad gso dang khrag dang ni/ /lud pa dbugs mi bde dang gcong / /slon dang chang nad gzhang 'brum dang / /tshad nad pho ba gcin nad gnyis/ /khong 'bras skran dang dmu rdzing dang / /sbya rbab 'or nad me

dbal dang / /mdze dang sha bkra rlung nad dang / /drag nad gso ba'i dpyad rnams te/ /le'u nyi shu gnyis 'di yin// //de las gzhan pa cho ga grub/ /skyug sman bkru sman cho ga dang / /de grub mas gtong cho ga dang / /mas gtong nyes grub drug pa ni/ /

sman yin de nas phyi ma ni/ /byis pa nyer spyod de'i nad dang / /de gdon 'byung por gtogs pa gnyis/ /smyo dang brjed byed stsogs gnyis gnyis/ /mig chu rdzi ma'i grwa mtshams dang / /mig 'bras rab rib mthong nyams gsum/ /gnyis gnyis kun la

'gro ba yin/ /rna nad sna dang kha nad mgo'i/ /rma dang chag grugs mtshan bar rdol/ /'bras stsogs phra mo'i nad rnams dang / /gsang ba'i nad ni tha dad gnyis/ /dug dang sbrul dang srin bu'i dug /byi ba dang ni bcud kyis len/ /bu med sa bon gso ba ste/ /

le'u bzhi bcu nyid yin no/ /de ltar le'u ni brgya nyi shu/ /gnas ni drug tu bshad pa yin/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ mdo'i gnas kyi le'u dang po'o// //de nas nyin re zhing dpyad pa'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /bde gnas tshe ni

bsrung ba'i phyir/ /yud tsam tshangs phyir gnas te langs/ /lus kyi bya ba rdzogs byas nas/ /de nas gtsang sbra'i cho ga bya/ /arka n+ya gro d+ha seng ldeng / /ka rany+dza ka ku la stsogs/ /bska dang tsha dang kha ba dag /rtse 'jam nang par zas spyad nas/ /so

dang rnyil la ma gnod par/ /so yi dag byed bca' bar bya/ /ma zhu slon bro dbugs mi bde/ /lud pa lu rims kha yon can/ /skom zhing kha skams snying mig rna/ /mgo bo na bas 'di mi bca'/ /rtag tu mig sman skyer khaN+Da/ /mig la phan pas de phyir

bsten/ /de ni me yi rang bzhin te/ /lhag par bad kan la 'jigs pas/ /mchi ma 'dzag phyir skyer khaN+Da/ /zhag bdun zhing ni blugs par bya/ /de nas sna sman mkhur bkang dor/ /dud pa so rtsi bsten par bya/ /so rtsi glo 'grams mkhris pa khrag /rtsub

pas mig ni na ba dang / /dug gis brgyal zhing chang nad gzir/ /lus skem gyur la gnod pa yin/ /rtag tu bsku byug spyod byed na/ /de ni rgas ngal rlung 'joms yin/ /mig gsal lus rgyas tshe 'phel zhing / /gnyid 'od pags 'jam rtas byed yin/ /

des ni mgo dang rna ba dang / /rkang pa khyad par rtag tu brtan/ /bad kan skyes dang ma zhu dang / /bkru sman stsogs btang bsku byug spang / /yang zhing las ni nus pa dang / /me yi drod skyed tshul 'bri la/ /lus kyi skabs phyed mkhregs pa nyid/ /rtsol ba las ni

'byung bar 'gyur/ /rlung mkhris nad can byis pa dang / /rgas shing 'khogs pas de spang bya/ /stobs ldan snum bag za ba dang / /grang ba'i dus dang dpyid dus dang / /nus ldan dag gis de bsten bya/ /de las gzhan tshe dal ba nyid/ /de byas ci bder lus dag ni/ /kun

nas yongs su mnye bar bya/ /rtsol ba de byas zin nas ni/ /bde bar lus kun gnas par bya/ /shin tu rtsol bas lud pa dang / /skom dang gcong can mi dran mun/ /khrag dang mkhris rgyas ngal dang dub/ /rims dang slon pa 'byung bar 'gyur/ /

rtsol ba mi nyal lam bud med/ /dgod dang smra sogs shugs 'byin dang / /seng ges glang po drangs pa bzhin/ /shin tu drags pas ma rung 'gyur/ /dril phyis bad kan sel ba dang / /tshil ni rab tu zhu byed cing / /yan lag brtan par byed pa dang / /pags pa

gsal bar byed pa'i mchog/ /khrus ni drod skyed ro tsa dang / /tshe dang mdangs dang stobs rab skyed/ /g.ya' dang dri ma ngal dang rdul/ /snyom skom lus tsha mi shis sel/ /chu dron gyis ni lus kyi smad/ /blugs shing bkrus pa stobs skyed yin/ /de nyid mgor blugs

khrus byas na/ /skra dang mig gi stobs 'phrog yin/ /khrus ni 'gram chags mig nad dang / /rna ba'i nad dang tshad pas 'khru/ /lto sbos cham pa ma zhu dang / /zos ma thag pa rnams la smad/ /zhu nas phan zhing ran par za/ /bshang stsogs nan gyis brnag mi bya/ /shugs ma

phyung bar gzhan mi bya/ /gnod las mi bde bar ma yin/ /sems can thams cad bde 'dod phyir/ /rtsom pa kun la 'jug par 'dod/ /bde bar chos med par ma yin/ /de bas chos la brtson par bya/ /mos pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten/ /cig shos

ring du spang bar bya/ /'tshe dang brku dang 'dod log spyod/ /phra ma ngag rtsub brdzun tshig dang / /mi 'brel smra dang gnod sems dang / /brnab sems lta ba phyin ci log /de ltar sdig pa'i las rnams bcu/ /lus ngag yid kyis spang bar bya/ /phongs pa nad pa

mya ngan gzir/ /ci nus par ni phan gdags bya/ /'bu srin grog sbur dag la yang / /rang dang 'dra bar rtag tu blta/ /lha dang dge slong bram ze dang / /sman pa rgan rgyal mgron pos mchod/ /slong la rgyab kyis phyogs mi bya/ /brnyas par mi bya tshar mi gcad/ /

gnod par byed brtson dgra gzhan la'ang / /phan gdags pa ni gtso cher bya/ /'byor dang rgud la'ang yid gcig bya/ /rgyu la phrag dog 'bras bu min/ /dus su phan dang ran par smra/ /slu ba med cing nges par bya/ /bzhin 'dzum gsong por smra ba dang / /spyod pa

bzang zhing snying rje 'jam/ /gcig pu bde min thams cad la/ yid mi brtan zhing dogs mi bya/ /su yang bdag gi dgra yin dang / /bdag ni su yi dgrar gyur dang / /brnyas dang bdag la gtso bo ni/ /mi byams zhes ni smra mi bya/ /'gro ba'i bsam

pa shes nas ni/ /gang zhig ji ltar yongs mgu ba/ /de la de bzhin rjes 'jug cing / /gzhan dag dga' byed mdzangs pa yin/ /dbang po gzir bar mi bya zhing / /'di rab nyams bder bya ba'ang min/ /tshoms gsum med pa'i rtsom pa la/ /mi bsten de dang

'gal mi bya/ /chos rnams kun gyi lam la ni/ /dbu ma'i lam gyi rjes 'jug bya/ /skra sen kha spu ring mi gzhag /sgo dgu rkang pa dri med bya/ /khrus la dga' zhing dri zhim bsgo/ /cha lugs bzang zhing mi 'phyar spa/ /rin chen grub pa'i gsang sngags dang / /

sman chen rtag tu bcang bar bya/ /gdugs dkar lham dang ldan pa ni/ /gnya' shing gang tsam blta zhing 'gro/ /mtshan mo don chen dag la ni/ /dbyig thogs mgo dkri grogs ldan bya/ /mchod rten mchod bya rgyal mtshan dang / /mi shis grib ma thal phub dang / /mi

gtsang gseg bod gtor ma dang / /khrus byas sa ni 'gom mi bya/ /chu bor rgyal te 'gro mi bya/ /me chen phung por 'gro mi bya/ /the tshom bcas pa'i gru shing la/ /bzhon pa mi bsrun bzhin mi 'dzeg /sbrid pa gad mo glal ba la/ /kha ni gdangs par mi bya'o/ /

sna ni brud par mi bya zhing / /don med sa ris mi bya'o/ /lus kyi yan lag mi gcu zhing / /tsog tsog por yang 'dug mi bya/ /lus ngag yid kyi spyod pa ni/ /snga nas ngal las bzlog par bya/ /bus 'greng yun rings gnas mi bya/ /mtshan mo shing drung bsten mi bya/ /

sum mdo mchod rten drung bzhi mdo/ /lha'i khang pa yang de bzhin no/ /gsod sa 'brog stong khang stong dang / /dur khrod du ni nyin mo'ang min/ /rnam kun nyi ma la mi blta/ /mgo yis khur ni bskur mi bya/ /shin tu phra dang 'tsher ba dang / /mi gtsang mi

sdug rgyun mi blta/ /chang 'tshong ba dang sbyor ba dag /sbyin dang len la spyad mi bya/ /mdun gyi ser bu nyi tshan rdul/ /ba mo dang ni rlung rtsub dang / /sbrid bsgregs pa lud pa zas/ /gnyid log nyal po gcu mi bya/ /gad kha'i grib ma rgyal po sdang / /sbrul gdug

gcan gzan rwa can dang / /dus mtshams dag tu zas bza' dang / /bud med nyal klog sems las dang / /dgra bo'i nar mar zan tshogs 'dus/ /smad 'tshong tshong pa'i zas dag dang / /lus dang mchu dang sen sgra 'byin/ /lag pa skra ni sprugs pa dang / /chu me

mchod bya'i bar du 'gro/ /ro bsregs la brten dud pa dang / /chang stsogs chags dang bud med la/ /yid rton rang dbang gyur pa spang / /blo ldan spyod pa thams cad la/ /'jig rten nyid ni slob dpon yin/ /de bas 'jig rten pa yi don/ /rtogs par byed pas de nyid bya/ /

snying rjes brlan zhing gtong dang ldan/ /lus dang ngag yid dul ba dang / /gzhan gyi don la rang don sems/ /de dag dam pa'i spyod mthar thug /da ltar bdag ni nyin mtshan du/ /ji lta bur ni gnas 'gro zhes/ /rtag tu dran pa nyer 'jog pa/ /sdug bsngal snod du mi

'gyur ro/ /de ltar spyod pa mdor bsdus pas/ /gang zhig kun tu spyod byed pa/ /tshe dang nad med dbang phyug dang / /grags pa 'jig rten rtag 'thob 'gyur/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /mdo'i gnas kyi le'u gnyis pa'o// //de nas dus su

spyod pa'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /dgun zla ra ba stsogs gnyis gnyis/ /rim bzhin dus ni drug tu bshad/ /de las dgun zla tha chungs stsogs/ /gsum ni byang du 'gro zhes bya/ /de tshe mi rnams nyin re bzhin/ /mthu 'phrogs pa zhes bya ba yin/ /de tshe shin tu rno

zhing tsha/ /rtsub pa'i las kyi ngo bo nyid/ /nyi ma rlung gi zla ba yi/ /sa yi yon tan zad par byed/ /'dir ni tshab ska kha ba yi/ /ro rnams stobs ni che ba yin/ /de bas me ni mthu stobs 'phrog /lho phyogs su ni 'gro ba'i dus/ /dbyar la sogs pa'i slar

stobs skyed/ /'di stobs slar ni skyed pas na/ /'dir ni bsil bas zla ba ni/ /stobs dang ldan pas nyi ma 'bri/ /char 'bab pa dang rlung bsil bas/ /sa stengs tsha ba zhi ba na/ /'dir ni snum dang skyur lan tshwa/ /mngar ba'i ro rnams mthu skyed do/ /

dgun tshe char dang tsha dus su/ /stobs chung lhag ma dag la 'bring / /stobs ldan grang bas bkag pas na/ /dgun gyi dus su me stobs ldan/ /de ni rlung gis sbar bas na/ /zas nyung gyur na lus zungs skems/ /de bas dgun ni mngar skyur dang / /lan tshwa'i ro ni

bsten par bya/ /de tshe mtshan mo ring bas na/ /nang par nyid ni bkres par 'gyur/ /nges par bya ba byas nas ni/ /ji skad bshad rdzogs de rjes la/ /rlung 'joms til mar gyis byug cing / /spyi bo'ang til mar gyis byug mnye/ /bag yod pa dang stobs 'gyed cing / /rkang pas ran par mnye bar bya/ /

de nas bska bas snum bsal la/ /cho ga bzhin du khrus dag bya/ /gur gum gla rtsi dang bcas pas/ /lus bsku a ka ru yis bdug/ /sha tshon khu ba snum pa dang / /bu ram chang dang chang dang sa chang / /gro dang 'bras khur ma sha dang / /'o ma bu ram shing byas bza'/ /

kha zas gsar dang zhag til mar/ /dro 'jam chu yis gtsang sbra bya/ /be+e'u ras slag pa dar stsogs go/ /dre'u rngog re'u bal chen gding / /rang bzhin dro zhing yang ba yi/ /gos bgo mal la brten par bya/ /nyi ma'i 'od la ran par 'de/ /dugs bya lham ni rtag tu bgo/ /

chung ma gzhon zhing yid 'ong rgyags/ /nu ma brla dang ro smad rgyas/ /gur gum gyis byugs spos kyis bdug/ /lus kyi drod kyis grang sel ba'o/ /sa khang khang pa nyis rim byas/ /mdag me'i drod kyis bsros pa ni/ /grang dang rtsub pa las byung ba'i/ /nyes pa nam yang mi

'byung ngo / /dgun smad dus su lhag par yang / /cho ga 'di nyid bya ba yin/ /de tshe lhag par grang ba dang / /stobs 'phrogs las byung rtsub pa yin/ /dgun ni bad kan khong na stsogs/ /dpyid dus nyi ma'i 'od dros pa/ /me yi drod nyams nas

skyed de/ /de bas de ni myur du bsal/ /rno dang skyug sman sna sman sogs/ /yang dang rtsub pa'i kha zas dang / /bcag dang lus phyi mnyes pa yis/ /bad kan bdo ba'i nad bsal bya/ /khrus byas ga pur tsan+dan dang / /gur gum stsogs pas bsku bar

bya/ /nas dang gro ni rnying pa dang / /sbrang rtsi skam sa'i bsregs sha bza'/ /a mra'i khu ba dang sbyar ba'i/ /khu ba skom du sbyar ba btung / /chung ma dri zhim ut+pal gyi/ /mig dang ldan dang lhan cig cing / /yid ni dga' zhing bder byas pas/ /grogs

dang lhan cig btung bar bya/ /skyon med chang rgan dro 'jam dang / /bu ram rgun chang sbrang chang dang / /sga chu bskol dang se'u'i chu/ /sbrang chu'am gla sgang chu btung bya/ /lho phyogs ser bus bsil ba dang / /mtha' ma kun tu chu 'bab la/ /nyi ma'i 'od ni mi snang dang / /

nor bu bcag 'dra'i mdangs ldan pa/ /khu byug snyan pa sgra sgrogs shing / /'dod pa'i longs spyod ldan pa'i sa/ /sna tshogs me tog ldan pa'i shing / /dri zhim skyed mos tshal du ni/ /dga' 'dun gtam ni sna tshogs pas/ /phyed du bde bas bde bar bya/ /lci bsil

nyin mo nyal ba dang / /snum bag mngar skyur spang bar bya/ /nyi ma'i 'od zer rab tsha bas/ /so ga 'phrog pa 'dra ba yin/ /de bas de tshe lan tshwa tsha/ /skyur rtsol nyi ma'i 'od zer spang / /zas ni mngar dang yang ba dang / /snum bsil sla ba nyid bsten bya/ /rab bsil chu

yis lus bkru zhing / /phye zan kha rar bcas pa bza'/ /chang mi btung ste 'thung na yang / /nyung ba'am chu mang bsres la btung / /gzhan du de ni kha skom lhod/ /tsha dang rmongs par byed pa yin/ /'bras chan kun+da ltar dkar dang / /skam sa'i srog chags sha dag bza'/ /

khu ba mi ska zho dang ni/ /bu ram sbyar stsogs g.yos byas btung / /phal cher skyur ba btung bar bya'o/ /snying po lnga yi btung ba ni/ /kham phor sar pa la gnas pa/ /chu shing rgya star dum bu bsres/ /skyur bcas kham phor snod kyis btung / /chu ni pa ta las bsgos shing / /

ga bur bcas shing shin tu bsil/ /zla zer lta bu'i bza' ba ni/ /mtshan mo'i dus su bza' ba dang / /zla ba skar ma ltar dkar ba'i/ /ma he'i 'o ma bsil mo btung / /sA la ta la chen mo ni/ /sprin reg tsha ba'i 'od zer sgrib/ /rgun 'bru'i snye ma g.yur za zhing / /

'khri shing ldan dang nags tshal bzang / /dri bzang khang pa chu yis ni/ /bsil khang lus dang 'tsham byas la/ /chag chag btab dang a mra yi/ /ldum bu 'bras bu 'phyang ba dang / /chu shing 'dab dang kal ltar/ /pad rtsa pad+ma ut+pal/ /me tog rgyas pa dang ldan par/ /

'jam pa'i gnas mal bcas nas ni/ /phyed dus nyi mas gdungs pa na/ /nyal ba'am chu yi khang pa ni/ /bud med bcos gzugs nu ma lag /kha las u shir chu 'bab bya/ /mtshan mo yang thog rdo thal byugs/ /zla ba'i 'od kyis bsil bar nyal/ /

mal stan bde bar sems bde zhing / /tsan+dan lde gu phreng ba thogs/ /rab tu phra ba'i gos bgos te/ /'dod pa'i rgyun las bzlog par bya/ /ta la'i bsil yab spos chus btab/ /pad+ma'i 'dab rgyas rlung yab dang / /dal gyis legs par g.yob pa dang / /rdzi char

ser bu dang ldan bya/ /ga bur ma li ka'i phreng ba/ /mu tig do shal tsan+dan dkar/ /ne tso sha ri ka la stsogs/ /sgra snyan yid 'ong sgrogs pa dang / /chung ma gdu bu pad rtsa 'dra/ /pad+ma rgyas pa lta bur mdzes/ /pad+ma can ni 'gro 'dral/ /snyom pa sel bar byed pa

yin/ /mthu 'phrogs pa ni na ba'i lus/ /dman pa las kyang dman gyur te/ /dbyar ni gnod pas gnod gyur te/ /mkha' la sprin 'dus chu yis brlan/ /chu thigs bcas pa'i rlung dang ni/ /grang ba drag por ldang ba dang / /sa yi rlangs pa skyur min dang / /chu ni rnyog ma

can dag gis/ /me drod chung bas gnod par byed/ /phan tshun gnod pa de la ni/ /dro zhing me yi stobs skyed pa/ /thun mong gang yin bsten par bya/ /sbyang bas lus ni dag byas la/ /zas ni yang bag khu ba bza'/ /skam sa'i srog chags sha khu dang / /

sbrang rtsi can ni rnying pa btung / /dar ba kha ru tshar sbyar ba'am/ /tsha ba lnga ni phye ma can/ /khron pa'i chu ni bskol ba'ang rung / /char che'i dus su kha zas ni/ /rab skyur lan tshwa snum dang bcas/ /skam zhing sbrang rtsir ldan la yang / /rkang gis mi 'gro dri zhim byugs/ /rtag

tu gos ni spos kyis bdug /khang bzangs steng du ba mo bsil/ /char gyi zer spangs gnas par byas/ /rlung chu dang sbyar skyom dang / /nyin gnyid rtsol dang nyi tshan spang / /dbyar lus bsil bar gyur pa la/ /'phral du nyi zer gyis gdungs pas/ /char

'bab tshe na'ang bsags pa yi/ /mkhris pa ston ni ldang bar 'gyur/ /de bsal phyir ni sman mar kha/ /bkru sman gtang dang gtar ga bya/ /kha dang mngar dang bska ba dang / /bkres tshe zas ni yang ba bza'/ /'bras chan mung+ga skyu rur/ /sbrang rtsi skam sa'i pa to la/ /

nyi ma'i zer gyis gdungs pa dang / /zla ba'i 'od kyis bsil byas la/ /r-i Shi shar bas dug med pa/ /nyin mtshan gnyis kar sbyangs chu btung / /dngas pa'i dri mad chu zhes pa/ /dri med dri ma sel 'gyur ba/ /mi 'brug rtsub pa ma yin pa/ /btung ba la sogs bdud

rtsir mtshungs/ /tsan+dan ur shing ga pur dang / /mu tig chun 'phyangs phreng gos mdzes/ /khang bzangs rdo thal gyis dkar zhing / /zla zer can du mtshan gnas bya/ /zil pa thal sman ha cang 'grangs/ /zho dang til mar zhag nyi tshan/ /mi bzad chang dang nyin par nyal/ /

mdun gyi ser bu yongs su spang / /dgun dang dbyar ni dang po'i gsum/ /dpyid ni tha ma'i ro gsum bsten/ /sos ka mngar te ston ka ni/ /mngar dang kha dang bska ba bsten/ /mdor na zas dang skom dag ni/ /ston dang dpyid ni rtsub pa ste/ /so ga dbyar mtha' bsil

bar bya/ /gzhan dag tu ni de las bzlog /rtag tu ro kun bsten pa las/ /rang rang dus su lhag par bsten/ /dus gnyis thog ma'i zhag bdun ni/ /dus mtshams yin par shes par bya/ /de ni snga ma'i cho ga spang / /'og ma rim bzhin bsten par bya/ /

ma spangs na ni nad 'gyur te/ /'phral du nad ni 'ong bar 'gyur/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ mdo'i gnas kyi le'u gsum pa'o// //de nas nad mi 'byung bar bya ba'i dpyad kyi le'u bshad par bya'o/ /phyi dbugs bshang gci sbrid pa dang / /

bkres skom gnyid dang lud pa dbugs/ /glal dang mchil ma skyugs pa dang / /khu ba'i shugs ni dgag mi bya/ /'phyen ni bkag par gyur pa yis/ /skran dang rtug skam gzer snyom lci/ /'phyen dang bshang gci khong du 'gags/ /mig rtul drod chung snying nad

'gyur/ /bshang 'gags byin pa'i nya 'gyur zhing / /cham pas 'debs shing klad pa na/ /khar ni mi gtsang 'byung ba dang / /sngar bshad nad du'ang 'gyur ba yin/ /gcin 'gags pa yis yan lag na/ /rde'u chu so pho mtshan dang / /dku yi nang na sngar gyi nad/ /phal

cher 'byung ngo de yi sman/ /reng bu bsku byug lus bcing dang / /dugs dang sman mar mas gtong ba'o/ /zas skom bshang ba 'gags pa dang / /bshang 'gags las byung glo gcong mtshungs/ /chu bkag pa las mar gsar ni/ /che tshad tsam ni rab tu sbyar/ /sgregs

pa bgag na yi ga 'chus/ /lus 'dar snying dang brang 'gags na/ /sbo zhing lud pa skyigs bus 'debs/ /de'i sman skyigs bu dag dang 'dra/ /sbrid bkag mgo na dbang mi rno/ /gnya' rengs kha yo 'gram chags 'gyur/ /dud rnon gyis bdug mig sman dang / /sna

sman nyi ma lta ba yis/ /sbrid pa 'gags pa bsal bya zhing / /snum dang dugs kyang bsten par bya/ /skom pa 'gags pas kha skams shing / /yan lag mi bde rna mi gsang / /mgo 'khor myos shing snying nad 'byung / /der bsil cho ga thams cad phan/ /bkres pas lus

zhig yi ga 'chus/ /lus snyom nyam chung gzer mgo 'khor/ /de la zas yang snum dro dang / /chung ba dag ni sbyar bar bya/ /gnyid bkag khong myos spyi bo mig /lci zhing snyom la glal 'ong zhing / /lus zhig snyam sems de la ni/ /gnyid log

lus mnye phan pa yin/ /lud pa bkag pas de 'phel zhing / /dbugs mi bde zhing yi ga 'chus/ /snying nad skems byed skyigs bus 'debs/ /der ni lud pas la cho ga bya/ /ngal dub dbugs ni bkag pa las/ /skran dang snying nad myos par 'gyur/ /de la

ngal gso bya ba dang / /rlung sel bya ba'i cho ga phan/ /glal bkag na ni sbrid bkag mtshungs/ /cho ga thams cad rlung 'joms bya/ /mchil ma bkag pas mgo snying na/ /gnya' rengs yi ga 'chus mgo 'khor/ /skran bcas sna chu 'dzag 'gyur der/ /gnyid

ngoms chang btung gtam snyan phan/ /skyug bro brnags pas mi dbal mdze/ /'bras dang mig nad g.yan pa rims/ /skya rbab lud pa dbugs mi bde/ /dang ga ro stod mi bde skrang / /der kha bkang dbo dud smyung gnas/ /rtsub bros de nyid skyugs pa dang / /rtsol

dang myur bar gtar ga gdab/ /bkru sman gtang ba'ang bsngags pa yin/ /khu ba bkag pas de 'dzag dang / /pho mtshan na dang 'or nad rims/ /snying nad chu 'gags lus zhig dang / /rde'u 'phel dang ma ning 'gyur/ /de la khyim bya'i sha dang chang / /'bras chan

mas gtong lus bcing dang / /chu so'i nad bsal til mar btsos/ /'o ma bud med gzhon bsten phan/ /shugs ni bkag dang btsir ba yis/ /nad ni kun kyang 'byung bar 'gyur/ /shin tu mang po de yi phyir/ /gso dpyad mang po 'dir bshad do/ /de las phal cher

rlung du ma/ /gang phyir 'khrugs par 'gyur bas na/ /de phyir de'i zas skom dang sman/ /mnyam par 'gyur bar sbyar bar bya/ /'di dang gzhan du phan 'dod pas/ /'dod chen phrag dog zhe sdang dang / /ser sna 'dod chags la sogs shugs/ /rtag bkag dbang po thul bar bya/ /

dri ma rnams ni sbyang ba'i phyir/ /ji bzhin dus su nan tan bya/ /de ni shin tu sogs 'gyur na/ /shas cher 'khrugs pas srog rgyun gcod/ /gnod pa smyung dang gzhu byas pas/ /bsal kyang slar ni ldang srid kyi/ /gang zhig legs par sbyangs pa dag /de ni

slar yang 'byung mi 'gyur/ /dus shes pa yis de phan chad/ /rim pa bzhin du ci rigs par/ /bcud kyis len rnams grub pa dang / /ro tsa'i sbyor ba sbyar bar bya/ /sman rnams kyis ni lus sbyangs phan/ /sA lu drug cu pa dang dro/ /mung+ga sha dang mar la sogs/ /

phan pa'i zas kyis rim lus brtas/ /yid 'ong drod skyed sman sbyar ba/ /yi ga 'byed cing 'ju byed dang / /bsku zhang dril phyis khrus byas dang / /drag po 'jam rtsi mas gtong brtas/ /des ni me kun stobs ldan zhing / /blo mdog dbang po dri ma med/ /de bzhin tshe

ring ro tsa dang / /dpal dang gzi mdangs thob par 'gyur/ /'byung po dugs dang rlung dang me/ /mtshon smas chag grugs stsogs 'byung dang / /'dod chags zhe sdang 'jig tshogs gang / /de ni glo bur nad ces bya/ /shes rab nyes pa spang ba dang / /dbang po nyer

zhi dran pa dang / /yul dus bdag nyid shes pa dang / /dam pa'i spyod pa'i rjes 'jug pa/ /lhan cig skyes dang glo bur nad/ /mdor na ma skyes mi 'byung dang / /skyes pa zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/ /cho ga 'di ni bsten pa yin/ /grang ba las byung nyes tshogs dpyid kyi tshe/ /

rnam bsal sog las byung dbyar dus na/ /dbyar bsags sprin bral dus su legs sbyangs na/ /dus byung nad ni nam yang 'byung mi 'gyur/ /rtag tu phan pa'i zas dang spyod lam bsten/ /brtags te byed cing yul rnams la mi chags/ /gtong ldan sems snyoms bden

brtson bzod dang ldan/ /nyams ldan sten par byed na nad med 'gyur/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /mdo'i gnas kyi le'u bzhi pa'o// //de nas chu sna tshogs pa la sogs pa'i bye brag shes par bya ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /mkha' las 'bab

pa'i gang gA'i chu/ /'tsho byed ngoms byed yi gar 'ong / /tshim byed sems ni gsal byed la/ /sla zhing ro mi gsal la zhim/ /bsil zhing yang ba bdud rtsir mtshungs/ /nyi zla rlung gis reg gyur pa/ /de ni yul dus la ltos nas/ /phal/

cher phan dang gnod pa yin/ /gang zhing char 'bab dri ma med/ /'bras chan dngul phor nang gnas pa/ /ma rul mdog kyang ma gyur pa/ /gang gA'i chu de btung bar bya/ /gzhan du mtsho chu ston zla ni/ /'bring po min par btung mi bya/ /char pa'i chu ni snod bzang bzhag/

'gyur ba med par rtag tu btung / /de med na ni thang la gnas/ /bar snang ba dang rjes mthun yin/ /sa phyogs dkar nag gtsang zhing yangs/ /nyi 'od rlung gis phog pa bsngags/ /lteng ka 'dam rdzab nya lcibs dang / /rtsa dang lo ma rnyog ma can/ /nyi zla rlung gis

ma phog pa/ /mngon du 'bab dang chu gar lci/ /dbu ba srog chags can dang dro/ /grang ches so yis mi bzod pa/ /char gang dus su ma bab dang / /dus kyi dang por bab pa gang / /srog chags gdug dang ba stsogs 'dres/ /bshang gci dug 'dres gnod

mi btung / /nub phyogs nas ni rgya mtshor bab/ /gang yang myur 'bab rdul med chu/ /de dag mdor na dge ba yin/ /de las zlog na bzang ma yin/ /rdo la shugs drag rdebs pa yis/ /rgyun chad g.yengs pa'i chu dag dang / /gangs can ma la ya las byung /

dge'o de ni brtan g.yung na/ /srin bu rkang bam snying dang ni/ /lkog ma klad pa'i nad skyed 'gyur/ /shar dang nub kyi mtha' las byung / /gzhang 'brum skyed do dbang chen 'bab/ /dmu rdzing rkang bam nad skyed 'gyur/ /sa h+ya bin da'i ri las 'bab/ /mdze dang skya rbab

klad nad 'gyur/ /pa ri ya tra'i nad kun sel/ /khron pa rdzing la stsogs pa'i chu/ /skam sa rlan can brag las shes/ /drod chung skran yod skya rbab dang / /dmu rdzing tshad 'khru gzhang 'brum mam/ /pho ba'i drod chung 'or nad can/ /mi btung brnag dka' nyung zad btung / /

ston ka so ga ma gtogs par/ /nad med mis kyang cung zad btung / /zan zos bar mtha' thog mar ni/ /chu 'thungs ran dang sbom skems 'gyur/ /chu bsil chang nad brgyal ba dang / /skyugs dang ngal dang mgo 'khor dang / /skom dang lus tsha mkhris pa dang / /

khrag rgyas dug naM sel byed yin/ /chu tshan drod skyed zas 'ju zhing / /mgul bde lus yang gcin nad sel/ /skyigs bu lto sbos rlung bad kan/ /rims sar 'phral du zlog byed cing / /lud pa cham sar dbugs mi bde/ /rtsib logs zug la bsngags pa yin/ /

chu ni bskol ba grang ba dag /bad kan mi skyed lus yang zhing / /mkhris pa can la'ang phan pa yin/ /de ni zhag lon nyes gsum skyed/ /rgya star chu ni snum pa dang / /ro mngar ro tsa bsil zhing yang / /skom dang mkhris pa rlung nad sel/ /drod skyed lgang

pa'i nad sbyong byed/ /dbyar gyi char chu chu bo'i chu/ /mchog tu bzang dang ngan par bshad/ /chu'i sde tshan no// //'o ma phal cher ro zhu mngar/ /snum zhing mdangs skyed lus zungs 'phel/ /rlung dang mkhris sel ro tsa byed/ /bad kan skyed lci bsil ba yin/ /

ba yi 'o ma 'tsho byed cing / /bcud kyis len yin glo rdol dang / /glo gcong la phan yid gzhungs byed/ /stobs skyed nu zho skyed dang 'khru/ /ngal dang mgo 'khor myos dpal nyams/ /lud pa dbugs mi bde bkres skom/ /rims rnying gcin ni srib dang / /khrag dang mkhris

pa sel ba yin/ /ma he'i 'o ma 'ju drags dang / /gnyid med la phan rab lci bsil/ /ra ni chu nyung 'thung zas rgod/ /kha zhing tsha ba za bas yang / /skems dang rims dang dbugs mi bde/ /khrag dang mkhris pa tshad nad sel/ /rnga mo'i 'o ma cung rtsub dro/ /lan tshwa bro zhing

drod che yang / /rlung dang bad kan lto sbos srin/ /'or nad dmu rdzing gzhang nad sel/ /bud med nu zho rlung mkhris khrag /snad pa'i mig nad sel byed de/ /tshim byed mig dang snar blugs phan/ /lug gi 'o ma snying gnod tsha/ /rlung 'joms skyigs bu dbugs mi bde/ /mkhris

pa bad kan skyed pa yin/ /ban glang mo yis rab brtan byed/ /rmig pa gcig pa'i 'o ma tsha/ /yan lag rlung sal skyur bcas shing / /lan tshwa bo zhing rmongs par byed/ /'o rlon bad kan skyed cing lci/ /rigs par bskol bas de las gzhan/ /shin tu

bskol na 'ju dka' lci/ /bzhos ma thog dro bdud rtsir mtshungs/ /zho ni ro dang zhu rjes skyur/ /rtug skam lci la rlung nad sel/ /tshil dang khu chu stobs bad kan/ /khrag mkhris drod skyed 'or nad skyed/ /yi ga 'bye zhing kha zas len/ /grang ba'i rims dang mi snyoms

rims/ /cham pa gcin 'gags gyur pa dang / /'khru ba'i nad la rtsub mo phan/ /zho dron dpyid dang sog dang / /ston dus mtshan mo btung mi bya/ /de ni mung+ga'i sran tshod dang / /sbrang rtsi mar dang sha khar/ /skyu ru ra ni med mi btung / /rtag tu ma yin ma langs min/ /

gzhan du me dbal rims khrag dang / /mdze dang skya rbab mgo 'khor skyed/ /dar sar yang la bska zhing skyur/ /drod skyed bad kan rlung dag sel/ /skran nad dmu rdzing gzhang 'brum dang / /pho nad chu sri yi ga 'chus/ /mcher pa skran dang mar ma zhu/ /sbyar dug skya rbab nad/ /

rnams sel/ /de 'dra zhog chu 'khru yang / /rtsa sbubs sbyong la rtug skam sel/ /'phral gyi mar sar ro ci zhing / /bsil zhing mdog stobs drod skyed byed/ /'khru gcod rlung mkhris khrag gzhang 'brum/ /glo gcong kha yon lung pa sel/ /zhun mar blo rno dran gsal zhing / /

yid gzhungs drod skyed stobs tshe 'phel/ /mig dang byis rgan bu 'dod dang / /mdangs bzang rab gzhon skad snyan phan/ /glo rdol skem dang gcod dang 'bras/ /mtshon smas mes tshig rma la'ang bsngags/ /rlung dang mkhris pa dug dang smyo/ /lus skems mdangs nyams

rims nad sel/ /snum gyi nang na snum mchog ste/ /bsil zhing na tshod 'jog pa'i mchog /zhun mar stobs ni stong dang ldan/ /sbyor bas las ni stong byed 'gyur/ /mar rnying smyo dang brjed byed brgyal/ /glad nad rna mig mngal nad dang / /rma rnams sbyang zhing 'tsho byed pas/ /

nad las rgyal byed dam pa yin/ /phrum sar sbri dang rgya phrum dang / /chur ba la sogs stobs skyed cing / /khu ba gnyid dang bad kan 'phel/ /rtug skam byed lci nyes ba dang / /ba mar 'o ma mchog yin te/ /lug las byung ba smad pa yin/ /'o ma'i sde tshan no// //

bu ram shing khu 'khru lci snum/ /sha skye ro tsa bad gcin 'phel/ /bsil zhing khrag mkhris sel ba dang / /ro dang zhu rjes mngar ba yin/ /de tshe lan tshwa bro zhing sos/ /bcas na khar dag dang 'dra/ /rtsa ba rtse mo dbus zos stsogs/ /btsir dang dri mas sbags pa dang / /dus

ni cung zad lon pa las/ /'khrul 'khor can ni rnam 'gyur te/ /tsha zhing lci la ma khrigs par 'gyur/ /de la khar dkar po'i shing / /bsil dang mngar bas mchog yin la/ /de yi 'og ma sbubs can yin/ /tshigs brgya pa dang kan+ta ra/ /bal yul skyes stsogs

de las rim/ /cung zad tsha bro bska ba dang / /drod bcas cung zad tsha ba skyed/ /dbu ba can lci bad kan skyed/ /sogs byed gcin ni sbyong byed yin/ /dkar por dkan cher mi skyed/ /bshang dang gci ba bde bar 'byin/ /dmar nag phal cher srin bu khrag /rkang tshil

sha dang bad kan skyed/ /rnying pa yid 'ong phan pa yin/ /sar pa drod 'bri bad kan skyed/ /hwags dang khaN+Da kar dkar/ /rim gyis yon tan che ba ste/ /ro tsa glo gcong glo rdol dang / /khrag dang mkhris pa rlung sel yin/ /ya ba kha ra tsha zhing mngar/ /bska ste yon tan de

dang 'dra/ /kha ra kar kun tsha dang skom/ /skyug bro brgyal dang khrag mkhris sel/ /bu ram shing gdus khang dang / /dbu ba can mchog tha ma yin/ /sbrang rtsi mig phan gcod skom dang / /bad kan skyigs bu khrag mkhris 'joms/ /tshil chen mdze nad gcin nad skyug/

lud pa dbugs mi bde tshad sel/ /rma sbyong rma 'tsho chag grugs sbyor/ /rlung ni skyed par byed pa yin/ /rtsub cing bska la mngar ba ste/ /sbrang rtsi'i khaN+Da de dang 'dra'o/ /tsha zhing tshas gdungs tsha bar ldan/ /tsha ba des ni gsod par 'gyur/ /skyug sman sman mar mas gtong la/ /sbrang rtsi

dro ba'am bkag pa med/ /bu ram shing gi sde tshan no// //'bru mar rang gnas lta bu yin/ /de la til mar til dang mtshungs/ /gtso bo rno zhing khyab pa yin/ /pags pa'i nyes sel mig la gnod/ /tsha zhing rno la bad kan

sel/ /skem po dag ni sha skyed cing / /sbom po'i sha 'bri mkhregs par 'ong / /rtug skam srin bu 'joms pa dang / /sbyar bas nad rnams thams cad sel/ /e raN+Da mar tsha zhing kha/ /zhu rjes mngar lci 'khru ba yin/ /rlig rlugs skrang rlung bad kan dang / /lto nad

ldang dub rims nad sel/ /'or nad rked pa gsang ba'i nad/ /lto ba ro rgyab nad la phan/ /e raN+Da ni dmar po'i mar/ /rno tsha dri nga rab 'byil 'dred/ /yungs mar tsha dro rno ba dang / /bad kan rlung sel khu ba 'bri/ /yang zhing khrag mkhris skyed byed la/ /sha bkra mdze

'brum rmen bu sel/ /ba ru ra'i mar mngar bsil lci/ /skran skye rlung dang mkhris pa sel/ /nim dmar rab tu tsha min kha/ /lto srin mkhris pa bad kan sel/ /zar ma le brgan rtsi yi mar/ /dro zhing pags nad bad mkhris skyed/ /zhag dang rkang ni rlung 'joms shing / /

stobs dang khu chu bad kan skyed/ /sha ni rang dngos rjes mthun la/ /tshil yang de dang 'drar shes bya/ /til mar la stsogs pa'i sde tshan no// //chang ni drod 'bar yi ga 'byed/ /rno zhing drod skyed khor brta dga'/ /mngar bcas kha zhing tshab dang / /zhu rjes skyur zhing cung zad

'khru/ /bska bcas gdangs snyan nad med dang / /spobs bskyed mdog 'gyur khong yangs shing / /gnyid med pa dang gnyid che la/ /phan zhing khrag dang mkhris pa skyed/ /rigs 'thungs skem dang sbom phan zhing / /rtsub rno las sgo khyab cing sbyong / /rlung dang bad kan sel ba yin/ /

gzhan du bsten na dug dang mtshungs/ /chang sar lci zhing nyes skyed yin/ /chang rnying de las gzhan du byed/ /tsha ba'i spyod par ldan mi btung / /sun cing bkres nyen nad bas min/ /shin tu rno min sar pa dang / /legs par ma bslangs rnyog can yin/ /'bru chang skran dang dmu

rdzing dang / /rtug skem glo gcong sel ba dang / /rlung 'joms tshil dang khrag skyed cing / /gcin bder 'byin zhing bad kan skyed/ /chang dngas yon tan de 'dra las/ /yid 'ong yang zhing rno ba dang / /gzer dang lud pa dbugs mi bde/ /skyug bro bshang 'gags

sbos cham 'joms/ /ba rur chang yang zhing phan/ /shin tu ra ror mi 'gyur zhing / /rma dang skya rbab mdze nad la/ /ha cang gnod par mi 'gyur zhing / /rdzas bzhin yon tan rjes mthun chang / /chang gi yon tan kun las lhag /pho nad skya rbab mdze gzhang 'brum/ /lus

skem skrang 'or dmu rdzing rims/ /skran dang srin bu mcher nad sel/ /ro ni bska zhing tsha rlung skyed/ /rgun chang nad sbyong snying la phan/ /shin tu dro min mngar zhing 'khru/ /mkhris rlung cung zad skyed skya rbab/ /gcin nad gzhang 'brum srin nad sel/ /bu ram chang ni gcin rtug

'gags/ /'byin zhing ngoms la drod skyed yin/ /bu ram shing chang rlung mkhris skyed/ /snum dang bad kan las byung 'joms/ /tshil 'or dmu rdzing gzhang 'brum sel/ /de bas khu ba bskol mchog yin/ /sbrang chang 'grib byed rno ba ste/ /gcin nad cham pa lud pa sel/ /

tsha ni khrag mkhris bad kan dag /'ju zhing rlung ni snyoms byed la/ /rab tu tsha zhing rno rtsub skyur/ /yid 'ong yig 'bye zhing 'khru/ /drod skyed reg na bsil ba dang / /skya rbab srin sel mig la gnod/ /bu ram bur shing rgun chang dang / /tsha ni phyi ma phyi ma yang / /sdong bu rtsa ba 'bras

stsogs las/ /mnan byas de dang 'drar shes bya/ /rdo gu la sogs bzhur ba gzhan/ /dus kyi skyur po yang zas len/ /'bras khu'i rang skyur 'khru rno tsha/ /mkhris pa skyed byed bskus na bsil/ /ngal dang rmya sel yig 'byed/ /drod skyed chu se'i nad sel yin/ /

mas gtong la phan yid du 'ong / /yang zhing rlung dang bad kan 'joms/ /ba gcin ra lug ma he dang / /glang po rta bong rnga mo'i gcin/ /mkhris skyed rtsub cing rno la tsha/ /'thungs rjes tsha bro ro tsha ste/ /srin nad 'or nad dmu rdzing sbos/ /gzer dang skya rbab bad kan rlung / /dug skran sha bkra

yi ga 'chus/ /mdze dang gzhang 'brum myur du 'joms/ /de ltar chu bo bu ram shing / /til mar chang gi sde tshogs rim/ /gsher ba'i rdzas phyogs gcig pa 'di/ /rags rim ji bzhin bstan pa yin/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /

mdo'i gnas kyi le'u lnga pa'o// //de nas kha zas kyi tshul brtag cing shes par bya ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /rtsa snar 'bras chan ka ma la/ /drug cu pa dang bya yis blangs/ /sgron bu'i mchu dang rtse rnon dang / /ro 'dra'i 'bras 'dra dri bzang dang / /pa tang ka dang gser

mdog can/ /gang gzhan 'bras ni bzang po rnams/ /ro mngar zhu rjes mngar zhing snum/ /ro tsa bshang gci ska zhing chung / /ro rjes bska zhing phan pa dang / /yang zhing gcin mang bsil ba yin/ /de la rtse rno nang rtsa snar/ /mchog yin skom dang nyes gsum sel/ /

de yi 'og tu 'bras chan smad/ /de'i 'og ka ma la de'i 'og /nas 'dra ha yan char ma/ /ne sha da ka la sogs ni/ /ro mngar dri zhim lci la snum/ /zhu ba'i rjes skyur bad mkhris skyed/ /bshang dang gci ba thur du 'byin/ /snga ma snga ma smad pa yin/ /'bras nang drug cu ba mchog

ste/ /rtsa ser shun pa nag pa dag /snum zhing 'ju sla brten zhing mngar/ /nyes pa gsum sel bsil rtug 'dril/ /de las rim bzhin thug chen dang / /shun nag rgya skyegs tshigs ma 'dra/ /khyim bya'i sgang 'dra 'ur ba'i mig /phug ron 'bras dang su khar/ /'ba'

ra kha dang ut+pal dmar/ /tsi ta ston skyes da dur/ /gan d+han dang ku ru bin/ /yon tan rim bzhin chung shes bya/ /'bras gzhan mngar zhing zhu rjes skyur/ /mkhris pa skyed cing lci ba dang / gcin rtug mang zhing tshab yin/ /pa ta la nyid nyes gsum skyed/ /ci tshe khre dang

ni ba ra/ /khre rgod sne 'bras stsogs bsil yang / /rtsa'i 'bru de dag rlung skyed cing / /khong rtsub bad kan mkhris pa sel/ /de la khre ni rtas byed lci/ /lus kyi chag grugs 'byor bar byed/ /khre rgod mchog tu 'khru gcod cing / /reg na bsil la dug sel yin/ /nas

ni rtsub bsil lci la mngar/ /cung zad khong 'khru bshang rlung 'phel/ /ro tsa brtan byed gcin dang ni/ /tshil dang mkhris pa bad kan sel/ /cham pa lud pa dbugs mi bde/ /da rgan lkog nad pags nad sel/ /nas rgod cung zad dman pa yin/ /smyig

skyes 'bras nas rtsub cing tsha/ /gro ni ro tsa snum bsil lci/ /'tsho byed rlung dang mkhris pa sel/ /chag grugs 'byor byed mngar ba dang / /sha mkhregs byed cing cung zad 'khru/ /nan+ti mu ka ro bska zhing / /bsil zhing mngar yang phan pa yin/ /gra ma can gyi 'bru sna

tshogs kyi sde tshan no// //mon sran sde'u dkar sran chung stsogs/ /gang bu can 'bru rtsa sgo bkag /ro bska mngar zhing 'khru ba gcod/ /zhu rjes tsha la bsil zhing yang / /tshil dang khrag dang mkhris pa la/ /bskus shing blugs na phan pa yin/ /'di las mung+ga mchog

rlung chung / /sran ma shin tu rlung skyed yin/ /mon sran dkar po rlung skyed cing / /rtsub cing lci la bshang ba 'phel/ /rgya sran nag tsha zhu rjes skyur/ /khu chu'i rde'u cham lud pa/ /dbugs mi bde rlung bad gzhang 'brum/ /'joms shing khrag mkhris mchog tu skyed/ /

nis pa ba ni rlung khrag mkhris/ /nu zho gcin 'phel lci zhing 'khru/ /tsha byed mig gnod khu ba 'bri/ /bad kan 'or nang dug rnams sel/ /ma sha snum stobs bad kan skyed/ /bshang gci mkhris pa 'phel byed 'khru/ /lci zhing tsha la rlung 'joms dang / /khu ba 'phel zhing

'byin par byed/ /ka kan du la kha sral phre'u/ /yon tan mon sran gre'u dang 'dra/ /til 'bru dro zhing pags pa 'jam/ /bsil zhing skra dang stobs skyed pa/ /lci zhing gcin nyung zhu rjes tsha/ /yid gzhungs drod skyed bad mkhris skyed/ /zar ma snun mngar kha zhing dro/ /

lci zhing bad kan mkhris pa skyed/ /mig gnod khu skems zhu rjes tsha/ /le brgan rtsi 'bras de dang 'dra/ /gra ma can las nas rgod dang / /ma sha gang bu can tha chad/ /'bru yi gsar thog bad kan skyed/ /lor lon 'bru ni yang ba yin/ /myur skye de bzhin sran ma ni/

spun med legs brngos tshod ma yang / /gang bu chags pa'i 'bru sna tshogs kyi sde tshan no// //'bras thug sla ska gar ba dang / /'bras chan rnams ni snga ma bzhin/ /yang ngo de las sla ba ni/ /dge 'o rlung ni lugs mthun byed/ /skom rmya nyes pa

lhag ma 'joms/ /'ju zhing lus zungs mnyam par byed/ /rtsa sbubs mnyen byed rngul ba dang / /me yi drod ni skyed par byed/ /thug ska bkres skom nyam chung rmya/ /lto nad rims nad sel ba yin/ /dri ma 'gags la phan pa dang / /drod skyed nad ni 'ju bar byed/ /

thug gar 'khru gcod yi gar 'ong / /skom sel drod skyed rma dang mig /bkru sman rjes dang nyam chung dang / /snum 'thungs rjes la phan pa yin/ /'bras chan legs bkrus khu btsags tshos/ /rlangs pa dang ni bral ba dang / /gang yang tsha ba'i sman rnams kyis/ /bskol

ba'i 'bras tshos yang ba yin/ /de las bzlog pa gang zhig ni/ /sha khu 'o ma bskol stsogs lci/ /de ltar rdzas dang bya sbyor dang / /tshad la sogs pas kun shes bya/ /khu ba nyams rtas tshim byed cing / /ro tsa mig phan rma la gnod/ /mon san sde'u sbyong dang rma/ /lkog

ma mig nad dag la phan/ /ku lang+ga tha khu rlung dang skran/ /ro smad slar gzer gnod pa sel/ /til tshigs g.yos su sbyar byas nas/ /tshod ma skam dang myu gu dang / /skyur por chang bu bcug pa ni/ /mig gnod nyes skyed rmya byed lci/ /dri 'dzin lus brta ro tsa zhing / /snum

zhing stobs skyed yi ga 'bye/ /rgun chu'i btung ba ngal dub dang / /bkres sel tshim par byed cing lci/ /rtug skam gcin mang yi gar 'ong / /de yi yon tan sman bzhin blta/ /'bras yos skom dang skyug tshad 'khru/ /gcin mang tshil dang bad kan sel/ /lud pa

mkhris pa nyer zhi byed/ /drod skyed yang zhing bsil ba yin/ /srus leb lci zhing stobs skyed la/ /bad kan bshang ba sra byed cing / /nas yos rtug mkhregs rtsub pa dang / /skom zhing khong 'khrugs lci ba yin/ /nas phye khong yang bkres skom dang / /ngal dub mig

nad rma la phan/ /skyo mar byas pa 'thungs pa yis/ /'phral du stobs ni skyed byed yin/ /chu dang phye spel mi bza' zhing / /dus gnyis mtshan mo 'phrad med min/ /'grangs rjes mi bza' sos bcad min/ /ha cang 'grangs ches bza' mi bya/ /'ba' cha nyam

'bri rtsub pa dang / /bshang mkhregs mig la gnod pa yin/ /sha g.yos spod sbyar snum zhing lci/ /stobs skyed sha 'phel rtas byed yin/ /mung+ga g.yos sbyar lci ba dang / /sman gyi cha dang yon tan 'dra/ /khur ba mdag btsos dog le dang / /sa slang da nur rgya sol

bsregs/ /khur ba 'di rnams rigs gcig kyang / /phyi ma phyi ma yang ba yin/ /g.yos su byas pa'i zas kyi sde tshan no// //sha ba dgo ba ku rang ga /rkyang dang ri sha ri dwags ma/ /ri bong dang sgo tsa ru ka/ /ldang sgo la sogs ri dwags yin/ /la ba bar ti bar

ti ka/ /go tsa dmar dang gong mo dang / /sreg pa u pa tsakra dang / /ka pin tsa ra ku ru ba/ /bar da ka dang bar ti ka/ /gong ma sreg dang rma bya dang / /khyim bya dang ni tsa kor/ /gon nad dang ri la gnas/ /sha ra ba dang in+d+ra ba/ /ri bya 'di dag zas khron rko/ /shang shang

te'u da du ha/ /bung 'dra ne+e tso sha ri ka /ta la khu byug ha ri ta/ /bye'u la sogs mchus rko yin/ /sbal pa sbrul dang skyin gor dang / /bi dur la sogs khung na gnas/ /ba lang rta bong dre'u dang / /stag gzig seng ge dom spre'u/ /byi la byi ba spyang ki dang / /sre

mo dang ni dred dag dang / /wa dang 'phar ba khra dang ni/ /chun lag khra spyang bya rog gi/ /bya rigs khra sngon bya ku ru/ /bya rgod 'ug pa ka ling ka/ /dung can ma du ha la sogs/ /bya dang gcan gzan rtsal mthus za/ /phag rgod ru ru ma he skyin/ /ro hi ta dang glang po

che/ /mdzo rgod g.yag rgod bse dang ni/ /smyig glang zhes grags ri dwags che/ /chur gnas ngang pa sa ra sa/ /chu skyar ka ran da bya bla/ /rgya dang khrung khrung ngur pa dang / /so bya ka tam+ba sogs yin/ /nya ro ha ti ba ti na/ /nya phyis rus sbal kum bir/ /kar ta

dung sram sham+bu ka/ /nye ldang bar mi tsan ti ka /bu lu chu srin nag khra dang / /nya bo che ni byis pa gsod/ /ja ri ci li tsi ma stsogs/ /de ltar sha ni brgyad du bshad/ /ra lug gzas kyi spyod yul ni/ /'dres pas rigs gcig nges ma yin/ /thog ma

tha ma skam gsher gnas/ /bar ma gnyis po thun mong bshad/ /de las skam sa'i sha rtug 'gags/ /bsil ba dang ni yang pa yin/ /'dus pa mkhris pa shas che zhing / /rlung 'bring bad kan chung la phan/ /ri bong sha ni drod skyed rtsub/ /zhu rjes tsha zhing 'khru gcod

bsil/ /bar ta ki la sogs pa'i sha/ /cung zad snum dro lci rtas byed/ /de rnams las kyang rgya bya'i sha// /yid gzhungs drod stobs khu ba 'phel/ /bshang skems mdog bzang rlung shas che/ /'dus pa sel ba'i dam pa yin/ /rma bya'i sha ni bzang min yang / /rna mig

skad 'gags rgas srar phan/ /khyim byed 'dra'i ro tsa la/ /grang gnas lci zhing bad kan skyed/ /gong mo u pa tsa krar bcas/ /yid gzhungs drod skyed yi gar 'ong / /thi ba zhar ba'i sha lci zhing / /tsha bro nyes pa thams cad skyed/ /bye'u sha bad kan skyed cing snum/ /rlung 'joms

khu ba rab tu 'phel/ /sde tshan de las phyi ma rnams/ /rim bzhin lci dro snum zhing mngar/ /gcin mang ro tsa stobs skyed cing / /rlung 'joms bad kan mkhris pa skyed/ /de las ri dwags chen po bsil/ /rtsal mthus sha rlon za ba'i yang / /ro rjes lan tshwa bro zhu rjes/ /

tsha zhing sha ni 'phel bar byed/ /gzhang 'brum rnying pa pho ba grang / /skem nad nyen la mchog tu phan/ /ra sha shin tu bsil min zhing / /lci snum ma yin nyes med yin/ /lus dang khams ni mnyam pas na/ /bad kan mi skyed lus rtas byed/ /lug sha de las bzlog

pa ste/ /lus rtas yin par shes par bya/ /ba lang sha ni lud skam dang / /ngal dang tsho ches ma snyoms rims/ /cham pa dang ni skem pa dang / /rlung nad gcig pu na ba sel/ /ma he'i sha ni lci zhing tsha/ /gnyid che brtan byed shas cher skyed/ /phag rgod sha ni de 'dra zhing / /

ngal sel zas len khu stobs skyed/ /nya ni mchog tu bad kan skyed/ /tsi li tsi ma nyes gsum skyed/ /la ba ro ha ti skyin gor/ /sha ba rang rang sde tshan mchog /sha ni 'phral bsad pa dag dang / /dar la bab pa bsten par bya/ /rang shi rid dang shin tu tsho/ /nad chu dug

gis shi ba spang / /pho dang mo yi stod smad phyed/ /lci ste sbrum ma thams cad lci/ /rkang bzhi mo yi yang ba yin/ /bya rnams kyi ni pho yi yang / /mgo bo ro stod brang dang rgyab/ /rked pa dpyi yi lci ba yin/ /de bzhin pho ba rgyu ma sogs/ /go rims bzhin du

lci ba yin/ /khrag la sogs pa'i lus zungs rnams/ /phyi ma phyi ma lci ba yin/ /sha las rlig pa pho mtshan dang / /mkhal ma mcher pa gzhang dag lci/ /sha'i sde tshan no// //tshod ma pa tha sha ti dang / /su sha su ni sha na dang / /sa tin dza rgya sne'u stsogs/ /

nyes pa gsum 'joms rtug sri yang / /de las su ni shan dro/ /ro tsa ra dzak+Sha pa ti/ /pho ba gzhang 'brum nad sel mchog /rgya sne'u rtug skam 'joms pa yin/ /mon sne'u dme ru nyes gsum 'joms/ /mdze sel ro tsa bcud len dro/ /'khru zhing mgul pa snyan

par byed/ /tsang gi ri skyur me drod skyed/ /pho ba gzhang 'brum bad kan rlung / /drod che 'khru gcod yang ba yin/ /pa to la dang sab ta la/ /nim pa shang gas+tha sle tres/ /a pal gu za rtsa'i myu gu/ /bri ha ti dang bA sha dang / /ti la par Ni ku ta la/ /

man du ka 'dab kar ko ta/ /ka ra be la par ba ta/ /Na ti dang ni ka ta ya/ /go dzi ha dang bar da ka /ba na tig ta ka ri ram/ /ku li ka dang nan ti dang / /ku tsel shag kun da ni/ /ka til dang ke'u kam/ /sho tam ko sha ta ka dang / /kar sha 'jam bsil kha

zhing tsha/ /bshang sri rlung skyed bad mkhris sel/ /pa to la zhim srin nad sel/ /zhu rjes mngar zhing yi ga 'byed/ /bri ha ti gnyis mkhris skyed 'khru/ /drod skyed rlung ni 'joms pa yin/ /bri shan rlung dang lud pa 'joms/ /khrag mkhris sel ba'i dam pa

yin/ /kar bel la kha ba dang / /drod skyed bad kan sel mchog yin/ /bar ta ka ro kha zhing tsha/ /mngar dro bad kan rlung dag sel/ /lan tshwar bcas pa me drod skyed/ /yid 'ong zas len mkhris mi skyed/ /ka ri ra ni sbos byed cing /

ro bska mngar zhing kha ba yin/ /ko sha ta ka bal gu za/ /'khru zhing drod ni skyed byed yin/ /tan du li bsil rtsub pa dang / /ro mngar zhu rjes mngar zhing yang / /chang nad mkhris nad dug khrag sal/ /mun dza las byung rlung mkhris sel/ /snum bsil lci zhing mngar ba dang / /

lus rtas khu ba 'phel ba'i mchog /pa lag kya lci 'khru bar byed/ /u po da ka chang nad 'joms/ /tsu tsu pa lag kya 'dra las/ /de ni 'khru gcod bdag nyid can/ /bi da ri ni rlung mkhris sel/ /gcin mang mngar zhing bsil ba yin/ /'tsho bar byed cing

lkog nad sel/ /lus brta ro tsa lci bcud len/ /dzi ban ti mngar bsil ba dang / /mig la phan zhing nyes gsum sel/ /ku sman da bum sha ka ling / /kar ka dang ni er ba ru/ /da na dis zhes bya ba dang / /da na dis dang ga gon dang / /tsin ta ka dang tsir bi ta/ /

bad rlung skyed cing 'khrug cin mang / /bshang sri lci zhing zhu rjes mngar/ /'khri shing 'bras bu'i nang na mchog /ku sman da ste rlung mkhris sel/ /gcin nad sel zhing ro tsar byed/ /ga gon shin tu gcin mang zhing / /ku ba shin tu rtsub pa yin/ /ka ling ka dang er

ba ru/ /tsir bi mkhregs gzhon mkhris sel bsil/ /smin pa de las gzhan du byed/ /'bras bu rnying lung lan tshwar bcas/ /mkhris skyed bad kan rlung nad sel/ /yi ga 'bye zhing dro yid 'ong / /hen langs lto lbos sel zhing yang / /pad rtsa rtsa ba ut+pal rtsa/ /

ku mu ut+pal chu ba dang / /chus pa sha lu ka ta dang / /sring gdang ga sha ru ka/ /kron dza da na ka lod/ /rtsub cing bshang sri bsil zhing lci/ /ka lam pa dang na li ka/ /mar she zhes ni bya ba dang / /ku ti na dza ra ku kha/ /seng phrom yungs ma lo ni ka /ka ru da ka ga pe du/ /

'tsho byed dang ni dzun dzu dang / /e dag dza dag dang ni/ /ya ba sha ka lcam pa dang / /a lu ka stsogs thams cad dang / /sran lo shing mngar lo ma dang / /mngar zhing rtsub la lan tshwa bro/ /bad kan rlung skyed lci ba dang / /bsil zhing bshang lci 'byung sla byed/ /phal

cher zhu nas bshang gci mkhregs/ /tshos shing khu ba legs btsir la/ /mar cher btab pa nyes mi skyed/ /seng phrom 'dab ma zhes bya gang / /de ni rgya sne'u dang 'drar 'dod/ /tar ka ri bar na mngar/ /kha bcas rlung dang bad kan sel/ /pur+Na rnam gnyis ka la

sha/ /cung zad tsha bro kha zhing tsha/ /drod skyed khong 'khru sbyar dug dang / /'or nad bad kan rlung nad 'joms/ /tsi bi ra yi myu gu ni/ /drod skyed rlung dang bad sel 'khru/ /nye'u shing myu gu kha ba ste/ /ro tsa nyes gsum sel ba yin/ /smyig ma'i myu gu rtsub pa dang / /

khong tsha rlung dang mkhris pa skyed/ /ba ru ra ni drod skyed kha/ /mcher pa gzhang 'brum bad rlung sel/ /ka sa mar da srin lung pa/ /bad kan sel zhing zhu byed 'khru/ /le brgan rtsi tshod rtsub skyur tsha/ /lci zhing mkhris pa skyed la 'khru/ /yungs kar tshod ma lci zhing tsha/

bshang dang lci 'gags nyes kun skyed/ /la phug gzhon nu ro mi gsal/ /cung zad tsha bro kha dang bcas/ /gang yin de ni nyes kun sel/ /yang zhing cung zad tsha ba dang / /skran dang lud gcong dbugs mi bde/ /rma dang mig nad lkog nad sel/ /skad 'gags

drod chung rtug skam dang / /cham pa'i nad ni 'joms pa yin/ /nar son ro dang zhu rjes tsha/ /drod skyed byed cing nyes gsum skyed/ /bad kan skyed lci btsos pa ni/ /snum zhing de yang rlung sel yin/ /skam po rlung dang bad kan sel/ /rjen pa thams cad nyes skyed

yin/ /yungs ma tsha zhing dro ba dang / /bad kan rlung sel mkhris pa skyed/ /shan ta mU la mkhris sel zhing / /bsil zhing zhu rjes mngar ba dang / /ro mngar kha zhing bska ba ste/ /bad kan dug kyang sel bar bshad/ /ku ther bye'u rug shi kru/ /su mu kha dang ske

tshe dang / /bu srin dang pha ni dza/ /zin thig le dang dzam bi ra/ /de la stsogs pa'i ldum rnams ni/ /bshang gci sra zhing me drod skyed/ /khong pa tsha byed kha rtsub tsha/ /yid 'ong lus dro yi ga 'bye/ /mig gnod khu ba srin 'joms rno/ /

skrang par byed dang yang ba yin/ /bye rug skyigs lud dbugs mi bde/ /rtsib logs zug dug kha mnam sel/ /su mu kha ni rab tsha min/ /sbyar dug 'or nad sel ba yin/ /'u su'i lo ma kha zhing mngar/ /gcin mang mkhris pa skyed ma yin/ /sgog skya rab tu

tsha zhing rno/ /zhu rjes tsha zhing 'khru ba dang / /zhim zhing skra skyed lci ro tsha/ /snam zhing drod skyed yi ga 'bye/ /sha bkra mdze skran gzhang 'brum dang / /gcin nad srin dang bad kan rlung / /skyigs bu cham pa dbugs mi bde/ /lud pa sel te khrag mkhris skyed/ /kun dong de las

yon tan dman/ /bad kan skyed mkhris rab mi skyed/ /ke'u btsos dug sbyar zos pa yis/ /bad kan rlung dang gzhang 'brum sel/ /rno zhing rtug pa sri ba dang / /de ni mkhris can la phan min/ /su ra drod skyed kha zas len/ /bad sel dri ma sbyong zhing yang / /mchog tu

gzhang 'brum dag la phan/ /sbang phrum shin tu nyes skyed yin/ /me tog 'dab ma 'bras yal ga /sdong bu rim bzhin lci ba yin/ /tshod ma'i rab mchog 'tsho byed yin/ /yungs kar tshod ma tha chad yin/ /tshod rngad rnams kyi sde tshan no// //rgun 'brum

'bras bu'i mchog yin te/ /ro tsa mig sman bshang gci sla/ /mngar zhing zhu rjes snum pa dang / /cung zad bska zhing bsil la lci/ /rlung dang khrag mkhris sel byed cing / /kha nang kha bro chang nad dang / /skom lud tshad rims dbugs mi bde/ /skad 'dzer glo rdol glo

gcong sel/ /bal po se'u mngar mkhris rgyas dang / /nyes pa gsum po sel ba yin/ /skyur ba mkhris skyed min cung dro/ /rlung dang bad kan 'joms par byed/ /se'u kun kyang yid 'ong snum/ /yang zhing bshang sra drod zas len/ /mo tsha 'bra go pa nas/ /rgya

star pa ru sha ka dang / /a mra ta la kasma 'bras/ /ra ja da na ma du'i 'bras/ /rgya shug so bi ra ang kol/ /phal ku sles ma ta'i 'bras bu/ /ta mal bi shu star ga'i 'bras/ /myu gu la dang rgya kham dang / /a ru ma na pi yal 'bras/ /rtas byed lci zhing bsil

ba yin/ /lus tsha glo rdol glo gcong sel/ /khrag dang mkhris pa snyoms par byed/ /zhu rjes mngar zhing snum pa dang / /bshang lci bad kan khu ba 'phel/ /ta la'i 'bras bu mkhris skyed 'khru/ /kasma rgya 'bras bsil ba dang / /bshang lci 'gags pa sel byed

cing / /skra byed yid gzhungs bcud len 'gyur/ /pa ta ma stsogs dro ba dang / /bad kan mkhris pa skyed byed 'khru/ /snum zhing mchog tu rlung skyed byed/ /pi la ya'i 'bras tshab min/ /pi la ya yi tshi gu mngar/ /ro tsa mkhris pa rlung nad sel/ /rgya shug tshi gu'i yon tan ni/ /de 'dra

skam slon lud pa sel/ /bil 'bras smin pa 'ju dka' zhing / /nyes skyed 'phyen ni dri ba byed/ /ma smin drod skyed bad rlung sel/ /de dag gnyis ka 'khru ba gcod/ /ma smin ka pid mgul nad dab/ /nyes pa kun skyed smin pa ni/ /nyes 'joms skyigs bu slon bro sel/ /

kun kyang 'khru gcod dug 'joms yin/ /'dzam bu'i shang tog bshang gci sri/ /bsil zhing shin tu rlung skyed yin/ /bshang dang lci ba gcod byed cing / /lkog ma la gnod bad mkhris sel/ /a mra'i 'bras bu ma smin rlung / /khrag mkhris skyed byed rus chags pa/ /

bad kan mkhris skyed min rlung skyed/ /lci mngar bad kan khu ba 'phel/ /br-ik+Sha am+la rtsub bshang sri/ /lci tsha bad kan rlung dag 'joms/ /sha mya tsha lci skra gnod rtsub/ /pi lu'i 'bras bu mkhris pa skyed/ /bad kan rlung nad sel zhing 'khru/ /mcher pa

gzhang 'brum skran srin sel/ /pi lu mngar zhing kha ba gang / /shin tu tsha min nyes gsum 'joms/ /ba lu shun kha tsha zhing snum/ /rlung nad sel bar byed pa yin/ /ba lung 'bras shas rtas byed mngar/ /rlung dang mkhris pa sel zhing lci/ /de yis rkang yang

skyigs lud pa/ /dbugs mi bde dang chang nad sel/ /kha skam rlung dang bad kan dang / /rtug sra skyugs bro yi ga 'chus/ /skran dang gzhang 'brum gzer nad dang / /me drod chung ba nyid sel to/ /na rang ga 'bras mngar cung skyur/ /

yi gar 'ong zhing kha zas len/ /lci zhing rlung ni rab skyed pa'i/ /yon tan ldan par shes par bya/ /bse shing 'bras bu'i shun pa sha/ /khong rtas byed cing mngar la bsil/ /de'i rus me mnyam yid gzhungs byed/ /bad kan rlung ni sel ba'i mchog /ku shu rnam

gnyis lci ba ste/ /mngar skyur bsil dang tsha ba yin/ /yi ga 'bye zhing me rab 'bri/ /kham sha yi ga 'byed cing mngar/ /smin pa myur du 'ju bar 'gyur/ /shin tu tsha min lci nyes skyed/ /rgun 'brum pa ru sha ka dang / /ka ra mar dang btsos rlon skyur/ /mkhris pa

bad kan skyed cing 'khru/ /lci zhing nus tsha rlung 'joms so/ /rgya shug skyur thung li gu tshe/ /a mra ka ta de bzhin no/ /e ra ba ti tu da dang / /mri ka lin da dzam bir bcas/ /smin dang ka ra yar ta skam/ /mkhris pa shin tu skyed byed min/ /am+li ka dang rgya

shug skyur/ /skam po drod skyed 'khru ba dang / /skom dang ngal dang rmya ba sel/ /yang zhing rlung dang bad kan 'joms/ /de las 'bras bu kun tha chad/ /li gu tsi ste nad kun slong / /kha ba me dang rlung gnod nyen/ /sbrul gyi kha chu stsogs pas phog /srin

bus zos dang chu nang ltung / /sa ngan dus min skyes pa dang / /'bru gzhan 'dres zhing mthu nyams dang / /shin tu rnying 'gyur 'bru spang bya/ /tshod ma'ang de bzhin rtsub par ni/ /g.yos pa dag dang mi snyi dang / /ro ni smin par ma gyur dang / /la phug ma gtogs

skam po dang / /'bras bu'ang phal cher de bzhin te/ /bil ba ma gtogs rlon pa spang / /'bras bu'i sde tshan no// //lan tshwa kun kyang bad kan skyed/ /phra zhing bshang gci 'byin la 'jam/ /rlung 'joms 'ju byed tsha zhing rno/ /yi ga 'bye zhing bad mkhris skyed/ /

de la lce myang tsha mngar bcas/ /ro tsa yid 'ong nyes gsum sel/ /yang zhing tsha la mig la phan/ /tsha ba mi skyed me drod skyed/ /rtsal ru tsha yang yid 'ong zhing / /sgregs pa sbyong zhing dri zhim la/ /zhu rjes tsha zhing bshang sri sel/ /drod skyed yi ga 'byed byed yin/ /

kha ru tsha ni stod bad kan/ /smad kyi rlung 'byin drod skyed la/ /bshang 'gags lto sbos rtug skam dang / /gzer zug lus lci sel ba yin/ /rgya mtsho'i lan tshwa zhu rjes mngar/ /lci zhing bad kan rnam 'phel byed/ /bkod ma'i tsha ni cung zad kha/ /tsha dang ba tsha rno byed

gsher/ /kha ru tsha nag yon tan dri/ /ma gtogs yon tan bi dar mtshungs/ /mtsho tsha yang ste sa skam tsha/ /bad kan skyed cing 'ju dka' lci/ /lan tshwa rnams kyi sbyor ba la/ /rgya mtsho la sogs rab tu sbyar/ /nas tshig 'khus pa'i lan tshwa ni/ /skran dang

snying nad skya rbab dang / /pho ba mcher pa lkog nad dang / /lud pa gzhang 'brum dbugs mi bde/ /lto sbos bad kan sel ba yin/ /swa rdzi ka sogs thal tsha kun/ /rab rno tsha zhing srin sel yang / /khrag mkhris skyed byed smin byed la/ /gcod cing mi zhim rnam

par 'byed/ /nas tshig 'khus tsha kha bas na/ /mdog mdangs khu ba skra mig gnod/ /shing kun rlung dang bad kan sel/ /gzer 'joms mkhris pa skyed byed de/ /zhu rjes ro tsha yi ga 'byed/ /drod skyed zas 'ju yang ba yin/ /a ru ra bska zhu rjes

mngar/ /rtsub cing lan tshwa'i ro med yang / /drod che zas 'ju yid gzhungs byed/ /na tshod la 'jog dam pa yin/ /dro zhing 'khrul tshe la phan/ /blo dang dbang gsal stobs rab skyed/ /mdze dang bzhin lus mdog mi sdug /skad 'gags rims rnying

mi bzad rims/ /glad pa mig nad skya rbab dang / /mig ser pho ba'i nad rnams dang / /skem bcas 'or dang gcin nad sel/ /tshad 'khru rmongs bag myos slon srin/ /mchil mang lud pa dbugs mi bde/ /gzhang 'brum mcher pa lto sbos dug/ /

gsum 'phel rgyun 'gags skran dang ni/ /da rgan na dang yi ga 'chus/ /rlung dang bad kan las gyur nad/ /de dang de ni sel byed yin/ /skyu ru ra yang de 'dra bsil/ /ro skyur bad mkhris sel de las/ /yon tan cung dman ba ru ra/ /

zhu rjes tsha mngar skra mig phan/ /'bras bu gsum po 'di dag ni/ /bcud kyis len mchog mig nad sel/ /rma 'tsho pags nad rma red dang / /tshil ches gcin snyi bad khrag sel/ /shing tsha sug smel b+ha dra gsum/ /ge sar bcas pa dri bzang bzhi/ /na

le sham ni mkhris skyed rno/ /rtsub cing drod skyed yi ga 'byed/ /ro dang zhu rjes dag kyang tsha/ bad kan 'joms shing yang ba yin/ /pi pi ling rlon bang skyed mngar/ /bsil zhing lci la snum pa yin/ /skam po de las bzlog pa yin/ /snum zhing ro tsa ro tsha la/ /zhu

rjes mngar zhing bad rlung dang / /lud pa dbugs mi bde sel 'khru/ /de gnyis bcud len ma gtogs pa/ /gzhan las shas cher sbyar mi bya/ /dong gra drod skyed ro tsa dang / /'khru gcod yid 'ong mkhregs pa sel/ /yi ga 'bye yang zhu rjes mngar/ /khong snum drod

che bad rlung sel/ /sge'u gsher de 'dra de dag ni/ /tsha ba gsum ste sha spom dang / /me drod nyams dang dbugs mi bde/ /lud pa rkang bam cham pa 'joms/ /dbyi mo pi pi ling rtsa ba/ /nal sham yon tan cung zad chung / /tsi tra ka stobs me dang mnyam/ /

'or nad gzhang 'brum srin mdze sel/ /'di rnams las ni na le sham/ /ma gtogs tsha ba lnga zhes bshad/ /skran chen dmu rdzing lto sbos dang / /gzer 'joms drod ni skyed pa'i mchog /bil ba kash+ma tar ka ri/ /ba ta la dang dun du ka /rtsa chen lnga po

bska kha dro/ /rlung dang bad kan sel byed yin/ /ang shu ma ti pri ha ti/ /gnyis gnyis gze rtsa chung lngar bshad/ /zhu rjes ro mngar ha cang ni/ /bsil dang tsha min nyes kun sel/ /ba la pur+Na e raN+Da/ /su pya par+Ni rnam gnyis rtsa/ /'bring yin bad

kan rlung 'joms yin/ /shin tu mkhris pa mi skyed 'khru/ /nye'u shing ka ko la 'tsho byed/ /dzi ba ka dang ri shar bshad/ /'tsho byed ces bya mig la phan/ /ro tsa rlung dang mkhris pa sel/ /'jag ma ku sha 'bras bur shing / /'dam rtsa rtsar bshad lnga

mkhris sel/ /gra ma gang bu g.yos sbyar zas/ /sha dang tshod ma shing tog sman/ /zas cha cung zad tshan gdus 'di/ /rtag tu dgos pa yod pa smra/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /mdo'i gnas kyi le'u drug pa'o// //

de nas kha zas bsrung ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /rgyal po'i pho brang nye 'khor du/ /srog 'tsho'i slob dpon gzhag par bya/ /de ltar byas pas thams cad du/ /thams cad las ni bsrung bar 'gyur/ /khyad par du ni sa bdag gi/ /zas skom dug las

bsrung bar bya/ /chos la stsogs dang gang 'brel pa'i/ /'byor ba de de la rag las so/ /'bras chan dug bcas gsher bag kyang / /skam bag can ni 'dra bar 'gyur/ /yun ring tshos par gyur pa dang / /tshos pa'ang zhag lon lta bur 'gyur/ /rlangs pa rma

bya'i mgrin 'dra zhing / /khong myos brgyal dang lus rngul skyed/ /dri dang mdog stsogs nyams par 'gyur/ /rul zhing rma bya'i sgro ltar 'tsher/ /tshod ma myur du skams pa dang / /bskol ba'i mdog ni gnag 'gyur zhing / /der gzugs chung ba'am che ba'am/ /

mi sdug pa'am mi snang 'gyur/ /dbu ba steng 'byung ri mo mtshams/ /kha chu 'dra dang chu bur 'byung / /btung ba mngar skyur tshod ma dang / /sha dag mtshams bye ro dang bral/ /sha khu'i ri mo sngor snang zhing / /'o ma zangs mdog zho dri ma/ /

dar ba la ni ser dang gnag /mar khu chu dang 'dra bar snang / /chang dang chu rnag sbrang rtsi la/ /ljang snang til mar dag la dmar/ /shing tog ma smin smin par snang / /smin pa dag ni yongs su 'drul/ /kha zas rlon dang skam pa dag /rnyings shing mdog

ni nyams par 'gyur/ /snyi ba dang ni sra ba dag /reg pa go ni bzlog par 'gyur/ /me tog phreng rtse lo ma gas/ /rnying cing dri ni mi zhim 'gyur/ /gos la nag po tal til dang / /spu rnams 'thul zhing kha tshar 'chad/ /gser

dngul mu tig shing dang rdo/ /rin chen stsogs la dri ma chags/ /gzi mdangs reg pa 'od nyams 'gyur/ /sa yi snod ni mdog bcas byed/ /dug ster kha ni sngo bskams la/ /gnong bag gis ni phyogs su blta/ /rngul zhing 'dar la skrag pa dang / /'jigs

shing 'gros 'khyor glal bar 'gyur/ /dug ldan zas ni mes bsregs na/ /me lce gcig 'khyil me stag rgal/ /du ba rma bya'i mgrin 'drar 'gyur/ /me lce mi 'bar 'bar yang mnan/ /sbrang mas zos na 'chi bar 'gyur/ /bya rog gis zos skad zhan 'gyur/ /

'di ni ne tso da ru ha/ /ri skegs kyis mthong ca co 'byin/ /ngang pas zos na rdeg 'chos la/ /shang shang te'u na bar 'gyur/ /sreg pa mig ni mi chags byed/ /khrung khrung dag ni 'dzur bar 'gyur/ /phug ron khu byug bya gag dang / /ngur bas zos na 'chi bar 'gyur/ /

byi la skyo zhing 'dor bar 'gyur/ /spre'u mi gtsang 'dor bar byed/ /rma byas de mthong dga' bar byed/ /dug gi dbal ni nyams par 'gyur/ /de ltar zas ni dug ldan par/ /shes shing ci nas de yi ni/ /srog chags phra mo yan chad la/ /gnod par 'gyur bas

'bad de dor/ /reg na tsha zhing g.ya' lan/ /rims 'debs 'brum 'byung tshor ba chung / /sen mo spu 'byung lus skrangs te/ /de la dug ni rnam 'jig pa'i/ /tsan+dan shug pa pu shel tsi/ /so ma'i shun bcas bal bu'i 'dab/ /ru rta sle tres a ka ru'i/ /
