chus bkrus blugs shing bsku bar bya/ /khar chud na ni mchil snabs mang / /lce mchu sbrid cing be+em por byed/ /lus tshan zhing so brtse la/ /ro mi tshor zhing 'gram so 'thams/ /de la dug kun 'joms sman dang / /ur shi stsogs khus mkhur bkang

dbo/ /ma zhu'i gnas 'bab rdul ba dang / /brgyal zhing lto sbos myos mgo 'khor/ /ba spu ldang zhing skyug lus tsha/ /mig mi gsal zhing snying mi dran/ /yan lag thig les khyab par 'gyur/ /zhu ba'i gnas su phyin na yang / /kha dog sna tshogs skyug pa

dang / /gcin mngar rab tu 'khru bar 'gyur/ /rmya snyom skem zhing mdog skya la/ /gsus pa che zhing nyams stobs zad/ /de gnyis slon dang khrus byas nas/ /ser gnyis bu ram gir kar ni/ /san+du ba ri nis pa ba/ /ba shi ka dang tshigs brgya pa/ /tan du

li ya'i rtsa ba dang / /bya gag sgo nga bal ku za/ /snar gtang mig sman blud bya ba/ /dug zhi'i phyir ni sbyar bar bya/ /dug 'thungs pa dag steng dang ni/ /de bzhin 'og ni sbyangs gyur nas/ /dus su zangs bzang bdar phye ma/ /sbrang rtsir bcas pa snying sbyong sbyin/ /

snying nad sbyangs nas gser phye ni/ /zhib mo zho phyed sbyin byas na/ /pad+ma'i 'dab mar chu bzhin du/ /gser gyis yan lag la mi chags/ /tshe yang ring du 'phel bar 'gyur/ /sbyar dug la yang cho ga 'di'o/ /kha zas dag kyang mi mthun zos/ /sbyar dug

'dra bar shes par bya/ /rlan can sha dang mon sran gre'u/ /sbrang rtsi 'o ma myu gu can/ /pad+ma'i rtsa ba la phug gam/ /bu ram dang bcas mi 'phrod yin/ /khyad par du ni 'o ma nya/ /nya rnams las kyang tsi li tsim/ /'o ma lhan cig skyur kun ni/ /mi 'phrod

shing tog de bzhin no/ /de bzhin rgya sran khre dag dang / /ba la ku mu ta mi 'phrod/ /la phug la stsogs sngo rngad ni/ /zos nas 'o ma spang bar bya/ /phag rgod byi dur sha mi bza'/ /khyim bya bri sha ta zhor min/ /sha rlon mkhris pa dag dang ni/ /la

phug ma sha'i tshod mar min/ /le brgan tsi tshod lug shar min/ /myu gu'i tshod ma pad rtsar min/ /ma sha'i sran tshod bu ram zho/ /mar 'o li gu rtse'i 'bras min/ /chu shing 'bras bu dar bar min/ /ta la'i 'bras bu zhor mi 'phrod/ /tshab gnyis

po bu ram dang / /sbrang rtsi ka kam tsir min/ /de ni nya btsos pa'i snod dang / /dong gra btsos bar g.yos pa min/ /ka ma ta ni snod gzhan du/ /btsos nas nyin mtshan lon mi bza'/ /nya brngos pa yi snum la ni/ /pi pi ling brngos

spang bar bya/ /mar sar khar snod zhag bcu lon/ /go bye'i 'bras bu dror mi bza'/ /ba sa bsregs shar mi 'phrod cing / /dar bar kam pi la btsos min/ /'o thug dang ni kri sar/ /chang dang lhan cig mi 'phrod spang / /sbrang rtsir mar sar zhag til mar/ /chu

rnams gnyis gnyis gsum gsum mam/ /cha mnyam lhan cig zos pa dag /phan tshun dag ni mi mthun no/ /mar sbrang cha ni mi mnyam yang / /char pa'i chu ni 'thungs na gnod/ /sbrang rtsi pad+ma'i sa bon dang / /sbrang rtsi 'bru chang kha rar min/ /'o thug rjes la skyo mar min/ /

sha mo yungs mar brngos mi 'phrod/ /u po ta ka til tshigs la/ /btsos pa 'khru bar byed pa yin/ /bya gag sha ni chang dngas dang / /kul ma sha yi thug mi 'phrod/ /de nyid phag rgod tshil la brngos/ /srog ni 'phral du 'joms par byed/ /de bzhin sreg pa rma bya

dang / /la ba ka pin dza la sram/ /e raN+Da yi me la ni/ /e raN+Da mar brdos mi 'phrod/ /ha rid tra sha skyer pa yi/ /thur ma dag la bskyon nas ni/ /skyer pa'i me la bsregs gyur pa/ /'phral du srog ni 'joms par byed/ /de nyid thal brdul gyis gos/ /sbrang

rtsir bcas pa 'phrod ma yin/ /gang yang nyes pa ma sbyangs pa/ /mdor na de ni mi 'phrod yin/ /nyes 'di sbyang bar 'dod pa'am/ /yang na de dang mi mthun pa'i/ /rdzas de nyid kyis dang po ni/ /lus ni mngon par sbyang bar bya/ /rtsol can snum bsten drod che dang / /dar

la bab cing nyams stobs ldan/ /goms par zos dang cung zad zos/ /mi 'phrod gyur kyang gnod mi 'gyur/ /mi 'phrod cha yis goms bya'am/ /cha yis cha yis yongs su spang / /phan pa'ang de bzhin bsten bya ste/ /'di dag gnyis gsum gyis

chod bya/ /skyon ni rim gyis 'grib pa dang / /yon tan rim gyis 'phel 'gyur na/ /slar skye bar ni mi 'gyur zhing / /g.yo ba med pa dag tu 'gyur/ /mi 'phrod pa yang spangs gyur zhing / /'phrod pa goms par gyur pa nyid/ /'phral du spangs dang ma bsten las/ /

nyes pa rnams ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /gnod pa gnod bya'i bdag nyid can/ /shin tu nyes par gyur pa la/ /phan med gnod par byed pa ni/ /mkhas pas phyir zhing bya mi rigs/ /zas dang mal stan 'dod la spyod/ /ran zhing rigs par sbyar ba yis/ /khang khyim

'chos pa lta bur ni/ /rtag tu lus ni gzung bar bya/ /de la zas ni bshad zin zhing / /de dang der ni bshad par bya/ /bde sdug sbom skem stobs che chung / /bud med la phod mi phod dang / /shes dang mi shes 'tsho dang 'chi/ /gnyid la rag ni lus pa yin/ /

dus min ha cang thal ches dang / /gnyid ni kun tu 'gegs pa dag /bde dang tshe ni nyams byed de/ /dus mtshan gnyis pa lta bu yin/ /mtshan mo gnyid ni ma log rtsub/ /nyin mo gnyid log snum lcir 'gyur/ /tsog pur 'dug ste yur bdag /mig

rtsub bad kan med par 'gyur/ /so ga rlung 'phel stobs 'phrog dus/ /rtsub cing mtshan mo thung bas na/ /nyin par gnyid phan gzhan dag tu/ /de ni bad kan mkhris pa skyed/ /smra mang bzhon dang lam gyis dub/ /ra ro bud med bsten khur las/ /

khros dang mya ngan 'jigs pas dub/ /skyigs bu dbugs mi bde tshad 'khru/ /rgan dang byis pa nyams stobs zad/ /glo rdol skem dang gzer gyis gnod/ /zas ma zhu dang bcom dang smyo/ /nyin par gnyid log rigs ma gtogs/ /'di dag de bzhin

lus zungs snyoms/ /bad kan skyes shing lus brtas gyur/ /tshil che bad kan mang dang snum/ /rtag za nyin par gnyid ma log /dug gis phog dang lkog nad can/ /mtshan mo nam yang gnyid ma log /dus min gnyid log rmongs bag dang / /rims

skyed rmugs shing cham pas 'debs/ /mgo na skrang zhing slon sgyid skyur/ /rtsa yi rgyun 'gags me drod nyams/ /de la bsnyung dang slon sman dang / /rngul 'byung sna sman btang ba dang / /gnyid ches gyur la skyug sman rno/ /mig sman rno dang sna sman

dang / /smyung ba sel las bud med bsten/ /mya ngan 'jigs dang khros ba sbyar/ /'di dag nyid kyis gnyid drags pa/ /'jig cing bad kan rab zad byed/ /gnyid yar ba yis yan lag snyoms/ /klad pa lci zhing glal 'ong la/ /mi gsal na zhing mgo 'khor

la/ /zas mi 'ju rmya rlung skyed nad/ /de bas mtshan mo dus bzhin du/ /ci bder gnyid ni log par bya/ /ma goms gnyid kyis ma log na/ /nang par ma zos phyed gnyid log /gnyid yar gyur na 'o ma dang / /chang dang sha khu zho rnams btung / /lus bsku

dril dang khrus bya zhing / /mgo bsku rna ba mig dag bya/ /na chung lag ngar gyis 'khyud dang / /sems bde bya ba zin pa dang / /yid dang rjes mthun yul ldan pa/ /ci 'dod gnyid 'ong bde bar skyed/ /nyal po'i bde la sems ma chags/ /tshangs par spyod pa la

dga' ba/ /chog shes pa yis mgu ba'i gnyid/ /rang gi dus las 'da' mi byed/ /nyal po'i chos ni spang bya ba/ /bkan min zla mtshan ldan pa dang / /yid du mi 'ong mi sdug spyod/ /mngal ni skyon gyis khyab pa dang / /rab sbom skem dang btsas pa dang /

sbrum ma gzhan gyi bud med dang / /rigs gzhan skye gnas mi mthun dang / /bla ma lha dang rgyal po'i gnas/ /mchod rten dur khrod gsod gnas dang / /bsti sa lam gyi bzhi mdo chu/ /dus tshigs nyin mo yan lag min/ /snying ga mgo bor brdeg spang bya/ /

'grangs ches ltogs dang stan bral dang / /yan lag mi bder gnas dang skom/ /byis pa rgan dang shugs gzhan nyen/ /nad pa yis kyang 'khrig pa spang / /dgun dus ro tsa byas drags tshe/ /'dod pas 'dod pa bsten bar bya/ /dpyid ston zhag ni gnyis

gnyis nas/ /so ga dbyar tshe zla phyed cing / /gzhan du bud med la zhugs na/ /mgo 'khor ngal dang bla mthu nyams/ /stobs dang lus zungs dbang po nyams/ /dus min 'chi bar byed pa yin/ /bud med dag la legs gdams na/ /dran dang yid gzhungs nad

med tshe/ /dbang po rtas shing grags stobs rnams/ /lhag par 'phel zhing rgas srar 'gyur/ /khrus dang byug pa rlung bsil khar la sogs bza'/ /chu bsil 'o ma sha khu sran tshod chang dngas 'thungs/ /nyal po dga' byas 'od da dang bral gyur rjes la bsten/ /

de 'dras de yi lus mdangs stobs slar skye bar 'gyur/ /sman pa thos spyod phun tshogs ldan zhing las mkhas snying rje can/ /gags dang gnod med lus srung byed pa nye bar bzhag byas nas/ /rgyal po rang gi dge ba'i 'bras bu'i longs spyod bder spyod cing / /nad med

mthu dang gzi brjid grags pa yun ring 'phel bar 'gyur/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /mdo'i gnas kyi le'u bdun pa'o// //de nas kha zas kyi tshod ran par bza' ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /dus kun du ni tshod zin bza'/ /de ni

me drod skyed byed yin/ /rdzas ni lci ba'am yang ba'ang rung / /chad la ltos par bya ba yin/ /lci ba las ni phyed 'grangs bya/ /yang ba las ni rab 'grangs min/ /bde blag 'ju ba de tsam la/ /tshod zin zhes ni bshad pa yin/ /zas tshod ma zin chung gyur

na/ /stobs dang gzi mdangs 'phel mi 'gyur/ /rlung gi nad ni thams cad kyi/ /rgyu nyid du ni 'gyur ba yin/ /tshad las shin tu ches ba yang / /nyes pa thams cad myur du skyed/ /ma zhu'i zas ni mi bzad pa/ /de yis rlung stsogs gzir gyur pas/ /

cig car rnam par 'khrugs 'gyur zhing / /de nyid du ni zhugs gyur nas/ /rtsa sgo 'gags shing be snabs skyed/ /steng dang 'og gi lam dag tu/ /bskyod pas gsud cing zug byed pa/ /brkam chags can la 'phral skyed byed/ /de las rlung las gzer mgo

'khor/ /khong sbos 'dar zhing rengs stsogs 'gyur/ /mkhris pa las ni 'khru rims 'debs/ /khong tsha skom zhing kha stsogs 'gyur/ /bad kan slon zhing yan lag lci/ /tshigs thog mchil ma mang bar 'gyur/ /khyad par du ni

nyam chung zhing / /me drod zhan dang shugs bkag pa'i/ /zas ni rlung gis bkag pa dang / /bad kan gyis ni bar bkag pa'i/ /nyes pa be'u snabs dkrugs pas na/ /zug rngu zug pa lta bur gnas/ /'khru dang slon par mi byed par/ /gzer la sogs pa

mi bzad pa/ /be'u snabs de yin nyes rab gdug /be snabs mi bzad kyis sbubs bkag /rtsib logs kun tu drang por 'gro/ /shing bzhin rengs par 'gyur na ni/ /ma zhu shing 'dra zhes bya ste/ /myur du gsod byed de spang bya/ /mi 'phrod lhag za ma zhu bar/ /

zad byed ma zhu dug gi ni/ /mtshan nyid can de mi bzad pa/ /dug gi ming can gang yin te/ /dug gi tshul can myur gsod byed/ /gso dpyad bya bar dka' bas spang / /de nas ma zhu'i be'u snabs 'gyur/ /gsor rung shu dag rgyam tsha dang / /po son cha bcug chu

dron ni/ /'thung bas skyugs bcug de nas na/ /dug dang mas gtong ring bu dag /dri ma rlung dag legs rgyu sbyar/ /yan lag 'khums par gyur pa la/ /shin tu dugs bya dkri bar bya/ /gsud nad shin tu 'phel ba dang / /rting par me btsa' gdab pa

bsngags/ /de ni de'i nyin ni smyung par gzhag /khrus btang lta bur nye bar spyad/ /ma zhu mi bzad nyen gyur kyang / /gzer 'joms sman ni btung mi bya/ /be'u snabs ma zhu me drod nyams/ /nad kyi sman ni 'ju mi nus/ /de yis nad pa 'phral du ni/ /

thung zhing 'chi ba dag tu 'ang 'gyur/ /kha zas zhu nas lto ba ni/ /rtsub srar gyur la sman dag kyang / /nyes pa'i lhag ma sbyang phyir dang / /pho ba'i me ni bskyed phyir gtang / /ma zhu'i 'gyur ba zhi ba dag /nyams smad par ni byas las gyur/ /de gsum nyes pa

rnam gsum ni/ /brtags nas rab tu sbyar bar bya/ /de la chung la smyung ba phan/ /'bring la smyung dang bzhu bya ba/ /chen po la ni sbyang ba ste/ /de yis dri ma rtsa nas 'byin/ /de bzhin nad gzhan dag la yang / /rang nad gzhi las go bzlog pas/ /gso ba

de las rjes 'brel yod/ /rgyu las go bzlog rnam spang ba/ /sman pas ji lta ji lta bar/ /nad las go bzlog sbyar ba'am/ /de'i don byed pa sbyor bar bya/ /nyes smin me drod skyed 'gyur nas/ /nyams rtas snum gyis byug pa dang / /btung dang 'jam rtsi stsogs rigs

sbyar/ /bad kan ma zhu'i be snabs te/ /de ni mig dang mkhur ba skrang / /sgregs pa zos ma thag 'dra 'byung / /mchil ma mang zhing nyes g.yo lci/ /rlung las rengs bag gzer ba dang / /bshang gci 'gags shing sbos drod nyams/ /mkhris las khong tsha skom mgo

'khor/ /rmongs bag sgregs pa skyur zhing tsha/ /ma zhu be+e snabs smyung bar bya/ /rengs bag las ni dugs rab bya/ /tsha ba'i ma zhu skyug sman dag /btang ba'am gnas skabs gang phan bya/ /ma zhu'i be snabs lci ba na/ /rtsa sbubs thim las yun rings can/ /

bad kan rlung ni 'dres mtshan ma/ /de dang mnyam par bsgrub par bya/ /dngas ma lus las zas dad chung / /snying na sgregs pa mnam par 'gyur/ /'di la cung zad gnyid log bya/ /ma zhu kun gyis nyin par ni/ /zas ma zos par gnyid log la/ /bkres

gyur yang las ran par bza'/ /ma zhu spyi yi mtshan ma ni/ /rnam par 'gags sam shas cher 'byung / /na zhing rlung ni mi gsal rgyu/ /mkhregs shing lus lci mgo bo 'khor/ /zas tshod lhag par gyur pa nyid/ /gcig bu ma zhum zad kyi/ /mi 'dod

gags byed tshig ma tshos/ /lci dang rtsub dang mi gtsang drang / /khong tsha skom dad chu mang dang / /bsres pa'i zas ni 'ju mi 'gyur/ /mya ngan khro dang bkres pa yis/ /nye bar gdungs shing zas mi 'ju/ /phan dang mi phan bsres pa dag/ /zos pa mnyam za

yin par 'dod/ /'grangs rjes slar yang za gyur pa/ /lhag par za ba yin zhes bya/ /dus min che ba'am chung zos pa/ /mi mnyam par ni zab yin/ /gsum po 'dis kyang gsod pa'am/ /mi bzad nad kyis 'debs par byed/ /dus

su goms shing gtsang la phan/ /snum dro yang dang ma yengs dang / /ro drug ldan zhing mngar bag che/ /shin tu myur min dal bar min/ /khrus byas bkres shing dben par gnas/ /kha gdong lag pa rkang pa bkrus/ /lha dang yi dags rjed cing sbyin/ /

bla ma byis pa mgron mchod byas/ /dud 'gro rnams kyang rab brtags shing / /bdag nyid legs par brtags nas ni/ /ma smad smra'am yid 'ong smra/ /skye bo gtsang zhing gus pas stobs/ /yid 'ong gnyen dang lhan cig bza'/ /zas ni rtswa dang skra sbu stsogs/ /

'dres shing khong du slar sros dang / /tshod ma zas ngan mang ba dang / /tsha ches lan tshwa mang ba spang / /phrum dang zho dang phrum skam dang / /ba tsha tsha dang la phug rjen/ /phag rgod lug dang ba glang nya/ /ma he'i sha dang rid dang skam/ /ma sha chu ldum nis sha ba/ /

pad rtsa 'bras 'khur myu gur gyur/ /tshod ma skam dang nas 'dra dang / /bu ram phra mo bza' mi bya/ /sA lu'i 'bras dang gro dang nas/ /drug cu pa dang skam sa'i sha/ /a ru skyu ru rgun 'brum dang / /mung+ga kha ra pa to la/ /zhun mar char chu 'o ma dang / /sbrang rtsi se'u

'brum rgyam tsha bza'/ /mig dang stobs phyir mtshan mo ni/ /'bras gsum sbrang rtsi mar sar bza'/ /mi nar 'jog par byed gang dang / /nad sel byed pa gang yin bsten/ /pad rtsa bur shing tso tsa dang / /mo tsa a mra'i 'bras bu dang / /la du 'khur

ba bu ram can/ /zas ni lci zhing snum pa dang / /mngar zhing 'ju dka' bsten pa rnams/ /dang po nyid du bza' bar bya/ /de las bzlog pa tha mar bza'/ /bar du skyur tsha lan tshwa can/ /lto yi cha gnyis zas kyis te/ /cha gcig skom gyis dgang bar bya/ /

rlung la sogs pa'i gnas su ni/ /cha bzhi pa ni lhag mar gzhag /zos rjes skom ni bsil ba'i chu/ /nas dang bag phye'i g.yos byas zos/ /zho chang dug 'bags sbrang rtsi la/ /chu bsil rjes su 'thungs na phan/ /mi 'ju 'gags la chu dron gtang / /

chad ma mung+ga'i gnod pa la/ /zhog chu dang dar ba dang / /rang sgyur rtsab mo btung bar bya/ /skem po rgyas phyir chang btung ste/ /sbom pos sbrang rtsi'i chu btung ngo / /gcong chen nad la sha khu btung / /drod chung sha zos chang btung bya/ /nad dang sman stsogs sbrum

bud med/ /zan bcad dka' thub las rnams kyis/ /skem dang byis pa rgan po la/ /'o ma bdud rtsi lta bur phan/ /mdor na zos rjes btung ba ni/ /gang zhig zas dang yon tan gyis/ /mi mthun mi 'phrod med gyur pa/ /de ni rnam pa kun tu bsngags/ /zas

rjes skom 'thungs ngoms dang khyab/ /stobs 'phel lus ni brtan byed la/ /zas sdud snyi bar 'gyur ba dang / /'drul zhing rnam par 'ju bar 'gyur/ /de ni nam tshang yan chad nad/ /dbugs lud glo rdol cham pa dang / /glu len smra mang la chags dang / /skad

'gags pa la gnod pa yin/ /lus las rnag 'dzag gcin nad mig /lkog nad rma yi nad kyis nyen/ /skom spang kun gyis skom 'thungs nas/ /mang smra lam zhugs nyal ba spang / /zas zos nas ni nyi tshan me/ /rta zhon rkyal dang 'degs pa spang / /bshang

dang gci gsal snying la dri med nyes pa lam min par mi 'gro/ /sgregs pa dag cing bru ba tsha gyur thur gyi rlung ni tha mal rgyu/ /de bzhin me yi drod bdo dbang po gsal zhing lus kyang rab tu yang / /zas kyi tshod ran cho gar sbyar bzhin za ba de ni dus su 'dod/ /

yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /mdo'i gnas kyi le'u brgyad pa'o// //de nas sman la stsogs pa'i bye brag shes par bya ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /sman rnams nyid kyi ro la stsogs/ /de ni de la bsten pas mchog /de yang 'byung

lnga'i bdag nyid can/ /sa la brten te skye ba yin/ /chu ni skye gnas me dang rlung / /nam mkha' rnams ni tshogs pa las/ /de skyes gyur dang khyad par phyung / /ming ni shas che las gyur yin/ /de bas 'byung ba 'dus pa las/ /byung bas sman ni

ro gcig min/ /de phyir nad kyang nyes gcig min/ /de la gsal ba ro zhes bshad/ /mi gsal ro rjes mtha' mar ni/ /cung zad gsal bdag tu'ang 'dod/ /sman gyi yon tan lci sogs dang / /ro ni sa la stsogs bsten pas/ /mtshungs par spyod pa nyer gdags

pas/ /ro las ming du btags pa yin/ /de la sa'i sman lci dang sbom/ /sra zhing dri yi shes rab che/ /lci zhing brtan dang 'dus pa dang / /nye bar 'phel bar byed pa yin/ /chu yi gsher dang lci bsil snum/ /rtul zhing bskal ro shas che/ /'jam zhing bad kan 'dra

ba la/ /'drul zhing tshim byed sdud par byed/ /me yi rtsub rno tsha zhing skam/ /phra zhing gzugs kyi yon tan che/ /tsha zhing 'bar la mdog skyed cing / /gsal zhing smin pa'i bdag nyid can/ /rlung gi rtsub cing khyab la yang / /reg pa'i yon tan shas che yin/ /rtsub

cing yang la dri ma sel/ /rnam dpyod na bar byed pa yin/ /nam mkha'i phra zhing dngas la yang / /sgra yi yon tan shas che ste/ /khong stong yang bar byed pa yin/ /de ltar 'gro na don dang ni/ /sbyor ba sna tshogs dbang gis ni/ /sman min ci yang yod ma yin/ /de la sman

ni gyen du 'gro/ /phal cher me dang rlung shas che/ /thur du 'gro ba phal cher ni/ /sa chu'i yon tan shas cher yin/ /de ltar sman no ro'i bye brag /'di yi 'og nas ston pa yin/ /sman mthu la las bshad pa ni/ /lci snum bsil dang 'jam pa dang / /yang rtsub tsha

dang rno ba ste/ /de ltar rnam pa brgyad du 'dod/ /sman mthu tsar kas bshad pa/ /gang gis bya ba gang byed pa/ /mthu min cir yang mi byed kyi/ /de dag thams cad mthu yis byed/ /des na lci la stsogs pa nyid/ /nus pa'i khyad par ldan pa dang / /yon tan ma

lus snying por ni/ /gyur pas mthu zhes bshad pa dag /don dang mthun par btags pa yin/ /gcis pa mang du yod na yang / /tha snyad gtso bo nyid kyis yin/ /de bas go ni bzlog pa'i phyir/ /de ni ro la stsogs pa la/ /srid du zin kyang ma bshad de/ /de bas lci ba

la sogs yin/ /gzhan dag tsha dang bsil nyid gnyis/ /stobs yin zhes kyang ston par byed/ /sman ni sna tshogs bdag nyid can/ /nyi ma zla ba'i stobs can yin/ /'gro 'di gsal dang mi gsal las/ /nam yang 'da' bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de la tsha ba mgo

'khor skom/ /rmya rdul tsha zhing myur 'ju byed/ /rlung dang bad kan zhi bar byed/ /bsil ba dag ni tshim byed cing / /'tsho dang rengs par byed pa dang / /khrag dang mkhris pa rab dang byed/ /pho ba'i me dang phrad pa las/ /gang zhig ro gzhan byung gyur pa'i/ /ro rnams

kyi ni mthar zhu ba/ /de ni zhu ba zhes bshad do/ /mngar dang lan tshwa zhu rjes mngar/ /skyur ba'i zhu rjes skyur ba yin/ /kha dang bska dang tshab rnams/ /zhu rjes phal cher kha ba yin/ /ro dang zhu rjes 'bras bu mnyam/ /de la sman ni bzang dang ngan/ /la la ro yis las byed

la/ /gzhan dag 'ju bar byed pa yin/ /yon tan gzhan dang nus pa dang / /mthu yis la la byed pa yin/ /sman gyi ro stsogs gang dang gang / /stobs ldan nyid kyis gnas byed de/ shin tu zil mnan de dang de/ /sgrub byed rgyu ni nyid du gnas/ /yon

tan mi 'phrod sbyar ba ni/ /mang pos nyung ngu zil gyis gnon/ /ro dang 'ju ba'i mthu dag ni/ /de yi stobs kyi zil gyis gnon/ /ro stsogs de ltar stobs ni mnyam/ /ma bcos pa yi stobs dang ldan/ /ro stsogs mnyam pa'i las gang ni/ /khyad 'phags

de ni mthu las skyes/ /dan ti dang ni tsi tra ka/ /ro stsogs mtshungs kyang dan ti 'khru/ /shing mngar rgun 'brum 'dra yang 'khru/ /'o ma mar 'dra mar drod skyed/ /de ltar sman la sogs pa yi/ /spyi yi las te de yang ni/ /sna tshogs rkyen gyi dbye ba yis/ /

sman dbye tha dad gyur pa yin/ /gro dang nas ni mngar ba dang / /lci las rlung 'joms skyed pa yin/ /nya gro 'o ma bsil ba dang / /seng ge kha yis phag ma yin/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /mdo'i gnas kyi le'u dgu pa'o// //

de nas ro tha dad pa shes par bya ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /mngar ba la sogs ro skye ba/ /sa chu me sa chu dang me/ /mkha' rlung me rlung sa dang rlung / /gnyis gnyis shas che las rim 'byung / /de las ro ni mngar ba dag /gang zhig myangs pa'i tshe na ni/ /kha la chags shing

lus kyang ni/ /tshim byed dbang po rab dang byed/ /grog ma la sogs dga' ba yin/ /skyur ba kha nas chu 'dzag cing / /so brtse sbu ni ldang ba dang / /mig dang smin ma 'dzum par byed/ /lan tshwa khar ni mchil ma 'du/ /mkhur ba gre ba tsha bar byed/ /kha ba kha yi dri ma sbyang / /

lce ni 'joms par byed pa yin/ /tsha ba lce rtse skyo byed cing / /tsag tsag byed par 'gyur ba dang / /kha mig sna las 'dzag byed cing / /mkhur bsreg par byed pa yin/ /bska bas lce ni bem por byed/ /gre ba rtsa sbubs 'gags par byed/ /ro yi tshul ni de dag ste/ /las ni

ro mngar ba dag gis/ /skyes nas 'phrod par byed pa dang / /lus zungs mthu stobs rab skyed cing / /byis pa rgan po glo rdol skem/ /mdog mdangs skra dang dbang po bzang / /lus rtas skad 'gags phan zhing lci/ /nu zho skyed cing rma 'byor byed/ /tshe ring 'tsho byed snum pa dang / /

rlung dang mkhris pa dug rnams sel/ /ha cang drags na tshil bcas dang / /bad kan las byung nad skyed cing / /lus sbom drod bri chang nad dang / /gcin nad lba ba rmen stsogs skyed/ /skyur ba me drod skyed byed snum/ /zhim zhing 'ju byed yi ga 'bye/ /dro ba'i nus skyed reg

pa bsil/ /tshim byed 'drul byed yang ba ste/ /bad kan khrag mkhris rgyas par byed/ /rlung 'gags rgyu bar byed pa yin/ /de ni shin tu bsten drags na/ /lus lhod rab rib mgo 'khor dang / /g.yan pa skya rbab me dbal dang / /'or nad thor bu skom rims skyed/ /

lan tshwa sra dang 'khyil pa dang / /'gags pa 'byin zhing drod skyed byed/ /snum dang dugs kyis rdul zhing rno/ /yi ga 'byed cing gcod 'byed byed/ /de ni drags pas rlung khrag dang / /skra 'byi skra dkar gnyer ma dang / /skom mdze dug dang me dbal rnams/ /skyed cing

stobs ni bri bar byed/ /kha ba rang nyid zhim min zhing / /yi ga 'chus dang srin skom dug /mdze dang rgyal dang rims slon bro/ /tsha dang mkhris pa bad kan 'joms/ /'drul dang tshil dang zhag dang rkang / /bshang dang gci ba skems pa dang / /yang zhing yid gzhungs bsil

zhing rtsub/ /nu ma'i nad dang skad 'gags sel/ /de ni shin tu drags gyur na/ /lus zungs zad cing rlung nad skyed/ /tsha bas lkog nad 'gags pa dang / /mdze dang ma zhu 'or nad sel/ /rma 'jig byed cing snum pa dang / /tshil dang 'drul bag skems par byed/ /drod

skyed 'ju byed yi ga 'byed/ /sbyong zhing zas ni 'jig par byed/ /'ching ba gcod cing rtsa sbubs dag /rnam par 'byed cing bad kan sel/ /de ni shin tu drag 'gyur bas/ /skom skyed khu ba stobs zad cing / /brgyal zhing lus 'khums 'dar ba dang / /rked pa rgyab

stsogs na bar byed/ /bska bas mkhris pa bad kan sel/ /lci zhing khrag nad rnam par sbyong / /skem zhing rma 'tsho bsil ba dang / /'drul dang tshil ni rnam par skems/ /be+e'u snabs 'khyil zhing sri bar byed/ /rtsub cing lpags mdog rab dang byed/ /de ni shin tu

bsten drags na/ /bshang 'gags lto sbo snying nad dang / /skom dang skem zhing skyes mthu nyams/ /rtsa sgo 'gags shing dri ma sri/ /zhun mar bu ram star ga gser/ /mo tsa tso tsa pa ru sha/ /nye'u shing ram nye pa nas/ /ra dza dan pa la gsum/ /med gnyis dang

par+Ni bzhi/ /'tsho byed dzi ba ri sho ba/ /shing mngar ma du ka bim+bi/ /shra ba ni gnyis bi da ri/ /cu gang k+Shi ra shu ku la/ /sa ha'o can kash+ma ri/ /'o ma bu ram shing gze ma/ /rgun 'brum sbrang stsogs mngar ba'i sde/ /skyur ba skyu ru am+li ka/ /ba lung dang ni

star bu dang / /se'u 'bru rdul dang dar ba dang / /tshwa dang ku shu a mra dang / /am+la ta ka b+ha bya dang / /ka ram rda ka pid ta'o/ /tsha mchog rtsal ru kha ru tsha/ /bi da rgya mtsho bkod ma'i tsha/ /mtsho tsha skam tsha ro nye dang / /k+Sha ra lan tshwa'i sde tshan yin/ /

kha ba kyi lce pa to la/ /tsan+dan ur shi ba le ka/ /ci skrigs nim pa pu tse shel/ /rgya spos a kar ba tsha ka /nag ta ma la ser po gnyis/ /gla sgang mur ba ba sha ka /a pa marga po son cha/ /'khar lcags sle tres byi tsher ba/ /rtsa ba che lnga bya gri gnyis/ /bong nga

shu dag bi sha la/ /tsha ba shing kun na le sham/ /byi dang ga dang tsha ba lnga/ /ku the ra stsogs ldum rngad sngo/ /mkhris pa gcin dang go bye yin/ /bska tshan a ru ba ru ra/ /sbrang rtsi seng ldeng shi ri sha/ /ka dam u dum+b+hAr dang / /mu tig byu ru an tsan bcag /ka pid tha

gzhon kha rdzur/ /pad rtsa pad+ma ut+pa la'o/ /'bras rnying nas rnying gro rnying dang / /mung+ga sbrang rtsi sha ka ra/ /skam sa'i sha rnams ma gtogs pa'i/ /mngar ba phal cher bad kan skyed/ /skyu ru se 'bru ma gtogs pa'i/ /skyur ba phal cher mkhris pa skyed/ /rgyam tsha lce

myang tsha ma gtogs/ /lan tshwa phal cher mig la gnod/ /sle tres pa to la bca' sga/ /sgog skya pi pi ling ma gtogs/ /kha dang tsha ba phal cher ni/ /ro tsa 'bri zhing rlung skyed yin/ /bska las a ru ra ma gtogs/ /phal cher bsil zhing sri bar byed/ /ro tsha

skyur dang lan tshwa rnams/ /go rims bzhin du dro nus ldan/ /kha dang bska dang mngar ba rnams/ /de bzhin du ni bsil ba nyid/ /kha dang tsha dang bska ba rnams/ /de bzhin rtsub cing dri ma sri/ /lan tshwa skyur mngar snum pa dang / /bshang gci thur gyi dbugs

'byin byed/ /lan tshwa las bska de bas kyang / /mngar ba mchog tu lci ba yin/ /skyur las tsha dang de bas kyang / /kha bdag ni yang ba yin/ /ro rnams kyis ni dbye ba las/ /sbyor ba lnga bcu rtsa bdun dang / /brtags pa drug cu rtsa gsum du/ /rags rim

ji bzhin phye ba yin/ /de lnga re re phri ba las/ /lngar gyur pa ni ro gnyis pa/ /gsum pa mngar bcu skyur drug ste/ /lan tshwa gsum ste kha ba gcig /bzhi pa la ni mngar po bcu/ /skyur ba bzhi po lan tshwa gcig/ /lnga pa la ni skyur gcig pu/ /mngar ba lnga la brten pa yin/ /

sman ni ro drug gcig pu yin/ /ma 'dres pa ni ro drug 'gyur/ /lnga pa drug dang ro ni tha dad drug /bzhi pa gnyis pa rnam pa bcwa lnga yin/ /dbye ba gsum pa nyi shu gcig nyid de/ /sman ni ro drug de ltar drug cu gsum/ /de rnams ro dang rdo rjes ro'i dbye ba/ /rab dang rab

mchog dag tu brtags pa las/ /rtsis las 'das par byung bar gyur pa ni/ /nad dang sman gyi dbang las nye bar sbyar/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /mdo'i gnas kyi le'u bcu pa'o// //de nas nad la stsogs pa'i tshul shes par bya ba'i le'u bshad

par bya'o/ /nad dang lus zungs dri ma rnams/ /rtag tu lus kyi rtsa ba yin/ /de rlung dbugs 'byung dbugs rngub dang / /bskyod dang las spyod shugs 'byin dang / /lus zungs legs par rgyu ba dang / /dbang po rnams ni gsal ba dag /mi gnod pa ni rjes 'dzin yin/ /

mkhris pa 'ju drod mthong byed dang / /bkres skom zas len mdangs yid gzhungs/ /blo ldan dpa' snying lus 'jam pas/ /bad kan brtan zhing snum nyid dang / /tshigs 'brel bzod la stsogs pas so/ /lus zungs las gtso go rims bzhin/ /tshim byed 'tsho byed g.yogs

pa dang / /snum dang brtan dang 'gengs pa dang / /mngal ni skyed byed yin par bshad/ /brtan par byed pa bshang ba yin/ /'drul dang 'byin pa gcin gyi yin/ /ba spu brtan pa rdul gyi yin/ /rlung ni 'phel bar gyur pa yis/ /skem dang mdog gnag drod bag

dga'/ /'dar dang lto sbos bshang ba sre/ /stobs dang gnyid dang dbang po nyams/ /smra mang mgo 'khor zhum par byed/ /mkhris pa bshang gci pags mig ser/ /bkres skom lus tsha gnyid chung byed/ /bad kan drod nyams mchil ma mang / /khong snyom lci

dang sha mdog dkar/ /lus grang yan lag lhod pa dang / /lud pa dbugs mi bde gnyid che/ /dngas ma'ang bad kan dang 'dra la/ /khrag 'phel me dbal khong 'bras mcher/ /mdze dang rlung khrag mkhris pa khrag /skran dang rnyil nad mig ser

dang / /bskyod dka' drod nyams rmongs bag can/ /mig dang gcin pags dmar bar 'gyur/ /sha 'phel wa ba rmen bu mdud/ /mkhur tshos brang lto brla sbom zhing / /mgul stsogs lhag par sha yang che/ /tshil 'phel de 'dra de bzhin ngal/ /cung zad bskyod

kyang dbugs rgod cing / /rkub tshos nu ma gsus 'phyang 'gyur/ /rus 'phel rus lhag so lhag 'gyur/ /rkang 'phel lus lci mig rtsa g.yung / /tshigs kyi mgo bo sbom pa dang / /tshigs la thor bu gso dka' 'byung / /khu 'phel bud med la rab gdung / /

khu ba'i rde'u dag tu 'ang 'gyur/ /bshang 'phel lto sbos rgyu 'khrug cing / /lus lci lto ba na bar byed/ /gcin 'phel chu sor zug cing na/ /gcis kyang ma gcis snyam sems 'gyur/ /rngul 'phel rdul che dri mi zhim/ /g.yan pa nyid kyang skyed ces bya/ /mig rdul la stsogs dri

ma rnams/ /mang bas lci la stsogs par byed/ /rlung zad mtshan ma lus mi bde/ /smra nyung rtsol ba chung bar 'gyur/ /dran pa mi gsal bad kan 'phel/ /sngar bshad pa yi nad rnams 'byung / /mkhris zad drod nyams grang ba dang / /mdog nyams byed de bad kan zad/ /

mgo 'khor bad kan gnas stongs shing / /snying 'dar tshigs ni lhod par 'gyur/ /cung zad rtsub ngal skam pa dang / /na zhing sgra cher mi bzod 'gyur/ /khrag zad skyur dang bsil la dga'/ /rtsa lhod pags pa rtsub par 'gyur/ /sha zad dbang nyams mig mkhur ba'i/ /

rus skam lhu tshigs na bar 'gyur/ /tshil zad gnyid che dpyi rked mngon/ /mcher pa che dang lus skem 'gyur/ /rus zad rus zug so dang ni/ /sen mo skra la sogs pa 'byung / /rkang zad rkang sbubs stong pa dang / /mgo 'khor rab rib can du 'gyur/ /khu ba

zad pas ring nas 'byung / /yang na khu ba khrag nyid 'byung / /rlig pa shin tu na ba dang / /pho mtshan tshig pa snyam du sems/ /bshang zad rlung ni rgyu ma'i nang / /sgra bcas 'khyil pa lta bur byed/ /lto bar rgyu zhing gyen du 'gro/ /snying ga rtsib logs mi bzad na/ /gcin

zad gcin ni nyung sri dang / /mdog 'gyur ba 'am khrag bcas nyid/ /rdul zad sbu 'byi spu 'grengs la/ /pags pa rnams ni 'gas par 'gyur/ /dri ma shin tu phra ba rnams/ /zad pas brtag dka' dri ma yi/ /rang gnas bskams dang na ba dang / /stong dang yang ba

las shes bya/ /nad stsogs rang nyid ji lta ba'i/ /yon tan 'di ni bzlog pa dang / zad pa dang ni 'phel gyur las/ /'phel 'bri sman pas shes par bya/ /dri ma thogs las 'phel ba ste/ /shin tu 'byung las zad shes bya/ /lus ni dri mas brten pas na/ /'phel

bas zad pa gnod pa yin/ /de la rlung ni rus par gnas/ /mkhris pa rngul dang khrag la gnas/ /bad kan lhag ma gnas des 'di/ /phan tshun rten dang brten pa yin/ /'phel dang zad par byed pa'i sman/ /gcig gi gang yin gzhan gyi'ang de/ /rus pa rlung gnyis la 'di min/ /phal cher

rtas pas 'phel bar 'gyur/ /bad kan rjes mthun de yi phyir/ /de las bzlog pas zad pa yin/ /rlung dang rjes mthun de ltar na/ /'phel dang zad pa 'byung 'gyur ba'i/ /smyung dang brta bar bya ba yis/ /nad ni rim gyis gso bar bya/ /rlung ma gtogs

te de skyes la/ /de nyid bzlog thabs sbyar bar bya/ /khyad par du ni khrag skyes nad/ gtar ga bkru sman dag gis gso/ /sha cher skyes las byung ba'i nad/ /gtar ga me btsa' thal sman sbyar/ /tshil ches sbom skem gso bar bya/ /rus pa zad pa las byung la/ /mar dang 'o

ma kha rang sbyar/ /de bzhin 'jam rtsi gtang bas gso/ /bshang ba 'phel la 'khru bas gso/ /bshang bzas las byung ba'i nad/ /ra lug nang grol zan dron dang / /sbyar thug ma sha gnyis sogs sbyin/ /gcin 'phel gyur la gcin 'bri ba/ /gcin zad las byung

gcin snyi gso/ /rdul mi 'byung la rtsol dang bsku/ /rdul 'byung cho gas gso bar bya/ /lus kyi me drod rang gnas 'dug /cha shas lus zungs rnams la brten/ /de rnams 'bri zhing rab 'bar ba/ /lus zungs 'phel dang zad par 'gyur/ /lus

zungs dang po phyi ma ni/ /rgyas byed zad pa'ang de bzhin no/ /nyes 'khrugs pas ni lus zungs nyen/ /gnyi gas dri ma la gnod byed/ /'og na gnyis te mgo bor bdun/ /bu ga dang ni rdul 'byung ba'i/ /dri ma'i gnas ni dri ma ste/ /rang rang gnas su nad skyed 'gyur/ /lus

zungs khu ba'i mthar thug pa'i/ /nang nas gzi can mdangs mchog yin/ /snying la gnas kyang khyab pa dang / /lus ni brtan par gnas pa yin/ /gang zhig 'jig na nges 'jig la/ /gang zhig gnas na gnas gyur pa/ /gang la dngos rnams sna tshogs pa/ /lus

la brten pa 'byung ba yin/ /mdangs ni sems 'khrugs bkres sems las/ /mya ngan ngal la stsogs pas zad/ /de zad sdang zhing lus rid la/ /yang yang sems shing dbang po nyams/ /gzi nyams rtsub dang yid mi dga'/ /nyam chung bar ni 'gyur ba yin/ /'tsho

byed sman dang 'o ma dang / /sha khu la sogs de'i sman yin/ /zas gang mi 'dod gang zhig slong / /de la mi 'phrod 'phrod pa ni/ /spang dang sbyin par bya ba dag /de dang des 'phel zad par 'gyur/ /nyes pa phyin ci log pa dang / /mthun pas sred pa skyed byed de/ /phal

cher 'phel dang zad pa dag /mi mkhas pa yis mi shes so/ /ji bzhin stobs dang rang ji bzhin/ /'phel na nyes pa rgyas par 'gyur/ /zad pas rang bzhin 'dor bar 'gyur/ /mnyam na rang gi las rnams byed/ /gang zhig mnyam pas lus ni 'phel bar

byed/ /nyes pa de nyid mi mnyam gsod par byed/ /de bas zad ba'ang 'phel ba lta bu ni/ /phan pa'i spyod pa nyid kyis bsrung bar bya/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /mdo'i gnas kyi le'u bcu gcig pa'o// //de nas nad kyi bye brag

shes par bya ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /zhu ba'i gnas dang rked pa dpyi/ /rna ba rus pa reg dbang po/ /rlung gnas yin te de las kyang / /zhu ba'i gnas su khyad par gnas/ /mkhris gnas lte ba pho ba rdul/ /chu ser dngas ma khrag dang ni/ /mig dang pags pa dag yin

te/ /de las lte ba khyad par gnas/ /bad kan brang dang mgul pa mgo /glo ba rus tshigs ma zhu'i gnas/ /dngas ma tshil dang sna lcer gnas/ /brang ni khyad par dag gi gnas/ /rlung ni srog stsogs dbye ba yin/ /lnga yi bdag nyid 'dir srog ni/ /spyir gnas brang dang

gre bar rgyu/ /blo dang dbang po sems 'dzin byed/ /mchil 'dor sbrid 'byung sgregs pa 'don/ /dbugs rngub zas ni mid par byed/ /gyen rgyu'i gnas ni brang yin te/ /sna dang lce dang lkog mar rgyu/ /tshigs 'byin 'bad rtsol mdangs dang ni/ /stobs dang kha dog dran las byed/ /

khyab byed snying gnas lus kun la/ /ma lus khyab cing rab tu mgyogs/ /'gro dang 'degs dang 'jog pa dang / /mig 'byed 'dzums pa la sogs pa/ /lus can bya ba phal cher ni/ /de la rag ni lus pa yin/ /mnyam gnas me drod nye bar gnas/ /nang grol kun tu rgyu ba

yin/ /bya ba zas len 'ju ba dang / /dngas snyigs 'byed cing 'dor bar byed/ /thur sel gzhang gnas 'dong mo dang / /lgang pa pho mtshan brla nang rgyu/ /bya ba khu ba zla mtshan dang / /bshang gci mngal gnas 'byin par byed/ /mkhris pa'i rang bzhin lnga de la/ /zhu

dang ma zhu'i gnas par gnas/ /'byung lnga'i bdag nyid can gyis ni/ /gang me'i yon tan shas che bas/ /gsher nyid skems byed 'ju la stsogs/ /las kyi me yi sgrar bshad do/ /zas ni 'ju dang de bzhin du/ /dngas ma tshigs ma 'byed par byed/ /der gnas

bzhin du mkhris pa ni/ /lhag ma rnams kyi grogs byed pas/ /stobs bskyed pa yis byed 'gyur bas/ /de ni 'ju byed ces bshad do/ /mkhris pa ma zhu'i gnas la brten/ /dngas mdog bsgyur bas dmar sgyur yin/ /mkhris pa sgrub byed snying la gnas/ /blo dang

yid gzhungs nga rgyal stsogs/ /mngon 'dod don ni sgrub byed pas/ /mig la gnas te gzugs mthong byed/ /mthong byed ces bshad mdog gsal ni/ /pags mdog gsal byed pags par gnas/ /bad kan rnam lnga brang gnas pa/ /

rang gi stobs kyis sum mdo dang / /snying dang zas kyi mthu dang ni/ /de nyid la gnas chu las byed/ /bad kan lhag ma'i gnas gyur pa'i/ /rten ni gang phyir byed gyur pas/ /de phyir rten byed ces bshad do/ /gang zhig ma zhu'i gnas la gnas/ /de ni zas stsogs 'drul byed

pas/ /myags byed ces ni bya ba yin/ /myong byed lcer gnas ro tshor byed/ /rtas byed mgor gnas dbang po ni/ /tshim par byed de 'byor byed ni/ /tshigs la gnas nas 'byor par byed/ /de ltar nad ni phal mo che/ /mi 'gyur bdag nyid can khyab kyang / /gnas

yin par ni shes bya ste/ /las rnams kyang ni tha dad yin/ /rtsub sogs dro bar ldan pas ni/ /rlung ni stsogs par 'gyur ba yin/ /grang bas ldang byed snum la sogs/ /yon tan dro ldan zhi byed 'gyur/ /rno stsogs bsil ba dang ldan pas/ /mkhris pa stsogs par

byed 'gyur la/ /dro bas ldang zhing ro rtul stsogs/ /bsil bar ldan pas zhi bar 'gyur/ /snum stsogs grang dang ldan pa yis/ /bad kan stsogs par byed 'gyur la/ /gro bas ldang 'gyur de nyid ni/ /rtsub sogs yon tan gyis zhir 'gyur/ /rang gnas nyid du 'phel

stsogs yin/ /dkyil 'gyur rgyu las 'khrugs pa dang / /mi mthun pa yi yon tan 'dod/ /ldang ba log pa'i lam zhugs nyid/ /rang gi rtags ni ston pa dang / /bde med nad ni 'byung 'gyur ba'o/ /rang gnas gnas pa mnyam nyid dang / /nad rnams ma byung

zhi ba yin/ /sogs dang ldang dang rab zhi ba/ /rlung ni so ga stsogs gsum tshe/ /mkhris pa dbyar la sogs par te/ /bad kan dgun smad stsogs par ro/ /yang dang rtsub pa la sogs pa'i/ /sman dang lus kyang de mtshungs pas/ /so ga rlung ni sogs 'gyur gyi/ /

dro ba'i dus kyis ldang mi 'gyur/ /chu rnams 'ju ba skyur ba dang / /sman yang de dag 'dra ba yis/ /mkhris pa stsogs kyi dus kyis ni/ /grang ba nyid kyis ldang mi 'gyur/ /chu dang sman ni bsil ba dang / /snum pas dus ni mtshungs 'gyur yang / /dgun smad bad kan stsogs

'gyur gyi/ /bsgongs pas ldang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de ltar dus kyi rang bzhin 'di/ /zas la stsogs pa'i dbang gis ni/ /dus la bab par ma gyur kyang / /'phral du stsogs pa la sogs 'gyur/ /nad ni ldang gyur 'phral du lus/ /mgo nas rkang gi bar du khyab/ /

ldog 'gyur chu yi rgyun bzhin du/ /cung zhig cung zhig dag gis zhi/ /nad 'khrugs sna tshogs tshul can ni/ /grangs med par ni gyur pa'i lus/ /thams cad nye bar gzir gyur pa/ /de rgyu tshul dang sgrub pa dag /re re nas ni bstan mi nus/ /de bas spyi yi brjod pa

yin/ /nad rnams dag ni thams cad kyi/ /nyes pa'i rgyu ni gcig pu nyid/ /dper na bya ni lding 'gyur pa/ /nyin rangs kun tu seng gyur kyang / /rang gi grib ma dang mi 'bral/ /'gro kun de dang 'dra ba yin/ /yang na ji ltar ma lus pa'i/ /'gro ba mi 'dra sna tshogs

'di/ /yon tan gsum dang mi 'bral lo/ /de bzhin rang khams ma snyoms pa'i/ /rgyu yang gnas skabs thams cad du/ /nad rigs nyes pa gsum mi 'bral/ /de rnams kyis ni ldang ba'i rgyu/ /dbang don mi 'tsham phrad pa dang / /dus dang nyes pa'i las rnams so/ /

de yang dman ltag log sbyor bas/ /dbye ba rnam pa gsum du 'gyur/ /dbang don rang yul chung du'am/ /mi sbyor ba ni dman pa ste/ /shas cher gtad pa lhag sbyor ba/ /rab phra'i 'od dang 'jigs pa dang / /shin tu nye dang shin tu ring / /yid du mi 'ong mi sdug pa'i/ /

gzugs la mig ni lta byed pa/ /lag sbyor de ni mi zad yin/ /de bzhin rab drags rdul la sogs/ /dbang don ji bzhin shes par bya/ /dus kyang grang dang tsha ba dang / /char dus dbye bas gsum du 'dod/ /de dman grang stsogs chung ba dang / /lhag sbyor shin tu che

mtshan nyid/ /rang gi mtshan nyid phyin ci log /log pa'i sbyor ba yin par bshad/ /lus ngag yid kyi dbye ba yis/ /las kyang rnam pa gsum du bshad/ /lus la sogs pa'i las dman la/ /'jug pa dman pa'i ming can yin/ /

brtun ngas 'jug pa lhag sbyor ba'o/ /shugs bkag pa dang btsir ba dang / /mi bzad lus kyi las rnams dang / /gcus dang rdeg 'chos gom 'khyor stsogs/ /ldang bzhin smra bar byed pa dang / /'dod chags zhe sdang 'jig stsogs dang / /srog gcod la sogs

las rnams dang / /rnam bcu de yang smad pa yin/ /'di dang gzhan du byas pa rnams/ /de dag ma lus log sbyor yin/ /'di dag nad kyi rgyu yin no/ /ldang 'gyur de ni mtha' yas te/ /sna tshogs nad ni byed par 'gyur/ /yan lag nang khrol lhu tshigs brten/ /yan lag

khrag stsogs pags pa yin/ /de ni phyi rol nad gnas te/ /de brten ma zhu yan lag na/ /lba ba be'u snabs 'brum pa stsogs/ /gzhang 'brum skran dang 'or nad sogs/ /de dag phyi rol nad ces bya/ /nang nad rtsa sbubs chen po dang / /ma zhu zhu ba'i gnas la brten/ /

gnas de las ni skyugs tshad 'khru/ /dmu rdzing lud pa dbugs mi bde/ /nang gi cha yi gzhang 'brum skrang / /skran dang me dbal khong 'brum pa/ /mgo bo snying dang chu so stsogs/ /rus pa'i tshigs nad gnad yin no/ /de 'brel rtsa dang chu ba dang / /chu ba chen stsogs bar

ma yin/ /de la nad lam der gnas pa/ /gcong chen gzhogs phyed mjing kha yo/ /glad nad stsogs dang tshigs rus dang / /dpyi yi gzer dang gnod nad stsogs/ /'byin khyab zug dang snyom pa dang / /lus tsha nad gzer bye ba dang / /'ja' zhing chag snyam

rkang lag 'khums/ /bsgongs dang rtse dang skom byed dang / /'dar dang rtsub dang khong stong dang / /skem dang mgul dang dkris snyam dang / /rengs dang ro bska bro ba'o/ /mdog ni gnag gam dmar ba dag /rlung gi las yin mkhris pa'i las/ /lus tsha mdog dmar dro

smin byed/ /rngul dang gnag dang 'dzag rma red/ /'drul dang brgyal zhing myos pa dang / /kha'i ro kha dang sgyur ba dang / /mdog skya dmar rtsa ma yin pa'o/ /bad kan las ni mkhrang zhing snum/ /g.ya' zhing khong grang lci ba dang / /tshigs dam sha rgyas rmongs bag dang / /

skrang zhing gnyid che zas mi 'ju/ /mdog dkar kha ro lan tshwa mngar/ /las kyi mtha' las 'dam ring ngo / /de ltar ji skad bshad pa yi/ /mtshan nyid kyis ni nad kun khyab/ /de ni ma yengs lta stsogs pas/ /yang dag par ni shes par bya/ /nad kyi gnas skabs dbye shes

pas/ /nad pa skad cig re rer blta/ /goms pas nges par thob 'gyur te/ /las rnams grub pa gsal byed yin/ /rin chen la sogs bzang ngan shes/ /bstan bcos 'ba' zhig las mi 'byung / /nad ni 'di ltar rnam gsum ste/ /la la tshe 'di'i nyes las byung / /la la sngon gyi nyes las byung / /

gzhan dag de gnyis 'dres las byung / /nyes 'byung nad gzhi ji bzhin par/ /las skyes rgyu ni med pa yin/ /rgyu chung ba la dkyel che'i nang / /nyes dang las las byung ba yin/ /dang po mi mthun bza' ba yin/ /las skyes las ni zad pa

ste/ /gnyi ga las byung nyes dang las/ /zad pas zad par 'gyur ba yin/ /nad ni rang rgyud gzhan rgyud las/ /gnyis 'gyur mtha' 'ang gnyis yin te/ /sngar skyes snga ma'i tshul du bshad/ /phyi skyes pa ni bla brnan yin/ /rang gnas ji bzhin gnas pa ni/ /rang rgyud

can de mtshan nyid gsal/ /gzhan dag de las go bzlog pa/ /dri ma'ang de bzhin shes par gyis/ /de ni nad re ldang ba na/ /ma yengs pas ni shes bya ste/ /de rnams gtso bo zhi byas pas/ /zhi 'gyur zhi bar ma gyur na/ /de bzhin phyi nas gso bar bya/ /'on te

bla brnan stobs che na/ /myur gso de nad kyis gzir ba/ /lus la shas cher gnod byed yin/ /nad la rnam par mi mkhas shes/ /ngo tsha nam yang ma byed cig /nad kyi 'gyur ba thams cad kyi/ /ming gi nges bstan yod pa min/ /nyes pa de nyid 'khrugs nas ni/ /khyad

par du ni ldang gyur nas/ /gnas gzhan dag tu song nas ni/ /nad ni mang por byed par 'gyur/ /de bas nad kyi rang bzhin ni/ /rang gnas gzhan du 'phos pa dang / /rgyu yi khyad par shes byas la/ /sman dpyad kyis gso myur du bya/ /gnod bya yul

dang nyams stobs dus/ /me drod rang bzhin na tshod dang / /snying stobs goms dang zas rnams kyis/ /gnas skabs rnam pa tha dad pa/ /'di dag phra mo yan chad brtag /nad dang sman gyi tshul brtags pas/ /gang zhig gso ba la 'jug pa/ /de ni nam yang 'khrul mi

'gyur/ /nad dkyel che ba'am chung ba dag /phog snya lus nyams che chung las/ /gnod par byed pa snang 'gyur bas/ /de la'ang ma yengs nyid du bya/ /sman pa ngan pas nad rnams ni/ /lci ba yang bar yongs rtog cing / /nad nyung dag tu brtags pa yis/ /

gso ba log pa dag tu 'gyur/ /de bas chung ba'ang stobs chung ba/ /dkyel chen nad la rab tu sbyor/ /sbyor ba chung ngur sbyar ba yis/ /nad ni shin tu slong ba yin/ /sbyor ba'ang lhag par sbyor ba dang / /log par sbyor bas phyin ci log /dri ma 'byung bar mi zad kyi/ /

lus kyang shin tu ma rung 'gyur/ /de bas rtag tu brtson pa dang / /thams cad kun tu legs brtags nas/ /ci nas nad med brtan gyur pa/ /de ltar sman dpyad sbyar bar gyis/ /de nas gzhan yang nad rnams ni/ /'phel zad dbye bas bshad bya ste/ /tha dad pa las gsum

shes bya/ /ldan gsum de yang de dgu yin/ /mnyam par 'phel bas gsum nyid de/ /gcig rab lhag pas drug tu 'gyur/ /ma lus pa las bcu gsum yin/ /gnyis gcig lhag pa las drug ste/ /mtshungs las gcig yin rab dang ni/ /rab mchog

brtags pa las drug yin/ /de ltar nyi shu rtsa lnga ni/ /'phel ba'o zad pa'ang de snyed yin/ /de dag re re 'phel mnyam zad/ /drug ste slar yang de dag ni/ /gcig zad gnyis gnyis 'phel ba ni/ /go bzlog bcas las drug tu 'gyur/ /dbye ba drug cu gnyis su

bstan/ /drug cu gsum pa bder gnas rgyu/ /de bzhin 'di dag dngas ma khrag stsogs 'dres pa las/ /nad ni zad dang mnyam dang 'phel ba'i dbye ba yis/ /rab dang rab mchog dag las mtha' yas nyid 'gyur bar/ /rang bzhin ci 'dra ma yengs yid kyis shes

par gyis/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ mdo'i gnas kyi le'u bcu gnyis pa'o// //de nas nad gso ba'i thabs kyi le'u bshad par bya'o/ /rlung nad gso ba snum dang ni/ /dugs dang sbyang ba 'jam rtsi dang / /mngar skyur lan tshwa bro ba yi/ /

zas dang bsku zhing mnye ba dang / /dkri snun sman chu blugs pa dang / /gro chang 'bras chang bu ram chang / /snum dro 'jam rtsi gtang ba ni/ /'jam rtsi nges pa bde dga' dang / /skye gnas du ma'i snum dag ni/ /drod che 'ju bar byed g.yos sbyar/ /khyad par du ni sha tshon dang / /til

mar dang sbyar 'jam rtsi bya/ /mkhris pa mar sar blud pa dang / /mngar zhing bsil ba'i bkru sman dang / /mngar dang kha dang bska ba yi/ /zas dang sman ni sbyin pa dang / /dri bzang bsil zhing yid 'ong ba'i/ /dri ni nye bar bsten pa dang / /mgul du do shal se mo do/ /nor

bu brang du gdags par bya/ /ga bur tsan+dan ur shi ra'i/ /byug pas skad cig re re bsku/ /srod la rdo thal can zla zer/ /yid 'ong glu dang ser bsil bsten/ /bag phebs mdza' bo bde ba dang / /bu la gzhon skad nyams rangs smra/ /chung ma yid mthun las byed cing / /

sdug cig yon tan rnams kyis brgyan/ /khang pa nyi rim chu bsil blugs/ /skyed mos tshal rdzing bzang po ni/ /rgya tsha dang ni stegs bcas pa/ /chus brlan bye ma bsil ba dang / /spyil bu lus tshad shing khebs dang / /chu 'gram pad+mar bcas par ni/ /bde gnas

khyad par 'o ma dang / /mar sar bza' dang bkru sman bya/ /bad kan cho gar ldan par ni/ /skyug sman bkru sman rnon po btang / /zas ni rtsub chung rno zhing dro/ /tsha zhing kha dang bska ba bza'/ /chang ni yun rings lon pa btung / /rtse dga' dang ni gnyid mi log /rtsol

ba'i tshul ni sna tshogs dang / /sems las rtsub pas mnye ba dang / /khyad par sman khu skyug sman btang / /sbrang rtsi tshil 'joms sman bsten bya/ /smyung bdud bdug mkhur bkang dbo/ /bde ba med nyid bde phyir bya/ /nad rnams so sor gso ba dang / /nad las dpags

te bshad pa yin/ /ldan pa dang ni 'dus pa dag /de ni so so'i tshul bzhin brtag /rlung ni zung du 'jug pas na/ /rlung mkhris phal cher so ga'i bya/ /bad kan rlung la dpyid kyi bya/ /bad kan mkhris pa ston gyi bya/ /zung du 'jug pa rlung gi mchog /yang dag 'dres pas gnyis bdag can/ /

me dang ldan pas sreg par byed/ /zla ba ldan pas bsil bar byed/ /nad ni dkyel sogs dus su bsal/ /ldang na gzhan don med par gso/ /thams cad ldan na tshabs che ba/ /nad gzhan gnod pa med par gso/ /nad ni sbyor bas zhi bya ba/ /gang gzhan ldang bar byed pa dag /de ni dag

min gzhan dag ni/ /ldang bar mi 'gyur rnam dag yin/ /rtsol drag tsha ba rno ba dang / /gnod par 'gyur ba spyad pas kyang / /khong pa yan lag rus pa dang / /gnad du rlung ni 'jug par 'gyur/ /de bzhin de la rtsa sgo ni/ /rnam par sbyangs pas 'byung bar 'gyur/ /smin byas rlung ni

tshar bcad pas/ /khong pa'i nang du 'du bar 'gyur/ /der gnas nas kyang rgyu dag la/ /sdod cing ring du thogs pa yin/ /de ni dus sogs stobs thob nas/ /gzhan la brten yang ldang bar byed/ /de la gnas gzhan gnas pa ni/ /de nyid stobs ni med nyid la/ /gso bar bya ba rang gi

ni/ /stobs kyis gzhan zil gnon byed na'o/ /bla brnan nad ni zhi byas na/ /rang gnas gnas pa gso mi dgos/ /phal cher rtsib logs 'gro ba'i nad/ /nad pa yun rings nyon mongs byed/ /lus me'i stobs ni shes pa yis/ /de la rings thabs dag mi bya/ /de ni sbyor bas zhi bya'am/ /

khong du bde bar bsdu bar bya/ /khong du 'dus par shes nas ni/ /ji ltar nye ba bzhin du bsal/ /bu ga 'byung 'gags stobs nyams shing / /lci zhing rlung ni khung du 'khrul/ /khong snyom mi 'ju mchil ma mang / /bshang gci sri dub zas mi len/ /nad rtse ma zhil spyi yi rtags/ /rtse

zhil de las bzlog pa yin/ /khong ba'i drod stobs chung nyid kyis/ /lus zungs dang po mi 'ju ba/ /nad ni pho bar zhugs pa dag /dngas ma ma zhu yin par bshad/ /gzhan dag nad nyid rab 'khrugs pa/ /rab sdug phan tshun 'doms las byung / /ko dra ba yi dug bzhin du/ /nad tshabs chen po

'byung bar bshad/ /nad tshabs de dang 'dres pa dang / /gnod pa gnod bya gnod 'gyur dang / /nad gzhan gang dag de las byung / /ma zhu ba dang bcas par bshad/ /de ni lus kun zhugs gyur pa/ /nad nang zhugs te rtse ma bcil/ /ma smin dbyung bar mi bya ste/ /ma smin shing thog

khu bar mtshungs/ /de ni dbyung bar dka' bas na/ /rten ni 'jig par byed par 'gyur/ /de ni smin dang drod skyed snum/ /dugs bya rtse bcil de bsil ba/ /ji ltar nye dang stobs ji bzhin/ /sbyangs pa'i dus su bsal bar bya/ /kha nas rigs par sman btang bas/ /ma zhu'i gnas

las nad myur bsal/ /nam tshod yan chad sna sman gyis/ /zhu ba'i gnas yong mas gtong bsal/ /steng ngam 'og tu 'byung bar rtsom/ /nad ni rang nyid 'byung bas na/ /sman gyis nad ni mi dgag ste/ /bkag na de nyid nad skyed 'gyur/ /de bas dang por nad 'byung la/ /bsdad de phan

par bza' bar bya/ /'khyil la smin pa de dang des/ /smin byas de bzhin bsal bar bya/ /dbyar ston tha chungs dpyid zla 'bring / /thun mong dus su rim bzhin du/ /so ga dbyar dang dgun bsags pa'i/ /rlung sogs nad ni myur du bsal/ /so ga dbyar dang dgun gyi tshe/ /rab tsha char dang

grang ba'i dus/ /de rnams dus mtshams thun mong ste/ /de tshe nad ni mi bzang bsal/ /tha mal bde gnas dbang byas kyi/ /nad pa nad kyi dbang du ni/ /grang tsha char gyi dus dag gi /gnyen po ji bzhin byas nas ni/ /sbyor ba'i dus su bab pa na/ /bya ba dus la mi sdod do/ /sman ni

zas ma zos sngon dang / /dbus dang mtha' dang kham gyi bar/ /zas bar tseg bu zas bcas dang / /zas mnan mtshan mo btung ba'o/ /bad kan bdo 'das nad pa ni/ /nyams stobs ldan la ma zos btang / /thur sel rlung la zas sngar btang / /mnyam gnas ldang la bar du yin/ /

khyab byed nang par zas za'i mthar/ /gyen rgyu'i rlung la dgongs ka'o/ /srog ces bya ba'i rlung ldang la/ /kham gyi bar dang zas bar bza'/ /dugs dang skyugs lud dbugs mi bde/ /skom dad skye la tseg bu'o/ /yi ga 'chus la sna tshogs zas/ /sman dang zas

bcas sbyar bar bya/ /skyigs bu lus 'dar lag 'dar dang / /zas nyung za la mnan pa gtang / /nam tshong yan chad nad la ni/ /mtshan mo'i dus su btang ba bsngags/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /mdo'i gnas kyi le'u bcu gsum pa'o// //de

nas gso ba'i thabs rnam pa gnyis bstan pa'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /gso ba rnam pa gnyis yin phyir/ /gso thabs rnam pa gnyis su 'dod/ /de gcig brta bar bya ba yin/ /gnyis pa nyams ni smad pa'o/ /de dag rgyas bya smyung ba zhes/ /rnam grangs dag tu bshad pa yin/ /

lus sha rgyas phyir rgyas bya ste/ /yang ba nyid phyir smyung bar bya/ /de ni phal cher sa chu dang / /cig shos las ni gyur pa yin/ /las gang snum dang dgag pa dang / /dugs dang khong rtsub bya ba ste/ /'byung ba de yang gnyis yin phyir/ /gnyis las 'da' bar mi byed do/ /de

la'ang sbyong dang zhi bya ba/ /rnam pa gnyis po smyung ba yin/ /gang zhig nad ni phyir 'byin pa/ /sbyong yin de ni rnam lnga ste/ /mas gtong skyugs sman lus nad bkru/ /mgo bo'i nad bkru gtar gas dbyung / /gang zhig nad ni mi sbyong dang / /snyoms gnas glongs pa ma yon dang / /ma

snyoms snyoms par byed pa dag /zhi ba yin te de rnams bdun/ /smin dang drod skyed bkres skom dang / /rtsol bcag nyi tshan ser bu bsil/ /brta ba dag ni rlung dang ni/ /rlung bcas mkhris pa zhi byed yin/ /brta bya nad dang sman dang chang / /bud med mya ngan gyis nyam chung / /khur dang

lam gyis glo rdol dang / /lus rtsub nyams dma' rlung shas che/ /sbrum ma bu btsas byis pa rgan/ /so ga'i dus dang gzhan yang brta/ /sha dang 'o ma ka ra dkar/ /mar sar mngar bag mas gtong dang / /gnyid log nyal bde bsku byug dang / /khrus dang bder gnas nyams dga' brta/ /

gcin snyi ma zhu snum rab zos/ /rims btab brla rengs mdze nad can/ /shub khong 'bras mcher pa na/ /glad nad lkog nad mig nad dang / /sbom po dgun dang gzhan dag kyang / /rtag tu smyung bar bya ba yin/ /de la sbyang bya shas che sbom/ /stobs ldan mkhris pa bad kan

rgyas/ /ma zhu'i nad dang rims dang skyug /tshad pas 'khru dang snying nad can/ /lus lci sgregs mang bshang gci 'gags/ /yi ga 'chus sogs kyis na ba/ /'bring tsam spom sogs phal cher ni/ /dang por smin dang drod bskyed bya/ /nad ni 'di dag gis nyam thag /sbom

dang stobs sogs chung ba la/ /bkres dang skom pas tshar bcad do/ /nad kyis nyam thag stobs 'bring brtan/ /ser bu tsha rtsol gyis smad na/ /nyam chung mi brta smos ci dgos/ /nyams smad bya ba brta mi bya/ /brta bya nyams smad 'jam pos bya/ /yang na yul dang stobs

sogs las/ /rigs pas de ni nye bar spyad/ /brta bas stobs ni 'phel ba dang / /de yis bsgrub bya'i nad zad 'gyur/ /smyung bas dbang gsal dri ma rnams/ /mi sri khong yang yi ga 'bye/ /bkres dang skom pa lhan cig 'byung / /dang ga snying dang sgregs pa dag /nad kyi rtse

zhil spro ba che/ /snyom bag med pa dag tu 'gyur/ /de dag tshad la sogs pa dang / /mi ldan sten par byed pa dag /rab sbom rab tu skem sogs 'gyur/ /de yang sman bcas bshad pa yin/ /tshul ni shin tu brta ba dang / /nyams smad de nyid las shes bya/ /shin tu tsho ches

'brum gcin snyi/ /rims dang dmu rdzing mtshan bar rdol/ /lus rmongs gcin sri be+e'u snabs chags/ /mdze la sogs pa mi bzad 'byung / /de la tshil dang rlung bad kan/ /sel bar byed pa thams cad phan/ /dzur na khre rgod ku lang+tha/ /nas dang sran chung mon sran sde'u/ /dar

ba dar rnying zho ga chu/ /sems las bya dang mi nyal bya/ /sbrang rtsi 'bras bu gsum pa'am/ /sle tres gla sgang a ru ra/ /skyer khaN+Da dang rtsa ba ni/ /chen po lnga dang gu gul dang / /brag zhun gyi ni sbyor ba dang / /ag ni man tha'i khu bcas phan/ /nas tshig 'khus thal byi dang ga /

bca' sga lcags phye sbrang rtsi dang / /nas dang skyu ru'i phye ma yi/ /sbyor bas shin tu tsho nad sel/ /tsha gsum 'bras gsum pu tse shel/ /shi kru byi dang po s+Thir/ /shing kun go snyod kha ru tsha/ /la la phud dang 'u su dang / /kru trug tres dang ser po gnyis/

bri ha gnyis dang chu rtsi mo/ /ha pu sha dang pa ta dang / /ke pu ka yi rtsa ba ste/ /'di rnams phye ma mar sbrang rtsi/ /til mar dag ni cha snyoms pa/ /nas phye'i cha ni bcu drug bskyed/ /sbyar ba 'thungs na de 'joms so/ /shin tu shas che'i bdag nyid kun/ /gzhan yang de 'dra'i

nad rnams dang / /snying nad mig ser sha bkra dang / /lus dbugs mi bde lkog nad sel/ /blo dang yid gzhungs sems dran byed/ /zas 'ju pho ba'i drod kyang skyed/ /smyung drags rab skam mgo 'khor lud/ /skom dad che zhing yi ga 'chus/ /snum drod gnyid mig rna ba

nyams/ /khu ba gzi mdangs skad gsang zad/ /rgu so snying klad byin pa brla/ /dku do rtsib logs na rims 'debs/ /tshig mang stong du rlung nad 'jug /rmya zhing skyug bro rus tshigs na/ /bshang gci sri ba la sogs pa/ /smyung ba drags pas 'byung bar 'gyur/ /

rab tu tsho bas skem nyid mchog /shin tu tsho drags pa yi sman/ /shin tu tshil ches me rlung sel/ /brta dang nyams smad yod ma yin/ /gang zhig mngar dang snum bag bza'/ /bsod bde dag gis skem pa sel/ /de las shin tu bzlog pa dag /nges par bsten pas sbom

nyid sel/ /de la bza' btung sman rnams ni/ /brta bar byed pa thams cad sbyar/ /sems las med dang dga' ba dang / /nges par brta bar bya ba dang / gnyid cher log pas skam pa yang / /phag dang 'dra bar lus rgyas gyur/ /lus ni brtas shing tsho byed pa/ /sha

dang 'dra ba gang yang med/ /sha mi za la sha za'i shas/ /lus ni shin tu brtas byed yin/ /sbom la nyams smad lci bas bya/ /de las bzlog pa skem la phan/ /nas dang gro ni gnyis ka la/ /de la 'os par byed pas brtag /nad kyi dbye ba tha dad kyi/ /gcod 'khrul

sogs dbye ba yis/ /nad ltar tha dad gyur kyang ni/ /gso ba gnyis las yod ma yin/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ mdo'i gnas kyi le'u bcu bzhi pa'o// //de nas sbyang ba la stsogs pa sman gyi sde tshan 'dus pa'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /po

son cha dang shing mngar dang / /ku ba kha bo nim pa dang / /bim pa ga gon bi sha la/ /dug mo nyung dang mur ba dang / /de ba da li byi dang ga /lcang ma tsi tra kru trug tres/ /ko sha pa ti ka rany+dza/ /pi pi ling dang rgyam tsha dang / /shu dag sug smel yungs kar te/ /'di dag skyugs

ba'i sman gyi sde/ /dan ti dang ni tri bid ta/ /'bras bu gsum dang bi sha la/ /shang ki ni dang snu ha dang / /seng phrom dong ga ni li ni/ /khron bu dang ni kam pi l+ya/ /'o ma ba gcin 'khru bar byed/ /po son cha dang dug mo nyung / /ru rta de ba da li dang / /shing mngar shu dag

rtsa ba bcu/ /thang shing ra snal la phud/ /sha ta pus pa pa ta la/ /rgya sran nag po sbrang rtsi dang / /rgyam tsha lce tsha shing nye ro/ /'di dag mas gtong bkru sman te/ /a ba marga byi dang ga /tsha ba gsum dang skyer pa'i rtsa/ /su ra la dang shi ri Sha/ /bri had shi kru'i sa bon

dang / /seng ldeng ma du ka'i snying po/ /rgyam tsha dngul rdo pha bong dreg /sug smel gnyis dang go snyod spom/ /mgo bo'i nad sbyong byed pa yin/ /thang shing rgya spos ru rta dang / /rtsa ba bcu dang bal gnyis/ /bi ra ta ri'i sman sder gtogs/ /bi da ri sogs rlung nad sel/ /

dUr ba dang ni byi tsher ba/ /nim pa ba sha ka'i lo ma/ /kha sral phre'u 'ol ma se/ /nye'u shing pa zhes bya dang / /shi ta ba ki pri yang ku/ /n+ya gro d+ha sogs shug pa sogs/ /s+thi ra rnam gnyis pad+ma'i ze/ /ban n+ya thal tres sogs mkhris sel/ /dong ga sogs dang arka sogs/ /

mung+ga sogs dang po son sogs/ /bye'u rug pa sogs gla sgang sogs/ /dug mo nyung sogs bad kan sel/ /dzi ban+ti dang ram nye ba/ /me da ma hA me da dang / /mung+ga ma sha par+Ni dang / /ldum bu zangs rtsi ba dang ni/ /dzi ba ka dang shing mngar te/ /sde 'di 'tsho byed ces bya

yin/ /bid ri dang e raN+Da/ /priSh+tsi kha li pur+Na rna/ /de ba ha sa de ba dang / /par+Ni gnyis dang kha sral dang / /'tsho byed lnga dang rtsa chung lnga/ /thal tres dang ni lcang ma dang / /haM sa pa ti zhes bya rnams/ /bi da ri sogs 'di snying phan/ /nyam

chung rlung dang mkhris pa sel/ /lus skem skran tshigs yan lag na/ /dbugs mi bde dang lud pa lu/ /sel bar byed pa'i sde tshan yin/ /thal tres dang ni pu shel tse/ /tang pa la dang ni ma du ka/ /tsan+dan dkar dang dmar ba dang / /shing mngar pa ru sha ka rnams/ /tshad

pa mkhris pa khrag rgyas dang / /skom dang rims kyis btab pa sel/ /shug pa puN+Da rI ka dang / /br-it+ti r-it+ti cu gang dang / /sring gi sle tres 'tsho byed bcu/ /nu zho skyed byed rlung mkhris sel/ /nyam chung tshim byed brtas byed la/ /'tsho byed ro tsa nyid du byed/ /pa ru sha dang

'bras bu gsum/ /rgun 'brum dang ni kad pa la/ /ka ta ka'i 'bras ra dza dan/ /se'u 'bru ba ra da du rnams/ /skom dang che dang gcin sri dang / /rlung gi nad rnams sel byed yin/ /any+dza na dang pha li ni/ /spang spos pad+ma ut+pa la/ /skyer khaN+Da dang sug smel dang / /

shing mngar nA ga ge sar bcas/ /dug dang nang gi tsha ba dang / /mkhris pa rgyas pa sel bar byed/ /pa tol dang pu tse shel/ /tsan+dan dkar po mur ba dang / /sle tres skra lor bcas pa dag /bad kan mkhris pa mdze dang rims/ /dug dang skyug bro yi ga 'chus/ /mig ser

gyi ni nad rnams 'joms/ /sle tres dang ni shug pa dang / /nim pa 'u su'i 'bras bu dang / /tsan+dan dmar po zhes bya rnams/ /mkhris pa dang ni bad kan dang / /rims dang skyug bro lus tsha dang / /skom dad che sel me drod skyed/ /dong ga dang ni dug mo nyung / /ka ka tig ta

ba ta li/ /nim pa sle tres dUr ba dang / /mur ba bi dang ka ta dang / /pa tha ci skrigs she rgya ka/ /ka rany+dza gnyis pa to la/ /lo ma bdun pa kru trug tres/ /su Sha byi ta po son cha/ /sa ha ra tsa zhes bya dang / /rgya shug gi ni 'bras bu rnams/ /de ni slon bro mdze nad dang / /dug dang

rims dang bad kan dang / /g.yan pa dang ni gcin snyi dang / /rma red pa rnams sbyong bar byed/ /a sa na dang ti ni sha/ /stag pa shwe ta ba ha dang / /ka ta ra dang seng ldeng dang / /ban da dang ni shing sha ba/ /a dza sring ga tsan+dan gsum/ /ta la a kar pa la sha/ /sa

la kha ra pa tra dang / /d+ha ba ka ling ka spro tog /tsha ga karna bad tsha ka/ /tha ram zhes ni bya ba ste/ /a san sogs de rnams kyis/ /sha bkra mdze nad bad kan dang / /srin nad skya rbab gcin snyi dang / /tsho ches nad ni sel bar byed/ /bar na she rgya ka gnyis/ /nye shing

tsi tra mo ra ta/ /bil ba any+dza sring gi dang / /bri ha ti ni rnam gnyis dang / /ka rany+dza gnyis dza ya gnyis/ /shi kru ku sha ru rta'o/ /ba ra ni sogs bad kan tshil/ /me drod chung dang rlung nad 'khyims/ /klad pa la brten nad sel zhing / /skran dang khong 'bras 'joms pa

yin/ /ru sha ka shing kun spangs ma/ /rgyam tsha brag zhun nag tshur gnyis/ /gcin sri rde'us 'gags pa dang / /skran dang tshil ches bad kan sel/ /be+e lan ta ra ar ni/ /sbra tog bri sha sru sru'i rtsa/ /i ka ta dang gzem dang / /sa ha ra dza ba na dang / /ka sha br-ik+Sha da ni

dang / /'dam bu ku sha rnam gnyis dang / /kun+tha dang ni kha sral dang / /ba lu ka dang mo ra ta/ /ku ru ta dang ka ram pa/ /lcam pa zhes bya'i sman sde 'di/ /be len ta ra la sogs pa/ /rlung las gyur pa'i nad 'joms shing / /rde'u'i phre'u yod pa dang / /gcin sri ba yi nad

rnams sel/ /seng phrom sha ba ra ro tra/ /pa la sha dang dz+hin dzi ni/ /thang shing kad pa la ra sna/ /ka tam pa dang chu shing dang / /e la ba lu a shwa ka/ /pa ri pe la mo tsa ka/ /'di ni seng phrom sogs zhes bya/ /tshil ches bad kan sel ba'i sde/ /mngal nad 'joms shing

'khru ba gcod/ /mdog bzang dug nad sel byed yin/ /arka dang ni a ral ka/ /nA ga dan+ti bi sha l+ye/ /ga bra ra sna bri shal/ /a ba marga ka rany+dza/ /ka kad ri ka rany+dza/ /gi ri kar gnyis iM gu dang / /arka la sogs sde tshan 'di/ /bad kan tshil ches dug

rnams sel/ /srin nad dang ni mdze nad 'joms/ /khyad par du ni rma la phan/ /bye'u rug rnams gnyis ku ther/ /ka la mal byi dang ga /kha ra pa tra kad pa la/ /bri sha kar+Ni sha kun ti/ /ske tshe ka bid tha'i lo ma/ /ga bra mon sne'u ka mu ka /

rkang mar bi sha muSh+Thi dang / /bu srin dang 'bam po'o/ /bye'u rug pa la sogs pa'i sde/ /bad kan tshil ches srin nad sel/ /cham pa yi ga 'chus lud pa/ /dbugs mi bde 'joms rma red sbyong / /muska ka dang snu ha dang / /'bras bu gsum dang tsi tra ka/ /pa la sha dang

d+ha ba dang / /shing sha pa zhes bya ba rnams/ /skran dang gcin nad rde'u chags/ /skya rbab dang ni tshil ches nad/ /bad kan rgyas dang khu ba yi/ /nad rnams sel bar byed pa yin/ /dug mo nyung dang mur ba dang / /bar gi dang ni bu tse shel/ /na le sham dang bong nga dkar/ /

chu sgog sug smel pa ta dang / nyungs kar zir ur lu/ /a za mo dang po son cha/ /shu dag zi ra nag po dang / /shing kun dang ni byi dang ga /pa shu gan+d+ha tsha ba lnga/ /rlung dang bad kan tshil ches dang / /cham pa skran dang rims dang gzer/ /gzhang 'brum gyi ni nad rnams

sel/ /shu dag gla sgang thang shing dang / /dong gra bong nga a rur/ /ser po gnyis dang shing mngar dang / /kr-iSh+Na par+Ni dug mo nyung / /shu dag yung ba la sogs sde/ /be+e'u snabs tshad pas 'khru smin gcod/ /tshil ches bad kan rgyas rlung 'khyil/ /nu ma'i nad rnams sel bar byed/

pri yang+ku dang ra gan dud/ /lig bu mig dang stang zil dang / /lcim rtsa pad+ma ge sar dang / /btsod dang ya ba sha ka dang / /shal ma li dang de'i khu ba/ /sa mang ga dang bun ma/ /tsan+dan da ta ka'i me tog /aM pa sha dang shing mngar dang / /na ma ka ra tu ni shing / /rgya skyegs

shing dang kad tshur/ /seng phrom bil rkang da ta ki/ /pad+ma'i ge sar ka tang ka /pri yang aM pas+tha sde gnyis/ /zhu ba'i tshad pa'i 'khru ba sel/ /'byor byed mkhris pa dag la phan/ /rma yang 'tshob par byed pa yin/ /kla sgang shu dag kru trug tres/ /ser po gnyis dang kha ba

gnyis/ /go bye pa tha 'bras bu gsum/ /bong nga dkar nag ru rta dang / /sug smel dang ni shu dag rnams/ /nu zho mngal nad dri ma sel/ /n+ya gro d+ha dang a shwad+tha/ /u dum+bA ra seng phrom gnyis/ /'dzam bu gnyis dang ardzu na/ /ka pi ta dang kad pa la/ /blag sha a

mra lcang ma dang / /bi ya la dang pa la sha/ /nan+ti rgya shug ka dam pa/ /bir shing mngar ma du ka /n+ya gro d+ha sogs sde tshan 'di/ /rma 'tsho 'khru gcod chag grugs sbyor/ /tshil ches khrag mkhris skom dad che/ /mngal gyi nad rnams sel bar byed/ /e la gnyis dang

du ru ka /ru rta gan+d+ha bri yang ku/ /spang spos pa la bya ma ka /spri ka tso ra tso tsa dang / /shing tsha gan+d+ha b+ha dra dang / /rgya spos bo la s+the ne ya/ /rgya mtsho'i lbu ba chu srin sen/ /thang shing dang ni a ka ru/ /gur gum shi ri bas ka /tsan+dan gu gul lce pog dkar/ /bur

na ma dang kun du ru/ /nA ga ge sar zhes bya'o/ /e la sogs ste rlung bad kan/ /dug rnams sel zhing mdog gsal byed/ /g.yan pa thor bu'i nad rnams dang / /sha bkra bas ldag sel bar byed/ /sha ma dan+ti dra ban+ti/ /ku ta ra na kra mu ka /shaM gi ni dang sa ta la/ /

khron bu dang ni ga bak+Shi/ /su d+ha k+Shi ra kam+bi l+ye/ /sle tres dong ga ka rany+dza/ /baSh+Ta an+t+ra shi kru dang / a mra shing ro tsha'i 'bras bu/ /dur byid la sogs sde tshan 'di/ /skran dang dug dang yi ga 'chus/ /bad kan dang ni snying nad dang / /gcin sri ba yi nad rnams 'joms/ /

de ltar sum cu rtsa gsum bshad/ /sde tshan de las ma rnyed na/ /de dang mtshungs pa gzhan dang sbyar/ /mi 'dra'i sbyor ba spang bar bya/ /sde tshan de dag gnod dang gnod bya sogs ltos te/ /cho ga bskol dang snum dang bsdams pa la sogs ldan/ /btung dang snar gtang mas gtong

dang ni phyi rol du/ /bsku zhing byugs pas shin tu gso dka'i nad kun 'joms/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /mdo'i gnas kyi le'u bcwa lnga pa'o// //de nas snum gyi cho ga bya ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /snum byed sman rnams phal cher ni/ /

lci zhing bsil la khong 'khru snum/ /rdul dang bral la mnyen zhing brlan/ /de las bzlog pa rtsub byed yin/ /zhun mar rkang dang tshil til mar/ /snum rnams kyi ni mchog rab 'dod/ /de dag las kyang zhun mar ni/ /sbyor rjes su 'jug pas mchog

yin no/ /de dag sngon bzhin mkhris pa sel/ /phyi ma bzhin du cig shos sel/ /mar bas til mar lci de bas/ /tshil de tshil bas rkang lci'o/ /de las gnyis dang gsum dang bzhi/ /zung dang gsum pa che zhes bya/ /dugs bya sbyang bya chang bud med/ /rtsol

chags sems las che ba dang / /rgan po byis pa stobs chung spegs/ /rtsub dang khrag dang khu ba zad/ /rlung nad kyis nyen rab rib dang / /shin tu dbye dka' la snum bya/ /shin tu drod chung rab drod che/ /shin tu sbom dang rid pa dang / /brla rengs tshad 'khru ma zhu dang / /lkog

nad dbyig dug dmu rdzing dang / /brgyal skyugs bad kan yi ga 'chus/ /skom dad chang nad kyis nyen dang / /dus min bu skyes sna sman dang / /mas gtong bkru sman byas la min/ /de la blo dran yid gzhungs sogs/ /'dod pa rnams la zhun mar bsngags/ /rmen bu bad

kan srin bu dang / /tshil ches rlung nad yod pa dang / /lus yang mkhrang 'dod lto srab pa'i/ /lus can rnams la til mar phan/ /rlung dang nyi tshan lam bud med/ /khur dang rtsol bas lus zungs zad/ /rtsub nyon mongs bzod me drod rno/ /rtsa sgo rlung 'gags lhag ma phan/ /

tshigs dang rus pa gnad rnams dang / /lto na mes tshig rma byung ltung / /mngal dang rna ba glad nad la/ /tshil yang mchog tu phan pa yin/ /til mar dbyar phan zhun mar ni/ /dbyar mtha' de bzhin dpyid kyang bsngags/ /thun mong dus la snum rnams ni/ /nyin mor nyi ma gsal

tshe bsngags/ /rings la dgun yang til mar gtang / /tsha ba'i dus su'ang mar tshan gtang / /mkhris pa rlung dang mkhris par bcas/ /ldan pa la yang mtshan mo nyid/ /mtshan mo las gzhan rlung bad kan/ /nyin par sbyar bas mkhris nad 'gyur/ /bza' sogs zas

dang mas gtong dang / /sna nas gtang bsku mkhur bkang dgo/ /mgo bsku rna mig dgang ba yi/ /snum ni rigs par dpyad par bya/ /ro yi dbye ba re re yis/ /drug cu rtsa bzhir rnam par brtags/ /snum ni gzhan gyis zil gnon zhing / /chung ngu dgos pas rim par bshad/ /

ji skad bshad pa'i rgyu med pas/ /dngas ma btung la dpyad mi dgos/ /snum gyi las ni myur bsgrubs pas/ /snum de'i cho ga mchog yin no/ /gang zhig thun ni gnyis dang bzhi/ /brgyad kyis rim bzhin 'ju 'gyur ba/ /tshad chung 'bring dang che ba ste/ /de las chung ngu bza'

ba mchog /nad la sogs pa brtags nas ni/ /thog mar shin tu chung ngu bza'/ /snga de'i zas de zhu nyid na/ /sbyang phyir dngas ma mang du btung / /zhi bya ltogs byas zas med par/ /'bring tshad tsam ni bsngags pa yin/ /brta ba sha dang sha khu sogs/ /de yang 'bras

chan nyung bcas pa/ /byis pa rgan po skom gyis gdungs/ /snum 'gras chang dad che ba dang / /bud med snum ni rtag bsten dang / /drod chung bde dang dka' mi bzod/ /lto snyi nad dkyel chung tsha dus/ /nyam chung pa la bsngags pa yin/ /dang po bar dang zas rjes zos/ /lus

kyi smad bar stod las byung / /nad rnams sel zhing lus kyi stobs/ /bskyed pa'i rim bzhin byed pa yin/ /de ni legs par smin phyir dang / /khar chags pa ni phyi ba'i phyir/ /snum dag 'thungs rjes chu tshan btung / /e raN pa la ta kar min/ /zhu'am ma zhu'i dogs

skyes na/ /slar yang chu tshan btung bar bya/ /des ni sgregs pa dag 'gyur zhing / /de las khong yang yi gar 'ong / /nang par 'thung ngam 'thungs pa dang / /'thungs par gyur tshe kha zas ran/ /gsher dro bad kan mi skyed dang / /shin tu snum min 'dres min bza'/ /kha

lag chu dron gyis bkru zhing / /bud med mi bsten mtshan mo nyal/ /shugs dgag drag shul las rnams dang / /khro dang mya ngan nyi tshan grang / /ser bu'i khar 'dug rta zhon 'gro/ /mang smra rab mtho'i stan la 'dug /sngas ni rab mtho rab dma' dang / /nyin nyal dud rdul gnas

pa spang / /gang gis nyin mo 'thungs gyur pa/ /de ltar gzhan la'ang spang bar bya/ /rim 'di las rnams thams cad dang / /nad zad pa la spyad par bya/ /zhi ba'i snum gyi nyer spyad ni/ /bkru sman btang ba lta bur bya/ /lto snyi zhun mar zhag

gsum btung / /lto sra ba yis zhag bdun btung / /yang na ji srid snum par btung / /de phan chad ni goms par 'gyur/ /rlung ni bder rgyu me drod 'bar/ /bshang ba snum zhing mi sri la/ /snum mi 'dod cing snyoms 'gyur pa/ /snum legs yin te rtsub go bzlog /

snum drags pa yis skya ba dang / /sna dang kha rkub las 'dzag 'gyur/ /tshad dang mi ldan dus min gnod/ /zas dang spyod lam log pa yis/ /snum chos byed skrang gzhang 'brum dang / /khong rmya rengs shing sems myos dang / /g.yan pa mdze dang rims skyug gzer/ /

lto sbos mgo 'khor la sogs 'gyur/ /de la bkres skom skyug sman dugs/ /zas skom sman ni rtsub pa dang / dar ba chang rnying tshod ma dang / /'bru rgod ci tse khre rgod dang / /sbrang rtsi 'bras gsum pi pi ling / /ba gcin gu gul a ru ra/ /nad dmigs so so ji bzhin du/ /

snum las nad gyur bcos thabs yin/ /rtsub pa dag ni smyung byas dang / /shin tu byas dang 'dra ba yin/ /slon dro skams sa las byung snum/ /sha khu btung zhing dugs dpyad bya/ /khrus byed pa'am skyug sman gtong / /snum byas zhag gsum gnas par bya/ /nyin zhag

gzhan pa gcig cig ni/ /de bskyed pa yis bad kan skyod/ /sha che tshil che bad kan mang / /me yi 'ju drod mi snyoms dang / /snum la goms pa'i snum bya rnams/ /de ni sngon du rtsub chos bya/ /de nas snum byas sbyangs gyur na/ /de la snum nad mi 'byung ngo / /snum

la goms par gyur pas na/ /dri ma 'thon par nus pa yin/ /byis pa rgan phol sogs pa/ /snum spang bar ni mi nus la/ /skye bar mi byed sbyor ba 'dis/ /'phral du snum ni sbyar bar bya/ /de la mar brngos sha khu dang / /mar dang brngos pa'i thug pa'am/ /til che snum

bcas bu ram chung / /bcas dang kri sar dang ni/ /'o thug mar mang dro ba'am/ /bu ram zho dang bcas pa'am/ /thug pa snum ni bzhi pa la/ /lnga pa 'bras dang ldan par bya/ /bdun pa de dag 'phral snum bya/ /snum rnams lan tshwa cher btab pa/ /de ni bad kan skyed

rtsub min/ /phra zhing dro la lus khyab byed/ /mdze dang skran nad gcin snyi la/ /bu ram bcas bza' 'o ma sha/ /til dang ma sha chang dang zho/ /snum bya'i don du mi bya'o/ /'bras gsum pi pi ling gu gul/ /a ru ra la sogs bskol bas/ /de dag snum la ji bzhin du/ /

gnod pa med par sbyar bar bya/ /nad kyis nyam chung gyur pa las/ /lus drod stobs bskyed nus pa btang / /skyes bu snum la brten par byed pa rnams/ /nang gi drod 'bar khong pa dag pa dang / /lus zungs 'phral brta stobs dang mdog bzang ldan/ /dbang brtan rgas sra lo

brgya thub par bshad/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /mdo'i gnas kyi le'u bcu drug pa'o// //de nas dugs kyi cho ga'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /dugs bsro bcing dang tha mal pa/ /chu dugs dbye bas rnam pa bzhi/ /bsro ba gos dang lcags

dang ni/ /lag mthil la sogs mer bsros bsro/ /bcing ba shu dag sbang ma dang / /thang shing sha ta put+pa dang / /'bru kun dri rnams ra sna dang / /e raN+Da'i rtsa shu dag dang / /snum bag tsha dang dar ba dang / /'o mas sbrus shing tsha cher btab/ /rlung lus byung ba 'ba'

zhig sel/ /bad kan 'dres la bye'u rug sogs/ /mkhris pa 'dres la shug sogs kyis/ /glan pa zhes bya yang dang yang / /dkri ba snum zhing nus pa dro/ /spu 'jam lpags rul min pas dkri/ /ma rnyed rlung 'joms lo ma dang / /dar dang snam bu ras kyis dkri/ /

mtshan mo dkris pa nyin par dgrol/ /nyin par dkris pa mtshan mo dgrol/ /tha mal pa ni khur ba dang / /bong ba gyo mo rdo sa phye/ /gso ma'i lo ma 'bru rnams dang / /lci ril phye ma phub ma rnams/ /thabs rnams du mas legs bsros pa/ /yul dang dus las dpags

te sbyar/ /chu dugs shi kru ba ra na/ /e raN+Da dang ka rany+dza/ /byi'u rug pa dang ardza ka /shi ri sha dang ba sha ka/ /'od ma arka ma la ti/ /ya ba sha ka'i lo ma bkru/ /shu dag la sogs sman rnams dang / /gsher sa chur gnas sha rnams dang /

rtsa bcu nad dmigs ji bzhin du/ /so so'am lhan cig sbyar nas ni/ /snum ldan chang dang tsha dang ni/ /'o ma chu sogs kyis btsos la/ /bum pa'am sbu gu ring po ni/ /bkang la nad kyis nyam thag pa'i/ /lus ni gos kyis dkris nas su/ /ci bde bar ni snum chu blugs/ /

lus la rlung nad zhugs gyur pa/ /de nyid kyis 'dir bkang snod du/ /nad pa zhugs te gnas na ni/ /gcin sri gzhang 'brum sogs nad sel/ /rlung med phyi nang snum bcas shing / /zas 'ju'i dus su dugs dpyad bya/ /nad dang nad pa yul dus kyi/ /dbang las

chung 'bring chen po bya/ /bad kan gyis nyin rtsub dugs bya/ /bad kan rlung la rtsub snum bya/ /rlung ni ma zhu'i gnas zhugs dang / /bad kan zhu ba'i gnas brten la/ /gnas kyi dbang gis rtsub dugs dang / /de bzhin snum sngar 'gro dugs bya/ /sta zur dag dang

mig dang snying / /rlig par nyung ngu'am bya ba min/ /dugs kyis grang dang zug gzer bral/ /yan lag mnyen par gyur pa dang / /dal gyis mnyes la khrus byas la/ /de nas snum gyi cho ga bsten/ /dugs drags pa yis khrag mkhris 'khrugs/ /skom brgyal skad

'gags yan lag 'jums/ /mgo 'khor tshigs na rims 'debs shing / /tshi gu dmar po tal til snang / /lums kyis skyugs bro bar 'gyur te/ /der ni zhi bya'i sman gyis gso/ /dugs dang thal sman me btsa' dang / /tshad 'khru skyugs bro brgyal nad gso/ /dugs

ni phal cher lci dro rno/ /de las gzhan pa zhi byed yin/ /gsher zhing brtan 'khru snum pa dang / /rtsub cing sra ba dugs sman yin/ /'jam dang rtsub dang zhi 'byar bag /gsher bag de ni sel byed yin/ /mdor na phal cher kha ba dang / bska dang mngar ba de sman yin/ /

zhi zhing rtse bcil stobs thob 'gyur/ /ji skad bshad pa'i nad rnams zad/ /bcil drags pags pa rtsa 'khums shing / /'dar snying kha 'gram nad du 'gyur/ /rkang mchu lag pa pags nag 'gyur/ /bcil drags pa yi nad du bshad/ /shin tu spom dang rtsub pa dang / /nyam

chung brgyal bar gyur pa dang / /dugs drags bcos dgos glo rdol dang / /skem dang chang nad kyis btab dang / /rab rib dmu rdzing shu ba mched/ /mdze nad 'or nad rlung mkhris dang / /'o ma zho dang mar sbrang rtsi/ /'thungs dang bkru sman btang ba dang / /lus nad tshigs

dang gzhang nad yod/ /khro dang mya ngan 'jigs pas nyen/ /bkres skom mig ser skya rbab dang / /gcin nad mkhris nad zla mtshan 'dzag /sbrum dang bu skyes dugs mi bya/ /nad tshabs che na 'jam por bya/ /lud pa cham pa dbugs mi bde/ /skyigs bu lto spos

bshang 'gags dang / /skad 'gags rlung gi nad rnams dang / /bad kan be snabs 'khyil zhing lci/ /lus rengs rked pa rtsib logs dang / /sgur dang lto nad 'gram nad dang / /rlig nad skrangs dang da rgan dang / /rtsol dang rlung nad kyis zug dang / /gcin 'gags

thor bu rmen bu dang / /khu ba bkag dang rlung 'khyims la/ /de yi sman gyi dbye ba yis/ /dugs ni so so ji bzhin bya/ /dugs phan me yis bsro min pa/ /rlung nad tshil dang bad kan can/ /rlung med khang par rtsol ba dang / /gos lci ba dang 'jigs pa dang / /dkri dang

stobs 'gyed khro ba dang / /chang mang bkres dang nyi tshan bzhag /nad gang nad khrol gnas pa'i lus zungs gnas/ /rtsar song rkang lag rus pa'i nang song ba'i/ /nad de dugs kyis bsrung bar byas nas ni/ /khong du bsdus la sbyang bas dpyis dbyung bya/ /yan lag

brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ mdo'i gnas kyi le'u bcu bdun pa'o// //de nas skyugs sman dang bkru sman gtang ba'i cho ga'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /bad kan nad dam 'dres pa yi/ /bad kan rgyas la skyugs sman gtang / /de bzhin mkhris pa bkru sman bya/ /rims

sar tshad 'khru thur du ni/ /mkhris pa khrag 'khru glo gcong dang / /mdze dang gcin nad 'brum thor bu/ /rkang bam mi dran lud pa can/ /dbugs mi bde snying 'phar 'bras mched/ /nu ma'i nad dang ro stod nad/ /khyad par du ni skyug sman bya/ /skyug sman

mi gtong sbrum khong rtsub/ /bkres dang rtag tu sdug bsngal ba/ /byis pa rgan skem sbom snying na/ /glo skam smras dang nyam chung dang / /rtag tu slon dang mcher pa na/ /rab rib lto na srin bu yod/ /rlung khrag 'dren mar gyen du 'byung / /so nams gtong skad 'dzer dang / /

gcin sri dmu rdzing skran can dang / /slon dka' drod che gzhang 'brum can/ /rtug skam mgo 'khor rtsib logs sra/ /rtsib logs zug dang rlung can no/ /de dag dug 'thungs ma zhu dang / /mi 'phrod zas zos ma gtogs so/ /rtag tu slon pa yan chad dang / /phal cher

ma zhu'i rims dag dang / /ma zhu ba ni thams cad la'ang / /dud pas bdug pa'i las kun spangs/ /bkru sman gyis gso skran gzhang 'brum/ /'brum bu mig ser gzhogs phyed lci/ /rims rnying dmu rdzing dbyig dug dang / /skyugs dang mcher nad skya rbab dang / /long nad rab

rib sngon por gyur/ /mchi 'dzag zhu ba'i gnas na zug /mngal dang khu ba'i gnas kyi nad/ /khong nad gtogs dang srin nad rma/ /dreg nad nam tshong yan chad nad/ /gcin sri bshang ba 'gags pa dang / /slon bya mdze gcin nad sogs yin/ /khrus mi bya ba rims

gsar dang / /drod chung khrag mkhris thur du 'byung / /rmas dang gzhang nad tshad pas 'khru/ /khong du mtshon lus lto sra dang / /snum ches pa dang skem ches pa'o/ /de nas thun mong dus su ni/ /cho ga bzhin du snum gyis nyen/ /nya dang ma sha til sogs kyis/ /nang par

slon bya'i bad kan skyed/ /mtshan mo gnyid log zas legs zhu/ /snga dro'i dang por bkra shis byas/ /zas ma zos pa'am cung zad snum/ /thug pa zhun mar ldan par btung / /byis pa rgan po nyams stobs chung / /sman stobs chung ba nad dbang las/ /chang 'o bu ram

shing sha khu/ /nad dmigs ji skad bshad pa bzhin/ /sbrang rtsi rgyam tsha dang ldan pa/ /sman tshad lto ba las dpags te/ /sman la sngags ni mngon bzlas la/ /lkog mar phyin ba'i bar du blud/ /tshangs pa skye dgu'i bdag dang tha skar bu/ /drag po dbang po nyi zla sa me rlung / /

drang srong rnams kyi tshogs dang bcas pa dang / /'byung po'i tshogs kyis khyed ni bsrung bar shog /drang srong rnams kyi bcud kyis len pa dang / /lha rnams kyi ni bdud rtsi lta bu dang / /klu mchog rnams kyi bdud rtsi lta bur ni/ /khyod la sman 'di nye bar gnas gyur cig /oM na mo b+ha ga ba

te/ b+hai Sha dz+ya gu ru bai DUr+ya pra b+ha rA dzA ya/ /ta thA ga tA ya/ arta te/ saM myag saM bud+d+hA ya/ /tad+ya thA/ /oM b+haiSha dz+ye b+hai Sha dz+ye ma hA b+hai Sha dz+ye/ rA dza sa mung+ga te swAhA/ shar du kha bstan 'thung du bzhug /'thungs nas de la sems dmigs te/ /yud tsam bsdad la dang gar

'khyil/ /mchil ma de nas slon du gzhug /ma gnod par ni sor mos sam/ /yang na chu ba 'jam po yis/ /lkog ma lce'u chung ma snang bya/ /skyug mi bro bar mi drang ngo / /'byung bar bzlog pa slon par bya/ /pus mo dang mnyam stan la gnas/ /de ni slon tshe glo gnyis

dang / /'phral ba dag nas brten par bya/ /de bzhin lte ba btsir ba dang / /rgyab nas gyen du mnye bar bya/ /de ltar bad kan rno drod kha/ /mkhris pa mngar dang bsil bas slon/ /rlung 'dres bad kan snum pa dang / /skyur dang lan tshwa dag gis slon/ /ji srid bad

kan rgyun chad pa'am/ /mkhris pa snang gi bar du skyugs/ /shugs dal pi pi ling skyu ru/ /yungs kar rgyam tsha chu dag gis/ /yang dang yang ni slon du gzhug /de ni slon par ma gyur pa'am/ /sdod pa dang bcas slon pa'am/ /sman ni 'ba' zhig byung gyur na/ /sbyor

nyes de ni mchil ma mang / /g.yan pa thor pu rims sogs 'byung / /bder skyugs bad kan mkhris pa dang / /rlung ni rim gyis 'byung bar 'gyur/ /sbyor ba legs yin sbyor drags pas/ /dbu ba tshon can khrag 'drar snang / /slon nas khong rmya lus tsha dang / /lkog

skam mgo 'khor mig mi mthong / /rlung nad mi bzad ldan gyur zhing / /srog gi khrag 'byung 'chi bar 'gyur/ /sbyor ba legs pas slon na ni/ /yud tsam ngal gso dud pa gsum/ /gang yang rung bas bdugs pa dang / de'i 'og snum gyi spyod pa

bstan/ /de nas dgongs ka'am nang par ni/ /bkres tshe chu dron gyis bkru la/ /sA lu rtsa snar 'bras kyi ni/ /thug pa la sogs rim bzhin bsten/ /thug pa gar g.yos ma byas pa'i/ /khu ba sha khu gsum dang gnyis dang gcig /mchog dang bar ma tha ma'i sbyong bas

sbyang / /mi yis zas kyi dus su rim bzhin spyad/ /dper na me chu rtswa dang lci sogs kyis/ rnam par sbar na rim gyis mched pa na/ /che zhing brtan la thams cad mched par nus/ /sbyangs pa'i nang me thug sogs kyis de bzhin/ /slon tshad chung dang 'bring dang chen po

ni/ /bzhi dang drug dang lan brgyad slon par 'dod/ /de nyid bcu dang nyis ldab sum ldab 'khru/ /bre gang de bzhin nyis ldab bzhi ldab 'gyur/ /skyug sman mthar mkhris bkru sman las byed dang / /bad kan mthar dbyung 'khru ba mchog tu bshad/ /'khru ba gnyis gsum

bshang dang bcas ma gtogs/ /'khru ba gzhal te slon la 'thungs ma gtogs/ /de nas slon pa de la ni/ /slar yang snum dang dugs byas te/ /bad kan dus 'das lto shes nas/ /legs par bkru sman gtang bar bya/ /mkhris pa mang zhing lto snyi la/ /'o mas byang ni

bkru bar byed/ /rlung shas che shing lto sra na/ /dur byid sogs kyis kyang bkru dka'/ /bkru sman mkhris la mngar dang bska/ /bad kan la ni kha bas bya/ /rlung la snum bro lan tshwa can/ /mi 'khrun ni chu tshan blud/ /lag pa bsros pas de yi ni/ /lto ba legs par
