dugs bya'o/ /ma 'khrus de zhag ldang zas zos/ /nyi ma gnyis par slar yang btung / /lto ba rab sra snum dag ni/ /zhag bcu'i bar du yang btung bas/ /slar yang snum dang dugs kyis ni/ /lus sbyangs nas ni bkru sman gyis/ /sbyor ba legs par brtags pa dang / /sngar

gyi nyes pa dran par bya/ /snying dang lto na yi ga 'chus/ /bad kan mkhris pa glongs pa dang / /g.yan pa lus tsha thor bu dang / /cham pas 'debs shing bshang rlung 'gags/ /sbyor ba nyes pa'i mtshan nyid yin/ /sbyor legs ji skad bshad go bzlog /bshang ba mkhris pa

bad kan rlung / /rim gyis 'khru zhing 'byung ba na/ /bad kan mkhris pa med chu 'khru/ /skya zhing rnag dang khrag dang bcas/ /yang na sha bkrus lta bu'am/ /tshil gyi dum bu 'dra nyid dam/ /gzhang 'byung skom dad che ba dang / /mgo 'khor mig ni phugs su bros/ /

bkru sman drags pas 'byung ba yin/ /de bzhin skyug sman drags nad 'byung / /legs par 'khrus pa de la ni/ /dud pas bdug pa ma gtogs pa'i/ /cho ga skyug sman dang mtshungs pas/ /de nas slon dang 'dra bar bya/ /zas la rim gyis spyad nas ni/ /de 'og nar

ma'i kha zas bsten/ /sman 'thungs me drod chung ba dang / /ma dag nad kyis rmya ba dang / /zhu ba'i mtshan ma ma mthong na/ /de ni nyin par smyung byas la/ /snum dang dugs dang sman rnams kyis/ /glongs pa'i nad kyis nyen mi 'gyur/ /sbyangs dang khrag ni 'byung ba dang / /snum mchog

la sbyar smyung ba yis/ /me drod zhan pa nyid 'gyur te/ /de bas thug sogs rim gyis spyad/ /bad kan mkhris pa bri zhing chung / /chang 'thungs rlung dang mkhris pa che/ /de la thug pa mi blud kyi/ /brta ba la sogs rim pa phan/ /skyug sman

ma zhu bar nad 'byin/ /bkru sman zhu nas 'byin pa yin/ /de yi phyir na skyug sman dag /zhu ba la ni bsdad mi dgos/ /steng dang 'og tu 'byung rigs pas/ /gang tshe phyin ci log gyur na/ /de tshe skyugs la rkang par ni/ /chu dron dag gis blugs par bya/ /lus kyi stod

ni chu grang blugs/ /'khru ba la ni de las bzlog /gang zhig nyam chung nad mang dang / /nad smin pa yis rang nyid ni/ /'khru bar byed la 'khru ba ni/ /kha zas byin la der 'khrur gzhug /sngar sbyangs pas ni nyam chung dang / /nad kyi dkyel chung lus zad mi/ /lto bsra

snyi mi shes la/ /sman ni 'jam zhing chung ngu blud/ /de mang 'thungs pa mchog yin gyi/ /gzhan du dgos pa bcas mi rung / /nyam chung pa yi nad mang po/ /g.yos gyur cung zad cung zad cig /sman ni 'jam pos lan mang zhig /de ni nyung 'gyur zhi

bar bya/ /ma btsal de ni yun ring du/ /nyon mongs pa'am gsod par 'gyur/ /me drod chung dang lto sra la/ /thal sman rgyam tsha mar bcas pas/ /me yi drod ni bskyed nas su/ /rlung dang bad kan bsal bar bya/ /rtsub cing rlung mang lto sra dang / /rtag tu rtsol ba'i tshul can

dang / /me drod rab tu che la sman/ /mi 'khru bar ni zhu bar 'gyur/ /de la sngar ni 'jam rtsi btang / /de nas snum pa'i bkru sman bya/ /sman ni rnon po'i reng bu yis/ /bshang ba cung zad dbyung bar bya/ /dri ma legs par 'khrus nas ni/ /snum 'khru bde bar 'byung bar

'gyur/ /dug gis phog na thor bu 'byung / /mdze dang 'or nad me dpal dang / /mig ser skya rbab za khus nyen/ /ha cang snum ches sbyang mi bya/ /kun la bkru sman snum bag gtang / /snum gyis zhen la rtsub pa gtang / /skyug sman la sogs las rnams la/ /slar yang bar

skabs bar skabs su/ /snum dang dugs kyi cho ga bya/ /snum rjes la ni stobs bskyed bya/ /lus las nad rnams bsal ba na/ /gos kyi dri ma 'khru dang mtshungs/ /snum dang dugs dag ma byas par/ /gang zhig sbyang ba'i las byed pa/ /shing skam 'gugs par byed pa ltar/ /

de yi lus ni ma rungs 'gyur/ /sbyang ba legs par nye bar bstan pas ni/ /blo gros gsal zhing dbang po stobs dang ldan/ /lus zungs brtan zhing khong pa'i me drod 'bar/ /na tshod dag kyang ring du 'jog par byed/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /mdo'i gnas kyi

le'u bcwa brgyad pa'o// //de nas mas gtong ba'i cho ga'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /rlung shas che ba'i nad rnams sam/ /rlung la mas gtong bsngags pa ste/ /de ni gso ba thams cad kyi/ /mchog ste de yang rnam pa gsum/ /bkru drags 'jam rtsi mas gtong gong / /de yis

gso bya skran dang ni/ /lto sbos dreg nad mcher pa dang / /'khru ba 'ba' zhig gzer nad dang / /rims rnying bying dang cham pa dang / /khu ba rlung dang dri ma 'gags/ /rlig rlugs rde'u nad zla mtshan 'jig /rlung gi nad ni mi bzad gso/ /bkru drags mi bya snum drags dang / /glo rdol shin tu

skems pa dang / /be+e snabs 'khru dang slon bro dang / /sbyang byas sna sman btang ba dang / /dbugs mi bde lud cham gzhang 'brum/ /skyigs bu lto sbos me drod chung / /gzhang skrangs kha zas zos zin dang / /lto 'gags bu ga chu yod dang / /mdze can gcin nad sbrang mdog dang / /sbrum ma zla

bdun yan chad do/ /bkru drags bya nyid 'jam rtsi bya/ /khyad par du ni me drod che/ /rtsub dang rlung nad gcig pus nyen/ /'jam rtsi mi bya'ang de nyid do/ /de bzhin skya rbab mig ser dang / /tshil che cham btab zas ma zos/ /bshang bar 'khru bar byed pa dang / /lto lci lto nad bad kan

can/ /mchil ma mang dang shin tu sbom/ /lto na srin yod rlung 'khyims dang / /dug dag 'thungs dang 'brum bus btab/ /rkang bam lkog ma'i wa ba can/ /de gnyis sbu gu gser sogs dang / /shing rus 'od ma las byas pa/ /ba lang mjug 'dra bug rdol med/ /'jam zhing drang la

kha zlum pa'o/ /lo gcig ma lon sor lnga pa/ /lo tshad lo bdun pa yi bar/ /tshad ni sor drug yin par bshad/ /lo bdun pa yi bdun nyid de/ /bcu gnyis pa la sor brgyad bya/ /bcu drug yan chad sor dgu ste/ /nyi shu yan chad sor bcu gnyis/ /lo gzhan dag la na tshod dang / /

stobs dang lus tshad brtags nas ni/ /tshad ni mngon pa bskyed par bya/ /rtsa ba rang gi mthe bong mnyam/ /rtse mo mthe'u chung tshad du bya/ /lo gcig lon sor nas bzung ste/ /de yis phyed phyed kyis bskyed bya/ /gang zhig rtsa ba'i bu ga'i tshad/ /sor mo gsum rtse shong ba mchog /mung+ga ma sha

sran ma btsos/ /rgya shug 'bras shong rim bzhin bya/ /rtsa ba'i bu ga'i tshad kyis ni/ /mthar ni bug pa 'gegs par bya/ /lce rtse rang gi sor gnyis kyis/ /chod par 'gag pa gnyis pa bya/ /der ni rkyal bu gdags bya ba/ /ra lug ma he la sogs pa'i/ /lgang pa legs mnyes sra

ba dang / /dmar btsos bu ga thag thug med/ /dri nga rtsa ris med srab par/ /sman ni legs par blugs byas la/ /srad bus dam par bcing bar bya/ /lgang med rkyal pa'i dpung pa'am/ /byin pa'i pags pa'am ras stug bzang / /ni ru ha tshad dang po ni/ /lo gcig pa la

srang gcig mchog /ji srid srang ni bcu gnyis par/ /lo re srang res bskyed par bya/ /bcu gnyis pa nas bcwa brgyad par/ /de yang bdun cu'i bar chad 'di/ /de phan tshad srang nyi shu nyid/ /bkru sman drag tshad ji lta ba/ /de yi bzhi cha 'jam rtsi tshad/ /bkru sman drag bya snum dugs bya/ /

sbyang byas nas kyang stobs thob pa/ /'jam rtsi gtang 'os par shes nas/ /thog ma nyid du 'jam rtsi gtang / /dgun dpyid nyin par gtang de las/ /gzhan du mtshan gtang la la 'dod/ /bsku byug khrus bya sngon thang las/ /bzhi gsum phan zhing yang ba dang / /snum dang rtsub ches ma yin

bza'/ /khu ba la sogs zos rjes btung / /bcags la bshang gci bsal nas ni/ /mal du bde bar gnas byas la/ /mtho dman med par mgo smad de/ /glo g.yon gyis ni phab nas su/ /rkang pa g.yas pa bkug nas ni/ /rkang pa g.yon pa brkyang bar bya/ /de nas de la gce'u kha dang / /gzhang

sgo snum gyis bskus nas ni/ /gce'u lgang pa'i dbugs bton la/ /kha bcings lag pa mi 'dar bar/ /rgyab kyi logs su 'dug nas ni/ /shin tu myur dang bul min dang / /ha cang shugs drag dal min par/ /ran par lan cig khong na btsir/ /rlung ni lhag par gnas pas na/ /

lhag ma cung zad lus par bya/ /btang nas lus ni gan rkyal bzhag /rkub tshos lag pas brdab par bya/ /rting pas mjug tsos brdung bya zhing / /rting pa bteg la lan gsum gsig /de nas lus ni brkyangs nas su/ /sngas dang bcas pa'i rting par ni/ /khu tshur gyis brdung lus

kyang ni/ /snum gyis bskus la mnye bar bya/ /tshor bas nyen pas snum dag ni/ /myur du phyir 'byung mi byed do/ /gal te myur du phyir byung na/ /phan mi byed pas gzhan dag gtang / /me drod che zhing snum byung na/ /dgongs ka kha zas yang ba sbyin/ /dbyung ba'i dus kyi dam pa ni/ /thun gsum

yin te de phan chad/ /nyin mtshan gcig ni bsdad nas su/ /de yi 'og tu reng bu yis/ /snum dbyung phyir ni 'bad bya ba'am/ /mas gtong ba ni rnon po bya/ /shin tu rtsub pas ma byung zhing / /snyom bag la sogs nad med na/ /btang snyoms su ni gzhag par bya/ /de nas mtshan 'das nang

par ni/ /bca' sga 'u su bskol chu 'am/ /yang na chu tshan 'ba' zhig btung / /'jam rtsi btang nas nyin gsum mam/ /nyin lnga lon nas slar gtang ba'am/ /ji srid snum ni 'jug gyur pa'am/ /yang na rlung ni shas che dang / /rtag tu rtsol byed me drod che/ /khong rtsub pa la nyin re gtang / /

de ltar snum ni gsum mam bzhi/ /snum gyur rtsa sgo sbyang ba'i phyir/ /mas gtong khrus kyis sbyang ba dang / /snum med lus ni snum gyur gtang / /nyi ma gsum mam nyin lnga na/ /tshes grangs bzang zhing dge ba la/ /nyin phyed cung zad yol ba'i tshe/ /gtor ma bkra shis cho ga bya/ /

snum bskus dugs bya bshang gci ni/ /bsal zhing shing tu bkres min la/ /skyes bu'i nad dmigs sman la sogs/ /'bad de shes par byas nas ni/ /sman pa de la mkhas pa ni/ /mar dang lhan cig mas gtong sbyar/ /sman gyi srang ni nyi shu dang / /bo son cha brgyad lhan cig

bskol/ /bskol ba de yi bzhi cha yis/ /sman mar rlung la rjes su sbyar/ /mkhris pa bde bar gnas drug cha/ /bad kan shas che brgyad cha gcig/ yang na kun la sman gyi ni/ /brgyad cha gcig gam ci nas kyang / /mas gtong ska slar mi 'gyur bya/ /bu ram dag ni srang gcig

tsam/ /rigs pas sbrang rtsi rgyam tsha sogs/ /lhag ma de kun snod cig blugs/ /bum par chu bskol rlangs pa yis/ /bsro zhing gzar bus dkrugs nas ni/ /rkyal pa'i nang blugs mjug mar ni/ /gtong tshe shin tu tsha grang min/ /shin tu snum min rtsub pa'ang min/ /shin tu rno min

'jam pa'ang min/ /shin tu ska min sla ba'ang min/ /shin tu mang nyung tshad med pa'ang / /tsha che skyur ba'ang de dang 'dra/ /de la mkhas pa gzhan smra ba/ /snum dang sbrang rtsi gnyis so sor/ /srang ni gsum gsum byas nas su/ /rgyam tsha dag ni zho gnyis dang / /nad med la btang sman srang gnyis/ /khu ba'i

sman ni lhag ma kun/ /srang bcu yongs su sbyar bar bya/ /sbrang rtsi rgyam tsha snum rnams dang / /sman phye khu ba'i rim pa ni/ /mas gtong rkyal bar bcug byas te/ /'di ni sbyor ba'i cho gar bshad/ /gan rkyal bzhag nas btang ma thag /sngas kyis brten te mas gtong la/ /yid ni gzhan

du ma yengs pas/ /'khru ba tsog pus gtang bar bya/ /'ong dus dam pa yud tsam ste/ /de las gzhan du 'chi byed yin/ /de la bcos pa'i thabs gyur snum/ /thal sman ba gcin khu skyur sbyar/ /myur bas snum la rno dro ba'i/ /mang gtong gzhan dag gtang bar bya/ /yang na sman gyi reng bu

dag /gtong zhing dugs la sogs pa bya/ /rang nyid 'ongs par gyur na ni/ /mas gtong gnyis pa gtang ba'am/ /lan gsum lan bzhi'i bar du ni/ /ji srid legs par gyur par gtang / /de yis sbyor sogs bkru sman dang / /'dra bar shes bya sbyor legs na/ /chu dron 'jam pos

bkrus nas ni/ /sha khu 'bras chan nyung zad sbyin/ /mas gtong drag pos nad rnams kyi/ /dri ma bskyod pas byung gyur pa/ /de ni chu dron gyis bkru dang / /kha zas tshul bzhin thos bas 'byung / /gal te rlung gis nyam thag na/ /slar yang 'phral du 'jam rtsi gtang / /de ni legs dang ma

legs dang / /grags pa snum 'thungs 'drar shes bya/ /gang zhig dus ni cung zad gnas/ /bshang dang bcas par 'byung 'gyur zhing / /thur du dbugs dang snum lhan cig /'byung 'gyur 'jam rtsi legs pa yin/ /bad kan la ni mas gtong ba'i/ /'jam rtsi gcig gam gsum

gtang bya/ /mkhris pa la ni lnga'am bdun/ /rlung la dgu'am bcu gcig gtang / /slar yang de la zung min pa/ /mas gtong rjes la bya ba yin/ /bad mkhris rlung la rim bzhin zas/ /yu sha 'o ma sha khu gtang / /rlung 'joms sman ni legs bskol ba/ /dur byid rgya mtshar bcas par

bya/ /snum mngar skyur sha khu dron sbyar/ /mas gtong gcig ni rlung la phan/ /n+ya gro d+ha sogs sde tshan bskol/ /shug sogs kar dkar dang bcas/ /mngar bsil bu ram shing khu mar/ /'o ma sbrang rtsir bcas mkhris sel/ /dong ga la sogs bskol ba dang / /dug mo nyung sogs bcas pa

gsum/ /rtsub dang sbrang rtsi ba gcin bcas/ /rno zhing dro kha bad kan sel/ /gsum po 'dus pa'i nad la yang / /gang phyir rim bzhin sel ba yin/ /gsum po de las gzhan pa yin/ /mas gtong gso zhes gzhan mi 'dod/ /gang phyir slar yang sbyin bya ba'i/ /nyes pa bzhi

po yod ma yin/ /nad bskyod dag par byed pa dang / /zhi bar bya ba'i rim pa yis/ /mas gtong gsum po nyid brtag ces/ /de skad gzhan dag smra ba yin/ /nad dang sman sogs stobs las ni/ /'di dag thams cad tshad mas gzhal/ /bskru sman drag btang legs mtshan ma/ /ma mthong

bar du 'phro mi bcad/ /dang por snum gcig tha mar lnga/ /bkru sman drag po bcu gnyis te/ /'jam rtsir bcas ba mas gtong ba'i/ /las ni sum cur bshad pa yin/ /dus ni bco lnga 'dir gcig ni/ /thog ma'i snum ste tha mar gsum/ /dugs dang mas gtong lnga par bshad/ /mas

gtong sbyor 'dir brgyad yin te/ /ni ru ha dang snum gsum dang / /thog ma tha ma gnyis ka'o/ /'jam rtsi'am bkru sman mas gtong drag /gcig pu lhag par bsten mi bya/ /'jam rtsis nad slongs me drod 'joms/ /ni ru has rlung skyed 'jigs yod/ /de bas snum rjes bkrus drags gtang / /khrus drag

btang nas 'jam rtsi bya/ /de ltar rim pas snum sbyang bya/ /mas gtong las ni nyes gsum sel/ /snum gyi tshad ni chung ngu yi/ /tshad dang de ni mnyam byas pa'i/ /snum tshad 'jam rtsi'i tshad du bshad/ /de ni byis rgan lam dang khur/ /bud med rtsol zhen pas du ba dang / /rlung nad kyis gzhom me

drod chung / /rgyal po phyug po la bde ba/ /yin pas rtag tu bsten par bya/ /nad 'joms yang ba med pa dang / /stobs skyed bshang ba bde bar 'byung / /mas gtong bud med ro smad kyi/ /mngal dang mo mtshan nad rnams la/ /bkrus drags gnyis gsum gyis dag par/ /mas gtong

gong mas gtang bar bya/ /de yi gce'u nad pa yi/ /sor tshad bcu gnyis tshad du bya/ /zlum zhing ba lang mjug ma 'dra/ /rtsa ba dbus su gag pa gdags/ /rtse mo yungs kar shong ba tsam/ /'jam pa gser la sogs las byas/ /kun+da sri zhing so man/ /me tog rtse mo ltar zlum phra/ /de yi rkyal bu 'jam

zhing yang / /tshad srang phyed dam gang rigs bya/ /de nas khrus byas zas zos la/ /'jam rtsi gtong ba'i cho ga bya/ /khri stegs bus mnyam 'jam pa la/ /drang zhing bde bar 'dug nas ni/ /pho mtshan bteg cing drang bar bya/ /sbubs sbyang phyir ni thur ma ni/ /'jam pa rim gyis gzhug

par bya/ /de dag pho mtshan dang 'tsham pa/ /'bras bu'i mthar thug bar gtang ba/ /mi 'dar 'jam rtsi btang ltar bya/ /btsir te btang la snum rjes bya/ /'jam rtsi'i rim pa bzhin du bya/ /mas gtong cho ga 'di yis ni/ /gsum mam bzhi yi bar du gtang / /lhag ma 'jam rtsi ji lta bar/ /'di la

thams cad sbyar bar bya/ /bud med zla mtshan dus su ni/ /mngal bye ba las chags par 'gyur/ /de phyir de tshe gtang bya la/ /rab na dus min par yang gtang / /mo mtshan nyams dang gzer ba dang / /mngal khrag rtag tu 'byung gtong ba/ /gce bu sor bcu rtse mo yi/ /bu ga mung+ga shong sor bzhi/ /mngal

gyi gnas su gtang bar bya/ /sor gnyis gcin 'bab lam du btang / /gcin 'gags pa yi nad rnams la/ /bu mo rnams la sor gcig gtang / /'bring tshad srang ni gcig pa ste/ /bu mo rnams la srang phyed nyid/ /mal du gan rkyal 'dug nas ni/ /brla ni legs par bskums nas su/ /

pus mo bstod de nyin zhag ni/ /gcig la lan gsum lan bzhi gtang / /de ltar mas gtong zhag gsum la/ /snum gyi tshad ni bskyed par bya/ /de nas zhag gsum ngal bso nas/ /slar yang zhag gsum gtang bar bya/ /skyug sman byas zla phyed bkru sman/ /de nas zla phyed nas bkrus

drags/ /bkrus drags 'phral la 'jam rtsi gtang / /khrus btang zhag bdun nas 'jam rtsi/ /dper na leb rgan sogs btsos pa'i/ /gos ni chu las tshos len ltar/ /de bzhin bangs par byas lus la/ /mas gtong bas ni nang rnams 'byin/ /lus kyi yan lag nang khrol dag tu song nad

dang / /gnad dang lus stod yan lag kun khyab nad/ /gang zhig yod pa de las skye ba'i rgyu/ /rlung ma gtogs pa gzhan dag yod ma yin/ /bshang dang bad kan mkhris sogs nad sogs pa/ /gang phyir 'thor zhing sdud par byed pa yin/ /de ni rab 'phel gyur la zhi ba'i phyir/ /'jam

rtsi ma gtogs sman gzhan gang yang med/ /de bas gso ba ma lus las ma btang / /gso ba'i phyed yin zhes ni la la 'dod/ /de bzhin nad rnying glo bur skyed byed la/ /gtar ga khrag dbyung sman nyid 'gyur ba yin/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ mdo'i gnas kyi le'u

bcu dgu pa'o// //de nas sman sna nas gtong ba'i cho ga'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /nam tshong yan chad nad rnams la/ /ltag par sna nas btang ba phan/ /sna ni klad pa'i sgo yin te/ /des na de nas nad de 'joms/ /bkru sman klad pa'i nad rnams dang / /glong bag lkog nad

mchi ma 'dzag /skrang dang thor bu srin rmen bu/ /mdze snyom cham pas btab la gtang / /brta ba rlung las byung gzer dang / /glad pa phyed nas skad 'gags dang / /sna dang kha skom tshig mi thon/ /mig dbye dka' dpung bskyod dka' gtang / /zhi ba mig sngon gdong pags nad/ /skra yi

skyon mig dmar la gtang / /dang po rang sbyor ji lta'i snum/ /sman gyi lde gu sogs bskol dang / /shing mngar rgyam tsha chang rnying sogs/ /ci rigs pa ni bskol ba gtang / /brta ba 'u su'i khu ba dang / /sha khu khrag dang thang chu'ang sbyar/ /zhi ba snga ma 'o ma dang / /chu dang bcas par sbyar bar bya/ /

tshad chen dang ni tshang phran te/ /'di yi snum tshad rnam pa gnyis/ /lde gu la sogs btsir ba yi/ /rno de spyi bo'i bkru sman yin/ /phye ma bud pa'i bkru sman te/ /sbu gu sor drug kha gnyis pa/ /nang na sman dang bcas pa dag /kha yi dbugs kyis bus te gtang / /des ni mgo nad mang po yang /

phye ma yin pas 'byen par byed/ /mdzub mo'i tshigs ni gnyis ba'i bar/ /smyugs pa'i phyir byung gyur pa las/ /thigs pa bcu'am brgyad dam drug /ji srid 'dzags par gyur pa dag /sna nas gtong tshad che 'bring chung / /rim pa de nyid kyis shes bya/ /lde gu la sogs thigs pa ni/ /

gnyis kyis phri ste gtang bar bya/ /chu dang chang dang sbyar dug mar/ /'thungs pa'am 'thung bar 'dod pa dag /kha zas zos dang mgo bkrus dang / /'khru bar 'dod dang gtar ga byas/ /cham pa shugs 'ongs kyis gzir dang / /bu btsas lud pa dbugs mi bde/ /sbyang byas mas gtong cho ga byas/ /de bzhin

dus min yul rmugs la/ /sna sman gtang bar mi bya ste/ /tshabs chen nad dang sogs ma gtogs so/ /de nas sna nas sman gtang ba/ /bad kan nang par mkhris nyin phyed/ /rlung can phyi 'bred mtshan mo gtang / /nad med pa la ston ka dang / /dpyid kyi tshe na snga dro gtang / /dgun ni phyed dus so

ga'i tshe/ /phyi 'bred dbyar ni nyi dron bcas/ /glad pa rlung nad kyis thebs dang / /skyigs bus btab dang mgo 'dar dang / /gnye'u rengs skad ni 'gags pa la/ /nyin re nang par dgongs ka gtang / /gzhan la nyin res bar bcad la/ /nyi ma bdun du de spyad bya/ /rtag tu bya ba'i las byas nas/ /dang por mgo snum

bsku dugs byas/ /rlung med mal du gnas nas ni/ /nam tshong yan chad dugs kyang bya/ /de nas gan rkyal lus drang brkyang / /rkang pa lag pa legs brkyangs la/ /rkang pa cung zad bstod nas su/ /mgo bo yid tsam smad par bya/ /sna khung gcig ni rab bkag la/ /rim gyis yongs su blugs bya ba/ /sman

ni chu dron gyis bsros la/ /sbu gu'am ras bal gyis blugs bya/ /blugs nas rkang mthil phrag pa dang / /lag pa rna ba la sogs mnye/ /rim gyis brngubs la glo gnyis su/ /mchil ma dor ba de nas ni/ /sman ni zad par 'gyur gyi bar/ /lan gnyis lan gsum snar btang spyad/ /gal te brgyal gyur

bsil ba'i chus/ /mgo ma gtogs par gtor bar bya/ /bkru sman 'og tu snum dag ni/ /nad sogs tshul las dpags te gtang / /sna sman btang mthar gan rkyal du/ /grangs brgyar de las bsdad par bya/ /dud pa brdubs la chu dron 'jam/ /gre ba mtshul pa dag phyir bya/ /snum btang legs gyur

dbugs bder rgyu/ /gnyid log sad bde dbang po gsal/ /nyes pas mgo rtsub mi 'gyur skam/ /sna dang kha skams klad stong snyam/ /snum drags g.yan dang lci ba nyid/ /mchil mang cham 'debs yi ga 'chus/ /legs bkrus mig gsal yang ba dang / /kha dang skad ni dag par 'gyur/ /bkrus

nyen nad ni 'phel bar 'gyur/ /bkrus drags khong ni rmya bar 'gyur/ /tshad phran glo rdol rid pa dang / /byis pa rgan po skyid par gnas/ /dus min char 'bab par yang gtang / /de ni cham pas drag btab dang / /chang 'thungs rna ba 'on pa dang / /klad rgyas srin bu zhugs pa dang / /nad bsdus phyir ni ma phyung

la/ /tshad phra ba ni gtang mi bya/ /nyin mtshan zas zos slon gnyid nyal/ /mtha' dang bud med lam ngal dub/ /mgo bskus mkhur bkang dbo ba'i rjes/ /bshang gci mig sman btang rjes dang / /so shing gi rjes dgod pa yin/ /rjes la thigs pa gnyis pa gtang / /lnga yis dbang po'i bu ga dag /

gsum gyis rim bzhin ngal ba sel/ /lnga yis mig ni gsal bar byed/ /so brtan rlung nad zhi bar 'gyur/ /sna sman lo bdun ma lon dang / /brgyad cu 'das la gtang mi bya/ /bcwa brgyad ma lon dud mi bdug /mkhur bkang lnga ma lon la min/ /lo bcu ma lon sbyang mi gtang / /bdun cu 'das la'ang

mi bya'o/ /skyes nas rgas pa'i bar du ni/ /tshad phran mas gtong lta bur bsngags/ /de ni rtag tu bsten gyur/ /tshad che ba ltar yon tan skyed/ /'di la bdam pa gang yang med/ /gnod las tshad chen ltar 'jigs med/ /sna sman don du til mar nyid/ /rtag tu bsten pa bsngags pa yin/ /mgo ni bad

kan gnas yin phyir/ /snum gzhan bde gnas la mi bsngags/ /myur byed ring zhig byed pa dang / yon tan che dang chung byed pa'i/ /khyad par tshad chen tshad phran la/ /gal te med par gyur na ni/ /gang zhig spang byas gnod byas pa'i/ /tshad chen ngag ni su zhig ston/ /snum dngas btung ba rtag bshad

du/ /spyil bu rlung dang tshad par gnas/ /'jam rtsi tshad chen mas gtong tshad/ /de dang 'dra bar rnam par bstan/ /dza la sgron shing dzi ban+ti/ /gla sgang shing tsha pu shel tse/ /go bi tsan+dan skyer pa'i rtsa/ /shing mngar gla ba a ka ru/ /nye'u shing bil ba puN+Da rI/ /ut+pal mur ba par+Ni gnyis/ /bri ha ti gnyis

byi dang ga /gan+d+ha b+ha dra sug smel dang / /ha re Nu ka pad+ma yi/ /ge sar dang ni ba la ste/ /sman ni 'di rnams cha mnyam la/ /char pa'i chus ni bskol bar bya/ /til mar las ni sman gyi khu/ /bcu 'gyur lhag byas de la ni/ /til mar chu dang bskol ba bya/ /lan bcu nyid ni bskol nas ni/ /tshos pa yi ni bcu cha

la/ /de mnyam ra yi 'o ma blugs/ /snar btang til mar yon tan che/ /thigs phran zhes bya 'di bsten bya/ /sna nas btang ba'i sman bsten pas/ /phrag pa mgrin pa dpung mgo ni/ /mkhregs shing mthol pa gas mdog gsal/ /dbang brtan skra dkar med par 'gyur/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po

bsdus pa las/ mdo'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu pa'o// //de nas sman gyi dud pa gtang ba'i cho ga'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /nam tshong yan chad bang rlung las/ /byung ba'i nad rnams mi skye dang / /skyes pa rnams ni bsal ba'i phyir/ /mkhas pas rtag tu dud pa brngub/ /de ni 'jam dang bar ma

rno/ /rlung dang bad rlung bad kan la/ /gtang ngo mkhris khrag gis nyen dang / /bkrus dang dmu rdzing za khu dang / /rab rib sbos dang stod rlung nad/ /lkog nad mas gtong byas pa dang / /nya dang chang dang 'o ma zho/ /sbrang rtsi mar dang dug 'thungs sogs/ /mgo nad skya rbab nad can ni/ /mtshan gnyid ma

log la mi gtang / /gal te dud pa cher brngubs na/ /khrag dang mkhris 'phel 'on dang long / /skom dang brgyal dang rmongs par byed/ /der ni bsil ba'i cho ga phan/ /bkres sbrid glal dang bshang gci bsal/ /bud med bsten dang gtar ga btab/ /dgod dang so shing bcas pa yi/ /mthar ni

dud pa 'jam po gtang / /dus 'di dag nas mtshan zas zos/ /sna sman rjes la bar ma brngub/ /gnyid log sna sman mig sman khrus/ /slon pa'i rjes la rnon pos bkru/ /mas gtong gce'u 'drar byas pa yi/ /dud gce'u sbubs gsum drang por bya/ /rtsa ba mtheb shong rtse mo ni/ /rgya shug shong ba'i

tshad du bya/ /de yi tshad ni rngub byed pa'i/ /sor ni nyi shu sum cu gnyis/ /bzhi bcu rno dang bar ma dang / /'jam po la ni rim bzhin bya/ /drang por 'dug cing de la sems/ /kha gdangs nas ni lan gsum brngub/ /sna khung re re bkag nas ni/ /snar ni dud pa brngub par bya/ /mgo dang snar gtogs nad

bskyod pa/ /dang por sna nas brngub par bya/ /bskyod pa'i don du kho nas brngub/ /gre bar gtogs pa de las bzlog/ /du ba kha gnyis nad slon gyi/ /snar slon mig la gnod par byed/ /du ba rngub dang 'byin pa yis/ /lan ni gsum gsum brngub par bya/ /'jam po nyin gcig lan gcig gtang / /bar ma lan gnyis

sbyor ba ni/ /lan gsum lan bzhi gtang bar bya/ /der sman gu gul a ka ru/ /gla sgang rdo dreg s+tho ni ya/ /spang spos ur shi ba la ka /shing tsha kon ti shing mngar dang / /bil rkang e la ba lu ka /pog dkar shri be ta ka dang / /gla ba sbra tshil bya ma ka /pog nag gur gum ma sha dang / /kun tu ru dang nas dang til/ /snum bcas

'bras bu snying po dang / /tshil dang rkang dang zhag dang mar/ /zhi ba pog nag rgya skyegs dang / /rgun 'brum pad+ma ut+pal/ /n+ya gro d+ha dang a shwad tha/ /u dum+bA ra blag sha dang / /seng phrom shun pa kha ra dang / /shing mngar klu shing shug pa btsod/ /dri las rgya spos ru rta bskol/ /rnon po dzo ti sma ti dang / /skyer pa dang ni rtsa ba bcu/ /

ldong ros ba bla rgya skyegs dang / /gi ri gar kar 'bras bu gsum/ /dri yi sman la ro rno ba'i/ /mgo bo'i bkru sman sde tshan no/ /de dag zhag gcig nur spangs la/ /dud pa'i sman rnams btags nas ni/ /thur ma sor ni bcu gnyis la/ /lan lnga'i bar du byug par bya/ /gdar bu mthe bong tsam sbom la/ /nas kyi

dbyibs dang 'dra bar bya/ /grib mar skam zhing khong stong med/ /snum gyis ji bzhin bskus byas la/ /brngub phyir me yis bsregs nas ni/ /dud pa'i gce'u sbyar bar bya/ /kham phor kha sbyar bu gar ni/ /gce'u sor bcu'am sor brgyad pa/ /bcug pa kha nas dud pa ni/ /lud pa can gyis brngub par bya/ /

dud pa brngubs la lud pa dbugs mi bde/ /skad 'gags rnag dang dri mi zhim gdong skya/ /skra skyon rna mig 'dzag g.ya' rmongs bag dang / /snyom dang skyigs bu cham pa'i nad mi 'byung / /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ mdo'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// //de nas

sman gyi khu bas mkhur ba dgang ba la sogs pa'i cho ga'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /mkhur bkang rnam pa bzhi yin te/ /snum dang zhi byed sbyong rma 'tshob/ /de las gsum ni rlung la sogs/ /gsum gtang tha ma rma la phan/ /'dir sman mngar skyur lan tshwa dang / /tsha dang snum ni bskol ba yin/ /zhi byed

kha bska mngar sman bskol/ /sbyong ba kha dang tsha dang skyur/ /rma 'tshob byed pa kha ba dang / /bska ba'i sman ni bskol bar bya/ /de la snum dang 'o ma dang / /sbrang rtsi chu dang tsha dang chang / /ba gcin 'bru yi khu ba rnams/ /sman ni ji lta ji lta dang / /lde gur bcas pa bskol ba ni/ /ji tsam bzod pa rnam par

sbyar/ /so brtse so ni 'gul ba dang / /rlung las gyur pa'i kha nad la/ /dro 'jam tsam mam bsil ba yi/ /til chus mkhur ba bkang ba phan/ /rtag tu mkhur ba bkang ste gzhag /til mar dag gam sha khu bsngags/ /kha drod che tsha tshos pa dang / /'phral du rma ni byung ba dang / /dug

dang thal sman mes tshig la/ /zhun mar dag gom 'o mas dgang / /sbrang rtsi mkhur bkang byas pas ni/ /kha yi dri ma sbyong byed cing / /kha yi rma ni 'tshob byed yin/ /kha tsha skom dad rab zhi byed/ /ro mi tshor dang dri ma che/ /kha mnam 'bras rtsabs bkang bas sel/ /

de nyid cung zad tsha bcas bsil/ /kha skams sel ba'i dam pa yin/ /thal sman rnon khus mkhur bkang bas/ /bad kan sogs pa myur du sel/ /chu tshan dro 'jam mkhur bkang bas/ /kha ni yang zhing bde bar byed/ /rlung med nyi tshan bcas par ni/ /phrag pa mjing bar dugs

bya mnye/ /mkhur ba bkang nas gdong pa ni/ /cung zad bteg ste ji srid na/ /bad kan gyis ni kha gang ba'ang / /sna mig 'dzag pa'i bar du gzhag /kha bkang mi spo bzhag mkhur bkang / /gzhan du khar brngub par 'gyur ro/ /khar brngubs pa yis khyad par gso ba ni/ /gnye'u

rengs mgo mig rna nad kha nag dang / /mchil mang gre nad snying ga sra ba dang / /snying 'phar snyam dang cham pa yi ga 'chus/ /mkhur bkang bshad pa'i sman rnams kyi/ /lde gu sman khu phye ma ste/ /kha mur bya ba rnam gsum yin/ /de ni bad kan nad la gtang / /

gdong bskus gsum ste nad sel dang / /dug sel kha dog bzang byed pa'o/ /de drod bad kan rlung la bsngags/ /lhag ma la ni rab bsil ba/ /de yi tshad dpangs sor bzhi cha/ /sum cha phyed de rnam pa gsum/ /ma bskams bar du de bzhag gi/ /bskams na pags

pa la gnod 'gyur/ /de nas spangs nas bkru bar bya/ /de yi rjes la bsku byug bya/ /nyin par gnyid log mang smra khro/ /me tshan nyi tshan mya ngan spang / /de ni cham pa sna sman gtang / /ma zhu 'gram 'thams yi ga 'chus/ /mtshan gnyid ma log la mi gtang / /de ni legs par

spyod pa yis/ /dus min skra dkar ngo khabs dang / /gnyer ma rab rib mig sngo sel/ /rgya shug snying po ba sha'i rtsa/ /seng phrom yungs kar dkar po rnams/ /sing hi'i rtsa ba til nag dang / /skyer ba'i shun pa rme'u rnams/ /'jag rtsa tsan+dan ur shir/ /shiR+sha sha ta pus pa 'bras/ /ku mud ut+pal

ka la ha/ /dUr ba shing mngar tsan+dan rnams/ /ka li ya ka ur shi ti/ /spang spos rgya spos shug pa rnams/ /da lis kun dra puN+Da rI/ /shing mngar rgya spos a ru ra/ /de ltar tshigs bcad phyed kyis bshad/ /bsku ba dgun stod sogs drug sbyar/ /gdong bsku ba la goms pa rnams/ /mthong ba brtan

par 'gyur ba dang / /gdong ni yongs su mi rnying la/ /'jam zhing pad+ma 'dra bar 'gyur/ /bsku dang blugs dang ras bal can/ /pags pas g.yogs dang rnam pa bzhi/ /de ni spyi bo'i til mar te/ /phyi bzhin du ni yon tan che/ /de la byugs pa rtsub pa dang / /g.ya' dang dri ma can la sbyar/ /rlugs pa glog

pa glad gzer dang / /cha dang rma smin rnags la gtang / /ras bal snum can skra 'byi dang / /gza' zhugs mig ni rengs la gtang / /bags bcibs mgo bo tshor ba med/ /kha yo gnyid ni yar ba dang / /kha dang sna skam rab rib dang / /mi bzad mgo nad dag la sbyar/ /de yi cho ga 'dug pa la/ /khri'u pus mnyam 'jam

pa la/ /lus bkrus bsku zhing dugs byas la/ /dgongs ka ba'am ma he yi/ /pags pa mgo bo dang mnyam la/ /rgyar ni sor ni bcu gnyis pa/ /rna ba'i mthar thug bar bcings pa/ /'phral ba gos kyis dkris pa ni/ /gos sam lan bus bcings byas la/ /ma sha'i lde gus bsku bar bya/ /de nas nad dmigs ci

'dra la/ /snum bskol ba ni dro 'jam tsam/ /de ni spyi bo man chad nas/ /skra drung sor gcig nub tsam blugs/ /kha dang snam tshul phyin par gzhag /de ni rlung sogs nad rnams la/ /stong phrag bcu dang brgyad drug gzhag /nad mad sa la stong phrag gcig /mar gsar phrag pa la sogs mnye/ /de ltar zhag

bdun blugs par bya/ /rna ba gang bar blugs te gzhag /rna ba'i rtsa la mnye bar bya/ /nad rtse zhil gyi bar bya zhing / /rna ba se gol brgya par gzhag /pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga ni/ /lag rtses bskor ba'i bar dang ni/ /mig 'byed 'jums dang mnyam pa yi/ /yun ni grangs kyi tshad du bshad/ /spyi bo'i

til mar sbyar ba bskus pas ni/ /skra dkar dmar ser skra 'byi gza' zhugs dang / /mgo bo'i rlung nad sel zhing dpang po gsal/ /skad gdangs 'gram pa mgo yi stobs skyed byed/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /mdo'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// //

de nas sman gyi thigs pa mig tu blugs pa dang sman gyis mig bsku ba'i cho ga'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /mig nad dag ni thams cad la/ /dang por sman thigs blugs pas ni/ /zug na g.ya' drud mchi ma 'dzag /mig tsha mig dmar rnams la phan/ /rlung

la dron po bad dro 'jam/ /khrag mkhris la ni de bsil bsngags/ /rlung med gnas su 'dug nas ni/ /lag pa g.yon pas mig phye la/ /nya phyis nang sbyar ras bal ni/ /bsnyad pa'i thigs ba blugs bya ba/ /sor gnyis tsam spangs las mig grwa/ /thigs pa bcu'am bcu

gnyis blugs/ /de nas gos 'jam dag gis phyi/ /rlung dang bad kan can dag la/ /gos 'jam gzhan ni chu dron la/ /sbangs pas dugs ni 'jam po bya/ /mig sman blugs pa rab tsha rnos/ /na zhing mig dmar rtul bar 'gyur/ /shin tu grang bas zug pa dang / /

'dzums mi shes dang na bar 'gyur/ /drags pas mig mchu dmar dang drud/ /rtsub cing mig ni 'byed dkar 'gyur/ /shin tu chung bas nad dkyel skyed/ /ma pho bas ni thu bar byed/ /bskus legs nad rtsa sna sul dang / /kha yi sbubs su sman gyis khyab/ /spyi bor gtogs

pa'i nad kyi ni/ /dri ma dpyis ni 'byin par byed/ /de nas lus sbyangs mig sman bsku/ /mig tsam la ni gnas gyur pa/ /cung zad skrangs dang shin tu g.ya'/ /rdu ma chags pas smin shes shing / /cung zad drud dmar mchi ma 'dzag /mig rdu stug la gtang bar bya/ /

bad kan dang ni khrag mkhris dang / /mchog tu rlung gis gzir la bsku/ /mig sman phyi dang rmag so dang / /gsal bar mthong ste rnam pa gsum/ /de la phyi ba'i mig sman ni/ /bska dang skyur dang tsha dang kha/ /rma gso sman ni kha ba ste/ /gsal sman mngar dang bsil ba yin/ /

thur ma sor bcu dbus phra la/ /rtse mo sri zhing kha 'bus 'dra/ /phyi ba'i thur ma zangs kyi bsngags/ /rma gso lcags nag byas sor tsam/ /bzang po gsal bar byed pa ni/ /gser dang dngul las byas pa bsngags/ /gdar bu khu ba phye mas te/ /mig sman rnam gsum nyid du

brtag /de ni mig nad lci 'bring dang / /yang ba la ni rim bzhin sbyar/ /mtshan mo nyal dang nyi ma'i gung / /zos 'thungs nyi ma tsha ba yis/ /mig gi nad ni 'phel ba dang / /dkyel ni skye dang 'khrugs par 'gyur/ /de bas de zhi phyir na dgongs/ /nyi ma sprin bral dus su bslu/ /

gzhan dag smra ba nyin par ni/ /mig sman rnon po gtang mi bya/ /bkrus pas nyam chung gyur pa'i mig /nyi ma bltas na gnod par 'gyur/ /mtshan mo gnyid ni log pa dang / /zla dus yin pas rtas 'gyur te/ /mig ni me yi rang bzhin pas/ /bsil bas gnad med bsten

par 'gyur/ /mig nad bad kan shas che ba'am/ /phyi zhing gsal bar bya ba las/ /rab cha min pa'i nyin par yang / /mig sman rnon po blugs par 'dod/ /lcags ni rdo las 'byung ba yin/ /rno ba de nyid las byung yang / /de nyid kyis ni gnod byed nus/ /mig gi rang

bzhin de dang 'dra/ /dgun tshe mtshan mo mig sman ni/ /rnon po phan pa ma yin te/ /'dzag mi 'gyur bas mig rengs dang / /g.ya' dang mi gsal la sogs skyed/ /mig sman mi gtang 'jigs dang slon/ /khrus btang zan zos shugs kyis nyen/ /khros dang rims btab mig phyir byung / /blang

nad mya ngan gnyid ma log /nyi ma ma mthong mgo bkrus dang / /chang 'thungs dud pa brngubs pa dang / /kha zas ma zhu nyi tshan gdungs/ /nyin nyal skom pa la mi gtang / /mig sman rab rno 'jam dang nyung / /mang sla ska dang rtsub pa dang / /shin tu bsil dang tsha ba yi/ /mig sman bsku bar mi

bya'o/ /des na mig ni ma phye bar/ /dal gyis nang du khyab par bya/ /mig sman bskus nas mig mchu ni/ /cung zad bskyod la mig sman ni/ /rnon pos myur du khyab par 'gyur/ /dbye dang 'dzums par mi bya'o/ /mig mchu gnyis ni bsdam pa dang / /bkru ba dag ni mi bya'o/ /

gang tshe mig sman gyis bskus pa'i/ /sman gyi rtsom pa zhi gyur na/ /nad kyi dmigs dang mthun pa yi/ /chu yis de tshe bkru bar bya/ /de nas gos 'jam bcas pa yi/ /mthe bong dang ni mdzub mo gnyis/ /mig ni ci ran phye ste phyi/ /g.yon pas g.yas pa phyi bar bya/ /

gzhan du mig sman blugs pa yis/ /mig mchu khyab pas nad skyed 'gyur/ /sman gyis g.ya' ba'am rtul gyur na/ /rnon po'i dud brngub par bya/ /mig sman rnon pos tsha gyur na/ /slar 'chos mig sman bsil byed gzhug /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus

pa las/ mdo'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o// //de nas mig brta ba'i cho ga dang / mig sman gyi phur ma bsregs shing btsos pa'i khu ba mig tu blugs pa'i cho ga'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /mig 'dzums mi shes rengs bag dang / /skam dang rtsub dang snad pa

dang / /rlung mkhris nad gyur zhum bag dang / /rdzi ma byi zhing g.yogs par mthong / /dbye dka' rtsa ni brtse ba dang / /mig ni rtsa 'gyur mi mthong dang / /dmar zhing mchi 'dzag klad phyed na/ /rlung nad kun 'gro ling tog can/ /mig nad brtse zhing mchi ma 'dzag /na zhing

dmar la mig rdu chags/ /thun mong dus su nang par ram/ /dgongs ka gan rkyal nyal nas ni/ /lus dang mgo sbyang rlung med pa'i/ /gnas su brta ba'i sman gtang ngo / /nas sam ma sha'i rjen zan gyis/ /mig sbubs mtha' bskor mnyam pa ni/ /dpangs su sor gnyis

rten byas la/ /nad dmigs ji bzhin sman bskol la/ /zhun mar chu tshan la bsros te/ /mig ni btsums par blugs par bya/ /mtshan mo mi mthong rlung rab rig /dbye dka' stsogs la tshil zhun blugs/ /rdzi ma'i rtse nub bar bkang la/ /de nas bskyod cing dbye ba ni/ /de

ni dal gyis byed du gzhug /tshad bgrang bya ba de la ni/ /mig mchu mig 'gram dkar nag nad/ /grangs brgya sum brgya lnga brgya dang / /brgya phrag bdun dang brgyad rim bzhin/ /dkrugs dang rlung la grangs stong ste/ /mkhris pa nad med la drug brgya/ /bad kan la ni lnga

brgya gzhag /de nas mig 'gram 'dzag sgo bya/ /sman mar snod du gzags byas la/ /dud pa brngubs nas nam mkha' dang / /gzugs 'tsher ba ni blta mi bya/ /de ltar rlung la nyin re bya/ /mkhris pa nyin re'i bar du gcod/ /bad kan bder gnas gnyis par bcad/ /tshim

par 'gyur gyi bar du gtang / /tshim pas gsal bar mthong nus shing / /bde zhing mig yang dri ma med/ /ma tshim pa las go bzlog yin/ /tshim drags bad kan nad skyed 'gyur/ /de ni lus kyis snum 'thungs ltar/ /mi gsal mthong ba nyam chung 'gyur/ /de bas lta ba'i rjes la ni/ /mthong ba'i stobs ni skyed

byed la/ /sngar bshad pa yi mig nad la/ /phur ma btsos pa sbyar bar bya/ /de ni rlung las snum can te/ /bad kan bcas te phyi ba ban/ /mthong nyams rlung dang mkhris bcas dang / /khrag mkhris bde gnas la gsal byed/ khung nas mthus tshol rlan can gyi/ /tshil dang

rkang dang zhag sha rlon/ /'o ma dag dang btags pa dang / /'tsho byed dag dang sbyar ba'i snum/ /ri dwags bya yi mcher pa sha//mu tig lcags zangs rgyam tsha dung / /rgya mtsho'i lbu ba lig bu mig /ba bla zhog chur sbyar bya/ /ri dwags bya yi mcher pa rkang / /lto tshil rgyu ma snying

dang sha/ /mngar bag mar bcas nu zhor bcas/ /btags pa gsal bar byed pa yin/ /sha dang sman gyi lde gu ni/ /gong bu srang gcig so sor byas/ /e raN n+ya gro pad+ma yi/ /lo ma snum pos rim bzhin du/ /dkris la 'byin pas byugs nas ni/ /da ba dgon pa'i lci

ba'i me/ /'bar bar yongs su bsreg par bya/ /tshos nas de yi khu ba btsir/ /mig tu brta ba'i sman ltar blugs/ /phyi dang snum dang bsal ba la/ /brgya phrag gcig gnyis gsum car bzhag /dang por dro 'jam phyi bsil blugs/ /de nyid rjes la dud pa brngub/ /des ni

sbyor ba brta dang mtshungs/ /brta dang phur btsos thigs pa blugs/ /sna sman mi bya la mi gtang / /ji srid dus ni sman gtong ba/ /de yi nyis 'gyur 'phrod pa bza'/ /me tog dzA ti ma li kas/ /mig bcings mtshan mo gnas par bya/ /sna sman mig sman brta ba la sogs

pas/ /mig mthu bskyed phyir kun tu 'bad par bya/ /mthong ba nyams na 'gro ba sna tshogs pa'ang / /mun pa'i rang bzhin tshul gcig nyid du 'gyur/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ mdo'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o// //de nas cha spyad kyi cho ga'i le'u

bshad par bya'o/ /zug rngu rnam pa sna tshogs dang / /lus ni sna tshogs gnod byed pa/ /'byin ba'i thabs su gang gyur pa/ /spyad yin de bzhin gzhang 'brum dang / /mtshan par rdo la sogs brta ba dang / /gtsags bu thal sman me btab pa'i/ /yan lag

lhag ma bsrung phyir dang / /mas gtong la sogs spyad ma gtogs/ /bum pa ku ba rA dang ni/ /'dzam bu'i mchu la sogs spyad yin/ /gang phyir cha spyad cho ga bzhin/ /sna tshogs tshul du brdung bya ba/ /blo yis rnam dpyad bya ba ni/ /rags rim tsam zhig bstan pa yin/ /seng

ge kang+ka dom bya rog /ri dgas bya sogs kha 'dra ba'i/ /mchu can cha spyad byas nas ni/ /de yi ming yang gdags par bya/ /phal cher lcags kyi rgyu las ni/ /srid du sor ni bco brgyad pa/ /skam pa 'brel pa'i mtshams su ni/ /sran chung lta bu'i gzer gdab pa/ /rtsa ba

lcags kyu ltar gug pa'i/ /cha spyad bde legs yin zhes bya/ /rtse mo g.yung drung lta bu'o/ /de ni brtan par rus zug pa'i/ /zug rngu 'byin la sbyar bar bya/ /gzer btab rtse mo gyes pa dang / /skam pa yin te sor bcu drug /de ni pags pa rtsa rgyus shar/ /zhen pa'i zug

rngu 'byin la sbyar/ /skam pa sor drug zug rngu phra/ /rdzi ma ma rungs 'byin la sbyar/ /so phra drang zhing rtsa ba ni/ /gdu bus brgyan pa mu tsa ti/ /des rma gting du zug pa dang / /mig mdzer gting du lus la sbyar/ /nya mgo 'dra bar sor bcu gnyis/ /cha spyad gnyis pa gcig pa bya/ /

nya mgo lta bu zhes bshad de/ /rna khung zug rngu 'byin la sbyar/ /cha spyad sbu gu can khong stong / /rtse mo gcig gam mang po bya/ /des ni bu ga'i zug rngu dang / /nad yod blta dang dbyung ba dang / /bya ba sla bar bya phyir dang / /dgang bar bya ba'i don du bya/ /de yi zheng dang sbom srid tshad/ /

bu ga'i tshad las dpag par bya/ /srid du sor bcu sbom sor lnga/ /gre ba'i zug rngu rtog byed yin/ /rtse mo lnga pa bu ga can/ /rtse mo bzhi la spyi mdud bya/ /cha spyad thur ma gnyis pa ni/ /bu ga gsum pa de'i tshad bya/ /cha spyad bya ba rang gi dbyibs/ /sbom dang chu yi tshad

mnyam pa'i/ /sbu gu de 'dra gzhan dag kyang / /cha spyad shes par byed du gzhug /rtse mo pad+ma'i snying po 'dra/ /srid du sor ni bcu gnyis pa/ /bzhi cha khong stong byas sbu gu/ /zug rngu 'byin pa yin par bshad/ /gzhang 'brum cha spyad pa yi ni/ /nu sor 'dra ba sor bzhi pa/ /

skyes pa'i sor lngas 'khyud pa ste/ /bud med sor drug gis 'khyud bya/ /nad lta ba la bu ga gnyis/ /las la bu ga gcig pa bya/ /dbus kyi bu ga sor gsum pa/ /mthe bong shong ba tsam du bya/ /de steng rtse mo zlum po ni/ /dpangs su sor ni phyed par bya/ /khar dkrol de 'dra bug

med/ /cha spyad gzhang 'brum btsir la sbyar/ /mtshan par rdol la rnam kun tu/ /bu ga yan chad bsal bar bya/ /sna yi shu ba'i 'brum pa la/ /bu ga gcig pa sor gnyis bya/ /zheng du mdzub mo'i tshad tsam las/ /mtshan par rdol gyi spyad 'drar bya/ /sor mo bsrung phyir

ba so'am/ /shing gis shubs ni sor bzhi bya/ /ba yi nu 'dra bu ga gnyis/ /de yis kha ni dbye bar bya/ /mo mtshan rma brtag dbus su ni/ /khong stong sor ni bcu drug pa/ /phyogs bzhir gdu bus bcing bar bya/ /rtse mo pad+ma kha zlum 'dra/ /thur ma bzhi ni mnan pa yis/ /rtsa

ba bsdams na kha dbye bya/ /cha spyad 'jam rtsi'i sbubs 'dra la/ /rtsa ba mtheb shong rtse sran shong / /rtse mo gag pa med pa la/ /rtsa bar lpags 'jam rkyal bu bcing / /rma yi phug ni 'chas pa dang / /rma bkru ba la sbyar bar bya/ /'od ma'i sbu gu'am sgro rtsa ni/ /'dra ba kha

gnyis dmu rdzing spyad/ /dud pa mas gtong la sogs spyad/ /rang rang gi ni skabs su smras/ /rdabs rwa kha zheng sor gsum pa/ /dpangs su sor brgyad pa'am bcu/ /rtse mo'i bu ga g.yungs kar shong / /legs bkag nu sor dbyibs 'dra bya/ /ku ba srid du sor bcu gnyis/

khyud skor sor ni bco brgyad pa/ /kha zlum sor ni gsum mam bzhi/ /nang 'bar bad kan khrag 'dren byed/ /de bzhin bum pa de 'dra ba/ /glan pas skran yang 'ju bar byed/ /thur ma zhes bya'i cha spyad ni/ /las dang dbyibs ni sna tshogs pa/ /ci rigs pa yi tshad ldan bya/ /

de la rma tshol las la gnyis/ /srin bu gan du pa ta'i dbyibs/ /bu ga'i nang gi zug rngu 'byin/ /kha ni sran chud phye 'dra gnyis/ /sor brgyad pa dang dgu pa'i tshad/ /thur ma drug ste de las gnyis/ /sor ni bcu drug bcu gnyis pa/ /thal sman btang ba sbrul kha 'dra/ /gnyis po bcu gnyis sor bcu pa/ /bskul spyad kha ni mda' ltong 'dra//

'byin pa'i cha spyad lcags kyu'i dbyibs/ /thur ma rtse mo gug pa ni/ /mngal gyi phur pa zhes bya ste/ /srid du sor brgyad byas pa des/ /bud med mngal du bu shi dbyung / /rde'u 'byin cha spyad sprul mgo yi/ /gdengs

ka 'dra la rtse gug pa'o/ /mda' ltong 'dra bar sor bzhi pa/ /so dbyung ba la sbyar bar bya/ /rtse mo ras bal gyis dkris pa'i/ /phyi bsal thur ma drug bya'o/ /gzhang gi nye ring nang la gnyis/ /sor bcu ba dang bcu gnyis pa/ /sna yi sor drug bdun pa gnyis/ /rna ba'i sor brgyad

dgu pa gnyis/ /rna ba bsal la a shwad+tha'i/ /rtse'am blugs gzar kha 'dra bya/ /thur ma 'dzam bu'i thor to 'dra/ /thal sman me btsa' so sor gsum/ /phra sbom rim bzhin sbyar bar bya/ /rgyu ma'i las la thur ma ni/ /khar ba 'dra zhing dbus zlum la/ /rtsa ba zla ba phyed 'dra bya/ /rgya

shug tshi gu bkas 'dra ba/ /sna yi thor to 'brum sreg byed/ /sor brgyad pa la rtse mo ljon/ /gsum pa thal sman sman rim la/ /mthe'u chung gung mo srin lag gi /sen mo lta bu'i so byas pa'o/ /pho mtshan spyad dang mig sman stsogs/ /cha spyad rang rang le'ur bshad/ /nye ba'i cha spyad

khab long dang / /thag pa ras dang tho ba dang / /'bring bu rgyu ma lce rta rda/ /yal ga sren mo kha so dang / /dus dang smin dang lag rkang dang / /'jigs dang dga' ba de'i bya ba'i/ /bye brag thabs ni shes pa'o/ /mkhas pas blo yis dpyad par bya/ /cha spyad gdung srub dgang dang rgyun

srang dag bya dang / /thal sman gdab dang mtshon dbyung bcing dang bcer ba dang / /gzhib dang smad dang stod dang bskyod dang bcag pa dang / /bzlog dang drang por bya ba tsha spyad las rnams yin/ /legs par zug cing 'byin par byed pa dang / /gzung bya blangs nas 'byin par byed phyir dang / /yan

lag kun la gnod pa med pas na/ /cha spyad kun gyi mchog ni kang+ka'i mchu/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /mdo'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o// //de nas gtar spyad kyi cho ga'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /mgar ba mkhas pas cho ga bzhin/ /brdungs pa'i

gtar spyad nyi shu drug /spu ni chod par nus pa dag /phal cher sor ni drug par bya/ /gzugs legs so ni legs pa dang / /gzung bar bde ba nyid du bya/ /ya yo med cing 'thar legs pa'i/ /shin tu rno ba'i lcags las bya/ /rtse mo shin tu legs brdungs la/ /ut+pal sngon

po'i mdog 'dra ba'i/ /rang ming rjes mthun gzugs can ni/ /rtag tu nye bar gzhag par bya/ /rtse mo re re dag la yang / /rang tshod sor phyed gnyis dang bzhi/ /phal cher gnyis dang gsum du bya/ /de gnas khyad par dag la sbyar/ /de las dkyil 'khor 'dra ba'i rtse/ /mdzub sen nang

gi dbyibs 'drar bya/ /de ni rnyil skyes lkog ma yi/ /sha lhag la sogs gzhar bcad sbyar/ /'phel gtsags spu gri'i dbyibs lta bu/ /gcod dang dral dang 'byin la sbyar/ /rtse drang skrangs nad mtho ba dang / /zab pa la sbyar de las gzhan/ /ltag pa ring zhing rtse gug pa/ /so thung

nad tshul ji bzhin sbyar/ /ut+pa la dang so phyed kyis/ /dral dang de bzhin gcad par bya/ /sbrul kha rtse sor phyed rna ba/ /sna yi thor bu dpyad la sbyar/ /rma tshol 'jam po rta bla ba'i/ /mgo bo 'dra gzhal brtag par bya/ /de las gzhan pa khab rtse 'dra/ /rtse bug can ni dbug la

sbyar/ /ljang pa'i lo 'dra 'bigs pa la/ /sha ri'i mchu 'dra mda' bug ni/ /kha 'dra rtse gsum khrag gzags la/ /'jag rtse a ta'i mchu 'dra ba/ /'bras bu sor gnyis khrag 'byin la/ /de 'dra'i so ni nang du lta/ /gtsags 'bras zla ba kham pa 'dra/ /sor ni phyed dang gnyis yod bya/ /

rtse mo 'bras dang 'dra pa la/ /sor ni phyed dang gnyis yod dag /de ni rtsa lto'i nad la sbyar/ /sta re'i spangs 'dra ba lang so/ /'dra ba'i gtsags 'bras sor phyed pa/ /de yi yu ba gyen bstan la/ /rus pa'i steng gnas rtsa la gdab/ /zangs ma'i thur ma rtse gnyis pa/ /rtse mo me

tog kha 'bus 'dra/ /de yis mthong nyams mig sbris dbug /rgya 'dra'i gcags bu bya ba ni/ /sor gdub 'dra las kha 'byung ba/ /gtsags 'bras rgyar ni sor phyed pa/ /rig pas 'phel gtsags lta bu'am/ /dkyil 'khor lta bu'i rtse 'dra bya/ /de ni

mdzub mo'i thor tol/ /gdags su rung ba'i rgya 'dra bya/ /srad bus brtod la gre ba'i nang / /nad rnams gcad dang dral la sbyar/ /gre ba'i sha lhag thor gtsug 'dzin/ /lcags kyu'i rtse mo legs gug bya/ /rus pa gcod pa'i sog le ni/ /srid du sor bcu zhing sor gnyis/ /so

rnams phra zhing rab tu rno/ /yu ba chang gzung legs par bya/ /rma yi chu rgyus skra bcad pa'i/ /chan pa chan pa 'dra bar bya/ /so yo so drang kha gnyis pa'i/ /sen mo 'dreg spyad sor dgu pa/ /zug rngu phra 'byung gcad pa dang / /dral dang dbug dang phyi bar bya/ /zur bzhi pa la sor

gcig pa/ /dbyibs ni kun tu gcig 'dra ba/ /so phyi ba yi gcags spyad de/ /so yi dreg pa phyi bar bya/ /khab ni mgo zlum mig zab che/ /mkhrang pa gsum bya de las ni/ /sha che ba yi phyogs su ni/ /zur gsum srid du sor gsum pas/ /sha chung pa dang rus tshigs na/ /

rma yod pa la srid sor gnyis/ /zhu dang ma zhu'i gnas nad rma'i/ /khab rtse 'bras dbyibs gzhu ltar sgu/ /srid du sor ni phyed dang gsum/ /khab ni bdun dang brgyad kun yang / /zlum po sor ni legs sbom pa/ /khri gcig la btsugs pir 'dra ba/ /brtsan sngo gdong nad thig le

gnag /skra 'byi ba la gtsags par bya/ /khab brgyad zlum po sor phyed pa/ /gcig tu sbom la gzar bu 'dra/ /lag pa gnyis kyis btsugs nas ni/ /de yis sna yi khrag dbyung ngo / /rna shal dbug pa'i snyung bu ni/ /yu ti ka ni kha 'bus 'dra/ /snyung bu sor ni phyed par bya/ /de yi

tshad dbug de yan chad/ /zur bzhi par byas de yis ni/ /skrangs smin ma smin dogs la dbug /rna drung sha ni stug po dbug /snyung bu kha ni sbom po la/ /sum cha sbu gu yod byas la/ /sor gsum pa yis rna ba dbug /pad+ma thal sman me btsa' dang / /mching bu rdo dum sen mo stsogs/ /

lcags min gtar spyad phra mo ste/ /de yang de bzhin sbyar bar bya/ /cha spyad 'khrul 'khor stsogs pas kyang / /mkho ba nad kyi dmigs dang sbyar/ /'dren dang 'byin dang 'dral dang 'drub/ /dmigs tshol phya bsal zhal zhal gdab/ /gtsags bcad gshegs dbug btsugs pa dang / /

gzung sreg de yis bya ba yin/ /gcad dang dral dang phyi ba'i phyir/ /spyad kyi gtsags 'bras rtsa ba'i bar/ /mdzub mo gung mo mtheb mo yis/ /ma yengs pa dang legs par gzung / /gtar ga gdab phyir rtse mo'i drung / /mdzub mo dang ni mthe bos gzung / 'bras 'dra ba yi yu ba

ni/ /chang par bcug ste rtse mas gdab/ /dbyung don yu ba nas gzung bya/ /gzhan dag bya ba gang bder bya/ /gtar spyad sna tshogs dag gi snod/ /gso ras bal snam men dri'am/ /pags 'jam du gu la las byas/ /rab tu stug pa zheng sor dgu/ /srid du sar ni bcu gnyis

pa/ bal gyis bar bcad spyad bcug la/ /legs par gzhag ste drub pa dang / /thur mas kha ni brgyu bar bya/ /srin bu pad pa bder gnas pa/ /khrag dbyung phyir ni sbyar bar bya/ /chu nang nya dang sbal stsogs dang / /mi ro'i dri ma mnam las byung / /dmar dang dkar dang shin tu

gnag /mi srun sbom dang 'byil ba dang / /'ja' tshon dang 'dra ro stod bkra/ /spu yod de rnams dug can yin/ /spang bya des ni khrag gzhibs na/ /g.ya' rnags 'dzag rims mgo 'khor skyed/ /de la dugs khrag mkhris gso bya/ /chu mdog rnam par gsal ba dang / /dug med nya

lcibs med las byung / /rtsa snar ro stong sngo khra zlum/ /rgyab ni ngur smrig 'dra lus phra/ /lto ni cung zad ser ba bzang / /de yang legs par ma skyugs dang / /rtag tu 'thung du bcug pa dag /chu nang zhugs te nub pa ni/ /khrag gis myos pa yin pas spangs/ /de nas cig shos

skye rab brtags// chu sbyar ba yi nang du gzhug /kan dzi'am dar ba'i nang du gzhug /slar yang chur ni dbugs phyung nas/ /mar ram sa zhag nu zho 'am/ /khrag gi thigs pa bskus 'thung gzhug /'thungs tshe ro stod mthor gyur na/ /ras ma srab mos g.yogs par bya/ khrag

ni bzang ngan 'dres pa las/ /pad pa dang por nad khrag ni/ /'thungs te ngang pas 'o ma dang / /'dres chu'i 'o ma len dang mtshungs/ /so yis 'debs pa'am g.ya' gyur na/ /de ni slar dbyung skyug tu gzhug/ /rgyam tsha til mar gyis kha bsku/ /phye ma 'jam pos rgyab tu

gtor/ /slar yang zhag bdun bar du ni/ /khrag myos bsrungs la 'thung mi gzhug /srin bu pad pa legs skyugs na/ /sngon bzhin khong grims brtan par 'gyur/ /drags na dal zhing snyom 'chi 'gyur/ /skyugs ma legs na rengs myos 'gyur/ /bum pa chu dang sa blugs pa/ /gzhan

dang gzhan du gzhag par bya/ /kha chu rul bag sbyang phyir bya/ /gzhan du dug dang bcas par 'gyur/ /ma dag pa'am khrag mang byung / /skyer pa bu ram sbrang rtsis bsku/ /lan brgyar dkrugs mar ras bal gyi/ /ye'us byugs la sman bsil bsku/ /nad kyi khrag dang bral gyur

na/ /'phral du rtsa dmar nad med 'gyur/ /ma dag gnas nas bskyod gyur pa/ /rma yi gnas su 'dug pa'i khrag /zhag lon na ni gnag par 'gyur/ /de bas de ni slar dbyung ngo / /mkhris rgyas khrag gi nad la ni/ /ku ba bum pa sbyar mi bya/ /de gnyis me dang bcas pa yin/ /rlung

dang bad kan la sbyar bya/ /bad kan las gyur nad khrag ni/ /ska bas rngabs rus gzhib mi bya/ /rlung dang mkhris pa las gyur khrag /rngabs rwas gzhibs te dbyung bar bya/ /lus kyi gong du srad bu'am/ /ras kyis dam du bcings nas ni/ /chu ba tshigs rus gnad rnams ni/ /dor

te zhal zhal gdab bar bya/ /gyen du dbyung ba'i thabs kyis ni/ /thur du babs pa gdab bar bya/ /zab dang nye dang 'phred mi gdab/ /btab ba'i gnas su'ang gdab mi bya/ /zhal zhal bya ba phyogs gcig 'dus/ /rtsa mdud srin bus khrag 'byung zhing / /bem bem por gyur rwa stsogs

gdab/ /nad khrag lus khyab gtar ga gdab/ /khrag nad 'dus pa zhal zhal bya/ /gting na yod pa pad pas dbyung / /pags gnas ku bum rngabs ras dbyung / /lus khyab khrag la gtar gnyid/ /rlung stsogs gnas la rngabs rwa dang / /pad pa ku bas rim bzhin dbyung / /khrag phyung

bsil bskus la stsogs pas/ /rlung ni rnam par 'khrugs gyur te/ /rma na g.ya' zhing skrangs gyur na'ang / /de la zhun mar dron pos bsku/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ mdo'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o// //de nas gtar ga gdab pa'i cho

ga'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /cung zad mngar zhing tsha bro la/ /grang dang tsha min ska ba min/ /pad+ma lam bu chu gsher dang / /btsod dang ri bong khrag ltar dmar/ /dag cing dmar ba 'byung ba ni/ /de nyid kyis ni lus gnas byed/ /de ni phal cher bad mkhris kyi/ /nad

kyis 'khrugs pas gnod bskyad pas/ /me dbal 'bras dang mcher nad dang / /skran dang me drod bri dang rims/ /kha dang mig dang mgo nad dang / /myos dang skom dang tsha bro dang / /mdze dang dreg nad mkhris khrag dang / /sgregs pa skyur zhing mgo 'khor byed/ /bsil

dro snum dang rtsub stsogs kyis/ /nad gang gsos par gyur pa dag /legs par 'chos par ma gyur pa/ /de ni khrag 'khrugs las gyur yin/ /khrag bdo gyur pa de las ni/ /gtar ga gdab pas dbyung bar bya/ /de yang bcu drug ma lon dang / /bdun cu 'das la khrag mi dbyung / /

nyam chung dugs drags dugs ma byas/ /rlung gi nad kyis nyen pa dang / sbrum ma bu btsas zas ma zhu/ /khrag mkhris lud pa dbugs mi bde/ /tshad 'khru rims dang skyugs pa dang / /skya rbab yan lag kun skrangs dang / /snum 'thungs pa la sbyor ba dang / /de bzhin las

lnga byas la min/ /ma bsdams gtar ga mi gdab cing / /yon po'am mi snang la mi gdab/ /tshabs chen nad ni ma gtogs pa/ /grang la tsha char rlung dus min/ /mgo dang mig gi nad rnams la/ /'phral ba'i rtsa la gtar ba'am/ /mig 'gram sna drung rtsa la gdab/ /rna ba'i nad

la rna ba'i rtsa/ /sna yi nad la sna rtser ro/ /cham pa sna dang dpral rtsar gdab/ /kha nad rnams la lce dang ni/ /mchu dang rkan gyi rtsar gdab bo/ /nam tshong yan chad rtsa mdud mgul/ /rna ba mur 'gram spyir gnas gdab/ /smyo byed mig 'gram brang dpral rtsa/ /brjed byed 'gram pa'i

mtshams su gdab/ /yang na kun la smin mtshams gdab/ /'bras dang rtsib logs zug pa la/ /rtsib logs nu ma'i bar rtsa gdab/ /nyin gsum pa la phrag mtshams gdab/ /nyin bzhi pa la ltag pa'i 'og /'khru ba gzer dang ldan pa la/ /mjug to'i

gong ma sor gnyis par/ /khu ba'i mtshan nad pho mtshan rtsa/ /lkog ma'i wa bar brla rtsa gdab/ /gzugs 'khums pus mthil 'og gam ni/ /gong gi sor bzhi pa la gdab/ /'bras kyi phreng bar byin pa'i nywa/ /'og tu sor ba gnyis gdab bo/ /rkub tshos bus mo'i lha nga'i

steng / /nad la long mo'i ltag sor bzhir/ /rkang tsha 'theng dang sbrid pa dang / /rting rdol rlung nad mdzer pa dang / /rkang sor snags su chad pa la/ /rgya tshigs las gong sor gnyis gdab/ /'khums la rkang 'khums lta bur gdab/ /ji skad bshad pa ma mngon na/ /gnad

ma gtogs pa gar nye ba'i/ /phyogs gzhan dag tu gtar ga gdab/ /de nas lus snum gtar ga yi/ /yo byad kun bsags stobs dang ldan/ /bkra shis byas shing kha zas ni/ /snum zos khu ba 'thungs pa dang / /me dang nyi tshan gyis dugs byas/ /pus mnyam mtho ba'i

stan la 'dug /skra rtsa ras ni 'jam pos bcings/ /pus mo'i lha ngar gru mo btsugs/ /khu tshur nang du glod bcug pas/ /mgul pa dam du btsir bar bya/ /so bsdam lud pa lu ba dang / /mkhur ba gnyis ni bud par bya/ /de la rgyab nas btsir ba dang / /gos kyis

dkri zhing mdzub mo ni/ /g.yon pa lkog mar bcug nas su/ /nang du legs par gzhug par bya/ /'di ni nang du kha bltas rtsa/ /ma gtogs bsdam pa'i cho ga yin/ /de 'og sman pa'i mthe bo las/ /gung mo btang bar gyur ba yis/ /rtsa byung mngon la gdab byas nas/ /

reg pa'am mthe bos mnan byas la/ /lag pa g.yon pas bzung ba yi/ /gtsags pu sta res dbus su gdab/ /gtsags bu'i kha phyogs mi g.yo gtad/ /de bzhin gdab pa'am btsir ba yis/ /bem rtol gdab las khrag dbyung ngo / /sna drung gi ni rtsar

gdab pa/ /rtse mo mthe bos bteg nas ni/ /gtsags rtse 'bras 'dra gdab par bya/ /lce bteg bzlog ste sos mnan la/ /lce 'og rtsar ni gdab par bya/ /nu ma yan chad bsdams nas ni/ /mgul par gnas pa'i rtsar gdab bo/ /lag pa gnyis su rdo bcangs te/ /lag

pa pus mor brten te brkyang / /mchan khung man chad mnyes nas na/ /gong du bcings la mdo rtsar gdab/ /lag ngar rtsa ni bder 'dug ste/ /gdab pa'i sor bzhi gong gi ni/ /phyogs su ras kyis dam bcings la/ /mthe bo chang par bcug nas ni/ /lag ngar brkyang la

gdab par bya/ /rtsib logs rtsa ni dpung pa gnyis/ /thur du dpyangs te gdab bar bya/ /pho mtshan rtsa ni bteg gdab/ /byin rtsa pus mo ma bkug par/ /rkang pa legs gzhag pus mo la/ /'og tu lag pa gnyis kyis ni/ /long mo'i bar du dam btsir la/ /rkang

pa de steng gnyis pa ni/ /cung zad bkug ste bzhag pa yis/ /mnan la de nas lag pa ltar/ /rtsar gdab de ltar ma smos pa'i/ /gzhan dag la yang gdab byas la/ /thabs shes gtsags spyad de dang des/ /phyogs ni de dang de ru gdab/ /sha che ba yi phyogs su 'debs/

'bras 'dra 'bras kyi srid tsam gdab/ /rus pa'i steng rtsa sta re 'dras/ /nas kyi phyed tsam gdab par bya/ /legs par btab nas khrag gzags te/ /chings ma bkrol nas gzag mi bya/ /gdab ma legs pa dus cung zad/ /nyung zad 'byung ba til phye gdab/ /gdab drags

sgra dang bcas par ni/ /'byung zhing bcad kyang dka' bar 'gyur/ /dbang dang 'bog par 'gyur ba dang / /chings lhod mtshon rtul 'grangs drags dang / /nyam chung shugs nyen dugs ma byas/ /khrag mi 'byung ba'i rgyu yin no/ /khrag ni legs par ma byung na/ /byi dang tsha gsum

skyer pa dang / /rgya spos rgyam tsha khyim dud bcas/ /til mar btags la rma la bsku/ /khrag ni legs byung til mar dang / /rgyam tshar bcas pa dro 'jam bsku/ /le brgan rtsi las tshon ser ltar/ /dang po nad khrag 'byung par 'gyur/ /legs par byung na rang nyid 'chad/ /khrag bzang

byung na'ang dbyung mi bya/ /brgyal 'gyur na ni chings ma dgrol/ /rlung g.yab kyis g.yab slar khrag dbyung / /slar 'bog gyur na nyi ma ni/ /gnyis pa'ang gsum pa dag la gdab/ /rlung khrag gnag cing dmar la rtsub/ /shugs drag gsal zhing lbu ba can/ /

mkhris khrag ser la rtsa gnag mnam/ /sbyin bag dro zhing tshon can yin/ /bad kan khrag ni 'jam la skya/ /rgyun can 'byar zhing ska ba yin/ /'dres pa'i mtshan ma 'dres ma yin/ /nyes gsum dri ma rnyog ma can/ /khrag ngan pa ni nyams che la'ang / /tshad las lhag par

dbyung mi bya/ /khrag dbyung drags na'ang 'chi ba'am/ /rlung nad mi bzad 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de la bsku byug 'o ma khu/ /khrag bcud blud pa sman yin no/ /khrag phyung nas ni chings ma dag /dal gyis bkrol la chu bsil gyis/ /bkrus la til mar gyis byugs pa'i/

gos 'jam gyis ni rma kha dkri/ /khrag nad yod na phyi 'bred dam/ /phyi de nyin par slar yang dbyung / /shin tu gnod pa'i khrag zla phyed/ /snum gyis brtas pa'i lus las dbyung / /khrag ngan cung zad lus kyang ni/ /nad ni lhag par mi skyed pas/ /de phyir lhag ma yod

gyur yang / /gzhag gi shas cher mi dbyung ngo / /lhag ma rngabs rwa stsogs gdab pa'ang / /yang na spyod bsil khrag mkhris bsal/ /sbyang dang skam pa'i bye brag ni/ /gso bas de ni dang bar bya/ /nad khrag rab rgyas ma gyur ba'am/ /de 'dra'i thabs kyis gso bar bya/ /

khrag gi rgyun ni mchod na/ /gcad pa'i sbyor ba myur du bya/ /seng phrom rma shing pri yang ku/ /ma sha shing mngar yug snam btsag /gyo dum zar ma snag tsha dang / /'o ma can shing shun lo ma/ /btags pa'i phye ma rma khar gdab/ /shug stsogs chu grang sbyar ba blud/ /

yang na rtsa btab de gong gi /rtsa de nyid la gtar ga gdab/ /yang na thur ma bsregs pa yis/ /rma kha myur du bsreg par bya/ /bcings pa nyes pas lam log la gnas te/ /nad ni rgyas pas khrag ni 'khrugs 'gyur ba/ /rang gi gnas su slar phyin ma gyur pa/ /de srid

zas dang spyod lam phan pa bsten/ /shin tu tsha grang ma yin yang drod skyed/ /khrag sel byed pa'i bza' dang btung ba phan/ /de tshe lus dang khrag bder mi gnas pas/ /khyad par du ni me las bsrung bar bya/ /mdog dang dbang po gsal zhing dbang po yul/ /'dod

cing zas 'ju shugs kyang bde bar 'ju/ /bde dang ldan zhing stobs rgyas phun sum tshogs/ /mi yi nad khrag dag pa yin par bshad/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /mdo'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o// //de nas zug rngu dbyung

ba'i cho ga'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /zug rngu'i bgrod pa rnam lnga ste/ /yo drang thad ka steng dang 'og /kha gnag skrangs dang nad dang bcas/ /yang dang yang du khrag 'dzag la/ /rma yi nye 'khor mtho zhing glo/ /chu bur lta bu'i thor bu 'byung / /sha ni 'jam 'gyur

lus mdor na/ /khong du zug rngu yod shes bya/ /khyad par du ni pags pa na/ /mtshon lus mdog nyams sra ba dang / /skrangs par 'gyur ro shar gnas pa/ /nad dang skrang pa lhag par 'phel/ /btsir bar mi bzod smin pa dang / /rma yi sgo ni 'drub mi shes/ /nya yi

nang zug shar zug dang / /'dra las skrang bag med pa yin/ /chu ba'i dra ba'i nang lus pa'i/ /chu ba las ni 'byung dka' zhing / /bsgul dka' bskyod tshe rengs shing na/ /rtsa la brten pa rtsa skrang 'gyur/ /bu ga'i sbubs gnas sbubs kyis ni/ /rang gi las dang yon tan

nyams/ /rtsa chen gnas pa'ang dbugs dang khrag /lbu ba can du 'byung 'gyur zhing / /sgra dang bcas par 'byung ba dang / /snying dang yan lag na bcas 'gyur/ /rus tshigs bog rer mtshon lus pa/ /rus brtse tshabs cher na bar 'gyur/ /rus gnas nad mang skrang

bar byed/ /tshigs la gnas pa de dang 'dra/ /bskyod par dka' ba dag tu'ang 'gyur/ /nang grol nang yod 'khrugs pa dang / /lbo zhing kha zas ngan skyugs gcin/ /rma yi khar ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /gnad kyi nang du mtshon lus pa/ /gnad zug mtshan nyid las

shes bya/ /pags pa la sogs rang rang gi /ji ltar 'dzag las shes par bya/ /skyon med lus kyi rma 'tsho ba ste/ /de ni gnod pa med par gnas/ /nad 'khrugs snad pa la sogs kyis/ /bslangs nas slar yang gnod pa skyed/ /gang yang

rung bar pags pa nyams/ /bsku dang mnye dang dugs byas nas/ /mdog dmar na zhing tsha la 'khrugs/ /yang na gang du mar gzhag 'ju/ /lde gus byugs pa myur du bskams/ /gnas der zug rngu bcas shes bya/ /shar lus sbyang bar byas pa

yis/ /skem byas lhongs 'gyur bskul ba dang / /btsan dmar sogs kyis shes par bya/ /nya dang rus tshigs nang grol gyi/ /zug rngu'ang de bzhin shes par bya/ /rus pa zug rngus ma rungs 'gyur/ /rus pa bsku dang dugs bya zhing / /mnye dang btsir

las shes par bya/ /rus tshigs gnas pa rus 'dra dang / /brkyang dang bskum las shes par bya/ /chu ba rtsa dang rtsa chen sbubs/ /zug rngu mi mnyam lam 'gro dang / /shing rta chag pa'i rta dang ni/ /ldan par nad pa bskyon nas su/ /myur du drangs nas de nas ni/ /bskyod pas

zug rngu shes par bya/ /gnad zug logs shig ma bshad de/ /de rnams sha stsogs la gnas yin/ /spyir ni zug rngu bcas bskyod pa'i/ /bya bas nad bcas las shes bya/ /mdor na zlum dang gyes pa dang / /zur bzhi ba dang zur gsum pa'i/ /rma yi dbyibs las zug

rngu ni/ /mi mngon rnam par shes par bya/ /de rnams dbyung ba'i thabs gyur gnyis/ /phyir drang ba dang mdun nas drang / /rtse nas drang dang rtsa nas drang / /de las bzlog pas dbyung bar bya/ /dbyung sla gang na yod dral te/ /de nas thad kar drang bar bya/ /mtshon ni brang dang mtshan

khung dang / /brla drung rtsib logs zug pa dang / /mdun drang rtse mo mngon gcad bya/ /kha zheng che drang mi bya dang / /zug rngur ma gyur mde'u dang / /mi mngon gnod med pa mi dbyung / /de nas lag pas zin gyur na/ /lag pa gnyis kyis drang bar bya/ /snang gzhan seng ge chu srin

dang / /bar gyi karta ti mchus drang / /mi mngon rma yi dbyibs las ni/ /gal te dbyung bar nus gyur pa/ /kang ka bring ka khrung khrung dang / /bya rog sha ra bye'i mchus drang / /pags stsogs la gnas skam pas drang / /khong stong nang nas nya mgos dbyung / /sbu

gur gnas pa 'dam bu 'dras/ /lhag ma gzhan gyis ci rigs drang / /yang na dang po mtshon gyis dral/ /de nas rma yi khrag bsal ba/ /byas la mar gyis dugs bya zhing / /bcings te spyod pa bsten par bya/ /rtsa dang chu bar mtshon lus pa/ /thur mas bskyod

de dbyung bar bya/ /snying gar gnas pa'i zug rngu ni/ /chu grang gtor bas sngangs byas la/ /gnas gzhan phyin cing 'phags gyur na/ /ci rigs par ni dbyung bar bya/ /rma yi sgo nas dbyung dka' ba/ /gzhan dag la yang de bzhin sbyar/ /rus par zug pa rkang

pa ni/ /gnyis kyis mnan la drang bar bya/ /de ltar ma nus stobs che ba'i/ /g.yog gis dam du bzung ste dbyung / /'on kyang ma nus mde'u'i rtsa/ /bkug la gzhu rgyud dam btags la/ /rta srab kyi ni kha lcags mthar/ /ma yengs pa yis dam btags te/ /

yan lag lnga pa legs bsdams nas/ /rta ni lcag gis gzhus nas su/ /brdeg cing mgo bo bteg nas ni/ /shugs kyis ji bzhin brtod nas ni/ /de ltar zug rngu dbyung ba'am/ /yang na shing gi yal gar gdags/ /mde'u rtsa phra bar srad bu dag /btags te zug

rngu dbyung bar bya/ /rma skrangs mde'u rtsa mi mngon na/ /skrangs pa lags par btsir nas dbyung / /dong bu tho bas brdungs pa yis/ /mtho zhing snang bar gyur na dbyung / /lam ma yin par 'byung ba gang / /de nyid kyis ni rmar dbyung bya/ /mde'u zur bcum ste dbyung ba'am/ /dong

bu kha yis dbyung bar bya/ /rna ba med cing rma kha dbye/ /drang 'dug khab long bstan pas dbyung / /zhu ba'i gnas su zug rngu ni/ /bkru sman nyid kyis dbyung bar bya/ /rlung gnod dugs dang nu zho dang / /khrag dang chus gnod gzhibs pas bsal/ /gre ba'i nang zhugs

zug rngu la/ /skud pa gre bar gzhug bya ste/ /pad+ma'i rtsa bar skud pas gdags/ /pad rtsa zug rngu lhan cig drang / /lcags sreg mig chur bcug pa yi/ /lcags thur brtan por byas nas ni/ /rgya skyegs can nam rgya skyegs med/ /rgya skyegs kyis

bsgos zug rngu dbyung / /skra shad 'dzings pa 'thungs pa dang / /gsher bas tsher ma zug pa gdon/ /'phral du srad bu thogs pa yis/ /slon par bya'o des cig shos/ /kha snar drang bar ma nus na/ /gzhan du thur du mid par bya/ /zas kyis brnangs pa'i zug rngu ni/

chu btung phrag par brdegs pas gzhug /mig gi rma yi zug rngu phra/ /dar ram bal lam chu yis bsal/ /mi ni chus gang kha sbubs te/ /sprugs pa'am brkyang la btsir slon pa'am/ /thal khung brkos te mi yi ni/ /ske yi bar du nub par gzhug/ /rna ba chus

gang lag pa yis/ /mnyes la til mar rgyun blugs la/ /rna ba thur du bstan nas ni/ /gdab pa'am yang na brngub bar bya/ /rna ba'i nang du 'bu zhugs na/ /rna ba tsha chus bkang ba'am/ /tsha chu dro 'jam nyid kyis dgang / /shi nas 'bu ro dbyung thabs bya/ /rgya skyegs

can dang gser dngul stsogs/ /'byung khungs las byung yun rings gnas/ /mtshon ni phal cher lus kyi me/ /drod kyis 'ju bar byed pa yin/ /sa dang 'od ma shing rwa rus/ /so dang skra dang rdo ba'ang 'ju/ /rwa dang 'od tshal lcags ta la/ /shing tshal zug rngu ring

pos kyang / /phal cher de dag tshos 'gyur la/ /khrag dang sha yis tshos par byed/ /zug rngu sha yi gting du zug/ /phyogs de tsha ba'am med gyur na/ /de nas de ni snang bya'i phyir/ /mnye dugs sbyangs dang sha dbri blta/ /sman rnon bcings dang zas skom sbyin/ /mtshon

gyis btab cing gtsags pa yis/ /smin par byas nas rma dbral dang / /btsal dang bye bas zug rngu dbyung / /zug rngu'i gnas dang cha spyad kyi/ /tshul ni mang pos legs brtags te/ /blo ldan thabs ni de dang des/ /shes par byas la zug rngu dbyung / /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying

po bsdus pa las/ /mdo'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu brgyad pa'o// //de nas gtar ga gdab pa'i las kyi cho ga'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /rma ni phal cher dang por ni/ /skrangs dang smin las 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de bas de nyid gso bya ste/ /de bsil byugs blugs

khrag dbyung dang / /legs par sbyangs pa la sogs pas/ /smin par gyur las 'bad de bsrung / /thor bu ma smin skrangs drod chung / /mdog 'dra sra zhing brtan par gnas/ /smin tshe mdog ni 'gyur ba dang / /dmar zhing rkyal bu'i dbyibs ltar 'dug /gas pa lta bu'i

nad bcas dang / /yan lag snyom zhing glal bcas dang / /lus grugs 'khrugs tsha yig 'chus/ /rims 'debs skom dad gnyid med dang / /mar 'khyags bzhag na 'ju ba dang / /rma gtar reg na mi bzod do/ /smin gyur na ba'i shugs chung zhing / /rnyid cing skya

la gnyer ma 'du/ /mtha' ma 'jum zhing dbus su mtho/ /g.ya' dang skrang ba la sogs chung / /rkyal pa yi ni chu lta bur/ /reg na rnag ni phan tshun rgyu/ /rlung min min mkhris min tsha/ /med de bad kan med mi skrang / /khrag med dmar bar mi 'gyur te/ /de bas nad

khrag dang bcas smin/ /smin pa thal drags khong stong dang / /nad kyis zos pas pags pa srab/ /gnyer ma 'jum zhing mdog gnag la/ /ba spu rnams ni 'byi bar 'gyur/ /bad kan shas che'i skrang pa ni/ /smin pa gting ring khrag gis gang / /de bas smin rtags

gsal ma yin/ /skrang pa gang du bsil 'gyur zhing / /pags mdog mi 'gyur nad tshabs chung / /rdo ltar reg na sra ba ni/ /mkhas pas the tshom med par de/ /khrag gi smin pa zhes bshad bya/ /snying stobs nyam chung byis pa dang / /thor bu smin pa'i tshabs che'am/ /gnad

dang rus tshigs la sogs par/ /'byung ba ma gtogs gzhan dag 'dral/ /ma smin brtol na rtsa rgyus la/ /gnod cing khrag ni mang du 'byung / /nad tshabs rab 'phel rma gyes pa'am/ /rma 'byung thor bu 'byung bar 'gyur/ /rnag ni nang du gnas gyur pa/ /'phel

bas rtsa rgyus sha dang ni/ /khrag rnams myur du sreg byed de/ /rtswa skam la ni me dang mtshungs/ /gang zhig ma smin brtol ba dang / /gang zhig smin kyang btang snyoms 'jog /khyad par mi shes de dag ni/ /sme sha can 'drar shes par bya/ /ma brtol

ba yi dang po ni/ /kha zas phan pa sbyin par bya/ /tshor ba mi bzad bzod 'gyur bas/ /chang 'thung ba la chang blud bya/ /zas zos pas ni mi brgyal zhing / /nang du mtshon btab tshor mi 'gyur/ /rum du bu shi rde'u chags pa dang / /kha nad dmu rdzing can ma gtogs/ /

de nas yo byad kun bsags te/ /nad pa shar du kha bstan la/ /sman pa mngon phyogs bsdams nas ni/ /gnad stsogs ma gtogs gtsags bus gdab/ /sha shugs rjes mthun shin tu rno/ /gtsags bu rnag phyin bar du gdab/ /de ni cig car gdab bar

bya/ /smin pa chen po yod kyang ni/ /rma zheng sor gnyis dral bya'am/ /sor gnyis pa yi zab sor gsum/ /mdzub mo chu ba spu dag gis/ /gnas phyogs ji bzhin brtag pa'am/ /rma 'tshol gyis ni legs btsal zhing / /kun

tu legs par brtag par bya/ /gang nas gang du 'gro bar 'gyur/ /gang du mtho ba shes byas la/ /de dang der ni rma btod de/ /legs phye phug ni med par bya/ /chu dang zheng du ci nas kyang / /nad ni gnas par mi 'gyur bya/ /sman pa dpa' brtan las la myur/ /mtshon rno mi rtul mi 'dar la/ /kun

tu rmongs par ma gyur pa/ /gtsags bus 'debs pa'i las la bsngags/ /gyen du bcad rtsa 'phral smin rtsa/ /rnyil dang ske rtsa lto sbos dang / /mchan khung dang ni mig sbubs mchu/ /mkhur tshos brla drung chu so rtsa'o/ /gzhan dag gyen du bcad na ni/ /rtsa dang chu ba'ang

ma rungs 'gyur/ /gtsags bus btab nas nad pa ni/ /tshig snyan chu ni bsil ba yis/ /dbugs phyung nas ni de 'og rma/ /sor mos kun nas btsir ba dang / /bska ba'i chu yis legs bkrus shing / /sman chur bcug pa'i gos kyis phyi/ /gu gul yungs kar a

ru ra/ /shing kun ka ra rgyam tsha dang / /shu dag nim pa'i lo ma ni/ /mar dang sbyar bas bdug par bya/ /til gyi lde gu mar sbrang rtsi/ /rang gi sman ni ji lta bas/ /byugs shing de nas rma tshangs gzhug /de nyid kyis ni de g.yogs la/ /mar dang phye sprus bskus

pa dang / /de'i 'og kog tse stug po ni/ /gzhag ste shin tu ma yengs pas/ /gos kyis legs par bcing byas te/ /glo dang g.yas dang g.yon dag gam/ /steng dang 'og tu ma song bya/ /rma tshangs kog tse dkris mar bcas/ /phra zhing sra la gtsang ba la/ /spos kyis

bdugs shing 'jam la mnyen/ /kham khum med cing rma la phan/ /bcings nas de'i 'og tu de/ /gnod pa bzlog phyir bsrung bar bya/ /de rnams la ni gtor ma sbyin/ /lak+Sh+mi gu ha a ti gu ha/ /spang spos pra ma tsa ri ni/ /tsha tra a ti tsha tra dang / /dur ba shu dag nyungs

kar dag /rtag tu de yi spyi bor btags/ /de nas snum gyi cho gar bshad/ /nyin re'i kun spyod bshad pa bstan/ /nyin par gnyid log rma g.ya' zhing / /kha dmar na skrangs rnag 'khyims 'gyur/ /bud med dran nam reg pa'am/ /mthong bas khu ba byung

'gyur na/ /ma phrad na'ang 'khrig pa las/ /byung ba'i skyon ni thob par 'gyur/ /kha zas dag ni gang goms las/ /nas dang gro dang drug cu pa/ /sran chung mung+ga du ba ri/ /ni shan nA ga dzi ban+ti/ /la phug gzhon nu brta ka/ /rgya sne'u dan+du li ya ka/ /ka ra be+e la

karko ta/ /ka du ga pal pa to la/ /rgyam tsha se 'bru skyu ru ra/ /chu bskol ba ni bsgrangs pa dang / /'bras rnying chang dang snum nyung zad/ /zos rjes su chu tshan btung ba dang / /skam sa'i sha ni zos gyur na/ /rma ni myur du 'tsho bar 'gyur/ /dus su ran par bza' ba dang / /

phan pa zos na bde 'ju 'gyur/ /ma zhu ba yi rlung la stsogs/ /ldang zhing nad ni stobs can 'gyur/ /de las skrangs dang rnags pa dang / /tsha dang sbos par 'gyur ba yin/ /'bru gsar til dang ma sha dang / /chang dang rlan can las byung sha /'o ma bu ram shing

las gyur/ /skyur dang lan tshwa tsha ba dang / /gzhan gang 'khru ba gcod byed dang / /tsha dang bsil dang lci ba yang / /'bru sa ra la sogs sde tshan 'di/ /rma dang lan pa'i nad kun skyed/ /chang ni rno ba tsha rtsub 'gyur/ /rma la myur du gnod par

byed/ /ba la uR+shi ras g.yab cing / /'di ni bskyod par mi bya la/ /drag shul mi gzug 'phrug mi bya/ /bskyod pa'i tshe na bag bya'o/ /mdza' dang bram ze rgan stsogs kyi/ /gtam ni yid la dga' ba nyan/ /nad las thar ba'i re bcas pas/ /rma ni myur du 'tsho

bar 'gyur/ /nyin gsum lon tshe rma yi tshas/ /slar yang bkrus sogs las rnams ni/ /snga ma bzhin bya de bzhin du/ /nyin zhag gnyis par mi bya'o/ /tshabs cher na zhing mi 'byar la/ /rma ni yun ring zhig na 'tsho/ /rma tshangs sam ni lde gus glan/ /snum ches rtsub

ches dam pa dang / /lhod drags gzhag nyes mi bya ste/ /snum ches rma ni rid par 'gyur/ /rtsub ches sha 'chad shin tu na/ /gas shing khrag ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /dam dang klod drags gzhag nyes pas/ /rma yi kha ni 'drud par 'gyur/ /rma ni rnag bcas skrangs shing

mtho/ /rgyu bcas rnag phugs 'chas pa dag /rma tshangs 'jam po nang gnas pas/ /rma yi skyon ni dag par byed/ /skrangs pa ha cang ma smin brtol/ /smin zhing rnags par 'gyur ba spyad/ /phan pa'i sman dang zas sbyin dkri/ /shin tu rmar mi gnod pas gso/ /

snad pa'i rma ni gsar du byung / /ral zhing kha bye 'phral du btsem/ /rmen bu chen po bkas pa dang / /rna shal bu ga chad pa'ang btsem/ /mgo dang mig phugs sna dang mchu/ /mkhur tshos rna pa dpung pa brla/ /mgul pa phrag pa rlig pa dpyi/ /pho mtshan gzhang dang lto ba

stsogs/ /phugs ring ba yi gnas rnams dang / /sha che mi 'gul ma yin dang / /chu so mchan khung la stsogs dang / /sha chung mgul pa'i rma dag dang / /dbugs dbyung zug rngu yod pa dang / /thal sman dug mes tshig mi btsem/ /btsem pa rus dum khrag skam

dang / /rtsa dang spu rnams bsal nas ni/ /sha chad dum bu 'phyang ba dang / /rang gi gnas su glan pa dang / /rus tshigs bcug cing khrag gzags la/ /skud pa shing shun rgyus pas btsem/ /srubs ni nye ba'am ring mi bya/ /blang ba che ba'am chung mi bya/ /de nas spro

bsring byas nas mthar/ /rma ni sbrang rtsi mar sbyar dang / /skyer pa zar ma'i dud pa dang / /'bras bu gsum dang sa la ki/ /seng phrom mngar dang snum bcas pas/ /bskus la bcing stsogs sngon bzhin bya/ /rma kha khrag ni med 'gyur gang / /de ni cung zad 'brud bya ste/ /rma

'byor byed pa khrag yin pas/ /phyung ste legs par drub par bya/ /de la bcings pa yul la stsogs/ /brtags nas nges par sbyar bar bya/ /bal gos pags pa dar gsum dro/ /zar ma'i ras ni bsil ba yin/ /dro grang ran pa shing bal 'dab/ /ras bal rgyus pa shing

shun yin/ /zangs lcags zha nye ro nye yis/ /bad kan tshil ches rma la glan/ /chag thur shing byang pags pa dang / /shing shun smyig tshal stsogs pas bcings/ /dbyibs ni rang min rjes mthun pa'i/ /bcing ba bco lnga rnam bya ste/ /shubs dang bkra shis lhod par

bcing / /mthar chags bcing dang zlum por bcing / /mda' lcags khri dang dam bcing dang / /sgye'u bla re lkog shal dang / /'ur mthil zung glan zlum pa dang / /yan lag lnga pa zhes bya sbyar/ /de las gang zhig gang legs sbyor/ /de ni de ru legs par sbyar/ /

brla dang mjug tsos mchan khung dang / /chu so spyi bor dam du bcing / /lag ngar gdong dang rna ba dang / /rgyab dang rtsib logs mgul pa lto/ /pho mtshan rlig pa ran par bcing / /mig dang tshigs su lhod par bcing / /lhod bcings rma ni bad kan dang / /rlung shas che

la ran par bcing / /ran zhing gnas su dam du bcing / /dam zhing shin tu dam du bcing / /dgun dang de bzhin dpyid kyi tshe/ /zhag ni gsum gsum dag nas dgrol/ /khrag mkhris shas che'i rma dag ni/ /dam bcing gnas su ran par bcing / /ran bcing

gnas su lhod par bcing / /lhod bcing gnas su bcing mi bya/ /de gnyis so ga ston gyi tshe/ /snga dro phyi dro dgrol bar bya/ /ma bcings sha sbrang sbrang bu dang / /lhags pa ser bu stsogs pas gnod/ /rma red 'gyur zhing der snum dang / /sman ni

yun ring gnas mi 'gyur/ /sbyang ba'am 'tsho bar dka' ba dang / /'tshob kyang mdog ni mi sdug 'gyur/ /bcings na chag bcing phyi mar 'gyur/ /'phres sam 'bur gyur dral gyur tam/ /rtsa dang rgyus pa chad gyur kyang / /rma ni myur du bde bar 'tsho/ /ldang

dang nyal ba la sogs pa'i/ /spyod lam kun la gnod pa med/ /rma kha skyes mtho mi mnyam dang / /sra zhing rab na 'tsho ba dka'/ /'jam zhing mnyam la na ba med/ /rma ni myur du dag cing 'tshob/ /rma ni yun ring sha chung dang / /rtsub pas 'byor par ma gyur na/ /

nad gzhi dus tshigs ji bzhin du/ /sman dang lo mas dgab par bya/ /ma rnying gzhon zhing bu ga med/ /kun nas legs par khebs pa dang / /phyis shing mi rtsub lo ma ni/ /'o ma can shing stag pa dang / /ardzu na dang ka dam+ba'i/ /lo ma yis ni g.yogs par

bya/ /mdze dang me yis tshig pa dang / /'bus zos gcin nad sbrang rtsi 'dra/ /byi ba sbrul gyi dug dang ni/ /thal sman rno dang dug gis pho/ /rma ni bcing bar mi bya zhing / /sha 'drul gzhang khar mi bzad rnags/ /'drul zhing tsha dang na bcas par/ /skrangs skams

med bal mi bcing ngo / /rma gang legs par ma bsrungs par/ /sbrang ma srin bu 'jug byed de/ /de yis zos pas na ba dang / /skrang dang rnag khrag 'dzag par byed/ /der ni bkru dang dag par ni/ /bye'u rug la sogs sde tshan sbyar/ /sap+ta par+Ni ka rany+dza/ /arka dang

ni nim pa dang / /ra tsha dang ni shing tsha rnams/ /ba gcin dang ni btags pa yi/ /lde gu de la bsku ba dang / /thal sman chu ni blugs pas phan/ /yang na sha rlon gyis g.yogs la/ /de ni myur du dbyung bar bya/ /'di ni nang na skyon bcas pas/ /myur du

'tshob bar mi bya ste/ /de ni gnod pa'ang chung ngus kyang / /slar zhing 'grams par 'gyur ba yin/ /'tshob par gyur kyang ma zhu dang / /drag shul bud med bsten stsogs spang / /zla ba drug gam bdun gyi bar/ /cho ga 'bad pas bsrung bar bya/ /gnas

skabs de dang der ni byung gyur tshe/ /nad gzhi la stsogs stobs kyis rjes 'brangs te/ /phyi ma nas bshad rgya cher legs brtags la/ /thabs ni de dang de yis 'bad de gso/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /mdo'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o// //

de nas thal sman rnon po dang me btsa' gdab pa'i cho ga'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /gtsags spyad lcags spyad rjes 'dra ba/ /mang po kun las thal sman mchog /dka' ba rnams su'ang bcad pa'am/ /dbug pa la stsogs byed par 'gyur/ /gtsags bus gdab par

dka' ba la'ang / /de yis bsgrub par rung ba dang / /shin tu gso dka'i nad rnams la/ /gang zhig btung du'ang rung ba yin/ /de ni gzhang 'brum me drod nyams/ /rde'u 'gags sbyar dug skran stsogs btung / /sme ba sha bkra sna 'thor dang / /phyi rol gzhang 'brum tshor

med mdze/ /thor bu 'brum phran mtshan bar rdol/ /rma log stsogs la byug par bya/ /khrag mkhris rlung can nad stobs chung / /rims dang tshad 'khru snying klad nad/ /skya rbab yi ga 'chus pa dang / /rab rib can la slon khrus btang / /lus kun khyab pa'i 'or nad dang / /

'jigs dang sbrum ma zla mtshan 'dzag /pho mtshan mo mtshan skrangs pa dang / /byis pa rgan po zas ma zhu/ /rtsa bo che dang rus tshigs gnad/ /rus pa gzhon nu chu ba rtsa/ /lto bsrubs mgul pa lte ba dang / /sha srab phyogs dang rlig pa dang / /pho mtshan bu ga sen mo

phrag /mig mchu ma gtogs mig nad rnams/ /tsha grang char dang yul rmus tshe/ /gnyi ga'ang gtang bar mi bya'o/ /mu ka ka nag sha mya ka /chu shing pa ri ba tra ka /a shwa ka r+Na 'dzam bu'i shing / /pa la sha dang a po ta/ /en+d+ra br-ik+Sha arga dang / /nag+ha ma la

muk+ti ka /sring shing a pa marga dang / /ka ka dza ka tsi tra ka/ /ag+ni man+ta til bca' sga/ /rlon shing rtsa ba la stsogs bcas/ /dum bur yongs su gtubs pa dang / /ko sha ta ka rnam bzhi dang / /nas kyi sog ma gram rnams/ /rlung med gnas su

bsags nas de/ /rdo leb steng du so sor gzhag /mu ka ka yi phung po dang / rdo thal rdo ni bcug par bya/ /de nas til gyi sdong bus bsreg /tshig nas me ni shi ba dang / /rdo thal thal ba logs shig dbye/ /thal ba gzhan dag bre gang ste/ /mu ka'i

thal lhag blangs nas ni/ /so sor phye ste chu dang gcin/ /srang stong dag dang bsres nas bzhu/ /tshags ni bzang pos de btsags la/ /ji srid 'byar bag dmar zhing dngas/ /rno bar gyur pa'i bar du ni/ /thal ba'i dngas ma de blangs la/ /lcags snod bzang por

bskol zhing dkrugs/ /de nas 'tshod par byed pa der/ /rdo thal bsregs rdo'i dum bu dang / /nya phyis k+Shi ra pa ka dang / /dung gi lte ba lcags snod gzhug /me mdog can du lan mang bya/ /thal sman cha ni phul gang dang / /me bsad de nyid dang btags la/ /lde gu der

ni gzhug par bya/ /khyim bya rma bya bya rgod dang / /kang+ka phug ron rtug pa dang / /bya dang rkang bzhi'i mkhris pa dang / /ba bla ldong ros lan tshwa rnams/ /zhib btags bcug bya de nas ni/ /gzar bus de yang kun tu dkrugs/ /gang tshe lbu bar bcas par khol/ /chu

bur sbom ska lde gu 'dra/ /de tshe phab la grangs pa dang / /lcags snod bcug ste nas nang gzhug /'di ni thal sman 'bring po yin/ /'jam po ma btags phar bcug la/ /gsur la slar ni gdon par bya/ /rnon por snga ma bzhin bcug la/ /lang+ka ling+ka dan+ti dang / /shu

dag pong nga tsi tra ka / swa rtsi ka dang khron bu dang / /shing kun ka rany+dza'i lo ma/ /ta la'i lo ma kha ru tsha'i/ /phye bcug zhag bdun de gzhag bya/ /rnon po de ni rlung bad kan/ /tshil skyes thor bu tshogs la btang / /'di nyid nad tshabs 'bring la 'bring / /'jam po khrag

mkhris gzhang 'brum la'o/ /mthu bskyed phyir ni 'o ma chu/ /thal sman chu ni slar yang gzhug /shin tu rno min 'jam dang mnyen/ /'byar bag sna rno dkar ba dang / /rtse can bde bar 'jil ba dang / /mi 'dzag byugs na nad mi che/ /thal sman yon tan bcu dang ldan/ /

gtsags bu me btsa'i las kyang byed/ /dkrugs pas gzhibs pa lta bu dang / /lus ni btsir ba lta bu dang / /nad kyi rjes 'gro snyegs pas na/ /rtsa ba nas ni 'byin par byed/ /las byas nad dang bral nas kyang / /rang nyid bar zhi bar 'gyur/ /thal sman gyis
