ni gso ba'i nad/ /mtshon bcad brud pa'am gtar ga bya/ /thal sman thur ma gos kyis ni/ /dkris pa bsgos te glan nas su/ /grangs brgya'i bar du bsdad nas phyi/ /de la gzhang 'brum bskus gos kyis/ /g.yogs te lag pas dgab par bya/ /mig mchu'i

nad la mig mchu bzlog /mig 'bras nag po ras bal gyis/ /bkab ste legs par byug par bya/ /thal sman pad lo tsam srab bsku/ /sna yi bu ga'i thor bu ni/ /nyi ma la bltas 'dug pa la/ /sna rtse legs par btag nas ni/ /grangs ni lnga bcu'i bar du

gzhag /rna ba'i thor bu la de bzhin/ /thal sman bskus pa'i 'og tu ni/ /phyis la legs nyes rtogs bya ste/ /legs tshig mar dang sbrang rtsi bsku/ /'o ma rang skyur zho ga chus/ /dbal bsad de nas mar bcas pa'i/ /mngar dang bsil bas byug par bya/ /

bza' btung bad kan bskyed pa dang / /bsrul pa'i phyir ni sbyin par bya/ /gal te rtsa ba brtan gyur pas/ /thal sman gyis bsregs mi 'drul na/ /'u su skyur snyigs shing mngar dang / /til gyi lde gus de tshe bsku/ /til gyi lde gu shing mngar bcas/ /mar gyis

bskus na rma 'tshob byed/ /smin pa 'dzam bu ltar kun gnag /legs tshos de las go bzlog pa/ /dmar zhing na la g.ya' stsogs byed/ /bsregs nyes yin te de slar bsreg /bsregs drags khrag ni 'dzag pa dang / /brgyal zhing tsha dang rims stsogs 'gyur/ /

gzhang khar bsregs drags khyad par du/ /'gags pa'am shas cher 'byung bar 'gyur/ /khu ba zad par 'gyur ba'am/ /gzhang kha 'byung bas 'chi bar 'gyur/ /snar drags sna yi mtshul bar ni/ /nyams pa'am yang na yo ba'am/ /yul

ni 'dzin mi nus par 'gyur/ /rna ba stsogs pa'ang de dang 'dra/ /'dir ni mchog tu skyur ba blugs/ /shing mngar mar dang til btags byug /rlung dang mkhris pa sel ba dang / /bsil pa'i spyod pa thams cad phan/ /skyur ba'i reg pa bsil bas na/ /thal

sman de dang 'dres gyur na/ /de yis myur du mngar 'gyur bas/ /skyur bas tsha ba shin tu 'jil/ /me btsa' thal sman las mchog ste/ /des bsregs pas ni slar mi 'byung / /sman dang thal sman mtshon spyad kyis/ /ma grub par yang grub byed yin/ /pags pa sha dang

rtsa rgyus dang / /tshigs dang rus stsogs de la gdab/ /sme ba mdze nad glad nad dang / /mgo bo'i gzhogs phyed na stsogs la/ /pags bsregs ras bal ba lang so/ /me shel mda' smyug stsogs me gdab/ /gzhang 'brum rmen bu mtshan bar rdol/ /bu ga rma

longs la stsogs la/ /sha bsreg spra tshil mar bsregs dang / /bu ram 'dzam bu'i chu yis bsreg /pags pa 'jar dang khrag ma chod/ /thig le gnag stsogs pags nad na/ /de dag nyid kyi rtsa bsreg go/ /bsreg min thal sman bkag pa dang / /nang na mtshon

lus rma chen 'byung / /khrag zags pa dang lto dral ba'o/ /legs bsreg mar dang sbrang rtsis bsku/ /snum dang bsil bas byug par bya/ /legs pa'i mtshan ma khrag mi dbyung / /sgra can chu bur phre'u 'byung / /ta la'i 'bras smin thi ba 'dra/ /na ba chung zhing 'tshob pa

sla/ /bag med pas bsregs thams cad dang / /bsregs nyes bsregs ni drags pa dang / /ma tshos mtshan nyid dang bcas bzhi/ /ma tshos pags mdog mi sdug tsha/ /chu bur 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /bsregs nyes chu bur che rab tsha/ /bsregs drags pas ni sha

'phyang dang / /pags pa 'khums shing rab tu tsha/ /dud pa 'khyims pa lta bu dang / /rtsa stsogs 'khums shing skom dang brgyal/ /rma yi gting zab 'chi bar 'gyur/ /mtshos pa ni me phrad cing / /tsha ba'i sman ni gtang bar bya/ /khrag ska shin tu na bar 'gyur/

zags par gyur na nad tshabs chung / /bsregs nyes bsil dang dro ba'i sman/ /dang por btang na de 'og bsil/ /bsregs legs na ni cu gang dang / /p+lag sha tsan+dan btsag yug snam/ /sle tres bcas pa mngar bcas bsku/ /de 'og mkhris me dbal

ltar spyad/ /bsregs drags mkhris pa me dbal gyi/ /cho ga thams cad myur du spyad/ /snum gyis shin tu bsregs drags pa/ /der ni rtsub pa'i cho ga'ang bya/ /snying po gsang ba lta bu ni/ /gnas 'dir rdzogs par byas pa yin/ /'dir don phra ba mdor

bshad kyi/ /rgya cher kun tu bstan pa yin/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /mdo'i gnas kyi le'u sum cu tham pa'o// //yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /mdo'i gnas te gnas dang po rdzogs so// //de nas lus kyi

rum du zhugs pa'i gnas dang po bshad par bya'o/ /de yang sngon gyi drang srong chen po rgyun shes kyi bu la stsogs pas 'di skad bshad do/ /khu khrag skyon med par sems can/ /rang las nyon mongs kyis bskul nas/ /tshogs pas mngal chags 'gyur te/ /gtsub

shing las ni me 'byung mtshungs/ /sa bon bdag nyid 'byung ba che/ /phra mo sems kyi rjes 'gro dang / /ma yi kha zas dngas ma las/ /rim gyis mngal du rnam par 'phel/ /ji ltar nyi ma'i zer gyi me/ /me shel dang ni phrad gyur pa'i/ /shing la 'gro bar mi snang ste/ /sems

can mngal gnas de dang 'dra/ /rgyu yi rjes su 'gro bas na/ /'bras bu de dang skal mnyam nyid/ /sems can skye gnas sna tshogs 'dzin/ /zangs ma la stsogs bzhu dang mtshungs/ /de bas khu ba mang ba las/ /phal cher skyes par skye 'gyur la/ /zla mtshan mang bas

bud med de/ /de gnyis mnyam las ma ning 'gyur/ /khu khrag rlung gis mang du phye/ /ji lta ba las mtshe mar 'gyur/ /skye gnas mi mthun gzugs mi sdug /gnod pa'i dri mas skye bar 'gyur/ /bud med zla ba re re'i khrag /dngas ma las byung

zhag gsum 'dzag /lo ni bcu gnyis yan chad nas/ /lnga bcu'i bar 'dzag de nas zad/ /bud med lo ni bcu drug lon/ /skyes pa nyi shu lon dang 'dus/ /mngal gnas lam dang khu ba khrag /rlung dang sems ni dag gyur pa'i/ /pu ni stobs dang ldan pa skye/ /de

las lo ni ma tshang ba'i/ /nad can tshe thung skal ngan pa'i/ /bu chags pa'am chags mi 'gyur/ /rlung stsogs rul dang mdud pa can/ /dri ma skyon dang ldan bshad pa'i/ /khu khrag sa bon byed mi nus/ /rang gi mtshan mas skyon byung bshad/ /khrag gis rul zhing bad

kan dang / /rlung gis mdud pa can 'drar 'gyur/ /khrag dang mkhris pas rnag 'dra la/ /rlung dang mkhris pas zad par 'gyur/ /'di dag gso dka' nyes gsum ldan/ /bshang gci 'dra ba gsor mi rung / /rlung la sogs pas gnod gyur pa/ /rang gi sman gyis

gso bar bya/ /rul la da ta ka'i me tog /seng ldeng se 'bru ardzu na/ /mar dang bskol ba blud pa'am/ /a sa na stsogs bskol ba blud/ /khu khrag mdud 'dra pa la sha'i/ /thal ba sru sru'i rtsa bas phan/ /rnag 'dra pa ru sha ka dang / /n+ya gro d+ha stsogs bskol

ba blud/ /khu ba zad la ro tsa'i dpyad/ /bshang 'dra slon khrus shing kun dang / /pu shel tsi tra ka bskol blud/ /zla mtshan mdud 'dra pa tha dang / /tsha gsum dug mo nyung bskol blud/ /zla mtshan rul dang rnag 'dra la/ /tsan+dan blud bya phyis bshad pa'i/ /gsang ba'i

nad gsor bshad kun dang / /'jam rtsir bcas pa gang yin bya/ /khu ba dkar zhing lci ba dang / /dmar dang bska dang mang ba dang / /mar dang sbrang rtsi til mar 'dra/ /mngal du legs chags zla mtshan yang / /rgya skyegs khu ba ri bong khrag /'dra zhing bkrus na dag 'gyur

bzang / /khu khrag skyon med nad med cing / /phan tshun du ni chags pa dang / /ro tsa'i snum gyis brtas pa dang / /sbyang ba byas shing 'jam rtsi btang / /mchog tu skyes pa 'o ma mar/ /mngar ba'i sman gyis brta bar bya/ /bud med til mar sha dag ni/ /mkhris pa

skyed pa nye bar spyad/ /bud med nyam chung bzhin ras dang / /nu ma rked pa 'gul ba dang / /mig dang dku g.yo skyes pa 'dod/ /zla mtshan ldan par shes par bya/ /dper na nyi ma nub pa na/ /pad+ma'i kha ni zum par 'gyur/ /de bzhin zla mtshan dus 'das pa'i/ /

mngal ni khu ba len mi 'gyur/ /zla ba gcig tu bsags pa'i khrag /rtsa chen gnyis las dus su ni/ /cung zad gnag cing dri bral ba/ /rlung gis mngal gyi sgo ru 'byin/ /de nas zla mtshan mthong nyid nas/ /zhag gsum bar du sems dge bsam/ /rgyan dang

khrus ni spang ba dang / /ku sha'i stan la nyal bar bya/ /nas thug 'o mar btsos nyung zad/ /blud cing lto sbyang nyams smad bya/ /lo ma'am rdza skyogs legs par ni/ /bza' zhing 'khrig pa spang bar bya/ /de nas zhag ni bzhi pa la/ /khrus byas gos phreng dkar zhing

gtsang / /pha dang 'dra ba'i bu 'dod cing / /mdun du khyo ni blta bar bya/ /zla mtshan zhag ni bcu gnyis dus/ /de las dang po'i zhag gsum dang / /bcu gcig pa smad tshes zung la/ /bur 'gyur gzhan du bu mor 'gyur/ /de nas bu phyir slob dpon gyis/ /cho ga cho

ga bzhin byas la/ /dmangs rigs phyag 'tshal la brtson pas/ /sngags kyis bya ba med par bya/ /de ltar 'dod spyod don ldan zhing / /yid la 'dod pa'i bu skyed 'gyur/ /bu 'dod bza' bran dben par ni/ /'dod spyad bya zhes dam pa smra/ /gzhan du rigs

bzang las kyang ni/ /bu ngan rigs sreg me 'drar 'gyur/ /ji lta ba yi bu 'dod pa/ /de yi tshal du de yis spyad/ /yul de'i skye bo'i spyod pa dang / /de yi yo byad la bsam bya/ /las mthar skyes pas zhun mar dang / /'o ma 'bras chan bcas pa bza'/ /skar

mkhan lung gis mal khrir ni/ /skyes pa dang po rkang g.yas kyis/ /'dzeg bya bud med g.yon gyis 'dzeg /de yi g.yas logs ngag tu nyal/ /til mar mon sran gre'u sbyar bza'/ /der ni sngags kyi tshig brjod bya/ /a hi ra si/ /a

yu ra si/ sarba taHpra tiSh+Tha si d+ha twa d+ha tu/ /bi d+ha ba twa/ ba d+ha du/ brah+ma brtsa sa b+ha ba zhes bya'o/ /tshangs pa phur bu khyab 'jug dang / /nyi zla tha skar bu gnyis dang / /legs ldan mdza' bo chu lha rnams/ /bdag la dpa' ba'i bu stsol cig /de nas phan tshun spro

bskyed de/ /dga' dang bcas pas gnas par bya/ /bud med der sems gan rkyal gnas/ /yan lag legs par gnas 'dug bya/ /de ltar nyes pa rang gnas 'dug /sa bon legs par 'dzin par 'gyur/ /'phral du mngal chags mtshan ma ni/ /mngal

du sa bon 'dzin pa dang / /'dod ngoms lci dang g.yo ba dang / khrag dang khu ba rjes 'dres dang / /snying 'phar ba dang snyom pa dang / /skom dang rmya dang ba spu ldang / /zla ba dang po mig gsal zhag /bdun nas nur nur po ru 'gyur/ /'dir ni mngal gyi bu skyes

pa/ /gsal bar ma gyur gong du bya/ /skyes bu byed pa 'di stobs ldan/ /las kyang zil gyis gnon par nus/ /skar ma rgyal skyes bu yi gzugs/ /gser ram dngul lam lcags las byas/ /me mdog 'gyur bsregs 'o mar bcug /de ni snyim gang blud

par bya/ /yang na go ra dan+da dang / /a pa marga dzi ba ka /zangs rtsi ba dang sher+ya ka /gcig gam gnyis sam gsum zhig gam/ /thams cad chu la btab pa ni/ /skar ma rgyal la bab tshe blud/ /bri ha ti ni dkar po'i rtsa/ /'o mar btab pa rang nyid kyis/ /

bu 'dod sna khung g.yas par blugs/ /bu mo 'dod na g.yon par blugs/ /lag sma na'i rtsa 'o mar sbyar/ /bu skyed gnas pa rab ster byed/ /de bzhin n+ya gro'i myu gu brgyad/ /sbyar ba sna 'am kha nas btung / /'tsho byed kyi ni sman sde rnams/ /phyi dang nang nas nye bar

sbyar/ /mngal 'dzin yid 'ong phan pa yi/ /khyo dang 'khor gyis bsnyen bkur bya/ /mar gsar zhun mar 'o ma rnams/ /rtag tu de la blud par bya/ /nyal po drags dang rtsol drags dang / /khur dang gos ni lci ba dang / /nyin nyal nub mo gnyid mi log /

stan srab tsog pur 'dug pa dang / /mya ngan khro dang 'jigs dang skyo/ /shugs dang sred pa dgag pa dang / smyung ba lam 'gro rno dang tsha/ /lci dang bshang 'gags zan za dang / /gos dmar gyon dang g.yang sa dang / /khron lta sha za chang 'thungs dang / /gan rkyal

nyal dang bud med dang / /mi 'dod gang yin de kun spang / /de bzhin gtar ga gdab slon khrus/ /mas gtong zla brgyad bar mi bya/ /'di dag gis ni mngal 'jig pa'am/ /dku skams pa'am 'chi bar 'gyur/ /rlung ni skyed par byed pas mngal/ /sgur po 'on

long mi thung 'gyur/ /mkhris pa can gyis spyi ther ser/ /bad kan sha bkra skya rbab 'gyur/ /nad gzhan 'jam zhing bde ba dang / /rnon po ma yin sman gyis gso/ /nur nur po las zla gnyis bar/ /gor gor mer mer nar nar po/ /de las pho mo ma ning

rim/ /de nas gsal 'gyur mtshan ma ni/ /rid cing dku ni lci ba dang / /brgyal skyugs yi ga 'chus pa dang / /glal dang mchil mang snyom bag dang / /spu yi phreng ba gsal ba dang / /skyur la dga' zhing nu ma rgyas/ /nu zhor bcas shing rtse mo gnag /

rkang pa skrangs shing kha zas tsha/ /sred pa sna tshogs nyid du 'gyur/ /'di yi snying ni ma las skyes/ /ma yi snying yang de dang ni/ /'brel pas de phyir sbrum ma ni/ /sred pa dgag par mi bya'o/ /de la gnod par 'gyur ba'ang / /phan dang bsres te cung zad sbyin/ /sred

pa bkag na mngal gyi bu/ /mi sdug pa'am 'jig par 'gyur/ /zla ba gsum par de yi lus/ /mgo bo dpyi gnyis dpung pa gnyis/ /yan lag lnga ni gsal dod 'gyur/ /yan lag phra mo rnams kyang 'byung / /mgo bo sogs dang cha mnyam du/ /bde dang

sdug bsngal shes pa 'byung / /mngal gnas lte ba ma yi ni/ /snying gi rtsa dang 'brel pa'i phyir/ /de yis de ni 'phel 'gyur te/ /zhing gi yur ba dag dang mtshungs/ /bzhi par yan lag gsal dod 'gyur/ /lnga par sems ni gsal bar

'gyur/ /drug par chu ba rtsa dang spu/ /sen mo pags pa mdog stobs 'gyur/ /bdun par dngos po thams cad kyis/ /yan lag kun ni rdzogs par 'gyur/ /mngal gnas nad kyis nyer gzir na/ /de tshe snying dang 'brel pa'i phyir/ /g.ya' dang tsha bar byed

pa dang / /pags gas rma phran 'byung bar 'gyur/ /der ni mar sar rgya shug chu/ /mngar ba'i sman sde bskol ba phan/ /lan tshwa nyung zhing snum bag can/ /yang zhing mngar ba'i kha zas bza'/ /tsan+dan pu shel rtsi'i lde gus/ /brang dang nu ma lto la bsku/ /'bras

bu gsum pa'am e ne ya/ /sha bkra ri bong khrag sbyar bsku/ /ka ra bI ra'i lo ma dang / /til mar bskol bas bskus te mnye/ /pa to la dang nim pa btsod/ /bye'u rug gis kyang bsku bar bya/ /skyer pa shing mngar chu yis ni/ /bkru dang bsku ba bsten par bya/ /

zla ba brgyad par ma dang bu/ /thang re rim gyis gzi mdangs 'pho/ /de yis de gnyis zhum dgar 'gyur/ /byis mdangs ma la mi gnas pas/ /de tshe btsas na mi 'tsho la/ /bud med the tshom bcas skabs 'gyur/ /'dir ni'o ma can blud cing / /mngar ba'i

sman dang bskol ba yi/ /mar gyi 'jam rtsi gtang bya zhing / /phyis rnying pa dag bya ba'i phyir/ /la phug skam dang rgya shug skyur/ /bska ba dang ni bskol ba bsngags/ /sha ta put+pa'i lde gu ni/ /rgyam tsha til mar 'jam rtsi gtang / /de tshe zhag gcig 'das pa

na'ang / /dus su btsas yin de phan chad/ /rlung gis dkur ni bkag gyur na/ /lo yi bar du gnod pa skyed/ /zla dgu lon na snum bcas pa'i/ /'bras chan sha khu blud pa bsngags/ /snum mang nas thug sbyin pa'am/ /sngar bshad pa yi 'jam rtsi gtang / /de

nyid la bcug ras bal ni/ /mtshan mar rtag tu gzhug par bya/ /rlung 'joms lo ma bskol ba'i chu/ /bsgrangs pas nyin re bkrus pa phan/ /zla dgu phan chad lus la ni/ /snum med par ni mi gzhag go/ /nu zho g.yas pa sngar byung zhing / /g.yas logs la

ni brten pa dang / /'dri tshig skyes pa'i ming can smra/ /dga' zhing rmi lam skyes pa mthong / /dku ni g.yas pa mtho ba dang / /mngal yang kun nas zlum pa dag/ /bu skye gzhan du bu mor 'gyur/ /gang yang skyes pa phrad 'dod dang / /glu gar rol mo la dga' dang / /

dri dang phreng chags bu mor skye/ /de 'dres pas ni ma ning 'gyur/ /dku yi dbus ni mtho ba yin/ /mtshe ma logs gnyis mtho bas na/ /lte ba dma' bar 'dug pa yin/ /dgu pa'i dang po nas brtsams te/ /sa phyogs shis shing yo byad ni/ /phun tshogs ldan

par dge ba'i zhag /de ni btsas khyim zhugs par bya'o/ /der ni bud med btsa' myong bas/ /bskor te btsa' ba'i dus bar bsdad/ /deng ngam sang ni bu btsas rtags/ /snyom zhing dku dang mig lhod dub/ /smad du lci zhing yi ga 'chus/ /mchil ma mang zhing

gcin mang 'byung / /brla dang rked pa lto dang rgyab/ /snying dang chu so brla rtsa na/ /mtshan bye na zhing zug pa dang / /'gul zhing 'dzag par 'gyur ba yin/ /rang dbang med gyur rjes su ni/ /de 'og mngal gyi chu 'dzag 'gyur/ /de nas mngal nas las byung rtsom/ /

bkra shis bsrung ba'i cho ga byas/ /lag par 'bras bu skyes ming gzhag /legs bskus chu ni dron mo blugs/ /mar dang bcas pa'i thug pa blud/ /de 'og sa la mal bcas 'dug/ /brla gnyis bkug ste gan rkyal gnas/ /yan lag yang nas yang du bsku/ /

lte ba man chad mnye bya zhing / /glal dang 'chag pa byed du gzhug /de ltas mngal gnas thur du 'byung / /de rtags snying ga las 'phos nas/ /mngal gnas lto bar zhugs nas ni/ /chu so'i steng na gnas par 'gyur/ /de nas dbang med nad ldang ste/ /myur du khri la

gzhag par bya/ /de 'og mngal gnas legs btsir nas/ /de yi mtshan ni dbye bar bya/ /dang por dal gyis btsir bya zhing / /btsa' khar drag tu btsir bar bya/ /de nas bu skye'i sgra dang ni/ /chu dang rlung gis dga' ba skyed/ /btsa' ba'i nad kyis

gzir ba yi/ /sreg bral 'dra ba slar gso bya/ /mngal du thogs na sbrul nag po'i/ /pags pas mo mtshan bdug par bya/ /bya r+Nu'i me tog rtsa ba'am/ /lcam pa'am yang na byi sha l+ya/ /rkang pa'am lag par gdags par bya/ /sha ma dbyung ba'i phyir yang ni/ /de dag

nyid bya de nas bteg /dpung pa gnyis nas bzung ste sbrug /rting pas mjug to rdeg pa dang / /rkub tshos dam du btsir par bya/ /skra yis lkog ma rkan reg bya/ /snu ha'i 'o ma spyi por blugs/ /stag pa ku ba lang+ka li/ /sbrul lpags ru rta yungs kar rnams/ /re

re 'am gnyis sam ma lus pas/ /mo mtshan byug pa'am bdag par bya/ /ru rta'am bal bu'i lde gu ni/ /chang dngas dang ni blug par bya/ /ku lang+tha 'am bal ba dza/ /chang rnyings dag la btab ste blud/ /shu ti nyungs kar zi ra dang / /shi kru tig sna kru drug tres/ /shing

kun ru rta po son cha/ /'o ma ba gcin yungs mar dang / /bskol ba bshang ba'i sgo'am ni/ /mo mtshan nas ni 'jam rtsi btang / /shu ti shu dag ru rta dang / /yungs kar pi pi ling lde gu/ /snum dang lan tshwar bcas pa yi/ /mas gtong sha ma myur du 'byin/ /der

thogs rgyu ni rlung yin te/ /de bcom sha ma myur du 'byung / /yang na lag bkrus sor mo bregs/ /mkhas pa yis ni drangs te dbyung / /sha ma byung na mo mtshan dang / /yan lag til mar gyis byugs mnye/ /mngal nad gzer ni chu so mgo /lto ba gzer la thal sman

ni/ /rnon po zhib tu btags pa dag /mar ram chu tshan sbyar ba blud/ /'u su bskol chu bu ram dang / /tsha gsum dri bzangs gsum btab blud/ /de nas byes pa'i nyer spyod kyis/ /byis pa ma mas skyong du gzhug /bu btsas bkres yod til mar dang / /mar las tshad

chen blud bya ba/ /tsha ba lnga phye ran btab sbyin/ /de 'og bu ram chu dron nam/ /rlung 'joms sman bskol chu blud de/ /des ni rlung nad ldang mi 'gyur/ /khrag ngan dag kyang dag par byed/ /rim 'di zhag ni gnyis gsum bya/ /snum mi 'phrod la cho ga 'di/ /snum

med par ni bsten par bya/ /'thungs nas lto ba til mar dang / /mar bskus nas ni gos kyis dkri/ /zhu nas khrus byas thug pa ni/ /sngar bshad sman dang bskol ba blud/ /zhag gsum phan chad bi da ri/ /la stsogs sman sde'i khu bar bskol/ /nas thug phan

zhing snum mang ba'am/ /goms pa'i dbang las 'o thug blud/ /zhag bdun phan chad de la ni/ /rim gyis brta ba'i cho ga phan/ /zhag ni bcu gnyis ma lon par/ /sha ni sbyin par mi bya'o/ /mngal du 'phel dang btsas pa'i nad/ /gsher dang khrag 'dzag btsir ba

yis/ /nad de gso dka' yin pa'i phyir/ /btsas tshe 'bad de rim gro bya/ /de ltar zla ba phyed dang gnyis/ /kha zas bsdams stsogs dang bral nas/ /btsas pa'i ming dang bral ba'am/ /zla mtshan byung bar gyur bar du'o/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa

las/ /lus kyi gnas kyi le'u dang po'o// //de nas lus kyi rum du zhugs pa'i nad kyi bye brag bshad par bya'o/ /sbrum mas spang bar bya ba dag /bsten pa'am nad kyi dbang las ni/ /zla mtshan byung ba'am gzer zhing na/ /phyi nang snum dang bsil thabs bya/

uR+shi pad+ma tsan+dan dang / /'o ma can shing shun pa yi/ /lde gur mar ni bsku ba dang / /ras bal sbangs pa bshang sgo dang / /mo mtshan gnyis su them bur gzhug/ /lan brgyar bkrus pa'i mar gyis ni/ /bsku ba'am bud med de yi lus/ /uR+shi ra stsogs chu nang gzhug/

kha ra sbrang rtsi ku mu ta/ /pad+ma ut+pal ge sar ni/ /'o ma'i mar sbyar ka she ru/ /sh-ing+ga ta ka sbyin bar bya/ /gan+d+ha pri yang ku dang ni/ /chu skyes rnams kyi rtsa ba dang / /u du m+ba' ra gzhon nu dang / /ldan pa'i 'o ma skom du blud/ /sA lu'i rtsa ba ka ko la/ /ba la gnyis

dang shing mngar dang / /bu ram shing dang bskol ba yi/ /'o ma sA lu rtsa snar chan/ /sbrang rtsi kha rar bcas pa ni/ /skam sa'i sha khu ldan par bza'/ /bkru sman ma gtogs khrag mkhris kyi/ /gso dpyad bshad pa thams cad bya/ /

zla gsum ma tshang bar du ni/ /khrag dgag phyir ni 'bad par bya/ /be'u snabs ldan pa'ang dgag par bya/ /der ni bsil pan rtsub pa dang / /smyung dang gla sgang uR+shir/ /sle tres 'u su a ral/ /byi tsher dang ni parba ta/ /tsan+dan ba la bong nga dkar/ /bskol

ba'i chu ni blud par bya/ /rtsa 'bru las g.yos zas sbyin dang / /mung+ga sogs khus be+e'u snabs ni/ /bsal la snum stsogs sngon bzhin gtang / /mngal ni rnam par 'jig gyur na/ /mngal nang dag par bya phyir dang / /nad kyis gzir ba mi dran phyir/ /chang

rno ci nus btung bar bya/ /de nas rtsa ba lnga po ni/ /chung ngu'i thug pa rtsub de blud/ /chang mi 'thungs la thug pa ni/ /tsha ba lnga dang bskol ba dang / /bil ba la sogs lnga dang bskol/ /til dang rtsa 'bru chan sbyin bya/ /zla ba dang mnyam nyin zhag rim/ /mngal

'jig pa la thug stsogs sbyin/ /yang zhing snum dang lan tshwa med/ /drod bskyed ldan la phan pa yin/ /nad dang lus zungs ljan ljin ni/ /skam phyir cho ga 'di bya'o/ /de phan chad zas snum 'jam rtsi/ /stobs skyed drod skyed 'tsho byed sbyin/ /snying por ldan

pas cher skyes la/ /mo mtshan nas ni khrag 'dzag pas/ /mngal du skye bar mi nus la/ /lto na 'gul dang bcas par gnas/ /de ni so na gnas shes bya/ /des ni lto ba rgyas mi 'gyur/ /mya ngan smyung dang rtsub sogs sam/ /yang na mngal nas khrag 'dzag pas/ /

mngal du skye bar mi nus la/ /rlung 'khrug skam zhing bskams gyur pa'i/ /mngal de klu yi lto zhes bya/ /'dir ni lto ba rgyas gyur yang / /'grib cing yun rings lon na 'phar/ /de gnyis brta dang rlung 'joms sman/ /mngar ba dag dang bskol ba yi/ /mar

dang 'o ma tshim sbyin zhing / /skyes ma thag pa'i sha sbyin bya/ /de gnyis kyis ni tshim bya'i phyir/ /khyogs dang bzhon par bskyon te bskul/ /sngon po zhes bya mi 'gul la/ /khra dang ba lang nya sha dang / /sgra sgrogs bya dang rma bya yi/ /sha khu mar ni mang po dang / /mon

sran gre'u dag dang ni/ /la phug dag gi khu ba blud/ /bil ba gzhon nu ma sha til/ /phye dang 'o ma sbyar ba blud/ /tshil bcas sha dang sbrang chang sbyin/ /rked pa bsku ba bsten par bya/ /de ni rtag tu dga' ba skyed/ /de 'dras mngal ni 'phel bar 'gyur/ /rgyas

pa gzhan du lo tshang nas/ /dka' bas btsas pa'am skye mi 'gyur/ /sbrum ma rtug pa 'gags gyur na/ /snum mam mthun pa'i 'jam rtsi yis/ /myur ba kho nar gso bar bya/ /gzhan du sbrum ma bu btsas 'chi/ /mngal du nang rab bsags pas sam/ /

mi mthun pa'am gnod gzhan gyis/ /nang du shi na lto grang zhing / /rengs dang sbo dang nad tshabs che/ /mngal mi 'gul dang mgo 'khor skom/ /dbugs 'byin dka' zhing dub pa dang / /dga' ba med cing mi 'gyur dang / /dbang med nad ni mang po 'byung / /de

la chu dron blugs pa dang / /bu ram spang ma lan tshwar bcas/ /btags pas mo mtshan bsku ba dang / /shal ma li dang zar ma ya/ /khu ba mar dang lde gur byas/ /nang du yang dang yang du gzhug/ /sngags dang sha ma 'byin sbyor bya/ /gal te bu shi ma byung na/ /

de nas sman pas rgyal po la/ /zhu la de 'bad myur du dbyung / /shal ma li yi thang chu mar/ /bcas pas lag pa mo mtshan bsku/ /lag pas dbyung nus de nyid kyi/ /lus ni legs par mi gnas na/ /gcus shing bsgyur dang bzlog pa dang / /btsir dang 'degs

gzhag la stsogs kyis/ /lugs dang mthun par drangs nas ni/ /mngal gyi sgor ni drang por drang / /gang zhig rkang lag mgo bo ni/ /yon por mngal du gnas gyur dang / /rkang pa gcig ni mtshan du 'byung / /gnyis pa bshang sgor chud yon po/ /de ni 'gags pa

zhes bya ste/ /mtshon gyis bcad par 'os pa yin/ /las der dkyil 'khor sor gdub can/ /gtsags bu gnyis ni bsngags pa yin/ /'phel gtsags rtse mo rno bas ni/ /mngal du gtang bar mi bya'o/ /dang por mgo bo'i thod pa ni/ /phye la rnam par dbyung

bar bya/ /de nas mchan khung brang kos ko/ /rkan gyi phyogs ni gang rung bar/ /gtang de mngal gyi lcags kyu ni/ /brtan po dag gis mkhas pas drang / /mgo bo ma phye mig sbubs dang / /mkhur tshos nas kyang drang bya zhing / /phrag pa thogs na dpung par bcad/ /lto ba rlung gis

sbos gyur pa/ /nang grol dbral tam rgyu ma ni/ /phyi rol du ni bton te dbyung / /rked par thogs na de bzhin du/ /de yi rus tshigs dbye bar bya/ /rlung gi dbang gis yan lag gang / /mngal du thogs pa de dang de/ /dum bur gtubs la legs phyung ste/ /'bad de bud med

bsrung bar bya/ /rlung ni rnam par 'khrugs gyur pas/ /mngal gyi gnas skabs sna tshogs byed/ /de phyir de ni mkhas pa yis/ /gnas skabs dag ni bltas te spyad/ /ma dang lhan cig 'chi 'gyur bas/ /gson po mngal du gcad mi bya/ /'chi bar 'gyur ba dag la ni/ /

yud tsam btang snyoms gzhag mi bya/ /mo mtshan 'gags dang nyams pa dang / /gzer nad dbugs kyis nyam thag dang / /sgregs pa mnam dang lus grang ba'i/ /mngal du bu shi bud med spang / /de nas sha ma thon na/ /sman pas sngon bzhin dbyung bar bya/ /de ltar zug

rngu phyung nas ni/ /chu dron gyis ni bkru bar bya/ /lus la snum gyis byugs pa dang / /mtshan du ras bal snum can gzhug /des ni mo mtshan 'jam 'gyur zhing / /de yis gzer ba zhi bar 'gyur/ /la la phud dang bong ba dkar/ /ra sna shing kun sug smel dang / /tsha ba lnga yi phye ma

snum/ /sbyar ba'am lde gu chu bskol blud/ /de bzhin nad rnams 'dzag pa dang / /tshor ba zhi phyir zhag gsum ni/ /pu tse shel dang bong nga dkar/ /ba sha ka yi shun pa dang / /shing kun te dzo ba ti rnams/ /btags pa'i phye ma'am bskol ba blud/ /de nas zhag bdun bar du ni/ /

snum nyid nye bar btung bar bya/ /dgongs ka chang ni rnying pa dang / /de bzhin legs sbyar chang btung bya/ /shiR+sha ka ku bar bskol sbangs/ /ras bal mo mtshan nang du gzhug /bla brnan gzhan dag gang byung ba/ /de la rang gis gso bas gso/ /rlung 'joms sman ni 'o mar

bskol/ /zhag bcu'i bar du bza' ba phan/ /zhag bcu'i bar du sha khu btung / /de phan chad ni yang zhing phan // /nyung ngu bza' zhing snum bsku dugs/ /ba la'i til mar la sogs bsten/ /zla ba bzhi lon phan chad de/ /de ni rim gyis ci bder spyad/ /ba le'i rtsa ba'i khu ba

ni/ /cha drug 'o ma de mnyam dang / /nas dang rgya shug ku lang+tha/ /rtsa ba bcu pa'i cha gcig dang / /bskol ba'i cha ni char byas pa'i/ /til mar cha ni bcu bzhi dang / /med gnyis dang thang shing bcod/ /ra mnye ba gnyis tsan+dan dang / /thal tres ru rta dzi ba ka /rgya spos

rgyam tsha zangs rtsi ba/ /gla sgang rdo dreg shu dag dang / /pur+Na rna ba a ka ru/ /a shwa gan+d+ha nye shing dang / /k+Shi ra ku shu shing mngar dang / /ba la ras shu ti dang / /pa r+Ni gnyis dang sug smel dang / /shing tsha gan+d+ha b+har dra rnams/ /zhib tu btags pa'i lde gu dang / /til mar me chung la

bskol ba/ /rlung nad thams cad sel ba'i mchog /bu btsas byis pa rus pa gnad/ /snad dang skem la bsngags pa yin/ /rims skran gdon dang smyo byed dang / /gcin nad rgyu ma skyes pa sel/ /thang la 'bar gyis mngal gyi ni/ /nad rnams sel ba'i mchog tu bshad/ /ma ni

shi tshe chu sor ni/ /mngal gnas gal te dkur 'phar na/ /de ni skye ba'i dus yin pas/ /dbral te byis pa myur du dbyung / /shi ri ka yi sa bon dang / /pa ya s+ya dang thang shing bzhi/ /til nag sru sru'i rtsa ba dang / /btsod dang nye'u shing zhes bya bzhi/ /bri sha dang ni pa ya s+ya/

ut+pal thal tres pri yang ku/ /byi tsher thal tres ra sna dang / /pad+ma tsa ri shing mngar dang / /bri ha te gnyis tang pal dang / /'o shing myu gu shun pa dmar/ kr-iSh+Na pa r+Ni ba la dang / /shi kru gze ma sle tres dang / /shring ga sta rga rgun pad rtsa/ /shing mngar kha ra ka she ru/ /tshigs

bcad phyed kyis rdzogs bshad pa'i/ /bdun pa 'di dag 'o mar sbyar/ /zla ba bdun la rim bzhin du/ /mngal 'dzag pa la gtang bar bya/ /ka bid ta dang bil ba dang / /bri ha ti dang bu ram dang / /kaN+Da ka ri pa to la'i/ /rtsa ba bskol bar byas pa dang / /de

bzhin 'o ma sha rnams ni/ /zla ba brgyad pa'i tshe na'ang btang / /dgu par thal tres er Na dang / /pa ya s+ya mngar gtang / /zla ba bcu par pa ya s+ya/ /'o ma dang ni bskol ba blud/ /yang na shing mngar dong gra dang / /thang shing 'o mar sbyar ba sbyin/ /bud med mngal du rlung

gis khrag bsgongs te/ /gnas pa de ni mngal chags cha 'dra bas/ /bu chags yin zhes mi mkhas pa dag smra/ /sman kha rno dros khrag ni 'ba' zhig zags/ /blun pos mngal gnas 'byung pos zos zhes zer/ /mdangs 'phrog yin phyir de lus mngon sum du/ /'phrog

par mi snang ba 'am 'byung po ni/ /gzhung 'dor ma ni btang snyoms 'jog mi byed/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ lus kyi gnas kyi le'u gnyis pa'o// //de nas lus kyi yan lag gi bye brag bstan pa bshad par bya'o/ /mdor na yan lag rnam drug

ste/ /mgo dang khog pa dpung pa gnyis/ /brla gnyis yin te de'i nying lag/ /mig snying lag pa rkang pa stsogs/ /sgra dang reg bya gzugs ro dri/ /go rims bzhin du nam mkha' rlung / /me chu sa yi yon tan yin/ /yon tan re res phyi ma skyed/ /de la mkha' las lus

bu ga/ /rna ba sgra dang khong stong nyid/ /rlung las reg pa lpags dbugs 'byin/ /me las mig dang gzugs 'ju nyid/ /chu las lce dang ro dang gsher/ /sa las sna dri rus pa yin/ /'dir ni ma las skyes 'jam khrag/ /sha dang rkang dang gzhang kha stsogs/ /pha skyes brtan dang khu

chu dang / /rtsa bo che rus skra stsogs yin/ /sems las sems byung dbang po rnams/ /skye gnas sna tshogs rnams kyang 'byung / /goms pa las byung nad med tshe/ /le lo med stobs gzi mdangs yin/ /dngas ma las byung lus skyed dang / /gnas dang 'phel dang mi brkam nyid/ /

snying stobs can gtsang yod par lta/ /chos dkar la dga' blo gros ldan/ /rdul can mang du smra ba dang / /nga rgyal tshul 'chos khro phrag dog /mun pa 'jigs dang mi shes dang / /gnyid dang le lo skyo ba'o/ /de ltar 'byung ba'i rang bzhin lus/ /de la khrag skyes lpags rim bdun/ /

'o ma las ni spris ma bzhin/ /smin pa'i tshe na 'byung bar 'gyur/ /lus zungs gnas ni nang gsher gyi/ /rang gi drod kyis smin pas na/ /bad kan rgyus pa shams g.yogs/ /char bshad shing gi snying po 'dra/ /bdun po de dag gnas bdun te/ /dang por khrag yin gzhan rim

bzhin/ /bad kan ma zhu mkhris zhu ba/ /rlung dang gcin gyi gnas su bshad/ /bud med mngal gnas brgyad pa ste/ /mkhris pa zhu ba'i gnas par gnas/ /'di la nang grol yan lag gnas/ /snying glo mchin mkhris mcher mkhal ma/ /pho ba grod pa rgyu ma dang / /gnye

ma long ka lgang pa'o/ /srog gi gnas ni rnam bcu ste/ /mgo dang lce yi rtsa ba dang / /lkog ma khrag dang snying lte ba/ /chu so khu chu dngas dang gzhang / /lus la rtsa dra chu ba che/ /re re bcu drug yod par bshad/ /pir 'dra drug dang srubs 'dra bdun/ /pho mtshan lce dang mgo la

brten/ /de dag gtsags bus gdab mi rung / /sha yi thag pa rnam pa bzhi/ /rus pa'i tshogs 'dus bcu bzhi yod/ /mtshams ni dgu phrag gnyis yod la/ /so dang sen mor bcas pa yi/ /rus pa sum brgya drug cu yin/ /thang la 'bar ni sum brgyar 'dod/ /tshigs

ni nyis brgya rtsa bcur 'dod/ /rgyun shes bus ni tshigs kyi grangs/ /nyis stong dag ni yod par 'dod/ /rgyus pa dgu brgya skyes pa la/ /sha ni spar tshad lnga brgya yod/ /bud med kyi ni nu ma dang / /mo mtshan la gnas nyi shu lhag /rtsa chen rtsa ba snying la gnas/ /de dag kun

gyis lus kun khyab/ /dngas ma'i bdag nyid mdangs su 'gyur/ /de ni phra ba kun dang 'brel/ /rtsa ba sbom zhing rtse rab phra/ /lo ma'i rtsa ltar gyes pa yin/ /gyes pa de las rtsa phran ni/ /bdun brgya dag tu gyur pa yin/ /de la yan lag re re zhing / /brgyad brgyad der ni gnas

pa yin/ /de la dbug par mi bya ba/ /rtsa yi dra ba 'dzin zhes bya/ /nang na gnas pa gsum po yin/ /rked par bcu drug phrag gnyis te/ /de las brla rtsar gnyis gnyis dang / /rked pa'i gnad rnams gnyis gnyis te/ /de brgyad gtsags bus

gdab mi bya/ /rtsib logs gnyis la rtsa bcu drug /de las gyen 'gro zhes bya spang / /rgyab tu rtsa ni nyi shu bzhi/ /sgal tshigs kyi ni ngos gnyis na/ /de las gnyis gnyis gyen 'gro ba/ /mtshon gyis gdab par mi bya'o/ /rgyab bzhin lto na

gnas rtsa de/ /pho mtshan steng na gnas pa dang / /sbu yi phreng ba'i ngos gnyis rtsa/ /gnyis gnyis mtshon gyis mi gdab bo/ /brang la gnas pa bzhi bcu las/ /bcu bzhi dbug par mi bya ste/ /nu ma jing de yi rtsa ba dang / /snying ga dag ni so sor gnyis/ /gnod bral gnad ni gnyis po dang / /mi gsal

zhes bya gnyis kyi gnyis/ /mgrin pa ltag pa 'dra ba las/ /sngon po mjing pa ltag pa dang / /'gal pa dang ni ma mo brgyad/ /bcu drug yongs su spang bar bya/ /'gram pa bcu drug de las gnyis/ /mtshams ni 'brel par byed pa spang / /lce yang 'gram pa dang

'dra ste/ /'og gi ro tshor byed gnyis dang / /tshig 'byin byed pa gnyis po spang / /sna yi rtsa ni nyi shu bzhi/ /de las dri tshor byed gnyis dang / /rkan du 'gro ba'i rtsa gnyis spang / /mig gnyis kyi ni lnga bcu drug/ /'byed dang 'dzums pa'i las byed pa/ /gnyis

gnyis dang ni mig 'gram gnyis/ /drug po de dag spang bar bya/ /mig dang snar gnas 'phral ba la/ /brten pa'i rtsa ni drug cu las/ /bzhag pa gcig dang gtsug gi gnyis/ /skra mtshams gnas pa'i rtsa bzhi ste/ /bdun po de dag mtshon gdab spang / /rna bar

bcu drug de las 'dir/ /sgra thos byed pa'i rtsa gnyis spang / /de nyid las ni mur 'gram gyi/ /mtshams su 'gro ba gnyis po spang / /spyi bor bcu gnyis de las ni/ /gyen 'gro skra mtshams bdag po las/ /so so'i re re spang bar bya/ /de ltar yan lag re re'i rtsa'i/ /dbye ba

dbug min shes phyir bshad/ /de las lus la dbug mi rung / /ma lus dgu bcu rtsa brgyad yod/ /dog dang rtsa mdud shin tu phra/ /yo dang tshigs la gnas mi dbug /rtsa ni bdun brgya de rnams las/ /bzhi char khrag ni so sor rgyu/ /rlung dang mkhris pa bad

kan khrag /nad med khrag ni de ltar gnas/ /de ni lus la phan 'dogs te/ /gzhan du gnod pa skyed par 'gyur/ /de la gnag dang dmar dang phra/ /skad cig re re gang zhing stongs/ /mgul pa rlung gi khrag rtsa yin/ /reg na tsha zhing myur du rgyu/ /mdog sngo ser

por 'dug pa ni/ /mkhris pa'i khrag rtsa'i mtshan nyid yin/ /dkar snum brtan grang bad kan rtsa/ /'dres pa'i mtshan nyid 'dren ma yin/ /mi mngon mnyam gnas snum pa dang / /mdog dmar khrag rtsa nad med yin/ /rtsa bo che ni nyi shu bzhi/ /lte ba la ni brten pa

yin/ /de rnams kyis bskor lte ba ni/ /'khor lo'i lte ba rtsibs bskor mtshungs/ /des ni steng 'og thad ka ru/ /lus 'di rjes su 'dzin pa yin/ /bu ga sna dang rna ba gnyis/ /mig gnyis kha rkub pho mtshan gyi'o/ /bud med nu ma gnyis khrag sgo/ /gsum gyis

lhag par gyur pa yin/ /nang gi srog gi gnas gyur pa'i/ /bu ga bcu gsum yod par bshad/ /srog dang lus zungs dri ma chu/ /zas rgyu mi mthun bsten pa yin/ /de la gnod pas nad skyed la/ /skyon med dag pas bde bar byed/ /rang gi lus zungs mdog mnyam

zhing / /zlum dang sbom dang phra ba yin/ /bu ga'i dbyibs ni ring po ste/ /lo ma'i rtsa 'phros lta bu yin/ /zas dang spyod lam dag gis gang / /nad kyi mthu dang mnyam gyur dang / /gang yang lus zungs mi mnyam ste/ /bu ga'i rgyun la gnod byed yin/ /

mang du 'byung ngam 'gags pa'am/ /rtsa ni mdud pa chags pa'am/ /lam gzhan dag tu 'gro ba ni/ /bu ga'i rgyu 'khrugs mtshan nyid yin/ /pad+ma'i rtsa ba phra mo las/ /ring du rgyu bar byed pa ltar/ /gang gis dngas ma nyer 'phel ba'i/ /lus kyi sgo ni

bu ga yin/ /bu ga rnams ni brtol 'gyur na/ /'dar myos lto sbos lkugs dang rims/ /sla dang gzer dang bshang gci 'gags/ /yang na 'chi ba nyid du 'gyur/ /de bas sman pas bu ga brtol/ /re thag bcad de gso bar bya/ /'phral

du rma byung cho ga yis/ /'bad de zug rngu dbyung bar bya/ /zas 'ju byed pa mkhris pa ni/ /'ju byed yin zhes sngar bshad do/ /nad dang lus zungs dri ma yi/ /drod yin zhes ni rgyun shes zer/ /de ni zas kyi gnas yin zhing / /'dzin cing 'dzin byed ces bshad

do/ /de nyid thang la 'bar gzhung gis/ /mkhris pa 'dzin pa'i cha ru bshad/ /tshe dang nad med brtson gzi mdangs/ /lus zungs me drod stobs 'phel byed/ /zhu ba'i gnas kyi sgor 'jug gang / /zas kyi lam gyi sgo gtan yin/ /de ni stobs ldan zos pa rnams/ /

zhu nas zur du 'dren par byed/ /stobs zhan gyur na kha zas ni/ /ma smin nyid du 'byung bar byed/ /'dzin byed stobs ni me drod de/ /de yang 'dzin byed stobs can yin/ /de bas me drod nyams gyur na/ /'dzin byed nad ni skyed par byed/ /zas gang lus kyi lus zungs

mdangs/ /stobs dang kha dog stsogs rgyas byed/ /de rgyu kha zas me drod ni/ /mi 'ju dngas ma stsogs mi 'gyur/ /zas ni dus su zos gyur pa/ /lto bar srog gi rlung gis drangs/ /skom gyis gong por rnam par phye/ /snum gyis mnyen par byas pa yin/ /me mnyam

gnas kyis bus nas ni/ /ma zhu'i gnas na gnas smin byed/ /phyi yi snod gnas 'bras chu ltar/ /lto ba'i me yis 'ju bar byed/ /dang por ro drug zas kyang ni/ /mngar ba nyid du gyur nas ni/ /sbu ba can gyur bad kan 'gyur/ /zhu ba'i gnas nas 'pho ba na/ /rnam

par tsha bas skyur nyid 'gyur/ /mkhris gyur 'phos pa'i rjes la ni/ /me drod kyis skams zhu ba dang / /kha zhing gong bur gyur rlung skyed/ /sa dang chu dang me dang rlung / /nam mkha' bcas pa'i drod lnga pos/ /rang rang yon tan zas lnga po/ /sa stsogs kyis smin de 'og tu/ /

de dag rang rang ji bzhin rgyas/ /smin 'byung yon tan tha dad yin/ /sa ru gtogs pas sa nyid dang / /lhag mas lus gtogs lhag ma rgyas/ /zas de zhu ba'i tshigs ma dang / /dngas ma zhes bya gnyis su 'gyur/ /de las zas kyi tshigs ma sla/ /gcin 'gyur ska ba bshad

bar 'gyur/ /dngas mas lus zungs rang rang gi/ /me drod kyis smin rnam bdun 'gyur/ /dngas ma las khrag de las sha/ /sha las tshil te de las rus/ /rus rkang de las khu ba yin/ /khu ba las na ming la gnas 'gyur/ /lus zungs tshigs ma rim bzhin du/ /bad

mkhris bu ga'i dri ma dang / /rdul dang sen mo ba spu dang / /mi lpags bshang snum dngas ma yin/ /de ltar lus zungs smin pa las/ /dngas ma tshigs ma gnyis su 'gyur/ /lus zungs snum ni gcig la gcig/ /phan tshun nye bar bsten pa yin/ /zas 'ju dngas ma

stsogs rim gyis/ /khu chur gyur pa la la ni/ /nyin zhag gcig 'dod gzhan dag ni/ /zhag drug kha cig zla gcig 'dod/ /lus kyi zungs ni zas kyi rgyun/ /'khor lo lta bur yongs su 'khor/ /ro tsa stsogs pa'i mthu yis ni/ /'phral du khu ba la stsogs skyed/ /

phal cher sman gzhan nyin zhag ni/ /gcig gis las rnams byed pa yin/ /khyab byed kyis dngas lus zungs rnams/ /'thor bar byed pa'i las kyis ni/ /cig car rgyun mi 'chad kun tu/ /lus la rtag tu rnam par 'thor/ /gtor tshe bu ga'i skyon gyis ni/ /dngas ma gang du

chags 'gyur te/ /der ni gnod pa skyed byed de/ /mkha' la sprin chags char 'bab mtshungs/ /nad kyang ma snyoms gyur pa las/ /phyogs gcig 'dus na ldang bar 'gyur/ /de ltar 'byung ba lus zungs me'i/ /las ni yongs su bshad pa yin/ /zas ni dus su zos

gyur pa/ /sa dang chu dang me dang rlung / /dngas ma lus zungs rang rang gis/ /smin byed kun la zas 'ju ba'i/ /me ni lhag pa yin par 'dod/ /de ni rtsa ba de 'phel 'phel/ /zad gyur zad pa'i bdag nyid 'gyur/ /de bas rigs pas cho ga bzhin/ /zas skom rigs

shing phan pa yin/ /de 'bad pas bsrungs gnas gyur na/ /tshe dang stobs ni gnas par 'gyur/ /mnyam gnas rang gnas 'dug na mnyam/ /mnyam lam gzhan 'gro drod mi snyoms/ /mkhris pa shas che rno bar 'gyur/ /bad kan gyis

gnod me drod chung / /me drod mnyam dang mi mnyam rno/ /chung dang de ltar rnam bzhi yin/ /gang zhig zas ni legs zos pa/ /legs par 'ju 'di mnyam pa yin/ /legs par ma zos myur 'ju ba'am/ /legs zos ring zhing 'ju mi mnyam/ /zas ni legs par ma

zos kyang / /myur 'ju me drod rnon po yin/ /zas ni legs par zos gyur kyang / /ring nas 'ju zhing kha skam dang / /sbo dang rgyu ma 'khrugs pa dang / /lci ba me drod chung ba yin/ /me drod nyams na 'chi 'gyur zhing / /skyon med na ni yun ring 'tsho/ /ma snyoms

nad ni skye 'gyur bas/ /de phyir me drod gtso bo yin/ /lus stobs lhan cig skyes pa dang / /dus skyes rigs pa las byung gsum/ /de la lus sems las byung ba/ /rang bzhin lhan cig skyes pa'i stobs/ /na tshong dus tshigs las byung ba/ /dus skyes yin te

rigs pa las/ /byung ba spyod lam zas kyis bskyed/ /de bzhin gzi bskyed sbyor las 'byung / /yul phyogs shing ring chu nyung la/ /skams nad nyung skyed byed yin/ /rlan can de las bzlog pa yin/ /cha snyoms thun mong yin par bshad/ /rkang dang tshil dang zhag dang gcin/ /

mkhris pa bad kan phyis khrag /dngas ma chu rnams lus gnas pa'i/ /snyim pa re res skyed par byed/ /mdangs dang klad rgyas khu chu ni/ /re re'ang rang gi khyor gang yin/ /bud med nu zho snyim do dang / /zla mtshan snyim pa bzhi yod do/ /lus zungs mnyam gnas tshad 'di yin/ /

de las 'phel dang zad shes bya/ /khu chu khrag dang sbrum ma'i zas/ /spyod lam mngal gnas dus tshigs las/ /gang zhig nyes pa lhag gyur des/ /rang bzhin rnam pa bdun du bshad/ /khyab dang myur bar byed phyir dang / /stobs ldan ba dang gzhan ldang byad/ /rang dbang

can dang nad mang phyir/ /nad las phal cher rlung stobs can/ /de nyid kyis na rlung gis bskyod pa'i mi rnams ni/ /nad kyi bdag nyid rdul can skra bshor pags pags/ /grang lhags mi bzod brtan dran blo gros spyod mdza' sred/ /blta dang 'gro ba g.yo zhing smra ba shin tu mang / /bad

kan nor nyung tshe thung gnyid srab dang / /gcom chung tshig thogs g.yo zhing skad 'dzer dang / /chad lta mang du za zhing sgeg dang bcas/ /glu dang dgod dang rngon las 'thab la dga'/ /mngar skyur kha dang tsha ba'i ro goms sred/ /lus skem dbyibs ring 'gro tshe sbra dang bcas/ /mi

brtan dbang po mi thul dam pa min/ /bud med mi chags bu mang skye mi 'gyur/ /de yi mig ni rtsub cing rdul gyis gang / /zlum zhing mi mdzes 'chi ba lta bu dang / /phye gdangs gnyid log lta bur snang ba yin/ /de ni shing dang ri 'dzeg mkha' 'phur rmi/ /skal ngan ser sna che zhing

khengs pa dang / /rku zhing byin snying rtsa rings bcas pa dang / /khyi dang wa dang rnga mo bya rgod khra/ /byi ba'i mtshan nyid ldan mi rlung can yin/ /mkhris pa me 'dra me las byung yin phyir/ /mkhris pa rgyas pa skom dang bkres shas che/ /mdog ser lus tsha rkang lag gdong yang dmar/ /

skra ser spu nyung dpa' zhing nga rgyal che/ /phreng ba byug pa rgyan la lhag par dga'/ /spyod bzang gtsang sbra che zhing mnyes gshin la/ /'byor dang rtul phod blo gros stobs dang ldan/ /'jig rten dgra bo'ang skyabs 'ongs skyob par byed/ /

yid gzhungs tshigs kyi mtshams dang sha ni rab tu lhod/ /bud med mi dga' khu ba dang ni 'dod pa chung / /gnyer ma'i tshogs dang skra dkar mig sngo'i gnas gyur la/ /zas ni mngar dang bska dang kha bsil za bar dga'/ /than pa mi bzod rngul zhing dring la/ /bshang gci bza'

btung khro dang phrag dog mang / /rmi lam dong ka pa la sha'i me tog /glog 'gyu phyogs tshig skar mda' nyi me mthong / /'di yi lus phra mig ser g.yo ba dang / /rdzi ma srab cing nyung zhing grang la dga'/ /khro dang chang dang nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis/ /mig ni myur bar dmar por

'gyur ba yin/ /tshe ni ran cing stobs ni 'bring ba dang / /mkhas shing sdug bsngal dag la sran chung 'gyur/ /stag dang dred dang spre'u byi la dang / /gnod sbyin rang bzhin ldan pa mkhris can yin/ /bad kan bsil bas bad kan can bsil zhing / /

rus tshigs mi mngon snum zhing sha rus 'brel/ /bkres skom nyon mongs sdug bsngal than pa bzod/ /blo ldan snying stobs che zhing dam bca' brtan/ /pri yang ku dang dUr ba 'dam bu'i mdog/ /tshon dang gi'u wang pad+ma gser mdog can/ /lag ngar ring zhing drang ni yangs la rgyas/ /

'phral ba'i dbyes che skra ni mthug cing gnag/ /lus 'jam snyoms shing yan lag mdzes pa dang / /mdangs che khu bcud bu tsha g.yog 'khor mang / /chos ldan tshig rtsub nam yang smra mi byed/ /dgra la zhe sdang 'dam rings khon 'dzin byed/ /glang po'i mchog dregs bcas pa lta

bur 'gro/ /rgya mtsho 'brug dang rdza rnga seng ge yi/ /sgra ldan dran dang brtson 'grus dul bar ldan/ /byis pa'i tshe na'ang ngu dang skom shas chung / /zas ni kha bska cha dang dro zhing rtsub/ /nyung ngu zos kyang de ni stobs dang ldan/ /mig gi mtha' dmar snum zhing dkyus ring yangs/ /

dkar nag rab gsal rdzi ma snyoms dang ldan/ /smra dang khro dang bza' btung spyod pa nyung / /tshe ring nor mang ring lta tshig 'jam smra/ /dad cing blo zab lta che bzod dang ldan/ /rang bzhin bzang zhing gnyid che las mtha' ring / /byas gzo drang mkhas skal bzang ngo tshar ldan/ /

bla ma la gus mdza' bshes dag la brten/ /rmi lam pad+ma bya yi phreng bar bcas/ /chu yi gnas dang sprin yang mthong ba yin/ /tshangs pa drag po dbang po chu lha dang / /nam mkha' lding dang ngang pa glang po mchog/ /de bzhin seng ge dang ni khyu mchog dang / /bad kan can ni

rang bzhin 'drar shes bya/ /rang bzhin gnyis dang kun las byung / /gnyis gnyis kun gyi yon tan bskyed/ /gtsang sbra yod par smra stsogs kyi/ /yon tan gyis ni de ldan bshad/ /na tshod bcu drug par byis pa/ /de las lus zungs dbang po gzi/ /'phel

'gyur bdun cu'i bar bar ma/ /zad pa phan chad rgan po yin/ /rang rang khru ni phyed dang bzhi/ /lus ni tshe ring bde ba'i snod/ /spu med gnag dang shin tu sbom/ /ring po nyid ni mi mthun bcas/ /smad pa brgyad dang rang nyid ldan/ /gang yin de ni de snod min/ /skra ni

rab tu 'jam pa dang / /phra zhing rtsa ba ma 'dres brtan/ /dpral ba mtho zhing mur 'gram 'phyar/ /zla ba kham pa 'ang ba bzang / /rna brgyab phyogs rgya che mdzes/ /rna shal che zhing sha yis rgyas/ /mig ni dkar nag 'byes pa dang / /rdzi ma stug cing snyoms pa bzang / /

sna yi rtse mo dbugs cher 'byung / /sha rgyas drang zhing snyoms pa bzang / /mchu ni dmar zhing ma 'phyangs ba/ /'gram pa yangs shing mi 'bur bzang / /kha che so yi tshigs dam la/ /snum zhing dkar la 'jam zhing snyoms/ /lce ni dmar zhing yangs la srab/ /ko sko

che zhing sha yis rgyas/ /mgrin pa thung zhing sha rgyas zlum/ /phrag pa mthong zhing sha yis rgyas/ /lto ba zlum zhing lte ba ni/ /zab cing mtho la g.yas su 'khyil/ /rkang pa lag pa legs gnas shing / /sen mo 'jam zhing mtho la dmar/ /snum zhing kun dmar sha

rgyas pa/ /sor mo ring zlum bu ga med/ /rgyab zhing che zhing sgal tshigs nub/ /tshigs mtshams mi mngon dam pa dang / /tshigs gsang mtho zhing brtan pa dang / /mdog snum kha dog brtan par gnas/ /rang bzhin gyis 'byung snying stobs brtan/ /phongs

pa'i tshe na'ang zhum pa med/ /mngal nas brtsams te nad med pa/ /gong nas gong du zhing bzang la/ /shes dang ye shes rgya cher ni/ /'phel zhing rim gyis dge bar 'gyur/ /de ltar yon tan kun ldan pa'i/ /lus ni ston brgya'i bar dag tu/ /tshe dang dbang phyug

'dod pa yi/ /dngos po thams cad rab tu gnas/ /bags pa khrag stsogs snying stobs par/ /brgyad po phyi ma bzhin du mchog/ /stobs dang tshad dang shes pa'i phyir/ /lus can rnams kyi snying por bshad/ /snying po kun dang ldan pa yi/ /mchog tu bkur bar

bya bar 'gyur/ /rtsom pa kun la'ang re bcas dang / /bzod ldan blo bzang brtan par 'gyur/ /dregs dang zhum pa med par ni/ /bde dang sdug bsngal bsten gyur ba/ /snying stobs can yin rdul can khengs/ /mun pa can ni de ltar min/ /

sbyin dang tshul khrims snying brtse bden/ /tshangs par spyod dang byas pa gzo/ /byams ldan bcud kyis len bsten pa/ /tshe dang bsod nams 'phel ba'i sde'o/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /lus kyi gnas kyi le'u gsum pa'o// //de nas lus

kyi gnad kyi bye brag bshad par bya'o/ /gnad ni brgya las bdun lhag pa/ /de las bcu gcig brla dang ni/ /de bzhin lag ngar gnyis so sor/ /lto ba la gsum brang la dgu/ /rgyab la bcu bzhi nam tshong ni/ /yan chad sum cu rtsa bdun yod/ /rkang pa'i mthil

nas gung mo yi/ /thad ka na ni mthil 'phrog pa'i/ /gnad yod ces ni rnam bshad de/ /de phug gnad kyis 'chi bar 'gyur/ /mtheb sor dbus na rgya tshigs te/ /de phug bskyod pa'i gnad kyis 'chi/ /de gong sor gnyis shes par bya/ /rkang pa 'khar zhing 'dar

bar byed/ /long mo'i tshigs 'og pir mgo ste/ /de bcad skrang dang nad skyed byed/ /byin pa rkang pa gnyis kyi bar/ /long mo gnad rengs bem por byed/ /byin pa'i nang na nya zhes pa/ /khrag zad pa yis 'chi bar byed/ /byin pa brla mtshams pus mo ste/ /de phug

gson yang 'theng por 'gyur/ /pus gong sor gsum par gnyan gong / /de phug brla rengs skrang bar byed/ /brla nang brla dbang zhes bya ba/ /de phug khrag zags brla bskam 'gyur/ /brla rtsa mig dmar zhes bya ba/ /khrag zad pas ni gzhogs phyed

'joms/ /brla rtsa rlig pa'i bar gyi gnad/ /ljon shing zhes bya ma ning byed/ /de dag brla'i'o dpung de bzhin/ /mkhrig ma 'di ni long mor mtshungs/ /gru mo byin 'dra de gnyis phug/ /zha bo ljon shing 'dra ba ni/ /mchan khung nang na mchan khung 'dzin/ /

de phug zha bo nyid du 'gyur/ /long ka'i gnad ni gzhang zhes bya/ /de phug gzhang rlung gis 'phral gsod/ /lgang ba gzhu ltar yo ba yi/ /chu so'i gnad ni sha khrag nyung / /dbus na kha cig thur du lta/ /rked pa'i dbus gnas srog 'phral 'joms/ /rde'u 'byin

rma bug gnas ma gtogs/ /de yang ngos gnyis phug ste 'dra/ /gcin 'dzag gnas dang gcig tu phug/ /rma ni 'tsho bar shin tu dka'/ /lus kyi zhu dang ma zhu'i gnas/ /dbus na lte ba rtsa kun gyi/ /rten yin de yang 'phral gsod byed/ /ma zhu ba yi gnas sgor

gyur/ /'dod chags stsogs gnas snying zhes bya/ /brang dang nu ma lto dbus gnas/ /nu mjing nu ma'i rtsa zhes bya/ /steng 'og sor gnyis nu ma'i gnad/ /de phug bad kan khrag gis ni/ /rim bzhin lto 'gengs 'jig par byed/ /rengs bral brang gi ngos gnyis na/ /

rtsa sbubs gnyis po rlung rgyu ba/ /de phug khong pa khrag gis gang / /lud pa dbugs mi bde bas 'chi/ /rgyab kyi sgal tshigs brang gi bar/ /de gnyis kyi ni ngos gnyis na/ /phrag pa gnyis kyi 'og na ni/ /mi gsal zhes bya'i gnad gnyis yod/ /de gnyis phug pas

khong pa ni/ /khrag khengs rnag ste 'chi bar 'gyur/ /sgal tshigs kyi ni ngos gnyis na/ /rked pa'i cha gnyis gnas pa dang / /rkub tshos ltag gnas sgal tshigs brten/ /rked pa can dang gzhon nur bshad/ /de snad khrag zad skya rbab dang / /gzugs nyams pas ni

'chi bar 'gyur/ /rgyab kyi sgal tshigs ngos gnyis kyi/ /rked pa'i mtshams ni gang yin pa/ /ro smad kyi ni rgyab phyogs na/ /khung bu zhes bya'i gnad gnyis yod/ /de snad bskyod pa nyams pa dang / /ro smad tshor ba med par 'gyur/ /gang zhig rtsib logs gnyis

dang 'brel/ /sta zur rtse mo gnyis steng gi/ /gnas ni g.yogs par gyur pa dang / /ro smad gzhon nu'i rus par gnas/ /de snad ro smad skrangs pa dang / /nyam chung 'chi ba nyid du 'gyur/ /rtsib logs gnyis kyi nang dang 'brel/ /rked pa'i ngos gnyis dbus na gnas/

thad ka dang ni gyen gnas pa/ /rtsib logs mtshams te de phug na/ /khong pa khrag gis gang ba dang / /lus dang bral ba nyid du 'gyur/ /nu ma gnyis kyi thad ka'i cha/ /rgyab kyi sgal tshigs la brten pa/ /rtsa chen zhes bya de phug na/ /khrag

zad nas ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ /dpung mgo gnyis dang 'brel pa yi/ /sgal tshigs kyi ni ngos gnyis/ /phrag pa gnyis kyi sog pa ste/ /de snad bskams shing tshor bral 'gyur/ /mgrin pa gnyis kyi ngos gnyis rtsa/ /dpung mgo dang ni mgrin pa'i bar/ /

brag pa brag pa la brten gnad/ /de phug lag ngar bya ba nyams/ /srol gong gi ni ngos gnyis na/ /'gram pa la ni brten pa'i rtsa/ /bzhi ste de la sngon po gnyis/ /gnyis pa'ang mjing pa'i gnad du bshad/ /de phug skad 'gags mi sdug dang / /lce yis ro ni

mi tshor 'gyur/ /lkog ma'i sbubs kyi ngos gnyis nas/ /lce dang snar ni 'gro ba'i rtsa/ /so sor bzhi bzhi yod ma mo/ /de bcad 'phral du srog 'joms so/ /mgo bo ske mtshams ltag pa ste/ /de phug mgo bo ldem por 'gyur/ /rna ba gnyis 'og lcong ba na/ /

rna rtsa zhes bya'o na bar 'gyur/ /sna yi bu ga gnyis dang ni/ /sna yi lam 'gro mgrin nang gnas/ /sbrul mgo zhes bya de bcad na/ /dri mi tshor bar byed par 'gyur/ /mig gnyis kyi ni phyi rol mtshams/ /smin ma skyes pa'i mtha' yi 'og/ /mig zur

smin steng dma' bar gnas/ /'khyil pa phug pas long bar 'gyur/ /rna mchan 'phral ba'i mtha' na ni/ /mur 'gram zhes bya dbral 'chi byed/ /mur 'gram gnyis steng skra mtshams na/ /gdeg pa zhes bya bzhag bya yang / /smin mtshams bar gnas

gsum char la'ang / /zug rngu dag ni ma phyung zhing / /smin nas rang nyid byung na 'tsho/ /phyung na 'phral du 'chi bar 'gyur/ /lce mig sna dang rna ba yi/ /bu ga bzhi ni 'dus pa dag/ /rkan dang sgo ru kha bzhi ste/ /bu ga'i gnad ni de rnams kyi/ /gnad ni sum

mdo ris zhes bya/ /de bcad srog ni 'phral du 'dor/ /thod pa yi ni mtshams lnga po/ /thad ka gyen 'gro mtshams kyi mtha'/ /de snad pas ni mgo 'khor dang / /smyo zhing dran pa nyams te 'chi/ /spyi bo'i steng na gtsug 'khyil pa'i/ /rtsa dang ldan sbubs 'dus pa na/ /spu

'khyil bdag po zhes bya ba'i/ /gnad kyis srog ni 'jig par byed/ /gang du mnan na shin tu 'gul/ /rab na de gnad yin zhes bya/ /sha rgyus rus pa rtsa chen dang / /rtsa dang tshigs ni 'dus pa ru/ /gnad ces bya ste des na der/ /srog ni lhag par gnas pa yin/

mang du rnam par bstan mod kyi/ /gnad ni rnam pa drug tu bstan/ /srog gi gnas su thun mong bas/ /gnad ni gcig tu'ang gnas pa yin/ /shar gtogs bcu ste byin lag nywa/ /mthil 'phrog nu mjing nu rtsa'o/ /rus pa'i gnad brgyad mur 'gram dang / /rked pa

can dang gzhon nu dang / /ro smad dang ni sog pa'o/ /rgyus pa'i gnad ni nyi shu gsum/ /gnyan gong zhes bya pir dang ni/ /pir mgo mig zur rgya tshigs dang / /phrag pa gzhag dang chu so yi/ /rtsa chen gnad ni rnam dgu ste/ /gzhang dang rengs bral rna rtsa dang / /sum

mdo ris zhes bshad pa'o/ /rtsa la gnas gnad sum cu bdun/ /rtsa chen gnyis dang ma mo sngo/ /'gram pa mchan khung 'dzin sprul mgo/ /ljon shing snying dang lte ba dang / /rtsib logs mtshams dang nu ma'i 'og/ /mi gsal gzhag dang brla dbang dang / /dmar po zhes bya

bzhi po'o/ /tshigs la nyi shu 'khyil pa dang / /mkhrig ma gnyis dang khung bu dang / /mtshams mtha' gru mo long mo dang / /ltag pa pus mo bdag po'o/ /gzhan dag gzhang sha'i gnad ces zer/ /mchan khung 'dzin dang ljon shing ni/ /rgyus pa la brten rna rtsa dang / /

sum mdor si dang rengs bral dang / /mig 'gram rtsa yi gnad yin gyi/ /rtsa chen gnas par de ma bshad/ /sha yi gnad bcad khrag rgyun 'dzag/ /sha bkrus 'drar 'gyur sla ba dang / /skya zhing dbang po nyams pa dang / /myur du 'chi ba nyid du 'gyur/ /rus

gnas gnad bcad rkang bcas na/ /sla dang bar bar chad cing 'dzag/ /rgyus pa'i gnad bcad na zhing 'khrug/ /brkyang bskum mi shes gnod par 'gyur/ /'gro dang stan gnas nus pa chung / /dbang po nyams pa'am 'chi bar 'gyur/ /

rtsa chen gnad bcad lbu ba dang / /sgra bcas 'byung zhing dran nyams 'gyur/ /rtsa yi gnad bcad khrag ska zhing / /rgyun mi 'chad par mang du 'byung / /de zad mgo 'khor dbugs mi bde/ /skom rmongs skyigs bus 'debs bas 'chi/ /lus ni gra ma lta bus khyab/ /'tshob

kyang sgur po'am 'theng por 'gyur/ /tshigs gnad stobs dang spyod pa nyams/ /lus skem tshigs ni skrang bar 'gyur/ /lte ba mur 'gram bdag po gzhang / /snying dang chu so sum mdo ris/ /ma mo brgyad dang bcu dgu po/ /'phral du srog ni gcod par byed/ /de rnams

'phral du mi 'chi yang / /zhag bdun gyis ni nges par 'chi/ /rengs bral mthil 'phrog rtsib logs mtshams/ /rked pa can gzhon mtshams kyi mtha'/ /nu rtsa dbang po chu so'i gnad/ /rgyab tshigs mi gsal rtsa chen dang / /ro smad nu mjing sum cu gsum/ /zla ba'am

zla phyed son nas ni/ /dus gzhan du ni 'chi bar byed/ /brdeg dang gzhag pa zhes bya gsum/ /der ni zug rngu byung gyur na/ /rlung gis sha dang tshil dang rkang / /glad rgyas rnams ni skems par byed/ /mtshon phyung lud pa dbugs mi bde/ /'byung zhing srog ni 'joms par

'gyur/ /sbrul mgo mig zur rna rtsa dang / /sngon po 'gram gnas ltag pa'i gnad/ /phrag pa'am phrag stsogs 'khyil pa dang / /ljon shing brla dbang khung bu dang / /mig dmar pus mo'i gnad dang bcas/ /mtshan 'dzin pir 'dra gru mo'i gnad/ /de ltar

gnad ni bzhi bcu bzhis/ /rkang lag 'jas par byed 'gyur ba'am/ /gal te tshabs cher snad gyur na/ /des ni srog kyang 'joms par byed/ /pir mgo 'dra dang long mo dang / /mkhrig ma'i gnad brgyad nad tshabs skyed/ /de las ljon shing mchan khung 'dzin/ /

brla dang pir mgo lta bu ste/ /bcu gnyis sor gcig tshad yin no/ /mkhrig ma dang ni long mo dang / /nu ma'i rtsa ba sor gnyis tshad/ /pus mo gru mo sor gsum tshad/ /gzhang dang chu so lte ba snying / /sngon po mtshams mtha' ma mo dang / /pir 'dra sum mdo ris 'gram pa/ /

gnad ni nyi shu dgu yi tshad/ /rang gi lag mthil tshad yin no/ /lhag ma gnad ni lnga bcu drug /sor phyed kyi ni tshad du 'dod/ /gzhan dag gnad de til 'bru ste/ /'bras tsam gyi ni tshad du 'dod/ /rtsa bzhir bshad pa gang yin pa/ /lus kun brtas par byed pa rnams/ /de ni

gnad la gnas pa yin/ /des na de phug khrag drag 'byung / /lus zungs rnams ni zad pa'i phyir/ /rlung 'phel nad ni mi bzang 'debs/ /rlung gis mkhris pa rgyas par byed/ /mkhris pa rgyas par gyur pas na/ /skom dang mgo 'khor skam dang myos/ /lus rngul

tshigs dbye lus lhod dang / /de ni gshin rje'i dbang du 'gro/ /gnad gcod na ni myur ba ru/ /lus kyi tshigs ni chod 'gyur te/ /tshigs kyi phyogs su bcad pas na/ /rtsa ni 'khums par byed pa yin/ /de la srog chags rnams kyi srog/ /khrag gnas na ni gnas pa

yin/ /de bas gnad min legs phog na/ /nges par 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro/ /'ga' zhig sman pa'i yon tan dang / /phyogs gcig tu ni phog pa yis/ /'tsho bar gyur kyang de yi ni/ /dbang po mtshang nyid du 'gyur/ /de bas 'bad de gnad du ni/ /thal sman me

btsa' la sogs spang / /gnad du phog na chung dus kyang / /phal cher shin tu gnod pa yin/ /de bzhin gnad la brten pa'i nad/ /rab tu 'bad pas gso bar bya/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /lus kyi gnas kyi le'u bzhi pa'o// //

de nas lus kyi 'gyur ba'i bye brag shes par bya ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /ji ltar 'bras bu me tog dang / /me yi du ba char gyi sprin/ /phyis 'byung mtshan ma yin pa ltar/ /de bzhin 'chi ltas las nges 'chi/ /'chi ltas med na mi 'chil/ /'chi ltas snang na

'tsho mi 'gyur/ /'chi ltas 'chi ltas mi shes pa/ /mi mkhas 'chi ltas med min shes/ /la la rten dang brten pa po'i/ /khyad par gyis de gnyis su 'dod/ /nad kyi tshul ni mang po las/ /'chi ltas tshul du 'byung bar 'gyur/ /nad zhin ni

zhi 'gyur la/ /brtan par gnas na 'chi bar 'gyur/ /gzugs dang dbang po skad dang mdog /gzugs brnyan bya ba sogs pa dang / /dngos po dag ni gzhan la yang / /tha mal pa las rgyu med par/ /gzhan du gyur gang mdor gang ni/ /'chi ltas yin par de shes bya/ /

skra dang ba spu ma bskus par/ /snum gyis bskus ltar gang snang dang / /gang zhig mig ni rab g.yo dang / /mi 'gyur phyir 'byung khung bur zhugs/ /yo dang bgrad dang 'jums pa dang / /bcum zhing smin ma smad pa dang / /'khrul dang mthong ba nyams pa dang / /sre mo'i mig

ltar lta ba dang / /thi ba 'dra dang mgal me 'dra/ /mchi ma 'dzag cing rdzi ma 'khrugs/ /sna ni shin tu gdangs pa dang / /zhom dang 'brum phran gyis khyab dang / /skrang dang gos dang rnyid pa dang / /gang gi ma mchu 'phyangs pa dang / /yam chu gyen la brdzes pa dang / /

gnyi ga 'dzam bu smin 'drar snang / /so gnag gseg mar bcas pa dang / /dmar zhing so zho nag nog can/ /glo bur du ni 'byung ba dang / /lce ni yo dang rtag tu 'byin/ /skrang dang skam dang lci dang gnag /gos dang rtsub dang tshor ba med/ /mjing pas mgo ni mi thig

dang / /rang gi ltag rgyab khur ltar lci/ /'gram pas khan gnas pa yi/ /kha zas bldad par mi nus pa/ /gang zhig rgyu med par yan lag /shin tu lci ba'am shin tu yang / /dug dang snad pa med par ni/ /bu ga rnams las khrag 'byung dang / /gang zhig pho mtshan

nub pa dang / /rlig pa rab tu 'phyangs pa'am/ /de las go log gyur ba rnams/ /thams cad 'chi bdag dbang gyur yin/ /gang gi rtsa ris sngon med par/ /zla ba tshes pa lta bu ni/ /'phral ba'am chu so'i steng na gnas/ /de ni zla drug las mi 'tsho/ /lus can

gang gi lus la chu/ /pad+ma'i 'dab ma lta bur ni/ /rgyal tshe chu ni mi chags pa/ /de ni zla ba drug na 'chi/ /spyi bo du ba'am snum bcas snang / /de ni zla ba gcig na 'chi/ /spyi bo'am smin mtshams gsar du ni/ /mtshams bye ba'am gtsug 'khyil snang / /nad med zhag

ni drug gis 'chi/ /nad pa zhag gsum na 'chi 'gyur/ /lce gnag kha ni mnam pa dang / /mig g.yas phugs su bros ba'am/ /bya ni mgo la babs pa dag /gang yin de ni yongs su spang / /gang zhig khrus byas byugs pa dang / /lus kun gsher bar gnas bzhin du/ /

snying ga shin tu myur bar bskams/ /de ni zla phyed las mi 'tsho/ /glo bur du ni lus kun mdog /cig car tha mal pa las nyams/ /de bzhin nad ni sogs pa dang / /rtsub dang snum 'gyur 'chi ba yin/ /gong gi sor mo drangs pa dang / /sgra mi 'byung ba de mi 'tsho/ /de bzhin

lud pa sbrid stsogs la/ /gang zhig sngon med sgra byung ba'am/ /dbugs 'byin thung ba'am ring ba'am/ /dri mnam pa'am dri zhim 'gyur/ /lus ni khrus byas ma byas rung / /mi ma yin pa'i dri 'byung ba'am/ /gos rma dri ma byung na yang / /de ni lo gcig nas 'chi 'gyur/ /

gang zhig shig dang sbrang ma stsogs/ /dri zhim pas ni 'du ba'am/ /dri nga bas ni spong 'gyur na/ /de ni lo gcig las mi 'tsho/ /gang zhig rtag tu lus tshal/ /grang ba nyid du snang ba dang / /bsil ba shin tu tsha bar snang / /rgyu med par ni rngul dang rengs/ /gang

zhig grang ba'i chu bur 'byung / /lus grang ba las tsha ba skyes/ /grang gdungs than pa la mi dga'/ /de ni gshin rjes dbang 'gyur yin/ /gang gi snying ga dro gyur la/ /lto ba shin tu grang gyur cing / /bshang ba 'khru zhing skom dad che/ /de ni ro dang 'dra ba yin/ /

bshang dang gci ba mchil snabs sam/ /kha chu chu nang nub gyur pa'am/ /mchil ma kha dog sna tshogs pa/ /gang yin pa de zla gcig 'chi// sa ni nam mkhar mthong ba dang / /nam mkha' sar ni mthong gyur dang / /gzugs med gzugs can lta bu dang / /

gzugs can gzugs med ltar gnas mthong / /de bzhin 'od can 'od med mthong / /dkar po gnag dang pa med/ /mig nad med par zla ba ni/ /gzugs mngar ri med mthong dang / /gnyid ma log par dri za srin/ /yi dwags

gzhan yang de 'dra ba'i/ /gzugs mi sdug pa mthong 'gyur ba/ /gang yin de ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ /sme bdun dang ni nyer gnas pa'i/ /skar ma sgrib med ma mthong dang / /dgu tshigs gung tshugs ma mthong ba/ /de ni lo gcig mi 'tsho'o/ /'brug sgra chu bo'i sgra dang ni/ /gling

bu pi wang rnga yi sgra/ /sgra gzhan med kyang thos pa'am/ /yod pa thos par ma gyur dang / /rna ba'i bu ga bkab pa yis/ /'ur 'ur po yi sgra mi thos/ /de bzhin dri dang ro dang reg /gang zhig log par shes pa dang / /yang na yong ye mi tshor dang / /me mar shi ba'i dri mi tshor/ /cho ga

bzhin byas nad skyed la/ /cho ga log pas bde gnas dang / /gang gi lus ni rdul g.yogs 'dra/ /lus la snad ba mi chor dang / /dka' thub drag dang cho ga ni/ /sngon 'gro'i rnal 'byor med pa ru/ /dbang po las 'das shes pa skyed/ /de rnams 'chi bar shes par bya /

skad 'gags dman zhing mi gsal dang / /gang zhig skad ni 'dzer gyur dang / /smra 'dod pa ni 'phral du ni/ /brjed 'gyur de ni mi 'tsho'o/ /skad gsang shin tu nyam chung 'gyur/ /mdog dang stobs ni nyams pa dang / /rgyu med par ni nad 'phel bar/ /snang ba dag kyang

'chi bar bshad/ /skad gdangs nyams par gyur pa dang / /bdag nyid 'chi bar smra ba dang / /de 'dra'i sgra ni thos pa dag /ring du yongs su spang bar bya/ /lus dbyibs dang ni tshad dang ni/ /mdog gam gzi mdangs gang dag gis/ /gzugs brnyan 'gyur ba rmi lam du/ /

mthong na'ang de ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ /nyi ma me long chu stsogs la/ /gang zhig dbyibs dang tshad dang ni/ /lus kyi rnam pa snang gyur pa/ /gzugs brnyan zhes ni de la bshad/ /mdog dang gzi mdangs la brten gang / /lus gtogs gzugs brnyan lta bu yin/ /gang

gi gzugs brnyan bcad pa dang / /gyes dang lhag dang 'khrugs pa dang / /mgo med mgo gnyis yon po dang / /mi sdug gzhan du gyur par snang / /mtshan nyid las byung ma yin na/ /de ni tshe zad yin zhes bya/ /gang gi mig gi rgyal mor ni/ /gzugs brnyan

snang bar ma gyur dang / /nam mkha' la stsogs lnga po yi/ /gzugs brnyan rnam pa sna tshogs lnga/ /nam mkha' dngas shing sngo ba dang / /snum bcas mdog dang bcas pa yin/ /rlung las rdul can dmar dang gnag /thal mdog rtsub cing mdog nyams yin/ /me yi

dmar zhing dang bar snang / /mdangs ldan/ /blta na sdug pa yin/ /chu skyes baiDUr+ya 'drar snang / /dag cing rab snum bde ba yin/ /sa yi brtan snum dag pa dang / /mthug cing dkar dang sngo bsangs yin/ /rlung ni 'chi sdug bsngal skyed/ /gzhan dag bde ba skyed pa

yin/ /me yis thams cad mdog can te/ /de ni rnam pa bdun du bshad/ dmar dang ser dang dkar nag po/ /ljang dang skya dang nag po'o/ /de rnams la ni gang gsal 'gyur// snum dang dri ma med de dag /dri ma can dang rtsub pa dang / /zhum pa sdug bsngal

skyed pa yin/ /mdangs kyis mdog ni zil gyis gnon/ /'od ni kha dog gsal byed yin/ /mdangs kyis nye bar snang ba yin/ /'di ni ring nas snang ba yin/ /'ga' zhig mdangs dang kha dog gi /mtshan ma'i khyad par med min te/ /mi rnams mtshan ma bzang

ngan 'byung / /dus su mdangs la brtan pa yin/ /gang zhig rkang pa 'drud pa dang / /phrag pa yo bas 'gro ba dang / /gang zhig phan zas mang zos kyang / /rtag tu stobs ni nyams 'gyur na/ /gang zhig nyung zos bshang gci mang / /mang zos bshang gci nyung ba dang / /

nyung zos bad kan gyis nyen zhing / /dbugs rings 'byin zhing sa la 'gre/ /gang zhig dbugs rings phyung nas ni/ /thung du rngubs te shugs 'byin dang / /thung du dbugs 'byin bsnun pa ltar/ shin tu 'dar bar byed pa yang / /gang zhig lag ngar bskums nas ni/

mgo bo dka' bas 'debs pa dang / /gang zhig 'phral ba las rdul 'dzag /tshigs mtshams lhod par gyur pa dang / /nyams che ba 'am nyam chung gyur pa gang / /ldang ba'i tshe na mi dran 'gyur/ /gang zhig gan rkyal nyal nas ni/ /rkang

pa rnam par bskyod pa dang / /rtsig pa mal stan la sogs pa/ /gang zhig rtag tu snyes pa dang / /rgyu med par dgod myongs tshul gyis/ /mchu la ldags par byed pa dang / /ya mchu ldags par byed pa dang / /sgra bcas par yang gang byed dang / /lus mdog nag po

ser po dang / /dmar po'i gzugs brnyan snang ba dang / /sman pa sman dang kha zas dang / /bla ma mdza' bshes la sdang gang / /'di dag thams cad gshin rje yi/ /dbang gyur yin par shes par bya/ /gang zhig drod chung sems g.yengs dang / /rtag tu mdangs ngan

yid mi bde/ /gang zhig gtor ma bya rog la/ /byin yang za bar mi byed dang / /gang zhig rgyu med yid gzhungs dang / /mdzes shing lus rgyas dpal thob pa'am/ /de las nyams par gyur pa dag /de ni gshin rje'i khyim du 'jug /tha mal par ram nad pa yis/ /

gang zhig yon tan skyon rang bzhin/ /snga las gzhan du 'gyur par snang / /de ni zla drug las mi 'tsho/ /dad dang tshul khrims dran dang sbyin/ /blo gros stobs ni rgyu med par/ /'di drug las ni ldog gyur pa/ /zla ba drug nas 'chi bar 'gyur/ /'gro dang

tshig ni smyo ba 'dra/ /'dar rmongs zla ba gcig nas 'chi/ /skra phyi ba na tshor ba med/ /zhag drug nas ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ /gang zhig lkog nad med pa ru/ /mid par kha zas mi chud dang / /bran g.yog log par byed gyur pa/ /de ni 'chi ba dang 'drar

bshad/ /gang zhig rtag tu gnyid log pa'am/ /gnyid med de yang mi 'tsho'o/ /mchi mas gdong ni khebs pa dang / /rkang pa shin tu rngul ba dang / /mig ni mi sdug par snang ba/ /gshin rje'i gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur/ /sngon chad dga' ba'i dngos la gang / /

dga' mi 'gyur ba de mi 'tsho/ /gang zhig 'phral du 'gyur ba yin/ /mtshan nyid thams cad snang ba dang / /'phral du ldog par 'gyur ba dag /de ni mod la 'chi bar 'gyur/ /rims ni stobs dang ldan pa dang / /gting du zhen zhing yun ring dang / bla bcas

mgo 'khor dbugs mi bde/ /rid cing skrangs dang me drod nyams/ /tshig mi gsal zhing thogs pa dang / /mig dmar snying ni gzer ba dang / /snga dro lud pa skam po 'byung / /phyi dro de las gzhan du 'gyur/ /bad kan lud par bcas pa dang / /stobs

dang sha ni zad na 'chi/ /khrag dang mkhris pa shin tu dmar/ /yang na gnag pa'am tshon can nam/ /dmar dang ser dang ljang mdog tu/ /khrag gi gzugs ni rab tu snang / /ba spu'i bu ga nas 'dzag dang / /lkog ma snying gar gos pa dang / /gos la ma chags dri

ngal/ /shugs byung shin tu mang du 'byung / /rgad po skya rbab rims thabs skyugs/ /lud pa skrang dang tshad 'khru gsod/ /lud pa dbugs mi bde rims skyugs// /skom dang tshad 'khru 'or nad dang / /gcong can sbos dang rtsib logs gzer/ /khrag skyug phrag pa

tshan 'chi/ /skyug pa shugs dang ldan pa dang / /bshang gci dri yod tshon can dang / /lud pa bshang nag khrag dang bcas/ /dbugs mi bde yun ring na 'chi/ /skom dad nad gzhan gyis nyam smad/ /lce 'byung dran pa stor na 'chi/ /chang nad shin tu grang bas

nyen/ /sha zad til mar gdong bskus 'dra/ /gzhang 'brum rkang lag lte ba dang / /bshang sgo rlig pa'i kha skrangs dang / /snying ga rtsib logs yan lag na/ /slon bro gzhang rnams rims kyis nyen/ /chad 'khru mcher ba'i dum bu dang / /sha bkrus pa'am snum

nag dang / /til mar 'o ma mar 'dra yang / /zho dang rkang zhag chang snying dang / /glad pa gnag tsha 'dra ba dang / /sha brdungs chu dang sbrang rtsi dang / /rab dmar gnag dang snum pa dang / /rnag 'dra sla ska rnag dang bcas/ /lus zungs sna tshogs 'byung ba dang / /bshang ba

med pa'am che ba 'am/ /'byar bag sbrang ma lta bu'am/ /ri mo can dang tshon can dang / /gzhang gi gnyer ma phyir 'byung dang / /sgra can rus tshigs gzer ba dang / /bshang sgo bye zhing stobs zad dang / /zas ni nyams 'byung ba dang / /skom bcas

rims dang skyug pa dang / /lus tsha lto sbos rgyun 'khrus 'chi/ /rde'u 'gags rlig pa skrangs pa dang / /gcin 'gags nad kyis nyam thag gsod/ /gcin snyi skom dang tsha 'brum bcas/ /sha rul tshad pas 'khru ba 'chi/ /thor nad dang ni snying ga rgyab/ /nu ma phrag pa spyi bor

byung / /tshigs dang rkang pa lag par gnas/ /gcin sri nad can stobs chung dang / /sha rnams thams cad 'drul ba dang / /skom dang tsha myos rims btab 'chi/ /me dbal gnad ni 'gags pa dang / /skyigs bu mgo 'khor dbugs mi bde/ /skran ni rgya cher kun nas zlum/ /

sra zhing rus sbal ltar mtho dang / /rtsa mngon rims btab skyugs pa dang / /skyigs bu sbos shing zug gzer bcas /lud pa che ma pa snying 'phar dang / /tshang 'khru skrang dang dbugs mi bde/ /dmu rdzing bshang gci 'gags pa dang / /dbugs mi bde skrang skyigs bu dang / /

rims dang mgo 'khor brgyal slon 'khru/ /nyam chung mi ni gsod 'gyur zhing / /mig skrang ba dang mchan khung dang / /pags pa rul zhing srab pa dang / /bkru sman gyis bkrus lto sbos zhing / /yang dang yang du 'phel ba 'chi/ /skya rbab skrang dang bcas pa dang / /mig dang

sen mo ser por snang / /snyoms tsha yi ga 'chus dang slon/ /brgyal dang lto sbos tshad 'khru 'chi/ /skrangs nad bla brnan sna tshogs ldan/ /skyes pa rkang gnyis dang por skrangs/ /bud med mgo nas skrangs na 'chi/ /gnyi ga'ang mtshan dang mchan khung skrangs/ /

ri mor bcas 'dzag skyugs pa dang / /rims dang tshad 'khru dbugs mi bde/ /skrangs pa'i tha mar rims tshad 'khru/ /de gnyis gnyis zad mthar skrangs dang / /lus can nyam chung gyur pa dag/ /skrangs par gyur na 'chi bar 'gyur/ /gang zhig skrangs pa rkang par

gnas/ /byin pa'i nywar ni phyin pa dang / /dpyi yi bar du gnod gyur pa/ /de ni sman pas spang bar bya/ /gang gi gdong lag rkang pa ni/ /lhag par skams par gyur pa'am/ /lus ma gtogs 'di shas cher skrangs/ /de ni zla ba gcig na 'chi/ /me dbal lud pa kha dog

nyams/ /rims brgyal yan lag bcag snyam sems/ /mgo 'khor kha skams snying ga na/ /lus snyom tshad pas 'khru ldan spang / /mdze ni yan lag 'drul ba dang / /mig dmar skad ni 'gags pa dang / /drod nyams srin bu rnams kyis gtses/ /skom

dang tshad pas 'khru ldan 'chi/ /rlung nad pags pas tshor med byed/ /lus 'dar skrang dang nad kyis gzir/ /dreg nad rmongs shing brgyal ba dang / /myos dang gnyid che rims mgo rengs/ /yi ga 'chus dang dbugs mi bde/ /'khums shing chu bur rul pa 'dra/ /

mgo nad yid 'chus dbugs mi bde/ /rmongs bag la 'khru zhing skom mgo 'khor/ /skad 'gags lus zungs me drod zad/ /lus nyam chung nad kun gsod byed/ /rlung gi nad dang brjed byed dang / /mdze nad khrag dang dmu rdzing gcong / /skran can gcin nad ldan pa

yis/ /sha zad nad tshabs chung yang sdang / /sha dang stobs ni shin tu zad/ /nad 'phel yi ga 'chus pa dag /nad pa gang la snang 'gyur te/ /zla ba phyed dang gnyis na 'chi/ /rlung nad gtun 'dra la 'phel 'gyur zhing / /mi zad snying ga gnas pa dag /skom

dad kyis ni yongs gdungs pa/ /'phral du srog ni 'phrog par byed/ /rlung nad nywa ni lhod byed cing / /sna ni yon por 'chus byed pa/ /gang gi 'gram pa zad par snang / /'phral du srog ni 'phrog pa yin/ /rlung nad lte ba gzhang bar song / /yang na brla dbrag gnyis

na gnas/ /stobs ldan rlung ni nyam chung ba'i/ /gzhang dang snying gar gnas byed pa'am/ /dri ma chu so'i ltag lte ba/ /bkag te nad ni skyed pa dang / /chu sor gzer bar byed 'gyur la/ /skom dad 'khru bar byed pa dang / /chu so bshang sgor gnas nas ni/ /rlung ni

dbugs mi bde skyed dang / /rtsib ma'i rtse mo 'degs byed cing / /snying gar rlung ni brten pa dang / /mig bgrad 'gyur ba med byed pa/ /'phral du srog ni 'phrog par byed/ /'phral du rims dang tsha bas btab/ /skom dad brgyal dang stobs

zad dang / /tshigs mtshams bral bar gyur pa rnams/ /nye bar 'chi bar 'gyur ba yin/ /nang par gang gi gdong las ni/ /rngul nas shas cher 'dzag 'gyur zhing / /khar chags rims kyis gdungs pa rnams/ /de yang 'tsho bar dka' ba yin/ /gang gi lus la 'brum

phran ni/ /byi ru'i mdog 'dra snang gyur pa/ /byung nas myur du mi snang gyur/ /de ni ring por mi thogs 'chi/ /'brum pa sran chung bshus 'dra zhing / /de bzhin byi ru'i mdog 'dra ba/ /nang du kha blta tshad 'brum 'dra/ /'brum bus lus ni 'jig byed yin/ /mig

ser gdong ser rgyas pa dang / /mur 'gram gnyis kyi sha zad pa/ /skrag cing lus ni tsha bdag /gang yin de ni spang bar bya/ /rgyu med phrugs pa dag las rma/ /'phel zhing mched par byed pa dang / /rlung skyed gang yin na ba med/ /mkhris pa las gyur tsha ba med/ /

bad kan las gyur rnag med dang / /gang zhig nad skyed zug gzer med/ /phye mas khyab dang rnying par snang / /gang du glo bur dag tu ni/ /rgyal mtshan mdung la sogs gzugs snang / /rma de thams cad spangs bar bya/ /mtshan par rdol na bshang gcig rlung / /'byung zhing

srin bus gtses pa dang / /pus mo phan tshun 'byer ba dang / /rkang pa bteg nas ltung gyur dang / /yang dang yang du kha bsgyur ba'i/ /nad pa de ni 'tsho mi 'gyur/ /so yis sen mo'i rtse gcod cing / /sen mos skra'am rtsa gcod dang / /sa la shing bus 'dri

ba dang / /bong pas bong ba rdeg pa dang / /spu ldang gcin ni bska ba dang / /lud pa bskams shing rims kyis 'debs/ /skad cig dgod cing spyugs glu len/ /ma la la rkang bas rdeg pa dang / /skad cig re res bu gsol/ /nad pa gang yin de mi 'tsho/ /

gdong la sme ba ngo khabs dang / /mdzer skyes so sen thig le chags/ /lto la sna tshogs rtsa snang ba/ /glo bur byung ba de mi 'tsho/ /gyen du dbugs rtseg drod yal zhing / /brla dbrag gnyis su gzer gyis nyen/ /dpal dang rnam par bral gyur pa/ /blo dang ldan pas yongs su

spang / /gang gi nad ni 'phel 'gyur dang / /rang bzhin yongs su nyams pa ni/ /gang la 'phral du 'byung gyur pa/ /de ni mod la 'chi bar 'gyur/ /sman pas nad pa gang zhig la/ /sman gyi bya ba byas gyur pa/ /'bad kyang sos par ma gyur na/ /de yi srog ni rnyed par dka'/ /

mkhas shing mang du grub pa dang / /cho ga bzhin du byin gyur yang / /sman gyi bya ba ma grub gang / /de la gso ba'i thabs med do/ /gang gis sman ni sbyor ba'i tshe/ /rgyu med par ni phyin ci log/ /mdog dang ro stsogs logs gyur na/ /nad med yin yang de mi 'tsho/ /gang

gi gnas su shing bcas med/ /rlung med kyang ni shi 'gyur dang / nad pa gang gi khyim du ni/ /snod ni shin tu mang po dag /chag gam lhung bar gyur pa na/ /de yi srog ni rnyed par dga'/ /mi gang nyam chung gyur ba yang / /glo bur sos par snang 'gyur ba/ /de yi srog kyang ma

nges pa/ /yin par rgyun shes bus bshad do/ /nye du mdza' bo rnams kyis ni/ /dris kyang mnyan par mi bya la/ /sman pas smra bar mi bya zhing / /de yi gso ba'ang khas mi blang / /gshin rje'i pho nya sha za stsogs/ /gzhan gyis nye bar bsten pa gang / /sman gyis stobs ni

'joms pas na/ /de phyir de ni yongs su spangs/ /tshe yi rig byed 'bras bu kun/ /tshe shes pa la gnas pa yin/ /de bas 'chi ltas gnas pa kun/ /sman pas 'bad de shes par bya/ /tshe dang bsod nams gnyi ga zad/ /de gnyis zad par ma gyur yang / /yang ba ni

ma spangs pas/ /srog chags rnams ni 'chi bar bshad/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ lus kyi gnas kyi le'u lnga pa'o// //de nas lus kyi gnas kyi pho nya la stsogs pa bshad par bya'o/ /ya mtshan can dang dge sbyong dang / /rigs mthun

las ni 'grub par bshad/ /de las go bzlog pho nya ni/ /las ni 'grub min rtags su bshad/ /dman dang 'jigs rengs sngangs pa dang / /rtsub dang bkra mi shis smra dang / /mtshon cha dbyug thogs mgo reg dang / /ma ning smar ral pa can/ /

bkra mi shis pa'i ming dang ldan/ /sdig las bud med dri ma can/ /mang po nad pa mi sdug dang / /phreng ba byug pa dmar pos brgyan/ /til mar 'dam bskus gos rnying dang / /mdog ngan rlan can gos gcig gon/ /bong bu rnga mo ma he zhon/ /shing dang bong ba nyed pa dang / /ring nas

'bod pa'i pho nya 'ongs/ /sman pas yongs su spangs bar bya/ /bkra mi shis pa sems dang smra/ /gcer bu gcod dang 'jig pa dang / /mtshun gtor me la bsreg pa dang / /'chi ba rnams la ster ba dang / /sar nyal skra bshig skud pa dang / /ngu dang ma bsdams gnas

skabs su/ /sman pa gnas tshe pho nya 'ongs/ /mi ni 'chi bar ston pa yin/ /nad dang mtshan nyid mtshungs ba yi/ /yul lam dus su sman pa gnas/ /bang chen 'bod du 'ongs mthong na/ /nad pa de ni gso mi bya/ /lte ba kha dang sna reg dang / /skra dang spu dang sen mo so/ /

mtshan rgyab nu ma mgrin pa dang / /lto dang srin lag dag dang ni/ /ras bal phub ma zha nye rtsa/ /rus pa gtun brdung phyags ma rdo/ /zhabs ma gos kyis mtha' ma dang / /thal ba sol ba kha tshar sogs/ /gzhan yang thog gi zhags pa

thogs/ /pho nya de 'dra sngon du mthong / /'chi ba dag tu ston pa yin/ /de bzhin mtshan phyed nyi ma'i gung / /thun mtshams dang ni dus tshigs dang / /tshes drug tshes bzhi tshes dgu dang / /sgra gcan mjug rings 'char dus stsogs/ /bra nye smin drug skag chu stod/ /gre

dang khrums stod snrubs dang ni/ /gong du pho nya nad pa yi/ /mtshan nyid la ni brten pa'i tshig /mi dge smra dang mi shis mthong / /der ni sman pa 'gro mi bya/ /dbang bo ma tshang mi ro'am/ /mi rus kyis ni brgyan pa'am/ /chad dang tshig dang nyams chag dang / /de yi tshig tu

smra ba'am/ /ro ni tsha dang drag pa'am/ /dri ni shas cher rul pa'am/ /reg bya rgya cher mi bzad dang / /gang yang de 'dra gzhan dag ni/ /de kun mdun du smra ba'am/ /yang na de skad smra ba'i tshe/ /pho nya 'ongs par mthong na ni/ /nad pa de ni gso mi bya/ /kyi hud kyi hud cho

nges 'debs/ /'od dod mod mo 'gyel sbrid sgra/ /gos dang gdugs dang lham 'jig dang / /sdug bsngal ba dag mthong ba dang / /shing chen rgyal mtshan gang ba'i snod/ /chu nang nub par mthong ba dag /gsod stsogs yid du mi 'ong smra/ /thal ba phyag dar gyis gtor dang / phyi la

sram dang sbrul dang ni/ /spre'us lam ni bcad pa dang / /'bar ba'i phyogs su ri dgas bya/ /gdug pa sgra ni sgrogs pa dang / /'bru gnag bu ram dar ba dang / /lan tshwa chang rnying pags pa dang / /yungs kar zhag dang 'bru mar dang / /rtswa dang 'dam bu bud shing dang / /ma ning mi srun sme

sha can/ /rgya dag dang ni rnyi rnams dang / /slon dang bshang ba gtong ba dang / /rnag dang mtshan ma ngan pa mthong / /snying po med dang 'khrig pa spyod/ /ras bal stsogs dang dgra bo mthong / /mal stan dang ni khyogs la stsogs/ /kha sbub tu ni gnas par mthong / /nad pa

dag dang gzhan dag dang / /snod stsogs ngan mthong mi shes so/ /skyes pa'i ming can bya g.yon na/ /bud med ming can g.yas 'dug bzang / /bya dang ri dwags g.yas skor bzang / /khyi dang wa ni de lta min/ /ri dwags rnams ni zung min shis/ /tsa sha bya rgod khany+dza ri/ /ne+e'u

le dang rma bya rnams/ /mthong ba rtag tu shis pa yin/ /'ug pa byi la sbrul mthong ba/ /rnam pa kun tu shis ma yin/ /go da dang ni ri bong sbrul/ /dza ba ka ni ming thos dge/ /mthong dang sgra sgrogs de lta min/ /dred dang spre'u de las bzlog /'phral ba'i phyogs su 'ja'

tshon mthong / /mi shis rgyab tu mthong na shis/ /me yis gang ba'i snod dag ni/ /chag dang khong stong gnas pa dang / /nad pa 'chi 'gyur khyim du ni/ /sman pa 'jug par byed pa'i tshe/ /zho stsogs bkra shis 'og nas bshad/ /gang ba'i snod phyir byung mthong dang / /pho nya la

stsogs mi shis mthong / /de lta'i nad pa spang bar bya/ /de las gzhan par snying rje'i rgyud/ /dag pas 'bad de gso bar bya/ /zho 'bru bu ram shing dang khre/ /sbrang rtsi zhun mar pri yang ku/ /nas thug dngul rdo bum pa dang / /dril bu mar me chu skyes

dang / /dUr pa nya dang sha rlon dang / /'bras yos 'bras bu kha zas dang / /bum pa rin po che yis gang / /bu mo gzhon dang shing rta dang / /mi ni mgo 'phang mtho ba dang / /lha rnams dang ni rgyal po dang / /gos dkar gon dang me tog dkar/ /khyim dang rnga yab rta dkar mthong / /dam

pa bram ze gtsug tor dung / /rta babs dang ni g.yung drung dang / /sa ni brkos par gyur pa dang / /me ni rab tu 'bar ba dang / /bza' btung yid du 'ong ba dang / /mi yis shing rta legs gang dang / /ba ni be'u dang bcas pa dang / /rgod ma bud med btsas dang / /shang shang te'u sha bkra

dang / /ngang pa khu byug rma bya dang / /sar sa ni sgra snyan sgrogs/ /de bzhin phyugs gcig btags pa dang / /gdu bu me long yungs kar dang / /gi wang rnams ni mthong ba dang / /byug pa dri zhim gyis byugs dang / /khu ba dkar zhing mngar ba dang / /khyu mchog de bzhin ba lang rnams/ /rjes su

mthun pa'i sgra sgrogs dang / /ri dwags bya dang mi rnams ni/ /yid 'ong sgra snyan smra ba yi/ /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan pa dan bsgreng / /mngon par stod par byed pa dang / /rdza rnga dung dang rnga bo che/ /sgra dang bkra shis sgra sgrogs pa/ /bram ze rig byed 'don pa dang / /bde ba'i rlung ni rjes

mthun rgyu/ /lam dang khyim du 'jug tshe yod/ /nad sos mtshan nyid yin shes bya/ /de ltar pho nya dge bshad nas/ /de 'og rmi lam bshad bya ste/ /rmi lam shi ba'i mi rnams dang / /lhan cig chang 'thungs khyis drangs gang / /mi de rim gyis gzugs can gyi/ /'chi

bdag gis ni myur khyer 'gyur/ /lus dang gos dang phreng ba dmar/ /bud med rgod pas drangs rmis gang / /de ni khrag mkhris dag gis 'chi/ /ma he rta phag bong bu dang / /rnga mo zhon te lho phyogs 'gro/ /de ni gcong chen nad kyis 'chi/ /lcug ma tsher can 'od ma'am/ /ta la

snying gar skyes pa rmi/ /gang yin de ni skran gyis 'chi/ /gang zhig me ni mi 'bar la/ /sbyin sreg byed cing mar gyis bskus/ /gcer bur 'dug dang pad+ma ni/ /snying gar byung rmis mdze yis 'chi/ /gang zhig sme sha can lhan cig/ /snum mang 'thungs par rmi bde/ /gcin nad

kyis ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ /srin po lhan cig gar byed cing / /chu la bying rmi smyo byed 'dzin/ /ra ro gar byed shi ba yi/ /mis khyer rmi ba brjed byed 'dzin/ /bong bu rnga mo byi la spre'u/ /seng+ge stag dang khwa dag dang / /wa 'am mi ro la zhon rmis/ /de ni 'chi bdag khar song yin/ /

snum khur sha khu li zos rmis/ /sad nas de 'dra slon 'gyur ba/ /gang yin de ni 'tsho mi 'gyur/ /nyi zla gzas zin rmis mig na/ /nyi ma zla ba lhung ba yi/ /rmi lam mthong na long bar 'gyur/ /spyi bor 'od ma'i lcug stsogs skyes/ /de bzhin bya rog tshang 'cha' dang / /

mgo bo chad par rmis pa dang / /khwa dang bya rog sogs kyis bskor/ /de bzhin yi dwags sha za mo/ /byad ma sme sha can gyis bskor/ /'od ma'i tshal dang tsher ma dang / /rtswa yi tshang tshing nang du tshud/ /g.yang sar lhung dang dur khrod nyal/ /phyag dar thal ba'i nang du lhung / /
