chu dang 'dam la stsogs par nub/ /chu rgyun gyis ni myur du khyer/ /glu gar dang ni rol mo dang / /gos dang phreng ba dmar po 'chang / /lus 'phel na tshod rgas pa dang / /bag ma len zhing kha spu 'dreg /zas btsos snum za chang 'thung dang / /skyugs dang 'khru ba rmi ba dang / /

lcags dang gser dag rnyed pa dang / /btsong dang rtsod las pham pa dang / /mchil lham gnyis ni stor ba dang / /rkang pags lhung ba rmi ba dang / /shin tu dga' dang rab khros ba'i/ /shi ba'i gnyen gyis spyos pa dang / /mar me gza' dang skar ma dang / /so mig lha'i gzugs

rnams ni/ /lhung ba'am 'jig pa rmis pa'am/ /ri bo ral par 'gyur pa dang / /nags tshal 'bar ba'i nang dang ni/ /sdig can khyim du 'jug pa dang / /ro bsregs pa dang mun par zhugs/ /ma yi mngal du zhugs pa dang / /brag dang khang pa sar lhung dang / /de bzhin nya

yis mid pa dang / /chos gos gon pa'i mi srun dang / /gcer bu dbyug pa thogs pa dang / /mig dmar kha dog gnag pa ni/ /mthong na nam yang shis yin/ /bud med sdig can gdong gnag dang / /skra dang sen mo nu ma ring / /gos dang

phreng ba dmar po thogs/ /rmis pa dus mtshan yin par 'dod/ /nad ni stobs dang ldan pa yis/ /yid 'jug bu ga bkag pa'i phyir/ /mi bzad rmi lam mthong 'gyur te/ /nad pa 'chi bar 'gyur pa yin/ /nad med the tshom bcas gyur zhing / /'ga' zhig thar bar

'gyur pa yin/ /mthong dang thos dang nyams myong dang / /gsol ba btab dang brtags pa dang / /'byung bar 'gyur dang nad las byung / /rmi lam rnam pa bdun du bshad/ /de las dang po'i lnga po dang / /rang gi rang bzhin nyin mo brjed/ /shin tu ring thung 'bras bu med/ /

cha 'dres pa yi rang bzhin can/ /mtshan stong rmi lam 'bras bu ring / /mthong ba chung ngu byed pa yin/ /nang par mthong dang gnyid ma log/ /mi mthun gtam gyis bar mchod/ /de yi nyin par 'bras chen 'gyur/ /sbyin dang sbyin sreg la stsogs kyis/ /rmi lam 'bras bu

chung bar 'gyur/ /gang zhig rmi lam ngan mthong nas/ /slar yang gnas skabs de nyid du/ /rmi lam bzang po mthong gyur na/ /'bras bu bzang po nyid thob 'gyur/ /lha dang bram ze khyu mchog dang / /ba lang rgyal po mdza' bshes gson/ /skyes bu dam pa grags ldan dang / /

me 'bar ba dang dngas pa'i mtsho/ /bu mo khye'u ser ba dang / /gos dkar gon zhing mdangs dang ldan/ /skyes bu za dang lus 'bar dang / /khrag gis lus kun byugs pa dag/ /gang gis mthong bar gyur ba dang / /gdugs dang sha rlon me long dug/ /sna ma dkar pos

gos pa dang / /mi gtsang gis byugs 'bras bu rnyed/ /ri bo khang bzangs 'bras bcas shing / /'dzeg dang seng ge glang chen mi/ /rta dang ba lang dag la zhon/ /chu bo mtsho bran rgya mtsho rgal/ /shar dang byang du 'gro ba dang / /bgrod min 'gro dang shi ba dang / /nyam nga

las thar lha rnams dang / /pha mas mngon par bstod pa dang / /ngu dang ltung las ldang ba dang / /dgra bo pham par byas pa dag /gang rmis tshe ring nad med dang / /nor mang po ni rnyed par 'gyur/ /de bzhin nad pa'i g.yog 'khor ni/ /bkra shis cho ga phun sum tshogs/ /

dad ldan rjes su mthun pa dang / /nor mang bsdus par gyur pa dang / /snying stobs mtshan nyid dang ldan zhing / /sman pa bram ze stsogs la gus/ /gso dpyad rnams la skyo ba med/ /de ni nad med 'gyur mtshan nyid/ /rtag tu shis pa sdud pa dang / /bkra mi shis pa rnam par spang / /

'di dag de nyid mthong ba yi/ /drang srong rnams kyis shis par bshad/ /de ltar 'di ni skye dang 'chi/ /mtshan nyid gang phyir bshad pas na/ /de phyir lus kyi gnas yin pas/ /'di ni lus kyi gnas su bshad/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ lus kyi gnas

kyi le'u drug pa'o// //yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ lus kyi gnas te gnas gnyis pa rdzogs so// //de nas nad thams cad kyi nad gzhi bshad par bya'o/ /de yang rgyun shes kyi bu la stsogs pa drang srong chen po rnams kyis 'di skad ces bshad do/ /

nad dang sdig pa rims gnod byed/ /'gyur byed sdug bsngal ma zhu'i skyon/ /zad byed 'tsho dka' mkhun gnod skyed/ /ming gi rnam grangs sgras bshad do/ /nad gzhi sngar byung tshul dang ni/ /de bzhin tshul phyed goms byed dang / /dkyel gyur shes par byed pa ste/ /nad ni

rnam pa lngar shes bya/ /gzhi dang rgyu dang skye mched dang / /rkyen dang slong bar byed pa'i rgyu/ /rnam grangs kyis ni nad gzhi bshad/ /gang gis sngar byung tshul shes pas/ /nad ni 'byung bar 'dod gyur la/ /bye brag phyed par ma gyur ba/ /nad kyi tshul ni ji bzhin par/ /

chung phyir mtshan nyid mi gsal ba'o/ /de nyid gsal ba nyid gyur pa/ /tshul phyed pa zhes bya bar bshad/ /dbyibs dang gsal mngon rtags dang ni/ /mtshan nyid mtshan ma rnams yin no/ /rgyu dang nad dang mi mthun zhing / /mi mthun pa yi don byed pa'i/ /sman dang zas

dang spyod lam rnams/ /nyer bar bsgyur pas bde 'gyur ba/ /nyams brtas byed par shes bya ste/ /de ni goms pa zhes byar bshad/ /de las bzlog pa'i ma goms nad/ /mi 'phrod nad ces bya ba'o/ /gang gis nad ni dkyil gyur pas/ /ji bzhin

rjes su 'phel 'gyur zhing / /nad rnams rdzogs shing mngon gyur pa/ /skyes shing 'ongs pa dkyel gyur yin/ /de ni grangs brtag gtso bo dang / /stobs dang dus kyis phye ba yin/ /grangs ni ji ltar 'di nyid las/ /rim ni brgyad du bshad pa yin/ /nad rnams spyir ni bsdus pa las/ /

cha shas dbye ba brtag pa yin/ /rang dbang gzhan dbang gnyis las ni/ /nad rnams gtso bor bshad pa yin/ /rgyu stsogs ma lus phyogs gcig las/ /stobs ni che chung shes par bya/ /nyin mtshan dus dang zas zos chas/ /nyes pa ji bzhin nad kyi dus/ /de ltar nad

gzhi'i don bshad nas/ /de ni rgyas par bshad par bya/ /nad rnams kun gyi nad gzhi ni/ /nad ni 'khrugs par gyur pa yin/ /de ni gnod 'gyur sna tshogs pa/ /bsten pas ldang bar 'gyur bar bshad/ /gsum po'i sbyor ba rnam pa gsum/ /gnod 'gyur sngar ni bshad pa yin/ /

kha dang tsha dang bska chung zad/ /rtsub dang bcud med sra ba dang / /bkag dang nan gyis btsir ba dang / /mtshan mo mi nyal skad cher smra/ /sbyangs pa'i sbyor drags mya ngan 'jigs/ /sems las drag shul bud med drags/ /so ga nyin mtshan zas zhu'i rjes/ /rlung gi nad ni ldang bar 'gyur/ /

mkhris pa tsha dang skyur dang rna/ /lan tshwa bro dang lus tsha dang / /ston ka nyin phyed mtshan phyed dang / /tsha ba'i dus su ldang bar 'gyur/ /mngar skyur lan tshwa snum pa dang / /lci dang bad kan skyed bsil dang / /'dug dang bde dang gnyid ma zhu/ /nyin par gnyid log brtas drags dang / /slon

stsogs sbyor ba nyes pa dang / /zos ma thag dang dpyid kyi dus/ /snga dro mtshan stod bad kan ldang / /'dres pa las ni ldan pa yin/ /thams cad bsten pas 'dus par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gzhan yang 'dren mar zos/ /ma zhu ma snyoms mi 'phrod dang / /lhag par zos pa la stsogs

dang / /chang dang btung ba nyes pa dang / /tshod ma skam dang la phug rjen/ /til tshigs sa zhag so ba'i chang / /sha rul sha skam sha rid rnams/ /de dang de yis nyes gsum skyed/ /de bzhin kha zas sbos pa dang / /dus tshigs log pa bdun gyi rlung / /gdon zhugs dug dang

dbyig dug zos/ /be'u snabs nad 'khrugs ri rtsar gnas/ /btsas skar la ni gza' zhugs dang / /log par sbyor ba sna tshogs dang / /sdig pa'i las la brten pa dang / /bud med bu btsas log par byung / /gso ba log par byas las ldang / /de ltar so so'i nad ldang bas/ /

nad kyi gnas su 'gro byed pa/ /rtsa sbubs rnams su phyin pa dang / /nad rnams lus la myur du skyed/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u dang po'o// //de nas rims nad kyi nad gzhi bshad par bya'o/ /rims ni nad bdag sdig can

dang / /'chi bdag mdangs za 'chi byed yi/ /khros pas myur ba'i mchod sbyin brlag/ /drag po dpral ba'i mig las byung / /skye dang 'chi tshe rmongs byed pa/ /mi 'phrod sna tshogs bsten las byung / /mi bzad ming ni sna tshogs pas/ /skye gnas du ma rnams la gnas/ /

de ni nad rnams so sor 'dres/ /'dus dang glo bur las brgyad 'gyur/ /de la nad rnams rang rang ni/ /rgyu las 'khrugs te ldang ba yis/ /ma zhu'i gnas su zhugs gyur pa/ /lhan cig gnas nas rtsa sgo bkag/ /zhu ba'i gnas nas me drod ni/ /phyi rol du ni 'byin par byed/ /

de dang lhan cig mngon khyab nas/ /lus kun tsha bar byed pa yin/ /yan lag shin tu tsha byed pas/ /rims ni de yis skyed par byed/ /rtsa sgo bkag pas de 'og tu/ /rdul ni mang du mi 'byung ngo / /de yi sngon tshul sgyid zhan dang / /nyams mi dga' zhing lus lci la/ /

ro mi tshor zhing yi ga 'chus/ /glal 'byung mig 'khrugs mchi mar bcas/ /yan lag na zhing 'ju stobs chung / /nyam chung gnyid ni che ba dang / /sbu ldang bya rmyang byed 'dod dang / /byin pa'i nywa na lus snyom dang / /phan par bstan pa mi bzod khro/ /skyur dang tsha dang drod

la sred/ /kha zas mngar ba la mi dga'/ /byis pa la sdang skom dad che/ /sgra me grang lhags rlung dang chu/ /grib ma nyin mtshan rgyu med par/ /dga' dang mi dga' dag tu byed/ /de rjes rims ni gsal bar 'gyur/ /rims thebs 'byang nye'i tshe nad tshabs/ /

chung zhing tshab mi snyoms la/ /yan lag de dang der 'pho zhing / /na bde dang der g.yo 'gyur/ /rkang pa be+ems po rengs pa dang / /byin snying na zhing ngal ba dang / /tshigs rnams bye ba lta bur sems/ /brla dang rked pa na ba dang / /rgyab ni brdungs pa ltar sems dang / /lto ba btsir ba snyam

sems dang / /rus pa bcad pa snyam pa dang / /rtsib ma lhag par na ba dang / /snying ni btsir snyam sems shing zug/ /brang du btsugs pa lta bur gzer/ /phrag pa brdungs snyam dpung pa ni/ /bcom snyam sems shing sgrog dus na/ /'gram pas kha zas bldad mi nus/ /glal 'byung rna ba

sgra dang bcas/ /mur 'gram zug cing mgo bo na/ /lce yis ro ni mi tshor ram/ /yang na kha bska bro bar 'gyur/ /dri ma rnams ni sri ba dang / /lpags mig kha dang sen mo dang / /bshang sogs rtsub cing dmar ba dang / /mchil mang yi ga 'chus sred chung / /zas mi 'ju zhing rdul mi

'byung / /gnyid yar mchu dang gre bskam/ /skom dad che zhing lud pa skam/ /lud pa lu zhing skyugs pa skam/ /sems zhum lus kyi ba spu ldang / /pags pa so dag brtse ba dang / /rkang lag 'dar zhing sbrid pa thogs/ /mgo 'khor tshig ni bla ba dang / /drod bag la dga' bya rmyang

byed/ rlung gi rims su shes par bya/ /lus kun cig car khyab pa dang / /bla zhing kha'i ro kha ba dang / /bsil 'dod kha snar thor bu 'byung / /mgo 'khor brgyal myos snying mi dga'/ /bshang sla mkhris pa slon pa dang / /mchil ma khrag bcas sgregs pa skyur/ /thor bu dmar

po 'byung ba dang / /pags pa la stsogs ser rtsa sngo/ /rdul 'byung dbugs ni mnam pa dang / /skom dad rab che mkhris pa'i rims/ /lhag par yi ga 'chus shing rmongs/ /bu ga 'gags shing rims shugs dal/ /mchil mang kha nang mngar ba bro/ /dang ga lci zhing

dbugs mi bde/ /cham btab snying na skyug pa 'byung / /lud pa lus rengs lpags stsogs skya/ /yan lag thor bu grang mo 'byung / /snyom zhing lus 'dar bad kan rims/ /rang gi dus su thams cad ni/ /'byung zhing 'phel ba nyid 'gyur ba/ /nad gzhir bshad pa'i mi mthun

bsten/ /bsgyur bas bde bar byed pa yin/ /rang rang mtshan ma 'dres pa ni/ /ldan pa'i rims yin gzhan yang ni/ /mgon brgyal slon lus tsha rmongs bag 'gyur/ /gre ba kha skam mi dga' rus tshigs na/ /gnyid mid mgo 'khor spu ldang skom dad che/ /kha glal tshig mang rlung

mkhris 'dres pa'i rims/ /tsha med yi ga 'chus shing klad tshigs na/ /cham pa lud pa dbugs mi bde bshang sri/ /khong bsil rmongs bag rab rib mgo 'khor rmya/ /bad kan rlung 'dres rims kyi mtshan ma yin/ /lus rdul rengs dang tsha bsil sor mi gnas/ /skom dad

lud pa bad kan mkhris bag 'byung / /rmongs bag rmya dang kha bro khar dri chags/ /bad kan mkhris pa 'dres pa'i rims kyi rtags/ /kun nas 'byung ba rtags kun ldan/ /'dir yang thang ri tsha ba ldang / /de bzhin grang dang nyin mo ni/ /gnyid che mtshan mo gnyid med byung ba'am/ /

rtag par gnyid 'ong pa'am yang na yar/ /rdul cher 'byung ba'am rdul mi 'byung / /glu dang gar dang dgod stsogs pa/ /spyod pa ngan pa la 'jug cing / /mig dmar mchi ma 'dzag dang bcas/ /zhum zhing rdzi ma 'khrugs par snang / /byin snying rtsib logs na ba dang / /

mgo bo rus tshigs na mgo 'khor/ /rna ba sgra dang nad dang bcas/ /mgul pa gra mas gang snyam sems/ /lce rtsub kun nas bsregs ltar snang / /lus lci tshigs ni 'bye snyam sems/ /mchil mar khrag mkhris bad kan 'byung / /mgo bo g.yo zhing skom dad che/ /

thor bu 'brum phran mtha' 'khor la/ /dmar zhing gnag pa 'byung bar 'gyur/ /snying na bshang gci sri ba'am/ /yang na nyung ba'am rab mang 'byung / /kha nang snum zhing nyams stobs chung / /gcom chung 'gyur zhing bla ba dang / /nad smin dka' zhing rmugs pa dang / /rgyun tu

gre ba 'dzer ba ni/ /'dus pa'i rims te mngon rmugs byed/ /de ni mdangs 'phrog ces kyang bshad/ /nad kyis bkag cing me drod nyams/ /mtshan ma thams cad rdzogs gyur pa/ /gsor mi rung te de las gzhan/ /gso dka' 'am dbang po ma tshang 'gyur/ /

gzhan yang 'dus pa las byung ba/ /gang du mkhris pa logs shig gnas/ /pags pa'am nang grol tsha ba dag /'debs pa'am tsha ba snga phyis 'byung / /de bzhin bad kan rlung grang ba/ /de gnyid tsha snga gso dka' yin/ /grang snga der ni mkhris pa yis/ /bad kan gsher ba skam pa dang / /

grang bzhi byes kha sgyur brgyal/ /myos dang skom dad skye bar 'gyur/ /tsha ba snga ma de rjes la/ /rmugs slon mchil mang khod snyom 'gyur/ /glo bur drag shul las byung dang / /mngon zin byad byas dmod byung bzhi/ /de la smas bcad mes tshig stsogs/ /ngal ba drag shul las byung yin/ /

de ni phal cher rlung nad kyis/ /khrag ni gnod cing 'khrugs byas pas/ /na bcas mdog nyams skrang dang bcas/ /zug gzer bcas pa'i rims skyed 'gyur/ /gdon zhugs sman gyi dri dang dug /khros 'jigs mya ngan gdon las 'byung / /mngon par zin las byung rims yin/ /

'dir gdon rgyu med dgod cing ngu / /sman gyi dri bskyed brgyal ba dang / /sbid pa glad nad skrangs par 'gyur/ /dug las brgyal dang tshad par 'khru/ /mdog nag lus tsha snying nad 'byung / /khros pas lus 'dar glad nad 'gyur/ /mya ngan 'jigs las bla bar 'gyur/ /'dod

las mgo 'khor yid 'chus tsha/ /ngo tsha gnyid blo brtan nyams 'gyur/ /gdon la sogs pa 'dus pa'i rims/ /'jig tshogs gsum ni rlung gi rims/ /khro las mkhris pa ldang bar 'gyur/ /dmod pa byad byas las byung gang / /'dus pa'i rims ni mi bzad pa/ /de ni

shin tu bzod dkar bshad/ /de la byad byas sngags kyis ni/ /sbyin sreg byas pa bzhin du byas/ /thog mar sems 'bab de 'og lus/ /de nas thor bu mgo 'khor skom/ /tsha bcas brgyal bas zin gyur ba'i/ /rims ni nyin re bzhin du 'phel/ /de ltar rims ni brgyad du bcas/ /

de dag mdor na rnam gnyis te/ /lus dang sems kyi rims dang ni/ /grang dang tsha dang phyi nang gnas/ /rang bzhin dang ni gyur ba dang / /gsor rung gsor mi rung ba dang / /smin dang ma smin zhes bya'o/ /lus rims thog mar lus tsha byed/ /sems kyi dang por snying tsha 'gyur/ /

rlung dang bad kan cig car ni/ /'byung tshe grang ba'i rims su 'gyur/ /mkhris pa dang ldan tsha ba ste/ /'dres pas 'dres pa'o nang gnas pa/ /rims nad dkyel ni bskyed 'gyur nas/ /nang na na zhing bshang gci sri/ /phyi rol rims ni tsha ba dang / /phyi rol gnas pa gso bar sla/ /

dbyar dang ston dang dpyid dus su/ /rlung stsogs rim 'byung rang bzhin rims/ /gzhan du gyur pa de gso dka'/ /phal cher rlung ni rang bzhin rims/ /yin yang gso bar dka' ba yin/ /dbyar dus rlung nad ldang 'gyur na/ /mkhris pa bad kan ldan rims 'gyur/ /ston ka mkhris bas nad

slong ste/ /bad kan de yi grogs byed 'gyur/ /der ni smyung ba byas gyur kyang / /gnod par 'gyur ba ma yin no/ /bad kan dpyid ldang de yang ni/ /de rjes rlung dang mkhris pa 'byung / /nyams stobs che zhing nad tshabs chung / /bla brnan med rims gso bar sla/ /rnam kun 'gyur bzhes

bya bar/ /gsor mi rung ba sngar bshad do/ /rims kyi nad tshabs che zhing tsha/ /khong rmya nyam chung gcin mang dang / /bshang sri kha zas mi 'ju la/ /bkres chung ma smin rims mtshan nyid/ /rims shugs stobs che skom dad che/ /bla zhing mgo 'khor dbugs mi bde/ /bshang gci

bder 'byung nad bskyod pa/ /smin par 'gyur pa'i mtshan ma yin/ /ma smin go bzlog mtshan nyid dang / /zhag bdun smyung byas las smin bshad/ /rims ni nad kyi dus dang ni/ /stobs chung che las rnam lngar bshad/ /phal cher 'dus par gyur ba yi/ /rims su mang du

'gyur bar bshad/ /rgyun dang rtag pa nyin gcig pa/ /nyin gsum pa dang nyin bzhi ba'o/ /lus zungs bshang gci rgyu ba yi/ /bu gnad kyis khyab byas pas/ /lus kun tsha bar gyur nas ni/ /gnod bya stsogs dang mnyam par 'phel/ /stobs che lus lci rkang lag rengs/ /khyad par du ni

dngas mar gnas/ /gnyen pos bcos dka' bzod par dka'/ /rgyun gyi rims su 'gyur ba yin/ /de yi drod kyis dri ma dang / /lus zungs myur du zad par byed/ /de 'og rnam kun lus zungs stsogs/ /dag pa'am ma dag rims kyis ni/ /rlung dang mkhris

pa bad kan zhag /bdun nam bcu'am bcu gnyis gnas/ /phal cher mtshams las mi 'da' bar/ /'tsho ba'am 'chi ba dag tu byed/ /de skad me bzhin 'jug gis bshad/ /ljang sngon gyis ni bshad pa'i gzhung / /bdun pa nyis bldab gyur ba yin/ /de bzhin dgu dang bcu gcig

bldab/ /'di ni nad gzhi gsum gyis tshigs/ /'tsho dang 'chi bar byed pa yin/ /rims dus dag dang ma dag las/ /yun rings dus su gnas pa yin/ /nad rtse zhil ba nyam chung dang / /kha zas mi 'phrod stsogs bsten pas/ /nad dkyel chung yang gnod bya stsogs/ /brten te

stobs che nyid gyur las/ /gnyen por bcas shing 'phel 'bri gnas/ /mi bzad pa ni nyid du 'gyur/ /de rnams kyis ni nad kyi stobs/ /rang gi dus su rims stobs skyed/ /slar yang de dag bcos thabs kyis/ /stobs che chung las ldog par byed/ /nad zad rims ni phrar gyur

pa/ /bcud la sogs pa nyid la thim/ /thim pas lus rid sha mdog nyams/ /rmongs bag la sogs de yis skyed/ /nye zhing kha ni bye ba'i phyir/ /dngas ma rgyu ba'i rtsa sgo las/ /lus kun myur du khyab pa ni/ /nad kyis skye bar byed pa yin/ /des na rgyun tu rtag rims 'gyur/ /

de las bzlog pa tshul mi 'dra/ /mi snyoms rtsol ba mi mnyam pa/ /bya ba'i dus min mnyam yun ring / /de ni nyin mtshan lan gnyis ldang / /gzhan dag nyin re lan re yin/ /phal cher nad ni khrag la brten/ /rtag pa'i rims ni byed par 'gyur/ /

de yang nyin mtshan lan gnyis ldang / /nyin gcig nyin re lan re ldang / /de ni sha yi rtsa la brten/ /gsum pa tshil gyi rtsa la gnas/ /mkhris pa rlung gnyis spyi nas 'dzin/ /bad kan mkhris gyur sum mdo na/ /rlung dang bad kan rgyab nas 'dzin/ /de ni zhag gcig gis chod yin/ /nyin bzhi pa'i rims

nad tshil dang / /rkang dang rus pa'i nang na gnas/ /gzhan dag tshil nyid la gnas zer/ /de yi nus pa bstan pa ni/ /bad kan gyis ni byin gnyis na/ /rlung gis glad pa na bar byed/ /rus rkang gnyis kar zhugs pa yin/ /nyin bzhi pa ni go bzlog pa'o/ /nyin gsum pas ni nyin gnyis na/ /nyin cig na bar mi byed do/ /nad rnams kyi ni stobs

che chung / /zas dang spyod pa las 'byung zhing / /de bzhin rims rnams 'byung ba ni/ /yid dang las las skye bar 'gyur/ /nad kyis lus zungs dkrugs gyur pa/ /nad sos nyi tshe zhu bar 'gyur/ /de tshe nad ba dbugs drag rdul/ /mkhun zhing slon byed 'gre ba dang / /lus 'dar tshig mang tshab dang / /lus grang bzhin mdog nyams pa

dang / /dran stor rims kyi shugs kyis gzir/ /khros pa'i tshul gyis lta ba dang / /bshang ba nad dang sgrar bcas pa/ /sla ba shugs drag 'byung ba yin/ /lus ni yang zhing rmya dang rmongs bag tsha ba med/ /kha na thor bu 'byung dang dbang po brtas shing bde/ /yid ni sor gnas rdul sbrid bder 'byung yi ga 'byed/ /mgo bo g.ya' ba rims

nad 'byang ba'i mtshan ma yin/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u gnyis pa'o// //de nas khrag dang mkhris pa dang lud pa'i nad gzhi bshad par bya'o/ /rab dro rab rno tsha dang skyur/ /lan tshwa la sogs tsha ba dang / /khre rgod ut+pa la yi zas/ /de bcas shin tu bsten drags dang / /mkhris pa can gyi mkhris nad ni/ /gsher dang khrag rgyas nad

du 'gyur/ /de ni phan tshun 'dres gyur bas/ /lus kun khyab par byed par 'gyur/ /mkhris pa khrag las gyur pa dang / /'dres dang gnod bya las dang gcig/ /mdog dang dri ni rjes mthun pas/ /khrag gi ming du bstan pa yin/ /de ni khrag gnas

mchin pa dang / /mcher pa las ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /mgo bo lci zhing yi ga 'chus/ /bsil 'dod sgregs pa dud can skyur/ /skyug cing skyugs mdog btsog par snang / /lud pa dbugs mi bde mgo 'khor/ /khong snyom khrag dmar nya dri bro/ /kha dri mi zhim skad 'gags la/ /mig la stsogs pa'i kha dog ni/ /

dmar dang ljang dang ser por snang / /rmi lam du yang kha dog de/ /'dir ni mthong bar 'gyur ba yin/ /stod du sna mig rna ba kha/ /smad du bshang sgo pho mo'i mtshan/ /ba spu'i bu ga kun las kyang / /khrag rab rgyas pa 'byung bar 'gyur/ /stod kyi bad kan yin gso sla/ /de ni bkru sman btang bas gso/ /sman mang yod cing

mkhris pa yi/ /sman gyi mchog ni bkru sman yin/ /zla la yod pa'i bad kan yang / /der ni de yis sbyangs byas 'gyur/ /de la sman ni mngar dang bska/ /bad kan dag la phan pa la/ /gang gtogs ngang gis bad kan sel/ /kha dang bska ba smos ci dgos/ /thur du 'byung ba'i rlung yin phyir/ /de ni skyug sman btang

bas gso/ /mkhris pa'i sman ni nyung ba yin/ /skyug sman mkhris pa'i sman mchog yin/ /zla la yod pa'i rlung nad kyang / /de ni de yis zhi mi 'gyur/ /de la ro ni mngar bskol ba/ /'ba' zhig phan par 'gyur ba yin/ /bad kan rlung ni 'dres pa'i nad/ /gnyi gar 'byung ba gso dka' ste/ /bzlog pa'i thabs ni med phyir dang /

sman yang yod pa ma yin no/ /'di las bzlog par bya ba'i thabs/ /sbyang ba'ang yod pa ma yin te/ /sbyangs pas bzlog par bya ba dang / /sman pas khrag mkhris gso ba yin/ /mkhris pa nye bar zhi ba yang / /'di las yong ye yod ma yin/ /'dres par gyur ba'i nad la ni/ /thams cad sel ba'i zhi bya phan/ /de la nad dang rjes

mthun pa'i/ /gtar ga btab ste brtag par bya/ /bla brnan byung bar gyur pa dag /'gyur bar shes las rtogs par bya/ /de la lud pa myur gnod byed/ /de phyir de nyid bshad par bya/ /lud pa rlung mkhris bad kan dang / /glo rdol glo gcong la lngar bshad/ /thams cad ma gsos zad byed 'gyur/ /phyi ma bzhin du stobs chen yin/ /de

rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i rtags/ /gre ba g.ya' zhing yi ga 'chus/ /gre nang gra mas gang snyam sems/ /de la thur rgyu'i rlung gnod 'gyur/ /stod du song ste brang du phyin/ /de tshe mgul ba'i nad du zhen/ /mgo ba'i rtsa rnams bkang nas ni/ /de nas yan lag 'degs pa ltar/ /g.yengs byed mig rdol tsam du na/ /rgyab brang

rtsib logs na zhing zug /kha ru 'byung zhing rgyu ba ni/ /lud pa snod chag 'dra'i sgra 'byung / /nad gzhi'i dbye bas nad kyang ni/ /tha dang shugs dang bcas pa yin/ /nad gang sgra ni mi snyoms pa'i/ /de las lud pa 'byung ba yin/ /rlung nad skyes pa rlung 'khrugs pa/ /brang dang gre ba skam zhing / /snying brang rtsib logs klad pa

gzer/ /rmongs bag khong 'khrugs skad 'gags shing / /lud pa skam po 'byung byed cing / /na ba'i shugs drag sgra cher 'byung / /lus kun brtse bcas bad kan skam/ /'thon par dka' zhing nyung ngu 'byung / /mkhris pas mig dang bad kan ser/ /kha nang kha zhing rims mgo 'khor/ /khrag mkhris slon zhing skom

dad che/ /skad 'gags dud 'dra skyur ba dang / /lud pa'i shugs kyi rgyun 'byung ba/ /skar mda' 'phro ba lta bur snang / /bad kan las brang nad tshabs chung / /mgo lci snying ga gang snyam sems/ /gre bar bskus 'dra snyom par byed/ /cham 'debs zas skyug yi ga 'chus/ /spu rtse lud pa skam pa dang / /snum zhing dkar ba 'byung bar

'gyur/ /stobs 'gyed la sogs drag shul rnams/ /mi nus bzhin byas de dang des/ /rlung gis brang nang glo dral la/ /mkhris pa rjes 'brangs dkyel gyur pa/ /'khrugs te lud pa lu bar byed/ /de ni bad kan khrag bcas dang / /ser zhing gnag la skam pa dang / /ril ril por mnam mang du 'byung / /'byung tshe gre ba na ba dang / /

brang ni dral ba snyam du sems/ /khab ni rnon pos phug snyam sems/ /gzer gyis 'debs par byed pa dang / /tshigs 'bye rims dang dbugs mi bde/ /skad 'gags lus 'dar skom dad che/ /phug ron lta bur mkhun 'byin to/ /rtsib logs gzer 'gyur de nas ni/ /rim gyis stobs dang me drod dang / /nus pa nyams ni 'bri bar

'gyur/ /zad byed kyis gcin khrag dang bcas/ /rgyab dang rkang pa na bar 'gyur/ /gtso bo rlung ni 'khrugs pa yis/ /lus zungs zad byed nad rgyal bo/ /glo gcong gi ni gnas byed cing / /lud pa lu zhing bad kan 'byung / /rnag 'dra mnam zhing ser ba dang / /rul zhing rtsa sngo dmar ba dang / /rtsib logs bton pa ltar sems shing / /snying ni

ltung bsnyam du byed/ /rgyu med dro dang grang ba 'dod/ /zas mang za zhing nyams stobs zad/ /bzhin ni snum zhing dang bar snang / /mig ni mdang ldan pa lta sdug 'gyur/ /de nas de las zad byed 'gyur/ /thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin/ /de ltar glo rdol las byung lud/ /nyam chung lus ni 'jig byed de/ /stobs ldan gso ba brtsam du rung / /

glo gcong las byung de dang 'dra/ /de gnyis gsar byung mgon ldan 'grub/ /nad gzhi tha dad gsum gsor rung / /gnyis 'dres kun kyang rgan po ni/ /na tshod zad btab 'tsho btsam/ /lud pa yal bar bor ba las/ /dbugs mi bde dang zad byed slon/ /skad 'gags la sogs nad 'byung 'gyur/ /de phyir de ni myur du gso/ /yan

lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u gsum pa'o// //de nas dbugs mi bde ba dang skyigs bus btab pa'i nad gzhi bshad par bya'o/ /lud pa 'phel ba'am sngar nad gzhi/ /'khrugs las dbugs mi bde 'byung 'gyur/ /ma zhu tshad 'khru slon dug 'thungs/ /skya rbab rims btab las kyang 'byung / /

phran tshegs mun can chad pa dang / /chen po gyen 'byung rnam pa lnga/ /bad kan gyis ni rgyu lam bkag /rlung ni sna tshogs khyab par gnas/ /srog dang zas skom rgyu ba'i lam/ /sbu gu nad kyis bkag pas na/ /ma zhu'i gnas nas 'byung ba'i dbugs/ /brang gnas dbugs mi bde bar byed/ /de yi sngon

tshul snying rtsib logs/ /gzer zhing srog rlung mi mthun rgyu/ /spos dang mur 'gram na ba yin/ /des ni drag shul 'grangs drags pas/ /bskyod pa'i rngam pa phran tshegs 'gyur/ /de ni rang nyid zhi bar 'gyur/ /rlung gis rtsa sbubs logs rgyu byed/ /bad kan slongs par gyur nas ni/ /klad pa mgul ba'i nang song ste/ /brang dang

rtsib logs na bar byed/ /lud pa ngar sgra 'dzer mi dran/ /cham pa mi bzad yi ga 'chus/ /mi bzad shugs ni skyed byed cing / /dbugs mi bde bde'i shugs kyis/ /srog la gnod 'gyur lud pa'i mthar/ /skad cig bde bar byed pa yin/ /nyal tshe shin tu mi bde la/ /'dug na cung zad bde bar 'gyur/ /mig gdangs

'phral ba'i phyogs nas ni/ /rngul 'dzag shin tu na bas nyen/ /kha skam dbugs ni bstud mar 'byung / /dro ba 'dod cing 'dar dang bcas/ /char 'bab grang dang ser bus phog /bad kan bskyed pas rnam par 'phel/ /mun can de ni 'tsho bya tsam/ /nyams ldan gsar du btab gso sla/ /rims dang brgyal

las byung gang ba'i/ /sman gyis zhi ste rab mun can/ /dbugs 'chad dbugs 'byin rgyun chad pa'i/ /gnad gcod nad kyis gzir bar byed/ /rngul bcas brgyal dang spos dang bcas/ /lgang pa tsha zhing gcin 'gags byed/ /mig mi sdug cing thur du lta/ /mig gcig dmar zhing dran pa stor/ /kha skam smre zhing skad

gdangs dma'/ /gzim dngas nyams shing sems bral ba'o/ /chen por ro cher 'byung zhing / /sgra che sdur pa drag pa dang / /bskyod pa bzhin du 'byung 'gyur zhing / /khyu mchog rgyags pa'i nga ro 'dra/ /shes dang rnam shes rab nyams shing / /mig 'khrul bzhin ni 'gyur ba dang / /ro stod zhum par 'gyur ba dang / /bshang

gci 'gags shing skad gsang nyams/ /mgul skam yang dang yang mi dran/ /rna ba mur 'gram klad pa na/ /gyen 'byung dbugs ni ring du 'byin/ /slar ni thur du rngub mi nus/ /bad kan gyis kha rtsa sgo 'gags/ /rlung ni 'khrugs pas gzir 'gyur ba/ /gyen du blta zhing 'khrul byed pas/ /mig ni kun tu lta byed pa/ /gnad rnams

'chad par byed bzhin du/ /skad 'gags smre sngags 'don par byed/ /'di dag ma tshang gsor rung la/ /tshang na nges par srog 'phrog byed/ /dbugs mi bde rgyu sngon tshul dang / /grangs dang rang bzhin rten gcig yin/ /skyigs bu thas byung phran tshegs dang / /zung dang chen por 'byung ba dang / /

za bdag dang rnam pa lnga/ /de la rlung gis ring zos dang / /rtsub tsha sra dang ma goms pa'i/ /zas dang skom gyis btsir gyur pa'i/ /rlung gis skyigs bu nad med dang / /sgra mi grag cing sbrid 'byung ste/ /gang zhig goms pa'i zas skom gyis/ /zhi 'gyur

skyigs bu zas byung yin/ /drag shul gyis rlung cung zad be skyod/ /skyigs bu phra mo 'byung bar 'gyur/ /nam tshong rtsa ba nas 'byung byed/ /de ni shul ngal 'jam pa yin/ /rtsol ba drag po 'phel 'gyur la/ /zas zos tsam gyis dal bar 'gyur/ /

zung 'byung tshigs ni ring bal/ /gang zhig zas las 'byung 'gyur ba/ /'ju bar nye ba'i tshe na 'dabs/ /zas zhu zin nas 'phel 'gyur ba'o/ /mgo dang mgul pa 'dar byed cing / /sbo dang shin tu skom dad skyed/ /bla dang slon dang tshad par 'khru/ /mig

gdangs glal ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /skyigs bu zung 'byung shugs drag la/ /zhu dang bcas par de shes bya/ /skyigs bu chen po 'byung ba'i tshul/ /smin ma mur 'gram gnyis rengs shing / /mi gnas ma chi 'dzag har bar lta/ /lus rengs tshig ni thogs

byed cing / /dran dang 'du shes 'khrul par byed/ /mid pa'am sbubs ni 'gags byed cing / /gnad kyi tshogs ni skyod par byed/ /rgyab sgu lus ni khong skem byed/ /rtsa ba che zhing sgra che la/ /nad tshabs che zhing stobs cher 'byung / /zhu ba'i gnas sam lte 'og

nas/ /snga ma 'dra bar gang zhig 'byung / /de 'dra'i tshul ni bstud mar 'byung / /glal dang rkang lag bya rmyang byed/ /brag ca zab 'byung zab mo'o/ /de rnams las ni dang po yi/ /gnyis po gso bar bya ba yin/ /tha ma gnyis dang zung 'byung ba/ /mtshan nyid

kun rdzogs shugs drag spang / /'di dag thams cad yun rings bsags/ /rgad po bud med kyis dub dang / /nad kyis nyam chung zas bcad pa/ /glo rdol nad can spang bar bya/ /nad kun gyis 'chi byed mod kyi/ /skyigs bu dbugs mi bde [(]bltar[,]ltar[)]/ /

nad gzhan myur du gsod mi byed/ /'di dag 'chi tshe nges 'byung 'gyur/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u bzhi pa'o// //de nas glo gcong chen po zad byed kyi le'u bshad par bya'o/ /nad ni du ma rjes 'brang zhing / /nad mang sngon du

'gro 'gyur la/ /rgyal po zad byed skem byed dang / /nad kyi rgyal po zhes kyang bshad/ /rgyu skar rnams dang bram ze yi/ /rgyal po'i gcong du sngon gyur cing / /gang yang nad kyi rgyal por 'gyur/ /de phyir gnod pa'i rgyal por bshad/ /lus dang sman ni zad byed cing / /

zad las 'byung bas zad byed yin/ /drangs stsogs skems pas skem byed yin/ /de rnams de las gsal pas rgyal/ /drag shul bsten dang shugs bkag dang / /khu chu drangs ma snum zad dang / /zas skom cho ga dang bral bsten/ /bzhi po 'di dag de yi rgyu/ /

de yis rlung dang mkhris pa dang / /bad kan bslangs nas thams cad du/ /lus kyi tshigs kun la zhugs te/ /de yis rtsa sgo la gnod cing / /bu ga'i sgo ni bkag pa'am/ /yang na shin tu kha bye 'gyur/ /stod smad thad kar gnas nas ni/ /rang gi nad ni ji bzhin

skyed/ /de 'byung 'gyur ba'i sngon tshul ni/ /cham 'debs sbrid pa shin tu mang / /mchil ma kha nas ro mngar bro/ /lus dang me drod nyam chung byed/ /gzhong snod zas skom la sogs ni/ /gtsang yang mi gtsang nyid du mthong / /phal cher zas dang skom stsogs la/

sbrang ma sku dang rtsa stsogs 'bab/ /snying 'phar slon bro yi ga 'chus/ /kha zas zos kyang nyams stobs zad/ /lag par lta zhing rkang gdong skrang / /mig ni shin tu dkar por snang / /lag ngar dag ni 'jal bar 'dod/ /lus la 'jigs su rung bar mthong / /bud med

chang dang sha la dga'/ /smod dang klad pa 'gebs par byed/ /skra dang sen mo shin tu 'phel/ /rmi lam du ni phye ma leb/ /rtsangs pa sdig sbrul gcan gzan spre'u/ /bya rnams kyis ni gtses par mthong / /skra rus phub ma thal stsogs kyi/ /phung po la ni

'dzegs pa dang / /yul dang grong ni stong pa dang / /chu klung skams par rmi lam mthong / /skar mda' ri bo ltung ba dang / /ljon shing rnams ni 'bar ba rmi/ /stod du gnas na cham pas 'debs/ /lud pa lu zhing dbugs mi bde/ /phrag pa spyi bo na ba dang / /skad 'gags yi ga 'chus par

'gyur/ /smad gnas bshang sla rtug skem byed/ /nang grol nang gnas slon par byed/ /thad kar gnas pas rtsib logs zug /tshigs la gnas na rims su 'gyur/ /de ltar nad tshul bcu gcig ni/ /gcong chen ldan las 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de rnams kyi ni bla brnan dag /skad

'gags brang du na ba dang / /kha glal lus grugs mchil snabs mang / /drod nyams kha mnam yin shes bya/ /de la rlung gyur klad pa dang / /rtsib logs zug sha yan lag na/ /skad 'gags mgul pa subs par 'gyur/ /mkhris rgyas rkang lag phrag pa tsha/ /

tshad 'khru khrag tu slon pa dang / /kha mnam rims 'debs myos par 'gyur/ /bad kan las gyur yi ga 'chus/ /slon lud lus dang yan lag lci/ /mchil snabs mang zhing cham pas 'debs/ /dbugs mi bde skad 'gags drod nyams/ /nad kyi me drod nyam chung

bas/ /'byar bcas bad kan rgyas gyur nas/ /rtsa sbubs sgo ni 'gags pa dang / /lus zungs drod ni chung 'gyur bas/ /dngas ma rang gi gnas su ni/ /ma zhu bla brnan de dang de/ /skyed cing sha stsogs mi 'gyur la/ /khrag ni gyen du 'byung bar byed/ /khong pa nyid du zas

'du bas/ /dngas mar 'gyur bar mi byed cing / /phal cher dri ma nyid 'gyur gyi/ /lus zungs 'phel bar mi byed do/ /dngas ma khrag tu mi 'gyur na/ /shar 'gyur ba lta smos ci dgos/ /zad byed can ni bshang 'phel ba/ /'ba' zhig gis ni gnas par byed/ /mtshan

ma chung yang nyam chung zhing / /nad kyis sman gyi stobs mi bzod/ /spang bya de las gzhan pa ni/ /thams cad ldan yang gso bar bya/ /nad ni sna re 'dus pa dang / /zad byed tshil las gyur pa drug/ /skad 'gags kyi ni dbye ba yin/ /de las

rlung g.yo nyam chung rtsub/ /gre ba gra mas gang snyam byed/ /de la snum dro 'o ma phan/ /mkhris pa las gyur rkan lkog tsha/ /skam zhing smra bar mi nus 'gyur/ /bad kan mgul ba byugs snyam byed/ /skad kyi gsang dma' ngar ngar 'dzer/ /thogs bcas

'gyur ro thams cad kyi/ /mtshan ma thams cad ldan pa yin/ /zad byed las ni drud snyam byed/ /du bas bdugs ltar shin tu na/ /tshil gyur bad kan bdag gnyid can/ /tshig gi brda sprod mi nus 'gyur/ /'dir ni 'dus dang tha mar spang / /yi ga 'chus pa'i nad

rnams ni/ /lce snying gnas pa so so dang / /'dus pa dang ni yid kyi ni/ /gdung ba las gyur lnga pa yin/ /kha ni bska dang kha mngar bro/ /rlung stsogs gsum dang rim bzhin sbyar/ /kun las gyur pa ro bro med/ /mya ngan khro stsogs nad ji bzhin/ /slon bro nad gzhi

sna re kun/ /mi sdug yul las byung lnga pa/ /'di dag stod du rgyu ba'i rlung / /'khrugs pas nad ni thams cad phul/ /de rnams bslangs na kha tsha bro/ /mchil mang yi ga 'chus sngon byung / /rlung gyur lte ba rgyab tu zug /rtsib logs na zhing zas slon nas/ /

cung zad 'byung zhing chad pa dang / /ro bska lbu ba can du skyugs/ /sgregs pa'i sgra bcas mdog gnag la/ /sla zhing 'byung dka' sgra dang bcas/ /lud pa kha skam glad snying na/ /skad 'gags pa dang khong snyom bcas/ /mkhris gyur thal chu 'dra ba la/ /dung kha

ljang sngon mdog ser skyug /khrag bcas ro skyur tsha zhing bro/ /skom dad brgyal tsha brdungs bcas yin/ /bad kan las byung snum bska bsil/ /nal nal bor 'dug dra ba ris/ /ro mngar lan tshwa bro tshabs che/ /chags shing ba spu brtse bar byed/ /gdong

skrang kha nang mngar ba bro/ /snyom zhing snying na lud pa can/ /gsum char las byung rtags kun ldan/ /'chi ltas las bshad gang de spang / /rul dang mi gtsang btsog pa dang / /skyugs bro mthong dang thos stsogs kyis/ /yid gdung snying la phog gyur slon/ /

mi sdug yul las byung ba yin/ /yid mi bde skom srin be'u snabs/ /rlung stsogs nyid la gnas par brtag /gzer dang 'phar dang snying na ba/ /bye brag tu ni srin bu'i nad/ /srin bu'i snying nad mtshan ma las/ /de ni shes par bya ba yin/ /snying nad nad

ni re re 'dus/ /srin bu las gyur rnam lngar bshad/ /rlung gis shin tu zug cing na/ /gas dang bshags pa snyam du sems/ /bcom snyam sems shing skam la rengs/ /snying ga stong snyam zag par byed/ /rgyu med zhum zhing mi dga' la/ /'jigs

shing dgra ni mi bzod cing / /'phar zhing 'gre la gcus snyam byed/ /rmongs bag dbugs thung gnyid chung 'gyur/ /mkhris gyur snyom dang mgo 'khor brgyal/ /tsha rngul snying ga skyur lus snyom/ /mkhris pa skyur ba slon par byed/ /dud pa khar song ser rims

'debs/ /bad kan las byung snying ga rengs/ /khong na rdo bcug lta bur lci/ /drod nyams mchil mang lud pa lu/ /gnyid che snyom rims yi ga 'chus/ /nyes gsum mtshan nyid thams cad ldan/ /srin bus mig ni gnag pa dang / /mun par

zhugs snyom byed snying 'phar/ /lus skam g.ya' zhing bad kan 'dzag /'di ni rtag tu sog le yis/ /snying la 'drud pa lta bur sems/ /mi bzad nad des myur gsod pas/ /de ni rings par gso bar bya/ /skom dang rlung mkhris bad kan dang / /'dus

pa dngas ma zad pa dang / /nad 'dres pa las drug tu 'gyur/ /de ltar gyur pa thams cad la/ /rlung mkhris gnyis ni rgyu yin te/ /de 'khrugs lus zungs bsil ba ni/ /skams nas ldang bar 'gyur ba yin/ /lus kun 'dar zhing mgo 'khor tsha/ /skom dang khong tsha rmongs par byed/ /

lce drung mgul pa glo ba dang / /skom dad skom 'thungs rgyu ba'i rtsa/ /skom pas skom dad skye bar 'gyur/ /de rnams kyi ni spyi'i mtshan nyid/ /kha skam skom gyis mi ngoms dang / /zas la mi dga' skad 'gags dang / /gre ba lce mchu rtsub mor 'gyur/ /lce 'byin byed cing khong snyom

la/ /bla zhing sems ni myos pa dang / /de bzhin skom gdung nad du 'gyur/ /lus skams rmya zhing 'on pa dang / /rmongs bag mgo 'khor snying nad de/ /'di lta bu yi nad rnams ni/ /skom pas gdungs las skye bar 'gyur/ /rlung 'gyur khong rmya nyam chung la/ /mur 'gram zug cing klad pa 'khor/ /sna lces dri

dang ro mi tshor/ /'on zhing gnyid med nyams stobs zad/ /chu grang 'thungs na skom 'phel 'gyur/ /mkhris pa kha nang ro khyab rgyal/ /mngar por mthong zhing rtag par ni/ /kha skam khong tsha dbugs mnam pa'o/ /bad kan ldang bas skom rgyu'i rtsa/ /bkag pas rlung ni 'khrugs gyur nas/ /de tshe de yis bad kan

ni/ /'dam bzhin de yis skem par byed/ /mgul pa gra mas gang snyam sems/ /gnyid che kha nang mngar bar bro/ /lto ba mgo bo tshor ba chung / /rmongs bag slon gyur yig 'chus/ /lus skam kha zas mi 'ju'o/ /kun las gyur pa rtags kun ldan/ /be'u snabs las gyur kha zas ni/ /mid dka' rlung mkhris las

gyur yin/ /tsha bas ngal bas 'phral du na/ /chu grang bsten gyur skom dad che/ /khong par tsha ba bsdus pa yis/ /skom dad de ni mkhris skyes yin/ /gang yang chang drags me drod rno/ /snum zos skyes pa'ang mkhris 'byung yin/ /snum zhing skyur dang lan tshwa'i bag /zos pas bad kan las skyes 'gyur/ /zad byed las

ni skom dad 'gyur/ /dngas ma zad dang mtshan nyid 'dra/ /khong skam gcin nad rims nad stsogs/ /yun rings nad ni rims skom nad/ /gang zhig skom dang mi bzang skyes/ /de ni 'dres las 'byung bar bshad/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u lnga pa'o/ /

de nas chang nad kyi nad gzhi bshad par bya'o/ /rno dang drod che rtsub phra skyur/ /nyal po 'dod myur byed dang yang / /gsal dang dang bar byed par bshad/ /mdangs ni 'di las go bzlog yin/ /dug kyang rno stsogs yin mod kyis/ /sems la gnod par byed pa yin/ /nus pas 'chi bar byed pas na/ /dug

ni lhag par mthu che'o/ /chang ni rno stsogs yon tan gyi/ /mdangs kyi yon tan rtul la stsogs/ /bcu po bcu yis 'khrugs byas nas/ /sems ni sgyur bar byed pa yin/ /ra ro dang po gnyis pa yis/ /bag med pa yi gnas la gnas/ /rnam rtog ngan bcom rmongs pa rnams/ /

bde ba yin snyam sems par 'gyur/ /'bring dang chen po bar gyi tshe/ /rngul dang mun pa'i rang bzhin can/ /glang chen lcags kyu med pa ltar/ /rmongs pas mi bya ci yang med/ /'di ni kha nam tho'i gnas/ /'di ni tshul khrims 'chal pa'i gzhi/ /'di gcig ngan 'gror

'gro ba'i lam/ /mang po ston par byed pa yin/ /ra ro gsum pa'i tshe na ni/ /sems med par ni ro ltar nyal/ /nyes pa'i bdag nyid shi ba las/ /shin tu ma rungs gnas skabs 'thob/ /chos dang chos min bde dang sdug /don dang don min phan dang gnod/ /gang la chags

pa mi shes pa/ /de la mkhas pas ji ltar bsten/ /chang las myos 'jigs mya ngan dang / /khro dang srog dang bral ba nas/ /smyo byed myos dang brgyal bar bcas/ /brjed byed bcas pa kun song nad/ /gang du dran pa nyams gcig yod/ /der ni mi dge thams cad 'byung / /

mi 'phrod zas ni zos pas kyang / /nad dam yang na 'chi bar 'gyur/ /chang ni sde tshan gsum blo ldan/ /ngo tsha stsogs kyang 'jig par byed/ /nyams stobs ldan dang zas zos dang / /zas cher za dang snum bag za/ /snying stobs lang tshor ldan pa dang / /rtag tu chang 'thungs de'i rigs skyes/ /

tshil dang bad kan shas che la/ /rlung dang mkhris pa shas chung dang / /me drod che zhing brtan pa rnams/ /shas cher ra ror mi 'gyur ro/ /de las bzlog pa chang dad can/ /khros dang chang rtsub skyur shas che/ /ma zhur bcas dang mnga' 'thung pa/ /gang yin shas cher ra ror 'gyur/ /rlung

mkhris bad kan kun las byung / /chang nad rnam pa bzhir 'gyur ro/ /kun kyang kun las skyes mod kyi/ /shas che ba las ming du btags/ /de rnams kyi ni spyi mtshan nyid/ /rmongs dang snying ni na ba dang / /'khru zhing rtag tu skom dad che/ /tsha grang rims 'debs yi ga 'chus/ /

mgo bo rtsib rus na dang 'dar/ /gnad 'jig ltag pa na ba dang / /brla rengs rab rib khyer ba dang / /lud pa dbugs mi bde gnyid med/ /rngul cher 'byung zhing bshang ba 'gags/ /skang zhing sems ni 'khrul pa dang / /bla zhing slon par byed pa dang / /

mgo 'khor rmi lam ngan mthong ba'o/ /rlung gyur khyad par gnyid mi 'ong / /dbugs mi bde zhing klad na 'dar/ /rmi lam du ni 'phyan zhing 'phur/ /gshin po rnams dang gtam smra rmi/ /mkhris pas lus tsha skad 'gags dang / /rmongs bag tshad 'khru skom mgo 'khor/ /

lus mdog ljang dang ser ba dang / /mig dang mkhur tshos dmar bar 'gyur/ /bad kan gyis slon snying na dang / /gnyid che grang 'dar yan lag lci/ /kun skyes mtshan nyid kun dang ldan/ /chang spangs pa las 'phral du ni/ /mang du 'thungs sam ma goms

'thungs/ /de las 'joms dang lus skam nad/ /rlung las sdug bsngal ldan pa 'byung / /nyam chung ba la mchog tu 'byung / /'joms pas bad kan mchil ma mang / /lkog ma skams shing gnyid rab che/ /sgra drag mi bzod glong bag 'gyur/ /lud skam yan lag

mgo rab na/ /snying nad mgul nad rmongs bag dang / /lud pa skom dad slon rims 'debs/ /gang zhig chang rnams spangs pas ni/ /dbang po thul zhing brtags te byed/ /nam yang de la lus sems kyi/ /skyon rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rdul dang mun pa mi 'phrod

zas/ /mchog tu bsten las nad gsum 'byung / /dngas ma khrag dang sems rgyu ba'i/ /rtsa sbubs bkag pa las byung ba/ /myos dang brgyal dang kun song nad/ /phyi ma bzhin du stobs rab che/ /'dir myos nad sna re re kun/ /khrag chang dug rnams las kyang 'byung / /

rlung las gtam la chags pa dang / /mang smra nyung smra spyod pa 'khrul/ /lus ni rtsub gnag dmar ba yi/ /myos pa rlung las skyes pa yin/ /mkhris pa las khro dmar ba dang / /ser por snang zhing rtsod la dga'/ /bad kan tshig nyung 'brel smra skya/ /sems

las che zhing le lo che/ /'dus pa mtshan nyid kun dang ldan/ /khrag las mig dang yan lag rengs/ /mkhris pa'i mtshan nyid ldan pa yin/ /chang gis yan lag skad bskyod 'gyur/ /dug gis 'dar zhing gnyid rab che/ /de ni kun las myos tshabs che/ /

khrag stsogs pa yis rlung stsogs pa'i/ /mtshan nyid lhag par shes par bya/ /brgyal ba rlung gi bdag nyid can/ /nam mkha' dmar sngo gnag par ni/ /mthong zhing mun par zhugs snyam sems/ /myur du sangs par byed pa dang / /snying na 'dar zhing

mgo 'khor la/ /skem zhing bzhin mdog dmar nag 'gyur/ /mkhris pas dmar ba'am ser por ni/ /nam mkha' mthong zhing mun 'thibs byed/ /sangs nas rdul dang bcas pa dang / /tsha skom gdungs pas nyen pa dang / /'khru zhing kha dog ser

dang dmar/ /mig dmar ser bar snang bar 'gyur/ /bad kan gyis ni sprin lta bur/ /nam mkha' mthong zhing mun 'thibs byed/ /rings nas sangs par 'gyur ba dang / /snying na bcas pas mchil ma mang / /pags pa rlon pas g.yogs pa bzhin/ /yan

lag lci zhing tshor ba chung / /nyes pa gsum gyi mtshan kun ldan/ /brjed byed gnyis pa lta bu ste/ /myur du 'gyel zhing brgyal 'gyur la/ /'jigs rung spyod pa med pa yin/ /lus can myos dang brgyal ba yis/ /nad la shugs yod gyur kyang ni/ /

rang nyid zhi bar 'gyur ba yin/ /kun zhugs sman med par mi zhi/ /nad ni shin tu stobs che la/ /'dus pa las gyur kun zhugs pa/ /srog gi gnas la brten pa yis/ /lus dang ngag yid spyod pa 'phrog /de yis skyes bu ro dang ni/ /shing dang

rtsig pa 'dra bar byed/ /rings par gso bar ma byas na/ /myur du 'chi bar byed pa yin/ /mtsho zab chu srin mang po can/ /chu 'jing 'jug ngogs med par ni/ /kun zhugs pa ni nub byed la/ /mi ni myur du gdon par bya/ /rigs pas brten dang bral

ba'i chang 'thungs pas/ /myos dregs khro dang bral ba'i rang bzhin can/ /rang gi dgra bos yongs su 'khyud 'gyur zhing / /rigs dang mi rigs mnyam par byed par 'gyur/ /stobs dang dus dang yul dang goms pa dang / /rang bzhin grogs

dang na tshod nad rnams ni/ /legs brtags de dang rjes mthun gang zhig 'thung / /de ni bdud rtsi 'thungs dang mtshungs pa yin/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u drug pa'o// //de nas gzhang 'brum gyi nad gzhi

bshad par bya'o/ /dgra ltar srog chags rnams kyi tshe/ /gzhang 'brum 'byung bas gsod byed pas/ /de phyir bshang ba'i lam 'gegs pas/ /gzhang 'brum zhes ni bshad pa yin/ /nad kyis lpags tshil sha rnams ni/ /gnod byas dbyibs ni sna tshogs pa'i/ /

sha yi myu gu gzhang stsogs su/ /skyes de gzhang 'brum yin par bshad/ /lhan cig skyes dang phyis 'byung dang / /skam dang khrag tu 'dzag pa yi/ /dbye bas mdor na rnam gnyis yin/ /gzhang ni rgyu ma sbom por brten/ /sor ni phyed dang lnga yod do/ /

gnyer gsum sor ni phyed dang gnyis/ /rim pa de yi nang ma ni/ /phyir 'phul bar ma sel ba yin/ /de yi phyi rol 'dzum pa yin/ /de yi phyi rol sor gcig kha/ /nas ni phyed dang gnyis kyi tshad/ /de phan chad ni spu skye 'gyur/ /de la lhan cig skyes

pa'i rgyu/ /gnyer ma'i sa bon gnod 'gyur nyid/ /gzhang 'brum sa bon gnod pa yang / /pha mas mi 'phrod zos pa dang / /sngon las de gnyis dang 'dus pa/ /'khrugs pa las gyur de dag ni/ /gsor mi rung ba nyid du bshad/ /rigs 'byung nad kun de

dang 'dra/ /lhan cig skyes pa khyad par du/ /rtsub cing brta bar dka' ba dang / /nang du kha bltas dkar ba dang / /bla brnan mi bzod can gso dka'/ /cig shos drug ste nad tha dad/ /'dres dang 'dus pa khrag las 'byung / /rlung dang bad kan gnyis las

skam/ /khrag dang mkhris pa las rlan can/ /nad rnams ldang rgyu sngar bshad pa/ /'khrugs pa de yis khong pa yi/ /me drod nyams shing bshang ba 'phel/ /gzhan yang nyal bo rab drags dang / /gzhon pas khong dkrugs stan dag ni/ /ma snyoms sra dang tsog

pur 'dug /'jam rtsi'i gce'u sa dang ni/ /rdo dang gos kyis drud pa dang / /shin tu grang ba'i chus bkrus dang / /rtag tu 'khru bar byed pa dang / /bshang dang gci dang 'phyen gyi shugs/ /bkag dang nan gyis btsir ba dang / /rims dang skran dang tshad par 'khru/ /

'or nad skya rbab be snabs kyis/ /skems byas gnod par 'gyur ba yi/ /spyod pa bsten las 'byung bar 'gyur/ /bud med zla grangs ma tshang 'phyil/ /zla ba rdzogs pas gzir las 'byung / /de 'dra dag dang gzhan yang rlung / /thur sel 'khrugs pas dri ma ni/ /

gzhang gi gnyer mar de gzhag pas/ /de ni mi mngon gyur pas gnas/ /gzhang 'brum 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin/ /de yi sngon tshul me drod nyams/ /brla ni rengs shing na ba dang / /byin pa'i nywa na mgo 'khor zhing / /yan lag na zhing mig gnyis skrang / /

bshang ba 'khru ba'am yang ni sri/ /rlung chen nang nas 'khyil ba dang / /phal cher lte ba'i 'og nas rgyu/ /nad bcas bcad pa lta bur sems/ /dka' bar 'byung zhing sgra can 'byung / /rgyu ma krul krul zer zhing spos/ /skem zhing sgregs pa mang du

'byung / /gcin mang bshang nyung yi ga 'chus/ /sgregs pa dud 'drar skyur ba 'byung / /mgo dang brang dang rgyab tu gzer/ /snyom zhing kha dog nyams pa dang / /glong bag dbang po nyam chung la/ /khro zhing bsnyen bkur dka' ba dang / /ma zhu skem nad

skya rbab dang / /dmu rdzing rnams la som nyi skyes/ /gzhang 'brum skye bar gyur ba la/ /'di dag nyid ni 'phel bar 'gyur/ /de yis 'og gi lam bkag pas/ /thur du sel ba'i rlang log ste/ /lus dang dbang po kun gnas pa'i/ /rlung gzhan

thams cad 'khrug par byed/ /de bzhin bshang gci mkhris pa dang / /bad kan lus zungs rten bcas pa/ /'khrugs shing me drod nyams par byed/ /de nas gzhang 'brum nad can la/ /phal cher thams cad nyer 'byung ba/ /skem

zhing mchog tu bskyod mi nus/ /stobs zad khong rmya bzhin mdangs nyams/ /lus lhod snying po med 'gyur zhing / /'bus zos pa yi shing 'dra la/ /bla brnan ma lus dag gis 'debs/ /ji skad bshad pa'i gnad gzir zhing / /lud pa skam dang skad

'gags dang / /kha ro mi tshor cham 'debs sbo/ /sgyid sgyur rka lag na zhing slon/ /sbrid pa skrang dang rims nad dang / /khu ba zad cing rab rib slon/ /rde'u chags nad kyis gzir ba dang / /skad 'gags zhum la sems khong chud/ /mchil ma mang 'dor

yi ga 'chus/ /rus tshigs kun dang snying lte ba/ /gzhang dang sna rtsa gzir dang bcas/ /gzhang nang 'bru ni ma smin btsos/ /khu ba lta bu'i sbyin bag 'dzag /rtug skam sbyin pa'am sla bar 'gyur/ /smin dang ma smin bar bar 'khru/ /skya zhing ser dang

sngon po yi/ /khrag ni sbyin bag 'khru bar 'gyur/ /gzhang 'brum rlung shas che las gyur/ /skam zhing tseg tseg tsha ba dang / /rnyid cing dmar nag rengs pa dang / /mi snyoms rtsub cing sra ba dang / /phan tshun mi 'dra yo ba dang / /rtse mo rno zhing gas pa dang / /

bim pa rgya shug kha rdzu ra/ /ras bal sa bon dang 'dra zhing / /la la ka tam me tog 'dra/ /la la yungs kar lta bur skyes/ /mgo dang phrag pa rtsib logs brla/ /chu so dag tu lhag par na/ /sbrid pa sgregs pa bshang ba sri/ /snying 'phar yi ga 'chus pa skyed/ /

lud dbugs mi bde me drod nyams/ /rna ba sgra bcas mgo 'khor byed/ /des nyes rtug skam nyung ngu ni/ /sgra bcas ska sla 'dren ma dang / /na zhing lbu ba 'byar bag can/ /rtug skam tshul gyis 'byung bar 'gyur/ /pags pa sen mo bshang gci dang / /mig dang

gdong ni gnag par 'gyur/ /skran dang mcher pa dmu rdzing dang / /gtun 'dra de nyid las 'byung 'gyur/ /mkhris shas che las rtse mo ni/ /sngo zhing dmar ser dkar bar snang / /phra zhing dri mnam khrag sla 'dzag /srab cing 'jam la lhod pa yin/ /mcher pa'i dum bu

ne tso'i lce/ /srin bu pad pa'i mchu 'drar snang / /tsha zhing gnag la rims dang rngul/ /skom dad yi ga 'chus rmongs skyed/ /bshang dro sla zhing sngo la tsha/ /ser zhing dmar bar 'khru bar 'gyur/ /nas rul nang 'dra pags pa dang / /sen stsogs sngo ser ljang bar 'gyur/ /

bad kan shas che rtsa ba sbom/ /mthug cing nad kyi shugs dal dkar/ /skrang zhing rgyas la snum pa dang / /'greng zhing snum la lci zhing brtan/ /'byar bag tshor ba chung zhing 'jam/ /g.ya' zhing reg na dga' bar byed/ /ka ri ra ba na sa yi/ /rus pa ba yi nu sor 'dra/ /

chu sor zug cing sbo gzhang na/ /lte ba lgang pa bcad snyam sems/ /lud pa dbugs mi bde snying na/ /mchil mang cham 'debs yi ga 'chus/ /gcin sri mgo bo tshor ba med/ /grang ba'i rims ni skyed par byed/ /kha chu 'dzag cing me drod nyams/ /slon zhing ma

zhu'i nad kun skyed/ /bshang ba tshil 'dra bad kan mang / /'khru dang bcas par 'byung bar 'gyur/ /'dzag par mi byed rdol mi byed/ /pags pa la sogs snum zhing dkar/ /'dres las mtshan nyid 'dres pa yin/ /'dus pa mtshan nyid kun dang ldan/ /khrag

shas che las gzhang 'brum ni/ /mkhris pa'i mtshan nyid 'dra ba la/ /n+ya gro d+ha yi myu gu 'dra/ /byi ru 'ol ma se mdog 'dra/ /shin tu tsha bro na ba dang / /bshang ba shugs kyis rab btsir las/ /'phral du khrag ni 'byung ba dang / /de nyid shin tu 'dzag par 'gyur/ /sbal

pa 'dra zhing khrag zad las/ /byung ba'i sdug bsngal gyis nyen 'gyur/ /mdog stobs spro ba nyams pa dang / /mdangs 'phrog dbang po zhan par 'gyur/ /mung+ga ko dra ba'i phye ma/ /tsa na ka ri ra stsogs pa/ /rtsub dang bshang ba sri bas rlung / /rang gnas 'khrugs pa stobs

ldan pas/ /thur du rgyu ba'i bu ga ni/ /bkag ste smad du rab skams nas/ /bshang ba gci ba 'phyen rnams ni/ /'gags pas nad ni mi bzad skyed/ /de yis khong pa rgyab rtsib logs/ /snying gar nad ni shin tu skyed/ /lto spos gsus pa na ba dang / /snying

gcus rgyu ma bcad snyam sems/ /chu sor shin tu zug pa dang / /mkhur bar skrang pa 'byung bar 'gyur/ /rlung ni gyen du song gyur na/ /de las slon rims yi ga 'chus/ /snying nad be'u snabs ma zhu dang / /gcin sri bshang ba 'khru ba dang / /'on dang rab rib dbugs mi bde/ /

mgo na lud pa cham pas 'debs/ /yid kyis 'gyur ba skom dang khrag /mkhris pa skran dang dmu rdzing stsogs/ /rlung gi nad gtogs de dang de/ /shin tu mi bzad 'byung bar 'gyur/ /gzhang 'brum gyen du 'khyil 'gyur ba/ /'di ni mchog tu gnod byed yin/ /rlung shas che ba'i

khong par ni/ /de med par yang 'byung bar 'gyur/ /lhan cig skyes dang nad gsum ldan/ /phugs ma'i gnyer mar gang gnas pa/ /de dag gsor mi rung ba yin/ /me drod stobs che stsogs kyis 'tsho/ /'dres las gyur dang gnyer ma ni/ /bar mar gnas pa gang yin

pa/ /lo gcig yan chad lon gyur pa/ /de dag gso dka' yin par bshad/ /phyi rol gnyer mar byung ba dang / /nad gcig shas che las byung dang / /skyes nas ring po ma lon gang / /gzhang 'brum de ni gso ba sla/ /pho mtshan stsogs kyi 'og nas ni/ /rang rang skabs

bshad lte bar skyes/ /rta bla ba yi kha 'dra zhing / /'byung bag can la 'jam pa yin/ /khyab byed kyis ni bad kan bsdus/ /pags pa'i phyi rol thor bur byed/ /mdzer pa 'dra zhing rtsub par gnas/ /pags pa'i mdzer pa yin par shes/ /rlung gis zug cing rtsub par 'gyur/ /

mkhris pas gnag la dmar rtsar 'gyur/ /bad kan gyis de snum nyid dang / /rmen bu'i mdog dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /blo dang ldan pas myur bar ni/ /'bad de gzhang 'brum gso bar byed/ /de yis gzhang ni myur 'gags nas/ /dmu rdzing nad ni skye bar 'gyur/ /yan lag brgyad

pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u bdun pa'o// //de nas tshad pas 'khru ba dang pho ba'i nad gzhi bshad par bya'o/ /nad gzhi sna re kun dang ni/ /'jigs dang mya ngan las gyur pa'i/ /tshad pas 'khru ba rnam drug yin/ /de ni chu 'thungs drags pa dang / /

sha rid sha skam ma goms pa'i/ /til gyi khu ba ma smin 'bru/ /chang rtsub kha zas tshod ma zin/ /gzhang 'brum snum bag drags pa dang / /'bu dang shugs ni bkag las 'byung / /de 'dras rlung ni 'khrugs pa yis/ /chu khams thur du bskyod gyur la/ /de nyid kyis ni me drod

nyams/ /de 'og khong pa khyab nas ni/ /bshang ba sla ba nyid du byed/ /de ltar tshad 'khru 'byung bar bshad/ /de yi 'byung 'gyur mtshan ma ni/ /bshang lam snying ga lto bar zug /lus snyom bshang ba sri ba dang / /sbo zhing kha zas mi 'ju ba'o/ /de las rlung gyur bshang chur

bcas/ /nyung zhig 'byung zhing gzer sgra bcas/ /'gag cing 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / /rtsub sla dbu bar bcas pa 'am/ /gong bu yang dang yang du 'byung / /de bzhin bu ram tshig pa 'dra/ /sbyin bag bcas shing bcad snyam sems/ /kha skam gzhang ni snad pa dang / /spu

langs pa dang 'khru ba yin/ /mkhris pas ser zhing gnag pa dang / /sngo zhing du ba'i mdog 'dra la/ /khrag bcas shin tu dri mnam pa/ /skom dad brgyal tsha rdul dang bcas/ /gzer bcas gzhang kha tsha dang bcas/ /gzhang khar thor bu 'byung ba yin/ /bad kan las gyur

ska ba dang / /'byar bag dkar zhing nal nal po/ /snum zhing be'u snabs bad kan bcas/ /rgyun du 'khru zhing lci la mnam/ /ska zhing nad rjes 'brang ba dang / /gnyid che khong snyom yi ga 'chus/ /nyung zad nyung zad 'khru dang bcas/ /ba spu brtse zhing glong bcas dang / /chu

so lto ba gzhang kha lci/ /bshang yang bshang ba ma btang snyam/ /kun skyes mtshan nyid kun dang ldan/ /'jigs pas sems ni 'khrugs gyur pa/ /rlung gis mkhris bcas bshang ba ni/ /sla byed de nas 'khru ba ni/ /tsha zhing sla la 'phyo ba dang / /mtshan ma rlung mkhris

las byung 'dra/ /mya ngan las byung de dang 'dra/ /mdor na tshad 'khru rnam gnyis te/ /ma zhur bcas dang ma zhu med/ /khrag bcas khrag med de las ni/ /dang po bshang gci chur 'bying 'gyur/ /dri mnam lto ni sbo ba dang / /mkhregs shing mchil snabs shin tu

mang / /smin pa de las bzlog pa yin/ /bad kan smin pa'ang chu nang 'bying / /gang zhig tshad 'khru 'bad pa ni/ /med des pho ba'i nad du 'gyur/ /me drod nyams par byed pa yi/ /zas bsten pa yis me drod nyams/ /gang zhig zhu nas bshang ba ni/ /be+e'u snabs bcas

dang be'u snabs med/ /'khru ba de ni tshad 'khru ste/ /rang bzhin gyis ni myur gsod byed/ /ma zhu kha zas ma zhu dang / /zhu ba smin pa'ang mi 'khru 'gyur/ /rgyu med yang dang yang sri ba'am/ /rgyu med yang yang sla bar 'byung / /pho bar ma zhu stsogs shing 'khru/ /yun ring

na bar byed pa yin/ /de ni nad sna re re 'dus/ /las byung rnam pa bzhi yin no/ /de yi sngon tshul snyom pa dang / /ring nas 'ju zhing skyur bag 'byung / /mchil mang kha yis ro mi tshor/ /rmya snyom skom zhing yi ga 'chus/ /lto sbo slon ni bro ba dang / /rna ba rgyu

ma sgra dang bcas/ /spyi yi mtshan nyid skem pa dang / /du ba mun dang rims kyis 'debs/ /brgyal zhing mgo na bshang ba 'gags/ /rkang pa lag pa skrangs par 'gyur/ /de la rlung la rkan bskams zhing / /rab rib rna bar sgra 'byung dang / /rtsib logs brla

dang chu sor na/ /bshang ba yang dang yang du 'byung / /yang yang sbo zhing gsud pa dang / /ro rnams kun la brkam pa dang / /bkres skom rgyu ma bcad snyam sems/ /zas zhu nas ni sbo ba dang / /zas zos nas ni bde bar 'gyur/ /rlung gi snying nad skran gzhang 'brum/ /

mcher pa skya rbab 'byung bar dogs/ /bshang ba 'byung dka' ska slar 'byung / /de yang be+e snabs sgra can 'byung / /gzhang na lud pa dbugs mi bde/ /mkhris pa sngo zhing ser ba dang / /ser po sla bag 'khru bar 'gyur/ /mnam zhing sgregs sgyur snying lkog tsha/ /

yi ga 'chus shing skom dad che/ /bad kan las gyur 'ju dka' zhing / /zas slon yi ga 'chus pa dang / /khar chags mchil ma mang ba dang / /lud pa snying nad cham pas 'debs/ /snying ga mer mer por sems shing / /lto ba tshor ba chung zhing lci/ /sgregs pa dri mnam

mngar 'byung snyom/ /bud med mi dga' me drod chung / /be+e'u snabs bad kan 'dres par 'khru/ /bshang ba lci bar 'byung bar 'gyur/ /rid pa min yang nyams stobs chung / /kun skyes mtshan nyid 'dren mar ldan/ /ma snyoms la sogs me drod gsum/ /yan lag

char phye gang bshad pa/ /de yang pho ba'i nad du 'gyur/ /snyoms pa bde gnas rgyu yin no/ /rlung nad rde'u nad mdze nad dang / /gcin snyi dmu rdzing mtshan bar rdol/ /gzhang 'brum pho nad ces bya brgyad/ /nad chen gso bar dka' ba yin/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying

po bsdus pa las/ /nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u brgyad pa'o// //de nas gcin 'gags pa'i nad gzhi bshad par bya'o/ /lgang pa lgang pa'i mgo pho mtshan/ /rked pa rlig pa gzhang kha ni/ /gzhang kha'i rus par brten gyur zhing / /gcig tu 'brel ba yin par

bshad/ /lgang pa kha ni thur bltas kyang / /gcin 'dzag pa yi rtsa sgo nas/ /rgyun mi 'chad par 'dzag pa yis/ /ngos gnyis nas ni phre'us 'gengs/ /zhugs pa gang yin de yis ni/ /gcin 'gags pa dang gcin snyi ba'i/ /gso dka' gnad la brten

pa'i nad/ /nyi shu skyed par byed pa yin/ /lgang pa chu so pho mtshan na/ /cung zad yang dang yang du 'byung / /sri ba rlung las gyur ba yin/ /mkhris pa las gyur ser tsha na/ /mdog dmar bad kan las gyur pa/ /lgang pa pho mtshan lci zhing skrangs/ /'byar bag ngal

gyis 'byung zhing thogs/ /nad kun las byung mtshan kun ldan/ /gang tshe rlung gis lgang pa'i kha/ /bkag pa de tshe gcin mkhris pa/ /bad kan khu chur bcas pa ni/ /rim gyis bskams par byas pa las/ /mi bzad rde'u chags 'gyur te/ /ba lang mkhris par gi

wang ltar/ /thams cad bad kan la brten 'gyur/ /'di yi sngon tshul mtshan nyid ni/ /lgang pa sbo zhing de yi ni/ /nye 'khor kun du rab tu na/ /gcin yang lhag par dbre bro zhing / /gcin 'gags rims 'debs yi ga 'chus/ /spyi yi mtshan

nyid lte ba dang / /lgang mgo lgang pa'i srubs na zhing / /de yis gcin 'byung sgo bkag pas/ /gcin gyi rgyun ni 'chad cing 'byung / /de byung zin nas bde bar byed/ /sla zhing ba lang tshil 'dra la/ /de bskyod pa yis khrag tu 'gyur/ /drag shul spyod pas rab tu na/ /

de la rlung gyur shin tu na/ /so 'thams sdom zhing lus 'dar la/ /pho mtshan nyed cing lte ba 'tshir/ /rgyun du na zhing 'khun par byed/ /bshang ba 'phyen dang bcas par 'byung / /gcin gyi thigs pa yang yang 'ong / /rde'u gnag cing rtsub pa dang / /chu sor tsher

mas gang snyam byed/ /mkhris pas lgang pa tsha ba dang / /btsos pa snyam byed rab tu dro/ /go bye'i 'bras bu'i dbyibs 'dra la/ /rde'u mdog dmar zhing ser la gnag /bad kan gyis bsil lci ba dang / /lgang pa'i nang du zug cing na/ /rde'u che zhing 'jam pa la/ /

sbrang rtsi'i mdog gam yang na dkar/ /'di dag byis pa rnams la ni/ /phal cher 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin/ /gnas dang sha ni chung ba'i phyir/ /bzung dang dbyung ba bde ba yin/ /mi chen khu ba las byung rde'u/ /khu ba bkag las 'byung bar 'gyur/ /gnas

las 'phos pa phyir ma byung / /rlig bar gnas pa rlung gis ni/ /bskams nas nye bar bsdus gyur pa/ /de ni khu ba rde'u chags yin/ /lgang par gcin ni sri byed cing / /tsha zhing skrang bar byed pa yin/ /de ni skyes ma thag tu ni/ /khu ba zhu ste sla bar

'gyur/ /phyogs der mnan na zhu bar byed/ /rde'u gseg ma lta bur gnas/ /rlung gis phye mar bshig gyur pa/ /de 'dir tshul bzhin 'byung zhes bya/ /gcin dang lhan cig phyir 'byung 'gyur/ /lugs bzhin mi 'byung rde'ur chags/ /gcin ni bkag par

byas gyur pas/ /rlung gis lgang ba'i kha bkag nas/ /gcin 'gags na zhing g.ya' bar 'gyur/ /lan 'ga' rang gnas las spangs nas/ /lgang pa rgyas te kha che zhing / /mngal 'dra sbom zhing log par 'dug /der ni na zhing tsha bar byed/ /'phar zhing

gcus pa snyam du sems/ /thigs pa tsam du 'dzag pa dang / /lgang btsir rgyun ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /rnam pa gnyis po 'di dag ni/ /rlung gi lgang pa'i nad ces bya/ /gso dka' gnyis pa rlung gi yin/ /mthu chen shin tu gso dka' yin/ /bshang lam de

ni ldang pa yi/ /bar na rlung ni brten gyur pa/ /gtun 'dra sra zhing mtho ba dang / /mi 'gyur gnas byed mdud pa can/ /rlung nad gtun 'dra de sbos bcas/ /bshang gci 'phyen ni 'gags byed yin/ /log rgyu 'khyil bar byed pa yi/ /rlung gis chu

sor mi bzad gzer/ /gcin las zhugs te 'khyil byed cing / /rengs byed lci zhing gcus snyam byed/ /gcin ni nyung shas nyung shas 'byung / /yang na bshang gci gtong tshe 'byung / /'di ni rlung nad 'khyil ba yin/ /gcin ni yun rings bkag gyur

pa/ /sri zhing 'byung bar mi 'gyur la/ /gcin thon nas ni nad tshabs 'bri/ /gcin bkag pa yis gnod gyur pa/ /gang tshe rlung gis bzlog gyur pa/ /lte ba'i 'og nas lte ba'i bar/ /gcin gyis gang 'gyur de yi tshe/ /rab tu na zhing sbos pa dang / /zas mi 'ju

zhing dri ma 'gags/ /de ni ltor gcin 'gags zhes bya/ /gcin 'byung bu ga 'chus pa'am/ /rlung gis bkag nas gcin nyung 'byung / /lgang pa mtshan sbubs nor bu ni/ /gnas nas de 'og rim gyis 'dzag/ /nad bcas pa'am nad med pa/ /gcin ni chad dang

bcas par 'byung / /lhag ma lus te mtshan lci yin/ /lgang pa'i kha nang zlum zhing sra/ /cung zhig 'phral du 'byung 'gyur na/ /gcin stsogs rde'u lta bu ni/ /gcin gyi mdud par de bshad do/ /gcin snyoms pa las nyal po byas/ /rlung gis khu ba bskyod gyur pa/ /

gnas las bskyod cing gcin btang tshe/ /sngon nam phyi nas thal chu dang / /mdog 'dra byung bar 'gyur ba yin/ /khu ba 'dres par de bshad do/ /rtsub cing skem la rlung gis ni/ /gang tshe rtug skam nad gyur pa/ /gcin 'byung bu gar song nas

ni/ /bshang ba dang 'dres de yi tshe/ /gcin ni bshang ba'i dri can 'byung / /bshang ba 'gags par de bshad do/ /mkhris pa drag shul kha zas ni/ /rno tsha nyi tshan la sogs kyis/ /'phel zhing rlung ni zhugs gyur pa/ /lgang pa'i nye 'khor tsha zhing na/ /

gcin ni ser por 'gyur ba 'am/ /yang na khrag bcas khrag nyid 'byung / /tsha zhing sril yang yang 'byung / /de ni tsha rlung zhes byar bshad/ /rtsub cing lus ni rmya ba yi/ /lgang par gnas pa'i mkhris pa rlung / /gcin zad tsha dang na bar bcas/ /bskyed pa de yang

de skad bshad/ /bad kan mkhris pa gnyi ga la/ /rlung gis bskyod par gyur na ni/ /de tshe gcin sri ser ba dang / /dmar zhing dkar la ska ba 'byung / /de ni tsha bcas gi wang ngam/ /dung gi phye ma'i mdog 'dra 'am/ /yang na skam zhing mdog kun ldan/ /de ni

gcin nyams nad du bshad/ /de ltar gcin 'gags las byung ba'i/ /mtshan nyid rgya cher bshad nas ni/ /de 'og gcin snyi las byung ba'i/ /nad gzhi'i mtshan nyid bshad pa yin/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u dgu pa'o// //de nas gcin

snyi ba za khu'i nad dmigs bshad par bya'o/ /gcin snyi'i nad ni nyi shu ste/ /de las bad kan las gyur bcu/ /mkhris pa las drug rlung gyur bzhi/ /de rnams tshil gcin bad kan skyed/ /zas dang skom gyi tshul las ni/ /phal cher de dag 'byung bar byed/ /mngar

dang skyur dang lan tshwa dang / /lci zhing 'byil la bsil ba dang / /'bru mar chang dang gsher ba'i sha//dar ba bu ram bu ram shing / /gnas gcig stan gcig la rtag gnas/ /mal stan cho gar mi ldan la/ /brten nas gcin snyi'i nad skyed byed/ /bad kan 'khrugs

las lgang pa'i gcin/ /snyi 'gyur lus gsher rdul tshil dang / /sha glongs lgang par brten cing snyi/ /mkhris pas khrag kyang zad byas nas/ /bad kan stsogs zad gcin gnas bskyed/ /rlung 'khrugs pa dang de zad las/ /lus zungs lgang par 'khus

te bskyed/ /de byung gso bya 'tsho tsam dang / /spang bya gcin nad rnam gsum 'gyur/ /mdor na mi mthun bya ba dang / /nad dmigs chen po nyid kyis 'byung / /de rnams kyi ni spyi'i mtshan nyid/ /gcin ni rnyog ma can du 'byung / /gnod dang gnod bya khyad med

kyang / /de dus khyad par nyid dang ni/ /gcin gyi mdog stsogs dbye ba yis/ /gcin snyi'i dbye ba brtag par bya/ /dang zhing mang la dkar zhing bsil/ /dri nga med cing chu 'dra ba/ /gcin snyi chu yi za khu yin/ /cung zad rnyog can sbyin bag can/ /bu ram

shing khu lta bur mngar/ /za khu bu ram shing khu yin/ /zhag lon na ni ska bar 'gyur/ /za khu gar po zhes bya'o/ /steng na dngas ma 'og na ska/ /chang 'dra chang gi za khu yin/ /ba sbu ldang zhing 'bras btags 'dra/ /dkar zhing mang 'byung 'bras phye 'dra/ /

khu chu 'dra ba'am khu ba 'dres/ /khu ba 'dra ba'i za khu yin/ /gcin ni bye tshigs dri ma can/ /bye ma'i za khu zhes bya'o/ /gcin snyi mang du 'byung zhing bsil/ /mngar ba de bsil za khu yin/ /dal gyis nyung zad nyung zad 'byung / /bags kyis 'byung ba'i za

khu yin/ /kha chu 'dra ba'i nal nal po/ /'byil bag kha chu'i za khu yin/ /dri ro kha dog reg bya ni/ /nas tshig 'khus 'dra nas tshig can/ /za khu sngon po kha dog sngo/ /za khu nag po snag tsha 'dra/ /gcin snyi tsha zhing mdog ser ba/ /de ni skyer pa 'dra ba yin/ /

mnam zhing btsod kyi khu ba 'dra/ /btsod kyi za khu zhes bya'o/ /dri nga tsha zhing lan tshwar bcas/ /khrag 'dra khrag gi za khu yin/ /zhag gi za khu zhag dang 'dres/ /zhag nyid gcin du 'byung ba yin/ /rkang 'dres pa'am rkang nyid ni/ /yang dang yang 'byung rkang za khu/ /

glang chen myos ltar rgyun du ni/ /gcin shugs dal bar 'byung 'gyur la/ /chu ser bcas shing rnyog bcas 'byung / /glang chen za khu zhes bya'o/ /sbrang rtsi'i za khu sbrang rtsi 'dra/ /de ni rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur/ /lus zungs zad pas

rlung 'khrugs pa'am/ /nad kyis rtsa sbubs bkag ste 'byung / /nad kyis bkag pa'i mtshan ma dag /de ni rgyu med par 'byung zhing / /skad cig zad stong gang 'gyur ba/ /gso bar dka' ba nyid du 'gyur/ /thams cad dus su ma bcos na/ /sbrang rtsi 'dra ba'i

za khur 'gyur/ /gang zhig thams cad mngar 'gyur bas/ /phal cher sbrang rtsi'i za khu yin/ /sbrang rtsi'i za khu zhes bya kun/ /mngar ba las ni bshad pa yin/ /zas mi 'ju zhing yi ga 'chus/ /slon lud gnyid che cham pas 'debs/ /bad kan las

byung za khu la/ /bla brnan de dag 'byung bar 'gyur/ /pho mtshan lgang par zug pa dang / /rlig 'bras bye zhing rims kyis 'debs/ /tsha skyur skom dad brgyal dang 'khru/ /mkhris pa las gyur bla brnan yin/ /rlung las skyes pa'i snying 'phar zhing / /lus

'dar snying na zas la brkam/ /gzer zhing gnyid med skem pa dang / /lud pa dbugs mi bde ba 'byung / /kham phor rus sbal 'dra ba can/ /sgu bo me dbal phra mo dang / /sran chung 'dra dang nyungs kar 'dra/ /bu bcas 'byung dang pi da ri/ /khong 'bras

zhes bya'i 'bras 'brum bcu/ /gcin nad ma bcos pa las 'byung / /tshigs dang gnad dang sha che ba'i/ /srog gi gnas su 'byung bar 'gyur/ mtha' ma mtho zhing dbus ma dma'/ /gnag cing rnag dang nad btsas la/ /dbyibs dang tshad ni kham phor 'dra/ /

thor bu kham phor zhes bya'o/ /nang du zug cing na byed la/ /nye 'khor dag tu cher mched cing / /'jam zhing rus sbal rgyab 'dra ba'i/ /'bras nad rus sbal can zhes bya/ /sra zhing rtsa yi dra ba can/ /snum zhing 'dzag la khyon che ba/ /na zhing nang zug bu ga

ni/ /phra mor ldan pa dra ba can/ /nang du zug cing na la rnags/ /rgyab bam lto ba dag tu ni/ thor bu chen po kha dog gnag/ /sku bor 'dug pas sgu bor bshad/ /skyes ma thag tu pags pa tsha/ /shin tu na byed me dbal te/ /dmar zhing gnag la

gas pa dang / /tsha zhing rmugs byed me dbal phra/ /sran chung 'dra ba'i tshad dang dbyibs/ /mnyam pas sran chung can yin no/ /tshad dang dbyibs ni nyungs kar 'dra/ /myur du smin zhing nad tshabs che/ /yungs kar 'dra ba'i 'brum phran gyis/ /yongs

su bskor bas chu bur can/ /bu bcas che zhing mang ba la/ /rab phra'i 'brum bus khyab gyur pa'o/ /ldum bu bi da ri ltar ldum/ /sra ba bi da ri zhes bya/ /khong 'bras gzhan du bshad pa yin/ /de la dang po'i 'bras nad gsum/ /bu bcas dang

ni bi da ri/ /tshil chen las byung brnag dka' yin/ /gzhan dag mkhris pa shas che zhing / /tshil chung las byung brnag nus 'gyur/ /de rnams nad shas ji ltar che'i/ /gcin snyi ba yi dbang las 'byung / /'di dag za khu med par ni/ /gnod

gyur tshil las 'byung 'gyur te/ /ji srid dngos po mi snang ba/ /de srid shes par mi 'gyur ro/ /kha dog ljang ba'am dmar ba'i gcin/ /za khu'i sngon tshul med pa yis/ /gcin 'byung gang de za khu min/ /de ni khrag mkhris yin zhes bya/ /lus rdul

yan lag mnan zhing lhod pa dang / /stan dang mal dang gnyid kyi bde la chags/ /snying mig rna ba kha lce byugs snyam byed/ /lus sbom skra dang sen mo ring ba dang / /bsil bag la dga' gre ba rkan bskams shing / /kha nang ro mngar rkang mthil lag

mthil tsha/ /gang du gcis par grog ma 'du 'gyur ba/ /gcin nad za khu'i tshogs ni phyis 'byung tshul/ /za khu sbrang rtsi'i mdog 'dra 'byil ba dang / /sbrang rtsi'i ro 'dra ba la gnyis su rtog /lus brtas bad kan can gyi za khu'am/ /nyes pa zad pas

rlung gi bdag can yin/ /sngon tshul bcas pa'i bad mkhris za khu dang / /gang yang rim gyis rlung nad za khur 'gyur/ /mkhris pa las gyur gang yin gso bar dka'/ /gal te tshil nad chung gyur gso sla/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying

po bsdus pa las/ nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u bcu pa'o// //de nas khong 'bras dang rgyu rlugs dang skran gyi nad gzhi bshad par bya'o/ /kha zas khengs bu rab tsha dang / /rtsub dang skam dang tsha 'gyur zos/ /nyal ba'i spyod pa mi bde bas/ /khrag nad

skyed 'gyur de dang des/ /pags pa sha tshil rus pa dang / /khrag dang chu ba chu ba che/ /phyi dang nang du skrangs gyur pa/ /rtsa ba che zhing nad tshabs che/ /zlum po'am 'jong bar gnas pa gang / /khong 'bras de ni rnam pa drug /nad dmigs sna re 'dus pa dang / /khrag

dang smas pa las byung ba'o/ /'dir phyi'i yan lag de dang der/ /rab na mdud pa 'dra la mtho/ /nang gi shin tu mi bzad cing / /gting ring skran ltar sra ba yin/ /grog mkhar lta bur mtho ba dang / /me dang mtshon ltar myur gsod byed/ /lte ba chu so

mchin mcher pa/ /glo dang snying lto brla rtsa dang / /mkhal ma gnyis sam gzhang du'ang 'byung / /de la rlung gyur nad tshabs drag /dmar nag ring zhig lon nas ni/ /'byung zhing smin pa dbyibs mi snyoms/ /ran zhing mgo 'khor spos ba dang / /g.yo

zhing 'pho la sgra dang bcas/ /mkhris gyur zangs ltar dmar rtsa gnag /skom dad tsha rims rmongs bag skyed/ /ldang zhing smin pa myur ba yin/ /bad kan las skya g.ya' dang bcas/ /slon zhing bsil la sla ba dang / /glal zhing lci la yi ga 'chus/ /'byung

zhing smin pa yun ring thogs/ /'dus pa las gyur 'dren ma yin/ /'dir ni phyi nang gnyis mtshan nyid/ /don gyi dbang las shes par bya/ /'brum bu nag pos khebs shing gnag /rab tsha na zhing rims kyis 'debs/ /mkhris pa'i rtags ldan phyi 'am

nang / /khrag gyur bud med nyid la 'byung / /mtshon la stsogs pas smas pa yis/ /rma byung mi 'phrod bsten pa las/ /rma kha'i tsha ba rlung gis phul/ /khrag bcas mkhris pa 'byung bar byed/ /khong 'bras bla brnan nad mang zhing / /khrag mkhris mtshan

nyid can dag byed/ /bla brnan de yi dbye ba yang / /gnas kyi dbye ba las bshad do/ /lte bar byung na skyigs bu ste/ /chu sor gcin 'gags rnag tu 'gyur/ /mcher pa dbugs mi bde mchin par/ /dbugs 'byung 'gag skom mgo 'khor

'gyur/ /glo bar byung na lkog nad 'gyur/ /snying byung yan lag kun gzir snyam/ /rab rmongs mun sros snyam du byed/ /snying 'phar na bar 'gyur ba yin/ /lto ba rtsib logs phrag pa'i bar/ /na zhing lto sbos 'byung bar 'gyur/ /chu so mdoms bar

byung brla na/ /mkhal mar byung na rked pa rgyab/ /rtsib logs su ni na bar 'gyur/ /gzhang du rlung ni thur 'byung 'gags/ /zhu dang ma zhu phyed nyid zhu/ /de dag 'or nad lta bur bshad/ /lte ba yan chad smin khar 'dzag/ /lte ba man chad gzhang du 'dzag//

lte bar gnas pa gnyi gar 'dzag /khong 'bras kyi ni nad dmigs rnams/ /'dzag las rma ltar shes par bya/ /de las 'dus pa las gyur dang / /snying dang lte ba chu sor gnas/ /phyi 'am nang du bye ba 'am/ /smin te kha nas 'dzag pa ni/ /nyam

chung bla brnan ldan pa spang / /de bzhin bud med bu btsas pa'am/ /sbrum ma'am nu zho yod pa dang / /nu zho med pa'i nu ma yi/ /rtsa sgo kha byer phyin gyur nas/ /phyi yi khong 'bras mtshan nyid can/ /skrang zhing srab 'byung bar 'gyur/ /bu mo rnams kyi nu

rtsa'i sgo/ /phra bas 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rlung ni rgyu lam 'gags pas 'khrugs/ /skrang dang gzer ni skyed cing rgyu/ /chu so rlig par phyin pa dang / /rlig par rgyu ba'i rtsa dag ni/ /btsir nas rlig pa pags pa dag/ /'phel zhing rlig rlugs nyid du phyed/ /rang

khrag gcin tshil rgyu ma las/ /rlig rlugs de ni rnam bdun 'gyur/ /rgyu ma gcin skyes pa'am rlung / /rgyu ma'i dbye ba 'ba' zhig gzhan/ /rlung gyur rkyal pa gang 'dra zhing / /reg na rtsub cing rgyu med na/ /mkhris gyur u dum+bA ra yi/ /'bras

bu smin 'dra tsha dro 'drul/ /bad kan las bsil lci zhing snum/ /g.ya' zhing sra la nad tshabs chung / /khrag gyur gnag cing 'brum bus khyab/ /mkhris pa'i rlig rlugs mtshan nyid ldan/ /tshil gyur rlig rlugs bad kan 'dra/ /'jam zhing ta la'i 'bras bur

mtshungs/ /gcin gnag pa la brten pa rnams/ /gcin las 'bang bar de 'gyur te/ /rkyal pa chu yis gang bltar/ /g.yo 'gyur nad dang bcas shing 'jam/ /gcin 'gags pa dang rlig pa yi/ /'og tu skrang par byed par 'gyur/ /rlung 'khrugs pa yi

zas dang ni/ /chu grang la ni rkyal ba dang / /shugs bkag bcir dang khur dang lam/ /yan lag log par 'chus pa dang / /rlung 'khrugs pa ni gzhan gyis kyang / /gang tsho rgyu ma phra mo'i cha/ /rlung gis log par phul 'gyur te/ /rang gi gnas nas

thur du bskyod/ /chu so'i tshigs su phyin pa dang / /de cha mdud pa ltar glo 'gyur/ /yal bar bor na rlig pa cher skye zhing / /spo shing na la rengs par rlung gis byed/ /rab tu gzir zhing nang na sgra dang bcas/ /gang bar byed cing bcug kyang slar 'byung byed/ /

rgyu rlugs 'di ni gso dka' ste/ /rlung gi rlig rlugs 'dra ba yin/ /rtsub cing gnag la dmar pa'i rtsa/ /phra mo'i dra bas khebs pa yin/ /skran brgyad nad ni so so dang / /'dres dang 'dus pa las gyur dang / /zla mtshan gyi ni nyes pa yis/ /brgyad pa bud med

rnams la 'byung / /rims dang slon dang tshad 'khru stsogs/ /skyug sman stsogs dang las rnams kyis/ /skem gyur rlung skyes zas za dang / /bkres te tu grang 'thungs gyur pa'am/ /skem 'thungs rjes la gang zhig ni/ /rkyal dang mchong ba la sogs pa/ /

bsten pas lus ni dkrugs byas dang / /slon mi bro yang skyugs pa dang / /rlung la sogs pa 'byung ba yi/ /shugs bkag pa 'am btsir pa'am/ /snum ma dang dugs ni ma bsten par/ /sbyang ba'i las ni byas pa dang / /sbyangs zin myur du tsha ba dang / /bad

kan skyed pa'i zas skom spyad/ /rlung rgyas pa yi nad rnams ni/ /so so'am 'dres pa'am 'khrugs gyur pa'am/ /kun nas khrag dang bcas 'khrugs pas/ /sbubs can la ni brten gyur nas/ /steng 'og lam ni bkag nas su/ /gzer sngon 'gro zhing reg

tu rung / /shin tu mtho zhing mdud pa'i gzugs/ /skran ni skyed par 'gyur ba yin/ /skem pas bad kan mkhris bshang ba'i/ /rgyun srang 'gags par gyur pa yis/ /rlung ni khong par gnas bcas pa/ /rtsub pas sra bar gyur pa yin/ /rang

gnas ldang 'gyur rang dbang can/ /gzhan gnas la brten gzhan dbang can/ /gong por gyur pas gzugs med kyang / /gzugs can ltar gnas skran zhes bya/ /chu so lte ba snying ga dang / /rtsib logs la ni gnas pa yin/ /rlung las mjing pa

klad pa gzer/ /rims 'debs mcher na rgyu ma khrug /bshang sri khab kyis gtsags snyam na/ /dbugs 'byin yang dang yang mi phyin/ /lus rengs kha ni skam pa dang / /skem zhing me drod mi snyoms la/ /pags stsogs gnag cing rtsub pa dang / /

rlung skran g.yo ba yin pa'i phyir/ /dbyibs ni brtag par mi mngon zhing / /gnas 'phel 'bri dang na ba dang / /grog mas khyab pa lta bur ni/ /skran ni 'gul zhing zug pa yin/ /mkhris las tsha zhing sgregs skyur brgyal/ /'khru zhing lus rngul skom rims

'debs/ /pags pa la sogs ser por snang / /skran ni reg par mi bzod dang / /tsha zhing 'bar la dro ba dang / /rang gi gnas ni sreg snyam byed/ /bad kan slon bag yi ga 'chus/ /me drod nyams shing grang rims 'debs/ /chom pa khong snyom dang ga lci/ /

lud pa lu zhing pags stsogs dkar/ /skran phugs ring zhing sra ba dang / /lci zhing rang gnas brten nad chung / /phal cher rang gnas 'dug pa dang / /rang gi dus su nad skyed byed/ /gnyis las byung ba'i skran gsum po/ /mtshan nyid

'dren mar ldan pa yin/ /kun skyes mi bzad na zhing tsha/ /myur smin sra mtho de gso dka'/ /khrag gi skran ni gang yin pa/ /de ni bud med nyid la 'byung / /zla mtshan dus sam bu gsar btsas/ /yang na mngal gyi nad can gyis/ /bud med rlung skyed bsten

gyur pas/ /rlung ni 'khrugs par gyur pa las/ /zla re 'byung bar byed pa yis/ /zla mtshan mngal du bkag pas ni/ /de ni mngal chags 'drar snang zhing / /mtshan ma gsal bar ston byed de/ /snying 'phar nu 'dzag yid mi bde/ /skem pa la stsogs tshul

du snang / /de nas rim gyis rlung 'dres dang / /mkhris pa yi ni rgyu yis na/ /rlung dang mkhris pa las byung ba'i/ /skran ni khrag de skyed byed yin/ /na zhing sra la tsha zhing 'khru/ /skom dad rims stsogs bla brnan 'byung / /nad kyi khrag la brten pas na/ /mngal

gnas dag tu lhag par gzer/ /mngal nas dri nga 'dzag pa dang / /na zhing 'phar la zug par byed/ /mngal chags 'dra yang yan lag med/ /'on kyang skran ni 'gul gzer ldan/ /de nyid der ni gong por gnas/ /lan 'ga' 'gul bar byed pa yin/ /

'di ni ltor 'phel mi byed kyi/ /skran nyid 'phel bar byed pa yin/ /rang gi nad gzhi la brten pas/ /des der skran nad thams cad skyed/ /yun rings nas ni smin 'gyur ba'am/ /yang na ma smin khong 'bras kyang / /nad khrag la ni brten pa'i phyir/ /shin tu myur

bar smin par 'gyur/ /de phyir myur du tsha 'gyur bas/ /khong 'bras zhes ni de la bshad/ /nang gnas skran ni chu so dang / /lto ba mchin pa snying na zhing / /me drod mdog nyams nyams stobs 'bri/ /shugs ni 'gag par 'gyur ba yin/ /phyi rol de las

bzlog pa ste/ /khong pa'i yan lag nad tshabs chung / /phyogs de'i mdog ni nyams pa dang / /phyi rol du ni mthong zhing 'phags/ /lto sbo lhag par mi bzad na/ /rgyu ma'i sgra bcas mi bzad na/ /sbo bcas lto ba na ba dang / /rlung gi nad kyis steng 'og

bkag /de ni hen gyi zhes byar bshad/ /sra zhing gtun 'dra mdud pa can/ /gtun 'dra gyen du mtho bar gnas/ /hen gyi mtshan ldan gtun bu ni/ /'phred gnas de dang tshul 'dra yin/ /zhu ba'i gnas nas gzhang pho mtshan/ /rlung ni mi bzad na zhing rgyu/ /

thur du zug pa yin par bshad/ /de las bzlog pa gyen du zug pa'o/ /sgregs pa mang zhing bshang ba 'gags pa dang / /'grangs za mi nus rgyu ma sgra dang bcas/ /sbo zhing hen langs kha zas 'ju mi nus/ /skran ni nyer 'byung mtshan ma yin par bshad/ /yan

lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u bcu gcig pa'o// //de nas dmu rdzing gi nad gzhi bshad par bya'o/ /nad kun me drod nyams las skye/ /lhag par dmu rdzing nad skye zhing / /ma zhu dri ma can gyi zas/ /dri ma stsogs

las skye bar 'gyur/ /nad kyis chu ni rgyu ba'i rtsa/ /steng dang 'og tu bkag nas ni/ /srog dang thur sel la gnod de/ /pags pa sha yi bar gnas nad/ /lto ba bkang ste dmu rdzing skyed/ /de yang rnam pa brgyad 'gyur te/ /nad gzhi tha dad 'dus mcher pa/ /dri

ma 'gags dang rgyu rdol dang / /des gzir rkan dang mchu bskams shing / /rkang pa lag pa gsus pa skrang / /spyod pa kha zas nyams stobs 'bri/ /skem zhing gsus pa cher skyes la/ /mi ni yi dags gzugs can 'gyur/ /de ni 'byung 'gyur mtshan ma dag /

bkres pa med cing zas kun ni/ /ring nas tsha zhing skyur bcas 'ju/ /'ju dang mi 'ju mi shes la/ /'grangs par za yang mi nus shing / /stobs ni rtag tu zad par 'gyur/ /cung zad bskyod kyang dbugs mi bde/ /bshang ba 'phel zhing 'gags par byed/ /

rkang pa gnyis su cung zad skrang / /chu sor na zhing zas yang ba/ /cung zad zos kyang gsus pa rgyas/ /rtsa rgyas lto ba'i gnyer ma 'jig /dmu rdzing nad ni thams cad la/ /snyom zhing nyam chung 'gyur ba dang / /dri ma sri zhing me drod chung / /

tsha zhing skrang la gsus pa sbo/ /mjug tu chu ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /thams cad chu med par du smug /skrang med khur ltar lci ma yin/ /rtsa dra'i skar khung ris kyis khebs/ /rtag tu sgra ni 'ur 'ur zer/ /rlung gis lte ba rgyu mar zhugs/ /shugs skyed na ni 'jig

par 'gyur/ /snying ga lte ba rked pa dang / /gzhang dang chu son bar byed/ /rlung ni sgra dang bcas par rgyu/ /bshang ba 'gag cing gci ba nyung / /me drod chung min skam pa min/ /khar ni ro bro med pa yin/ /de la rlung gi dmu rdzing ni/ /rkang lag rlig

pa lto ba skrang / /lto ba rtsib logs [(]rkad [,]rked [)]rgyab na/ /tshigs rnams bye ba snyam du sems/ /lud pa skams shing yan lag snyom/ /ro smad lci zhing bshang gci 'gag /pags pa la stsogs gnag la smug /glo bur du ni 'phel zhing 'bri/ /

gsus par zug cing na ba dang / /rtsa bran nag pos khyab cing rgyas/ /brdabs na rkyal pa dbugs kyis ni/ /gang ba lta bu'i sgra dang ldan/ /'dir rlung nad dang sgrar bcas pas/ /thams cad du ni rgyu bar byed/ /mkhris pa'i dmu rdzing rims 'debs rgyas/ /

lus tsha skom dang kha ro kha/ /mgo 'khor tshad 'khru pags pa stsogs/ /ser zhing gsus pa'i mdog rtsa sngo/ /rtsa ni dmar ser dag gis khyab/ /rdul dang tsha bar bcas pas sreg /dad 'byung reg na 'jam pa dang / /myur du smin zhing nyer gdung

'gyur/ /bad kan dmu rdzing lhu tshigs na/ /tshor ba med cing skrangs la lci/ /gnyid che slon zhing yi ga 'chus/ /lud pa dbugs mi bde pags stsogs/ /sra zhing lto ba mkhrang la snum/ /rtsa yi ri mos khyab cing che/ /ring nas 'phel zhing sra ba dang / /

reg na grang zhing gsus pa lci/ /nad gsum 'khrugs pa de dang de/ /bud med kyis byin dri ma rdul/ /dbyig dug dug stsogs kyis gnod 'gyur/ /khrag bcas dri ma bsags pa ni/ /ltor song gnod pa skyed byed de/ /kha skom mgo 'khor brgyal bcas pa'i/ /
