rtags gsum ldan pa'i dmu rdzing skyed/ /myur du smin zhing mi bzad na/ /de ni grang dang rlung dang char/ /phrad pas shin tu gnod par 'gyur/ /mang du zos pas bskyod pa dang / /bzhon pa drag tu 'gro ba dang / /las lam nyal po drags pas dub/ /skyug sman drags

dang nad kyis skem/ /g.yon logs gnas pa'i mcher pa ni/ /gnas las 'phos te 'phel ba dang / /yang na dngas ma stsogs pas khrag /rgyas byas de ni 'phel gyur dang / /de nas gtun bu bzhin rab sra/ /de nas rus sbal rgyab 'dra bar/ /rim gyis

'phel bar 'gyur nas ni/ /lto bar dmu rdzing chags par byed/ /lud pa dbugs mi bde skom dad/ /kha yis ro ni mi tshor zhing / /lci zhing na la rims kyis 'debs/ /sha mdog skya zhing mi sdug la/ /brgyal zhing slon par byed pa dang / /tsha zhing myos dang

ldan par 'gyur/ /rtsa mdog dmar ba'am mi sdug pa'am/ /sngo zhing ser la ri mor bcas/ /de la rim gyis nad rnams ni/ /bshang 'gags nad dang lto sbos dang / /rmongs bag skom tsha rims kyis 'debs/ /lus lci lto sra yi ga 'chus/ /mcher pa lta

bur mchin g.yas logs/ /gnas 'phos dmu rdzing skyed ces bya/ /bya sgro spu dang bcas pa'i zas/ /zos pas bshang lam gnas 'gags te/ /gzhang 'brum dang ni rtug skam dang / /rgyu mar chags pa'i zas kyis kyang / /thur du sel ba'i rlung 'khrugs

te/ /bshang bas bad mkhris bkag nas ni/ /lto bar dmu rdzing chags par byed/ /des ni tsha skom rims sbrid 'byung / /lud pa dbugs mi bde brla na/ /klad snying lte ba gzhang kha na/ /dri ma 'gags slon yi ga 'chus/ /lto bar rlung ni 'khyims par byed/ /

brtan zhing rtsa ni sngo la smug /rtsa ris snang ba'am mi snang 'gyur/ /phal cher lte ba'i 'og tu ni/ /ba lang mjug 'dra 'byung bar 'gyur/ /rus stsogs zug rngur bcas pa'i zas/ /zos sam shin tu drag zos pa/ /rgyu ma rdol lam gas

gyur nas/ /bu ga de nas ma zhu bar/ /phyir 'dzag bshang lam las 'byung zhing / /bshang bcas nyung shas nyung shas ni/ /sha rul lta bur mnam pa ni/ /sbyin bag dmar ser 'byung bar 'gyur/ /lhag ma yis ni lto ba 'gengs/ /dmu rdzing mi bzad skye

bar 'gyur/ /de ni lte ba man chad rgyas/ /chus gang lta bur myur du 'gyur/ /nad kyi tshul ni shas cher ldan/ /dbugs mi bde skom mgo 'khor khyab/ /rgyu rdol dmu rdzing zhes bshad de/ /gzhan dag rgyu ma 'dzag ces zer/ /snum 'thungs la sogs byas nas

ni/ /'phral du chu grang 'thungs pa'am/ /me drod bri ba'am ha cang ni/ /skom pas chu 'thung drags pa'am/ /rlung dang bad kan 'khrugs chur 'dres/ /chu yi lam ni bkag gyur pas/ /de nyid gnas der 'phel bar 'gyur/ /de 'og dmu rdzing gyur pa

yin/ /de nas dmu rdzing de las ni/ /skom dad rkub tu chu 'dzag bcas/ /dbugs mi bde lud yi ga 'chus/ /sna tshogs mdog ldan rtsa yis khyab/ /rkyal pa chus gang reg pa 'dra/ /bskyod na sgra grag lus 'dar la/ /dmu rdzing chen pos cha zhing

snum/ /brtan zhing de ni lte ba zlum/ /thams cad yal bar bor na ni/ /nad ni rang gnas las 'phos te/ /smin pas sla zhing zag 'gyur ba/ /tshigs dang rtsa sgo las kyang 'dzag /phyi yi rtsa sgo nas rngul 'byung / /'gags nas thad kar 'khyil zhing

gnas/ /chu de nyid ni 'phel 'gyur zhing / /sbyin bag gyur na de tshe ni/ /lto ba lci zhing sra la zlum/ /brdabs na sgra ni mi 'byung zhing / /mdog 'jam rtsa ris mi snang la/ /lto ba dang ni rgyab tu 'gro/ /de rjes chu yi dmu rdzing skye/ /lto ba 'phel zhing

de las lhag /rtsa nub gyur pa'i dmu chu ni/ /dmu rdzing bshad pa'i mtshan nyid ldan/ /rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan mcher/ /'dus pa'i chu yi dmu rdzing rnams/ /phyi ma bzhin du gso ba dka'/ /gzhan dag phal cher zla phyed gsod/ /thams cad

chur gyur 'chi ltas le'u/ /las bshad bla brnan ldan pa'ang gsod/ /skyes nas dmu rdzing gyur pa dag /phal cher gso bar dka' bar bshad/ /stobs ldan chur ni ma gyur zhing / /gsar du byung ba 'bad pas gso/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus

pa las/ nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u bcu gnyis pa'o// //de nas skya rbab dang 'or nad dang me dbal gyi nad gzhi bshad par bya'o/ /ji skad bshad pa'i nad 'khrugs pas/ /mkhris pa lhag par ldang 'gyur la/ /de la rlung ni stobs che bas/ /snying

la gnas pa'i mkhris pa ni/ /gtor te rtsa chen bcu'i nang bkram/ /lus kun la ni khyab gyur pas/ /bad kan pags pa sha khrag la/ /gnod byas bar du gnas nas ni/ /sha dang pags pa de dag las/ /pags mdog tha dad dkar ba dang / /ser

zhing ljang sngon byed par 'gyur/ /de las skya ba'i shas che bas/ /de phyir skya rbab nad ces bshad/ /nad des lus ni lci ba dang / /lus zungs rnams ni lhod pa dang / /mdangs kyi yon tan zad gyur zhing / /de las khrag dang tshil chung ste/ /snying po med

cing dbang po lhong / /yan lag brdungs pa snyam byed cing / /snying ni zag pa snyam du sems/ /mig phugs skrang zhing nyams la na/ /mchil mang skad gsang dma' ba dang / /zas mi 'dod cing grang mi bzod/ /spu 'byi me drod nyams pa dang / /ro smad

'bying zhing rims kyis 'debs/ /dbugs mi bde zhing rna sgra 'bod/ /mgo 'khor ngal bar byed pa yin/ /de ni nad gzhi tha dad 'dus/ /sa zhag zos las rnam lnga 'gyur/ /'di yi sngon tshul snying 'phar zhing / /pags pa rtsub par gyur pa dang / /yi

ga 'chus shing gcin mdog ser/ /rngul med khong pa'i me drod chung / /lus rmya ngal bar byed pa yin/ /de la rlung gyur lus na zug /rtsa sen mig dang bshang gci rnams/ /mdog nag rtsub la 'dar ba dang / /skrang sbo kha yis ro mi tshor/ /

rtug skam rtsib logs klad pa na/ /mkhris las rtsa dang sen mo stsogs/ /ljang sngon rims 'debs mun 'thibs byed/ /skom dang rngul brgyal bsil ba 'dod/ /lus mnam kha nang kha ba dang / /'khru zhing sgregs pa skyur la tsha/ /bad kan rtsa stsogs dkar

ba dang / /glongs shing kha nang lan tshwa bro/ /ba spu ldang zhing skad 'gags la/ /lud pa lu zhing slon par byed/ /'dus gyur mtshan ma 'dres brnag dka'/ /sa zhag bska bas rlung skyed la/ /tsha bro mkhris pa mngar bad kan/ /dngas ma la sogs gnod

'gyur zhing / /rtsub pas zas zos rtsub gyur nas/ /zhu bas rtsa sbubs 'gags byas te/ /snga ma bzhin du skya rbab skyed/ /de nas lte ba rkang pa dang / /kha dang pho mtshan skrang par byed/ /bshang ba srin bu dang bcas 'khru/ /bad kan khrag dang bcas pa 'byung / /

gang zhig skya rbab nad kyis btab/ /de yis mkhris skyed zas zos pas/ /khong pa yan lag gnas mkhris gnas/ /bshang khrag bsregs te mig ser skyed/ /des ni mig dang pags pa gdong / /bshang gci sen mo kha dog ser/ /lus tsha skom dang

zas mi 'ju/ /sbal 'dra dbang po nyam chung 'gyur/ /de ni mkhris pa'i shas chen/ /skya rbab nad med par de 'byung / /yal bar bor na cher skrangs te/ /gso dka' mig ser 'or thabs yin/ /ha li sa ni ljang nag ser/ /rlung mkhris mgo 'khor skom

dad che/ /bud med la dga' rims chung 'debs/ /khong rmya me drod nyams stobs 'bri/ /ha li sa ka khrag ngan 'gyur/ /chu ser can zhes bya ba yin/ /de rnams kyi ni bla brnan sngar/ /'or nad gtso bo yin par bshad/ /de phyir de nyid bshad par bya'o/ /

rlung 'khrugs gyur pas bad kan dang / /khrag dang mkhris pa phyi rol rtsar/ /'phros byas de yang rgyun srang 'gags/ /pags pa sha la gnas gyur te/ /'or nad mthong zhing skrang par byed/ /de bas thams cad 'dus gyur bshad/ /rgyu rnams

kyi ni bye brag las/ /gzugs dbye dgu yi bdag nyid can/ /nad gzhi tha dad gnyis dang kun/ /snad dang dug gis phog las 'byung / /yang na rang dang glo bur gnyis/ /yan lag kun skrang phyogs gcig gnyis/ /khyab dang mtho dang mdud pa

yi/ /dbyibs kyi dbye bas gsum du 'dod/ /'or nad kyi ni spyi yi rgyu/ /nad las skyes pa khyad par nyid/ /nad las smyung stsogs kyis nyam chung / /myur du lhag par zos las 'byung / /de nas gzhan yang lci ba dang / /skyur dang snum bsil lan

tshwa dang / /thal sman rnon po tsha ba dang / /mya ngan chu gnyid drags dang yar/ /sa zos sha lci sha skam dang / /ma zhu ngal dang bud med drags/ /rkang gis lam du 'gro ba 'am/ /bzhon pas drag tu bskyod 'gyur yin/ /lud pa dbugs mi bde tshad

'khru/ /gzhang 'brum lto ba'i nad dang ni/ /mngal nas khrag zag rims kyis btab/ /gsud dang chu ser slon nyes dang / /sbrum ma dang ni me dbal gyi/ /nad dang skya rbab dag gis btab/ /gzhan yang log par gsos gyur pa'i/ /nad

de brang du gnas na ni/ /stod skrang chu sor gnas smad skrang / /dbus na gnas pa rab tu skrang / /yan lag kun khyab thams cad skrang / /nying lag la brten de skrang byed/ /de yi sngon tshul rtsa rnams tsha/ /yan lag snyom par byed pa yin/ /rlung

las skrang pa 'pho zhang rtsub/ /spu rtsub smug cing gnag pa dang / /pags 'khums 'dar brtse reg nan/ /na zhing zug pa be+em bem po/ /myur bar ldang zhing myur du zhi/ /skrangs pa mnan na dma' bar 'gyur/ /snum dang dro pas mnyes na zhi/ /

mtshan mo chung zhing nyin mo che/ /pags pa yungs kar lde gu yis/ /bskus ltar tsha ba tsag tsag byed/ /mkhris pa rtsa ser dmar la gnag /spu ni dmar ser gyur pa dang / /myur du ldang dang zhi mi 'gyur/ /dang por dbus

su byung dang srab/ /skom bcas tsha zhing rims 'debs rngul/ /mnam zhing 'drul la snum mgo 'khor/ /bsil bar 'dod cing thur du 'khru/ /dri mnam reg na mi bzod 'jam/ /bad kan g.ya' spu pags pa dkar/ /mkhrang zhing bsil la lci ba

dang / /snum zhing 'jam la brten zhing 'thas/ /gnyid che slon zhing me drod nyams/ /mnan na mi 'bying ldang dka' zhing / /zhi dka' mtshan mo skrangs tshabs che/ /'od ma gtsags bu stsogs dral yang / /khrag mi 'byung bar spyin bag 'dzag /dro dang

reg pa la mngon dga'/ /gnyis 'byung gsum po rang ji bzhin/ /rgyu dang mtshan ma 'dren ma yin/ /'dus pa kun gyi bdag nyid can/ /mtshon las stsogs pas nad gyur zhing / /bcad dam dbral lam smas la stsogs/ /kha ba me

dang rgya mtsho'i rlung / /bse rtsi ka pi ka chu yi/ /khu ba gra ma stsogs reg pas/ /skrang pa mched par 'gyur ba yin/ /shin tu tsha zhing dmar bar snang / /phal cher mkhris pa'i mtshan nyid can/ /dug skyes srog chags dug can ni/ /

lus la sod dang gcin gyis phog /srog chags dug med pa yi yang / /so dang mche ba sen mos zug /gcin rtug khu bas smos pa dang / /dri ma can gyi gos kyis reg /dug shing rlung la rag pa dang / dbyig dug phye mas reg las byung / /

mnyen zhing g.yo la 'phyang ba dang / /myur gsod tsha zhing na bar byed/ /'or nad gsar byung bla brnan med/ /gso sla gso dka' sngar bshad zin/ /me dpal nad dang snad pa'i bar/ /gnod pa 'or nad mtshungs pa yin/ /de ni phyi nang gnyi ga ste/ /

gsum na gnas pa yin par bshad/ /phyi ma bzhin du gso bar dka'/ /de la nad ni ji bzhin du/ /'khrugs pa'i rgyu yis ldang gyur la/ /khyad par du ni tsha ba yis/ /lus la myur du mched par byed/ /de yang nang gnas nang du mched/ /phyir

gnas phyir mched gnyi gar gnas/ /gnyi gar mched par byed pa yin/ /de la nang na gnas pa ni/ /gnad rnams tsha gdung myos par byed/ /bu ga rnams la gnod pa dang / /skom dad rab che gcin nad stsogs/ /mi snyoms par ni 'byung ba

dang / /me drod myur nyams las shes bya/ /phyi rol de las bzlog pa yin/ /de la rlung gyur me dbal ni/ /rlung gi rims dang nad thabs 'dra/ /skrang zhing 'gul la zug pa dang / /yan lag snyom zhing ba spu brtse/ /mkhris gyur

myur du mched cing 'gro/ /mkhris rims rtags ldan shin tu dmar/ /bad kan las g.ya' reg na 'jam/ /bad kan las byung rims 'dar na/ /me dbal stsogs kun yal bar bor/ /rang gi nad tshul bsags gyur na/ /de ni smin rdol rang

rang gi/ /me dbal rma yi mtshan nyid 'dzin/ /rlung mkhris la ni rims 'debs slon/ /brgyal zhing tshad 'khru skom mgo 'khor/ /rus tshigs chag snyam me drod nyams/ /mun zhugs snyam sems yi ga 'chus/ /yan lag thams cad me

mdag ni/ /'bar pas khyab pa lta bur tsha/ /phyogs ni gang dang gang du mched/ /khyab pas yan lag de dang de/ /me mdag zhi ba ltar gnag pa'am/ /sngo ba'am dmar bas khyab byed la/ /mes bsregs lta bur chu bur 'byung / /myur du mched cing

khyab par byed/ /gnad kyi rjes 'jug me dbal ni/ /de nas stobs rab skyes pa'i rlung / /yan lag na zhing dran pa stor/ /gnyid yar dbugs kyi rngam pa drag /skyigs bus 'debs shing 'di lta bu'i/ /gnas skabs des ni thob par 'gyur/ /

sa dang mal khri stan stsogs la/ /gang du 'ang bde ba mi 'thob cing / /'gre zhing sdug bsngal myong ba dang / /lus sems ngal las byung ba yis/ /gnyid kyi rmongs bag sad dga' ba/ /de ni me 'dra'i me dpal yin/ /bad kan gyis ni

bkag pa'i rlung / /bad kan de rdol mang du phye/ /khrag 'phel ba yis khrag brtol te/ /pags pa chu bshal gnas/ /gnod byas thor bu phra zhing rim/ /zlum zhing sbom la sra ba yi/ /mdzer pa'i phreng ba chags byed cing / /mdog dmar rab na rims kyis 'debs/ /

lud pa dbugs mi bde tshad 'khru/ /kha skam skyigs bu slon mgo 'khor/ /rmongs bag mdog nyams brgyal dang lus/ /yan lag na zhing me drod nyams/ /de ltar mdzer pa'i me dbal ni/ /bad kan rlung 'khrugs las gyur yin/ /bad kan mkhris las rims

'debs rengs/ /gnyid che slon bag klad pa na/ /yan lag na zhing bya rmyang 'dod/ /bla zhing mgo 'khor yi ga 'chus/ /rtsub cing drod nyams rus chag snyam/ /skom zhing dbang po mi gsal lci/ /be snabs 'khru zhing dang ga 'khyil/ /de ni rtsa sbubs rnams su 'gro/ /

phal cher ma zhu gnas na zhugs/ /phyogs gcig tu ni rab min/ /thor bu ser po dmar po dang / /dkar pos phyogs kun gang bar byed/ /nor bu ltar snang gnag cing snum/ /dri ma can la skrang zhing lci/ /rnag pa'i zabs che rab tu tsha/ /reg na 'jig cing rnag pa dang / /

'dam ltar sha ni zhig gyur cing / /rtsa rgyus gsal bar snang ba yin/ /mi yi ro ltar mnam me dpal/ /de ni 'dam 'dra zhes byar bshad/ /kun skyes mtshan nyid kun dang ldan/ /lus zungs kun la rab khyab byed/ /phyi yi rgyu yi smas las 'khrugs/ /khrag

bcas mkhris pa skyed byed de/ /me dpal du ni rlung gis byed/ /rgya sran ku lang+tha 'dra ba'i/ /'brum bus khyab skrang rims 'debs na/ /shin tu tsha la dmar zhing sngo/ /nad dmigs tha dad las gyur gsum/ /gnyis gyur bla brnan med gso sla/ /rma dang 'dus pa las

'byung dang / /thams cad gnad ni khyab pa dang / /rtsa dang chu ba sha 'drul dang / /mi ro'i dri 'dra rul gso dka'/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u bcu gsum pa'o// //de nas mdze nad dang sha bkra dang gzi gu dang srin bu'i

nad gzhi bshad par bya'o/ /kha zas spyod lam log pa dang / /khyad par du ni mi 'phrod bsten/ /dam pa smod dang srog gcod dang / /gzhan gyi nor 'phrog stsogs bsten dang / /sdig pa'i las ni 'phral byas dang / /sngon chad byas pas nad bslangs nas/ /rtsa la thad kar gram

nas ni/ /sha dang pags pa chu ser khrag/ /gnod byas sla bar gyur nas ni/ /de nas phyir ni 'byung 'gyur te/ /pags pa'i mdog ni mi sdug byed/ /mi bzad de ni mdze ru bshad/ /gang phyir dus las yal bar bor/ /de ni lus kun ma rungs 'gyur/ /lus zungs

la zhugs nang du khyab/ /thams cad 'drul bar byed par 'gyur/ /rngul bcas rul zhing mnam pa dang / /srin bu phra mo mi bzad skyed/ /spu lpags chu ba rtsa chen dang / /rus pa snyi ba rim bzhin za/ /de bas sha bkra phyi rol te/ /mdze las gzhan ni yin par bshad/ /

nad gzhi tha dad 'dres pa dang / /'dus gyur mdze nad rnam pa bdun/ /kun kyang nyes gsum las byung yang / /de las lhag pa las ming 'dogs/ /rlung gi mdze ni thod pa 'dra/ /mkhris gyur u dum+bA ra ste/ /bad kan las gyur zlum glang shu/ /rlung mkhris

las skyes ri sh+ya'i lce/ /bad rlung las byung pags pa gcig/ /'brum phran dang ni sha bkra dang / /'bras byer chu ser zhig po'o/ /bad kan mkhris pa las byung ba/ /shu ba rma kha brgya pa dang / /pad+ma dkar po 'brum bur bcas/ /g.yan pa pags

pa myags pa'o/ /'dus pa las gyur 'ol ma se/ /dang po'i gsum dang shu ba dang / /'ol ma se dang pad+ma dkar/ /ri sh+ya'i lce zhes bya ba ste/ /'di bdun mdze nad chen po yin/ /mdze nad sngar byung mtshan ma ni/ /shin tu 'jam pa'am reg na

rtsub/ /rngul 'byung mi 'byung mdog mi sdug /lus tsha g.ya' zhing pags tshor med/ /thor bu phra'u mtho ba dang / /rma ni lhag par gzer ba dang / /myur du 'byung zhing ring du gnas/ /'tshobs pa dag kyang rtsub par 'gyur/ /

rgyu chung gis kyang nad cher ldang / /ba sbu brtse zhing khrag mdog gnag /thod pa lta bu gnag cing smug /rtsub sra tshor ba chung la srab/ /khyab cing mtha' ma mi mnyam la/ /ba spu langs pas khyab par byed/ /shin tu zug cing g.ya' ba chung / /

myur du khyab byed thod pa 'dra/ /u dum+bA ra smin pa ltar/ /pags spu smug rtsa dkar bas khyab/ /shas cher mthug dang shas cher 'drul/ /tsha ba'i nad dang khrag shas cher/ /myur du smin cing 'drul bar byed/ /'bu can u dum+bA ra yin/ /

brtan zhing 'thas la lci zhing 'jam/ /dkar dmar myur du mi mched la/ /phan tshun 'dab 'brel shu ba slon/ /g.ya' zhing rnag che 'bus gang la/ /mtha' ma 'jam zhing ser por snang / /gor gor por gnas zlum po yin/ /g.ya' zhing phra tsag

gnag pa dang / /chu ser mang ba glang shu yin/ /rtsub cing srab la mtha' ma dmar/ /nang na gnag cing mtho ba dang / /zug cing tsha la na zhing rnags/ /'brum bu rtsub pos khyab pa dang / /ri sh+ya'i lce ni dbyibs 'dra pa/ /'bu mang ri sh+ya'i

lce 'drar bshad/ /glang po'i lpags 'dra reg rtsub lpags/ /gcig pur bshad la gzhi che ba/ /rngul mi 'byung zhing nya lpags 'dra/ /'brum bu phra mo thug thug po/ /reg na rtsub dang ldan pa dang / /g.ya' zhing sra la gnag pa yin/ /sha bkra

nang rtsub phyi rol 'jam/ /phrugs na glog pa 'byung ba dang / /reg na 'jam zhing srab pa la/ /ku ba'i me tog ltar dmar dkar/ /phal cher ro stod dag tu 'byung / /rmen bu dmar po g.ya' dang ldan/ /khyab par byed pa'i 'bras zhes bya/ /

rkang pa lag pa gas pa dang / /mi bzad na zhing g.ya' tshabs chung / /rkang lag zhig pa zhes bya'o/ /thor bu dmar pos khyab pa dang / /ring du mched cing dUr ba 'dra/ /pags pa zar ma'i me tog 'dra/ /g.ya' zhing brtan par gnas pa dang / /

zlum por byung ba shu ba yin/ /rtsa ba sbom zhing tsha bcas na/ /dmar zhing smug la rma kha mang / /rnag cing 'bu mang kha brgya pa/ /phal cher kun tu skye ba yin/ /mtha' ma dmar zhing dbus na dkar/ /g.ya' tsha na dang bcas pa dang / /

mtho zhing ri mo brtan pas khyab/ /pad+ma'i 'dab ma ltar rgyas shing / /stug cing chu ser khrag mang la/ /phal cher myur rdol pad dkar yin/ /pags pa srab pa'i 'brum bu dkar/ /dmar bas gang ba 'brum bu yin/ /g.ya' ba'i nad ni g.ya'

ba dang / /'drul zhing lhag par na ba dang / /'brum pa phra nag mang po ni/ /phal cher rkub lag gru mor 'byung / /thor bu bcas shing reg mi bzod/ /g.ya' zhing dro tsha na dang bcas/ /dmar la pags pa myags pa yin/ /'ol ma se ni rab

tsha na/ /stod ni dmar zhing gnag pa ste/ /'ol ma se yi 'bras bu 'dra/ /mdze yi mtshan ma kun dang ldan/ /de bas kha dog du mar 'gyur/ /mdze nad nad gzhi shas che ba/ /nad dbye shes las bshad pa yi/ /mtshan ma las kyis

bstan pa yi/ /nad kun rgyas pa las byung dang / /gang yang 'chi ltas las bshad dang / /rus rkang khu chu la gnas spang / /tshil la gnas pa 'tsho ba tsam/ /mkhris 'dres sha khrag gnas gso dka'/ /rlung dang bad kan las gyur dang / /

pags gnas nad gcig gyur gso sla/ /de la pags par gnas pa'i mdze/ /zug cing rtsub la mdog mi sdug /khrag gnas rngul 'byung gnyid che skrang / /sha la gnas pa rkang pa dang / /lag par 'brum bu 'byung ba dang / /tshigs gnas lhag par tshigs 'drul skem/ /rkang pa 'jas

'gyur tshil gnas pa/ /yan lag zhig par byed par 'gyur/ /rus pa rkang gnas sna zhom zhing / /mig dmar skad ni 'gags pa dang / /rma la 'bu zhugs khu bar gnas/ /bu dang chung mar bcas la 'byung / /khrag stsogs

la ni rim bzhin du/ /mtshan ma thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur/ /gzi gu mdze dang gcig las 'byung / /de ni sha bkra chu dang ni/ /yongs su 'dzag pa zhes byar bshad/ /nad gzhi gsum la brten zhing 'byung / /rlung las rtsub cing smug pa yin/ /

mkhris gyur pad+ma'i 'dab ltar dmar/ /tsha zhing ba spu 'byi bar byed/ /bad kan las skya stug cing lci/ /g.ya' bcas rim bzhin khrag dang ni/ /sha dang tshil la brten par bshad/ /'di dag mdog ni gnyi ga yin/ /de ni phyi ma bzhin gso dka'/ /spu

dkar ma yin srab pa dang / /phan tshun ma 'dres gsar du byung / /mes ma bsregs pa gso bar sla/ /de las gzhan pa gso dka' yin/ /mdoms dang lag mthil mchur byung ba/ /gsar du byung yang gso bar dka'/ /nad rnams phal cher zas dang ni/ /

mal gcig reg stsogs la brten las/ /thams cad 'go ste mig nad dang / /mdze nad lhag par 'gos pa yin/ /sha bkra gzi gu'i nad bshad nas/ /da ni srin bu'i nad bshad bya/ /phyi dang nang gi dbye ba yis/ /srin bu rnam pa gnyis su bshad/ /phyi

yi dri mas bad kan khrag /bshang skyes dbye bas rnam bzhi yin/ /ming las rnam pa nyi shur 'gyur/ /de la phyi yi khrag las byung / /tshad dbyibs mdog ni til 'bru 'dra/ /skra dang gos la brten pa yin/ /phra zhing rkang pa mang la ming / /shig dang sro

ma zhes bya'o/ /gnyi gas thor bu 'brum bu dang / /g.yan pa dag ni skyed par 'gyur/ /nang gi mdze dang rgyu gcig ste/ /de las bad kan las mang skye/ /zas mngar bu ram 'o ma dang / /tsha dang 'bras sar chan la dga'/ /mi gtsang byung bcas bshang

lam nas/ /lo ma 'dab ma la stsogs dga'/ /bad kan ma zhu'i gnas su 'byung / /skyes nas kun du 'gro ba yin/ /la la 'breng ba 'dra ba yin/ /la la srin bu khol ma 'dra/ /kha cig myu gu 'bus pa 'dra/ /phra zhing ring la chung ba

dang / /dkar zhing dmar bar snang ba yin/ /de yi ming ni rnam bdun te/ /rgyu ma zad dang lto nang 'khyil/ /snying za ya mtshan chen po dang / /mi mngon rgyu dang 'jag ma 'dra/ /dri zhim zhes bya de rnams ni/ /snying 'phar kha chu 'dzag pa dang / /

zas mi 'ju zhing yi ga 'chas/ /brgyal zhing mi dran rims 'debs slon/ /skom zhing sbrid pa cham pas 'debs/ /khrag rgyu ba yi rtsa nang nas/ /khrag las byung ba'i srin bu phra/ /zlum zhing rkang med zangs ltar dmar/ /phra zhing la lar bltar

mi snang / /skra rtsa za zhing sbu 'byi byed/ /sbu gling u dum+bA ra 'dra/ /zhags pa bcas dang thong ka ste/ /drug po de dag mdze las gcig /zhu ba'i gnas su mi gtsang skyes/ /'phel nas thur du rgyu bar byed/ /de ni cher 'phel gyur pa na/ /

gang tshe ma zhu'i gnas su zhugs/ /de tshe sgregs pa dbugs 'byung ba/ /phyi sa lta bur mnam par 'gyur/ /zlum zhing lus phra sbom po dang / /smug dang ser dang dkar dang gnag /srin bu de ming rnam lnga ste/ /kham gyi zas dang dal gyis 'gro/ /

myong bar byed dang brkam pa dang / /lus la gnod byed ces bya'o/ /des 'khru gzer dang rtug skam byed/ /skem zhing mdog ni skya ba dang / /ba spu ldang zhing me drod nyams/ /lci g.ya' gzhang ni phyir 'byung byed/ /

yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u bcu bzhi pa'o// //de nas rlung nad kyi nad gzhi bshad par bya'o/ /rlung ni phan dang gnod byed la/ /'di ni sna tshogs rgyu gcig pu/ /khyad par du ni lus kyi ni/ /

nad dang nad med rgyu gcig pu/ /de ni kun byed kun bdag nyid/ /sna tshogs gzugs can skye dgu'i bdag/ /'byin byed 'dzin byed khyab 'jug gtso/ /sdud byed 'chi bdag gshin rjer 'gyur/ /de bas de ldang mi 'gyur

bar/ /rtag tu 'bad pa nyid du gyis/ /de yis tha mal gzhan gyur las/ /nad kyi bye brag shes par bshad/ /bsdus dang rgyas pa de'i ming gnas/ /rgyu ba'i lam ni re re lnga/ /nad tshul shes par bshad pa yin/ /'dir ni

nad kyi rnam gyur ba/ /de yi dbye ba nad gzhi dang / /mtshan nyid bcas pa nyid du bshad/ /grangs med kyang ni brgyad cu yi/ /grangs su sngar ni bshad pa yin/ /lus zungs zad byed bsten drags pas/ /rlung ni 'khrugs par byed 'gyur

te/ /sbu gu stong par rgyu gyur pa/ /de nyid shin tu 'gengs bar byed/ /nad gzhan gyis ni gang ba der/ /khebs pas mthu can nyid du 'gyur/ /de la zhu ba'i gnas su zhugs/ /gzer dang rgyu ma sgra bcas sbo/ /bshang 'gags rde'u nad

gzhang 'brum skye/ /rgyab dang rked pa mjug mdor na/ /ro smad kyi ni phyogs de ru/ /mi bzad gnod pa de de skyed/ /ma zhu'i gnas zhugs skom dad slon/ /lud pa dbugs mi bde gsud nad/ /lkog ma 'gags shing sgregs mang na/ /

lte ba yan chad skyed par byed/ /rna ba stsogs zhugs dbang por gnod/ /pags zhugs gas shing rtsub par byed/ /khrag zhugs gnyid stug mi bzad na/ /tsha zhing dmar la mdog mi sdug /thor 'byung kha zas sra bar gnas/ /yi ga 'chus

skom mgo 'khor na/ /sha tshil la gnas rmen bu dang / /rab tu zug cing lus rtsub la/ /lus lci rab na rengs pa dang / /khu tshur dbyig pas phog snyam byed/ /rus gnas brla dang rus tshigs na/ /mi bzad gzer zhing nyams stobs zad/ /rkang

gnas rus pa khong stong zhing / /gnyid med rtag tu na ba yin/ /khu bar gnas pa myur 'byung la/ /'gags pa'am mdog 'gyur nyid du 'gyur/ /mngal gyi khu bar gnas de bzhin/ /rtsa rnams stong zhing sbo bar 'gyur/ /chu bar gnas

pa gzugs 'jas dang / /sgur dang da rgan nad du 'gyur/ /tshigs la gnas pa'i rlung skrang pa/ /rkyal ba rlung gis gang reg 'dra/ /brkyang dang bskum par byed pa yis/ /bskyod pa na dang bcas par 'gyur/ /yan lag kun la brten pa ni/ /

zug chag snyam sems 'gul ba dang / /rengs dang tshor ba med pa dang / /tshigs 'khums 'dar bar byed par 'gyur/ /gang tshe rtsa chen kun la gnas/ /yang dang yang du 'khrugs gyur pa/ /de tshe yan lag la 'jug pas/ /nad ni

lus la 'jug ces bya/ /ro smad du ni 'gag pa'i rlung / /gyen du song ste snying gar gnas/ /snying ga'i sbu gur zhugs nas ni/ /mgo bo yan lag bcas par zug /lus ni kun du zhugs gyur na/ /de ni gzhu ltar sgu bor byed/ /dbugs

'byin dka' zhing mig rengs har/ /lhod cing 'dzums par byed 'gyur la/ /de nas phug ron lta bur 'khun/ /dran pa med de gzhan dbang can/ /de nyid a ba ta nar bshad/ /rlung gis snying ni btang gyur na/ /skad cig tsam du bde la

reg /slar zhugs na ni na bar byed/ /de ni mngal 'jig las byung dang / /khrag ni lhag par 'dzag gyur dang / /snad pa dag las byung gyur pa/ /shin tu gso bar dka' bar 'gyur/ /mjing pa rengs pa'i rlung zhugs shing / /gang tshe

rtsa chen la gnas pa/ /lus kun khyab par gyur pa na/ /de tshe nam tshong 'gugs par byed/ /lus ni gzhu ltar nang du gug /mig rengs shugs ni 'byin par byed/ /glal 'byung so ni 'cha' ba dang / /bad kan skyugs par byed par 'gyur/ /

rtsib logs zug cing tshig mi 'thon/ /'gram pa rgyab dang mgo bo na/ /'di ni nang du gug ces bya/ /phyi yi de dang 'dra ba la/ /lus ni phyir dgyed byed pa dang / /mgo bo rgyab tu 'dren byed cing / /de la brang ni shin tu 'bur/ /gnya' ba bcom pa ltar na zhing / /so dang kha ni

mdog mi sdug /rngul zhing lus ni lhod par byed/ /phyir dgyed gzhu rengs zhes bya zhing / /de la shugs drag ces kyang bshad/ /gnad la gnas pa'i rmar zhugs te/ /rlung gis bskyod par gyur pa dang / /rkang pa nas ni mgo bo'i bar/ /lus la nad kyis khyab byed pa/ /skam

zhing lus ni skya gyur pa/ /rma yi da rgan de spang bya/ /lus la 'jug pa'i rlung kun ni/ /shugs dang bral nas bde bar 'gyur/ /lce ni brud drags skam zos gnod/ /'gram pa'i rtsa bar gnas rlung 'khrugs/ /'gram pa gnyis ni bskyod byas nas/ /kha ni gdangs par byed pa'am/ /yang

na 'dzums par byed par 'gyur/ /'gram pa nyams par byed pa des/ /za dang smra ba dka' bar 'gyur/ /smra bar byed pa'i rtsa gnas rlung / /lce ni ldibs par byed 'gyur zhing / /lce ldibs des ni bza' btung dang / /smra ba la sogs mi nus 'gyur/ /mgo bos khur ni khyer pa

dang / /dgod drags mang du smra ba dang / /sngangs dang gcus te sbrid pa gtong / /gzhu sra 'dren par byed pa dang / /sngas ni mi mnyam la nyal dang / /sra ba 'cha' bar byed pa dang / /rlung skyed pa ni de dang des/ /rlung 'phel ro stod la zhugs nas/ /gdong gi gzhogs

phyed yon por byed/ /smra ba dgod dang lta ba'ang yo/ /de nas de yi mgo 'gul zhing / /tshig mi phyin la mig rengs shing / /so 'gul skad ni 'gags pa dang / /sgra mi thos shing sbrid pa thogs/ /dri mi tshor zhing dran nyams rmongs/ /gnyid log pa na dngang bar

'gyur/ /mchil ma g.yon du 'dor ba dang / /mig gcig 'dzums par 'gyur pa dang / /nam tshong yan chad mi bzad na/ /gzhogs phyed dag gam ro smad na/ /la las de gzhogs phyed nad bshad/ /gzhan dag phyogs gcig gug ces zer/ /rlung ni khrag la

brten gyur te/ /spyi bo 'dzin pa'i rtsar zhugs pa/ /rtsub cing nad bcas mdog gnag byed/ /rtsa 'dzin de ni gsor mi rung / /rlung gis de la gzhogs phyed bzung / /rtsa dang rgyus pa bskams byas nas/ /gzhogs phyed gang yang rung la gnod/ /tshigs kyi sbrel mtshams lhod

par byed/ /de yis lus phyed thams cad ni/ /las sbyor mi nus tshor ba med/ /de ni phyogs gcig nad ces zer/ /gzhan dag phyogs gcig bskams par 'chad/ /lus kun rlung nad de dang 'dra/ /yan lag kun la brten pa yin/ /rlung nad nyi tshes gzhogs byed bskams/ /

shin tu gse dka' yin par bshad/ /gzhan dang 'dres pa'ang gso dka' yin/ /zad byed rgyu can spang bar bya/ /ma zhu bad kan ldan pa yis/ /rgyun srang bkag ste lus rengs pas/ /brkyang bskum kun las nyams 'gyur ba/ /shing 'dra shing ltar rengs pa yin/ /

phrag pa'i rtsa bar zhugs pa'i rlung / /der gnas rtsa ni 'khums byas te/ /dpung pa bskyod par mi nus byed/ /dpung pa 'jas pa'i rlung nad yin/ /gang zhig lag mthil sor mor 'brel/ /chu ba rgyab tu 'khums byed cing / /lag ngar bya ba nyams byed pa/ /rlung de bi sha tse ru

bshad/ /gang tshe rlung ni rked par gnas/ /brla yi chu ba'i nang du zhugs/ /de tshe mi de 'theng por 'gyur/ /brla gnyis la zhugs 'phye bor 'gyur/ /gang zhig 'gro bar rtsom pa na/ /lus 'dar 'theng po ltar 'gro ba/ /tshigs kyi sbrel mtshams lhod gyur pa/ /de ni sran ma'i 'theng por bshad/ /kha zas dro grang

skam rlon 'dres/ /lci dang snum ches bsten pa dang / /zhu dang ma zhu mi bdes bskyod/ /nyin nyal mtshan gnyid ma log pas/ /ma zhu shin tu stsogs 'gyur te/ /gal te brla nang zhugs 'gyur na/ /bad kan tshil dang rlung bcas pa/ /nad gzhan zil gyis mnan nas ni/ /brla rus nang du gang byas te/ /bad kan

gyis te rengs gyur la/ /de tshe de yis brla rengs byed/ /'degs mi nus grang tshor ba med/ /gzhan gyi yin snyam sems shing lci/ /mi bzad par ni 'gro ba nyams/ /sems khong chud cing yan lag na/ /snyom slon rims 'debs yi ga 'chus/ /rkang pa sgyid zhan 'degs pa dka'/ /bem be+em por 'dug ldan pa

yin/ /de ni bla rengs nad ces bshad/ /gzhan dag phyug po'i rlung zhes zer/ /rlung dang khrag las skyes pa'i skrang / /pus mo'i steng byung nad tshabs che/ /ce spyang mgo ltar sbom gyur pa/ /ce spyang mgo 'dra yin zhes bya/ /rkang pa na zhing mi mnyam

'dor/ /ngal ba las ni gang che rlung / /long mor gnas te nad skyed pa/ /de ni rlung nad tsher mar bshad/ /rting ba sor mor 'brel pa yi/ /chu bar rlung gis gnod gyur gang / /brla nas 'jug par byed pa de/ /gzugs 'khums zhes ni bya bar bshad/ /bi sha tsi

dang gzugs 'khums bshad/ /mi bzad na ba kha lir bshad/ /gang gi rkang pa brtsi 'gyur zhing / /bem bem por ni gyur pa dag /bad kan rlung 'khrugs las gyur pa/ /rkang pa brtse bar de bshad do/ /mkhris pa khrag dang bcas pa'i rlung / /rkang pa gnyis su tsha

byed cing / /khyad par du ni 'gro tshe tsha/ /de ni rkang tsha zhes byar bshad/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u bcwa lnga pa'o// //de nas dreg nad kyi nad gzhi bshad par bya'o/ /khrag ni 'khrugs par byed pa'i zas/ /tsha ba dang

ni mi 'phrod pa/ /bsten dang sbyor ba log pa dang / /nyin nyal mtshan gnyid ma log dang / /nyal po drags dang skyid par gnas/ /'chags pa'i spyod pa ma bsten dang / /snad dang sbyang ba ma byas bas/ /mi yi khrag ni 'khrugs 'gyur zhing / /rlung skyed zos pas rlung nad ni/ /

'phel bas 'khrugs te lam gzhan zhugs/ /de bzhin khrag kyang lam 'gags la/ /dang por gnod par 'gyur ba yin/ /de ni phyug po'i rlung nad dang / /'theng nad stobs 'jig rlung khrag 'dres/ /ming du de ni rnam par bshad/ /de yang dang por rkang par rgyu/ /mchog tu bzhon

sogs mchongs las byung / /de yi 'byung 'gyur mtshan nyid ni/ /mdze ni 'byung 'gyur mtshan mar mtshungs/ /de bzhin lus nyams yan lag lhod/ /pus mo byin pa brla rked pa/ /lag pa rkang pa'i tshigs rnams su/ /g.ya' zhing 'gul dang na ba dang / /chag snyam

sems shing tshor med lci/ /yang dang yang du ldang ba dang / /slar yang zhi bar 'gyur ba yin/ /rkang pa gnyis kyi rtsa bar gnas/ /lan 'ga' lag pa dag tu gnas/ /byi ba'i dug ni ldang ba ltar/ /lus kun la ni khyab par 'gyur/ /thog mar pags pa khrag

la gnas/ /byung ba rtogs par bla zhes bya/ /de nas rim gyis lus zungs kun/ /khyab ste rtogs par dka' zhes bya/ /rtogs sla pags g.ya' la sogs ldan/ /zangs ltar dmar dang sngo ba dang / /bya rmyang bcas shing rab dro tsha/ /rtogs dka' sngar

bas lhag par na/ /skrang zhing mkhrang la tshos par byed/ /gzhang dang tshigs dang rus pa rkang / /bcad snyam sems shing nang du rgyu/ /shugs dang ldan tshe sgur po dang / /zha bo 'theng por byed 'gyur la/ /lus ni kun du rgyu ba yin/ /de la rlung shas che gyur na/ /

gzer 'gul zug pa'i shas che zhing / /skrang ba rtsub cing gnag pa dang / /sngo zhing 'phel zhing 'bri bar 'gyur/ /rtsa chen sor mo'i tshigs rnams ni/ /'khums shing lus bcum bzhin du na/ /grang la mi dga' reg na bde/ /rengs shing 'dar la tshor ba med/ /khrag shas che

skrang rab tu zug /dmar zhing tsha ba tseg tseg byed/ /snum dang rtsub bas zhi mi 'gyur/ /g.ya' dang 'drul bar ldan pa yin/ /mkhris gyur tsha zhing rmongs bag dang / /rngul zhing brgyal myos skom dad che/ /reg mi bzod cing na la dmar/ /skrang zhing smin la shin tu

bro/ /bad kan gyis 'gul mi shes lci/ /tshor med snum zhing grang ba dang / /g.ya' zhing cung zad na ba yin/ /'dres pa'i mtshan nyid 'dren ma yin/ /nad gcig las byung gsar gso sla/ /nad gnyis las byung 'tsho ba tsam/ /'dus pa las byung chu ser 'dzag /rengs

dang thor bu 'byang ba spang / /rlung ni yan lag tshigs gnas pa/ /khrag gi lam la myur gnod byed/ /de gnyis phan tshun 'dres gyur pa'i/ /nad kyis srog ni 'phrog par byed/ /lnga yi bdag nyid can rlung las/ /srog rtsub drag shul smyung ba dang / /'grangs drags

snad dang lam gyis dub/ /shugs bkag nan gyis brtsir ba yis/ /'khrugs nas mig la sogs pa la/ /nye bar gnod pa skyed byed cing / /cham pa nyam thag skom lud pa/ /dbugs mi bde sogs nad ma bskyed/ /stod rgyu sbrid pa sgregs pa dang / /

skyugs pa gnyid ni bkag pa dang / /khur lci 'degs dang drag tu ngu / /dgod drags sogs kyis nad 'khrugs te/ /mgul pa 'gags shing sems nyams la/ /cham 'debs slon zhing yi ga 'chus/ /mgul par lba ba sogs skyed cing / /nam 'tshong yan chad brten

nad skyed/ /khyab byed 'gro dang 'dug drags dang / /rtsed mo drags dang mi bzod spyod/ /kha zas mi mthun rtsub 'jigs dga'/ /yi mug sogs kyis 'khrugs par 'gyur/ /khu ba stobs dang spro ba nyams/ /skrang dang sems g.yengs rims kyis 'debs/ /yan lag kun la zug pa dang / /

spu brtse yan lag tshor ba med/ /mdze dang med dbal gzhan yang ni/ /lus kun khyab pa'i nad skyed 'gyur/ /mnyam gnas 'du ba ma snyoms dang / /grang dang 'dren ma'i zas zos dang / /dus min gnyid log mtshan mo ni/ /gnyid ma log la sogs kyis 'khrugs/ /gzer

dang skran dang pho nad sogs/ /zhu dang ma zhur gnas nad skyed/ /thur sel zas ni rtsub dang lci/ /shugs bkag pa dang mi srun bzhon/ /khyogs dang bzhon dang stan gnas dang / /'gro ba bsten ni drags pa yis/ /'khrugs nas gso bar dka' ba'i nad/ /zhu ba'i gnas la

brten pa skyed/ /gcin dang khu chu'i nad gzhang 'brum/ /gzhang 'byung la sogs mang po skyed/ /rlung kun ma zhur ldan pa ni/ /snyom dang 'gul mi shes khong lci/ /snum dang sgyid zhan yi ga 'chus/ /grang skran me drod nyams byed cing / /tsha dang rtsub pa mngon 'dod

cing / /de zos bde 'gyur las shes bya/ /ma zhu ba dang mi ldan pa/ /snyom sogs go ni bzlog pa yin/ /de nas rlung gis 'dres pa yi/ /dbye ba mang por shes par bya/ /mkhris pas 'dres rtags tsha ba dang / /skom gzer mgo 'khor mun 'thibs byed/ /tsha dro skyur dang

lan tshwa bro/ /tsha zhing grang ba 'dod pa yin/ /bsil zhing khong lci gzer ba dang / /tsha ba sogs zos smyung ba dang / /rtsol dang rtsub pas lhag par bde/ /drod 'dod bad kan ldan pa yin/ /khrag bcas tsha zhing na dang bcas/ /pags pa'i sha nad shin tu zug /skrang pa

mdog dmar 'gyur ba dang / /thig le dmar po 'byung ba yin/ /sha dang 'dres pa mkhrang ba dang / /mdog 'gyur 'brum bu phra mo 'byung / /spu brtse lus la grog ma ni/ /rgyu ba snyam du sems par 'gyur/ /tshil dang 'dres pa gso dka' dang / /g.yo zhing snum la

'jam grang bar/ /lus la skrang zhing yi ga 'chus/ /de ni phyug po'i rlung nad yin/ /rus pa dang ldan reg na tsha/ /btsir na mngon par dga' ba dang / /khab kyis rab tu gtsags snyam byed/ /yan lag na zhing zug pa yin/ /rkang dang ldan la lus sgu zhing / /glal

mang dkris pa snyam du sems/ /rab tu na la lag gnyis kyis/ /btsir na bde bar 'gyur ba yin/ /khu ba dang 'dris drag tu 'byung / /yang na mi 'byung 'bras bu med/ /zas 'dres khong par ma zhu na/ /zhu nas nad de bde bar 'gyur/ /gcin dang rlung 'dres lgang pa sbo/ /

gcin ni 'gags par byed par 'gyur/ /bshang 'dres thur du 'byung ba 'gag /rang gi gnas su yongs su gcod/ /snum zos myur du 'ju bar 'gyur/ /zas zos lto ni sbos pa dang / /zas kyis bshang ba phul nas ni/ /na zhing skom po rnyog can 'byung / /rlung ni

lus zungs kun dang 'dres/ /brla dang chu so rgyab tu na/ /rlung ni log song mi bde zhing / /snying ni rab tu na bar byed/ /srog dang mkhris pa 'dres gyur 'khrugs/ /mgo 'khor brgyal dang lus tsha 'gyur/ /legs par ma zhu slon par byed/ /stod rgyu mgo 'khor sogs

pa dang / /nang du tsha zhing stobs zad 'gyur/ /khyab byed rmongs bag lus kun ni/ /tsha zhing ngal la lus spyod 'gags/ /lus tsha nad dang bcas pa yin/ /mnyam gnas drod kyis gnod rdul che/ /mi dga' skom dang tsha bcas 'gyur/ /thur du sel bas dri ma ni/ /kha

dog ser por 'byung ba dang / /zla mtshan cher 'phel mo mtshan dang / /pho mtshan rkub tu tsha bar 'gyur/ /srog ni bad kan 'dres gyur pa/ /lus lhod skom dang yi ga 'chus/ /mchil mang sgregs pa sbrid mang slon/ /dbugs 'byung dbugs rngub thogs

pa yin/ /stod rgyu lus ni lci ba dang / /tshig thogs skad 'gags yi ga 'chus/ /stobs dang kha dog nyams par byed/ /khyab byed rus tshigs rengs pa dang / /yan lag thams cad lci ba dang / /'gros ni shin tu 'khyor ba yin/ /mnyam gnas yan lag grang

byed cing / /rngul mi 'byung zhing drod chung 'gyur/ /thur sel bshang dang gci ba ni/ /bad kan bcas par 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de ltar rlung ni gzhan 'brel ba/ /nyi shu rtsa gnyis yin zhes bya/ /de bzhin srog la sogs pa'i rlung / /phan tshun rim bzhin 'dres gyur pa/ /

kun kyang 'khrugs par gyur pa de/ /nyi shur 'gyur ba yin zhes bya/ /srog dang stod rgyu lhan cig 'khrugs/ /dbugs 'byung dbugs rngub dka' ba dang / /cham 'debs mgo bo na bar byed/ /snying na kha ni skam par 'gyur/ /stod rgyu'i rlung ni srog dang 'dres/ /mdog dang

gzi mdangs stobs zad byed/ /phyogs 'dis 'gres pa lhag ma rnams/ /sman pas nye bar sbyar par bya/ /rlung ni gnas dang 'phel dang 'bri/ /las rnams legs par brtag par bya'o/ /srog la sogs pa lnga po ni/ /'khrugs pas phan tshun 'dres pa yin/ /mkhris

pa la sogs bcu gnyis dang / /'dres par 'gyur te 'dren ma yin/ /mkhris pa sogs las 'dres de bzhin/ /'dren ma rnam pa du ma yin/ /rab dang rab mchog brtags pa yis/ /'dres pa grangs med 'gyur ba yin/ /de ni rang gi mtshan nyid dang / /rim gyis

bde bar 'gyur ba las/ /rtogs dka' yin te yang yang brtag /ma yengs pas ni shes par bya/ /khyad par srog ni 'tsho ba yin/ /stod du rgyu ba stobs zhes brjod/ /de gnyis gnod par gyur pa las/ /tshe dang stobs ni zad par 'gyur/ /rlung ni 'dres pa

ma shes pa'am/ /shes kyang lo gcig lon pa ni/ /'bad kyang gso dka' yin pa'am/ /gso ba'i thabs ni med pa yin/ /'dres nad yal bar bor na ni/ /khong 'bras mcher pa snying nad dang / /skran dang me drod nyams la sogs/ /bla brnan de las 'byung bar

'gyur/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u bcu drug pa'o// //yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ nad gzhi'i gnas te gnas gsum pa rdzogs so// //de nas rims nad gso ba bshad par bya'o/ /

rgyun shes kyi bu la sogs pa drang srong chen po rnams kyis 'di skad ces bshad do/ /gang phyir ma zhu gnas ma zhu/ /rgyun srang bkag ste me drod nyams/ /rim gyis nyes pa skyed byed pas/ /sngon tshul byung dang rims sogs la'ang / /de phyir smyung ba bya dgos la/ /stobs

ni 'bad pas bsrung bar bya/ /stobs ni nad med pa yi gnas/ /bya ba'i rims ni nad med don/ /smyung byas nad ni nyam smad cing / /me drod skyed dang khong yang 'gyur/ /bde zhing bkres skom yi ga 'bye/ /zas 'ju stobs dang mdangs skyed 'gyur/ /de la phal cher bad

kan nad/ /bslangs dang g.yos par gyur pa dang / /dang gar 'khyil bcas mchil ma mang / /zas la mi dga' lud pa gsung / /zos ma thag tu rims 'debs pa/ /khyad par du ni ma zhur 'gyur/ /skyug sman btang 'os skyug sman bsngags/ /de las gzhan du byas na

ni/ /dbugs mi bde dang tshad 'khru rmongs/ /snying nad mi bzad rims kyis 'debs/ /po son pi pi ling bcas pa/ /dug mo nyung ngam shing mngar ni/ /chu dron sbrang rtsir bcas pa'am/ /yang na rgyam tshar ldan pa blud/ /kar ka ta 'am pa to la/ /nim pa sba'i lo ma'i

chu'am/ /'bras yos kyi ni skyo ma'am/ /bu ram shing khu'am chang sbyar btung / /nyams stobs dus kyi dbye shes pas/ /cho ga'i gnas las bshad pa yi/ /skyug sman dag ni rab tu btang / /skyug sman gyi ni sbyor ba dag /byas par gyur tam ma byas kyang / /rims

nad can la rnam sbyang bya/ /nad ni bskyod par gyur pa dang / /smin dang zhi bar bya phyir bya/ /thal bas g.yogs pa'i me bzhin du/ /ma zhus khebs zas 'ju mi 'gyur/ /de bas nyes pa smin bya'i phyir/ /rims dang ldan la smyung ba bya/ /rlung dang

bad kan rims skom dang / /chu tshan nyung shas nyung shas btung / /des ni bad kan zhu gyur nas/ /skom dad myur du sel bar byed/ /me drod skyed cing bu ga'i rgyun/ /'jam par byas nas sbyong bar byed/ /zhen pa'i rlung mkhris rngul dang ni/ /bshang gci bde bar 'byin

par byed/ /gnyid rmongs yi ga 'chus pa sel/ /srog ni 'dzin par byed pa yin/ /chu grang de las bzlog pa ste/ /nad kyi tshogs ni [(]'phal [,]'phel[)]byed yin/ /chu tshan yon tan de 'dra yang / /gcig tu mkhris pas ldan rims dang / /mkhris shas che dang phyogs gcig

tsha/ /kun tsha rmongs bag tshad par 'khru/ /chang dub las byung so ga dang / /gcong skems khrag mkhris can mi blud/ /de la gla sgang tsan+dan dang / /bca' sga par pa ta dang ni/ /pu shel tsi dang ba le ka / bskol chu bsgrangs blud rims skom sel/ /mkhris pa med par tsha mi

'byung / /tsha ba med par rims yod min/ /de bas mkhris pa la gnod spang / /mkhris shas che bas lhag par spang / /khrus dang bsku dang byug pa dang / smyung ba lhag ma'ang spang bar bya/ /ma zhu gzer 'joms sman lta bur/ /ma zhu rims ni mi bzad la/ /sman btung mi

bya de yis ni/ /lhag par ma zhu 'phel bar 'gyur/ /lto ba ma zhus khyab pa la/ /'o ma sbrul la blud dang mtshungs/ /rlung dang bad kan bdag nyid der/ /lkog nad cham pa dbugs mi bde/ /byin pa tshigs rus gzer gyur la/ /rngul 'byung ba ni rab bsngags te/ /rngul

dang bshang gci 'phyen bder 'byung / /me drod skyed cing zas 'ju byed/ /snum 'thung cho gar bshad pa ni/ /rnam pa kun du spyad par bya/ /smyang dang dugs bya dus dang ni/ /nas thug tig ta'i khu ba rnams/ /dri ma rnams ni smin byed pa/ /rim mam gnas skabs ji bzhin sbyin/ /

rlung nad nyi tshe zad byed dang / /glo bur ba dang rims rnying la/ /smyung ba mi bya de la ni/ /nyams mi smad pa'i zhi bya phan/ /de la ma zhu'i rims ldan tshul/ /nyams smad mi byar shes par bya/ /gso ba'i thabs ni gnyis shes las/ /brtags te smyung ba bya ba yin/ /smyung

byas mtshan mar ldan pa ni/ /de la thug sla la sogs blud/ /rang gis sman dang ji bzhin bskol/ /dang por thug sla la sogs sbyin/ /zhag drug bar du'am gang tshe rims/ /rtse zhil gyur pa'i bar du sbyin/ /de yis shing gis me bzhin du/ /de yi me drod 'phel

bar byed/ /dang po 'bras yos thug 'ju sla/ /bca' sga pi pi ling dang bcas/ /'u su rgya mtshar bcas pa sbyin/ /skyur 'dod se'u 'bru bcas ba btung / /'khru ba'am mkhris pa mang ba la/ /sbrang rtsi bca' sga btab bsgrangs blud/ /chu so rtsib logs glad pa gzer/ /gze

ma bya kri bskol ba blud/ /rims 'khrur kr-iSh+Na par+Ni dang / /bal bil ba bca' sga dang / /ut+pal 'u su bskol rims 'khrur/ /thug skyur smin dang drod bskyed yin/ /skyigs bu lud pa dbugs mi bde/ /gzer can rtsa ba chung ngu lnga/ /bad kan gyis nyen nas thug ni/ /rtsa

ba chen po lnga pa sbyin/ /rtug pa 'gags la nad bcas pa/ /pi pi ling dang skyu ru ra/ /btab pa'i nas thug mar dang brngos/ /dri ma nad ni bde 'byung byed/ /lto bar rtug 'gags nad bcas la/ /dbyi mo pi pi ling rtsa ba/ /rgun 'brum dong ga skyu ru ra/ /khong pa bcad pa snyam

byed la/ /rgya shugad trig sa la bar/ /kr-iSh+Na paNi bil ba blud/ /rngul med gnyid med skom pas nyen/ /khar dong gra skyu ru ra'o/ /rgya shug khar rgun 'brum dang / /thal tres gla sgang tsan+dan ni/ /skom dang slon dang bcas pa blud/ /sbrang rtsir bcas pa rims 'joms yin/ /

de dag thug pa'i sman yin te/ /sha khu yu sha sogs pa'ang sbyar/ /chang las byung dang chang rgyun bsten/ /bad kan mkhris pa'i gnas zhugs nas/ /de gnyis shas che'am so ga'am/ /skom dang slon dang tshad pas nyen/ /khrag ni stod du 'byung ba ste/ /de la thug pa mi blud kyi/ /

'bras phye'i skyo ma rims 'joms pa'i/ /'bras bu'i khu ba sbrang rtsi dang / /khar dkar bcas blud par bya/ /de nas skyo ma zhu nas ni/ /bkres na nas thug 'bras brngos pa'i/ /'bras chan dag ni bza' bya zhing / /sha khu sla ba'i khu ba 'am/ /mung+ga 'ur

pa'i khu bcas bza'/ /de ltar zhag drug 'di bzlas te/ /nyams stobs nad ni bsrung bar bya/ /de nas smyung ba la sogs pas/ /smin pa'i nad ni lhag ma rnams/ /smin pa'am yang na zhi bya'i phyir/ /sman khu'i sbyor ba'i bya ba bsngags/ /mkhris la mchog tu kha ba

ste/ /bad kan la ni tsha ba blud/ /bad kan mkhris pa sel byed kyang / /bska ba bsngags pa ma yin te/ /rims gsar dri ma 'gags byed pas/ /bska bas mi bzad rims skyed cing / /dang ga 'khyil dang yi ga 'chus/ /skyigs bu dbugs mi bde yang skyed/ /

la la zhag bdun nas sman gtong / /gzhan dag zhag ni bcu lon nas/ /kha cig zas yang zos nas gtong / /ma zhu shas che la mi gtang / /gang phyir mi bzad rims nyen la/ /nad kyi shugs ni 'byung 'gyur ba/ /ma smin pa la sman gyis ni/ /rims ni slar 'phel byed pa

'am/ /nad ni shin tu sogs pa yis/ /snyom dang rmongs bag skyed par byed/ /gang tshe rims rtse zhil lus yang / /dri ma la sogs g.yos gyur ba/ /rims btab yun ring ma lon yang / /de tshe sman ni sbyin par bya/ /gla sgang par pa tar bcas pa'am/ /bca' sga'am

yang na byi tsher ba/ /bskol ba bsgrangs pa'i khu ba blud/ /pa ta pu shel pa la ka /blud pa'am de bzhin du nim pa/ /sle tres gla sgang do gra rnams/ /'di ni ci rigs par blud bya/ /nan smin byed pa'i sman khu ba/ /rims dang skom dad yi ga 'chus/ /khas ro mi tshor ma zhu

'joms/ /dug mo nyung dang pa to la'i/ /lo ma dang ni pu tse shel/ /pa tol gla sgang thal tres dang / /pa ta dang ni pu tse shel/ /pa tol nim pa 'bras bu gsum/ /rgun 'brum gla sgang dug mo nyung / /kir tig ta sle tres dang / /bca' sga dang ni tsan+dan dkar/ /sle tres gla sgang skyu ru

sbrang / /tshigs bcad phyed kyis rdzogs byas pa/ /lnga po 'di dag rtag rims sogs/ /lnga po zhi bar byed par 'dod/ /rlung gi rims la byi tsher ba/ /bca' sga sle tres gla sgang phan/ /yang na pi pi ling rtsa ba/ /sle tres dang ni bca' sga'am/ /rtsa ba lnga ba chung ngu phan/ /

mkhris rims gla sgang dug mo nyung / /pu tse shel ni sbrang rtsir bcas/ /de bzhin gla sgang par pa ta/ /byi tsher rtsa mkhris bcas pa phan/ /bad kan dug mo nyung sogs sde/ /yang na ba sha ka gla sgang / /bca' sga byi tsher bskol ba phan/ /pi pi ling rtsa a ru ra/ /dong ga gla

sgang pu tse shel/ /bad kan rlung 'dres bshang 'gags pas/ /na ba smin zhing drod skyed byed/ /rlung mkhris las gyur rims la ni/ /rgun 'brum shing mngar ma du ka /seng phrom tang pal thal tres dang / /gla sgang skyu ru ba la ke / pad+ma ge sar shug pa dang / /pad rtsa tsan+dan

uR+shir/ /ba ru sha ka ut+pal sngo/ /rgun sogs skyo ma'am bskol bsgrangs pa/ /me tog dzA ti'i dris bsgos te/ /kha ra 'bras yos sbrang rtsir sbyar/ /rlung mkhris rims ni 'joms byed cing / /chang nad slon brgyal tsha mgo 'khor/ /ngal dang stod kyi khrag mkhris nad/ /skom

dang mig ser dag kyang sel/ /pu tse shel btags snod sar pa/ /gtsang mdag tu bskol nas ni/ /btsir ba'i khu ba mar dang sbyar/ /khu ba des ni rims tshad sel/ /bad kan rlung 'dres shu dag dang / /pu tse shel dang pa ta dang / /dong ga dug mo nyung bskol phan/ /yang

na sle tres bskol ba yi/ /khu bar pi pi ling gi ni/ /phye ma btab ste 'thungs na phan/ /bya kri bca' sga sle tres bskol/ /pi pi ling gi phye mar bcas/ /bad kan rlung rims dbugs mi bde/ /lud pa cham pa gzer 'joms byed/ /gla sgang 'u su a ru ra/ /bca' sga

skra lo pu ti ka /shu dgag bra kad phal/ /thang shing shing kun sbrang rtsir bcas/ /rlung dang bad rims mchil ma mang / /lto dang snying ga rtsib logs na/ /lkog nad kha ni skrangs pa dang / /lud pa dbugs mi bde rnams sel/ /dong ga sogs te sbrang rtsir bcas/ /bad kan mkhris

'gyur rims 'joms so/ /de bzhin pu tse shel dang ni/ /ba sha ka dang pu shel tse/ /kyi lce ba dang 'bras bu gsum/ /sle tres dang ni pa to la/ /bong nga dkar po nim pa dang / /mur ba byi tsher ba yang phan/ /'dus pa'i rims la bya kri dang / /

thang shing skyer pa gla sgang dang / /pa to lo ma nim pa'i shun/ /'bras gsum pu tse shel yang phan/ /rlung dang bad kan shas che'i rims/ /lud dbugs mi bde rtsib logs zug /dong gra puSh+kar mU la dang / /sle tres kaN+Da ka ri phan/ /rgun 'brum ma du ka'i me tog /ba ru

sha ka kyi lce ba/ /pu shel tse dang pu tse shel/ /'bras bu gsum dang tang pal bcas/ /bskol te bsgrangs par gyur pa yi/ /khu ba de ni des 'thungs na/ /rims ni thams cad sel bar byed/ /dzA ti gla sgang skyu ru ra/ /byi tsher ba bskol de 'drar phan/ /bshang 'gags

rgun 'brum pu tse shel/ /kyi lce bu ram 'bras bu gsum/ /sman zhu nas ni thug pa sogs/ /spyad bya bad kan can gyis min/ /bad kan gyis brlan lus la ni/ /rngul la char bab 'phel ba ltar/ /thug pa yis ni bad kan skyed/ /de phyir thog ma nyid du yang / /yu sha

rgya sran tsa na ka /sran ma sogs byas yang ba dang / /rtsub cing ro kha ldan yid 'ong / /yi ga 'byed byed g.yos legs sbyin/ /sA lu rtsa snar sogs 'bru rnying / /drug cu pa yang rims la phan/ /bad kan shas cher de bzhin nas/ /phub ma med byas chag tshe'i chan/ /nad dang

lus zungs sogs stobs las/ /rims sel sman khur btsos 'bras chan/ /lan gnyis lan gsum btsags nas ni/ /ci rigs par ni sbyin par bya/ /mung+ga sogs dang ku lang+tha'i/ /yu sha yang bas rims nad 'joms/ /tshod ma ka ra be la dang / /kar ko

ta dang la phug gzhon/ /par pa ta dang ba sha ka /nim pa'i me tog pa to la'i/ /'bras bu dang ni lo ma las/ /legs par g.yos pa'i tshod ma bsngags/ /shin tu yang ba'i sha dang ni/ /skam sa'i srog chags sha khu ni/ /kaN+Da ka ri pa ru sha/ /ag+ni man+tha rgun 'brum

dang / /skyu ru ra dang se 'bru dang / /pi pi ling dang bca' sga dang / /'u su zir rgyam tshar bcas/ /phal cher khar sbrang rtsi cher/ /ldan pa'i g.yos byas ma byas pa/ /mi skyur dar ba bskol ba dang / /yi gar 'ong zhing sla ba dang / /legs par bskol ba'i tshod ma phan/ /

de ni btung ba'i phyir yang sbyin/ /chu bskol bsgrangs par gyur pa dang / /goms par gyur pa'i dbang las ni/ /chang yang blud par bya ba yin/ /rims dang bcas pa'am rims bral la/ /dgongs ka kha zas yang ba sbyin/ /de tshe bad kan me drod 'phel/ /khong pa'i

me drod stobs dang ldan/ /yang na yul goms dbang las ni/ /ci rigs su yang sbyin par bya/ /me drod chung la sngar zos na/ /zas ma zhu bar gzir bar 'gyur/ /sman bskol khu ba phan zas kyis/ /zhag bcu'i bar du smyung ba bya/ /bad kan bri nas rlung mkhris

ni/ /shas che'i rims la zhun mar sbyin/ /nad smin pa la bdud rtsi yin/ /gzhan du de ni dug dang mtshungs/ /zhag bcu 'das par gyur kyang ni/ /rims gyis bla brnan 'phel bar byed/ /de la smyung ba la sogs rims/ /bad kan zad kyi bar du bya/ /lus dang lus

zungs stobs zhan pas/ /rims rnying du yang 'gyur ba yin/ /me drod rtsub pas rims skyed byed/ /me drod rtsub par gyur pa la/ /skyugs sman dugs dang dus dang chu/ /bskol dang kha zas spangs pa yis/ /rlung gi khams ni grogs gyur pas/ /gang zhig stobs

chen gyur pa la/ /de yi zhi byed zhun mar te/ /khang pa 'bar la chu blugs mtshungs/ /rlung mkhris sel ba'i mchog tu ni/ /sbyor ba'i dbang las gyur pas na/ /de phyir rang gi sman dang ni/ /ji bzhin bskol ba de la sbyin/ /rims dro mi mthun pas sel la/ /

bsil bas mkhris pa'ang sel bar byed/ /snum pas rlung sel bad kan mar/ /mtshungs kyang sbyor dang g.yos pas sel/ /sngar gyi sman khu mar bcas pa/ /thams cad nad dmigs ji bzhin gtang / /'bras bu gsum dang nim pa'i shun/ /shing mngar bri ha ti

gnyis dang / /sran chung 'o mar bcas bskol la/ /mar ldan rims dang lud pa 'joms/ /pi pi ling dang tig ta dug mo nyung / /kaN+Da ka ri pu tse shel thal tres/ /ta ma la ka skyu ru ra bil ba/ /gla sgang tsan+dan kyi lce pu shel tse/ /

rgun 'brum bong nga sa la par+Ni dang / /bskol ba'i mar gyis rims kyi nad dang ni/ /me drod mi snyoms ha li sa ka dang / /yi ga 'chus dang mi bzad tsha ba dang / /snyom pa'i nad dang rtsib logs na ba dang / /mgo nad slon ni myur du 'joms par byed/ /dur byid ma gtogs

seng phrom sogs bskol mar/ /rlung las gyur pa'i rims la bsngags pa yin/ /mkhris pa'i rims la pu tse shel dug mar/ /kyi lce bar bskol sman mar gang yin phan/ /bye dang ga dang dbyi mong kha ru tsha/ /pa ta tsha ba gsum dang tsi tra ka /lce myang tsha dang nas tshig 'khus

thal ba/ /'di rnams cha ni srang rer byas pa dang / /mar dang 'o ma cha ni mnyam byas pa/ /bre gang bskol bas bad kan rims rnying 'joms/ /sle tres khu ba lde gu dang / /ba sha ka dang 'bras bu gsum/ /rgun 'brum dang ni ba la dang / /bskol ba'i sman mar rims

nad 'joms/ /mar zhu nas ni sha 'jam khu/ /kha zas bcas pa bza' bar bya/ /des ni stobs rab skyed byed cing / /nad ni shin tu zad byed yin/ /ka ra be+e la sogs khu dang / /mung+ga bad kan mkhris 'joms pas/ /phal cher rlung shas che rims la/ /gzer

dang bshang ba 'gags pa ni/ /skyed cing rims ni 'phel bar byed/ /de phyir de ni bsngags ma yin/ /gal te de ltar byas kyang ni/ /rims ni zhi bar ma gyur na/ /sbyang 'os la ni sbyang bar bya/ /de la skyugs sman sngar bshad pa/ /ma zhu bar ni gnas nad la/ /

stobs can stobs ni bsrungs te btang / /smin zhing nad ni lhod gyur pa'am/ /chang dang dug las byung rims la/ /sha ma dur byed 'bras bu gsum/ /pi pi ling dang ge sar dang / /yang na tsha ba gsum sogs sman/ /kha ra sbrang rtsir bcas pa sbyin/ /rgun 'brum skyu

ru ra'i khu ba/ /a ru ra ni rgun chur bcas/ /dong ga'o mar bcas pa'am/ /rgun chu dang ni bcas pa blud/ /'bras bu gsum mam kyi lce ba/ /'o ma rims dang ldan pas btung / /bkru sman btang ba'i skabs su yang / /thug sla la sogs rim bzhin

blud/ /rim gyis di ma glongs g.yos tshe/ /de la rtag tu dgag mi bya/ /nad ni khong par gnas snyeg nas/ /smin kyang gnod pa skyed par byed/ /shin tu tshabs cher byung gyur na/ /smin nas gcad par bya ba yin/ /ma smin bkag pa'i nyes pa ni/ /nad bcos

thabs su bshad pa yin/ /gang zhig rmongs pas ma smin pa'i/ /rims la nad 'byin sman gtong ba/ /de ni sbrul nag gnyid log la/ /lag pa'i rtse mos reg dang mtshungs/ /rims zad pa la slon sman dang / /bkru sman phan pa ma yin te/ /de la 'o ma dag gi

ni/ /mas gtong bas ni nad bsal bya/ /'o ma la goms bad kan zad/ /lus tsha skom dad gnyis yod na/ /rlung dang mkhris pas nyen pa ni/ /tshad par 'khru yang 'o ma pan/ /de lus smyung bas gdungs pa dag /mes tshig pa yi nags la ni/ /char chu

'bab pas skyed pa ltar/ /rims ni myur du sel bar byed/ /de bas 'o ma sbyar te bskol/ /dro ba'am bsgrangs pa bzhos ma thag /dus kyi dbye ba shes te sbyin/ /de las gzhan du rims can gsod/ /'o ma bca' sga 'bra gor bcas/ /rgun 'brum kha ra mar

ldan par/ /bskol te bsgrangs par sbrang rtsi btab/ /skom dad lus tsha rims 'joms byed/ /de bzhin pa la rgun shing mngar/ /tsan+dan thal tres pi pi ling / /'o ma'i bzhi 'gyur chu bskol ba'am/ /pi pi ling dang bskol ba ni/ /rims kyis btab

pas 'thungs na ni/ /klad gzer lud pa dbugs mi bde/ /rtsib logs gzer rims rnying las thar/ /rtsa ba lnga bskol de dang 'dra/ /e raN+Da rtsa bskol ba'am/ /bil ba gzhon nu dang bskol ba'am/ /bzhos ma thag gi 'o ma 'thungs/ /rlung gi rims kyis phyi sa

'gags/ /khrag bcas sbyin bag tshad 'khru dang / /skom dad gzer bcas 'khru las thar/ /bca' sga ba la bya kri dang / /gze ma bu ram 'o mar btsos/ /bskol 'thungs skrangs bshang gcin dang 'phyen/ /'gags dang rims dang lud pa

'joms/ /bri Sh+tsi bal bil ba dang / /bar sha b+hu dang bskol ba yis/ /rims kyi skrangs nad sel ba yin/ /shing sha pa yi snying po dang / /'o ma dag tu bskol ba ni/ /rims ni myur du 'joms byed yin/ /nad smin zhu ba'i gnad song la/ /mas gtong drag pos me

stobs skyed/ /rims bral sems dga' yi ga 'byed/ /myur du skyed par byed pa yin/ /bkru sman mkhris pa'am bad mkhris 'dres/ /mkhris pa'i gnas su zhugs pa sel/ /'jam rtsis nad ni sum char dag /zhu ba'i nad la brten pa sel/ /'o mas bad

kan mkhris pa dag /mjug to rgyab dang rked pa na/ /me drod che la rtug 'gags pa/ /'jam rtsi mas gtong sbyar bar bya/ /nim pa pa to la'i lo ma/ /pu tse shel dang dong ga dang / /s+thi ra ba la po son cha/ /gze ma pu shel ba la ka /'o ma'am chur ni bskol ba dag /

'o ma lhag ma lus pa la/ /gla sgang shing mngar po son cha/ /pi pi ling dang dug mo nyung / /mar dang sbrang rtsi bsres pa yi/ /'jam rtsi btang na rims 'joms so/ /par+Ni bzhi dang shing mngar dang / /po son cha dang pu shel tse/ /dong ga rnams ni bskol ba ru/ /shing

mngar sha ta puSh+pa dang / /pri yang+ku dang po son cha/ /gla sgang lde gur byas pa la/ /bu ram mar dang sbrang rtsir bcas/ /'jam rtsis rims ni sel byed yin/ /dzi ban+ti dang po son cha/ /me da shing mngar pi pi ling / /shu dag d+d+hi ra sna dang / /bal dang ni bil ba

dang / /shu ti dang ni nye shing rnams/ /mar dang til mar 'o ma dang / /chu dang btags te lhan cig bskol/ /snum ni nad dang rjes mthun pa'i/ /'jam rtsi rims la gtang bar bya/ /gang yang cho ga grub pa las/ /rims sel bar ni bshad pa yi/ /'jam

rtsi dag kyang gtang bar bya/ /sna yi bkru sman rims rnying la/ /btang na yi ga 'byed byed cing / /mgo ni lci zhing bad kan che/ /sel zhing dbang po gsal byed la/ /snum gyi sna sman mgo stong snyam/ /lus tsha mkhris pa sel byed yin/ /dud brngub mkhur

bkang mkhur ba sbo/ /nad dmigs ji bzhin sbyar bar bya/ /cham pa khas ro mi tshor dang / /mgo nad lkog nad sel byed yin/ /yi ga 'chus la kha lung gi/ /ge sar mar dang rgya ma tshar bcas/ /yang na rgun 'brum skyu ru ra/ /kha ra'i lde gu mkhur bar bcad/ /rims

rnying pags pa la brten la/ /reg na ji ltar bde 'gyur ba'i/ /sman bsil dro ba la sbyar ba'i/ /bsku byug chu blugs la sogs bya/ /mig sman dud pa'i sbyor ba'ang bya/ /glo bur byung la de de bzhin/ /tshal lan stong bkrus pa yi/ /mar gyis bsku ba spyad par bya/ /

mdo gnas las bshad sman gyi sde/ /mngar dang skyur dang bska ba dang / /drur ba la sogs rlung mkhris 'joms/ /skyug sman la sogs sde tshan bshad/ /nus pa bsil zhing reg na grang / /bskol dang lde gur byas pa dang / /til mar 'o mar bcas bskol ba/ /

bskus na 'phral du tsha rims sel/ /mgo dang lus kyang de nyid ni/ /cung zad rtsing bar btags pas bsku/ /de bskol chu ni blugs pa dang / /lus 'bying la yang sbyar bar bya/ /skyur rtsabs chu dang 'o ma tsha/ /mar la sogs pa'ang de bzhin sbyar/ /bil rkang kha lung a mra

dang / /se'u 'bru seng phrom bid ri/ /rgya shug lo ma las byung ba'am/ /lung tang gi ni dbu ba yis/ /lus bskus tsha na rmongs bag dang / /slon dang skom dad zhi bar byed/ /gang zhig nad gso'i thabs su bshad/ /mkhris pa sel ba'i rim pa ste/ /bsten par

byas na myur du ni/ /tsha dang bcas pa'i rims sel 'gyur/ /nus pa dro zhing reg na dro/ /rgya spos gur gum a ka ru/ /ru rta rdo dreg sto ne ya/ /sa ra la dang thang shing dang / /chu srin sen mo ra sna dang / /gu gul shu dag lca ba dang / /sug smel gnyis dang tsa rong dang / /

tsan+dan sib dang byi'u rug pa/ /shi kru spang spos bya ma ka /yungs kar rtsa ba bcu pa dang / /sle tres er N+Da gnyis dang / /ba ru ra dang ro hi sha /ta ma la yi lo ma dang / /pu ti ka dang sa la ki /'u su a za mo ta dang / /shu ti ma sha ku

lang+tha/ /tsi tra ka dang pra ki r+ya/ na ku la ni rnam gnyis dang / /gzhan yang de 'dra'i bsil ba'i sman/ /bskol dang lde gur byas nas ni/ /chang dang skyur rtsabs la sogs sbyar/ /til mar bskol ba grang rims sbyar/ /de dro 'jam gyis bsku ba dang / /zhib tu btags

pas byug par bya/ /cung zad dro bas blugs pa dang / /lus 'bying bar yang bya ba yin/ /tshwa dang ba gcin zho ga chu/ /'ba' zhig gis kyang de bzhin bya/ /dong ga la sogs sde yis kyang / /btung dang bsku dang byug par bya/ /bdug pa a ka ru las byung / /'og nas

bshad pa'i rims la sbyar/ /dugs ni mes byas mes ma byas/ /dugs kyi sman dang kha zas bsten/ /khang sbrum sa phug tu nyal zhing / /la ba dre'u rngog re'u snam bgo/ /du ba med pa'i mdag mas gang / /zhugs shing dag ni bsten pa dang / /chang ni tsha ba gsum

bcas/ /dang / /dar ba rgya sran ku lang+tha/ /'bru dang ko tra ba dag kyang / /'dar ba'i rims can de la sbyin/ /grang ba'i rims nad can de la/ /chung ma nu ma rgyas pa dang / /rgyan gyis brgyan te bzhag pa dang / /lang tshos rgyags shing chang gis myos/ /bud med kyis de 'khyud par bya/ /

grang dang bral bar shes nas ni/ /de nas de slar bsal bar bya/ /nad gcig 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang / /'grib pa'am ldang bar gyur pa'am/ /mnyam gnas nad ni bad kan gyi/ /gnas kyi rim pas bsal bar bya/ /'dus pa'i rims kyi mtha' mar ni/ /gang

gi rna pa'i rtsa ba ru/ /mi bzad skrang pa byung gyur na/ /'ga' zhig thar par 'gyur ba yin/ /de ni gtar gas dbyung ba dang / /zhun mar blud pas myur bsal te/ /bad mkhris sel ba'i sman bsku dang / /sna sman mkhur ba bkang bas gso/ /gang gi rims ni bsil drod

dang / /snum rtsub sogs kyis zhi mi 'gyur/ /yan lag zhen pa de rims bzhin/ /lag ngar las khrag myur du dbyung / /cho ga 'di ni mi bzad pa'i/ /rims la'ang nad dmigs ji bzhin bya/ /rlung sogs rim gyis cha phye la/ /phyis bshad gang yin dag kyang

bya/ /pa to la dang pu tse shel/ /gla sgang shing mngar a rur/ /gnyis sam gsum mam lnga bskol ba/ /mi bzad rims ni 'joms byed yin/ /'bras bu gsum dang a rur/ /sle tres pi pi ling so sor/ /cho ga de dang sbyar ba'am/ /go bye bu ram bcas

pa sbyin/ /rims kyis thebs pa'i nyin zhag la/ /nyams smad pa'am nyams brta bya/ /nang par til mar sgog skya bcas/ /bza' 'am yang na mar rnying ngam/ /de bzhin zho dang 'o ma sbyin/ /zhun mar srang drug pa dang ni/ /dge ba chen po'am ba'i rnam lnga/ /

tig ta'ang dugs dang bskol te sbyin/ /'bras bu gsum dang rgya shug dang / //ag+ni man+tha bskol ba ru/ /zho dang bskol ba'i mar dag tu/ /seng phrom shun lpags lde gu btab/ /mi bzad rims ni 'joms pa'i mchog /'bru chang dang ni chang rnying rno/ /rma bya

gong mo sreg khyim bya/ /rlan can sha ni drod skyed pa/ /zas bcas dag ni ci 'dod par/ /bsten la de bzhin gnyid log pa'am/ /yang na slar ni skyug tu gzhug/ /yang na zhun mar tshad chen po/ /blud de slar yang skyug tu gzhug /a dza gan+d+ha ni li ni/ /dur byid

dang ni pu tse shel/ /rims kyis 'debs tshe snum dang dugs/ /legs par byas te blud par bya/ /ldong ros rgyam tsha pi pi ling / /til mar dang sbyar mig sman gzhug/ /shing kun stag tshil cha mnyam bya/ /rgyam tshar bcas pa'i sna sman bya/ /de bzhin mar rnying seng ge'i

tshil/ /rgyam tsha dag dang sbyar te gtang / /pa la ka sa nim pa'i lo/ /shu dag ru rta a ru ra/ /yungs kar nas bcas mar sbyar ba'i/ /bdug pa'am byi la'i rtug pas bdug/ /gu gul shu dag bya ma ka/ /sardza ra sa nim pa dang / /arka dang ni a ru ra/ /thang

shing bcas pa'i spos sbyar ba/ /'di ni gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i/ /bdug pa yin te rims kun sel/ /spos bdug sna sman gtang bya ba/ /sems kyis bsgyur bar gang bshad dang / /'phags pa la brten sman gyis ni/ /rims nad

thams cad sel bar byed/ /mchog tu phal cher mi bzad rims/ /de ni glo bur 'ong rjes 'brel/ /mi bzad rims zhir ma gyur na/ /rang gi gtar ga ji bzhin gdab/ /dngas ma la gnas thams cad la/ /skyug sman gtang dang smyung ba bya/ /khrag

la gnas pa sman chu blugs/ /bsku dang byug dang gtar ga bya/ /shar gnas bkru sman rnon po bya/ /tshil gnas tshil ni dbri bar bya/ /rus par gnas la rlung zhi ba'i/ /bsku dang dugs dang mnye ba bya/ /rims der rlung nad zhi bya dang / /khyad par du ni 'jam rtsi bya/ /

ma 'dres rlung dang me dbal dang / 'brum bus gnod 'gyur rims la ni/ /zhun mar blud cing tsan+dan byug /sman chu blugs shing sha khu sbyin/ /rang gi dpyad ni ji skad bshad/ /gtar ga la sogs dag gis gso/ /gdon byung 'byung po'i rig par bshad/ /

gtor ma sngags la sogs pas gso/ /sman dri las byung mkhris pa ni/ /zhi bya dug skyes dug gis gso/ /'dod don ji ltar yid 'thad dang / /nad ni ji ltar zhi 'gyur ba/ /phan dang mi phan la mkhas pas/ /khros sogs las byung rims bsal bya/ /khros byung 'dod pas zhi bar 'gyur/ /

'dod byung khros pas zhi bar 'gyur/ /mya ngan 'jigs byung de gnyis kyis/ /'jigs dang mya ngan byung cig shos/ /dmod pa mngon spyod sngags las byung / /'phags pa'i don la brten pas zhi/ /rims de thog mar ma 'dres la/ /de 'og dri mas khyab par byed/ /de bas nad dang rjes mthun

par/ /de la kha zas la sogs sbyar/ /rlung stsogs rgyu la ma brten par/ /rims ni rjes 'brel gnas mi byed/ /rims kyi dus dran byung de la/ /yid 'phrog yul gyis brjed par bya/ /snying rjes brlan zhing sems dag pa/ /rims kun 'joms par byed pa yin/ /

nyams stobs rdzogs par 'gyur gyi bar/ /rtsol dang khrus dang nyal po dang / /zas lci ma goms tsha byed dang / /gang gzhan rims skyed byed pa spangs/ /rims bral gyur kyang 'phral du ni/ /zas kun bsten par mi bya ste/ /rims ni myur du ldog byed nas/ /

nyam chung mi ni myur gsod byed/ /gang phyir myur du gsod 'gyur bas/ /de phyir de ni khyad par du/ /gnas skabs de dang de dag tu/ /sman dpyad de dang de dag bya/ /sman dang nor bu sngags dang bcas pa dang / /dam pa bla ma bram ze dkon mchog mchod/ /

yid ni dga' bar byed pa'i yul bsten pas/ /khyab 'jug gis byas ma rungs rims kyang 'joms/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /gso ba'i gnas kyi le'u dang po'o// //de nas khrag mkhris gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /

khrag mkhris bde ba'i dus su 'byung / /stobs ldan stod 'byung shugs dal la/ /nyes gcig las byung gsar du btab/ /bla brnan med pa gso bar bya/ /khrag gang nad gzhi gnyis la skyes/ /zhi zhing zhi zhing slar ldang dang / /lam nas lam gzhan 'gro ba

gang / /thur du 'byung ba gso ba tsam/ /shas cher 'byung zhing me drod nyams/ /nyes gsum lam gnyis las byung spang / /nad gzhi zas dang gnas dang ni/ /nad kyi grogs dang stobs dag dang / /yul dang dus kyi gnas skabs sogs/ /shes bya dang por smyung

ba'am brta/ /de bzhin sbyang dang zhi bya bas/ /khrag dang mkhris pa gso bar bya/ /brta ba las byung stobs ldan pa/ /nad gzhi mang po las byung ba/ /gyen 'byung bkru sman gtong bas gso/ /thur 'byung skyug sman gyis gso rjo/ /smyung ba brta bya la ltos bya/ /stod

du 'byung ba kha ba dang / /bska ba'i sman khu smyung ba dang / /yan lag drug sman bca' sga med/ /'thungs na zhi bar 'gyur ba yin/ /thur du 'byung ba'i khrag mkhris la/ /sman khu mngar bas brta bar bya/ /stong 'byung dang por skyo ma blud/ /smad 'byung dang

por thug pa blud/ /stobs ldan za nus ma dag khrag /byung yang mi dgag ga des nad skyed/ /de ni gzhan du me lta bur/ /myur gsod byed pas gcad par bya/ /dur byid pri yang chu bskol dang / /lde gu kha rar bcas pa dag/ /cho ga bzhin

du de la ni/ /zho gnyis tsam du bldag par bya/ /dur byid pri yang 'bras bu gsum/ /kha ra sbrang rtsi pi pi ling / /sbrus pa 'dus byung stod du byung / /khrag rims 'or nad sel byed yin/ /de bzhin dur byid kha rar mnyam/ /pi pi ling ni bzhi char bcas/ /

skyug sman phyir ni po son cha/ /kha ra sbrang rtsir bcas skyo ma'am/ /kha ra sbrang rtsi po son cha/ /chur bcas pa'am shing mngar chu/ /'o ma'am bu ram shing khu blud/ /sbyangs pa'i rjes la cho ga ni/ /thug sla la sogs ji bzhin du/ /blud cing stobs ni bsrung bar bya/ /skyo ma

rims skabs bshad rgun sogs/ /yang na mkhris 'joms 'bras bur sbyar/ /sbrang rtsi 'bra go rgun 'brum dang / /pa ru sha ka ka ra'i chu/ /snying po lnga yi skyom ni/ /'bras yos phye ni mar bcas sbyin/ /me drod chung zhing skyur la dga'/ /se 'bru skyu ru ra skyur ba/ /pad+ma

ut+pal ge sar dang / /kriSh+Na pa r+Ni pri yad+ku/ /pu shel tse dang seng phrom dkar/ /bca' sga dang ni tsan+dan dmar/ /byi tsher da ta ka'i me tog/ /ba la ka dang bil ba'i rkang / /tshigs bcad phyed bshad thug pa blud/ /rtsa mkhris gla sgang pu shel tse/ /sran chung kr-iSh+Na

pa r+Nir sbyar/ /mung+ga gan+d+ha bi da ri/ /ha re Nu ka bal mar/ /tshig rkang gcig gis bshad pa blud/ /nus pa bsil ba de rnams ni/ /skam sa'i srog chags sha dag dang / /chur ni so sor bskol ba yi/ /khu bar nas thug sbyar ba bsgrangs/ /khar sbrang rtsir

sbyar ba blud/ /de bzhin du ni sha khu dang / /cung zad skyur dang skyur min pa/ /mar brngos khar bcas pa sbyin/ /zas kyi tshul ni shes pa ru/ /yang dang bsil bar gang bshad pa'i/ /gra ma gang bu can 'bru dang / /tshod ma khrag la bsngags pa yin/ /sngar bshad

pa yi chu dag gam/ /rtsa ba chung ngu lnga bskol te/ /bsgrangs pa'am sbrang rtsi'i chu'am ni/ /'bras bu mnyes pa'i chu blud bya/ /bshang 'gags rgya sne'u ri bong sha/ /rlung shas che la sreg pa'i sha/ /u dum bA ra'i khu ba ni/ /bskol ba blud na bsngags pa yin/ /

de bzhin blag sha rma bya'i sha/ /n+ya gro d+ha dang khyim bya'i sha/ /khrag mkhris kyi ni nad gzhi ni/ /gang ci'ang rung ba de spang bya/ /ba sha ka'i khu pri yang ku/ /sa nag dang ni skyer khaN+Da/ /seng phrom dang ni sbrang rtsir sbyar/ /'thungs na khrag dang mkhris pa 'joms/ /

yang na ba sha ka yi ni/ /khu ba kha ra sbrang rtsi dang / /bcas par 'thungs pa de bzhin te/ /ba sha ka ni 'ba' zhig dang / /bskol bas khrag ni myur sel te/ /de ni 'di yi sman mchog yin/ /pa to la dang ma la ti/ /nim pa shug pa tsan+dan gnyis/ /seng

phrom ba sha tan tu li/ /sa nag ma da yan ti ka /nye shing dang ni thal tres dang / /ra mnye ba gnyis shing mngar rnams/ /bskol ba gsum po kha ra dang / /sbrang rtsir bcas pas khrag mkhris 'joms/ /rgya skyegs shing kun bskol ba ni/ /legs bsgrangs

ka ra btab pa phan/ /yang na sbrang rtsi mar bcas pa'am/ /lci ba rta sbangs btsir khu 'thung / /khrag nad mdud pa can 'drar 'byung / /phug ron rtug pa sbrang rtsi phan/ /khrag ni shas cher byung gyur na/ /skom sa'i srog chags khrag dang ni/ /sbrang rtsir bcas pa'am ra yi ni/ /

mchin pa mkhris bcas rlon pa bza'/ /tsan+dan gla sgang pu shel tse/ /'bras yos mung+ga pi pi ling / /nas ni ba la'i chur sbangs pa/ /khu ba khrag mkhris sel byed yin/ /tsan+dan pad+ma pu shel tse/ /khu bar bong pa bsregs bcug la/ /rab bsgrangs kha ra sbrang rtsir bcas/ /khrag

ni shas cher 'byung ba sel/ /bu ram shing ni chu mang sbangs/ /rdza bum gsar par de bzhag nas/ /mtshan mo phyi rol dben par gzhag /nang par chu ni btsags nas su/ /sbrang rtsi btab nas pad+ma ni/ /kha phye'i phreng rgyan chu de 'dra/ /gang yang

mkhris pa'i rims skabs bshad/ /sman khu de yang blud par bya/ /sman khu sna tshogs 'di yis ni/ /me drod skyed pas bad kan zad/ /gal te khrag mkhris ma zhi na/ /de la rlung shas cher phan pa'i/ /ra yi 'o ma bskol ba

blud/ /de bzhin ba yi 'o ma ni/ /lnga 'gyur chu bskol gdus pa blud/ /rtsa ba lnga pa chung ngu dang / /sbrang rtsi kha ra bskol ba'ang rung / /rgun 'brum bca' sga dzi ba ka/ /ba la gze ma zangs rtsi ba/ /re re 'o mar bskol ba'am/ /'o ma khar mar

bskol phan/ /gze ma nye'u shing bskol ba'am/ /de bzhin 'dab bzhi 'o mar bskol/ /khrag ni nad bcas myur du sel/ /mchog tu mtshan nas 'byung la phan/ /rkub las byung la khyad par du/ /mo tsa ra sa blud na phan/ /n+ya gro d+ha yi myu

gu'am/ /'dab ma gzhon pa'am bca' sga dang / /uR+shi ra dang ut+pal phan/ /khrag gi tshad 'khru gzhang 'brum gyi/ /gso ba dag kyang 'dir sbyar bya/ /sman khu 'o ma 'thungs nas ni/ /bza' ba'ang 'o ma nyid dang bza'/ /sman khu'i sbyor ba 'di

dag nyid/ /bskol ba'i mar ni blud bar bya/ /ba sha ka rtsa rtser bcas brdungs/ /chu ni brgyad 'gyur nang du ni/ /bskol te brgyad cha lus gyur pa/ /de dang mar ni btso bar bya/ /de yi me tog nang bcug bsgrangs/ /sbrang rtsir bcas pas khrag mkhris dang / /mkhris

skran rims dang dbugs mi bde/ /lud pa snying nad mig ser dang / /rab rib mgo 'khor me dbal dang / /skad 'gags pa ni 'joms par byed/ /pa la sha yi myu gu'i khur/ /de bcug mar ni bskol ba dag/ /sbrang rtsir bcas pas khrag nad sel/ /kyi lce ba yang

de bzhin no/ /khrag ni spyi bag bad kan bcas/ /mdud par chags nad mgul bar byung / /ut+pal sdong bu bsregs thal ba/ /zhun mar sbrang rtsir bcas pa bldag/ /pad+ma ut+pal ge sar dang / /pri yang ku dang ma du ka/ /re re'i sbyor ba de bzhin bya/ /khrag ni bshang

ba'i lam las ni/ /'byung bar byed la khyad par du/ /'jam rtsi btang ba bsngags pa yin/ /sna nas nad can khrag byung na/ /sna sman btang zhing blugs par bya/ /sngar bshad sman khu'i sbyor ba dang / /'o ma bu ram shing khu blugs/ /'o ma sogs chu kha rar bcas/ /yang na chu ni 'ba'

zhig phan/ /se 'bru'i me tog khu ba 'am/ /a mra'i rus pa dUr ba phan/ /bsil sman sde tshan gtogs pa dag/ /bsku dang byug la sogs las sbyar/ /mkhris pa'i rims sel bshad pa gang / /phyi nang las btung sman de dang / /glo rdol bar ni gang phan

pa/ /de yang khrag dang mkhris par phan/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /gso ba'i gnas kyi le'u gnyis pa'o// //de nas lud pa gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /lud pa ma 'dres rlung las byung / /dang por snum gyis gso

bya zhing / /sha khu thug pa yu sha sogs/ /rlung 'joms sman bskol snum pa dang / /dud bdugs lde gu bsku dang dugs/ /chu blugs lus bcing dag gis gso/ /bshang rlung 'gags la 'jam rtsis gso/ /mkhris bcas zhun mar 'o ma ni/ /zas kyi

sngon btang bad kan bcas/ /snum bcas bkru sman btang bas gso/ /sle tres ka N+Ta ka ri gnyis/ /re re srang sum cu'i khu bar/ /mar srang sum cu rtsa gnyis bskol/ /rlung gi lud sel me drod skyed/ /k+Sha ra ra sna shu dag dang / /shing kun pa ta shing

mngar dang / /'u su zho gnyis mar bre gang / /tsha ba lnga dang bcas pa dang / /rtsa ba bcu pa'i khu bar bskol/ /'thungs rjes thug pa blud gyur na/ /lud pa dbugs mi bde bcas snying / /rtsib logs pho ba'i skran nad sel/ /ra sna nye'u shing rtsa ba bcu/ /

srang ni bcu gnyis tshad du bya/ /rgya sran rgya shug nas dag ni/ /ra sha srang ni lnga bcu dang / /chu srang lnga brgya bcu gnyis bskol/ /de dang mar ni bre bzhi bskol/ /'o ma mar mnyam dzi ban+ti/ /la sogs srang char byas te brtag/ /rlung gi nad la blud

pa dang / /snar btang 'jam rtsi'i mas gtong sbyar/ /lud pa rnam lnga mgo 'dar dang / /mo mtshan chu son ba dang / /lud kun lus ni phyogs gcig nad/ /mchin bcas stod kyi rlung nad sel/ /bi da ri sogs sde tshan bskol/ /lde gu

mar bskol lud pa 'joms/ /shing mngar a shwa ka'i sa bon/ /byi dang ga dang skyer khaN+Da/ /shug pa kha ru tsha mar bskol/ /yang na de phye mar dang sbrus/ /lde gu byin la ra yi ni/ /'o ma blud na lud pa sel/ /dong gar sna byi dang ga/ /shing kun rgyam tsha pi pi ling / /

bar gyi k+Sha ra de'i phye ma'am/ /mar dang ran tsam blud gyur na/ /rlung gyur bad kan bcas lud pa/ /dbugs mi bde dang skyigs bu dang / /me drod chung ba sel bar byed/ /byi tsher ba dang bca' sga dang / /zur ba rgun 'brum kha ra dkar/ /kar ka ta yi sring gi ni/ /til mar dang ni lde

gur sbyar/ /rlung las gyur pa'i lud pa sel/ /byi tshar gla sgang pi pi ling / /bar gyi zur pa kar ka ti/ /bu ram rnying dang til mar dang / /lde gur byas pa bldag par bya/ /bca' sga pi pi ling de bzhin/ /kar ka ta sring de bzhin no/ /chu dron dag dang pi pi ling / /lce myang tsha dang bcas pa blud/ /

bca' sga ka ra zho ga chu'am/ /pi pi ling phye zhor btab blud/ /rgya shug tshi gu chang ngam zho/ /zho ga chu dang sbyar ba blud/ /yang na pi pi ling lde gu/ /mar brngos rgyam tshar bcas pa'ang phan/ /lud pa cham bcas dud pa ni/ /snum bcas cho gas bdug pa dang / /skyigs bu dbugs mi bde dud brngub/ /

'o ma sha khu bcas pa bza'/ /grong chu rlan can srog chags sha /sA lu nas gro drug cu pa'am/ /ma sha ang ma kub ta yi/ /yu sha dag dang zos na phan/ /la la phud dang pi pi ling / /byil rkang dong gtsi tra ka /ra sna zir pa la sha/ /kr-iSh+Na par+Ni zur pa dang / /ma nu bskol

bar snum skyur dang / /lan tshwar bcas thug rlung gyur blud/ /rked pa lto snying rtsib logs na/ /dbugs mi bde dang skyigs bu sel/ /rtsa ba bcu pa'i khu bar ni/ /tsha ba lnga dang bu ram bcas/ /til dang bcas pa'i thug pa blud/ /yang na 'o thug rgyam tshar bcas/ /nya dang khyim

bya phag rgod sha /mar dang rgyam tshar bcas pa'ang phan/ /tshod ma rgya sne'u pa ya si/ /ni shan na ga lud pa 'joms/ /ka N+Da ka ri'i lo 'bras dang / /la phug gzhon nu skam po'ang phan/ /til mar sogs snum 'o ma dang / /bu ram bu ram shing khu'i zas/ /zho ga chu zho rang skyur

chang / /'bras bu skyur chu blud pa phan/ /mkhris pa'i lud pa bad kan bcas/ /zhun mar gyis ni skyug sman phan/ /de bzhin po son cha tang pal/ /ma du ka ni bskol chus sam/ /shing mngar po son cha'i lde gu/ /bi da bu ram shing khur sbyar/ /mkhris lud bad kan shas chung la/ /

dur byid mngar ba'i sman sbyar gtang / /bad kan shas cher kha ba'i sman/ /skyug sman phyir ni gtang bar bya/ /nad sbyangs nas ni thug pa sogs/ /bsil dang mngar dang snum pa spyad/ /bad kan shas cher kha ba dang / /rtsub pa dang sbyar grang thug blud/ /mkhris gyur kha ra skyu ru ra/ /rgun

'brum ut+pal tsan+dan dkar/ /sbrang rtsir sbyar ba'i lde gu sbyin/ /bad kan bcas lan le sham/ /gla sgang dang ni bcas pa sbyin/ /rlung can la ni mar bcas phan/ /rgun 'brum lnga bcu pi pi ling / /sum cu kha ra srang gcig sbyar/ /sbrang rtsi'am ba yi lci ba'am/ /be'u

gzhon lci khur lde gur sbyar/ /shing tsha sug smel tsha ba gsum/ /rgun 'brum pi pi ling rtsa ba/ /ma nu 'bras yos gla sgang dang / /zur pa dkar dang ra sna dang / /skyu ru ra dang ba ru ra/ /kha ra sbrang rtsi zhun mar sbyar/ /lde gus snying nad lud pa sel/ /mngar ba'i sman dang srog chags

ni/ /skam sa'i sha dang nas dang ni/ /khre dang khre rgod mung+ga sogs/ /yu sha dang ni tshod ma dang / /kha ba tshad ldan sbyar lde gu/ /kha ba dang ni sbrang rtsir bcas/ /bad kan shas che'i nad la phan/ /bad kan shas chung s+'a lu dang / /drug cu pa'i chan sha khu phan/ /btung bar

kha ra'am rgun chu'am/ /bu ram shing khu'am 'o ma blud/ /mkhris pa'i lud par ra mnye ba/ /bri ha ti gnyis med gnyis/ /ba tsa ka dang li dong gra/ /sha khu dang ni 'o ma'am/ /thug pa'am yu shar sbyar te blud/ /rgun 'brum dang ni pi pi ling / /rtsa yi rtsa ba lngar bshad dang / /chur

bskol ba yi khu ba dang / /de dang 'o ma bskol te bsgrangs/ /sbrang rtsi khar ra bcas pa blud/ /yang na de yis thug pa bskol/ /legs bskol sbrang rtsir bcas pa sbyin/ /zur pa dang ni ba le ka /kha ra bca' sga bri ha ti/ /btags pa'i khu ba ras kyis btsags/ /

mar dang bsres te blud par bya/ /kha ra dang ni dzi ba ka /mung+ga ma sha par+Ni dang / /byi tsher ba ni lde gur sbyar/ /mar dang 'o ma brgyad 'gyur bskol/ /de btung bza' dang bldag pa dang / /sbyar bas mkhris pa'i lud pa sel/ /'di dag phye ma'i lde gu 'am/ /bskol ba'i khu ba blud par bya/ /

bad kan lud can gyis dang por/ /thang shing bsregs nas gzags pa'i snum/ /ba sha ka dang nas tshig 'khus/ /thal ba'i phye ma btab pa btang / /snum bcas bkru sman gyis steng dang / /'og dang spyi bor ci rigs par/ /nyams stobs ldan bkru sman rno gtang / /thug pa sogs kyang 'di la

blud/ /nas dang mung+ga rgya sran zas/ /rtsub dron le sham gyis tsha/ /ka sa marda brda ka /bya kri ya bak+Sha ra dang / /pi pi ling dang bcas pa sbyin/ /skam sa khung gnas sha khu snum/ /til dang yungs kar bil ba'i snum/ /sbyar ba'i thug pa sbyin par bya/ /skom na rtsa ba bcu bskol chu/ /chu tshan chang

mang sbrang chu blud/ /dong ga ma nu'i rtsa ba dang / /pa tol yi rtsa bar bcas/ /nub gcig chur sbangs sbrang rtsi btab/ /zas dus gsum mam nang par blud/ /pi pi ling dang de rtsa ba/ /bca' sga dang ni ba ru ra/ /rma bya khyim bya'i mjug sgro ni/ /snag tshar byas dang nas tshig thal/ /bi sha gla sgang pi

pi ling / /dur byid sbrang rtsir sbyar ba ste/ /tshigs bcad phyed kyis rdzogs lde gu/ /gsum po bad kan lud pa sel/ /sbrang rtsi na le sham sbyar bldag /a ka ru sbrang rtsi nyid kyis/ /kaN+Da ka ri brta ka /bring ga ra dza'i khu ba dang / /ka sa marda rta spangs btsir/ /khu ba bye ru gnas po'i khu/ /sbrang

rtsi so sor sbyar ba ldag /thang shing zur par sna dang / /byi tsher kar ka ta sring gi /gla sgang bca' sga pi pi ling / /kha ra a ru skyu ru ra/ /'bras yos kha ra dkar po dang / /skyu ru ra yi pags pa rnams/ /sbrang rtsi til mar sbyar lde gu/ /gsum po rlung 'dres bad kan sel/ /se'u 'bru srang gnyis

bu ram ni/ /srang brgyad tsha ba gsum srang res/ /skad snyan drod skyed yi ga 'byed/ /lud pa dbugs mi bde cham sel/ /bu ram ya bak+Sha ra dang / /na le sham dang pi pi ling / /se'u 'bru rim gyis srang gnyis dang / /zho re srang phyed du sbyar/ /lud pa dbugs mi bde ba sel/ /

rims kyi skabs bshad a ru ra/ /sogs dang kar ka ta sring gi /bskol ba'i khu ba blud par bya/ /yang na dur byid la la phud/ /gla sgang ma nu bi shal/ /pi pi ling bcas pa gcin nam/ /chur bskol ba gcin lud pa sel/ /pi pi ling ni til mar brngos/ /lde gu

zho gnyis kha rar bcas/ /rgya sran bskol ba'i khu bar sbyar/ /blud na bad kan lud pa 'joms/ /rtsa ba bcu khu bre bzhi dang / /mar bre gang dang ma nu dang / /zur pa bil ba bye'u rug pa/ /shing kun tsha gsum zho gnyis bskol/ /blud pa'i rjes la thug pa btung / /de kun

bad kan rlung nad 'joms/ /nir gun thi lo bskol ba'i khu/ /mar bskol lud pa 'joms byed yin/ /byi dang ga yi khu ba'i nang / /tsha ba gsum bcug mar bskol phan/ /ba spru ba gnyis byi'u rug pa/ /ka sa mar da sle tres dang / /pa to la dang bri ha ti/ /pha nid dza

ga'i khu ba ni/ /'o ma mar dang bcas pa la/ /tsha ba gsum dang legs bskol 'thungs/ /lud pa'i rims drag zad byed dang / /gzhang 'brum nad kyi 'jigs pa med/ /kaN+Da ka ri'i rtsa ba dang / /'bras bu lo mar bcas pa yin/ /khu ba bre bzhi'i tshad la ni/ /mar bre gang

dang ba la dang / /tsha ba gsum dang byi dang ga /shu dag dang ni se'u 'bru dang / /kha ru tsha dang nas tshig thal/ /pi pi ling gi rtsa ba dang / /skyu ru ra dang ma nu dang / /bri shi ba dang bri ha ti/ /a ru ra dang yab ti/ /kru trug tres dang rgun 'brum dang / /dbyi mong byi tsher bar sha bu/ /

star bu karka ta sring gi/ /ta ma la gi ga bra'i rtsa/ /ra sna gze ma'i lde gu dang / /bskol ba'i mar des lud kun dang / /skyigs bu dbugs mi bde la'ang phan/ /kaN+Da ka ri'i sman mar 'di/ /bad kan nad ni sel byed yin/ /bya kri srang brgyad brdungs chu srang / /nyis

stong bzhi bcu brgyad nang bskol/ /btsags par tsha ba gsum ra sna/ /sle tres kru trug phye ma dang / /ka rka ta sring ga bra'i rtsa/ /gla sgang pi pi ling rtsa ba/ /byi tsher ba rnams srang phyed phyed/ /zhun mar srang ni bcu drug dang / /kar dkar po srang bzhi bcu/ /

slar yang de ni bskol bya ba/ /gzar bu la chags bsgrangs nas ni/ /pi pi ling dang smig rkang dang / /sbrang rtsi rnying pa dag las ni/ /srang ni brgyad brgyad gzhug par bya/ /lde gu 'dis ni snying nad skran/ /gzhang 'brum lud dbugs mi bde sel/ /bad kan zhi bdud pa
