brngub/ /shas cher sbyangs pa'i dud pa brngub/ /ldong ros ba bla shing mngar dang / /spang spos gla sgang i gu da'i/ /shun lpags du ba lud 'joms pa'i/ /chogs dud pa brngubs nas ni/ /mchil mang mthar ni bu ram bcas/ /'o ma 'thungs pa'i dud rngubs des/ /rlung

dang bad kan shas che ba'i/ /lud pa rnying pa'ang myur sel/ /bad kan lud pa mun zhugs snyam/ /gal te mkhris pa rjes 'brel la/ /der ni gnas skabs ji bzhin du/ /mkhris pa'i lud gso'i sbyor ba bya/ /rlung ni bad kan 'brel pa la/ /bad kan

bsal ba'i bya ba bya/ /mkhris pa dang 'brel rlung bad kan/ /lud par mkhris pa bsal bar bya/ /rlung dang bad kan bdag nyid skam/ /gsher la snum dang rtsub chos bya/ /lud pa bad kan las gyur ba/ /mkhris par bcas pa kha bas gso/ /glo nad

'grams la 'phral du ni/ /rgya skyegs sbrang rtsi'i 'o ma blud/ /zhu nas s+'a lu'i 'bras chan ni/ /'o ma kha rar bcas pa bza'/ /rtsib logs chu son bcas te/ /mkhris drod shas chung chang sbyar btung / /bshang 'khru gla sgang bong nga dkar/ /ba ta dug mo

nyung bcas btung / /rgya skyegs zhun mar sbrang rtsi dang / /'tsho byed sde tshan ka ra dkar/ /smig rkang kha ra mnyam 'o mar/ /bskol ba me drod che la blud/ /bu ram shing dang pad+ma'i tshigs/ /pad+ma ge sar tsan+dan dmar/ /'o mar bskol ba sbrang rtsir bcas/ /

glo 'grams 'byor bar bya phyir blud/ /nas rjen phye ni 'o ma ru/ /btsos te mar dang sbyar ba'am/ /kha ra sbrang rtsi 'o ma phye'i/ /skyom rims tshad ldan la blud/ /lud pa can la sman mngar dang / /bskol ba'i zhun mar blud par bya/ /yang na bu ram chu bskol bsgrangs/ /sbrang rtsi

na le sham btab blud/ /yang na skyu ru ra'i phye ma/ /'o mar bskol ba mar btab blud/ /yang na bcud kyis len cho gas/ /pi pi ling yang sbyin par bya/ /lud pa rus tshigs gzer ba la/ /rgun 'brum shing mngar ma du ka /smig rkang ba la pi pi ling / /zhun mar sbrang rtsir

bcas pa sbyin/ /dri sna gsum ni zho re dang / /pi pi ling srang phyed kha ra/ /rgun 'brum 'bra go ma du ka /srang re zhib tu btags nas ni/ /sbrang rtsis ri lur byas pa yis/ /ro tsa byed cing khrag mkhris dang / /lud pa dbugs mi bde slon bro/ /brgyal myos skyigs bu mgo 'khor dang / /

glo rdol skad ni 'gags pa dang / /mchil ma lus skem rlung 'khyil dang / /mchil mar khrag 'byung rtsib logs na/ /snying nad skom dang rims nad 'joms/ /bar sha bu dang kha ra dkar/ /s+'a lu rtsa snar btags pa'i phye/ /rgun chu 'o ma mar du bskol/ /mchil ma khrag tu 'byung la blud/ /shing

mngar dang ni ma du ka /tan du li ya 'or btsos phan/ /khrag ni gang tshe drag tu 'byung / /de bcos pa yi sman bsten bya/ /rlung 'khyil pa la ra tshil ni/ /chang brngos rgyam tshar bcas pa sbyin/ /skems shing nyam chung glo 'grams dang / /gnyid chung me drod che ba la/ /'o ma bskol ba'i spris mar

chags/ /kha ra sbrang rtsi mar bcas sbyin/ /ka ra dkar dang nas dang gro/ /'tsho byed zangs rtsi sbrang rtsir bcas/ /yang na 'o mar bskol te blud/ /glo 'grams nyam chung rid la sbyin/ /sha za'i sha yi khu ba ni/ /mar dang brngos pa'i pi pi ling / /sbrang rtsir bcas pa de la blud/ /sha dang khrag ni

'phel byed yin/ /u dum+bA ra n+ya gro d+ha/ /a shwat+tha dang blag sha dang / /s+'a la'i shing dang pri yang ku/ /ta la'i rtse mo 'dzam bu'i shun/ /pi pi ling dang shug par bcas/ /a shwa ka nar bcas pa ni/ /'o mar bskol ba las byung ba'i/ /mar dang 'bras chan bza' ba ni/ /glo

'grams khu ba nyams stobs dang / /dbang po'i nus pa zad la sbyin/ /rlung mkhris kyis nyon yan lag zhig /na la mar des bskus pa bsngags/ /rlung nad kyis ni nyen pa la/ /rlung 'joms sman bskol til mar bsku/ /'tsho byed sde tshan zhun mar ni/ /snying dang

rtsib logs na la blud/ /yang na rlung nad 'joms pa dang / /khrag mkhris sel ba gang yin bya/ /shing mngar nA ga pa la gnyis/ /'o ma dang mnyam mar bskol bar/ /pa ya s+ye dang pi pi ling / /smig rkang lde gu bskol bas ni/ /glo 'grams pa yi nad la phan/ /'tsho byed

sde tshan bca' sga dang / /nye'u shing ba dang ra mnye ba/ /ba spu ba gnyis pa la dang / /ga bra'i rtsa ba kha sral phre'u/ /ri di zur pa ka ma la/ /shring ga da ka ka ya s+ya/ /rtsa ba lnga ni chung ngu dang / /rgun 'brum star ga'i 'bras bu sogs/ /mngar shing snum la stobs skyed pa/ /zho ni

gnyis gnyis btags lde gu/ /de nang zhun mar bre gang bskol/ /'o ma ra sha skyu ru ra/ /bi da ri dang bu ram shing / /khu bar sha'i khu bar bcas/ /bskol te bsgrangs par sbrang rtsi ni/ /bre phyed khar srang lnga bcu/ /na le sham dang sug smel dang / /shing tsha gan+d+ha b+ha dra dang / /na

ga ge sar srang phyed phyed/ /phye mar btags te bcug nas ni/ /'ju stobs rjes mthun tshad du blud/ /'di ni bdud rtsi'i sman mar te/ /mi rnams kyi ni bdud rtsi yin/ /bdud rtsi 'di ni zos nas su/ /'o ma sha khu ldan zos na/ /khu chu nyams dang glo 'grams dang / /nyams stobs

zad pa'i gso ba yin/ /bud med la gdu lus skem dang / /mdog skad nyams la gtang bar bya/ /lud pa dang ni skyigs bu rims/ /dbugs mi bde dang lus cha dang / /skom dad khrag mkhris sel byed cing / /bu skyed byed cing slon dang brgyal/ /mngal nad gcin nad 'joms byed

yin/ /gze ma btsod dang pu shel tse/ /ba la tang pal bu ti ka/ /kr-iSh+Na par+Ni dUr ba'i rtsa/ /thal tres stir pa la sha /de rnams srang re bskol ba yi/ /'o ma sman khu'i bzhi 'gyur la/ /kha sral phre'u dzi baN+Ti/ /me da gnyis dang zangs rtsi ba/ /dzi ba ka dang nye'u shing dang / /ri di

rgun 'brum sha kha ra/ /sra ba dang ni pad+ma'i rtsa/ /mar ni bre gang bskol ba yis/ /rlung mkhris snying 'dzag gzer nad sel/ /gcin sri ba dang gcin snyi ba/ /gzhang 'brum lud pa lus skem dang / /zad byed rims ni sel byed cing / /gzhu 'dren bud med chang dang

lam/ /khur dub stobs dang sha zad skyed/ /shing mngar srang brgyad rgun 'brum ni/ /bre gang bskol bar mar btsos la/ /pi pi ling srang brgyad lde gu/ /bre gang bskol ba bsgrangs nas ni/ /kha ra sbrang rtsi re re zhing / /srang brgyad dang ni bsres pa la/ /nas phye

mnyam sbyor zos pa yis/ /de ni glo 'grams zad byed dang / /khrag gi skran la phan pa yin/ /skyu ru ra dang bi da ri/ /bu ram shing khu 'tsho byed kyi/ /sde tshan bskol ba'i khu ba mar/ /ba dang ra yi 'o ma las/ /bre ni re re btso bar bya/ /bskol btsags khar sbrang rtsi ni/ /

bre re der ni gzhug par bya/ /de ni zad byed brjed byed dang / /khrag dang mkhris pa lud pa dang / /lus skem pa ni sel byed cing / /rgas sra tshe ni ring ba dang / /sha dang khu chu stobs skyed byed/ /mkhris pa shas ches mar bldag bya/ /rlung shas che bas btung bar bya/ /

bldags pas mkhris pa zhi byed kyis/ /nyung bas rlung ni 'joms mi nus/ /'thungs na rlung ni gnon byed cing / /me drod nang du sdud par byed/ /skems shing lus kyi sha zad pas/ /sman mar bshad pa 'di dag nyid/ /smig rkang 'bras yos pi pi ling / /phye ma lde

gur byas la sbyin/ /zhun mar bu ram sbrang rtsi'i cha/ /bcug ste byin la 'o ma blud/ /ro tsa brtson dang lus rgyas stobs/ /'di yis myur du skyed par 'gyur/ /bum sha shun lpags sa bon bsal/ /srang brgyad rlangs par btsos nas ni/ /zhun mar bre gang nang gzhug dkrugs/ /

sbrang rtsi'i mdog 'drar gyur pa dang / /hwags ni srang brgyad pi pi ling / /bca' sga zir srang gnyis dang / /dri sna gsum dang 'u su dang / /na le sham ni re re zhing / /srang ni phyed phyed tshad bcug la/ /phab ste bsgrangs par gyur pa dang / /sbrang rtsi mar gyi phyed bcug la/ /

gzar bus dkrugs te bzhag gyur pa/ /lud pa skyigs bu yi ga 'chus/ /dbugs mi bde dang khrag mkhris dang / /glo 'grams zad byed 'joms par byed/ /glo 'grams pa ni 'byor byed cing / /blo dang dran pa stobs rab skyed/ /ku sman da yi bcud

kyis len/ /yid du 'ong ba dam pa 'di/ /tha skar bu gnyis kyis bshad yin/ /nA ga pa la'i rtsa ba ni/ /zho gcig sogs kyis bskyed srang gcig /'o mar bcas pa zla gcig btung / /'o ma spyad cing zas mi bza'/ /sbyor 'dis tshe ni 'phel byed cing / /stobs

skyed kha dog bzang byed mchog /man du ka par+Ni shing mngar/ /bca' sga'i sbyor ba'ang 'di yin no/ /nA ga pa la srang brgya ni/ /chu srang lnga brgya rtsa bcu gnyis/ /nang du bskol te bzhi cha lus/ /sman khu de dang cha mnyam pa'i/ /'o ma mar dang bskol bar bya/ /ba la a ti

ba la dang / /shing mngar pur+Na rna ba dang / /stag tsher ba dang tang pal dang / /pi la ya dang kha sral phre'u/ /a shwa gan+d+ha kha ra dkar/ /nye shing med rnam gnyis dang / /gze ma ram nye ba gnyis dang / /pa ya s+ya dang zi ra gnyis/ /pad+ma'i rtsa ba sdong bu dang / /'bra go sring ga ta ka dang / /ke she ru ka

srang phyed phyed/ /nA ga pa la'i sman mar 'dis/ /khrag mkhris glo rdol zad byed dang / /skom dad mgo 'khor sel byed cing / /stobs ni skyed par byed pa'i mchog /mdog sdug mdangs bzang tshe 'phel zhing / /skra dkar gnyer ma 'jig par byed/ /zla ba drug gi bar bsten

na/ /rgan po'ang gzhon nu nyid du 'gyur/ /cho ga 'dis ni drod skyed cing / /me drod bri ba skyed 'ju byed/ /gcong chen bshad pa'ang glo rdol bsngags/ /'khru na gcod par byed par phan/ /rtsa ba bcu pa kha sral phre'u/ /shang ka put+pa zur pa dang / /pa la ha sti pi pi ling / /a pa

marga kru trug tres/ /ga bra pi pi ling rtsa ba/ /ma nu srang ni gnyis gnyis dang / /nas srang drug cu rtsa bzhi dag /a ru ra ni srang brgya dag /chu srang drug brgya bzhi bcus bskol/ /nas chos pa dang sman khu de/ /btsags la a ru ra brgya der/ /bu ram srang brgya bcug la bskol/ /mar dang til

mar pi pi ling / /phye ma srang ni brgyad po dag/ /bskol te bsgrangs nas sbrang rtsir gzhug /rtag tu a ru ra gnyis bcas/ /lde gu bcud len 'di zos na/ /'dis ni skra dkar gnyer ma med/ /tshe ring mdog stobs 'phel bar byed/ /lud lnga zad byed dbugs mi bde/ /

skyigs bur bcas pa'i mi bzad rims/ /gcin snyi ba yi nad dang ni/ /gzhang 'brum skran dang snying nad dang / /cham pa yi ga 'chus pa sel/ /bcud kyis len mchog dpal yon can/ /'di ni drang srong r-i Shis bshad/ /rtsa ba bcu pa ba la dang / /mur ba ser po rnam

gnyis dang / /pi pi ling ni rnam gnyis dang / /pa tha a shwa gan+d+ha dang / /a pa marga kha sral phre'u/ /sle tres dan ti bong nga dkar/ /bil ba gzhon nu dur byid dang / /tsi tra ka rtsa lo mar bcas/ /pa ya s+ya dang dug mo nyung / /spang spos bi za ka'i snying po/ /me tog bcas

dang rkang mar dang / /go bye byi dang ga ta dang / /nye'u shing bu ti ka rany+dza/ /dong ga so ma ra dza dang / /sa ha ra dza shi kru dang / /nim pa'i shun lpags bu ram shing / /phra mo'i khu ba srang re dang / /a ru ra stong chig brgya dang / /nas srang nyis brgya lnga bcu drug/ /chu ni brgyad 'gyur nang du

bskol/ /nas tshos pa dang phog nas ni/ /btsags nas a ru ra bcas der/ /bu ram rnying pa srang brgyad gzhug /til mar zhun mar skyu ru'i khu/ /bre re bcug nas de rjes yang / /me chung la ni btsos nas su/ /gzar bur chags nas thab las dbab/ /bsgrangs nas sbrang rtsi bre do

dang / /pi pi ling ni phul gang gzhug /dri sna gsum ni phyer btags pa/ /srang gsum bcug nas de 'og tu/ /rdza snod rnying bcug 'bru nang du/ /bcug ste zla ba gcig gzhag bya/ /de nas snga ma bzhin du bza'/ /gnas 'jog gis bshad bcud len 'di/ /sngon las yon tan lhag par che/ /

nad med kyis bza' dgag pa med/ /dus kun du yang bsngags pa yin/ /rgyam tsha bca' sga srang re dang / /kha ru tsha ni srang gnyis dang / /da trig se'u 'bru ardza ka /de dag srang ni bzhi bzhi dang / /na le sham gcig go snyod gnyis/ /'u su'i 'bras bu srang bzhi dang / /tshad 'di las ni

phye mar byas/ /zas dang skom la btab ste sbyin/ /des ni yi ga 'byed pa dang / /me drod skyed cing nyams stobs skyed/ /rtsib logs na dang dbugs mi bde/ /lud pa lu ba'i nad sel byed/ /'u su zho gnyis go snyod dang / /la la phud la zho bzhi

bzhi/ /se 'bru dang ni da trig dag/ /de yi nyis 'gyur nyis 'gyur bya/ /kha ru tsha ni srang gcig dang / /bca' sga zho gnyis bil ba'i rkang / /srang lnga dang ni sbyar ba la/ /kha ra srang ni bcu drug gzhug /ro drug pa 'di bza' ba dang / /btung ba snga ma bzhin du sbyin/ /

gcong chen las bshad cho ga gang / /gnas skabs ji bzhin glo rdol phan/ /glo rdol nad ni byang gyur nas/ /bad kan skyes nas mgo bo brang / /na ba'i lud pa can gang yin/ /de la dud pa 'di brngub bya/ /me da gnyis dang ba la gnyis/ /shing mngar gso ma'i shun

lpags ni/ /lde gur byas la reng bur ni/ /byas te dud pa brngub par bya/ /de rjes 'tsho byed sman mar btung / /ldong ros dang ni ba la sha /a za gan+d+ha cu gang dang / /dong gra las kyang de bzhin bya/ /de rjes kha ra bu ram dang / /bu ram shang khu btung bar blud/ /ldong ros dang

ni n+ya gro d+ha'i/ /myu gu rlon pa cha snyoms btags/ /zhun mar dang sbyar dud pa brngub/ /de 'og sreg pa'i sha khu btung / /glo rdol las byung blud pa la/ /thog mar stobs dang me drod skyed/ /nad gzhi mngal snum bcas pa'i/ /bkru sman 'jam po gtang bar bya/ /dong ga dang ni dur

byid gnyis/ /rgun 'bru'i chu dang sbyar ba dang / /seng phrom bskol ba'i khu ba dang / /bi da ri yi khu bar sbyar/ /zhun mar la btsos ci rigs sbyin/ /lus zad pa la sbyar bar bya/ /mkhris pa bad kan lus zungs rnams/ /zad pa'i zad byad lung pa can/ /mar dang karka ta sring gi/ /

'o ma ba la gnyis bskol blud/ /bi da ri 'am ka tam pa/ /ta la'i 'bras bu bskol ba yi/ /mar dang 'o ma gcin nad ni/ /mdog 'gyur bre bar byed la blud/ /pho mtshan rkub dang chu so dang / /brla dbrag mjug to skrang zhing na/ /mar gyi nying khu yang ba 'am/ /

til mar bsres pa'i 'jam rtsi gtang / /skam sa'i srog chags sha dang ni/ /byi'u sogs dang ni khung na gnas/ /de bzhin mthu rtsal gyis zas tshol/ /sha za'i sha yang rim bzhin sbyin/ /dro bas bad kan 'jig byed la/ /rtsa sbubs rnams ni dag byed cing / /dngas ma

legs par rgyu byed bas/ /lus ni rgyas par byed par 'gyur/ /dbyi mo bar gyi 'bras bu gsum/ /rtsa ba bcu dang tsi tra ka /rgya sran pi pi ling rtsa ba/ /pa ta rgya shug nas chur bskol/ /li dong gra dang byi tsher ba/ /zur pa ma nu pi pi ling / /karka ta yi sring gi

btags/ /mnyam pa'i zhun mar dag dang bskol/ /bskol ba'i mar 'di k+Shar gnyis/ /lan tshwa lnga ni btags te gzhug /de las ran par 'thungs na ni/ /zad byed lud pas nyen pa sel/ /ka sa mar da a ru ra/ /gla sgang pa ta kad pa la/ /

dong gra pi pi ling tang pal/ /pu tse shel tshad zho gnyis gnyis/ /mar ni bre gang 'o ma dang / /rgun chu bre bzhi'i nang du bskol/ /zad byed rims dang mchin pa'i nad/ /lud pa kun sel dge ba yin/ /kaN+Da ka ri ba sha ka /sle tres rtsa ba 'bras bu

dang / /myu gu lo mar bcas pa rnams/ /bskol ba'i khu ba mar du btsos/ /lud pa'i rims kyis btab pa dang / /yi ga 'chus pa'i nad rnams sel/ /se 'bru'i khu ba nyis 'gyur ram/ /tsha gsum ldan par bskol ba'ang phan/ /ya

bak+Sha ra mar dang sbyar/ /zas zos pa yi 'og tu blud/ /pi pi ling dang bu ram bskol/ /ra yi 'o ma mar bcas phan/ /'di ni me drod sbyar phyir te/ /zad byed lus can gyis mar btung / /nad kyis 'gags pa'i mid pa brang / /rtsa sbubs rnams ni dag par byed/ /nas ni bre

gang btsos pa ru/ /rnam par rgyal ba nyi shu btso/ /tshos nas de phyung mnyes nas der/ /bu ram rnying pa srang drug dang / /pi pi ling ni srang gnyis dang / /ldong ros zho gnyis skyer khaN+Da/ /zho gcig tshad ni bcug nas ni/ /slar yang bskol ba'i lde gu des/ /lud pa dbugs mi bde sel byed/ /

reg 'jam sgro rtsa bsregs nas ni/ /mar dang sbrang rtsi kha rar sbyar/ /yang na rma bya'i rkang pa bsregs/ /mar dang sbrang rtsir sbyar ba yi/ /lde gu zos na lud pa dang / /dbugs mi bde ba sel bar byed/ /e raN+Da yi thal ba ni/ /til mar tsha gsum

bu ram bcas/ /lde gu'am bye'u rug e raN+Da'i/ /lo ma'i thal ba de bzhin bya/ /tsha ba gsum gyi phye ma ni/ /bu ram rnying pa mar sbyar phan/ /shug pa tsha gsum 'bras bu gsum/ /byi dang ga dang thang shing dang / /ba la ra sna'i phye ma kun/ /de dang mnyam pa'i kha rar sbyar/ /

yang na sbrang rtsi mar dang sbyar/ /lde gu lud pa sel byed mchog /de bzhin na le sham gyi phye/ /mar dang sbrang rtsi kha rar bcas/ /a ru ra dang bca' sga ni/ /bu ram dang ni bcas pa yi/ /ri lu khar ni bzhag gyur na/ /lud pa dbugs mi bde kun sel/ /yang na ba

ru ra 'ba' zhig /lud pa sel bar byed pa yin/ /seng phrom a mra kha ra dang / /bcas pa'i lde gu mar dang brngos/ /thug pa zan dron nang du btab/ /slon bro skom dang lud pa dang / /ma zhu tshad 'khru sel bar byed/ /kaN+Da ka ri'i khu bar bskol/ /mung+ga'i khu bar

legs g.yos pa/ /skyu ru ra ser se'u 'brur bcas/ /lud pa kun gyi sman gyur yin/ /rlung 'joms sman bskol 'o ma'am/ /mchu yis zas tshol khron rko dang / /khung na gnas pa'i sha khu ni/ /zad byed lud pa can la sbyin/ /glo rdol gyis dud brngubs la gang / /btung bar bcas pa

bsten pa yang / /zad byed lud par de gtang bya/ /gang yang gcong chen skabs su bshad/ /stobs skyed me drod skyed pa dang / /rtsa rgyun sbyong bar byed pa'i sman/ /rnam grangs zad byed lud can la/ /stobs skyed thams cad

bsngags pa yin/ /gang phyir 'dus pa las byung ba'i/ /zad byed lud pa mi bzad pas/ /de phyir nad stobs ji bzhin du/ /'dus pa'i nad la phan pas gso/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /gso ba'i gnas kyi le'u gsum pa'o// //

de nas skyigs bu dang dbugs mi bde ba gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /gang phyir skyigs bu dbugs mi bde/ /rgyu sogs mtshungs pas de yi phyir/ /gso ba'ang gcig ste des nyen la/ /thog mar dugs kyi nyer dpyad bya/ /snum dang lan tshwa til mar byug /

de yis bad kan bu gar 'gags/ /shin tu zhen pa zhu nas ni/ /khong par gnas pa legs par 'byin/ /bu ga'i rgyun srang mnyen gyur cing / /rlung ni lugs dang mthun par rgyu/ /'jam zhing rlan gyur zas snum dang / /rlan can shar bcas sbyin pa 'am/ /yang na zho yi

spris ma sbyin/ /de nas de la rlon 'jam btang / /mchog tu lud pa rnying nad dang / /skad 'gags pa la skyug sman sbyin/ /rgyam tsha sbrang rtsi pi pi ling / /sbyar ba'am rlung la phan pa gtang / /bad kan gyis ni gnod byas pa/ /gsal na bde ba thob 'gyur la/ /bu ga

rnam par dag gyur nas/ /rlung ni gnod pa med par rgyu/ /lto sbos rtug 'gags mun 'thibs byed/ /ma du lung ga star bu dang / /shid+kun pi lu kha ru tsha/ /ldan zas byin na bde bar 'byung / /rgyam tshar bcas pa'i 'bras bu skyur/ /cung zad dro ba'i bkru sman gtang / /'di

dag bad kan gyis lam bkag /srog gi rlung ni 'khrugs las byung / /de bas de lam bsal bya'i phyir/ /steng dang 'og tu sbyang byas phan/ /ji ltar 'bag par gyur pa'i chu/ /shin tu 'khyil zhing 'phel ba ltar/ /de bzhin rlung ni 'khyil gyur pa'i/ /de lam legs par

sbyang bar bya/ /sbyang ba byas kyang ma dag pa'i/ /zhen pa'i dri ma du bas bsal/ /yung ba'i lo ma e raN+Da'i/ /rtsa ba rgya skyegs ldong ros dang / /thang shing ba la spang spos bcas/ /btags te reng bu nyid du bya/ /de ni mar bskus dud pa rngub/ /yang na mar sbrus nas

bsregs rngub/ /spra tshil sra rtsi pog dag gam/ /a ka ru bzang mar sbyar rngub/ /de bzhin tsan+dan glang rwa 'am/ /spu 'am rgyus pa'i dud pa rngub/ /btsod dang go dku rang ga /dge ba lpags mgar yi'am/ /yang na gu gul ldong ros sam/ /yang na sA la'i thang

chu nyid/ /mo rtsa gu gul a ga ru/ /shug pa mar dang bcas dud rngub/ /dugs byar mi rung btang snyoms gzhag /brang dang mid pa zhom pa la/ /bshol du med na 'jam dugs bya/ /kha ra dkar po'i 'o mas sam/ /dro 'jam tsam kyis dugs

bya zhing / /dkri dang ldan par bya ba'i dugs/ /dugs kyi le'ur bshad dugs bya/ /ma zhur de gso'i cho ga spyad/ /sbyor drags rlung shas cher gyur na/ /rlung nad bsal ba'i sbyor ba bya/ /sha khu snum sogs rab tsha sbyin/ /bsku ba dag gis zhi bar bya/ /bad kan ma slong

dugs mi bya/ /nyam chung ba la sbyang byas pas/ /rlung gi gnas rnyed gnas rnams ni/ /skam par byas nas srog 'phrog byed/ /de bas sman khu snum dang ni/ /lde gu stsogs kyis de zhir bya/ /skem zhing glo rdol tshad 'khru dang / /khrag mkhris tsha ba las byung ba'i/ /

skyigs bu dbugs mi bde ba la/ /mngar snum bsil stsogs dag gis gso/ /ku lang+tha dang rtsa ba bcu/ /bskol ba'i skam sa'i sha khu phan/ /shi kru par ta ka dang ni/ /ka sa mar da ba sha ka /la phug lo ma'i khu ba dang / /nim pa'i myu gu las byung dang / /kha lung

bri ha ti khu phan/ /kaN+Da ka ri byi tsher ba/ /bil ba'i rkang dang gze ma dang / /sle tres kar ka ta sring gi /tsi tra ka dang ku lang+tha/ /chur bskol ba yi yu sha bya/ /yang na ra sna rtsa chung lnga/ /mung+ga tsi tra kar bcas blud/ /tsi tra go snyod kha ru tsha/ /kar kata sring thug pa phan/ /

yang na rtsa ba bcu sbyar ba'i/ /thug pa blud na lud pa dang / /skyigs bu dbugs mi bde nad sel/ /rtsa ba bcu par sna dang / /zur pa ga bra'i rtsa ba dang / /bil ba gnyis dang ma nu dang / /kar ka ta sring pi pi ling / /lca ba sle tres bca' sga ni/ /bskol ba'i khu ba blud zhu

nas/ /de nyid dang btsos thug pa blud/ /sA lu drug cu pa dang gro/ /nas dang mung+ga rgya sran zos/ /lud pa snying nad rtsib logs zug /skyigs bu dbugs mi bde ba sel/ /yang na arga'i myu gu yi/ /'o ma dang sbrus nas kyi zan/ /sbrang rtsi dang bcas rtsa bcu sogs/ /

bskol ba'i khu bar sbyar ba blud/ /zas ni k+Sha ra shing kun mar/ /kha ru tsha dang se'u sbyar za/ /ma nu zur pa tsha ba gsum/ /star bu ba lung sbyar ba sbyin/ /skyigs bu dbugs mi bde skom dang / /rtsa ba bcu bskol khu ba'am/ /yang na thang shing bskol khu'am/ /chang gi

dngas ma blud par bya/ /pi pi ling dang de'i rtsa ba/ /ma ru ra dang byi dang ga/tsi tra ka rnams lde gur sbyar/ /mar snod bskus te bskams pa ru/ /snod du dar ba zla gcig gzhag /de 'bungs me yi drod skyed cing / /lud pa dbugs mi bde ba sel/ /ba ta mur pa thang

shing dang / /sa ra la dang chang dngas ma/ /nub gcig bzhag ste lan tshwa btab/ /de las khyer gang blud par bya/ /ga bra'i rtsa ba bca' sga'i phye'am/ /ya bak+Sha ra na le sham/ /bcas phye chu tshan blugs pa ban/ /ba spri ka ni bskol ba'i chu/ /btags pa lde gur byas bsres

blud/ /sab ta par+Ni'i khu ba'am/ /shri sha yi ni me tog ni/ /pi pi ling dang sbrang rtsir sbyar/ /bad kan mkhris pa 'dres gyur pa'i/ /skyigs bu dbugs mi bde ba sel/ /cu gang pi pi ling dang ni/ /'bras dang bca' sga mar dag las/ /khu ba mkhris pa las gyur

sal/ /rlung dang ldan la reg 'jam sha /ri bong sha dang pi pi ling / /mar dang sha spya ka yi khrag /lcam pa'i khu ba tsha ba gsum/ /mar dang 'o mar sbyar ba dang / /'bras chan zos la 'o ma blud/ /rlung mkhris 'dres pa las gyur sel/ /ra yi 'o ma bzhi 'gyur

gyis/ /chu bskol bu ram dong gra btab/ /pi pi ling rtsa shing mngar dang / /bu ram lca brta sbangs khu/ /sbrang rtsi mar sbyar zos gyur na/ /skyigs bu dbugs mi bde ba sel/ /rta dang glang po ba lang phag /rnga mong bong bu lug dang ra/ /gang yang rung ba'i rtug btsir

khu/ /sbrang rtsir sbyar ba bldags na phan/ /bad kan shas cher btung ba blud/ /rkang bzhi pa yi lpags rus spu/ /rmig pa bsregs la snag tshar byas/ /ya shwa gan+d+ha'i lde gu ni/ /sbrang rtsir sbyar bas bad kan shas/ /che ba'i dbugs mi bde ba sel/ /zur pa ma

nu skyu ru ra'am/ /ma nu pi pi ling bcas phan/ /yug snam pi pi ling bcas pa'am/ /ka pid ta yi khu ba'am/ /bil ba'i rkang khu skyu ru ra/ /pi pi ling dang rgyam tshar bcas/ /mar dang sbrang rtsi a ru ra'am/ /tsha ba gnyis dang kha ru tsha/ /rgya shug

'bras yos sbrang rtsi dang / /rgun 'bru pi pi ling dong gra/ /bu ram rgun 'bru yung ra sna/ /pi pi ling dang na le sham/ /til mar dang ni sbyar ba phan/ /lde gu sman gyi phye ma yang / /sha khu chu dron tsha stsogs btung / /dzi ban ti dang gla sgang dang / /bye'u rug pa dang shing tsha dang / /

sug smel gnyis dang ma nu dang / /lca ba ta ma ma li ka /a ru ra dang ga bra'i rtsa/ /dong ga dang ni ba la ka /zur pa kar ka ta sring gi /nA ga ge sar pi pi ling / /tsa rong ci rigs sbyar nas ni/ /phye ma nyis 'gyur kha rar bcas/ /rtsib logs nad rims lud pa sel/ /

skyigs bu dbugs mi bde 'joms mchog /dong ga bu ram cha mnyam pa/ /bza' ba'am sna nas btang sman bya/ /yang na sgag skya'am kun dong ngam/ /gri dza na yi rtsa bas bya/ /tsan+dan gyi ni khu ba dang / /bud med nu zho snar blugs bya/ /sbrang ma'i rtug pa nu zhor sbyar/ /rgya skyegs khu ba

dang sbyar blugs/ /rgyam tsha zhun mar dang bcas pa/ /nu zho mar dang bskol ba'am/ /mngar ba'i sman dang lde gur byas/ /de btung ba'am sna nas gtad/ /kha ra sbrang rtsir bcas pa ni/ /grang dro res kyis blugs pa'am/ /de bzhin 'o ma bskol ba ni/ /sman gyi phye ma mar sbyar

blugs/ /pi pi ling dang kha ru tsha/ /ya bak+Sha ra sle tres dang / /shing kun tso ra bye'u rug pa/ /mar dang zhog chur sbyar zhing / /rtsa bcu'i khu bar bskol ba blud/ /yang na 'tsho byed bskol ba'i khu/ /sbrang rtsir bcas pa blud par bya/ /te dzo ba ti a ru ra/ /pi pi ling

dang pu tse shel/ /ru rta ma nu bu ti ka /tsitra ka dang pa la sha//zur pa lan tshwa rnam gnyis dang / /dzi ban ti dang bil ba'i rkang / /shu dag bal bu'i lo ma rnams/ /de dag zho ni gnyis gnyis bskol/ /shing kun zho phyed mar bre gang / /bskol ba de ni 'thungs gyur na/ /

rkang lag la ni zhen pa'i rlung / /gzhang 'brum dang ni pho ba'i nad/ /skyigs bu snying nad rtsib logs zug /myur du sel bar byed pa yin/ /zhun mar cha phyed bcas pa yi/ /ya bak+Sha rgyam tsha sbyin/ /thang la 'bar gyi'am dug gi mar/ /zho can ha pu sha'i mar blud/ /chu

grang glo bur blugs pa dang / /sngangs dang sprugs dang 'jigs pa dang / /dga' dang phrag dog dbugs bsdams dang / /gnod pa'i 'bu yi sos btab dang / /gang yang bad kan rlung 'joms sman/ /dro zhing rlung ni bde rgyu bsten/ /gang yang phal cher rlung gi nad/ /

lhag par 'joms par byed pas spyad/ /thams cad la ni brta byas pas/ /tshabs chung gso bar sla ba yin/ /lhag par nyams smad pa yis ni/ /zhi ba'i thabs su 'gyur ma yin/ /de bas zhi ba brta ba'i thabs/ /mang po de la spyad par bya/ /lud pa dbugs

mi bde gcong slon/ /skyigs bu'i sman ni phan tshun 'dre/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /gso ba'i gnas kyi le'u bzhi pa'o// //de nas gcong chen po gso ba'i thabs kyi le'u bshad par bya'o/ /stobs ldan nad ni mang gyur la/ /

snum chos dugs byas sbyang ba ni/ /snum med ma yin nyam smod min/ /steng 'og gi ni sbyang bar bya/ /'o ma po son chang bcas pa'am/ /sha khu mngar dang ldan pa'am/ /zhun mar btab pa'i nas thug ni/ /skyug sman bskol bas slon du gzhug /sham dur byid dong

grar bcas/ /kha ra sbrang rtsi mar dang ni/ /bcas pa'i 'o ma 'am skyo ma'am/ /rgun 'bru tang pa la bi da ri/ /yang na sha khur ldan pa yi/ /bkru sman 'jam po gtang bar bya/ /lto sbyang pa la brta ba dang / /drod skyed cho ga spyad par bya/ /zas skom yi gar 'ong ba dang / /

rlung 'joms byed cing yang ba sbyin/ /s+'a lu drug cu pa dang gro/ /nas dang mung+ga lo gcig lon/ /ra yi 'o ma mar dang sha/ /sha za'i sha ni zad byed 'joms/ /bya rog 'ug pa spyang ki gzig /ba lang rta dang ne le sbrul/ /bya rgod rnga mo bong bu khra'i/ /sha ni sgyu yis byin na phan/ /

shes na de las smod pas na/ /slon zhing mdangs dang stobs mi 'gyur/ /bad mkhris ri dwags la sogs sha /rlung la mthu rtsal gzan tshol sha /tsho khur sbyar zhing phan pa dang / /sha khu sogs la'ang sbyar bar bya/ /yungs mar dag dang brngos pa'am/ /

yang na ci rigs mar dang brngos/ /khu bar ldan zhing mnyen la snum/ /spod la sogs dang legs g.yos sbyin/ /de bzhin la phug rgya sran las/ /g.yos pa'i yu shar sbyar bar bya/ /pi pi ling bcas nas dang bcas/ /rgya sran bcas shing dong grar bcas/ /se'u 'bru skyu

ru ra dang bcas/ /ra sha'i khu ba snum bcas blud/ /des ni cham pa la sogs pa/ /gnod pa drug ni sel bar 'gyur/ /mkhris pa sogs las khyad par du/ /chang rnying rtsa sbubs sbyong byed pa/ /ngoms pa nyid du blud par bya/ /rgun chang chang rnying chang dngas blud/ /rtsa ba chung ngu

lngar bskol ba'am/ /tam la ka chur bskol ba'am/ /par+Ni bzhi dang bskol ba'am/ /'u su bca' sga bskol ba blud/ /de dang kha zas gtsang ba dag /'bad pas btsos pa rjes mthun yin/ /rtsa ba bcu dang 'o ma 'am/ /sha khu'i nang du btso bar bya/ /ba la btab pa'i

mar sbyar ba'am/ /sha za'i sha khur btsos pa sbyin/ /'o ma bcu 'gyur dag dang ni/ /mar bskol sbrang rtsir bcas pa'ang phan/ /dzi ban ti dang shing mngar dang / /rgun 'bru dug mo nyung 'bras bu/ /ma nu zur pa pi pi ling / /bya kri gze ma ba la dang / /ta ma la ki ut+pal

sngo/ /kyi lce ba dang byi tsher ba/ /lde gur byas dang mar bskol ba/ /gcong chen sel ba'i dam pa yin/ /'bra go rgun 'brum ma du ka /pa ru sha dang pi pi ling / /mar dang bskol bas skad 'gags dang / /lud pa dbugs mi bde rims 'joms/ /rtsa bcu 'o mar

bskol ba las/ /byung ba'i mar gsar gang yin de/ /pi pi ling dang sbrang rtsir bcas/ /skad 'gags sel ba'i dam pa yin/ /mgo brang rtsib logs gzer 'joms shing / /lud pa dbugs mi bde rims sel/ /rtsa ba lnga ba lngar bskol ba'i/ /'o ma las

byung mar gang yin/ /rtsa ba lnga pa lnga yi ni/ /khu ba 'o ma'i bzhi 'gyur la/ /bskol ba yi ni mar 'di yis/ /zang byed kyi ni stobs bdun 'joms/ /ya bak+Sha ra tsha ba lnga/ /srang drug dang ni btsos pa'i mar/ /bre gang 'o ma cha mnyam byas/ /de yis bu ga dag

byed cing / /skran dang dmu rdzing mcher pa dang / /pho nad skya rbab cham pa dang / /lud pa dbugs mi bde drod nyams/ /skrang dang stod kyi rlung nad 'joms/ /ra sna ba la gze ma dang / /ti ra ba ra sha khu'i chur/ /dzi ban ti dang pi pi ling / /'o bcas gcong chen

'joms pa'i mchog /a shwa gan+d+ha 'o mar bskol/ /las byung mar 'o kha rar bcas/ /spyi yi sha ni srang brgya dag /chu bre sum cu gnyis na bskol/ /de yi brgyad cha lus pa ru/ /'tsho byed bcu ni srang re gzhug /zhun mar bre gang bcas bskol ba/ /sha yi sman mar 'di

blud pa'am/ /sha khu dang sbyar ci rigs sbyin/ /rlung dang mkhris pa las gyur nad/ /lud pa dbugs mi bde skad 'gags/ /skem zhing rtsib logs zug pa 'joms/ /sug smel ti mus 'bras gsum/ /sa nag tsha ba gsum tsi tra/ /sa ra nim pa seng ldeng dang / /

sA la'i 'bras bu las byung dang / /go bye dang ni byi dang ga /srang ni brgyad brgyad tshad du byas/ /chu ni bcu drug 'gyur byas par/ /bcu drug char gnas bar du bskol/ /slar yang de dang mar bre gang / /bskol ba 'dir ni cu gang ni/ /srang drug khar srang sum cu bcug /

sbrang rtsi srang ni drug cu gzhug /dri sna gsum ni srang re gzhug /gzar bus dkrugs te lde gur byas/ /snga dro zos la 'o ma btung / /bcud len bsdams pa med pa yin/ /yid gzhungs mig rno tshe ring la/ /drod skyed skran dang gcong chen nad/ /skya rbab dang ni mtshan bar rdol/ /

myur du 'joms par byed pa yin/ /gang yang zhun mar bu ram bcas/ /glo rdol la bshad zang byed sbyar/ /shing tsha sug smel pi pi ling / /cu gang kha ra rim nyis 'gyur/ /phye mar byas bza' 'am sbrang rtsi dang / /mar dang sbyar te lde gur zos/ /skad 'gags lud pa

dbugs mi bde/ /zad byed rtsib logs bad kan 'joms/ /'di yi skad 'gags la khyad par/ /sna sman dud pa rngub stsogs bya/ /de la'ang rlung las gyur pa la/ /kas mar da brda ka /bring+ga ra dza'i khu ba mar/ /bskol ba'am arda ga la bskol/ /dro 'jam zos rjes la blud na/ /

yud pa lu dang skad 'gags sel/ /rgya shug lo ma'i lde gu ni/ /mar brngos rgyam tshar bcas pa'am/ /shing mngar dang ni pi pi ling / /byi dang ga dang rgun 'brum dang / /ha nas par+Ni'i rtsa ba rnams/ /til mar bskol ba snar blugs bya/ /'bras chan mar dang bu ram bcas/ /

zos na de rjes chu tshan btung / /'o thug snum can blud pa dang / /snum gyi dugs kyi cho ga bya/ /mkhris pa las gyur 'o ma'i shing / /lde gu bskol ba'i zhun mar ni/ /sbrang rtsir bcas te de rjes ni/ /'o ma bskol te bsgrangs pa blud/ /shing mngar ma du ka 'o thug /zhun

mar bcas pa blud pa'am/ /ba la dri bzang bi da ri/ /shing mngar k+Shi ta bi da ri/ /rgyam tshar bcas pa bskol ba'i mar/ /skad 'gags sna sman bla med yin/ /pra puN+Da rI ka shing mngar/ /pi pi ling dang bri ha ti/ /ba la 'o ma mar bskol te/ /skad 'gags pa yi sna sman

mchog /mngar ba'i sde tshan phye ma ni/ /sbrang rtsi mar sbyar lde gu sbyin/ /bad kan las gyur tsha ba dang / /zas rtsub ba gcin blud par bya/ /kad pha la dang skyu ru ra/ /tsha gsum til mar sbrang rtsir sbyar/ /ya bak+Sha ra tsha ba gsum/ /kru trug tres dang dbyi mong dang / /a ru ra dang

sbrang rtsir sbyar/ /nas thug til mar zhun mar dang / /pi pi ling dang skyu rur sbyar/ /bca' sga dang ni pi pi ling / /bza' ba'am skyug sman rnon po bsten/ /sha kha ra dang sbrang rtsir bsres/ /mngar ba'i sman dang lhan cig bskol/ /'o ma 'thung bas skang gsang ni/ /chen

por smras pa'i 'gags nad sel/ /yi ga 'chus la sna tshogs zas/ /phan pa'i sman dang sbyar ba sbyin/ /phyi dang nang ni sbyang ba dang / /sems dga' yid dang mthun sman sbyin/ /dus gnyis su ni so shing dag /bca' zhing kha ni sbyang bya zhing / /bska bas kha ni bkru ba dang / /

rjes su mthun pa'i dud pa rngub/ /da lis kyi ni ri lu dang / /kha ra ga bur bcas pa sbyin/ /'bras khu zla ba'i zer ltar dkar/ /bza' ba yi ga 'byed pa'i mchog /de las rlung 'gyur yi ga 'chus/ /ha re Nu dang pi pi ling / /byi dang ga dang ra sna dang / /rgyam tsha dang ni dong

gra dang / /sug smel ga bra'i rtsa ba dang / /nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba dang / /shing kun bcas pa mar ram ni/ /chang gi dngas mar sbyar te btung / /shu ngag chus ni slon du gzhug /mkhris gyur bu ram chus slon gzhug /kha ra dang ni zhun mar ram/ /rgyam tsha sbrang rtsir

bcas pa sbyin/ /bad kan nim pa'i chus slon gzhug /la la phud dang dong gra'i chu/ /sbrang rtsi'am chang rnying rno sbyar ba/ /bu ram sbrang rtsi chang bcas blud/ /ha re Nu sogs phye ma ni/ /sngar bshad chu tshan sbyar ba blud/ /sug smel dang ni shing tsha dang / /nA ga pus pa na le sham/ /

pi pi ling dang bca' sga rnams/ /rim bzhin cha res bskyed phye ma/ /kha ra dag dang mnyam sbyar bas/ /mchil mang yi ga 'chus pa dang / /snying dang rtsib logs na lud pa/ /dbugs mi bde dang mgul nad 'joms/ /la la phud dang da trig dang / /star bu bca' sga se'u 'bru

dang / /rgya shug zho ni gnyis gnyis byas/ /kha ra srang bzhi 'u su dang / /go snyod shing tsha kha ru tsha/ /zho re pi pi ling 'bru brgya/ /na le sham ni nyis brgya dag /phyer btags yi ga 'byed pa'i mchog /yid 'ong phyis 'gags pa dang / /lud pa snying ga rtsib logs na/ /mcher

pa gzhang 'brum pho nad sel/ /bal bu'i lo man le sham/ /dong gra dang ni pi pi ling / /go rims bzhin du cha res bskyed/ /shing tsha sug smel dang po'i phyed/ /pi pi ling gi brgyad 'gyur gyi/ /kha rar sbyar ba'i phye ma de/ /drod skyed yi ga 'byed pa dang / /lud pa lu dang

dbugs mi bde/ /yi ga 'chus dang slon bro dang / /mcher pa snying nad rtsib logs zug /skya rbab tshad 'khru rims nad 'joms/ /rlung 'khyil ba ni bde rgyu byed/ /sug smel shing tsha pu shel tse/ /zho ni gnyis gnyis byas pa dang / /nA ga ge sar srang phyed dang / /gan+d+ha

b+ha dra srang phyed gzhug /phye btags bu ram rnying pa ni/ /srang ni nyi shu lnga ni bskol/ /sbrus te zho gnyis tshad ri lu/ /byas pa'i yon tan de dang mnyam/ /arga sle tres k+Sha ra'i chur/ /nas dang nub gcig spangs nas ni/ /chu dang zan ni sbrus nas su/ /

byin te nyams stobs ldan slon gzhug /de bzhin skam sa'i srog chags sha /bsregs pa kha dang tsha sbyar sbyin/ /zas ni skam zhing rab yang dang / /tsa na ka sogs khu ba blud/ /bad kan gyis rab mchil ma mang / /rlung gis mchil mang skyed par byed/ /de ni bad kan mchil

mar bshad/ /snum dang dro bas de bsal bya/ /rims 'di cham pa dag dang ni/ /slon pa'i nad la'ang sbyar bar bya/ /mchog tu cham par bsku ba dang / /snum dang dugs kyi cho ga bstan/ /mgo dang lkog ma rtsib logs su/ /'bras khur snum bcas dugs bya zhing / /

lan tshwa skyur dang kha dang tsha/ /sha khu snum dang bcas pa sbyin/ /mgo bo snying ga rtsib logs gzer/ /nad gzhi ji bzhin gso bar bya/ /chu dang rlan can gnas pa'i sha /legs sbyar dkri ba'i dugs bya zhing / /de nas snum bzhi'i sbyor ba bsngags/ /nad gzhi

'dres bar gyur pa la/ /rgya spos shing mngar shu ti dang / /tsan+dan mar gyi lde gus byug /pa la ra sna til mar dang / /shing mngar ut+pal mar de bzhin/ /ba spru ba dang shi kru dang / /ba la ra mnye bid ri/ /sna sman dud pa rngub pa dang / /zas zos 'og tu snum bsten zhing / /

til mar gyis ni bsku ba dang / /de bzhin 'jam rtsi'i las rab bsngags/ /yang na rngabs rwa la sogs pas/ /nad dmigs ji bzhin nad khrag dbyung / /shug pa tsan+dan pu shel tse/ /mar bcas lde gus bsku ba'am/ /dUr ba shing mngar btsod dang ni/ /nA ga ge sar mar sbyar

bsku/ /n+ya gro d+ha sogs bskol til mar/ /lan brgya bkrus pa'i mar gyis ni/ /bsku ba'am 'o ma shing mngar chus/ /blugs par gyur pa'ang bsngags pa yin/ /phal cher me drod nyams pa'i phyir/ /ma zhu be snabs bcas 'khru na/ /de la pho ba'i tshad 'khru ba'i/ /skabs su

bshad pa'i sman bsten phan/ /zad byed ldan pa'i bshang ba ni/ /rnam pa kun tu bsrung bya ste/ /de yi lus zungs kun zad pas/ /de stobs bshad pa'i stobs kyis gnas/ /rig pas sha rnams kho na sbyin/ /skom du rgun chang blud par bya/ /shugs ni bkag par gyur pa yis/ /

gcong chen gyis ni glags mi rnyed/ /chang dang chang dngas rgun chang dang / /chang rnying bu ram sbrang chang dang / /ci rigs par ni blud pa dang / /sha ni sbyin pa nyid du bya/ /bu ga'i rgyun 'gags dag phyir dang / /stobs dang mdangs ni rgyas bya'i phyir/ /snum dang 'o ma chus gang

ba'i/ /snod du lus ni 'bying bar bya/ /phyung nas bsres pa'i snum gyis ni/ /bsku zhing lag pas bde bar mnye/ /bde bar 'dug par gyur pa la/ /dal gyis lde gus dril bar bya/ /dzi ban ti dang dUr ba dang / /btsod dang a shwa gan+d+ha dang / /a pa marga ba spru ba/ /

ag ni man ti shing mngar dang / /ba la yungs kar bid ri/ /ru rta 'bras dang zar ma dang / /mon sran gre'u gnyis til dang phabs/ /thams cad gcig tu btags nas ni/ /nas kyi phye ni sum 'gyur dang / /zho dang sbrang rtsi lhan cig sbyar/ /'di dag gis ni dril phyis

bya/ /sha rgyas mdog bzang stobs skyed byed/ /yungs kar ser po'i lde gu dang / /'tsho byed sde tshan dang sbyar ba/ /khrus kyi sman gyis khrus bya zhing / /dus tshigs bde ba'i chus khrus bya/ /dri dang phreng ba sogs pas brgyan/ /bkra mi shis pa 'jigs pa bstan/ /mdza'

bshes blta zhing glu dang ni/ /rol mo mnyan zhing dga' ston bya/ /'jam rtsi 'o ma zhun mar dang / /sha dang chang bsten tshul la gnas/ /lha la brten pa'i cho ga dang / /mchod pa'i las la brtson par bya/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ gso ba'i gnas

kyi le'u lnga pa'o// //de nas slon pa'i nad dang snying nad dang skom dad gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /slon nad phal cher ma zhu ba'i/ /gnas 'khrugs las byung de yi phyir/ /rlung ma gtogs la dang por ni/ /smyung byas skyug sman gtang ba phan/ /

stobs ldan rgyun tu slon gyur cing / /nad mang 'gyur la gtang bar bya/ /de 'og rim gyis bkru sman ni/ /yid 'ong chang rgun chu sogs sam/ /'o mas btang gyur de mod la/ /gyen 'byung nad ni thur du 'byung / /zhi ba'i sman ni rtsub pa ste/ /nyam chung ba yang de

nyid bya/ /zas ni skam zhing yi gar 'ong / /goms shing yang ba bsngags pa yin/ /de bzhin smyung ba yu sha dang / /sha khu 'ba' cha skam pa la/ /tshod ma lde gu bza' ba dang / /btung ba dri bzangs pa na ka /ro drug zas skom sna tshogs dang / /'bras bu 'khrus dang mnye ba

dang / /dri zhim 'bras bu me tog skyes/ /zas dang skom la spyod pa dang / /zos ma thag tu 'phral du ni/ /chu grang gis ni gdong bkru bya/ /rlung las gyur pa'i slon pa'i nad/ /rgyam tsha mar bcas dro ba'am/ /tsha gsum lan tshwa gsum sbyar bas/ /lud pa dang ni snying 'dzag

dang / /bcas pa sel bar byed pa yin/ /se 'bru'i khu ba bca' sga dang / /'u su zho dang mar bskol ba'am/ /chu dang 'o ma cha mnyam pa/ /khron gyi zas tshol sha khu ni/ /'bras skyur rgyam tsha mar shas che/ /kha zas snum po bca' sga dang / /zho dang se 'brur sbyar ba'am/ /

rgyam tshar bcas pa dro 'jam phan/ /'dir ni bkru sman lan tshwa dang / /snum dang dro bar bcas pa phan/ /mkhris pa las byung bkru sman phyir/ /rgun 'brum bu ram shing khu dang / /dur bying sbyar ba'i bkru sman btab/ /zhun mar seng phrom sbyar ba gtang / /'phel te bad kan gnas

khyab pa'i/ /mkhris par mngar dang khab yis/ /gyen du drangs la dag gyur nas/ /'bras yos khar bcas pa las/ /skyo ma'am nas thug blud par bya/ /sA lu drug cug ba yi chan/ /skam sa'i sha khu mung+ga'i khu/ /so phag bsregs te chu nang gsur/ /shin tu bsgrangs

pa'i chu blud pa'am/ /mung+ga 'u su pu shel tse/ /pi pi ling dang nub gcig sbangs/ /yang na rgun chu bu ram shing / /sle tres chu mang 'o ma blud/ /'dzam bu a mra'i lo ma dang / /u shir n+ya gro d+ha'i myu gu/ /bskol te bsgrangs par sbrang rtsi ni/ /btab ste blugs na

slon pa dang / /rims dang tshad 'khru brgyal ba dang / /skom dad che ba mi bzad sel/ /skyu ru ra'i khu tsan+dan bcas/ /mung+ga ba la'i chu blud phan/ /rgya shug tshi gu khar dkar/ /'bras yos spra tshil pi pi ling / /dngul rdo sbrang rtsi'am a ru ra/ /rgun 'bru'am rgya shug dang

sbyar phan/ /bad kan las gyur nim pa dang / /pi pi ling dang po son cha/ /yungs kar chu dron gyis slon bya/ /nyam chung ba la smyung ba bya/ /dong gal stsogs khu ba bskol/ /bsgrangs pa sbrang rtsir bcas pa blud/ /nas kyi skyo ma slon 'joms pa'i/ /sman mang dang ni

sbyar ba blud/ /bad kan 'joms zas yi gar 'ong / /btung ba zin thig bu srin/ /ldong ros dang ni pi pi ling / /na le sham ni skyur rtsi che/ /ka pid ta yi khu ba dang / /sbrang rtsir bcas pas slon nad sel/ /ka pid ta dang tsha ba gsum/ /phyi tshor sbrang rtsir sbyar ba sbyin/ /

mthun pa'i spyod pa byas pa yis/ /mi sdug yul mthong las byung sel/ /srin bu las byung srin bu yi/ /sman du bshad pa rnams kyis gso/ /lhag ma nad dmigs ji bzhin du/ /de zhi 'gyur ba'i dpyad kyis gso/ /slon pa'i skabs su rlung gi nad rnams ni/ /lus zungs zad pas

nges par ldang gyur te/ /de bas 'dir ni skyug sman sbyor drags pa'i/ /skabs bshad bcad dang brta ba'i cho ga bya/ /bu ram zhun mar sha khu dge ba che/ /tsha ba gsum dang 'tsho byed sman mar dang / /'o thug dang ni phan pa'i lde gu yis/ /rgyun du slon pa zhi ba nyid du bya/ /snying nad rlung gyur

til mar ni/ /skyur rtsab dang ba zho ga chu/ /ldan pa tsha can dro 'jam blud/ /des ni lto sbos skran yang 'joms/ /til mar lan tshwar bcas dang skyur/ /ba gcin bskol ba'ang de dang mtshungs/ /bil ba ra sna rgya shug nas/ /thang shing dang ni ba spu ba/ /rgya sran rtsa ba lnga pa

rnams/ /bskol ba'i chu der til mar ni/ /bskol ba de ni snar btang dang / /btung dang 'jam rtsir gtang bar bya/ /bca' sga rgyam tsha byi'u rug pa/ /sle tres shing kun ma nu dang / /a ru ra dang mar bskol ba/ /snying nad rtsib logs gzer skran 'joms/ /kha ru tsha ni srang

gnyis dang / /a ru ra ni lnga bcu dang / /zhun mar bre gang bskol rtsib logs/ /snying nad skran dbugs mi bde sel/ /se 'bru bca' sga kha ru tsha/ /shing kun star bu phye mar sbyar/ /rlung nad gzhan dbang can snying nad/ /dbugs mi bde ba sel

mchog yin/ /ma nu zur pa bca' sga dang / /skyur rtsi che rtsa a ru ra'i/ /lde gu ya bak+Sha ra dang / /mngar skyur lan tshwa ldan pa 'thungs/ /bcad snyam sems pa'i gzer 'joms byed/ /rgyam tshal la phud k+Sha ra/ /shu dag go snyod bca' sga dang / /thang shing sgyur rtsi chen

po dang / /zur pa ma nu pa la sha /bskol khu 'jam 'thungs yon tan mtshungs/ /tsha lnga zur pa a ru ra/ /bu ram ma nu skyur rtsi che/ /chang btags lde gu mar til mar/ /brngos te rgyam tshar ldan 'thungs na/ /snying nad rtsib logs mo mtshan zug /skran dang dmu rdzing

nad rnam sel/ /'di la snum gyi dugs phan zhing / /sman mar gyi ni sbyor ba phan/ /skom la rtsa ba chung ngu lnga'am/ /bca' sga dang ni bskol ba'i chu'am/ /chang gi dngas ma zho ga chu/ /'bras bu'i rang skyur blud par bya/ /bya rmyang rengs gzer ma zhur bcas/ /

snying la rlung gis gnod gyur la/ /bya ba 'di bya snying 'dzag cing / /'phar dang gcin snyi bcas pa la/ /sreg pa khrung khrung rma bya dang / /dgo ba khyim bya snum mang phan/ /snying nad can la ba la'i mar/ /yang na skyid de ba'i mar blud/ /shing mngar lan brgyar btsos pa'am/ /

de bzhin snum chen mchog tu phan/ /ra sna 'tsho byed dzi ba ni ti/ /ba la bya kri ba spru ba/ /ga bra'i rtsa ba tir dang / /shu dag tsha ba gsum dang ni/ /snum chen zhes bya bskol bar bya/ /zho ni bzhi cha de bzhin skyur/ /ji snyed pa las sbyar ba bsten/ /tshim byed brtas byed

stobs skyed cing / /rlung gi snying nad 'joms pa yin/ /snying nad drod che 'phar ba dang / /rlung las gyur ba'i snying nad la/ /'o ma zho dang bu ram mar/ /chu dang rlan can sha ngag phan/ /'di ma gtogs pa'i snying gi nad/ /bzhi po dag la spang bar bya/ /rlung can

rengs dang be+e'u snabs can/ /tshor med lhag ma rnams la'ang spang / /bad kan 'dres gyur de la ni/ /rtsub drod bshad pa'i bya ba bya/ /mkhris gyur rgun chu bu ram chu/ /kha ru sbrang rtsi pa ru shar/ /ldan pa'i bkru sman yid 'ong bas/ /sbyangs la mkhris sel rim pa bya/ /glo

rdol rims kyi mkhris skabs bshad/ /phyi nang gi ni sbyang ba bya/ /pu shel tse dang shing mngar btags/ /kha rar bcas pa'i chu blud bya/ /ra sna khar rgun 'brum dang / /'tsho byed ut+pal zangs rtsi ba/ /ba la 'bra go ra mnye ba/ /me da gnyis dang ma he'u mar/ /'o mar

bcas pa bskol ba ni/ /mkhris gyur snying nad sel byed yin/ /shing mngar ba spru puN+Da rI/ /pad+ma'i rtsa ba ka she ru/ /bca' sga ba lar bcas de dang / /'o mar bcas dang bca' sgar bskol/ /bsgrangs par sbrang rtsi btab pa dang / /mngar ba'i sde tshan bsdus pa'ang

bsngags/ /til mar shing mngar bcas bskol zhing / /sbrang rtsi btab pa'i 'jam rtsi'ang phan/ /bad kan las gyur dugs byas la/ /nim pa shu dag chu yis slon/ /rgya sran khu ba rgyam tsho'i chu/ /chang rno blud cing nas zan sbyin/ /shu dag shing kun lan tshwa gnyis/ /dong

gra sug smel la la phud/ /nas tshig 'khus thal pi pi ling / /phye ma dro 'jam chu blud pa'am/ /'bras bu'i chu'am rang skyur ram/ /rgya sran ba gcin chang rnying blud/ /ma nu bca' sga a ru ra/ /zur pa ra sna pi pi ling / /shu dag bskol te blud pa'am/ /de bzhin

bca' sga a ru ra/ /bong nga dkar po yung ba dang / /kad pa la ni bskol ba'am/ /ro hi ta ka a shwad tha/ /seng ldeng u dum bA ra dang / /ardzu na dang pa la sha /n+ya gro d+ha bskol tsha ba gsum/ /dur byid phye mar bcas lde gu/ /zos te chu tshan rjes 'thungs na/ /bad kan

snying nad sel byed yin/ /bad kan skran skabs bshad mar dang / /k+Sha ra sna tshogs blud par bya/ /yang na brag zhun bcud len dang / /tshangs pa'i bcud len skyu ru ra'i/ /lde gu'am ri byis bshad pa'am/ /bdud rtsi'i mar ni 'di sbyar bya/ /gang zhig zan zos gzer gyis

'debs/ /zas zhu gyur nas zhi gyur pa/ /de la ru rta byi dang ga /lan tshwa gnyis dang seng phrom dang / /thang shing bong dkar por bcas/ /phye ma chu bskol dro sbyar blud/ /gang zhig zhu nas cher gzer ba/ /de la snum gyi bkru sman ni/ /'bras bu dang

ni de bzhin du/ /rtsa ba'i bkru sman sbyin par bya/ /phal cher rlung ni lam 'gags pa/ /ma zhu'i gnas su 'khru bar 'gyur/ /de la smyung dang smin pa dang / /sbyang bas bde bar rgyu bar bya/ /'bu 'joms pa yi sman kun gyis/ /'bu yi snying nad gso bar bya/ /skom dad

rlung dang mkhris pa 'joms/ /cho ga phal cher bsngags pa yin/ /kun la phyi nang bsil ba dang / /de bzhin zhi dang sbyang bar bya/ /char chu grang mo sbrang rtsir bcas/ /sa chu'i yon tan de ldan bsngags/ /bong ba rdza skyogs bye ma'am/ /gshag ma bsreg bcug dngas

mar bcas/ /bskol te kha rar bcas pa'am/ /dUr ba la stsogs rtsa ba lnga/ /bskol te kha ra btab pa'am/ /'bras yos phyer sbyar skyo ma'ang bsngags/ /nas rjen chag tshe sbrang rtsi dang / /kha ra btab pa grang mo'ang phan/ /de bzhin nas thug sA lu dang / /ko tra pa ni rnying

pa ni/ /'o ma bsil zhing nus bsil ba'i/ /sman dang bskol ba'i kha zas ni/ /nad pa chu grang gis bkrus nas/ /kha ra sbrang rtsi sbyin pa bsngags/ /skam sa'i sha khu lan tshwa skyur/ /med cing mar dang brngos pa yang / /de bzhin mung+ga stsogs khu ba/ /'tsho byed sde tshan khu

bar bcas/ /sna sman 'o ma mar bsil sman/ /bskol ba'am bu ram shing khu phan/ /skom sel mkhur ba bkang nas ni/ /mdog nas las bshad byas pa'ang phan/ /tsha rims bshad pa'i lde gu sogs/ /rtsol ba chung zhing sems dga' dang / /chu bo mtsho ni chen po stsogs/ /

dran pa dang ni mthong ba phan/ /skom dad rlung las gyur pa las/ /zho ni bu ram bcas pa bsngags/ /sha khus nyams brtas bid ri/ /stsogs te bskol nas bsgrangs pa phan/ /mkhris gyur u dum bA ra smin/ /khu bar kha ra btab pa phan/ /yang na de bskol bsgrangs

pa'am/ /sha ri bstsogs sde tshan chu/ /sde tshan de 'dra bskol khu ba/ /bsgrangs ba kha ra sbrang rtsir bcas/ /mngar ba'i sman gyi sde tshan dang / /'o ma can shing bskol de bzhin/ /bi dza bur rgun 'brum dang / /lcang ma n+ya gro d+ha'i lo ma/ /ku sha 'jag ma'i rtsa ba dang / /shing

mngar chu ni bskol ba'ang phan/ /rims la phan sman rgun 'brum stsogs/ /snying po lnga yi chu blud phan/ /bad kan las gyur nim pa ni/ /chu mchog bskol bas slon du gzhug /bil ba 'u su tsha ba lnga/ /'jag ma kru trug tres bskol blud/ /yang na skyer ba chu bskol la/ /

kha ra sbrang rtsi btab pa blud/ /mung+ga'i khu ba pa to la/ /nim pa'i lo ma tsha gsum bcas/ /nas zan mkhur bkang rnon po dang / /sna sman lde gu rnon po'ang bsten/ /nyes kun ma zhu des 'joms pas/ /de bzhin slon gyi bya ba'ang bsngags/ /go bye shu dag cha ba gsum/ /

'bras bu skyur pa'am chu tshan nam/ /zho ga chu dang btung ba bsngags/ /zas kyi nyes 'byung dus shes pas/ /thug sla'am skyo ma bsil ba blud/ /ngal bas skom la sha khu'am/ /skyo ma kha rar bcas pa blud/ /tsha bas bskol la kha rar bcas/ /nas dang rgya shug

phye skyo blud/ /lus kun til gyi lde gu dang / /rang skyur bcas pas bsku bar bya/ /chu bsil khrus las skom gyur chang / /chur bsres pa'am bur chu blud/ /chang ni chu phyed bcas pa blud/ /lan tshwa skyur dang bcas khrus bya/ /snum bcas me drod rab rno la/ /rang

bzhin bsil ba'i chu blud bya/ /snum ma zhu la chu tshan blud/ /zhu las skom la thug pa blud/ /zas snum zos pas skom dad 'gyur/ /kha ba dang mnyam bu ram chu/ /bu ram sogs zas zos la skom/ /chu dron blud la de slon bya/ /gcong chen las byung gcong la

phan/ /thams cad nyams ni brta ba phan/ /skem zhing nyam chung khong rtsub la/ /sha khu'am ra yi 'o ma blud/ /stod rgyu'i rlung la 'o ma dang / /zad byed lud pa'i sman bskol blud/ /nad rkyen las gyur 'u su ni/ /'bras bskol kha ra sbrang rtsir bcas/ /nad dmigs la ni

bltas nas ni/ /btung ba'i bya ba kun kyang bsngags/ /skom zhing sngar gyi nad kyis gzir/ /chu dang 'phrad par ma gyur na/ /'chi ba'am yun ring ba yi nad/ /rnyed par 'gyur bas de yi phyir/ /goms pa'i zas skom sman gyis ni/ /de yi skom dad

myur bsal bya/ /de bsal nad ni gzhan dag kyang / /gso ba nyid du nus pa yin/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /gso ba'i gnas kyi le'u drug pa'o// //de nas chang nad gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /nyes pa gang zhig shas cher mthong / /

de ni dang por gso bar bya/ /yang na chang nad nad gzhi mtshungs/ /bad kan gnas kyi rim pas gso/ /mkhris pa rlung gi mthar thug par/ /chang nad phal cher 'byung ba yin/ /dman dang log pa drag 'thungs las/ /nad ni gang zhig skyes gyur pa/ /de nyid cha mnyam

'thungs pa yis/ /chang nyid kyis ni zhi bar 'gyur/ /chang dang dug ni mtshungs pa las/ /dug ni rno stsogs yon tan gyi/ /nus pa shin tu che bas na/ /dug gzhan la ni ltos pa yin/ /rno tshe lhag par 'thungs pa dang / /tsha zhing skyur ba dag gis ni/ /chang gis zas

kyi ro bsrul zhing / /'ju nyer ba tsha bro gang yin/ /myos dang skom rmongs nang du tsha/ /rims dang mgo 'khor skyed par byed/ /chang gis bslangs pa'i nad kyis ni/ /rlung rgyu'i bu ga bkag gyur pas/ /mgo dang rus pa tshigs rnams su/ /mi bzad par ni skyed par byed/ /

sbyor ba rjes mthun gyur pa yi/ /chang nyid kyis ni de sel 'gyur/ /chang nad ma zhu zhu gyur na/ /zas 'dod lus ni yang bar 'gyur/ /ba tsha ro ni skyur dang phrad/ /mngar ba nyid du myur du 'gyur/ /nad ni 'ju bar byed nus pas/ /skyur ba kun las chang mchog yin/ /sngar

bshad rno dang dro stsogs dang / /de bzhin drod skyed stsogs yon tan/ /de nyid goms pa'i dbang gis ni/ /'di yis lus zungs mnyam byed mchog /zhag bdun nam zhig zhag brgyad par/ /chang nad sman gyi sbyor ba bya/ /dus 'di tsam gyis lam log par/ /gnas pa'i

chang nad zhi bar 'gyur/ /sman ni byas gyur nas chad nad/ /de phan chang ni rjes 'brel pa'i/ /nad gang yin pa de la sman/ /nad dmigs ji bzhin sbyin par bya/ /de la rlung shas che ba la/ /sgyur rtsi chen pod trig dang / /rgya shug se 'bru go snyod dang / /la la phud dang

ha pu sha /zi ra tsha gsum lan tshwa gsum/ /sge'u gsher phye chang sbyar ba blud/ /sreg sha ldum rngad bcas pa dang / /snum dang ldan pa'i zas sbyin no/ /snum zhing dro skyur lan tshwar bcas/ /sha tshon khu ba blud pa'am/ /a mra a mra ta ka gtubs/ /g.yos sbyar ba yi

drug pa'am/ /gro dang ma sha las byas pa/ /rnying zhing yi gar 'ong ba dang / /sge gsher bcas ba'i khu ba ni/ /tsha dang sha sogs nang bcug pa'am/ /chang ni dri zhim bsil ba dang / /legs langs dngas shing tshar bcas phan/ /se 'bru'am rtsa ba chung lnga bskol/ /

bca' sga 'u su bskol ba'am/ /zhog chu'am tsha chu'am/ /rang skyur dngas ma blud par bya/ /lus bsku dril dang bkru ba dang / /gos ni dro zhing mthug pa dang / /a ka ru yi dud pas bdug /gur gum a ka ru yis byug /chung ma nu ma ro smad mdzes/ /lang tshor

ldan zhing yan lag dro/ /dga' bas 'khyud par byed pa dang / /bsnyen bkur byas par gyur pa'ang phan/ /mkhris pa shas cher chu mang ba'i/ /sbrang rtsi khar dang ldan pa'i/ /se 'bru 'bra go'i khu ba dang / /b+ha bya rgun 'brum pa ru sha'i/ /khu bsgrangs phye dang khar rar bcas/ /

btung ba'ang de 'dra blud par bya/ /yang na mngar ba'i sde tshan bskol/ /khu ba chang bsres sbrang rtsi btab/ /sA lu drug cu pa'i tshan dang / /ri bong gong sreg gtsod kyi sha /tsa na mung+ga skyu ru ra/ /se 'bru pa to la g.yos sbyin/ /bad kan mkhris 'dres las gyur pa/ /tsha dang

skom dang ldan pa yi/ /chang ngam chu grang bu ram shing / /khu ba'am rgun chu mang blud la/ /slon gzhug 'dres pa'i nad la ni/ /skyo ma la sogs rim pas phan/ /de yis me drod 'bar gyur pas/ /zas dang nyes lhag smin par byed/ /lud pa mchil ma khrag bcas 'byung / /

rtsib logs nu mar gzer ba dang / /tsha dang bcas pa'i skom dad dang / /snying dang brang ni na ba la/ /sle tres ga dur bskol ba'am/ /yang na pa to la bskol khu/ /bca' sgar bcas pa blud bya zhing / /gong ma sreg gi sha sbyin bya/ /mkhris pa rlung ni rgyas gyur pas/ /

shin tu shas cher skom gyur na/ /rlung ni bde bar rgyu byed pa'i/ /rgun chu bsgrangs pa blud par bya/ /zhu nas ra sha'i khu ba ni/ /mngar dang skyur ba'i sman sbyar sbyin/ /skom na chu mang bsres pa yi/ /chang blud ra ror mi 'gyur bsrung / /gla sgang se 'bru 'bras yos chu'am/ /yang

na 'dab ma bzhi bskol ba'am/ /ut+pal pa to la sogs sam/ /rang bzhin gyis ni bsil ba blud/ /chang mang 'thungs pas chu yi khams/ /'bri zhing me shas rgyas par 'gyur/ /gre ba rkan mchu skam 'gyur zhing / /lce ni 'byin cing gcong byed la/ /mtshan mo rlung gis

bsil byas pa'i/ /chu ni yog tshad blud par bya/ /rgya shug se 'bru da trig dang / /tsug tral chu ba'i khu ba/ /skyur ba lnga yis khar bskus na/ /'phral du skom dad sel bar byed/ /chang 'thungs drod ni khrag mkhris dang / /'dres pas pags pa khyab gyur pas/ /

mi bzad tsha ba skyed byed de/ /der ni rab bsil cho ga bya/ /ma zhu sha khus tshim byas la/ /ro hi ni las gtar ga gdab/ /slon dang smyung ba dag gis kyang / /bad kan shas cher skug sman dang / /smyung ba bca' sga sti ra dang / /kaN+Da ka ri ba la ka /gang yang rung ba'i

chu blud bsal/ /ma zhu med cing bkres dus su/ /sbrang rtsi mang po blud par bya/ /sha kha ra dang sbrang rtsi dang / /chang rnying dag gam rgun chang ngam/ /rtsub pa'i skyo mar sbyar ba ni/ /dong gral la phud bcas blud/ /nas dang gro zan nyung shas la/ /rgya sran yu sha nyung

zad bcas/ /chu tshan kha dang tsha bar bcas/ /mar ni nyung zad bcas pa sbyin/ /la phug skam por sha'i khu/ /skam sa'i srog chags sha khu ni/ /star bud trig pa to la/ /tsha ba gsum dang se 'brur sbyar/ /bca' sga na le sham mang btab/ /rjen rngad

gtubs pa dang ldan zhing / /skyur rtsi chen po'i khu bas skyur/ /brngos shing khu ba med pa dang / /ka ra mar dang ka ri ra/ /la sogs yi ga 'byed pa dang / /lan tshwa brgyad po legs bro dang / /gtubs shing be reg ltar btsos pa/ /me drod tshod las sha sbyin zhing / /sbrang

chang nad med gyur pa blud/ /kha ra dang ni kha ru tsha/ /go snyod da trig star bu dang / /shing tsha sug smel na le sham/ /cha phyed yan lag brgyad par bshad/ /phal cher bad kan chang nad sel/ /bu ga'i rgyun sbyong drod skyed byed/ /rtsub dang dro bas mnye zhing dril/ /khrus dang kha

zas smyung byas dang / /'dod bcas bud med lhan cig gnas/ /mtshan nyid ma log rig pas bsten/ /phal cher bad kan las byung ba'i/ /chang nad myur du zhi bar byed/ /nad gzhi so so'i shas che las/ /las rnams gang dag bstan pa 'di/ /'di ni 'dus pa las gyur

pa/ /lhag ma bcu la'ang sbyar bar bya/ /shing tsha nA ga put+pa dang / /pi pi ling dang na le sham/ /go snyod pa ru sha ka dang / /'u su sug smel ma du ka /thang shing kar dkar dang bcas/ /ka pid ta yi khu ba btab/ /ga pur dri yis bsgos gyur pa/ /btung ba shin

tu yid 'ong ba/ /chang nad kun la blud gyur na/ /yi ga 'byed cing me drod skyed/ /chang gis yid ni ma dkrugs shing / /lus la gnod pa mi byed par/ /chang nad mi skyed de yi phyir/ /sems dgar 'gyur ba'i cho ga bya/ /chang nad la ni sbyang ba dang / /zhi ba'i las ni

byas gyur kyang / /gal te ma zhi bad kan zad/ /nyam chung yang ba nyid gyur na/ /rlung dang mkhris pa shas che zhing / /chang nad kyis zad 'o ma blud/ /so ga'i tsha bas gdungs pa yi/ /shing las char pa bab dang mtshungs/ /chang gis zad par byas pa'i mdangs/ /'o

mas myur du brtas byed de/ /mdangs dang yon tan kun mtshungs la/ /chang las go ni bzlog pa yin/ /'o mas nad ni bcom gyur cing / /stobs skyes nas ni 'o ma yi/ /cho ga chang yang bzlog byas te/ /rim gyis nyung zad nyung zad spyad/ /ci nas 'joms dang skams

gyur pa'i/ /bla brnan 'byung bar mi 'gyur bya/ /de gnyis la ni 'o ma mar/ /'jam rtsi btang bas brta ba bsngags/ /bsku dang dril phyis khrus dang ni/ /bza' btung rlung ni sel ba phan/ /rig par chang 'thung gang gis ni/ /nad ni 'byung bar

'gyur ma yin/ /de la rlung nad la phan chang / /phal cher zan chang bu ram chang / /mkhris pa rgun chang chu dang bcas/ /bad kan chang rnying sbrang rgun chang / /bad kan can gyis dang por btung / /mkhris pa can gyis zos rjes btung / /rlung can gyis ni bar du btung / /

nad gzhi mnyam pas ci dgar btung / /myos dang brgyal la phal cher ni/ /rlung dang mkhris pa sel las bsngags/ /thams cad la yang khyad par du/ /mkhris pa shas cher shes par bya/ /bsku byug bsil dang nor bu dang / /chus gtor rlung yab kyis g.yab

byed/ /kha ra rgun 'brum bu ram shing / /'bra go tang pal khu ba dang / /mngar ba'i sde bskol 'o ma khu/ /yu sha se 'brur bcas pa blud/ /sA lu rtsa snar drug cu pa/ /nas dang 'tsho byed sman mar dang / /dge ba chen po tig ta che/ /srang drug 'o ma tsi trar bcas/ /pi pi

ling dang brag zhun ni/ /bcud kyis len gyi cho ga sbyin/ /yang na 'bras bu gsum mar dang / /sbrang rtsi kha rar bcas pa sbyin/ /shugs drag pa la kha dang sna/ /bkag par gyur pa phan pa yin/ /yang na bud med nu zho ni/ /blud pa'am sna nas gtang bar bya/ /pad+ma'i

rtsa sdong pi pi ling / /a ru ra 'am gla sgang ngam/ /byi tsher sbrang rtsir sbyar ba sbyin/ /rgya shug tshi gu na le sham/ /nA ga ge sar pu shel tse/ /chu grang dang ni sbyar ba blud/ /skyu ru ra yi khu ba'am/ /a ru ra mar bskol ba'ang phan/ /ji skad bshad pa'i bya ba dag /nad

gzhi'i shas ni ji bzhin sbyar/ /las ni rnam lnga bya ba dang / /gtar gas khrag ni dbyung ba dang / /snying stobs che zhing shes dang ldan/ /yul la chags pa med pa phan/ /myos pa shin tu 'phel gyur dang / /brgyal bar gyur pa dag la ni/ /kun tu zhugs pa'i sman rnon

dang / /dug las byung ba dug sman gtang / /kun tu zhugs la rab rno ba'i/ /sna sman dang ni mig sman dang / /dud pas bud dang khab kyis ni/ /sen mo'i bar du gzugs par bya/ /skra 'bal bsregs dang sos btab dang / /sdig pa sha sbrang gtses pa dang / /mkhur bar tsha

dang skyur ba gzhug /kha sral phre'u bdar bar bya/ /'du shes rnyed cing ldang gyur nas/ /sgog skya'i khu ba blud par bya/ /tsha ba gsum ni lan tshwar bcas/ /bi dza pu ra'i ge sar sbyin/ /bu ga'i rgyun srang dag bya'i phyir/ /zas yang tsha dro rno ba sbyin/ /brjed pa dran phyir ngo

mtshar dang / /yid 'ong lta dang thos pa dang / /glu dang rol mo snyan pa yi/ /sgra snyan rtsol ba byed du gzhug /slon sman bkru sman btang dus rngub/ /khrag ni dbyung bar bya ba dag /rgyun mi chad pa spyad par bya/ /sems stor ba yi rgyu las ni/ /slar ldang 'brel pa'i

'jigs pa yis/ /de ni legs par bsrung bar bya/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /gso ba'i gnas kyi le'u bdun pa'o// //de nas gzhang 'brum gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /thun mong dus su sprin med par/ /gzhang 'brum

can rab nyam chung min/ /lto sbyangs kha zas yang la nyung / /rjes su mthun pa zos pa la/ /gtsang byas bde legs 'gyur bar byas/ /bshang dang gci bsal gnod pa med/ /khri'am spang leb mi gzhan gyi/ /pang par legs brten gnas nas ni/ /gan rkyal

'dug cing ro stod smad/ /drang 'dug nyi mar rkub bstan la/ /rked pa'i phyogs ni bstod par bya/ /de nas brla dang gnya' bar ni/ /bcings pa'i gos kyis bsdams nas su/ /gzung ste drang por 'dug pa la/ /nad g.yog gis ni bzung nas su/ /rkub ni zhun

mar dag gis bsku/ /de nas mar gyis bskus pa yi/ /cha spyad drang por de gzhug bya/ /rkub nas phyogs par rim gyis gzhug /de nas 'byung 'gyur mthong ba dang / /cha spyad chud par shes gyur nas/ /gzhang 'brum thur ma gos gsher bas/ /sman pas legs

par btsir nas ni/ /ji skad bshad pa'i cho ga yis/ /rlan can thal sman bsreg cig shos/ /thal sman rnon po'i me yis bsreg /stobs ldan mche ba bcad de bsreg /de nas cha spyad phyung nas ni/ /nad pa'i rkub dang ro smad bsku/ /snum gyi

nang du 'bying bar bya/ /de ltar zhag ni bdun bdun zhing / /re re nye bar bcos par bya/ /de nas rlung med khang par ni/ /bzhag la spyod pa bsten par bya/ /gzhang 'brum mang la dang por g.yas/ /de nas g.yon bsal de 'og rgyab/ /gzhang 'brum mang po bsregs

legs na/ /rlung ni bde bar rgyu byed cing / /kha zas 'dod cing me drod skyed/ /bder gnas stobs dang kha dog skyed/ /chu sog zer gyis btab pa la/ /ba spru ba dang ru rta dang / /gan+d+ha mung+ga a ka ru/ /sha tapuSh+pa thang shing rnams/ /zhib tu btags la lde gu yis/ /lte ba man

chad bsku bar bya/ /bshang dang gci 'gags gyur pa la/ /a lam bu sa ba ru na/ /ba spru gzem e raN+Da/ /a za gan+d+ha mu ra rnams/ /bskol ba dro 'jam byas pa yis/ /blugs dang 'bying ba'i sbyor ba bya/ /yang na 'o ma snum bcas pa/ /rlung sel sman bskol til

mar sbyar/ /zas ni bshang ba sla byed cing / /snum dang rlung 'joms drod skyed sbyin/ /de nas bsreg pa mi bya zhing / /bad kan rlung skyes phyir byung ba/ /'gags shing g.ya' la na zhing skrang / /gzhang 'brum bsku ba byas nas ni/ /bil ba'i rtsa ba tsi tra ka /thal sman

ru rta bskol ba yi/ /til mar blugs pa'am sbrul byil/ /rnga mo phag rgod zhag gis byug /de rjes rlan dugs kyis dugs bya/ /yang na gsher dugs spyad par bya/ /yang na zan ni til mar dang / /zhun mar snum can gyis dugs bya/ /ra sna ha gu sha dag dang / /

shi kru'i lo ma'i gong pos bya/ /arga'i rtsa ba shal ma li'i/ /lo ma mi skra sbrul lpags dang / /byi la'i pags pa mar sbyar ba'i/ /dud bdugs gzhang 'brum dag la phan/ /a shwa gan+d+ha bri ha ti/ /byi'u rug pi pi ling mar sbyar/ /ku ba kha bo'i sa bon dang / /

yal ga 'jam por rang skyur dang / /lde gu grib mar skams pa yi/ /reng bu rkub bcug gzhang 'brum 'jig /ku ba kha bo'i yal ga rtsa/ /thal sman bcas pa'i lde gu ni/ /'ol ma se dang su ra na/ /bum sha yi ni sa bon las/ /reng bur byas pa de dang 'dra/ /

su d+hA k+Shi ra yung lde gu/ /khyim bya'i rtug pa pi pi ling / /yung dang 'ol ma se dag ni/ /ba gcin btags pa de dang 'dra/ /snu ha'i 'o mar btags shu dag /ta ma la rus pri yang ku/ /rnam rgyal kar ka ta sring gi/ /ru rta spangs ma go bye dang / /shi kru la

phug sa bon dang / /nim pa ka ra bI ra'i lo/ /pi pi ling gi rtsa ba dang / /bil rtsa shing kun bcas pa'am/ /ru rta shri sha'i sa bon dang / /rgyam tsha bu ram pi pi ling / /arga snu ha'i 'o ma dang / /'bras bu gsum gyi lde gu bsku/ /arga'i 'o ma snu ha'i sdong / /

ku ba kha bo'i 'dab ma dang / /ka rany+dza dang ra thug gcin/ /lde gus gzhang 'brum sel mchog yin/ /'jam rtsi'i sman ni pi pi ling / /la sogs lde gu'ang bsngags pa yin/ /sman 'di nyid kyis til mar ni/ /bsku ba'i don du bskol bar bya/ /dud pas bdug

dang lde gu ni/ /bskus pas gzhang 'brum dag gi khrag /sogs pa 'dzag par byed 'gyur te/ /de nas bde ba nyid du 'gyur/ /skrang zhing 'dzag par ma gyur dang / /sra ba las ni khrag dbyung ste/ /bad pa gtsags bu khab kyi ni/ /pir gyis yang dang yang khrag dbyung / /bsil

drod snum dang rtsub pa yis/ /nad ni zhi bar ma gyur na/ /de phyir sman pas nad khrag nyid/ /dbyung ba la ni 'bad par bya/ /'o ma tsi tra ka'i rtsa phye/ /btab pa las byung dar ba dang / /blud cing de nyid kyi zas ni/ /byin na gzhang 'brum sel bar 'gyur/ /ka pi da ri'i rtsa ba'i phye/ /

dar ba gsar pa btab pa blud/ /zhu nas phan pa'i zas byin na/ /gzhang 'brum nad las thar bar 'gyur/ /gzhang skrang gzer bcas me drod 'bri/ /skran nad la ni phan pa'i sman/ /shing kun la sogs blud pa'am/ /bu ram a rur sbyar ba/ /byin la de rjes dar ba blud/ /

yang na a ru byi dang ga /dug mo nyung shun tsi tra ka /dar ba dang sbyar blud pa'am/ /dug mo nyung dang pi pi ling / /tsi tra ka dang su ra na/ /cha res bskyed pa chu dron blud/ /yang na tsha gsum lan tshwa gsum/ /shing kun star bu bcas chu blud/ /bil ba ka pid

thar bcas pa'am/ /bca' sga kha ru tsha ba bcas pa'am/ /go bye la la phud bcas pa'i/ /skyo ma de la blud par bya/ /yang na shing kun spa ma'i 'bras/ /tsi tra ka dang dar ba sbyar/ /pi lu'i 'bras bu dar bar bcas/ /zla ba gcig gi bar du sbyin/ /zas kyi sngon nyid re re

zhing / /ci 'dod par ni blud par bya/ /shin tu me drod chung ba la/ /dar ba kho na blud par bya/ /nyams stobs dus dang gnas shes pa'i/ /sman pa yis ni dar ba dag /zhag bdun nam ni zhag bcu'am/ /zla ba zla gcig bar du blud/ /yang na phyi dro 'bras yos kyi/ /

phye dang dar ba'i lde gu sbyin/ /dar ba zhu nas dar ba ni/ /thug pa rgyam tshar bcas pa blud/ /de rjes dar bar g.yos pa'i zan/ /snum can byin la dar ba blud/ /yu sha'am sha khu dar ba can/ /sA lu'i 'bras chen ran par bza'/ /rtsub dang mar phyed phyung ba dang / /gang

las mar ni ma phyung ba/ /dar ba nad dang me drod kyi/ /stobs las de ni rnam gsum sbyar/ /dar bas legs bcom gyur pa yis/ /gzhang 'brum slar ni 'byung mi 'gyur/ /de blugs gyur na rtsa yi ni/ /tshogs kyang skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rtsa sbubs dar bas dag

byas pas/ /lus zungs dngas mar gyur pa gang / /de ni nyams dga' mdog dang stobs/ /mchog tu rgyas par byed par 'gyur/ /rlung dang bad kan dag gi nad/ /brgya phrag dar ba rnying pas 'joms/ /gzhang 'brum gzhig par 'dod pa yis/ /kaN+Da ka ri'i lde gus bsku/ /

snod du dar ba gsar pa ni/ /nub gcig gzhag ste blud par bya/ /'u su zi ra go snyod dang / /pi pi ling gnyis ha pu sha /shu ti pi pi ling rtsa ba/ /la la phud dang tsi tra ka /ya ba na gi'i phye ma dang / /dar ba sbyar ba mar gyi snod/ /bzhag par gyur pa de las skyur/ /kha ba

dang ni rab skyur min/ /skyur dang kha ba bro bar ni/ /ldang ba'i dar rnying ci 'dod blud/ /drod skyed mdog bzang yi ga 'byed/ /rlung dang bad kan sel byed cing / /gzhang skrang na bas nyam thag pa/ /'joms shing stobs ni 'phel byed yin/ /kru trug tres kyi rtsa ba'i shu/ /

btags pa'i lde gus bum pa bsku/ /der ni 'o ma dang ba gzhag /smin pa'i gzhang 'brum sel byed blud/ /ga bra'i rtsa ba a ru ra/ /sle tres tsha ba lnga dag la'ang / /cho ga 'di nyid sbyar bar bya/ /pa ta ha ti pi pi ling / /shu ti tsha ba lnga g.yer ma/ /zi ra 'u su bil ba'i

rkang / /phye mar btags te sbyar bar bya/ /'bras bu skyur po mar til mar/ /yu sha sha khu thug stsogs bya/ /sman 'di nyid dang chu dang mar/ /bskol ba'ang drod skyed byed pa yin/ /rim 'di bshang bslab yin/ /rtug pa 'gags pa bshang bya ste/ /snum stsogs

zan dang ldan pa yi/ /chang dngas lan tshwa btab pa blud/ /yang na dar ba bu ram chang / /chang skyur chang dngas lan tshwar sbyar/ /zas mngar mar dang til mar gyis/ /brngos pa'i ka rany+dza'i lo ma/ /steng du phye btab byin gyur na/ /rlung gis rtug pa 'gags pa sel/ /bca'

sga bu ram bcas pa'am/ /ba ta bu ram mar lan tshwa/ /ba gcin la spangs a ru ra/ /bu ram bcas pa sbyin pa'ang rung / /a ru ra ni nyis brgya gcin/ /bre bcu drug tu gcin du'i bar/ /bskol ba sbrang rtsir bcas pa dag /gnyis gnyis zos nas bad kan gyis/ /

gzhang 'brum mdze dang 'or nad dang / /skran dang dmu rdzing gcin snyi 'bu/ /rmen bu shu bas khyab tsho ches/ /skya rbab rlung 'khyil 'joms par byed/ /a za sring gi rtsa ba yi/ /lde gu ra gcin sbyar 'thung zhing / /bu ram bar ta ka zos na/ /gzhang 'brum myur du 'jig par

'gyur/ /dur byid 'bras bu gsum khur sbyar/ /yang na dar ba a ru ra'am/ /pi pi ling bcas a ru ra/ /mar dang brngos pa'i bu ram bcas/ /yang na dur byid dan dar bcas/ /zos na bde bar 'byung bar byed/ /gzhang na gnas pa'i nad bsal na/ /

gzhang 'brum zad par byed par 'gyur/ /se 'bru'i khu ba zir dang / /bca' sga bu ram la la phud/ /pa ta dang sbyar dar ba ni/ /rlung gis rtug 'gags sel byed yin/ /rgyun chang yang na bu ram chang / /bca' sga kru trug tres dang bcas/ /

yang na chang ni pa ta dang / /spa 'bras kha ru tsha bcas blud/ /pi pi ling ni bcu bcus bskyed/ /til ni srang phyed btab gyur na/ /'o ma bcas 'thungs lus stobs dang / /me drod skyed par byed pa yin/ /byi tsher ba dang bil ba dang / /la la phud dang dong gra rnams/ /

re re dang sbyar pa tas kyang / /gzhang 'brum nad ni sel bar byad/ /chu bre drug cu rtsa bzhi'i nang / /a ru ra shun bre phyed dang / /skyu ru ra ni bre gang dang / /ka pid ta ni srang bcu dang / /pi sha la ni srang lnga dang / /seng phrom shing tsha na le sham/ /pi pi ling dang byi dang ga /

srang ni gnyis gnyis tshad byas bskol/ /bzhi cha lus btsags bu ram ni/ /srang ni nyis brgya bcug nas ni/ /da ta ki ni bre gang gzhug /mar gyi snod du bcug nas ni/ /zla phyed nas ni chang rnying 'thungs/ /me drod skyed cing gzhang 'brum dang / /pho nad skya rbab mdze dmu

rdzing / /dbyig dug rims skran mchin nad dang / /snying nad skran dang gcong chen dang / /slon dang srin bu'i nad rnams 'joms/ /chu bu bcu drug nang dan ti/ /rtsa bcu 'bras gsum tsi tra ka /srang re bskol ba bzhi cha lus/ /bu ram srang brgyad gzhug par bya/ /thams

cad snga ma dang 'dra las/ /rjes mthun cig shos sel bar byed/ /chu bre bcu drug nang dag tu/ /byi tshor ba ni bre gang dang / /dan ti pa ta tsi tra ka /rnam rgyal dong gra ba sha ka /skyu ru ra ni khyor re bskol/ /bzhi cha lus pa de'i nang du/ /ka ra dkar po srang brgyad gzhug /

gzhan dag snga ma bzhin du sbyar/ /rdza ma'i snod kyang pri yang ku/ /pi pi ling dang dbyi mo dang / /mar dang sbrang rtsi'i lde gus bsku/ /bde bar 'byung phyir zas kyi sngar/ /'bras bu skyur bcas mar blud pa'am/ /dbyi mo kru trug tras bskol mar/ /nas tshig

'khus thal bu ram bcas/ /pi pi ling gi rtsa bar bskol/ /bu ram dong gra nas tshag 'khus/ /pi pi ling rtsa pi pi ling / /se 'bru 'u su dag dang mar/ /bzhi 'gyur zho dang bskol bas ni/ /'phyen dang bshang gci 'gags pa sel/ /ba la sha yi thal ba'i chu/ /

sum 'gyur dang ni mar du bskol/ /dug mo nyung sogs phye ma btab/ /drod skyed gzhang 'brum 'joms pa'i mchog /tsha ba lnga dang ya ru ra/ /ya bak+Sha ra la la phud/ /lce myang tsha dang kha ru tsha/ /pa ta 'u su na le sham/ /bil bzho dang bcas pa'i mar/ /bskol

ba des ni chu so gzhang / /'khru zhing gzhang ni nyams pa dang / /gcin sri 'dzag pa sel bar byed/ /pa ta 'u su la la phud/ /tsha ba lnga dang gze ma dang / /bil bzho dang tsang gi ri/ /khu ba mar gyi bzhi 'gyur bskol/ /lto sbos gcin ni sri ba dang / /rtag tu 'khru

dang gzhang 'brum dang / /gzhang 'brum pho ba'i nad rnams dang / /bad kan rlung ni 'joms par byed/ /rma bya sreg pa 'ur bya yi/ /sha khu skyur po legs sbyar ba/ /khyim bya 'am bye'u'i sha khu/ /'phyen dang phyi sa 'gags la blud/ /rgya sne'u dur byid tsi tra ka /dan ti

pa ti am+li ka /la sogs lo ma gzhan yang ni/ /bad kan rlung 'joms tshod ma ni/ /yang zhing bshang ba sla bar byed/ /shing kun mar dang til mar brngos/ /zho yi spris mar bskol ba dang / /'u su dang ni tsha ba lnga/ /btags pa'i phye dang se 'bru'i bcud/ /'u su'i

'dab ma gzhon nu dang / /sge'u gsher gshags par gyur pa dang / /spos zhim legs bdug dri zhim byas/ /zir na le sham dang bcas/ /kha ru tsha ni shas cher bro/ /rlung shas cher rtsub drod chung la/ /sA lu tsa snar 'bras chan ni/ /ba lang go ta rnga mo ra'i/ /sha khu tshod ltar

g.yos pa dang / /mchog tu sha za rnams kyi sha /rtug skam can la sbyin par bya/ /chang dang bur chang ka ra'i chu/ /rgun chang dar ba rtsab mo dang / /chang rnying dang ni zho ga chu/ /yang na chu nyung bskol ba'am/ /'u su bca' sga bskol ba'am/ /kaN+Da ka ri bskol ba blud/ /

zas kyi thog ma'am bar dag tu/ /rlung gi rtug skam sel ba sbyin/ /rlung mkhris bad kan rtug skam rnams/ /bde bar 'byung zhing dri ma sbyang / /gzhang khar gzhang 'brum zhi 'gyur zhing / /me drod skyed par byed pa yin/ /rtug skam gyis ni gzir ba dang / /

gang yang shin tu khong rtsub dang / /rlung 'khyil gzer gyis nyen pa gang / /de la 'jam rtsi bya ba bsngags/ /pi pi ling dang po son cha/ /bil ba shu ti shing mngar dang / /shu dag ru rta kru trug tres/ /zur pa ma nu thang shing rnams/ /btags te til mar la btso

zhing / /'o ma til mar nyis 'gyur gzhug /gzhang 'brum rlung gis 'khyil ba la/ /'jam rtsi de ni mchog tu bsngags/ /gzhang 'byung ba dang gzer ba dang / /gcin sri 'khrog cing 'khru ba dang / /brla rked rgyab na nyam chung dang / /lto sbos chu sor brten pa

dang / /be snabs 'khru dang gzhang skrang dang / /rlung gis rtug ba 'gags pa dang / /gang zhig mang du 'byung 'dod pa/ /de dag 'jam rtsis sel bar byed/ /yang na mas gtong bkru sman drag /rtsa ba lnga pa 'o mar bcas/ /ba gcin til mar lan tshwa dang / /son

cha la sogs lde gu gtang / /de nas gzhang 'brum khrag 'dzag pa/ /rlung ngam bad kan dang 'brel ba/ /btags nas de la snum pa dang / /rtsub dang bsil ba sbyar bar bya/ /de la rlung dang rjes 'brel ba/ /bshang ba gnag cing sra la rtsub/ /rlung ni thur du 'byung mi

byed/ /rked pa brla dang gzhang kha gzer/ /rtsub pa'i rgyur ni gyur pa yin/ /bad kan rjes 'brel bshang ba sla/ /skya zhing ser la lci zhing snum/ /spyi bag gzhang kha tshor ba chung / /rgyu ni snum lci yin zhes bya/ /rang khrag mtshan nyid las kyang brtags/ /nad khrag

bsal bar bya ba dang / /nyams stobs ji bzhin smyung ba bya/ /ji srid nad khrag nag po byung / /de srid khrag 'dzag gcad mi bya/ /nad ni smin par bya phyir dang / /me drod bskyed par bya phyir dang / /khrag ni gcad par bya ba'i phyir/ /de phan chad ni kha ba blud/ /gang zhig nad

kyis stobs zad pa/ /khrag ni rlung gi shes che la/ /btung dang bsku dang 'jam rtsi ru/ /rig pas snum ni sbyar bar bya/ /gang zhig mkhris pa rgyas pa'i khrag /tsha ba'i dus su 'byung gyur pa/ /de ni gcig tu gcad bya yi/ /rlung dang bad kan las gyur min/ /bad kan bcas

khrag bca' sga dang / /dug mo nyung shun bskol ba blud/ /yang na rtsa mkhris bca' sga dang / /byi tsher tsan+dan dmar po'am/ /skyer pa'i shun pa pu shel tse/ /nim pa'am se 'bru'i shun bskol blud/ /dug mo nyung shun 'bras bu dang / /bong nga sbrang rtsi skyer khaN+Da 'am/ /

yang na a pa marga yi/ /lde gu 'bras kyi chu sbyar blud/ /dug mo nyung gi shun pa rlon/ /srang brgyad char chu nang du bskol/ /shun lpags khu ba btsags pa ru/ /btsod dang mo tsa pri yang+ku'i/ /khu ba srang re dag dang ni/ /dug mo nyung gi phye ma bcug /de nas gzar bur

chags pa yi/ /lde gu bskol ba sbyin bya zhing / /thug pa thug sla'i'o thug gam/ /ra 'am ba yi'o ma'am/ /me stobs ji bzhin blud par bya/ /lde gu 'dis ni khrag gi ni/ /tshad 'khru gzhang 'brum sel byed cing / /khrag mkhris nad ni stobs ldan pa/ /

steng ngam 'og nas 'byung ba sel/ /dug mo nyung shun srang brgyad cu/ /bre bcu drug bskol brgyad cha blud/ /de ni cha gsum skyer khaN+Da/ /seng phrom gnyis dang mon cha ra/ /se 'bru gzhon nu'i shun lpags dang / /bil ba gzhon nu gla sgang dang / /btsod dang da ta ka'i

'bras bu/ /srang ni re re btags pa yi/ /lde gur byas pa gzhug par bya/ /dug mo nyung shun srang bcu dang / /zhun mar srang ni nyi shu dang / /bu ram srang ni sum cu gzhug /bskol la gzar bur chags pa dang / /'bru nang zla phyed bcug ste bldag /gzhang

'brum kun dang pho ba'i nad/ /lud pa dbugs mi bde ba sel/ /seng phrom mo tsa ra sa til/ /btsod dang tsan+dan ut+pal/ /ra yi 'o ma sbyar ba blud/ /de nyid dang ni 'bas chen sbyin/ /shing mngar shun pa byi tsher ba/ /'o ma dUr ba pa ya s+ya/ /khar sbrang rtsir

bcas chu'am/ /ra yi 'o ma sbyar ba btung / /seng phrom btsod dang pu shel tse/ /sha ma li shun dug mo nyung / /tsan+dan shing mngar pu shel tse/ /nA ga ge sar 'bras chur blud/ /la la phud dang dug mo nyung / /pa ta bca' sga skyer khaN+Da'i/ /

phye ma gzer dang bcas la phan/ /khrag ni drag tu 'byung ba la/ /kaN+Da ka ri pa ya s+ya/ /gnyis dang bskol ba'i zhun mar bsngags/ /yang na seng phrom da ta ki/ /dug mo nyung shun 'bras bu dang / /ut+pal pad+ma ge sar mar/ /ya bak+Sha ra se 'bru'i bcud/ /kha

ra pad+ma ge sar dang / /mar sar bcas pa til sbyar ba'am/ /mar sar sbyar bas khrag las ni/ /gyur pa'i gzhang 'brum sel bar byed/ /ra yi mar sar 'o ma dang / /skam sa'i srog chags sha khrag dang / /rgya sne'i khu bar bcas sha khu/ /cung zad skyur dang skyur med pa/ /

sA lu tsa snar zho yi spri/ /drug cu pa dang chang sar dang / /chang gi dngas ma sar pa ni/ /khrag las gyur pa'i sman mchog yin/ /thug pa yu sha sha khu sogs/ /yang na kun dong 'ba' zhig gis/ /khrag rgyas gyur pa sel byed de/ /rlung las gyur pa'ang sbyar bar bya/ /

phal cher rlung shas che gzhang 'brum/ /khrag 'dzag drags las 'byung 'gyur bas/ /de bas lhag par de la ni/ /de bsal ba la 'bad par bya/ /khrag mkhris shas che bad kan dang / /rlung shas che bar mthong gyur na/ /de zhi bya phyir rnam kun du/ /bsil ba'i cho ga spyad

par bya/ /gal te des kyang ma zhi na/ /de tshe snum dang dro bas brta/ /sha khu dro 'jam zhun mar ni/ /thog ma nyid du sbyar bar bya/ /de la til mar mar dang ni/ /'o ma dro 'jam blud pa'ang bsngags/ /byi tsher ku sha 'jag ma'i rtswa/ /shal ma li yi me tog dang / /

u dum bA ra n+ya gro d+ha/ /a shwad+tha yi myu gu srang / /gnyis gnyis chu bre gsum dang ni/ /'o ma bre gang nang du bskol/ /'o ma lus nas tshigs ma btsags/ /khu ba der ni mon cha ra/ /btsod dang tsan+dan ut+pal/ /ut+pal pad+ma'i ge sar dang / /dug mo nyung gi sa bon

te/ /'di rnams btags pa'i lde gu bsres/ /'di ni spyi bag 'jam rtsir grags/ /mar dang sbrang rtsi kha rar bcas/ /mkhregs dang gzhang ni 'byung ba dang / /khrag 'dzag rims ni 'joms par byed/ /shing mngar pra puN+Da rI ka /de bzhin mon char la sogs/ /nyis

'gyur gyi ni 'o ma bskol/ /snum gyi 'jam rtsi gtang bar bya/ /shing mngar ut+pal seng phrom btsod/ /bil ba tsan+dan ba le ka /dbyi mo gla sgang bong nga dkar/ /ba ta ya bak+Sha ra mchog /skyer pa shing tsha tsi tra ka /dong ga spang spos thang shing

dang / /tsang gi ri yi khu ba mar/ /bskol ba des ni nyes gsum 'joms/ /gzhang 'brum tshad 'khru pho ba'i nad/ /skya rbab rims dang yi ga 'chus/ /gcin sri gzhang ni nyams pa dang / /chu so sbo dang mkhregs pa dang / /be snabs 'khru dang gzhang 'brum sel/ /

de blud sman gyi dam pa yin/ /rim gyis mngar zhing skyur ba dang / /grang dro la sogs rtag tu ni/ /me drod stobs las ltos te gtang / /gzhang 'brum nad las rgyal bar 'gyur/ /rtug skam gyis nyen til mar ni/ /grang ba'i rims la phan pas bsku/ /rlan dugs

snum can gyis dugs bya/ /de nas reng bu gzhug bya ste/ /sha ma dur byid dan da dang / /ni li ni 'bras pi pi ling / /po son cha lan tshwa nyes 'gyur/ /phyer btags bu ram ba gcin sbyar/ /mar bskus ring bu mthe bong tsam/ /bcug na rtug skam bde 'byung

byed/ /pi pi ling dang po son cha/ /khyim gyi dung pa nyungs kar bcas/ /'di dag nyid kyi phye ma ni/ /rkub nas gce 'us 'bud bar bya/ /de don med na rab rno snum/ /mas gtong bas ni btsir te gtang / /des ni gzhang rtsa drang por byed/ /bshang gci 'phyen ni bde bar

'byung / /slar yang 'gags na rlung 'joms pa'i/ /bkru sman snum can gtang bya zhing / /'jam rtsi dag ni gtang bar bya/ /rtsub pas rlung ni rtug skam 'gyur/ /lan tshwa gsum dang tsha ba gsum/ /'bras bu gsum dang dan ti dang / /bse shing 'bras bu tsi

tra ka /phye ma mar dang sbrang rtsis sbrus/ /rdza skyogs kha sbyar 'jim pas byugs/ /du ba nang 'khyims bsreg par bya/ /thal ba dge ba can zhes bya/ /mar dang lhan cig blud pa'am/ /'bras chan snum can dang sbyar zos/ /rtug skam 'gags

dang gzhang 'brum skran/ /skya rbab dmu rdzing bde gcin sri/ /snying nad 'or nad pho ba'i nad/ /gcin snyi mchin pa gzer dang smro/ /lud pa dbugs mi bde ba 'joms/ /gzhang 'brum la ni gang zhig bshad/ /de bzhin rtug skam dag la sbyar/ /ka rany+dza shun srang ni nyis

brgya bcu/ /bre bcu drug bskol bzhi cha lus pa der/ /bu ram srang ni brgyad cu tsha ba gsum/ /srang brgyad zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma gzhug /'di dag zla gcig bzhag ste langs gyur nas/ /tsha byas mchog tu drod skyed zas 'ju ba'i/ /nus skyed rlung bder rgyu byas gzhang

'brum dang / /mcher nad skran dang dmu rdzing sel bar byed/ /pu ti ka rany+dza ni srang brgyad dang / /tsi tra kaN+Da ka ri srang nyis brgya/ /chu bre bzhi bcu brgyad bskol bzhi cha lus/ /btsags te bsgrangs par bu ram srang brgyad gzhug/ /dri sna gsum dang tsha gsum se 'bru dang / /pi pi

ling gi rtsa ba sru sru'i rtsa/ /gu gul ma nu 'u su dbyi mong dang / /spa ma'i 'bras bu sge gsher star bu ni/ /srang re zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma bskol/ /bsgrangs nas sbrang rtsi srang ni nyi shu gzhug /sge gsher skyur rtsi chen po rgun 'brum rlon/ /bu ram shing gi khu ba btsir ba

bcas/ /mar gyi snod bcug zla gcig bzhag ste langs/ /skyur gyur 'di ni gzhang 'brum sog le ste/ /me drod skyed par byed pa'i mchog yin la/ /skya rbab dbyig drug dmu rdzing skran mcher pa/ /lto sbos rde'u chags gcin sri 'joms par byed/ /pi lu'i khu ba ras

btsags bre bcu drug /mar gyi snod kyi nang du bcug nas ni/ /da ta ki dang rgun 'bru 'bra go dang / /skyu ru ra yi 'bras bu srang gnyis gnyis/ /pa ta bong nga dkar po byi tsher ba/ /star bu tsha ba gsum dang shing tsha dang / /sug smel 'u su spra ki ka ko la/ /li shi pi pi ling rtsa byi

dang ga /kru trug tres srang re re bu ram ni/ /srang brgyad rlung med gnas su zla phyed gzhag /des ni gzhang 'brum skran bcas zhi byed cing / /me yi stobs ni myur du skyed par byed/ /yang na rtsa ba bcu pa dur byid dang / /pa ta ar ka gnyis dang bong nga dkar/ /kad pa la

rnams re re srang bcu bcu/ /snga ma bzhin du bsregs pa'i thal ba ni/ /chu bre bcu drug nang du bskol nas ni/ /bzhi cha lus par bu ram srang brgya dang / /tsha ba gsum dang dbyi mong a ru ra/ /srang lnga tsi tra ka ni srang gnyis dang / /ya bak+Sha ra srang gnyis bcug ste
