bskol/ /gzar bur chags pa'i bu ram lde gu yis/ /skran dang mcher nang gzhang 'brum mdze nad dang / /gcin nad me drod nyams pa 'joms par byed/ /tsi tra ka yi rtsa ba srang lnga bcu/ /chu srang bcu drug bskol la brgyad cha lus/ /der ni bu ram rnying pa srang brgya

gzhug /slar bskol ska bar gyur pa de nang du/ /tsha ba gsum dang shu ti a ru ra/ /ru rta gla sgang shing tsha byi dang ga /tsi tra ka dang sug smel phyer btags bsres/ /des ni gzhang 'brum mdze dang skran dang ni/ /mcher pa dmu rdzing nad ni 'joms byed cing / /rtag tu

bsten na me drod skyed par byed/ /tsha ba gsum dang til dang 'bras bu gsum/ /byi dang ga dang go bye tsi tra ka /bu ram ri lur byas bsten gzhang 'brum dang / /pags pa'i nad ni sel bar byed pa yin/ /sor na yi rtsa ba kha sbyar bcug /'jim pas bskus te cho ga bzhin

bsregs pa/ /lan tshwa til mar bcas pa zos gyur na/ /gzhang 'brum sel bar byed pa'i dam pa yin/ /na le sham dang pi pi ling dong gra/ /kru trug tres ni cha re bskyed pa dang / /tsi tra bzhi 'gyur su ra na dang sbyar/ /bu ram ri lus gzhang 'brum gcod par byed/ /so

ra na yi bcu drug phyer btags shing / /tsi tra ka ni de yi cha phyed bya/ /bca' sga cha gnyis na le sham cha gcig /bu ram ri lur byas pas gzhang 'brum sel/ /a ru ra dang dong gra pi pi ling / /ka rany+dza dang tsi tra byi dang ga/ /ka ra mnyam phye rgod ma'i kha lta bu/ /zas lci mang du

zos kyang 'ju bar byed/ /dug mo nyung laM ga li pi pi ling / /tsi tra ka dang a ba marga yi/ /sa bon rtsa mkhris rgyam tsha bu ram rnams/ /ri lur byas pas gzhang 'brum sel bar byed/ /gal te gzhang 'brum gzhig par 'dod na ni/ /rgyam tsha tsi tra ka

dang dug mo nyung / /tsi li bil ba nim par bcas pa dag /btags pa'i phye ma dar bar bcas pa btung / /gzhang 'brum skam la ba la ta ka ste/ /gsher la dug mo nyung shun sman mchog yin/ /kun la dus kun du ni dar rnying mchog /stobs skyed byed cing nad rnams

'joms pa yin/ /rtug pa 'gags pa bsal bar bya ba'i phyir/ /rlung sel me drod skyed par byed pa yi/ /bza' dang btung ba gang yin de bsten bya/ /de las go zlog pa ni spang bar bya/ /gzhang 'brum tshad 'khru pho ba'i nad rnams ni/ /phal cher phan tshun rgyur gyur

yin pas na/ /me drod chung na skye'i che na min/ /de bas de la mchog tu me drod bsrung / /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /gso ba'i gnas kyi le'u brgyad pa'o// //de nas 'khru ba gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /'khru ba phal cher

ma zhu ba'i/ /gnas rten me drod nyams pa la/ /'byung bas de'i phyir rlung gyur la'ang / /dang po smyung ba byas pa phan/ /gzer dbo bad kan gyis nyam thag /'khru ba can ni slon du gzhug /nad ni gang zhig sogs pa dag /ma smin zas dang 'dres gyur na/ /'khru ba dag

ni 'byung gyur te/ /shin tu slongs te 'byung gyur dang / /rang nyid 'khru byed de la ni/ /btang snyoms gzhag pa de nyid sman/ /ma zhu 'khrul dang por ni/ /gcod pa'i sman ni gtang mi bya/ /gal te 'gags byed lto sbo lci/ /gzer dang tshor ba chung gyur la/ /a

ru btang na nad 'khyil ba/ /'byin pas srog ni ster byed yin/ /nad tshabs 'bring la khyad par du/ /bu ti ka dang pi pi ling / /bca' sga shu dag a ru ra/ /'u su legs par bskol ba blud/ /yang na bil ba 'u su dang / /gla sgang dong gra ba le ka /pa tha shu dag kha ru tsha/ /

dong ga byi dang a ru ra/ /bca' sga gla sgang bong nga dkar/ /bil ba shing kun dug mo nyung / /nad gzhi chung ba'i tshad 'khrul/ /smyung ba byas pa bsngags pa yin/ /yang na shu dag bong nga dkar/ /gla sgang par pa ta bskol pa 'am/ /ba le ka dang dong gra ni/ /bskol

ba'i chu dag blud par bya/ /bkres shing nyam chung zas dus su/ /kha zas yang ba rig pas sbyin/ /des de'i kha zas yi gar 'ong / /me drod lus stobs skyed par byed/ /dar ba'am rang skyur dag gam ni/ /nas thug dag gi skyo ma'am/ /chang ngam rgun chang dag gi ni/ /

btung ba gang 'os nyer spyad bya/ /kha zas byin pa'i 'og tu ni/ /bil ba gzhon nu zur ba dkar/ /'u su shing kun nga trig se'u/ /zi ra spa 'bras pa la sha /la la phud dang kha ru tsha/ /rgyam tsha rtsa ba chung ngu lnga/ /tsha ba lnga dang pa tha ste/ /smin gcod drod ni skyed par byed/ /

bad kan mkhris pa'i shas che la/ /sa la par+Ni ba la dang / /bil ba kr-iSh+Na par+Ni dang / /se 'bru bskol ba'i thug pa phan/ /pi pi ling rtsa a ru ra/ /thug pas rlung ni bder rgyu byed/ /nad gzhi mang la 'gags pa dang / /me drod che bar gang zhig 'khru/ /pi pi ling dang 'bras

bu gsum/ /byi dang ga bskol bkru sman gtang / /sbyangs byas nas ni thug pa dag /rlung 'joms me drod skyed pa blud/ /gang zhig ma zhu smin gyur dang / /me drod skyes nas 'khru 'gyur zhing / /'byar bag lbum can nad bcas pa/ /sri shing yang dang yang du ni/ /yang

yang 'khru zhing bshang chung ba'am/ /bshang ba ma 'dres mkhregs bcas la/ /zho dang 'o ma mar til mar/ /bca' sga bu ram bcas pa blud/ /yang na rgya shug 'bras bu spangs/ /bu ram til mar ldan pa sbyin/ /bshang bsri la phan tshod ma/ /sdum mang de bzhin sha khu

dang / /zho dang se 'bru g.yos pa dang / /sA lu'i 'bras chen ma sha til/ /mung+ga legs par g.yos pa'i zas/ /de ni bkres par gyur tshe sbyin/ /zur ba'i rtsa ba ka pi ta/ /pa ta swa ti ka'i tshod ma/ /shu sha la la phud dang ni/ /kar ka ru dang sring gi ni/ /yang na

tsir bi ta yang rung / /u po ta ka dzi ban ti/ /ba gu rtse dang rgya sne'u dang / /lcam pa'am yang na e raN dang / /lo ni ka yi khu ba dang / /rus sbal bye'u lo ba ka /rma bya sreg pa khyim bya yi/ /sha khu dang yang sbyin par bya/ /bil ba gla sgang ba ru ra/ /bca'

sga da ta ka'i me tog /dar ba bskol ba'i nas thug gam/ /zho dang sbyar bas 'khru ba sel/ /ka pid ta dang ka tsu ra/ /ga bra'i rtsa ba yu ti dang / /n+ya gro d+ha dang rdo dreg dang / /se 'bru so mar bal dang / /shal ma li yi lo ma phan/ /bil ba gzhon nu'i lde gu dang / /til btags lde gu'ang de dang mnyam/ /

zho yi spris skyur snum bcas dang / /sbyar dug mkhregs pa 'joms par byed/ /'u su zi ra na le sham/ /da trig zur pa kha ru tsha/ /se 'bru pa ta da ta ki/ /'bras gsum cha lnga ka pi/ /nas tshig 'khus thal la la phud/ /a mra 'dzam bu'i 'bras bu'i rkang / /bil ba

drug 'gyur lde gur btags/ /zho dang bu ram mung+ga'i khu/ /til mar mar dang g.yos pa dag /gzhan gyis mi thub sbyar thug 'di/ /drod skyed smin byed 'khru ba gcod/ /yi ga 'byed cing mkhregs pa sel/ /rgya shug bil ba gzhon nu yi/ /lde gu 'bras dang nas dang

ni/ /mud ga ma sha til rnams dang / /'bru yi yu shar rnam par btags/ /bshang ba zad cing kha skam la/ /zho dang se 'bru'i khu ba dang / /mar dang til mar lhan cig brngos/ /'bras chan de dang sbyar ba ni/ /bshang zad kha ni skam la sbyin/ /yang na zho spris snum

gnyis brngos/ /bu ram bca' sgar bcas pa sbyin/ /yang na chang ni snum gnyis brngos/ /tshod ma'i don du sbyin pa'am/ /'bras bu skyur po snum gnyis brngos/ /sgog pa las byas yu sha'am/ /snum gnyis dang brngos phye zan ni/ /tsha ba gsum gyi phye btab sbyin/ /

de bzhin ma sha legs bcos pa/ /mar gyi snying po blud pa'am/ /ra thug lug thug dag gi sha /btsos te btsags pa'i khu ba dang / /se 'bru'i khu ba'i chu dang ni/ /'u su dong gra snum bcas bskol/ /sA lu rtsa snar bcas pa ni/ /za zhing de nyid 'thungs pa/

yis/ /rtug pa zad pa las byung ba'i/ /nad las myur du thar bar 'gyur/ /bu ram til mar bil ba gzhon/ /pi pi ling dang bca' sga yi/ /lde gus rlung gis gnod gyur pa'i/ /gzer thabs mkhregs dang bcas pa sel/ /seng phrom shun lpags da ta ka'i/ /

me tog rgya shug 'dab ma rnams/ /zho spris sbrang rtsi ka pi ta'i/ /khu bar sbyar ba blud na phan/ /rlung gis rtug 'gags shas cher ni/ /na zhing mkhregs par byed pa dang / /be snabs khrag bcas skom gdungs la/ /'o ma tshim par blud na phan/ /til mar mar gyi steng du ni/ /

bzhos ma thag pa'i 'o ma blud/ /yang na a raN+Da yi rtsa'am/ /bil ba gzhon nu bskol ba blud/ /gla sgang nyi shu 'o ma yi/ /sum 'gyur gyi ni chu bskol ba/ /'khru ba gzer bcas sel bar byed/ /pi pi ling dang na le sham/ /zhib du btags pa'i phye dang sbyin/ /

des ni yun ring gnas pa yi/ /mkhregs pa sel bar byed par 'gyur/ /ma zhu med cing gzer gyis nyen/ /smyung ba la sogs pas nyams smad/ /khong rtsub me drod brtags nas ni/ /mar ni thal sman rno bcas sbyin/ /yang na rtsa ba bcu bskol chu/ /zho dang chang gi dngas mar

bskol/ /lce myang tsha dang tsha ba lnga/ /til mar 'phral du nad 'joms byed/ /bca' sga srang drug pi pi ling / /mU la kru trug tres rgyam tsha/ /srang gnyis til mar bre gang dang / /zho dang bskol ba'i til mar ni/ /'khru ba'i nad ni sel byed yin/ /sha dang 'o ma

mar phyogs gcig /btung dang 'jam rtsi bsku ba ru/ /til mar 'ba' zhig phyogs gcig sbyar/ /bshang mkhregs gzer ni 'joms byed yin/ /de ni rlung sel mchog yin la/ /rlung 'khrugs ma gtogs gzer mi 'byung / /khams gzhan 'joms pas

'bar gyur pa/ /rlung ni rang gnas brten khyab byed/ /me drod chung la til mar ni/ /sbyar bas bde bar byed pa'i mchog /til mar bcas pa rlung gnas su/ /mkhregs pa gnas par mi 'gyur ro/ /dri ma zad cing nad gzhan rang gi ni/ /gnas las 'phos pas rlung ni stobs

che ba/ /khong pa gzer zhing mkhregs par byed pa la/ /phyi nang til mar ma btang su zhig 'tsho/ /gzhang na 'byung bar gyur pa la/ /'o mar bskol ba'i mar rgya shug /skyur po tsang gi ri'i khu ba/ /zho dang dong grar btags pa blud/ /sgyur ba de nyid bcug pa dang / /

'u su na le sham zir/ /kha ru tsha dang tsha ba lnga/ /se 'bru dag dang sbyar ba ni/ /zhib tu btags pa'i lde gu phan/ /rtsa ba bcu pa bskol ba yi/ /zur ba shu ti ru rta'am/ /shu dag tsi tra ka bskol ba'i/ /snum gyi 'jam rtsi gtang bar bya/ /mkhregs dang gzhang ni 'byung ba dang / /gcin

sri rked pa na ba dang / /mngar dang skyur bar bskol ba yi/ /mar ram til mar 'jam rtsi gtang / /gzhang 'byung gzhug pa dka' ba la/ /bsku zhing dugs ni 'jam byas gzhug /dbus su phug pa'i pags pa ni/ /'ur mthil 'ching bdag kyang bya/ /rtsa ba lnga ni chen

po yi/ /khu ba dang ni 'o mar bskol/ /byi ba rgyu ma bton pas kyang / /rlung 'joms lde gu lta bur bya/ /til mar bskol gzhang 'byung ba la/ /btung dang bsku bas de gso bya/ /mkhris pa ma zhu rno dang dro/ /spangs la sngon bzhin smyung ba bya/ /skom bcas yan lag drug

pa'i chu/ /rtswa mkhris thal tres bcas pa blud/ /bkres na kha zas thug pa sogs/ /bri ha ti sogs nye'u shing pa/ /ba la rnam gnyis par+Ni gnyis/ /bskol ba drod skyed byed pa phan/ /blud kyang rjes su 'brel gyur na/ /dug mo nyung shun 'bras bu dang / /bong nga dkar po

bcas btags phye/ /sbrang rtsi bsres pa 'bras chu blud/ /ba tha dug mo nyung shun 'bras/ /skyer pa pi pi ling rtsa'am/ /bong nga bil ba dug mo nyung / /gla sgang ba le ka bskol ba'am/ /yang na bong nga dkar mur ba/ /skyer pa dbul rdo dug mo nyung / /bong nga bca' sga dug mo nyung / /gla

sgang kad pal sbrang rtsir bcas/ /dug mo nyung gi sa bon ni/ /srang gcig bskol ba'i khu ba blud/ /gang zhig sha khu bcas sbyar za/ /mkhris bcas lto ba'i nad sel 'gyur/ /de bzhin gla sgang bskol ba'i khu/ /sbrang rtsir sbyar ba blud pas phan/ /shal ma li yi 'dab ma'i rtsa/ /bskol ba'i

khu ba bsgrangs pa'am/ /rtsa mkhris gla sgang dug mo nyung / /skyer khaN+Da dang bcas pa'am/ /yang na skyer pa ba le ka /bil ba'i rkang dang byi tsher ba/ /til dang seng phrom mon cha ra/ /btsod dang pad+ma ut+pal/ /dong gra da ta ka'i me tog /se 'bru'i shun pa ut+pal bcas/ /

tshigs bcad phyed kyis bshad sbyor ba/ /sbrang rtsir bcas pa 'bras chu blud/ /skyer pa seng phrom dug mo nyung / /sug smel bskol bas smin 'khru sel/ /seng phrom dang ni a brta/ /pri yang ku sogs sde tshan dang / /bskol ba so sor blud de bzhin/ /pu tse shel dang shing

mngar dang / /se 'bru'i myu gu pri yang ku/ /zho dang 'u su'i 'bras bur bcas/ /thug pa lde gus sbyar dugs bya/ /de bzhin bil ba ka pid tha/ /a mra 'dam bu'i rkang las sbyar/ /smin pa'i khu bar ra'i 'o ma/ /mchog tu phan te des kyang ni/ /stobs ldan nad gzhi che ba'i

phyir/ /ma zhin ni bkru sman gtang / /rim gyis bshad pa khrag dag tu/ /gang zhig 'khru bar gyur pa la'ang / /pa la sha yi 'bras bu yi/ /khu ba dang sbyar 'o ma blud/ /de nas 'o ma dro 'jam tsam/ /nyams stobs ji bzhin blud par bya/ /des ni dri ma bsal bas na/ /

lto yi nad ni zhi bar 'gyur/ /kyi lce ba yi sbyang ba yang / /pa la sha ltar sbyor ba bya/ /thug sogs rim pa byas kyang ni/ /gal te gzer ni ma zhi na/ /nyes bsal de la me drod stobs/ /las dpags 'jam rtsi myur du gtang / /sha ta puSh+pa nye shing dang / /bil ba dang ni shing

mngar dag /mar 'o til mar bzhi char bcas/ /bskol ba 'jam rtsi'i sman mar yin/ /des ni tsha 'khru ma zhi na/ /spyi bag 'jam rtsi mchog tu phan/ /shal ma li yi lo ma rlon/ /ku sha rlon pas dkris nas ni/ /sa nag lde gu bskus nas su/ /lci ba skam po'i me nang

bsregs/ /'jim pa lus pa de bkog ste/ /gong po de las srang gcig tsam/ /'o ma bre gang nang du mnye/ /btsags la dngas mar rgya spos dang / /shing mngar sbrang rtsi lde gu mar/ /til mar ldan pas 'jam rtsi bya/ /khrus byas 'o ma 'bras chan sbyin/ /yang na skam sa'i sha khu sbyin/ /

mkhris pa'i tshad 'khru rims dang 'or nad skran/ /rlung nad khrag dang pho ba'i nad sel zhing / /'di dag bkru sman mas gtong drag po yi/ /sbyor byas drag tu 'byung ba'ang myur zhi byed/ /dug mo nyung ni bu ram phran/ /ltar bskol dug mo nyung sogs sde/ /a

brta sogs sbrang rtsir bcas/ /lde gus 'khru ba thams cad sel/ /smin cing nad med me drod che/ /khrag dang bcas pa ring nas 'khru/ /sna tshogs mdog tu 'khru 'gyur ba/ /sman thum btsos pa sbyar bar bya/ /kad pha la yi shun lde gu/ /bil ba'i lo mas dkris

nas ni/ /'jim pas bskus te me nang bsregs/ /khu ba btsir la bsgrangs pa ni/ /sbrang rtsi'am kha rar bcas pa ru/ /'khru ba can la ci rigs blud/ /de bzhin 'o ma can shing kun/ /de yi myu gu las kyang bya/ /'khri shing shun pa mar dang bcas/ /bskol ba'i

rlangs pas btsos pa ni/ /sbrang rtsi bcas pa tsha 'khru ba/ /stobs can drag tu 'byung ba'ang sel/ /mkhris pa'i 'khru ba can gyis ni/ /mkhris pa skyed byed gang bsten pa/ /de yis mkhris pa 'khrugs gyur nas/ /khrag gi tshad 'khru skom dad rims/ /'debs shing

gzhang kha mi bzad 'drul/ /pad+ma ut+pal sa mang ga /mon cha ras bskol ba yi/ /ra yi 'o ma de la phan/ /thal tres shing mngar seng phrom mam/ /n+ya gro d+ha sogs myu gu dang / /sbrang rtsi kha rar bcas pa ni/ /btung ba'am gzhang khar blugs pas phan/ /de bzhin sha

khu sogs skyon med/ /mar bcas bsgrangs pa'i zas skom phan/ /tang pal 'bras bu'i khu ba ni/ /cung zad skyur zhing ka rar bcas/ /ra yi 'o ma chu phyed dang / /ut+pal dong gra ba le ka / kr-iSh+Na par+Ni khu bar bcas/ /thug pas khrag gi tshad 'khru sel/ /zas kyi sngon du mar

sar ni/ /sbrang rtsi kha rar sbyar ba bldag /khrag 'khru tshabs che la ra'am/ /ri dgas khrag gi mar brngos sbyin/ /'o ma dang bza' 'o ma btung / /'o ma bsrubs mar zhag gsum bsten/ /yang na gong ma sreg gi ni/ /sha khu dang zos nad med 'gyur/ /nye shing btags pa

'o ma dang / /lhan cig blud cing 'o mar bza'/ /yang na de dang bskol ba yi/ /mar gyis tshad 'khru myur du sel/ /rgya skyegs bca' sga pi pi ling / /skyer pa'i shun pa pu tse shel/ /dug mo nyung dang bcas bskol mar/ /thug sla thug pa dang sbyar bas/ /nad gzhi gsum las

byung ba yi/ /mi zad 'khru ba'ang myur du sel/ /sa nag dung dang shing mngar dang / /sbrang rtsir khrag 'bras chu blud/ /khrag gis 'khru ba sel bar byed/ /pri yang ku dang sbrang rtsi'ang phan/ /til nag btags pa'i lde gu dang / /sha khar ni cha lnga ni/ /ra yi 'o ma sbyar ba blud/ /

'phral du khrag tu 'khru ba sel/ /kha ra sbrang rtsi tsan+dan bcas/ /'bras kyi chu dang blud na ni/ /khong tsha skom dang gcin nad dang / /khrag tu 'khru las thar bar 'gyur/ /gzhang kha tsha zhing 'drul ba la/ /bsil ba'i sman gyis blugs shing bsku/ /gang tshe yang dang yang du

'khru/ /khrag nyung gzer dang bcas par 'khru/ /rlung gis gags ni byas gyur pas/ /skabs 'byung ba'am mi 'byung byed/ /de tshe de la spyi bag ni/ /'jam rtsi sngar bshad gtang bar bya/ /kar bu dar shing sha pa/ /la sogs lo ma cham chom brdungs/ /nas dang bskol ba'i

khu ba de/ /mar dang 'o ma bcas par bskol/ /spyi bag 'jam rtsi btang na ni/ /be+e snabs 'khru dang gzhang 'byung dang / /mkhregs pa'i nad rnams sel byed cing / /skem po stobs ni skyed par byed/ /stag tsher ba dang bskol ba yi/ /mar gyi 'jam rtsi gtang bar

bya/ /dang por bshang ba khrag 'dres 'byung / /yang na phyis ni 'khru gyur pa/ /de la nye shing bskol ba'i mar/ /lde gu'i don du sbyar bar bya/ /kha ra cha phyed dang sbyar la/ /sbrang rtsi bzhi cha bcug pa yi/ /mar sar phan pa'i zas zos na/ /nad de myur du sel bar 'gyur/ /

u dum wA ra n+ya gro d+ha/ /a shwad+tha yi myu gu ni/ /brdungs te zhag gcig chu nang sbangs/ /mnyes te btsags par mar bskol la/ /kha ra de yi phyed btab cing / /sbrang rtsi bzhi cha btab ste blud/ /gang zhig khrag ni thur du'am/ /gyen du 'byung bar byed la sbyin/ /bad kan

'khru ba rlung bshad pa'i/ /ma zhu smin bya mchog tu bya/ /rjes su 'brel pa de la ni/ /bil ba gzhon nu gla sgang dang / /a ru ra dang bca' sga bskol/ /smin cing me drod skyed pa blud/ /shu dag dong gra byi dang ga /bu ti ka dang thang shing dang / /pi pi ling

gnyis kru trug tres/ /pi pi ling gi rtsa ba'am/ /pa ta tsi tra dug mo nyung / /shu dag pi pi ling rtsa ba/ /pu tse shel dang a ru ra/ /bskol ba'am yang na btags pa sbyin/ /bad kan tshad par 'khru sman blud/ /kha ru tsha dang tsha ba gsum/ /shu dag shing kun bong nga

dkar/ /a ru ra yi chu tshan bcas/ /bad kan 'khru bas nyen la blud/ /ka pid ta yi rkang dang ni/ /tsha gsum sbrang rtsi sha kha ra'am/ /kad pha la dang sbrang rtsir bcas/ /lto yi nad ni sel byed yin/ /pi pi ling dang sbrang rtsir bcas/ /tsi tra ka dang dar bar bcas/ /bil ba

gzhon nu byin na yang / /'khru ba'i nad ni sel bar byed/ /pa ta gla sgang mon cha ra/ /bil ba dong gra da ta ka'am/ /bu ram dar bar bcas pa yis/ /'khru ba shin tu gso dka' 'ang sel/ /pi pi ling rtsal la phud/ /dri bzang bzhi dang dong gra dang / /na le sham

dang kru trug tres/ /'u su zi ra ba le ka /kha ru tsha rnams cha mnyam dang / /da trig dang ni da ta ki /bil ba dang ni pi pi ling / /se 'bru dang ni la la phud/ /sum 'gyur ka ra drug 'gyur dang / /ka pid ta ni brgyad 'gyur byas/ /phye mas tshad 'khru pho ba'i nad/ /zad byed skran

dang lkog ma'i nad/ /lud pa dbugs mi bde drod nyams/ /gzhang 'brum cham pa yi ga 'chus sel/ /smig rkang dang ni dri sna bzhi/ /zho ni gnyis gnyis la la phud/ /'u su zi ra zho bzhi bzhi/ /pi pi ling rtsa tsha ba gsum/ /srang ni re re se 'bru dang / /kha ra srang brgyad

gcig sbyar 'di/ /phye ma se 'bru brgyad pa yin/ /yon tan gong ma dag dang 'dra/ /kha zas rlung gis 'khru bar bshad/ /sbyar thug la sogs ci rigs sbyin/ /na le sham dang byi dang ga /ka pid ta dang dong grar bcas/ /tsang gi ri dang rgya shug skyur/ /sbyar thug bad kan 'khru

ba sel/ /bad kan zad la sngar bshad pa'i/ /rgya skyegs la sogs srang drug pa/ /nas thug dang ni bsres pa yi/ /mar ni rnying pa sbyin par bya/ /rlung dang bad kan gyis bkag pa/ /bad kan shas cher 'khru ba'am/ /gzer zhing mkhregs par byed pa la/ /spyi bag

'jam rtsi bsngags pa yin/ /shu dag bil ba pi pi ling / /ru rta shu ti rgyam tshar bcas/ /bil ba'i mar ram til mar ni/ /shu dag sogs dang bskol ba gtang / /bad kan rlung gis shas cher gzer/ /cung zad dro ba'i 'jam rtsi gtang / /bad kan zad cing yun ring

du/ /'khru zhing nyam chung gyur pa na/ /rlung ni nges par stobs che ba/ /rang gi gnas na brten de skye/ /de stobs che bas 'phral gsod byed/ /de phyir de ni myur du gso/ /rlung gi rjes la mkhris pa ste/ /mkhris pa'i rjes la bad kan ni/ /gso ba'am gsum las dang

po ni/ /gang zhig shas cher gyur pa gso/ /'jigs dang mya ngan dag las kyang / /myur du 'khrugs pas de phyir der/ /rlung bsal ba yi gso ba dang / /dbugs dbyung ba dang dga' bar bya/ /gang zhig gcin med phyi sa dang / /'phyen ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / /

me drod che zhing lto ba yang / /de yi khong nad zhi ba yin/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /gso ba'i gnas las le'u dgu pa'o// //de nas pho ba'i nad gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /pho ba la ni brten pa'i nad/ /ma zhu ba ltar gso bar

bya/ /'khru bar bshad pa'i cho ga yis/ /de yi ma zhu smin par bya/ /zas kyi dus su nad dug sogs/ /tsha ba lnga sogs ldan pa dang / /tsha bro yang ba'i kha zas dang / /gzhan yang drod skyed sbyor ba sbyin/ /ma zhur thug pa bong nga dkar/ /bca' sga skyur dang bcas pa sbyin/ /

btung bar 'khru ba las bshad pa'i/ /chu dang dar ba chang sogs blud/ /pho ba'i nad la dar ba ni/ /drod skyed 'khru gcod yang bas na/ /phan te zhu rjes mngar ba'i phyir/ /mkhris pa skyed par mi byed do/ /bska zhing dro la sbyong byed dang / /rtsub cing bad kan la yang phan/ /

mngar skyur kha bas rlung la phan/ /bsrubs ma thag tu tsha mi skyed/ /skyur ba bzhi po bre gang dang / /tsha ba gsum ni srang gsum dang / /rgya tsha srang bzhi kha ra ni/ /srang brgyad phye mar byas pa ni/ /tshod ma sran tshod btung ba sogs/ /btung ngo drug sogs la yang

gdab/ /ma zhu lud pa dbugs mi bde/ /yi ga 'chus dang skran mchin pa/ /pho ba snying nad skya rbab 'joms/ /dong gra gla sgang bong nga dkar/ /bskol ba ma zhu sel byed blud/ /de yi lde gu chu tshan nam/ /bca' sga'am a ru ra bcas blud/ /shu dag la sogs rgyam

tshar bcas/ /yang na chang dang sbyar ba blud/ /bshang ba ma smin 'khru bcas la/ /se 'bru'i chu dang bcas pa yi/ /bil ba dong gra tsi tra ka /kha ru tsha ni btab pa sbyin/ /bad kan rlung gyur be snabs can/ /khong pa gzer la dug mo nyung / /shing kun

bong nga kha ru tsha/ /shu dag a ru ra chu dron/ /skyugs pa'i rjes la gzer zhing bsgongs/ /a ru ra dang kha ru tsha/ /zi ra na le sham bcas phye/ /chu dron dang ni bcas pa blud/ /dong gra pa ta pi pi ling / /thal tres bri ha ti gnyis dang / /dug mo nyung dang tsi tra ka /tsha ba rnam lnga thal sman gnyis/ /

phyer btags chang zho de'i dngas ma/ /chu dron rang skyur dag la blud/ /des ni me drod 'phel byed cing / /khong pa'i rlung ni sel mchog yin/ /lan tshwa lnga dang thal sman gnyis/ /tsha ba lnga dang na le sham/ /la la phud dang shing kun las/ /skyur rtsi chen po'am se 'bru

'am/ /rgya shug khu bas ri lu byas/ /smin dang drod skyed byed mchog yin/ /bal bu'i lo ma dbyi mo dang / /pi pi ling ni srang re dang / /pi pi ling dang de rtsa srang / /gnyis gnyis bca' sga srang gsum dang / /dri sna gsum dang pu shel tse/ /zho ni gnyis gnyis phyir zhib

btags/ /bu ram sum 'gyur dag gis ni/ /ri lu byas pa rtag tu bza'/ /de rjes yu sha sha khu dang / /chang rnying 'o ma zho ga chu/ /thug pa blud na rlung dang ni/ /bad kan las gyur slon bro dang / /pho ba rtsib logs snying ga na/ /rims dang 'or nad skya rbab dang / /skran

dang chang nad gzhang 'brum dang / /cham pa mchil ma dbugs mi bde/ /lud pa rnams ni 'joms par byed/ /bshang ba 'gags la de nyid ni/ /bca' sga'i gong du a ru ra/ /bcug ste de la sbyin par bya/ /mkhris gyur slon bro la sogs la/ /kha ra bzhi 'gyur bcas pa ni/ /

bskol ba las ni ri lur byas/ /yang na bu ram kha rar bcas/ /me dang 'phrad par gyur pa las/ /de ni mchog tu yang bar 'gyur/ /de nas 'di ni ma zhu smin/ /rlung las gyur pa'i pho nad la/ /drod skyed sman dang bcas pa dang / /mar ni nyung zad nyung zad blud/ /me drod chung

zhing skyes gyur nas/ /bshang gci rlung ni 'gags gyur na/ /zhag ni gnyis gsum snum btang dugs/ /bsku byas mas gtong drag po bya/ /de nas e raN+Da yi mar/ /seng phrom gyi ni mar dang ni/ /thal sman dag gis rlung zhi nas/ /g.yos pa'i nad la bkru sman gtang / /sbyangs

nas khong pa rtsub gyur te/ /bshang ba 'gags la 'jam rtsi ni/ /drod skyed skyur zhing rlung 'joms pa'i/ /sman btsos til mar de la gtang / /de ltar bkru sman drag bkru sman/ /'jam rtsi cho ga bzhin byas la/ /kha zas yang ba dang ldan pa'i/ /zhun mar slar yang bsten par bya/ /

rtsa ba lnga dang tsha ba gsum/ /a ru ra dang lce myang tsha/ /ra sna pi pi ling rtsa ba/ /thal sman rnam gnyis zi ra dang / /byi dang ga dang zur pa mar/ /tsha dang skyur rtsi chen po yi/ /khu ba dang ni sge'u gsher dang / /la phug skam po rgya shug skyur/ /se 'bru tsug kri ka'i khu ba/ /dar bzho

dang chang dngas dang / /rtsab mo dngas ma rtsab mo dang / /skyur rtsabs dang ni de bskol ba/ /me drod skyed pa'i dam pa yin/ /gzer dang skran dang dmu rdzing dang / /lud pa dbugs mi bde ba dang / /rlung dang bad kan 'joms par byed/ /yang na skyur rtsi chen po yi/ /khu bar

bskol ba'i mar blud bya/ /'di yi til mar bskol ba yis/ /bsku byug byas na rlung sel to/ /rlung dang bad kan ma 'dres zhu'am/ /bad kan rlung shas che ba la/ /sman ni 'di dag nyid kyi phye/ /chu dron sbyar ba blud par bya/ /mkhris pas me drod nyams gyur pa/ /bkru

sman dag gam slon sman gtang / /kha dang yang dang 'khru gcod dang / /tsha mi skyed pas drod bskyed bya/ /phye ma snum dang kha ba yis/ /me drod nye bar bskyed par bya/ /pa to la dang kyi lce ba/ /nim pa pu tse shel rtsa mkhris/ /par pa ta dang dug mo nyung / /

shun lpags 'bras bu mur ba dang / /shi kru mngar po'i 'bras bu dang / /shu dag skyer pa'i shun lpags dang / /shug pa dang ni pu shel tse/ /tsan+dan gla sgang la la phud/ /sa nag bong nga tsha ba gsum/ /shing tsha sug smel thang shing dang / /gan+d+ha b+ha dra'i phye ma ni/ /sbrang

rtsi'i lde gur byas bza' ba'am/ /chang ngam chu dang sbyar 'thungs na/ /snying nad skya rbab pho ba'i nad/ /skran gzer rims nad yi ga 'chus/ /mig ser 'dus pa'i nad dang ni/ /kha yi nad rnams 'joms par byed/ /rtsa mkhris gla sgang pu tse shel/ /tsha ba gsum dang dug

mo nyung / /tsi tra ka ni cha gnyis dang / /dug mo nyung gi shun lpags ni/ /bcu drug cha sbyar zhib tu btags/ /de ni bu ram chu grang blud/ /pho ba'i nad dang skran sel zhing / /mig ser skya rbab rims kyi nad/ /yi ga 'chus dang 'khru ba 'joms/ /dong gra bong nga gla sgang dang / /

pa ta bil ba skyer khaN+Da/ /dug mo nyung gis po na dang / /tig ta da ta ka'i me tog /phye mar btags la sbrang rtsir sbyar/ /'bras bkrus chu dang blud na ni/ /mkhris pa las gyur pho ba'i nad/ /mkhregs 'khrugs gzhang 'brum gzhang kha na/ /khrag tu 'khru ba dag la'ang phan/ /tsan+dan

shug pa pu shel tse/ /pa ta mur ba bla ba dang / /shu dag thal tres dbyi mo dang / /lo ma bdun pa ba sha ka /pa to la dang n+ya gro d+ha/ /u dum wA ra a shwat+tha/ /be+eg sha ka pi ta na dang / /pu tse shel dang li ga dur/ /nim pa srang ni gnyis gnyis la/ /chu bra bcu drug bskol ba der/ /

ki ra tig ta dug mo nyung / /ram nye ut+pal pi pi ling / /bskol ba de 'thungs mkhris pa yi/ /pho ba'i nad la blud par bya/ /mdzer bshad tig ta'i mar yang blud/ /bad kan las gyur pho ba'i nad/ /slon sman rnon pos slon byas nas/ /tsha skyur lan tshwa thal sman gyis/ /rim

gyis me drod skyed par byed/ /tsha ba lnga dang a ru ra/ /'u su pa ta pa la sha//skyur rtse chen po'i myu gu dang / /bskol ba'i thug pa la sogs blud/ /ma du ka yi me tog bre/ /bcu drug bye dang ga de'i phyed/ /tsi tra ka ni de phyed dang / /bse shing 'bras bu bre bzhi dang / /btsod srang

brgyad de 'di dag ni/ /chu bre sum cu rtsa gnyis bskol/ /chu bye bcu drug lus bsgrangs par/ /sbrang rtsi bye do gzhug pa dang / /sug smel pad+ma'i rtsa ba dang / /a kar tsan+dan lde gu byug /bum par zla ba gcig gzhag ste/ /langs nas mnan chang blud gyur na/ /'di yis pho ba'i

drod skyed cing / /nyams brtas khrag mkhris sel bar byed/ /skems dang mdze dang sha bkra dang / /gci snyi ba yi nad rnams 'joms/ /ma du ka yi me tog ni/ /khu ba bskol ba phyed du ba/ /bsgrangs par sbrang rtsi bzhi cha btab/ /snga ma bzhin du byas pa'i chang / /phan pa'i

zas dang bcas bsten na/ /pho ba'i nad ni thams cad sel/ /de bzhin rgun 'bru bu ram shing / /'bra go'i khu ba mnan pa blud/ /shing kun shu dag pu tse shel/ /bong nga pa ta dug mo nyung / /gze ma tsha ba lnga po zho/ /gnyis gnyis lan tshwa lnga srang re/ /mar dang til mar

phul do do/ /zho bre gnyis dang bsres nas ni/ /me ni chung ngu la btsos ste/ /rnying zhing khu ba thim pa dang / /de nas du ba 'khyims par bsreg /btags te mar dang bsres pa dag /de las zho gnyis 'thungs nas ni/ /zhu nas kha zas mngar zos nas/ /des ni bad kan rlung nad ni/ /kun

dang dug dang dbyig dug 'joms/ /rtswa mkhris dang ni pu tse shel/ /pa to nim pa par pa ta/ /bsregs la ma he'i gcin dang ni/ /'thungs na me drod skyed byed yin/ /shu dag ru rta ser po gnyis/ /tsi tra ka dang pu tse shel/ /gla sgang ra yi gcin dang ni/ /bskol ba me drod skyed

byed yin/ /su ta'i sdong bu srang bzhi dang / /lan tshwa gsum las srang re dang / /par ta ka ni phul gang dang / /arka srang brgyad tsi tra ka /srang gnyis bsregs la par ta ka'i/ /khu bas ri lu byas nas ni/ /zas rjes zos na zos pa'i zas/ /myur du lud pa dbugs mi bde/ /

gzhang 'brum gsung dang cham pa dang / /snying nad des ni zhi bar byed/ /kha lud zur pa ra sna dang / /tsha ba gsum dang a ru ra/ /nas tshig 'khus thal swardzi ka'i/ /thal sman lan tshwa lnga po rnams/ /phyer btags dro 'jam chu dang blud/ /mdog stobs me drod 'phel

byed yin/ /bad kan las gyur pho ba'i nad/ /rlung bcas de la mar dang bskol/ /thang la 'bar dang srang drug pa/ /de bzhin go bye'i sman mar blud/ /kha ru tsha dang tsha nag dang / /bul tog dang ni swardzi ka /nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba dang / /kaN+Da ka ri sab ta la/ /tsi tra ka ni gcig

tu bsreg /lan bdun bar du gzags pa yi/ /thal khu bre do mar bre bzhi/ /bskol la me drod bskyed phyir blud/ /'dus pa las ni lnga po dang / /'di dag nyams stobs ji bzhin bya/ /bad kan mchil mang drod chung la/ /kha rtsub me drod skyed par sbyar/ /bad kan las byung

skems pa la/ /snum dang rtsub pa res kyis bsten/ /nyam chung rid pa'i lus la ni/ /me drod skyed pa snum ldan sbyin/ /mkhris pa shas che'i drod nyams la/ /kha dang mngar ba ldan pa sbyin/ /rlung shas che la snum skyur dang / /lan tshwar ldan pa bsngags pa yin/ /rid pa me

drod skyed pa la/ /snum nyid mchog tu shes par bya/ /snum shas che bar gyur pa la/ /rab lci'i zas kyang sbyin mi bya/ /gang zhig drod chung bad kan zad/ /bshang ba smin kyang sla ba la/ /de la sman rnor bcas pa yi/ /mar ni nyung zad blud par bya/ /de yis me dang mnyam gnas

rlung / /rang gnas bkug ste rang gi ni/ /las la sbyor bas drod skyed byed/ /de ni me drod skyed byed yin/ /gang zhig bshang ba sra ba yis/ /dka' bas 'byin par byed pa dag /de la lan tshwa bcas pa'i mar/ /zas ni sla bar byed pa sbyin/ /rtsub pas me drod chung la mar/ /

yang na til mar drod skyed blud/ /snum mang 'thungs pas drod nyams la/ /thal sman phye ma chang rnying sbyar/ /rtug 'gags pa la mas gtong ba'i/ /drag po dang ni 'jam rtsi bya/ /nad tshab che bas me drod nyams/ /sbyang byas zas kyi cho ga spyad/ /nad byang me drod chung ba la/ /

zhun mar 'ba' zhig drod skyed byed/ /lam dang smyung bas nyam chung la/ /nas thug mar dang sbyar ba'am/ /zas bcas blud na stobs skyed cing / /drod skyed brta bar byed pa yin/ /yun rings nyal po spyad pa dang / /mi ni nyam chung skam gyur la/ /mthu rtsal can gyis zas tshol

ba/ /sha za'i sha khu skyur sbyar sbyin/ /yang zhing dri tsha sbyong byed pa/ /de yis me drod myur du skyed/ /sha yis skyed pa'i sha yin phyir/ /stobs ni mchog tu skyed par byed/ /snum dang mnan chang chang rnying dang / /sman khu phye ma 'phrod pa zos/ /lus la legs par sbyar ba yis/ /

stobs dang me drod 'phel bar byed/ /dper na me ni shing sra bas/ /sbar ba yun ring gnas par byed/ /de bzhin khong par gnas pa'i me/ /snum dang bcas pas brtan par gnas/ /ji ltar me ni shing med pa'am/ /me chung shing ni drags pa ltar/ /lus me zas ni ma

zos pa/ /zas drags gyur pas 'bar mi byed/ /gang tshe bad kan zad mkhris pa/ /rang gi gnas su rlung zhugs na/ /me drod 'phel zhing rab rgyas 'gyur/ /de tshe me ni rlung bcas pas/ /zas smin byas nas lus zungs kyang / /zad cing mdangs 'thor byed pas gsod/ /

zas zos nas ni bde 'gyur la/ /zhu nas mun zhugs snyam sems 'gyur/ /skom dad tsha brgyal dbugs mi bde/ /la sogs me drod drags las 'byung / /zas lci snum sla rtul ba dang / /grang dang 'ju dka' me drod 'bri/ /'bar ba'i me la chu blugs ltar/ /me drod

shas cha de zhi bya/ /de nas kha zas ma zhu la'ang / /yang dang yang du zas sbyin bya/ /bud shing med pa'i skabs rnyed ltar/ /ji gnas 'dir gnas mi 'gyur bya/ /kri sa ra dang 'o thug snum/ /snum khur bu ram g.yos pa dang / /rlan can chu yi srog chags ni/ /tsho ba yi ni sha sbyin

no/ /mchog tu nya ni 'jam po dang / /mi 'gul chu la gnas pa sbyin/ /lug sha tshon po dag kyang ni/ /zos na me drod drags pa sal/ /'o ma sbrang rtsi bcas ba'am/ /mar dang sbyar ba skom tshe blud/ /gro yi phye ni 'o ma dang / /mar ni mang por bcas pa blud/ /rlan can

srog chags sha khu dang / /til mar ma gtogs snum can blud/ /sha ma dur byid dang bskol ba'i/ /'o ma'i bkru sman blud par bya/ /mkhris pa sel ba'i kha zas dang / /'o thug lan mang sbyin par bya/ /gang zhig lce zhing chil skyed dang / /bad kan skyed pa'i

kha zas rnams/ /thams cad me drod drags la phan/ /zos nas nyin par nyal bar bya/ /zas ni me drod kyis 'ju byed/ /zas med nas ni nad zad byed/ /lus zungs zad par byed par 'gyur/ /lus zungs zad nas 'chi bar 'gyur/ /zas 'di dag ni rang bzhin gyis mi mthun/ /

'di ni sbyor dang g.yos kyis mi 'phrod pa/ /de la sogs pa me shes ci dga' bar/ /spyod de me drod stobs las gyur pa yin/ /de bas 'bad pa kun gyis me drod bsrung / /de nyams na ni mi yi srog nyes nyams/ /nyes pas khyab na nad kyi tshogs kyis 'debs/ /me drod mnyam na

nad med tshe ring 'gyur/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /gso ba'i gnas kyi le'u bcu pa'o// //de nas gcin 'gags pa'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /rlung las gyur pa'i gcin sri la/ /rlung 'joms til mar gyis lus bsku/ /lte ba man chad

dugs bya zhing / /rlan dugs lus ni spying ba'ang bya/ /rtsa ba bcu pa e raN+Da/ /ba la nas dang nye shing pa/ /ba spru ba dang ku lang+tha/ /rgya shug dang ni ba ru ra/ /sru sru'i rtsa ba bri shi ba/ /til mar zhun mar phag dang dred/ /zhag bskol lan tshwa bcas pa ni/ /'thungs na gzer

'joms mchog yin no/ /sman 'di dag ni snum pa yi/ /'bras bur bcas shing skyur ba dang / /snum dang ldan par zas skom dang / /gong po dkri ba'i dugs dpyad bya/ /kha ru tsha mang btab pa'i chang / /'thungs na gcin gyi nad sel byed/ /mkhris gyur bsku dang

blugs pa dang / /lus bcing bas ni bsil bar bya/ /nye shing gze ma bi da ri/ /rgun 'bru rtsa yi rtsa ba lnga/ /bskol ba'i nang du sbrang rtsi dang / /kha rab btab pa blud par bya/ /ba sha ka dang ga gon dang / /rgyal mo ga gon le brgan rtsi'i/ /sa bon gur gum rgun chu dang / /'thungs

na gcin 'gags nad sel byed/ /shing mngar er ba ru'i sa bon/ /skyer pa 'bras kyi chu dang blud/ /rgun 'bru'i lde gu chur sbyar ba'am/ /rgun 'bru chur ni sbangs pa blud/ /bad kan las gyur dugs byas la/ /skyug sman bza' ba rno dro sbyin/ /nas yos thal sman rno ba dang / /dar

ba bcas pa sbyin par bya/ /sug smel chang dang sbyar ba'am/ /skyu ru ra yi khu ba blud/ /bzhad rus gze ma sug smel dang / /tsha gsum sbrang rtsi gcin bcas blud/ /yang na kaN+Da ka ri'i khu/ /sbrang rtsir sbyar ba blud par bya/ /shi ti ba ra'i sa bon ni/ /zhib btags dar bar sbyar ba

blud/ /ba da sap+ta par+Ni dang / /sle tres dong gra dug mo nyung / /ke'u ka dang sug smel dang / /ka rany+dza bskol sbrang rtsir bcas/ /des sbyar thug pa'am byi ru yi/ /phye ma 'bras kyi chu dang blud/ /pa ta li yi thal ba'i chu/ /lan bdun btsags pa til mar bcas/ /nas tshig

'khus thal pa ta li/ /pa ri pa tra til thal chu/ /shing tsha sug smel na le sham/ /chang dang sbyar ba blud par bya/ /'di dag re re'i lde gur sbyar/ /bu ram so yis bcad cing bza'/ /'dus pa'i bdag nyid can kun la/ /'di dag gnas skabs ji bzhin phan/ /rde'u

chags ring po ma lon dang / /rlung gi lgang nad sogs la'ang sbyar/ /rde'u chags nad ni mi bzad de/ /'chi bdag dang ni 'dra bar 'dod/ /gzhon pa'i tshe na sman gyis gso/ /'phel nas 'dral bar 'os pa yin/ /de yi sngon 'byung tshul la ni/ /snum 'chos la sogs rim

pas bsngags/ /sru sru'i rtsa ba spra tog dang / /a sman da ka ba si ra/ /nye shing lcam pa pu tse shel/ /a ti pa la ba lu ka /spangs ma br-ik+Sha da ni dang / /sha ka'i 'bras bu bya kri gnyis/ /gud tha gze ma ku lang+tha/ /nas dang rgya shug pa ra Na/ /ka ta ka yi 'bras bu

dang / /u sha ka stsogs phye ma btab/ /'di dag khu ba mar bskol blud/ /rlung gyur rde'u 'jig par byed/ /e raN+Da dang bri ha ti/ /kaN+Da ka ri gze ma dang / /bu ram shing phran rtsa ba yi/ /lde gu zho dang sbyar te blud/ /rde'u chags pa sel byed yin/ /ku

sha 'jag ma 'dam bu dang / /ku ta nye'u shing ig ga tha/ /sru sru'i rtsa ba 'jag zlum dang / /bi da ri dang ba ra hi/ /'bras kyi rtsa ba gze ma dang / /ba lu ka dang pa ta li/ /btul dang bla bar bcas/ /ba spru ba dang sri sha ka /de rnams bskol khu mar dang bskol/ /

ga gon sa bon la sogs dang / /ut+pal yis bon dang / /shing mngar dang ni brag zhun phye/ /de dag mkhris gyur rde chags sel/ /ba ra Na sogs rlung 'joms te/ /sug smel ha re Nu ka'i sde/ /gu gul ru rta na le sham/ /tsi tra ka dang bye'u rug pa/ /de dag lde gur byas pa gzhug /

u sha ka yi sde tshan bcug /mar bskol ba yis bad kan las/ /gyur pa'i rde'u myur du 'joms/ /rang rang sman ni 'di nyid kyis/ /thal sman 'o ma thug stsogs sbyar/ /pi tsu ka dang ang go la/ /ka ta ka la sha ka dang / /ut+pa la yi 'bras bu rnams/ /bu ram bcas pa'i chu

dron blud/ /rde phran 'jig par byed pa'i mchog /khrung khrung rnga mo bong bu'i rus/ /gze ma ta la pa tri ka /a za mo dang ka dam pa'i/ /rtsa ba dang ni bca' sga ni/ /chang ngam chu dron bcas pa blud/ /rde phran chags pa 'jig par byed/ /ma ri tsi ka'i sa bon gyi/ /phye ma sbrang rtsir sbyar ba

dang / /lug gi 'o ma zhag bdun ni/ /blud na rde'u ni 'jig par byed/ /shi kru'i rtsa ba bskol ba ni/ /dro 'jam 'thungs pas rde nad 'joms/ /til dang a pa marga dang / /chu shing dang ni pa la sha /nas tshig 'khus thal lug gcin blud/ /phye ma rde'u chags pa sel/ /yang

na lcam pa'i rtsa ba ni/ /gcig tu chang la sogs pa blud/ /yang na de bskol 'o ma blud/ /nad kyis nyen pa sel ba byed/ /a ru ra yi rus pa btsos/ /yang na ba spru ba btsos blud/ /yang na 'o ma can zas bza'/ /yang na bar hi shi ka yi/ /rtsa ba 'bras bur bcas pa blud/ /

gcin 'gags lhag ma rnams la ni/ /'di yi gso ba lhag ma'ang sbyar/ /bri ha ti sogs sde tshan bskol/ /gze ma nyis 'gyur gzhug par bya/ /chu 'am 'o ma zhun mar dang / /blud na gcin gyi nad kun sel/ /thang shing gla sgang mur ba dang / /shing mngar dang ni a ru ra/ /chang ngam

'o ma chur sbyar ba/ /gcin gyi nad ni kun la blud/ /byi tsher ba bskol khu ba'am/ /ardzu na bskol khu ba ni/ /rgyam tsha 'bras bu gsum btab la/ /chu tshan dro 'jam sbyar ba blud/ /kaN+Da ka ri gze ma bskol/ /yang na nas thug bur phran bcas/ /bi da ra sogs bskol ba'am/ /

khyim bya'i sha yi khu ba blud/ /bi da ri la sogs pa dang / /bskol ba'i brag zhun sbyin pa'am/ /yang na chang ni nad med blud/ /rta'am shing rtar bskyod nas ni/ /mgyogs par 'gro bas bskyod gyur na/ /rde'u de ni g.yo bar 'gyur/ /bi da ri la sogs pa yi/ /sde tshan rnam

pa kun tu sbyar/ /bkru sman don du seng phram mar/ /'jam rtsi'i las kyang bsten par bya/ /mchog tu 'jam rtsi gong ma bya/ /khu chu'i rde'u chags de yi ni/ /gcin lam sbyangs la stobs che ba'i/ /khu chu'i gnas ni sbyang ba'i phyir/ /skyes pa khu ba 'phel byed pa'i/ /sha

dang khyim bya'i sha yis 'grangs/ /'dod pa bdo bas bud med ni/ /dga' ba skyed la nyal po bya/ /gso ba 'di yis bcos kyang ni/ /ma zhi na ni sman pa yis/ /mtshon ni legs par brtag byas te/ /gso ba ma bgyi nges par 'chi/ /bgyis na 'ang dogs par bcas

pa las/ de ltar rgyal po la zhus nas/ /las la byang ba'i sman pa ni/ /mang po dang ni dpyad par bya/ /de nas nad par snum bskus shing / /sbyangs shing cung zad nyams smad pa'i/ /lus ni snum bsku dugs bya zhing / /zan ma zos shing bkra shis byas/ /pus mor sleb

pa'i spang leb la/ /'dug pa mi yi pad par brten/ /ro stod gan rkyal bzhag nas ni/ /gos kyis dkris pa'i steng du gzhag /de nas de yi sgyid khung dag /bkug nas ras kyis dam pa ru/ /rten gyi mi dang bcas par ni/ /bcings te dbugs ni phyung nas su/ /lte ba

man chad bskus nas ni/ /de yi g.yon rol phyogs su ni/ /mnyes la khu tshur gyis mnan cing / /'og tu 'byin pa'i bar du btsir/ /de nas g.yon pa'i mdzub mo dang / /gung mo'i sen mo zegs nas ni/ /til mar bskus te rkub tu ni/ /srubs mtshams bar du gzhug

par bya/ /rde'u lte ba'i gnyer ma nas/ /pho mtshan gzhang bar phyin par bya/ /de nas chu so'i gnas su ni/ /gnyer ma med cing dbyung sla ba/ /sor mo gnyis kyis btsir nas ni/ /mdud pa lta bur mtho bar bya/ /srubs mtshams nas gang ma gtogs

par/ /gtsags bus legs par dral nas ni/ /rde'u'i tshad du dbral byas la/ /ci nas chag grugs med par ni/ /cha spyad rtse mo gug pa yis/ /ma lus par ni dbyung bar bya/ /bud med chu so ngos su gnas/ /de ni mngal gnas pa la brten/ /mtho bar gyur nas spyad

kyis/ /legs pa kho nar dbral bar bya/ /gzhan du byas na de yis ni/ /rma nas gcin ni 'dzag par 'gyur//skyes pa'i rma ni dbral nyes na/ /gcin 'dzag pa dang gcig tu 'gyur/ /chu so dbral ba'i rde'u rgyu/ /gcig las grub kyi gnyis las min/ /zug rngu chung las

chu dron gyi/ /nang du de ni spying bar bya/ /de ltar khrag gis gang mi 'gyur/ /gang la mtshan las 'o ma can/ /shing gi khu ba btsir bar bya/ /de nas gcin ni dag bya'i phyir/ /bu ram grangs pa sbyin pa dang / /rma la mar dang sbrang rtsi bsku/ /dus gnyis nas thug mar

bcas pa'i/ /dro 'jam gcin skyed zhag gsum blud/ /bu ram mang po 'o ma dang / /'bras chan nyung ba zhag bcu sbyin/ /de nas 'bras bu skyur ba dang / /skam sa'i srog chags sha khu sbyin/ /'o ma can shing khu ba yis/ /rma ni bkrus nas btsod dang ni/ /shing mngar pra

puN+Da ra'i ka /seng phrom dkar pos bsku bar bya/ /rma bskus sman ni 'di dag nyid/ /skyer bcas til mar bskol te bskus/ /'di yis rma zhag bcu dugs bya/ /gcin gyi lam ni zhag bdun na/ /rang gi lam nas ma byung na/ /rde'u'i rma ni me yis bsregs/ /rang gi lam

nas byung gyur nas/ /phal cher mas gtong mngar bas gso/ /rma de 'tshobs kyang lo gcig bar/ /ri bo glang po rta dang ni/ /shing la 'dzeg par mi bya ste/ /shing rtar mi zhon nyal po spang / /chu la rkyal bar mi bya'o/ /khu chu gcin rgyu lgang pa dang / /rlig sbubs mtshams

srubs gzhang rtsa dang / /pho mtshan mo mtshan rtse mo ni/ /brgyad por mtshon ni gdab mi bya/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /gso ba'i gnas kyi le'u bcu gcig pa'o// //de nas gcin snyi ba za khu'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /za khu can ni stobs

ldan la/ /dang po skyug sman bkru sman ni/ /snum can nyungs kar a ri ha/ /ba ru ra dang ka rany+dza'i/ /snum dang gze ma til mar bskol/ /rang sman ji bzhin bskol ba yi/ /snum bcas skyug sman bkru sman gtang / /gla sgang thang shing dong gra bcug /bye'u rug pa sogs khu ba

yi/ /'jam rtsi de nas gtang bar bya/ /mkhris pa n+ya gro d+ha sogs pas/ /sbyangs nas sha khus brta bar bya/ /gcin nad dang ni skran dang ni/ /skem zhing nyams ni smad pa 'byung / /de bas rjes 'brel bsrung ba'i phyir/ /zhi bar bya ba gtang bar bya/ /sbyang ba ma byas

la de nyid/ /gcin nad can ni kun la blud/ /skyer pa skyu ru ra bskol khu/ /sbrang rtsir bcas pa nad par blud/ /skyer pa thang shing 'bras bu gsum/ /gla sgang chu bskol blud pa'ang phan/ /tsi tra skyer pa 'bras bu gsum/ /dug mo nyung ni sbrang rtsi bcas/ /yang na sle

tres skyu ru ra/ /sbrang rtsir bcas pa'i khu ba'ang phan/ /seng phrom gla sgang kad pa la dang a ru ra/ /pa tha byi tsher byi dang ga dang ardzun/ /seng ldeng skyer pa byi dang ga dang dar ba bskol/ /khu ba gsum po sbrang rtsir bcas pas bad kan sel/ /mkhris gyur pu shel seng phrom

tsan+dan ardzu na/ /nim pa pa to la dang sle tre+es skyu ru ra/ /seng phrom ba le ka dang skyer pa da ta ka'i/ /gsum po de dag bskol ba sbrang rtsir bcas pa blud/ /'di dag ji bzhin zas skom dang / /nas dang gro dang sbyar ba dang / /rlung shas che ba'i gcin snyi la/ /snum dang sbyar

te sbyin par bya/ /lci ba rta rtug las byung ba'am/ /'od ma las ni skyes pa dag /khur ba zan dron chag tshe stsogs/ /nas las byas pa'i zan kyang phan/ /rtsa 'bru mung+ga la sogs dang / /'bras rnying drug cu pa rnying phan/ /nyungs kar til btsir las byung ba'am/ /sbyar thug

skyur dang bcas pa'am/ /ka pid ta dang tin tu ka /'dzam bu de sbyar btung ba dang / /tshod ma kha bo sbrang rtsi dang / /'bras bu gsum zan bza' ba skam/ /skam sa'i sha ni bsregs pa dang / /skam pa'am lcags dang g.yos pa dang / /rgun chang chang rnying

mnan chang rnying / /rgun chu bskol ba las byung blud/ /a sa na sogs bskol ba'i chu/ /'jag ma bskol chu sbrang rtsi'i chu/ /'bras bu gsum la mtshan mo sbangs/ /nyin par skams la de nas ni/ /legs par btags pa'i phye dag dang / /bu ram sbrang rtsir bcas

pa blud/ /sa la lo ma bdun pa dang / /kam bi l+ya dang ba ru ra/ /bri sha ka dang ka pid ta/ /ro hi ni yi me tog ni/ /phyer btags sbrang rtsir bcas sbyin nam/ /skyu ru ra yi khu ba blud/ /bad kan mkhris pa'i gcin nad sel/ /gzem skyer pa seng phrom dang / /shu dag

kad phal ardzu na/ /shug pa lung thang asman ta/ /tsan+dan dang ni a ka ru/ /la la phud dang pa to la/ /ga dur bong nga go bye btsod/ /bad kan rlung la til mar bcas/ /mkhris par mar de 'dren mar btsos/ /rtsa ba bcu pa zi ra dkar/ /dan ti thang shing ba spru

gnyis/ /snu ha arga'i rtsa ba dang / /bu ga dam pa a ru ra/ /go bye ka rany+dza'i rtsa ba/ /ba ra Na yi rtsa ba dang / /pi pi ling rtsa ma nu'i rtsa/ /re re srang ni bcu bcu dang / /nas dang rgya shug rgya sran las/ /bre gsum chu ni brgyad 'gyur dang / /bskol la bzhi cha

lus pa dang / /de dang pi pi ling gnyis dang / /dbyi mo lcang ma ro hi sha /dur byid byi dang kam+bi l+ya/ /ga bra'i rtsa ba bca' sga dang / /mar bre gang dang bskol ba yis/ /gcin snyi'i nad ni de nyid dang / /'brum phran dug dang skya rbab dang / /khong 'bras skran dang gzhang 'brum

dang / /'or nad skem dang dbyig dug dang / /dmu rdzing lud pa dbugs mi bde/ /slon dang tshil ches mcher pa'i nad/ /dreg mdze smyo byed brjed byed 'joms/ /mar 'di thang la 'bar gyi yin/ /seng phrom mur ba byi dang ga /zur pa rgya spos ga bra'i rtsa/ /chu srin sen mo

dug mo nyung / /gla ba ru rta pri yang ku/ /gla gor zho sha tsi tra ka /bong nga bil sha la gnyis dang / /dri bzang bzhi dang rtsa mkhris dang / /pu tse shel dang la la phud/ /pa ta puSh+kar mU la dang / /pi pi ling gi rtsa ba dang / /dbyi mo dang ni 'bras bu gsum/ /zho ni gnyis

gnyis chu bre ni/ /bcu drug la bskol bzhi cha lus/ /btsags te bsgrangs pa'i nang du ni/ /sbrang rtsi bre do bcug nas ni/ /zla phyed legs par gzhag pa yi/ /seng phrom mnan chang gcin snyi dang / /gzhang 'brum mdze dang yi ga 'chus/ /srin bu skya rbab pho ba'i nad/ /tshil

byed pa yi nad sel byed/ /a sa na la sogs pa'i sde/ /sna re srang ni nyi shu dag /chu bre nyis brgya lnga bcu drug /bskol la bzhi cha lus pa dang / /bu ram srang ni nyis brgya dang / /sbrang rtsi bre do gzhug pa dang / /dug mo nyung sogs lde gu ni/ /srang re'i tshad ni bcug pa ste/ /sbrang

rtsi pi pi ling gi phya/ /mar gyis bskus pa'i snod dag ni/ /rgya skyegs bskus par bcug nas ni/ /nas kyi nang du bcug nas su/ /lcags ni rno la srab pa dag /seng ldeng gi ni me mdag bsregs/ /ji srid lcags ni zad pa'i bar/ /mang du der ni gzhag par bya/ /lcags

las byas pa'i chang mnan blud/ /sngon pas yon tan lhag pa yin/ /rtsub pa dril phyis dam du bsdams/ /drag shul mtshan mo gnyid mi log /tshil dang bad kan 'joms byed gang / /de ni phyi nang las btang phan/ /brag zhun srang brgya snying po'i chu/ /sbangs pa'i snying po chu

dang ni/ /legs par blud cing sA lu dang / /skam sa'i sha khu bcas pa bza'/ /bla brnan shin tu mang ba yi/ /gcin snyi'i nad ni kun kyang 'joms/ /'bras phreng thor bu rmen bu dang / /tshil ches mdze dang mtshan bar rdol/ /srin nad rkang bam 'or nad sel/ /'di ni

bcud kyis len mchog yin/ /lam du dugs dang lham dag ni/ /med par drang srong tshul du ni/ /dpag tshad brgya yi bar du 'gro/ /chu yi gnas ni brko ba'am/ /ba gcin lci ba bsten pa'am/ /ba lang dang ni lhan cig 'khyams/ /skem pa'i gcin nad can dag

gi/ /zas dang sman tshil mi bskyed pas/ /kham phor la sogs 'bras nad ni/ /ma smin skrang pa'i nad ltar gso/ /sman pa la ni rma ltar gso/ /de yi sngon byung tshul nyid la/ /'o ma can shing bskol chu dang / /ra thug gcin ni blud pa bsngags/ /gcin

snyi'i nad can lto sra bas/ /phal cher bkru sman rnon po gtang / /sug smel sogs kyi til mar sbyar/ /rma 'tshob pa yi cho ga bya/ /dong gra la sogs sde tshan ni/ /btags pa'i lde gus dril bar bya/ /a sa na sogs bskol chu blud/ /dug mo nyung sogs zas skom sbyar/ /

pa ta thal tres tsi tra ka /sha rang ga pA kan ta ri/ /sap+ta par+Ni dug mo nyung / /kad pha la dang dong ga'i phye/ /sbrang rtsis lde gu byas pa'am/ /lcags dgu pa yang de bzhin sbyin/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /gso ba'i gnas kyi le'u bcu gnyis pa'o// //

de nas khong 'bras dang rgyu rlugs kyi le'u bshad par bya'o/ /khong 'bras ma smin thams cad la/ /'or nang lta bur gso ba dang / /rgyun tu khrag ni byung bar bya/ /smin pa la ni rma ltar gso/ /rlung shas che la rtsa ba lnga/ /bskol bas rma ni bkru ba dang / /thang shing sogs sde shing mngar dang / /til sbyar rgyam tshas

rma bsku bya/ /bkru sman dang ni ldan pa yi/ /dur byid kyis ni rnam sbyangs shing / /bi da ri yi sde bskol ba'i/ /dur byid kyis ni rma 'byor bya/ /mkhris gyur 'o ma can chus bkru/ /sle tres shing mngar til gyis bsku/ /btsod dang rgya shug pu shel tse/ /pa ya s+ya dang ser po gnyis/ /

'bras bu gsum dang shing mngar dang / /'o mar bcas pas rma 'byor bya/ /yang na n+ya gro d+ha sogs pa'i/ /myu gu shun pa 'bras bu bsku/ /bad kan las gyur dong ga'i chus/ /bkru zhing phye dang ser po gnyis/ /dur byid dang ni til gyis bsku/ /yang na rgya sran dan ti yi/ /sham

dur byid tsi tra ka /seng phrom rgyam tshab gcin bcas/ /til mar gyis ni rma 'tshob bya/ /khrag dang glo bur las gyur pa/ /mkhris pa'i khong 'bras lta bur gso/ /ma smin nad du byung ba la/ /ba ra Na sogs sde bskol bar/ /u sha ka yi sde tshan btab/ /snga dro khong 'bras can

la blud/ /bkru sman bcas par bskol ba'i mar/ /de gnyis dang ni ldan par blud/ /ni ru ha dang snum 'jam rtsi/ /de dag gnyis la sbyar bar bya/ /bza' dang btung dang bsku ba la/ /sbrang rtsi na le sham dkar sbyar/ /nad dmigs ji bzhin blud na ni/ /khong 'bras

ma smin 'joms par byed/ /kyi lce nim pa 'bras bu gsum/ /shing mngar pu tse shel cha mnyam/ /dur byid pa to la'i rtsa ba/ /re re cha ni bzhi par bya/ /sran chung spun pa med srang brgyad/ /de bskol mar dang bcas pa blud/ /khong 'bras skran dang me dpal dang / /

lus tsha rmongs bag myos rims 'debs/ /skom dang brgyal slon snying nad dang / /khrag mkhris mig ser mdze nad 'joms/ /kyi lce ba ni phul gang dag /brgyad 'gyur chu ru bskol nas ni/ /de yi khu ba phul gang dang / /skyu ru ra yi khu ba dang / /'o ma mar ni phul re

dang / /tig ta byi tsher kra yin ti/ /gla sgang ram nye ta ma la/ /tsan+dan ut+pal dzi ban ti/ /gcig tu bsdus te bskol ba yi/ /mar de yon tan snga mar mtshungs/ /rgun 'bru 'bra go ma du ka /bi da ri dang nye shing bcas/ /pa ru sha ka 'bras bu gsum/ /de btsos khu

ba mar bskol la/ /'o ma bu ram shing ku dang / /skyu ru ra yi khu ba dang / /a ru ra yi lde gur bcas/ /bskol te bsgrangs pa de nang du/ /kha ra sbrang rtsi bzhi char btab/ /yon tan snga ma 'drar shes bya/ /nad dmigs ji bzhin rngabs rwa sogs/ /yang na gtar gas

khrag dbyung bya/ /khong 'bras smin par gyur pa la/ /khong par gnas pa phyir 'bur bar/ /shes nas de ni bcing bar bya/ /gzer ba der gnas gong bur 'dug /de ngos btsir bas tshor ba chung / /tsha ba la sogs chung gyur na/ /smin pa yin pas khong 'bras ni/ /

brtol te rma ltar gso bar bya/ /nang gi char gnas khong 'bras ni/ /smin pa'i mtshan ma'ang 'di nyid yin/ /smin nas bu ga rnags gyur te/ /de ni steng ma 'og tu dbyung / /rang nyid rdol ba'i nad de ni/ /zas phan byin zhing btang snyoms gzhag /zhag bcu'am bcu

gnyis bar du ni/ /sman pas bla brnan las bsrung bya/ /rnag ni legs par mi 'dzag na/ /ba ra Na sogs chu dron nam/ /shi kru sbrang rtsi blud pa'am/ /de dang sbyar ba'i nas thug blud/ /rgya shug rgya sran nas kyi ni/ /yu sha dang ni bza' ba bsngags/ /zhag bcu yan

chad kyi lce ba/ /mar ram seng phrom dag gis ni/ /nyams stobs ji bzhin sbyang bar bya/ /sbyangs nas tag ta sbrang rtsi blud/ /'di la kun kyang skran lta bur/ /nad thabs ji bzhin gso bar bya/ /khong 'bras kun dang gnas skabs dang / /thams cad du ni gu gul gtang / /

de bzhin brag zhun rang rang gi/ /sbyor bar bcas te khu ba blud/ /'bad de smin pa las bsrung bya/ /smin na shin tu gso dka' yin/ /gzhan yang myur du tsha byed pas/ /khong 'bras zhes ni de la bshad/ /gal te gcin snyi las gyur na/ /gcin snyi ba yi gso ba bya/ /nu

mar byung la 'di ltar ni/ /mi bcing thams cad rma ltar gso/ /dbral tshe nu zho 'dzag pa dang / /nu sor nag por mi gnod bsrung / /ma smin gnas skabs thams cad du/ /de yi nu zho btsir zhing bzho/ /rgyu rlugs rlung shas che ba la/ /dur byid snum can gyis sbyangs shing / /a

mra'i 'bras bu seng phrom mar/ /e raN+Da dang skyid de ba'i/ /mar dang sman mar 'dren mar sbyin/ /de nas rlung 'joms sman khu snum/ /lde gu mas gtong drag po bya/ /sha khu bcas pa'i zas sbyin zhing / /shing mngar snum bskol 'jam rtsi gtang / /rlung 'joms dugs dang

bsku mnye bya/ /smin nas dral la rma ltar gso/ /rgyu rlugs khrag mkhris las gyur pa/ /smin dang ma smin ji bzhin du/ /rma dang skrangs pa'i gso ba bya/ /rgyun tu khrag kyang dbyung bar bya/ /bad kan las gyur skyer pa yi/ /phye ma gcin sbyar ba blud/ /'di la mnyed

bya ma gtogs par/ /bad kan rmen bu'i gso ba bya/ /smin nas dbral te dzA ti yi/ /me tog go bye ang ko la/ /lo ma bdun pa pa to la/ /nim pa yung ba byi dang ga /dug mo nyung dang til mar bskol/ /rma sbyang phyir ni blud pa bsngags/ /tshil las gyur la bye'u rug sogs/ /

ba gcin sbyar te btags pa'am/ /mgo bo'i bkru sman dag gis bya/ /rlig pa'i srubs mtshams ma gtogs par/ /'phel gtsags kyis ni dbral nas ni/ /tshil ni legs par dbyung bar bya/ /rma ni sbrang rtsi nag tshur dang / /rgyam tsha nges par bskus nas btsems/ /

de la tshil ni sbyang ba'i phyir/ /sdong ros sug smel su ma na/ /go bye pi pi ling mU la/ /til mar ngag ni bsku bar bya/ /rma ni 'byor bar gyur gyi bar/ /snum dang dugs kyang bsten par bya/ /gcin byung snum gyis dugs bya zhing / /ras ma phra mos dkri bar bya/ /

srubs mtshams 'og tu dmu rdzing bzhin/ /legs par dbral te gzag par bya/ /rma bkab bcing dang 'byor par bya/ /rgyu ma byung bar gyur pa dag /rlig par phyin par ma gyur la/ /rlung gi rgyu rlugs bzhin du gso/ /ba sbu ba ni srang brgya dang / /rtsa ba bcu pa eraN+Da/ /

a shwa gan+d+h+ya nye shing dang / /pa ya s+ya dang dUr ba gnyis/ /'dam bu ku sha bu ram gnyis/ /a ha ga lar bcas pa ni/ /re re srang ni bcu bcur byas/ /chu bre brgya rtsa nyi shu brgyad/ /bskol ba brgyad cha lus pa ru/ /der ni bu ram srang sum cu/ /e raN+Da yi mar bre

do/ /'o ma mar ni bre do do/ /pi pi ling dang de rtsa ba/ /shing mngar rgun 'bru lce myang tsha/ /la la phud dang dong gra gzhug /de btsos skyid de ba zhes bya/ /gzhon sha can gyi bcud len yin/ /rlung dang than pa lam du 'gro/ /bzhon stsogs bsrung ba bsdams mi dgos/ /skyid

de ba dang phyug po dang / /bde ba bsten dang bud med dang / /bud med rgan mo'i khyo dang ni/ /dpal skyed rtsod pa zlog byed cing / /dus kun du ni brten gyur na/ /mdog mdangs sha ni rgyas byed cing / /rgyu rlugs khong 'bras skran gzhang 'brum/ /pho mtshan mo mtshan

rlung gis nyen/ /'or nad dmu rdzing mchin pa dang / /rtug skam nad ni sel byed mchog /snum gyi bkru sman 'jam rtsi yis/ /gal te rgyu rlugs ma zhi na/ /dang po 'jam rtsi btang nas ni/ /de nas chu sor gnas pa ni/ /zla ba kham pa'i kha 'dra bas/ /rlung lam dgag phyir

bsreg par bya/ /mthe bong steng gi rgyus pa ni/ /ser zhing snal ma 'dra ba gang / /khab kyis bteg ste thad ka ru/ /gang na nad yod bcad de bsreg/ /gzhan dag de las logs gzhan nam/ /srin lag sor mo bsreg ces zer/ /kha cig 'di ni bad kan rlung / /las gyur

skran mcher la bya zer/ /bi sha tse nad gang na yod/ /mthe'u chung srin lag dag la bya/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ gso ba'i gnas kyi le'u bcu gsum pa'o// //de nas skran gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /rlung gyur skran ni mi bzad na/ /phyis

'phyen ni 'gags gyur na/ /rtsub dang grang byung rlung nad la/ /phan pa'i til mar dag gis gso/ /zas skom 'jam rtsi sbyar ba dang / /bsku byug snum 'tshos dugs dpyad bya/ /sbo dang zug dang rengs pa dang / /'gags pa la ni mchog tu bya/ /snum 'chos dugs ni

byas pa yis/ /bu ga'i rgyun srang mnyen byed la/ /rlung shas che ba gzhom bya zhing / /phyis sri ba sel skran 'joms/ /lte ba yan chad skyes pa yi/ /skran la mchog tu snum blud phan/ /zhu ba'i gnas brtan 'jam rtsi bya/ /lto bar gnas la gnyi ga bya/ /rlung can skran ni

drod che la/ /phyis rlung ni 'gags gyur la/ /bza' btung nyams brtas byed pa dang / /snum dang dro ba sbyin par bya/ /rlung gyur skran la bad kan dang / /mkhris pa srung zhing ni ru ha/ /'jam rtsi bcas pa'i sbyor ba ni/ /yang dang yang du bya ba yin/ /'jam rtsi mchog tu

skran 'joms par/ /shes bya de ni rlung gi nad/ /dang por rang gi gnas su bcom/ /'phral du skran ni sel bar byed/ /de bas skran la rgyun du ni/ /mas gtong drag po 'jam rtsi bcas/ /btang bar gyur pas rlung bad kan/ /mkhris pa'i bdag nyid can rnams sel/ /

shing kun dang ni tsha ba gsum/ /rtsabs ru tsha dang kha ru tsha/ /se 'bru ma nu go snyod dang / /zi ra 'u su la la phud/ /star bu ya bak+Sha ra dang / /zur pa shu dag tsi tra ka /a za gan+d+ha sug smel dang / /bye rug pa ni zho dang bcas/ /mar bskol rlung gi skran sel zhing / /gzer dang

lto sbos 'joms par byed/ /spa ma'i 'bras bu tsha ba gsum/ /zi ra go snyod tsha ba lnga/ /a za mo dang lce myang tsha/ /zho dang 'o ma mar dang ni/ /se 'brul phug/ /rgya shug gi/ /khu ba bskol bas rlung gi ni/ /skran dang dmu rdzing lto sbos dang / /rtsib logs snying dang lto ba gzer/ /

mngal nad gzhang 'brum pho ba'i nad/ /lud pa dbugs mi bde ba dang / /rims nad yi ga 'chus pa 'joms/ /rtsa ba bcu pa su sha bi/ /pa la sha ka ma nu dang / /ba sbu ba gnyis e raN+Da/ /ra sna a shwa gan+d+ha dang / /ga bra'i rtsa ba zur pa dkar/ /sle tres gan+d+ha pa lag

srang ni gnyis gnyis tshad byas dang / /nyi shu rtsa brgyad nang du bskol/ /nas dang rgya shug rgya sran dang / /ma sha bre re lhan cig tu/ /chu bre bcu drug nang du bskol/ /khu ba der zho bre bzhi dang / /mar bre gang dang slar bskol la/ /se 'bru amra ta ka dang / /kha lung khu ba bre

rer bcas/ /de bzhin rtsab mo skyur rtsabs tsha/ /g.yer ma shu dag ga bra'i rtsa/ /ra sna pi pi ling rtsa ba/ /tsi traka dang 'u su dang / /ya ba na ga la la phud/ /star bu zi ra nag po dang / /go snyod zi ra spa ma'i 'bras/ /ka ra pi ba zangs rtsi ba/ /u sha ka dang dur byid dang / /

dan da mur ba byi dang ga /se 'bru hasti pi pi ling / /gze ma spang spos sru sru'i rtsa/ /ga gon rgyal mo ga gon gyi/ /sa bon shu ti thal sman gnyis/ /bye'u rug pa thal tres dang / /ni li na la'i 'bras bu dang / /lan tshwa gsum dang tsha ba gsum/ /bcas pa'i zho yi sman mar

des/ /sngar bshad nang ni gso dka' dang / /brjed byed smyo byed gcin sri dang / /rlung nad gzhang 'brum myur du 'joms/ /tsha ba gsum dang 'bras bu gsum/ /'u su dbyi mong byi dang ga /tsi tra ka ni lde gur byas/ /'o ma mar bskol rlung skran 'joms/ /sgog skya'i rtsa ba

srang brgya dang / /rtsa ba chen po srang lnga lnga/ /chu srang stong dang de bskol la/ /bzhi cha lus par phyed se 'bru'i/ /khu ba chang dang 'bras khu skyur/ /zho rnams de yi phyed phyed dang / /tshab gsum dang 'bras bu gsum/ /shing kun dbyi mo la la phud/ /dbyi mong star bu lce myang tsha/ /

thang shing srang ni phyed phyed dang / /mar ni bre gang bcas par bskol/ /rlung las gyur pa'i skran kun 'joms/ /gcong chen skabs su bshad pa yi/ /srang drug pa yi mar yang blud/ /'o ma'i skyin pa chang dngas sam/ /se 'bru zho spris sbyar ba'i mar/ /

rlung las gyur pa'i skran sel to/ /rlung gi skran la bad kan 'phel/ /dro 'jam yi ga 'chus pa dang / /snying rgal khong lci snyom gyur pa/ /de la skyug sman gtang bar bya/ /gzer dang lto sbos bshang sri la/ /gnas shes byas nas snum bcas pa'i/ /sman mar sman gyi phye ma

dang / /khu ba ri lung byas pa yi/ /rgya shug se 'bru chu dron dang / /dar ba chang dang skyur rtsabs dang / /chang dngas bcas pa nang par blud/ /yang na phye ma la sogs pa/ /thug pa sla bor byas pa ni/ /nang par yang na zas sngon blud/ /phye ma kha lung khu ba dang / /lan mang

bgrungs par gyur pa yi/ /las ni byed par nus gyur pa'i/ /ri lus rlung dang bad kan 'joms/ /shing kun shu dag a ru ra/ /a zag gan+d+ha se 'bru dang / /'u su pa ta ti mu sa/ /ma nu zur pa dkar po dang / /spa ma'i 'bras bu ci ta ka /thal sman gnyis dang lan tshwa

gnyis/ /tsha ba gsum dang zir dang / /dbyi mo da trig star bu'i phyes/ /rlung dang bad kan las gyur pa'i/ /snying ga rtsib logs chu so dang / /mjug to mngal dang chu sor gzer/ /bad kan rlung las gyur pa'i nad/ /gso dka' skran dang 'phyen dang ni/ /gcin dang phyi sa

'gags pa dang / /lkog ma 'gags shing snying nad dang / /skya rbab yi ga 'chus pa dang / /mcher pa gzhang 'brum skyigs bu dang / /rgyu rlugs lto sbos me drod nyams/ /lud pa dbugs mi bde ba sel/ /rgyam tsha dang ni la la phud/ /a za mo dang pi pi ling / /dong gra rim

bzhin cha res bskyed/ /thams cad dang ni cha mnyam pa'i/ /a ru ra bsres phye ma 'di/ /me ni mngon sum nyid yin no/ /tsha ba gsum dang ti mu sa/ /rgyam tsha dang ni zi ra gnyis/ /cha mnyam shing kun brgyad cha'i phyir/ /mar bsres kham gyi dang por zos/ /me drod drag po skyed

byed cing / /rlung gi skran ni 'joms par byed/ /shing kun shu dag kha ru tsha/ /dong gra dang ni la la phud/ /rnam rgyal ma nu ru rta dang / /dur byid dan da'i rtsa bar bcas/ /cha res bskyed pa'i phye ma 'di/ /chu dron sbyar 'thungs lto ba'i nad/ /skran dang dmu rdzing la sogs pa/ /seng

ges ri dwags tshogs rnams ni/ /mthu rtsal gyis ni zil non ltar/ /nad rnams 'joms par byed pa yin/ /lce myang tsha dang pi pi ling / /a za mo dang a ru ra'i/ /phye ma chu dron sbyar blud na/ /skran can bad rlung las gyur tshogs/ /lcags mdas lus phug bzhin du 'joms/ /

ka rany+dza yi lo ma dang / /in tra ba ru Na dbyi mo/ /kru trug tres dang bca' sga dang / /pi pi ling dang na le sham/ /ma lus rim bkod rgyam tshas bkab/ /bsregs la btags te zho dang ni/ /zho ga chu sbyar blud pa dag /skran dang dmu rdzing 'or nad dang / /skya rbab gzhang

'brum nad rnams sel/ /shing kun sum 'gyur rgyam tsha dang / /de las e raN+Da yi mar/ /sum 'gyur de las sgog skya yi/ /khu ba sum 'gyur sbyar ba dag /blud na skran dang dmu rdzing dang / /rgyu rlugs gzer gyi nad rnams 'joms/ /kha lung khu ba shing kun dang / /se 'bru

rgyam tsha kha ru tsha/ /chang gi dngas mar sbyar blud na/ /rlung las gyur pa'i skran nad sel/ /bca' sga zho gnyis bu ram zho/ /bzhi dang til nag bkrus srang gcig /gcig tu phye mar btags byin zhing / /'o ma dro 'jam rjes blud na/ /rlung gi snying nad skran gzhang 'brum/ /

mngal gzer rtug pa 'gags pa sel/ /rlung gyur skran la e raN+Da'i/ /mar ni chang dang sbyar ba blud/ /bad rlung 'dres la'ang de nyid blud/ /mkhris pa 'dres la 'o ma bcas/ /gal te mkhris pa 'phel 'gyur te/ /tsha gyur rlung gi skran can la/ /mthun pa rjes su 'byin

byed pa/ /snum bcas bkru sman gtang bar bya/ /des kyang tsha ba ma bri na/ /de la gtar ga gdab par bya/ /sgog skya bshus pa skam po ni/ /srang bzhi chu dang 'o ma ni/ /brgyad 'gyur gyi ni nang du bskol/ /'o ma ma lus par blud na/ /rlung gyur skran dang rtug 'gags

dang / /rlung nad gzugs 'khums mi bzad rims/ /snying nad khong 'bras zad byed rnams/ /'o ma de yis myur du 'joms/ /til mar chang dang ba gcin dang / /rang skyur ya bak+Sha rar bcas/ /blud na skran dang dmu rdzing dang / /lto sbos cig car

'joms par byed/ /tsitra pi pi ling spru la/ /bca' sga shing kun eraN+Da/ /rgyam tsha kha ru tsha bcas pa/ /bskol ba blud na gzer ba dang / /lto sbos rtug 'gags sel mchog yin/ /ma nu e raN+Da'i rtsa ba/ /nas dang byi tsher ba sha ka /chu dang bskol te blud na ni/ /lto

nad sbos dang gzer 'joms byed/ /ma nu e raN+Da 'jag ma'i/ /rtsa ba thang shing bca' sga rnams/ /chu dang bskol ba'i khu ba blud/ /khong pa phrag pa rgyab gzer 'joms/ /brag zhun dang ni pa ya s+ya/ /rtsa ba chen po lnga bskol ba/ /rlung gyur skran nad can la blud/ /

rtug skam nad la nas kyi ni/ /chag tshe snum dang ldan pa sbyin/ /pi pi ling ngam la phug gi /khu ba dang ni sbyar ba sbyin/ /nas kyi zan dron 'o mar bcas/ /rlung gi rtug 'gags nad la sbyin/ /yang na mon sran gre'u'i chan/ /snum mang lan tshwar ldan pa sbyin/ /dur byid

dan ti ni li ni/ /a ru ra dang kam pi l+ya/ /nas tshig 'khus thal kha ru tsha/ /dong gra mar dang bcas pa ni/ /dri mar bcas la bkru sman gtang / /ni li ni dang 'bras bu gsum/ /ra sna pa la pu tse shel/ /kaN+Da ka ri byi dang ga /srang re chu bre bzhi nang bskol/ /khu ba

brgyad cha lus pa ru/ /mar bre gang dang zho bre gang / /su d+ha k+Shi ra srang gcig bskol/ /de las mar bre re re na/ /nas thug thug sla sbyar te blud/ /zhu zhing legs par 'khrus nas ni/ /sha khu bza' ba sbyin par bya/ /ni li ni yi sman mar 'dis/ /skran mdze dmu rdzing ngo

khabs dang / /'or nad skya rbab rims nad dang / /sha bkra mdzer ba smyo byed 'joms/ /khyim bya rma bya gong ma sreg /khrung khrung bye'u'i sha khu dang / /sA lu'i 'bras chan chang dang mar/ /rlung gi skran ni sel ba yin/ /nyung zhing snum la sla zhing dro/ /kha zas rlung skran can gyis

bza'/ /btung bar chang gi dngas ma'am/ /'u su bskol ba'i chu tshan blud/ /mkhris gyur skran ni snum dro las/ /byung ba de la rgun 'bru dang / /a rur bskol bu ram bcas/ /kam pi l+ya dang sbrang rtsi dang / /cho ga'am khrag mkhris gsor bshad pa'i/ /bkru sman blud de

'khrus pa phan/ /rtsub dro las byung skran la ni/ /tig ta'am ba sha ka bskol ba'i/ /mar ni blud par byas pa'am/ /rtswa yi rtsa ba lnga pa 'am/ /'tsho byed sde tshan bshad pa dang / /mar bskol blud na mchog tu phan/ /n+ya gro d+ha sogs sde tshan rnams/ /'tsho byed sde tshan 'o

ma phan/ /de yang bshol du med gyur par/ /sman pas bkru sman dang bskol ba'i/ /mar ram 'o ma dag gi ni/ /bkru sman nye bar gtang bar bya/ /skyu ru ra dang bu ram shing / /khu ba mar ni bre gang dang / /a ru ra ni zhi cha bcug /bskol ba'i mar blud mkhris skran

sel/ /yang na mkhris pa'i khong 'bras gsor/ /bshad pa'i seng phrom sman mar blud/ /rgun 'bru shing mngar pa ya s+ya/ /shug pa tsan+dan sbrang rtsi rnams/ /'bras bkrus chu dang blud na ni/ /mkhris pa'i skran ni sel bar 'gyur/ /kyi lce ba ni srang gnyis dang / /

chu bre do ni bskol nas su/ /brgyad cha lus pa btsags pa ni/ /dro 'jam 'o ma cha mnyam blud/ /yang na de steng 'o tshan ni/ /me drod ji bzhin blud par bya/ /de yis nad ni bsal bas na/ /mkhris pa can gyi skran zhir 'gyur/ /tsha la mar grang bsku ba'am/ /bsil

ba'i sman mar bcas pa bsku/ /chu skyes lo mas reg bya zhing / /snod chus gang la reg pa phan/ /gzer dang me drod bri 'gyur zhing / /tsha ba'i dang po tshul can gyis/ /mkhris pa'i skran la khyad par du/ /khrag ni lan mang dbyung ba phan/ /rtsa ba chad skran mi tsha

zhing / /nye bar zad par 'gyur ba dang / /khrag ni skyur bar mi 'gyur la/ /khrag las gyur pa'i nad kyang mang / /gnyid cing nad ni bsal bal/ /skam sar skyes pa'i sha khus brta/ /brtas na nyes pa lhag lus la/ /slar yang mar ni bsten par bya/ /khrag dang

mkhris pa [(]'phal [,]'phel[)]gyur pas/ /skran ni smin par phyogs pa la/ /gso ba'i bya ba ma rnyed cing / /mkhris pa'i khong 'bras ltar gso bya/ /sA lu ba dang ra'i 'o ma/ /pa tol skam sa'i sha mar dang / /pa ru sha ka skyu ru ra/ /rgun 'bru 'bra go se 'bru dang / /

kha rar bcas pa'i kha zas bza'/ /btung ba ba la bri ha ti/ /la sogs bskol ba blud par bya/ /bad kan las gyur dang po ni/ /slon bya de mi bzod smyung bya/ /kha dro tsha ba'i thug stsogs kyi/ /rim par de 'og me drod skyed/ /shing kun la sogs thal sman dang / /shing kun star bu nyis 'gyur gtang / /

gal te 'bur ram gting ring gyur/ /tshor ba chung zhing sra la brtan/ /lto sbos la sogs ldan pa'i skran/ /dugs byas nas ni snyi bar bya/ /bad kan las gyur skran can gyis/ /mar tsha thal sman bcas chu blud/ /nas tshig

'khus thal tsha ba gsum/ /rgyam tsha shing kun kha ru tsha/ /se 'bru rtsa ba bcu bskol mar/ /bad kan las gyur skran myur 'joms/ /bse shing 'bras bu srang gnyis dang / /rtsa ba chung ngu lnga srang re/ /chu bre bzhi yi nang du bskol/ /bzhi cha lus pa de dang ni/ /mnyam

pa'i 'o ma mnyam pa'i mar/ /byi dang ga dang shing kun dang / /nas tshig 'khus thal lce myang tsha/ /kaN+Da ka ri rtsabs ru tsha/ /zur pa ra sna shing mngar dang / /pi pi ling dang dong gra rnams/ /zho ni gnyis gnyis bcas par bskol/ /go bye yi ni sman mar ni/ /bad kan

skran ni sel ba'i mchog /mchin pa mcher pa'i nad dang ni/ /skya rbab dang ni pho ba'i nad/ /lud pa dbugs mi bde ba 'joms/ /de nas skran can de yi lus/ /ma lus par ni dugs byas la/ /skran kun la ni thog ma nyid/ /snum chos dugs ni byas gyur na/ /

gso ba gang zhig byas pa des/ /grub kyi rtsub chos kyis mi 'grub/ /snum zhing dugs kyis brlan lus kyi/ /skran ni snyi bar gyur pa dang / /ji ltar bshad pa'i bum pa ni/ /bzhag pas bkang nas de bsal bya/ /de nas ras nang chud byas te/ /tshad shes pa yi

skran dbral bya/ /shing gcad ra rmig me long rnams/ /ji snyed pa yis legs par bcing / /des skran gcig pu dbyi bya zhing / /snying dang rgyu mar reg mi bya/ /til dang zar ma'i sa bon dang / /nyungs kar e raN+Da yis byug /bad kan skran ni lcags kyi snod/ /dro

'jam tsam gyis dugs bya'o/ /de ltar gnas las bskyod nas ni/ /bad kan skran la snum bcas pa'i/ /bkru sman dang ni 'jam rtsi dag /rtsa ba bcu pa ldan par sbyang / /pi pi ling dang skyu ru ra/ /rgun 'bru sha ma dur byid sogs/ /srang re dang ni bskol ba

la/ /e raN+Da yi zhun mar ni/ /bre re 'o ma drug 'gyur dang / /lhan cig bskol bar gyur ba 'di/ /'dres pa'i sman mar zhes bya ste/ /skran can 'khru bar byed pa'i mchog /rgyu rlugs khong 'bras gzer ba ni/ /rlung gi nad la bdud rtsi yin/ /yang na ni li ni sman mar/ /

srang gnyis tshad du blud pa'am/ /de bzhin skyid de ba'i sman mar/ /dmu rdzing skabs bshad mar yang phan/ /dan da tsi tra a ru ra/ /srang ni nyi shu rtsa lnga lnga/ /chu bre bcu drug nang du bskol/ /brgyad cha lus btsags a ru ra/ /bcas pa bu ram dan dar mnyam/ /bcug

la til mar dur byid phye/ /srang bzhi bca' sga pi pi ling / /zho gnyis bskol bsgrangs lde gu de/ /sbrang rtsi til mar cha mnyam pa/ /dri sna bzhi bzhi srang re gzhug /de las a ru gcig dang / /lde gu srang gcig bcas zos na/ /bde bar nad ni bre gang 'khru/ /

skran dang snying nad gzhang 'brum dang / /glo nad lto sbos sbyar ba'i dug /mdze dang dmu rdzing nad slong dang / /yi ga 'chus dang mcher pa'i nad/ /skya rbab mig ser 'joms par byed/ /'di ni dan da tsi tra ka /a ru ra yi lde gu yin/ /su d+ha k+Shi ra'i rlan dang ni/ /dur byid

dang ni legs bsres te/ /mar dang sbrang rtsi zho gnyis bcas/ /lde gus legs par 'khru bar 'gyur/ /ru rta dur byid a ru ra/ /dan da gu gul nas tshig 'khus/ /ba gcin bcas blud yang na ni/ /gu gul nyi tshe ba gcin blud/ /cho ga grub pa las bshad pa'i/ /

bkru sman drag po skran 'joms gtang / /rtsa ba zug cing lhun che la/ /sra zhing lci la tshor ba med/ /gting ring ma smin pa yi skran/ /thal sman dang ni chang rnying dang / /me yi las kyis bsal bar bya/ /bad kan shas che thal sman ni/ /gzhang 'brum

rde'u pho ba'i nad/ /gso ba'i skabs bshad gtang bya zhing / /zhag gcig zhag gnyis kyis chod pa/ /yang na zhag gsum ngal sos la/ /lus kyi nyams stobs nad dag ni/ /'phel 'bri'i las la brtson par bya/ /thang shing dur byid dan dang / /pu tse shel dang

tsha ba lnga/ /swa rdzi ka thal nas tshig 'khus/ /pa ta dang ni 'bras bu gsum/ /ru rta ba sar su gan+d+ha/ /zi ra nag po srang phyed phyed/ /lan tshwa lnga ni srang re dag /btags pa'i phye ma til mar dang / /zhag dang zho dang mar dang sbrus/ /rdza mar dub ma shor bsregs/ /

rdza ma me yi mdog 'gyur de'i/ /thal ba blangs pa 'o ma mar/ /dar ba chang sogs sbyar te blud/ /skran dang rtug 'gags rgyu rlugs dang / /gzhang 'brum dmu rdzing pho ba'i nad/ /srin nad brjed byed smyo byed gdon/ /mngal nad khu chu las gyur rde'u/ /byi la sbrul gyi

dug rnams kyang / /thal ba'i sman 'dis sel bar byed/ /bad kan las gyur skran la snum/ /sha khu 'o ma mar bsten la/ /thal sman btang na skran dag ni/ /gnas nas dum bu dum bu ru/ /bcad nas thur du 'byin par byed/ /me drod chung zhing yi ga 'chus/ /chang

goms snum can za ba la/ /rgyun srang dag phyir mnan chad dang / /chang rnying skyon med blud par bya/ /sA lu drug cu pa rnying pa/ /rgya sran skam sa'i srog chags sha /tsi tra pu ri ka rany+dza/ /a ti man da la la phud/ /ba ri na yi myu gu dang / /shi kru bil ba gzhon nu

dang / /la phug gzhon nu skam po dang / /kha lung shing kun star bu dang / /se 'bru nas tshig 'khus thal ba/ /tsha ba gsum dang ngar ba dang / /mar dang til mar kha zas sbyin/ /btung bar chang gi dngas ma dang / /skyur rtsabs dar bzhog chu/ /bid la la phud phye ma/ /

rtsa ba la bskol khu ba'am/ /rgun chang rnying pa blud par bya/ /pi pi ling dang de'i rtsa ba/ /go snyod rgyam tsha kru trug tres/ /chang gi snyigs mar bsres pa yis/ /skran ni myur du sel bar byed/ /slon dang smyung ba dugs dang ni/ /sman mar blud dang bkru sman dang / /'jam

rtsi thal sman mnan chang dang / /chang rnying ri lu phan zas kyis/ /bad kan skran can gting zug pas/ /gal te zhi bar ma gyur na/ /de la khrag dbyung tha mar ni/ /mde'u lcags sogs kyis bsreg par bya/ /de nas skran ni mthar thug par/ /sman pas gos kyis dkris

nas ni/ /lte ba chu so rgyu ma snying / /spu yi phreng ni ma gtogs par/ /shin tu gting thug ma yin par/ /mde'u bsregs pa'am yang na ni/ /gzong bu'i lcags ni bsregs pa'am/ /tin du ka yi shing gis bsreg /de nas bsil bas me dbal ni/ /zhi nas rma

ltar gso bar bya/ /ma zhu rjes 'brel smyung byas nas/ /thug pa sogs kyis me drod bskyed/ /rang rang rim dang 'brel pa las/ /'dren ma'i gso bas gso bar bya/ /btsas pa'i dus ni 'das gyur pa'i/ /bud med la skran khrag skyes 'byung / /de la lus snum

dugs byas par/ /snum gyi bkru sman gtang bar bya/ /til bskol mar dang bu ram dang / /tsha gsum ga bra'i rtsa ba'i phye/ /khrag las gyur pa'i skran dang ni/ /bud med zla mtshan med la blud/ /ga bra'i rtsa ba pi pi ling / /thang shing ka rany+dza'i shun pa/ /pi pi ling gi rtsa

ba yi/ /phye ma til bskol chur sbyar ba/ /blud na khrag skran nad sel byed/ /pa la sha yi thal ba ni/ /bre brgyad til mar mar bre brgyad/ /bskol te tshad bzhin blud na ni/ /skran ni snyi bar byed pa yin/ /gal te snyi bar ma gyur na/ /mngal gyi bkru sman gtang bar

bya/ /til gyi lde gu thal sman bcas/ /yang na su d+ha k+shi rar sbyar/ /yang na de gnyis dang bsres pa'i/ /nya ni kha bo gtang bar bya/ /phag rgod nya yi mkhris pa yis/ /bsgos pa'i ras ma gzhug par bya/ /yang na bu ram thal sman gnyis/ /phabs sbyar mngal ni sbyang phyir

gtang / /khrag mkhris sel ba'i thal sman ni/ /sbrang rtsi mar bcas lde gu sbyin/ /sgog skya'i chang ni rnon po dang / /nya yang de la sbyin par bya/ /rtsa ba bcu pa thal sman dang / /'o ma ba gcin mas gtad bya/ /des kyang khrag 'dzag ma gyur na/ /skran

'jig byed pa'i sbyor ba phan/ /byung nas mar dang til mar bsku/ /bcad pa dag ni mi bya zhing / /sha khu 'bras chan bza' ba dang / /btung ba chang ni sar pa blud/ /khrag ni shas cher byung gyur na/ /khrag mkhris sel ba'i gso ba bya/ /rlung gi nad kyis nyen gyur na/ /rlung gi gso

ba kun kyang bya/ /ltor spos sogs dang rtug skam la/ /rlung bsal gsol ba ji bzhin bya/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /gso ba'i gnas kyi le'u bcu bzhi pa'o// //de nas dmu rdzing gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /nad ni shas cher stsogs pa dang / /bu ga'i rgyun

srang 'gags pa la/ /dmu rdzing 'byung bas de yi phyir/ /rtag tu bkru sman gtang bar bya/ /yang na zla ba gcig gam gnyis/ /e raN+Da'i mar ba gcin bcas/ /'o mar bcas pa'am ba gcin nam/ /ma he'i gcin ni blud bya zhing / /ba yi 'o ma blud par bya/ /lto sbos tsha

bas nyam thag cing / /skom dang brgyal bas non pa la/ /rnga mo'i 'o ma blud par bya/ /rtsub cing rlung shas che ba yi/ /nad ni sbyong bar 'dod pa yis/ /snum chos dang ni sman mar dag /dmu rdzing 'joms pa sbyar bar bya/ /srang drug rtsa ba bcu pa'i chu/ /zho ga chu ni bre brgyad

bskol/ /dong gra srang gsum mar dang ni/ /til mar bre ni re re dang / /zho ga chu ni bre bzhi dag /bskol ba 'di ni blud gyur na/ /dmu rdzing thams cad 'joms par byed/ /rlung dang bad kan las byung ba'i/ /skran la'ang mchog tu phan pa yin/ /bzhi 'gyur chu dang nyis 'gyur

gcin/ /kru trug tres srang gcig lde gu/ /bre gang mar bskol thal sman bcas/ /dmu rdzing can la blud par bya/ /nas dang rgya shug rgya sran dang / /rtsa ba lnga ni bskol ba'i chu/ /chang dang rang skyur bcas pa dang / /mar bskol ba yang blud par bya/ /snum 'di snum

bcas nyams stobs ni/ /skye zhing rlung nad zhi gyur nas/ /nad ni gnas nas bskyod pa dang / /cho ga grub bshad bkru sman gtang / /pa to la'i rtsa 'bras bu gsum/ /skyer pa byi dang ga zho re/ /kam pi la dang ni li ni/ /tsi tra ka zho gnyis gsum bzhi/ /phyer btags

ba gcin sbyar ba blud/ /'khrus nas thug pa sha khu ni/ /skam sar gnas pa'i sha khu sbyin/ /de nas zhag drug 'o ma dang / /tsha ba gsum dang bskol ba ni/ /yang dang yang du blud byas na/ /'di yis dmu rdzing thams cad ni/ /dmu chur gyur kyang 'joms par byed/ /bi sha

la dang shang khi ni/ /dan da seng phrom shun shu dag /rgya shug phre'u rgun 'bru dang / /rgya shug sbom chu bu ram chang / /ba gcin dang ni sbyar te blud/ /la la phud dang spa ma'i 'bras/ /'u su shu ti zir nag /pi pi ling rtsa ka ra bI/ /a za mo dang zur ba dkar/ /shu dag

zi ra tsi tra ka /tsha ba gsum dang khron bu dang / /'bras bu gsum dang thal sman gnyis/ /ma nu ru rta lan tshwa lnga/ /byi dang ga rnams cha mnyam dang / /dan da cha gsum de bzhin du/ /dur byid bi shal nyis 'gyur/ /sa dal ni bzhi 'gyur te/ /phye ma 'di ni sred med du/ /

zhes bya nad kyi tshogs 'joms byed/ /'di bsten nad ni mi gnas te/ /khyab 'jug gis bcom lha min mtshungs/ /dmu rdzing nad la dar ba blud/ /skran can rgya shug chu sbyar blud/ /rlung gis lto sbos chang sbyar gtang / /rlung nad nyid la chang dngas sbyar/ /phyis 'gags

la zhog chu/ /gzhang 'brum can la'ang zhog chus/ /bcad snyam sems la da trig chus/ /ma zhu ba la chu dron las/ /mtshan bar rdol dang skya rbab dang / /lud pa dbugs mi bde skad 'gags/ /snying dang pho ba'i nad dang ni/ /mdze dang me drod nyams dang rims/ /mche

ba'i dug dang rtsa ba'i dug /dbyig dug sbyar ba'i dug bcas la/ /ci rigs par ni phye ma 'di/ /khong pa snum dang ldan pa la/ /blud nas 'khru ru gzhug par bya/ /spa ma'i 'bras bu bya snu dang / /'bras bu gsum dang ni li ni/ /pu tse shel dang kyi lce ba/ /dur byid shu dgas ta

la/ /rgyam tsha dang ni kha ru tsha/ /pi pi ling ni phye mar btags/ /se 'bru'i khu ba'am 'bras bu ni/ /gsum gyi khu ba'am sha khu'am/ /ba gcin dro 'jam chu las blud/ /'dis ni skran nad thams cad dang / /mcher pa dmu rdzing thams

cad dang / /sha bkra mdze nad ma zhu dang / /drod nyams me drod ma snyoms dang / /gzhang 'brum skya rbab mig ser dang / /rkang lag zha ba'i nad dang ni/ /rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan rnams/ /bkru sman btang bas myur du sel/ /ni li ni dang tsha ba gsum/ /lcang

ma ya bak+Sha ra dang / /lan tshwa dang kru trug tres/ /phye ma zhun mar blud na ni/ /dmu rdzing skran gyi nad rnams sel/ /sbyang byas nyam chung bar bar du/ /rnga mo ba'am ra yi ni/ /'o ma sngon bzhin blud par bya/ /bshol du med pa'i nad la ni/ /bkru sman phyir

ni snum bcas gtang / /mchog tu nyam chung gyur la sbyin/ /a ru ra yi phye ma ni/ /bre gang mar ni bre bzhi dang / /me la bzhus nas gzar bu yis/ /dkrugs nas nas kyi sbun pa'i nang / /zla gcig bzhag nas de rjes la/ /phyung ste legs par bzhus nas ni/ /

a ru ra bskol khu ba dang / /zho ni skyur po bcas pa bskol/ /de 'thungs dmu rdzing skran lto sbos/ /gtun 'dra'i rlung nad khong 'bras dang / /mdze dang smyo byed brjed byed rnams/ /nye bar 'joms par byed pa yin/ /shrI khaN+Da ba'i 'o ma/ /bskol te bsgrangs nas

gzar bus dkrugs/ /las byung mar ni snu ha yi/ /'o mar bcas bskol snga mar mtshungs/ /'o ma bre ni bcu drug dang / /su d+ha k+Shi ra bre phyed bcas/ /zhor gyur bsrubs pa las gyur mar/ /dur byid bskol ba'ang yon tan de'o/ /mar ni bre gang dag dang ni/ /

'o ma brgyad 'gyur nang du ni/ /snu ha'i 'o ma srang gcig dang / /dur byid srang drug bskol de bzhin/ /'di blud 'og tu thug pa dang / /sha khu mngar po'am 'o ma blud/ /ma zhu 'khrus par gyur pa dang / /bca' sga bskol ba'i chu dron blud/ /de nas thug pa de 'og ni/ /

ku lang+tha yi yu sha blud/ /de ltar khong rtsub zhag gsum blud/ /slar yang thug sogs rim par blud/ /rim pa 'di dag nyid kyis ni/ /zhun mar yang dang yang du blud/ /mar ni bskol bar gyur pa 'di/ /sman pa las la byang ba yis/ /skran rnams dang ni dbyig

dug dang / /dmu rdzing bsal phyir blud par bya/ /yang na pi lu lde gur bskol/ /lto sbos sel bar blud par bya/ /seng phrom ni li ni mar ram/ /'dres pa'i sman mar blud par bya/ /nad bsal nas ni rim gyis zas/ /sA lu'i 'bras chan yang zhing nyung / /byin

la dmu rdzing can gyi ni/ /nad kyi lhag ma dag bya'i phyir/ /a ru ra ni rdog ma stong / /ba gcin dang sbyar 'o ma blud/ /yang na pi pi ling rdog stong / /su d+ha k+Shi rar legs bsres pa'am/ /pi pi ling ni bskyed sbyin pa'am/ /'o mar 'thung zhing brag zhun bza'/ /de bzhin

gu gul 'o ma dang / /cha mnyam sge'u gsher khu ba sbyin/ /yang na thang shing tsi tra ka'i/ /lde gu 'o mar sbyar ba blud/ /zla gcig ha ti pi pi ling / /bca' sga 'o mar bcas pa blud/ /dan da tsi tra byi dang ga /dbyi mo tsha ba gsum lde gu/ /zho gnyis 'o ma sbyar blud na/ /

dmu rdzing 'phel ba sel bar byed/ /yang na su d+ha k+Shir mar/ /bcas pa'i kha zas zla gcig sbyin/ /su d+hA k+Shi ra la sbangs ba'i/ /pi pi ling dang khur ba sbyin/ /gal te rtsib logs gzer zhing rengs/ /snying brgal rlung gi nad ldang na/ /de la til mar bil ba

dang / /thal sman dang ni ldan par sbyin/ /tun tu ka dang ba la dang / /ba la sha 'am til sdong dang / /a pa marga ka ta li/ /ag+ni man+thI thal ba rnams/ /so sor gzags pa bskol ba blud/ /bad kan rlung ngam mkhris pa'am/ /de gnyis rlung dang 'dres gyur pa/ /

stobs ldan rang gi sman bcas pa/ /e raN+Da yi til mar phan/ /thang shing arga pa la sha /ha ti pi pi ling shi kru/ /a shwa kar+Na ba gcin bcas/ /lde gu lto ba'i phyi rim byug /bri shi kali shu dag dang / /bca' sga rtsa ba lnga pa dang / /'u su ru rta ba spru gnyis/ /bskol
