ba ba gcin bcas pa blugs/ /'khrus shing lto ba zhum 'gyur ba'i/ /sa ra na la sogs dugs bya/ /gos kyis legs par dkri bar bya/ /de ltar rlung gis spos mi 'gyur/ /gang zhig legs par 'khrus gyur pa/ /slar yang sbos gyur de la ni/ /

snum bcas skyur dang lan tshwa gnyis/ /bkru sman mas gtong drag por bya/ /rlung gis rengs dang bcas gyur pas/ /gang zhig lto sbos gyur pa'i mi/ /de la thal sman rnon po ni/ /ba gcin bcas pa mas gtong bya/ /de ltar dmu rdzing spyi yi ni/ /gso ba grags

par bshad pa yin/ /de nas rlung gyur dmu rdzing can/ /bi da ri sogs mar bskol blud/ /de nas snum gyis zhen byas shing / /yan lag dugs bya bkru sman gtang / /'di la seng phrom mar ram ni/ /'dres pa'i sman mar lan mang blud/ /thug stsogs rim pa

byas nas ni/ /stobs bskyed phyir ni 'o ma blud/ /nyams stobs rnyed nas rim gyis ni/ /'o ma de ni spang bar bya/ /yu sha sha khu skyur dang ni/ /lan tshwar bcas pas me drod bskyed/ /rtug 'gags gyur nas slar snum dang / /dugs bya de 'og mas gtong bya/ /

rtsub cing mas gtong sman bcas pa'i/ /rtsa ba bcu pa'i mas gtong sbyar/ /g.yo zhing tshigs rus la 'jug pa/ /rtsub cing 'phyen dang phyis 'gags/ /me drod che la til mar dang / /e raN+Da'i mar rlung 'joms pa'i/ /sman dang bskol ba'i 'jam rtsi gtang / /khrus

mi bya la 'o ma mar/ /sha khu la sogs zhi byed gtang / /mkhris pa las gyur stobs che la/ /mngar dang sbyar ba'i snum chos bya/ /sha ma dur byid 'bras bu gsum/ /bskol ba'i khu ba'i bkru sman gtang / /de 'og n+ya gro d+ha sogs bskol/ /khu bar kha ra sbrang

rtsi mar/ /ldan pa ni ru yang phan/ /de bskol snum gyi 'jam rtsi gtang / /nyam chung dang po 'jam rtsi gtang / /'o ma mas gtong ges sbyang bya/ /me stobs bskyed cing snum chos bya/ /'o ma dur byid lde gu'am/ /e raN+Da dang bskol ba'am/ /sad la dang kyi

lce ba'am/ /dong ga bskol ba dag gis bya/ /bad kan bcas la ba gcin bcas/ /rlung can tig ta mar bcas pa'i/ /yang dang yang du bkru sman gtang / /'di dag 'o mar bcas bza' ba'am/ /bi da ri sogs sde bskol blud/ /dmu rdzing can la 'o thug ni/ /

sbyin zhing nye bar bsku bar bya/ /slar yang 'o ma 'jam rtsi dang / /bkru sman yang dang yang du gtang / /rim pas nges par gnas byas te/ /ma yengs mkhris gyur dmu rdzing bsal/ /bad kan las gyur snum chos bya/ /dug mo nyung sogs mar bskol gtang / /nyams

stobs ldan pas dugs byas te/ /su d+ha k+Shi ra'i bkru sman gtang / /thug sogs rim dang thal sman tsha/ /ldan pas bad kan sel ba sbyin/ /ba gcin tsha gsum til mar bcas/ /mas gtong drag po bya ba'ang phan/ /mung+ga ka sogs lde gu dang / /snum gyi 'jam rtsi de

nas gtang / /kha zas 'o ma tsha ba gsum/ /yang na rgya sran khu ba sbyin/ /bad kan 'thas shing lto ba skrang / /rmongs bag snying 'phar yi ga 'chus/ /me drod chung ba chang goms na/ /chang snying nas tshig 'khus thal blud/ /shing kun dang ni pi pi ling / /'bras bu gsum

dang thang shing dang / /ser po rnam gnyis go bye dang / /na le sham dkar pu tse shel/ /seng phrom shu dag bca' sga dang / /bong nga gla sgang ru rta dang / /sa ra na dang lan tshwa dang / /btags pa zho dang snum bzhi sbyar/ /du ba ma shor bar bsregs la/ /thal ba de las zho gnyis

dang / /chang dang chu dron zhog chu/ /chang rnying mnan chang sbyar ba blud/ /skran dang dmu rdzing gtun 'dra'i nad/ /rtsig pa 'dra dang gsud dang skran/ /snying nad mcher pa gzhang 'brum dang / /rtug 'gags nad rnams 'joms par byed/ /bad kan dmu rdzing nyam chung la/ /

chang rnying dang ni bag cin dang / /lcags phye dang sbyar btung ba dang / /thal sman til mar bcas pa blud/ /nyungs kar phabs dang la phug gi/ /sa bon btab pa'i lde gu yis/ /bsku zhing dmu rdzing dugs bya ba/ /'di la rgyun du sbyang bar bya/ /'dus pa las gyur dmu

rdzing ni/ /me drod nyams stobs ma zad la/ /nad shas che ltar re thag chad/ /gso ba'i sbyor ba 'di bya'o/ /dan da tra pan ti'i 'bras bu/ /btsir ba'i mar ni blud pa bsngags/ /dmu rdzing gsos kyang ma 'chos dang / /mchog tu nyes gsum

las gyur la/ /de yi nye du dris nas ni/ /ka ka da ni 'ol ma se/ /ka ra bI ra'i rtsa ba dag /btags pa'i lde gu chang sbyar blud/ /yang na bza' btung nang du ni/ /dug kyang rim pas sbyin par bya/ /gang du sbrul ni khros gyur nas/ /shing tog la ni dug bsgos pa/ /

de yis 'di yi nad tshogs ni/ /brtan zhing zhen pa lam log zhugs/ /bshig ste phyir ni 'byin par byed/ /dug gis myur du 'jig par byed/ /de bzhin nad med 'gyur ba'am/ /'chi ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin/ /nad bsal nad de chu grang gis/ /khrus byas 'o ma'am

thug pa blud/ /dur byid kyi ni tshod ma'am/ /rgya sne'u mar ti ka par+Ni/ /ka la sha ka sne'u yi/ /khu ba dang ni bskol ba la/ /skyur dang lan tshwa snum med cing / /shin tu tshos pa'am ma tshos min/ /zas med zla ba gcig sbyin la/ /de nas skom na khu ba blud/ /de ltar

zla ba gcig gi bar/ /tshod mas nad ni bsal gyur nas/ /nyam chung ba la brtas byed pa/ /rnga mo'i 'o ma blud par bya/ /mcher pa'i dmu rdzing nad gzhi ni/ /ji bzhin snum chos dugs bya ste/ /zho dang 'bras chan bcas byin la/ /lag pa g.yon nas gtar ga gdab/ /

nyam stobs rnyed nas slar yang ni/ /snum blud nas ni sbyang bar bya/ /rgya mtsho'i nya phyis thal sman dang / /'o ma sbyar ba blud par bya/ /pu ti ka rany+dza'i thal ba/ /skyur khu kha ru tsha dang ni/ /pi pi ling gi phye btab ba blud/ /shi kru bskol ba pi pi ling / /rgyam tsha tsi tra ka btab blud/ /

shing kun stsogs phye thal sman dang / /mar sbyar me drod ji bzhin sbyin/ /dong gra ngan pa pi pi ling / /cha mnyam a ru ra nyis 'gyur/ /kha ru tsha ni cha phyed bcas/ /phye ma chu dron sbyar ba blud/ /byi dang ga dang kru trug tres/ /phye dang rgyam tsha shu dag rnams/ /kham skyogs

nang bsregs 'o mar bcas/ /blud na skran dang mcher nad 'joms/ /rgya shug lo ma til mar bsres pa dag /legs par mnyes shing bsregs te de 'og tu/ /gtun bus btsir la de 'og 'o ma blud/ /mcher pa dmu rdzing tshogs ni 'jig par 'gyur/ /ro hita yi lcug

ma gtubs/ /dum bu a ru ra bcas chu'am/ /ba gcin nang du zhag bdun ni/ /sbangs la de ni blud gyur na/ /mig ser mcher pa skran gzhang 'brum/ /srin nad gcin snyid mu rdzing 'joms/ /ro hi ta ka'i shun lpags ni/ /srang ni nyi shu rtsa lnga'i tshad/ /rgya shug bre

dor bcas pa ni/ /bskol ba'i khu ba byas nas ni/ /tsha ba lnga ni sring re dang / /de dag kun dang mnyam pa yi/ /ro hi ta ka'i shun lpags phye/ /mar bre gang dang btsos nas ni/ /'di blud pa yis myur du ni/ /mcher pa rab tu 'phel ba sel/ /chu shing til gyi sdong po

dang / bu ram shing bsregs thal ba ni/ /til mar bskol ba blud gyur na/ /bad rlung las gyur mcher nad 'joms/ /ma zhi skran gyi cho ga ltar/ /rlung dang bad kan shas che la/ /mcher nad spyi bag ma gyur la/ /me yi las ni spyad par bya/ /mkhris gyur 'tsho byed sna

bcu dang / /mar dang 'o ma 'jam rtsi gtang / /khrag dbyung sbyang ba bya ba dang / /'o ma blud par gyur pa'ang bsngags/ /mchin pa mcher pa la ltar gso/ /gtar ga lag pa g.yas nas bya/ /rgyu ma 'gags gyur dugs byas la/ /ba gcin sman ni rno bcas pa'i/ /

til mar lan tshwa bcas pa yi/ /ni ru ha ni 'jam rtsir bya/ phyis sla 'gyur kha zas dang / /bkru sman rnon po 'di la gtang / /rtug 'gags bsal ba'i gso ba ni/ /rlung 'joms byed pa gang yin bya/ /rgyu ma rdol ba'i dmu rdzing la/ /dugs ma gtogs

pa'i gso ba kun/ /bad kan dmu rdzing lta bur bya/ /sogs pa bzhin du chu gzags shing / /sman pas de ltar 'tsho tsam bya/ /dmu chu la ni chu yi ni/ /nyes sel sman ni dang po ni/ /sman rno ba gcin ldan pa dang / /sna tshogs thal sman ldan par sbyin/ /drod

skyed bad kan 'joms pa yi/ /zas kyis de ni gso bar bya/ /ra yi ril ma'i thal ba'i chu/ /ba gcin bcas gzags me bskol ba/ /ska bar gyur pa de nang du/ /pi pi ling dang de'i rtsa ba/ /bca' sga dur byid lan tshwa lnga/ /dan da khron bu

'bras bu gsum/ /shu dag karka ta sring gi/ /ya bak+Sha ra pa ta la/ /swa rdzi kaSha zhes bya ba/ /zho ni gnyis gnyis btags phye gzhug /rgya shug tsam gyi ri lu bya/ /de nas skyur rtsabs dang sbyar la/ /blud na ma zhu 'or nad dang / /dmu chu'i nad ni 'phel ba sel/ /de

ltar sman gyis ma thub na/ /rgyu 'gags la sogs dmu rdzing gsum/ /gnyen gyi rgyal po la zhus te/ /mtshon gyi las ni spyad par bya/ /rgyu 'gags rdol ba'i dmu rdzing la/ /snum zhen dugs byas lte ba'i 'og /g.yon logs su ni sor bzhi yi/ /lto ba'i phyogs

su bzhag nas ni/ /sor bzhi tsam gyi tshad dbral la/ /de nas rgyu ma phyung nas ni/ /btags te spu dang dri ma dang / /'byar bag rdo ba la sogs bsal/ /brtol ba zug rngu phyung nas ni/ /rnam par bsal la gzags par bya/ /bu ga dbral la 'char gzhug cing / /

zin nas de yi lus kyi ni/ /mgo bo rnam par gcad par bya/ /de rjes mar dang sbrang rtsi yis/ /bskus nas rgyu ma legs par gzhug /de 'og phyi'i ngos nas rma btsem/ /de nas sa nag shing mngar gyi/ /lde gus legs par bsku bar bya/ /de 'og rlung med gnas

su ni/ /bzhag la 'o mas gsos pa dang / /snum gyi snod nas bcing bar bya/ /chu bcas dmu rdzing til mar ni/ /rlung 'joms bskol bas bskus nas ni/ /chu dron blugs pas dugs bya zhing / /lto ba ras kyis dkris nas ni/ /rgyu 'gags rdol par bshang

nas su/ /sor gcig tsam ni dbug par bya/ /der ni gce'u bcug nas ni/ /de la chu phyed gzags par bya/ /de nas gce'u phyung nas ni/ /til dang rgyam tsha'i lde gu yis/ /rma bskus nas ni bkag nas su/ /ras kyis lto ba dkri bar bya/ /zhag gsum yang na

zhag bzhi zhing / /zhag ni bcu drug bar gyis bya/ /de ni bar bar dub bsti zhing / /chu ni nyung zad nyung zad dbyung / /lto ni lhod par gyur pa na/ /shin tu dam du dkri bar bya/ /chu ni gzags pa smyung byas la/ /thug pa lan tshwa snum med blud/ /zla drug bar du 'o mas

gso/ /zla gsum thug pa 'o thug blud/ /zla gsum bar du'o thug gam/ /'bras bu skyur bcas sha khu ni/ /lan tshwa snum ni nyung ba blud/ /khre dang ci tse rnying po sbyin/ /de ltar lo gcig 'bad pa yis/ /chu yi dmu rdzing legs par gso/ /spang ba rnams ni bsdams pa

dang / /brtan par bya zhing skom med bya/ /gang phyir dmu rdzing thams cad ni/ /nad sogs pa las byung bas na/ /de phyir rlung sogs bsal ba yi/ /gso ba kun la bsngags pa yin/ /nad kyis lto ba gang 'gyur pas/ /me drod 'bri bar gyur pa yin/ /de bas

nang na drod skyed pa'i/ /rtsa ba lnga bcas nyung ba dang / /lan tshwa snum dang kha ba nyung / /'ju sla'i kha zas sbyin par bya/ /ba gcin dang ni sbangs pa yi/ /drug cu pa yi 'bras dag las/ /thug pa 'o thug btsos nas ni/ /ci 'dod par ni sbyin par bya/ /dmu rdzing skyon

ni sbyang ba'i phyir/ /de rjes bu ram shing khu blud/ /de ni rlung mkhris bad kan rnams/ /rang rang gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur/ /shin tu tsha ba'i chu lan tshwa/ /rtsub cing bshang sri grang zhing lci/ /bu ram til g.yos tshod ma dang / /chu 'thung lus ni 'khru ba dang / /rtsol

drags lam dub nyin mo gnyid/ /bzhon pas 'gro ba spang bar bya/ /shin tu ska sla min zhing mngar/ /dar ba skom du blud pa bsngags/ /rlung la rgyam tsha pi pi ling / /mkhris par kar tsha ba gsum/ /bad kan las gyur la la phud/ /rgyam tsha zi ra sbrang rtsi dang / /tsha ba

gsum dang ldan pa sbyin/ /'dus pa las gyur sbrang rtsi dang / /shu dag til mar bca' sga dang / /shu ti ru rta lce myang tsha/ /mcher pa rgyun 'gags dmu rdzing la/ /tsha ba gsum dang la la phud/ /rgyam tsha go snyod spa 'bras bcas/ /rgyu rdol sbrang rtsi pi pi ling / /tsha ba

gsum dang ldan pa blud/ /chu yi dmu rdzing can la ni/ /tsha ba gsum bcas blud na phan/ /rlung dang bad kan gyis gzir zhing / /lus lci lto sbos yi ga 'chus/ /tshad 'khru me drod nyams pa la/ /dar ba bdud rtsi lta bu yin/ /sbyor ba kun

gyi rjes la ni/ /'o ma nye bar sbyar bya ste/ /lus zungs thams cad brtan byed cing / /stobs bskyed nad ni lhag lus sel/ /sman gyis nyams smad gyur lus la/ /'o ma bdud rtsi lta bu yin/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ gso ba'i gnas kyi

le'u bco lnga pa'o// //de nas skya rbab kyi nad gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /skya rbab nad la dang por ni/ /dge ba chen po'i sman mar ram/ /ba yi lnga dang tig ta che'am/ /dong ga sogs bskol sman mar blud/ /se'u 'bru phul gang 'u su phyed/ /

tsi tra ka dang bca' sga las/ /srang re pi pi ling srang phyed/ /lde gur byas pa mar srang ni/ /nyi shu chu bre bzhi nang bskol/ /skya rbab snying nad gzhang 'brum skran/ /mcher rlung bad kan gyis nyen sel/ /drod skyed lud pa dbugs mi bde/ /sel zhing dbugs 'khyil

bder 'byung byed/ /bu btsas dka' dang mo gsham la/ /'di ni mchog tu bsngags pa yin/ /snum byas skyug sman rnon po gtang / /slar yang snum bcas bkru sman ni/ /'o ma gcin sbyar btang ba'am/ /mkhur bkang lan mang byas pas sbyang / /dan da'i 'bras

bu'i khu ba dro/ /tang pal yang na rgun 'bru ni/ /srang brgyad zhag gcig spangs mnyes pa/ /de 'thungs skya rbab nad sel to/ /a ru ra btags ba gcin sbyar/ /yang na de bskol 'bras bu gsum/ /khron bu ma sha dur byid dang / /thang shing bca' sga'i lde gu ni/ /ba

gcin srang brgyad sbyar ba'am/ /ba gcig lhan cig bskol ba blud/ /de dag nyid ni mar bskol ba/ /blud na'ang nad ni sel bar byed/ /yang na lcags phye ba gcin nam/ /'o ma zhag bdun bzhag pa blud/ /zhu nas kha zas 'o ma'am/ /sha khu mngar po sbyin par bya/ /

stod smad sbyangs nas a ru ra/ /sbrang rtsi mar sbyar lde gu sbyin/ /bi sha la dang pu tse shel/ /gla sgang ru rta thang shing dang / /dug mo nyung ni zho gnyis gnyis/ /mur ba srang phyed bong nga ni/ /zho gcig de yi phyer btags chu/ /dro 'jam sbyar blud sbrang rtsi sbyin/ /skya rbab rims

dang khong tsha dang / /lud pa dbugs mi bde skran sbos/ /yi ga 'chus dang ma zhu rlung / /khrag mkhris des ni sel bar byed/ /sle tres dang ni ba sha ka /'bras bu gsum dang pu tse shel/ /tig ta nim pa rtsa mkhris rnams/ /bskol te bsgrangs par sbrang rtsi ni/ /btab

pa blud na skya rbab dang / /mig ser khrag mkhris 'joms par byed/ /tsha ba gsum dang tsi tra ka /'bras bu gsum dang byi dang ga /ga dur dang mnyam lcags kyi phye/ /mar dang sbrang rtsi dar ba'am/ /chu dron 'o mar sbyar blud na/ /mig ser skya rbab snying nad dang / /mdze

dang gzhang 'brum nad rnams sel/ /dong gra lcags phye til dang ni/ /bu ram cha mnyam pa yi tshad/ /pi pi ling ni nyis 'gyur gzhug /ri lu skya rbab can la sbyin/ /ta bya skyer pa'i shun pa dang / /dbyi mong pi pi ling rtsa ba/ /thang shing rtsa ba gsum stsogs dgu/ /

phye mar btags pa nyis 'gyur gyi/ /man du ra'i phye dngul rdo 'dra/ /de dag gi ni brgyad 'gyur gyi/ /ba gcin nang du so sor bskol/ /ri lur bya bar bzod pa dang / /gcig tu bsres te ri lur bya/ /'di ni ma du ra'i ri lu/ /de zos dar ba 'thungs na ni/ /skya rbab can

la srog ster ro/ /mdze dang ma zhu 'or nad dang / /brla rengs yi ga 'chus pa dang / /gzhang 'brum mig ser gcin snyi dang / /mtsher pa'i nad rnams zhi bar byed/ /ta bya brag zhun rdul lcags kyi/ /dri ma sna re srang lnga lnga/ /tsi tra ka dang 'bras bu gsum/ /tsha ba

gsum dang bye dang ba/ /srang re kha ra srang brgyad sbyar/ /phye ma sbrang rtsis sbrus pa yis/ /skya rbab dug dang lud pa lu/ /gcong chen mi bzad rims dang ni/ /mdze dang ma zhu gcin sri dang / /skran dbugs mi bde yi ga 'chus/ /khyad par du ni brjed byed dang / /mig ser

gzhang 'brum nad rnams 'joms/ /dug mo nyung dang 'bras bu gsum/ /nim pa gla sgang pa to la/ /dong gra bskol ba'i khu bar ni/ /brag zhun srang brgyad zhag bcur ram/ /nyi shu'am sum cu'i bar du sbangs/ /ka ra dkar po de mnyam dang / /

smig rkang dang ni pi pi ling / /kar ka ta sring skyu ru ra/ /srang re'i tshad du byas pa dang / /kaN+Da ka ri'i rtsa 'bras bu/ /srang gcig tshad du byas pa dang / /dri sna gsum ni zho gnyis gnyis/ /sbrang rtsi srang gsum byas pa dang / /ri lu zho gnyis tshad byas zos/ /se

'bru'i khu ba 'o ma dang / /bya yi sha khu chu dron dang / /a sa ba dang chang rnying dang / /de ni zos rjes blud pa'am/ /zas sngon zas kyi rjes blud na/ /skya rbab mdze dang rims mcher pa/ /mgo 'khor gzhang 'brum mtshan bar rdol/ /rnag dang snying nad khu ba'i nad/ /

gcin nad drod nyams sel byed cing / /skem dang sbyar dug dmu rdzing dang / /lud pa khrag mkhris gsar pa dang / /'or nad skran dang lkog ma'i nad/ /rgyu rlugs mgo 'khor bcas pa yi/ /nad kun sel zhing dge ba yin/ /rgun 'bru pi pi ling bre re/ /khar srang

ni lnga bcu dang / /shing mngar bca' sga smig rkang dag /srang ni gnyis gnyis phye mar byas/ /skyu ru ra khu bre bcu drug /nang gzhug lde gu bzhin du bskal/ /bsgrangs par sbrang rtsi bre gang gzhug /de las zho gnyis tshad zos na/ /gzugs 'khums skya rbab nad

dang ni/ /mig ser gyi ni nad 'joms so/ /rtsa ba lnga pa chung ngu'i chu/ /rgun 'bru skyu ru ra'i khu ba/ /bza' dang btung bar sbyar ba ni/ /skya rbab mig ser nad sel to/ /de ltar skya rbab nad la ni/ /spyi yi sman ni bstan pa yin/ /mkhas pas nad dmigs so so

yi/ /stobs dbang las kyang sbyar bar bya/ /rlung gyur phal cher snum chos bya/ /mkhris par kha dang bsil ba gtang / /bad kan las gyur rtsub tsha dro/ /'dus par 'dren mar sbyar bar bya/ /sa zos las gyur sbyang ba ni/ /rnon pos lus las bsal bar

bya/ /de 'og lto sbyang stobs bskyed phyir/ /de la zhun mar sbyin par bya/ /tsha ba gsum dang bil ba dang / /ser po gnyis dang 'bras bu gsum/ /ba spru ba gnyis gla sgang dang / /lcags phye ba ta byi dang ga /thang shing breSh+tsi ka li dang / /ga bra'i rtsa ba 'o ma

mar/ /bskol ba 'thungs na sa zhag zos/ /las gyur nad ni thams cad sel/ /de bzhin nA ga ge sar dang / /shing mngar ku sha pi pi ling / /'o mar bskol ba blud na phan/ /de la sred par gyur na ni/ /byi dang ga dang pa ta dang / /nim pa bskol ba'i

khu ba'am/ /mur ba dang bsres sa zhag dag /sred pa dgag phyir sbyin par bya/ /sa zhag bye brag tha dad nad/ /rjes su mthun pa'i sman sbyin bya/ /mig ser la ni mkhris 'joms sman/ /skya rbab gnod pa med pa sbyin/ /a ru ra ni brgya'i khu bar/ /a ru

ra rdog lnga bcu'i phyed/ /mar ni bre gang nang du bskol/ /skran dang mig ser skya rbab 'joms/ /dong ga bur shing khu ba'am/ /bi da ri dang skyu ru ra'i/ /khu ba tsha ba gsum bcas la/ /srang gcig blud na mig ser 'joms/ /dan+da bu ram nyis 'gyur gyi/ /

lde gu chu srang sbyar ba blud/ /dur byid phye ma sbrang rtsir bcas/ /'bras bu gsum gyi khu ba blud/ /'bras bu gsum mam sle tres sam/ /skyer pa'am nim pa'i khu ba dag /sbrang rtsir sbyar ba nang re ni/ /mig ser gyis ni nyen la blud/ /skyer pa yug snam skyu ru ra/ /

mig ser sel ba'i mig sman yin/ /mig ser can gang dri ma ni/ /til btags lta bur byung gyur na/ /bad kan lam bkag de la ni/ /bad kan mkhris pa sel bas gso/ /rtsub grang lci dang mngar ba dang / /drag shul rlung ni 'gags pa yis/ /rlung dang

bad kan gcig gyur pa/ /mkhris pa phyir 'byin de yi tshe/ /mig dang pags pa ser ba dang / /phyis skya bar gyur pa dang / /bshang 'gags rgyu ma 'khrugs pa dang / /snying ga lci ba nyid 'gyur la/ /mkhris pa'i yan lag la brten pa/ /rid cing drod chung rtsib

logs gzer/ /skyigs bu lud pa yi ga 'chus/ /rims 'debs rim gyis 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de la rma bya'am khyim bya dang / /sreg pa'i sha khu'am la phug ni/ /skam sa'i khu ba'am rgya sran khu/ /rtsub kha skyur bar sbyar ba sbyin/ /rab tsha skyur

dang rno ba dang / /lan tshwa shin tu dro ba'ang bsngags/ /kha lung khu ba tsha ba gsum/ /sbyar ba'i lde gu'ang sbyin par bya/ /des ni mkhris pa rang gnas su/ /'jug cing bshang mdog tha mal 'gyur/ /rgyu ma 'khrugs sogs bla brnan bcas/ /rlung yang rab tu zhi bar

'gyur/ /'di yis bla brnan zhi nas ni/ /mig ser gso ba'i cho ga bya/ /mig ser khong du zhen pa na/ /brag zhun ba gcin dang sbyar ba/ /gser gyi dri ma'am ta bya ni/ /ba gcin sbyar ba zla gcig blud/ /ha lis ka sle tres khu/ /'o ma ma he'i mar bskol ba'i/ /

skyu ru ra yi khu ba dang / /dur byid sbyar ba'i bkru sman blud/ /'khrus nas kha zas mngar bag ni/ /rlung 'joms mkhris pa 'joms pa sbyin/ /sngar bshad rgun 'bru lde gu dang / /mngar ba'i sman mar zhun mar sbyin/ /'o ma mas gtong sman dang ni/ /'jam rtsir

bcas pa bsten par bya/ /me drod bskyed par bya ba'i phyir/ /rgun chang chang rnying sbyin bya zhing / /lud pa'i skabs bshad a ru ra'i/ /shing mngar ra dar ba pi pi ling / /'o mar bcas pas nad dmigs dang / /me drod ji bzhin sbyin par bya/ /mkhas pas 'or nad skabs

bshad pa'i/ /gso ba skya rbab la yang sbyar/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /gso ba'i gnas kyi le'u bcu drug pa'o// //de nas 'or nad gso ba bshad par bya'o/ /'or nad yan lag kun zhugs shing / /nad skyes ma smin la dang por/ /

smyung byas kha zas yang ba bza'/ /bong nga thang shing byi dang ga /dug mo nyung dang na le sham/ /bskol ba'i chu dron blud par bya/ /yang na a ru ra bca' sga/ /thang shing ba spru bskol ba'am/ /lcags phye dgu par bcas pa blud/ /'or nad shas cher a ru ra/ /ba

gcin bcas pa sbyang phyir blud/ /'bras bu gsum bskol pu tse shel/ /dur byid lcags phye tsha gsum bcas/ /yang na de bzhin gu gul lam/ /brag zhun dang ni sbyar ba blud/ /me drod chung zhing ma smin la/ /lci zhing rtug 'gags yang na 'khru/ /tsha ba gsum dang

rtsab ru tsha/ /sbrang rtsi dar bar sbyar ba'am/ /a ru ra dang bu ram bcas/ /bu ram bca' sgar sbyar ba'am/ /zos rjes dar ba blud par bya/ /sge'u gsher bu ram cha mnyam pa/ /srang phyed tshad kyis bskyed nas ni/ /che tshad srang lnga'i bar du ni/ /zla gcig za zhing

yu sha dang / /'o ma sha khu bcas zos na/ /'or nad dmu rdzing skran gzhang 'brum/ /gcin dang dbugs mi bde cham pa/ /sgyid snyom ma zhu mig ser dang / /lus skem gdon gyi nad rnams dang / /lud pa bad kan sbyor 'dis sel/ /sge'u gsher dong gra lde gu'i

khu ba dang / /'o ma dag dang mar ni bskol blud na/ /'or nad sbrid pa dmu rdzing me drod nyams/ /nad kyis zil non na yang nad med 'gyur/ /ma zhu med cing phyi sa 'gags/ /'or nad kyis gzir tsha ba gsum/ /dur byid dan da kru trug tres/ /bskol ba'i 'o

ma blud par bya/ /ma he'am yang na ba gcin nam/ /'o ma btung zhing de dang bza'/ /zhag bdun yang na zla gcig par/ /rnga mo'i 'o ma blud pas gso/ /ti mu sa dang nas tshig thal/ /la la phud dang tsha ba lnga/ /na le sham dang se 'bru dang / /pa ta 'u su star

bu dang / /bil ba gzhon nu zho gnyis gnyis/ /chu bre bzhi bskol mar bre gang / /bskol ba blud na 'or nad dang / /gzhang 'brum skran dang za khu 'joms/ /zho dang tsi tra ka bsres las/ /byung ba'i mar ni dar bar bcas/ /tsi tra ka btab bskol ba ni/ /

yon tan gong ma mtshungs pa yin/ /thang la 'bar dang tig ta che/ /dge ba'am a ru ra'i sman mar/ /dus shes pa yis sbyin par bya/ /rtsa ba bcu pa'i khu ba ni/ /bre bzhir a ru ra brgya bskol/ /der ni bu ram srang brgya gzhug /tsha ba gsum dang dri sna

gsum/ /nas tshig 'khus thal cung zad btab/ /bsgrangs nas sbrang rtsi bre phyed gzhug /de byin nas ni 'or nad dang / /rims skran gcin nad lus skem pa/ /ma zhu khrag mkhris rlung dang ni/ /sgregs skyur kha dog mi sdug dang / /gcin

nad rlung gi khu chu'i nad/ /dbugs mi bde dang yi ga 'chus/ /mcher pa'i nad dang sbyar ba'i dug /dmu rdzing gi ni nad rnams sel/ /nas dang sA lu 'bras rnying zas/ /rtsa ba bcu ba'i chu dang bskol/ /lan tshwa nyung zhing snum shas chung / /byin na 'or nad sel bar

byed/ /rgya sran mung+ga'i khu ba ni/ /thal sman rtsa ba gsum dang ldan/ /de bzhin skam sa'i sha rus sbal/ /skyin gor byi dur sha khu sbyin/ /btung ba dar ba gsar pa dang / /chang ni sman dang bcas pa blud/ /zi ra zur pa dzi ban ti/ /ma nu tsi tra ka ra dang / /ya

bak+Sha ra bil ba'i rkang / /da trig zho re'i tshad du byas/ /mar dang til mar nang du brngos/ /byin na 'or nad skran gzhang 'brum/ /tshang 'khru dang ni snying gi nad/ /me drod chung dang gcin nad sel/ /tsha ba lnga dang sbyar ba yi/ /thug pa'ang yon tan de dang 'dra/ /rdo dreg

ru rta ston ne ya/ /ha re Nu ka a ru ra/ /shri be ta ka shug pa dang / /chu srin sder mo pri yang ku/ /pri ka thang shing spang spos dang / /pi pi ling dang dbyi mo dang / /ku nan na ta bya ma ka /ma li ka dang dri sna bzhi/ /bal bu'i lo ma gla sgang dang / /gan+d+ha pa la sha la ni/ /

bsku ba'i til mar dag dang ni/ /khrus kyi chu dang lde gu bya/ /nim pa arga ba spru ba/ /nag tam la'i chus khrus bya/ /yan lag phyogs gcig skrangs pa la/ /ka ra bIr ba spu ba/ /ki shu ka dang pi la sha /'bras bu gsum dang seng phrom dang / /na li ka dang thang shing dang / /

spang spos ko sha ta ki dang / /bong nga ta la'i lo ma dang / /dza yan ti dang 'ol ma se/ /ka ka dang ni sa le shing / /pri sha kar+Ni byi mo dang / /ri ti bri ti glang po'i sna/ /lde gu dro 'jam bskus pas phan/ /de nas rlung gyur 'or nad la/ /zla phyed bar du dur byid dam/ /

yang na e raN+Da mar blud/ /rlung gi rtug 'gags la de nyid/ /zas kyi sngon du 'o ma 'am/ /sha khu blud cing rlung 'joms pa'i/ /sman gyi dugs dang bsku ba bya/ /phyogs gcig skrangs la kha lud dang / /ag+ni man+tha spang spos dang / /bca' sga thang shing lde gu bsku/ /

mkhris gyur tig ta'i sman mar dang / /n+ya gro d+ha sogs bskol ba blud/ /skom dad che dang rmongs bag tsha/ /'o ma bsku byug bsil ba bya/ /pa to la rtsa kyi lce ba/ /shing mngar thang shing pu tse shel/ /skyer pa tsan+dan a ru ra/ /da na lcang ma bi la sha /pi pi ling dang

mar bskol blud/ /khong tsha mgo 'khor skom dad che/ /'dus pa'i nad dang me dbal skrang / /lus tsha rims dang bcas pa sel/ /bad kan las gyur dong gra sogs/ /til mar dang ni bskol ba blud/ /rgyun srang 'gags shing me drod nyams/ /rmongs bag yi ga

'chus pa la/ /thal sman chang rnying mnan chang dang / /ba gcin dar bar bcas pa blud/ /pi pi ling dang 'ba' cha rnying / /shi kru'i shun pa zur pa dang / /ba gcin lde gu dro 'jam sbyar/ /bsku dang dril ba'i las la sbyar/ /ru rta ag+ni man+tha dang / /rgya sran dong

ga tsi tra ka /ba gcin chu bskol bas khrus bya/ /tsa rong a ka ru yis byug /na ga ba ra sa ral/ /a za sring gi am pa ta/ /a za gan+d+ha zhes bya dang / /a shwa gan+d+ha'i lde gu ni/ /yan lag phyogs gcig skrangs la phan/ /nad gzhi ji bzhin yan lag ni/ /nye

ba'i phyogs nas gtar ga bya/ /'dres pa'i nad la nad gzhi ni/ /shas che'i dbang du gso ba bya/ /go snyod pa ta gla sgang dang / /kaN+Da ka ri tsha ba lnga/ /skyer pa chu dron sbyar blud pa/ /rtsa mkhris bca' sga chu dron blud/ /nad gzhi gsum gyi 'or nad ni/ /yun rings

lon zhing tshabs chen sel/ /sle tres dang ni a ru ra/ /thang shing gu gul ba spru ba/ /ba gcin sbyar blud dmu rdzing dang / /mdze dang skya rbab srin bu'i nad/ /gcin nad bad kan za khu dang / /rlung ni stod du 'byams pa sel/ /de ltar rang rang nad kyi dbang byas bshad/ /

snad pa las byung ba la khrag dbyung zhing / /bsil sman mar khu byugs shing blugs par bya/ /dug skyes skrang la dug sel sbyor ba bya/ /grong dang rlan can chur gnas sha rid rlon/ /tshod skam til gyi zas dang bu ram can/ /phyer btags

zas dang zho dang lan tshwa dang / /kha zas rul bag chang skyur yos sha skam/ /'dres pa'i zas dang lci dang ma goms za/ /tsha ba bskyed dang nyin par gnyid log dang / /mtshan mo gnyid ma log dang nyal po rnams/ /'or nad can gyis de dag thams cad spang / /

yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /gso ba'i gnas kyi le'u bcu bdun pa'o// //de nas me dbal gso ba bshad par bya'o/ /med bal nad la thog ma nyid/ /smyung ba dang ni rtsub chos dang / /khrag dbyung skyug sman bkru sman gtang / /

snum chos spyad par mi bya'o/ /po son cha dang dug mo nyung / /shing mngar bcas pa'am pa to la/ /nim pa'i lo ma pi pi ling / /skyug sman btang na me dbal 'joms/ /kyi lce ba yi khu ba'am/ /rgun 'bru 'bras bu gsum yang rung / /dur byid phye ma

btab pa'am/ /'o ma mar sbyar bkru sman ni/ /khong ni zhen pa'i nad la ni/ /khyad par du ni sbyang ba gtang / /sbyang min nad tshabs chung ba la/ /zhi sman tsan+dan ut+pal gtang / /gla sgang nim pa pa to la/ /pa to la sogs nyid dag gam/ /thal tres gla sgang skyu

ru ra/ /pu shel tse ni chu bskol blud/ /me dbal skom dad can la ni/ /byi tsher ba dang par ba ta/ /sle tres bca' sga bskol ba ni/ /khu ba bsgrangs par blud par bya/ /skyer pa sran chung pu tse shel/ /pa to la dang 'bras bu gsum/ /nim pa shing mngar gyi lce ba/ /

bskol ba mar dang bcas pa blud/ /yan lag nad zhugs nad khrag nyid/ /thog ma nyid du khrag dbyung bya/ /pags pa sha dang rgyus pa 'drul/ /khrag rul ba las byung ba yin/ /smin zhing bad kan zad pa dang / /rlung dang mkhris pa shas che la/ /tig ta tig ta

chen po'i mar/ /kyi lce ba bskol mar phan no/ /khrag dbyung khong pa dag gyur nas/ /nad ni sha lpags la gnas na/ /phyi rol na[+]sa ni byug stsogs kyis/ /'phral du me dbal zhi bar 'gyur/ /rlung gyur shu ti gla sgang dang / /'o ma 'u su pa ra hi/ /a ta ka la

pi pi ling / /thang shing sha kru ru rta yi/ /lde gu byug pa byas na phan/ /mkhris pa n+ya gro d+ha sogs sde/ /de bzhin pad+ma ut+pal sogs/ /n+ya gro d+ha'i rtsa gzhon nu dang / /chu shing nang gi lo mar bcas/ /pad+ma'i rtsa ba lde gu dang / /lan brgya bkrus pa'i mar

gyis byug /pad+ma can gyi 'dam bsil ba'am/ /mu tig btags par gyur pa la/ /dung ngam byu ru nya phyis sam/ /yug snam mar dang bcas pa byug /bad kan las gyur 'bras bu gsum/ /shug pa btsod dang pu tse shel/ /ka ra bI ra 'dam bu'i rtsa/ /a

nan ta yi lde gu bsku/ /da ba lo ma bdun pa dang / /seng ldeng thang shing bkru sman dang / /gla sgang dong grar bcas pa'am/ /ba ra Na stsogs lde gu bsku/ /dong ga yi ni lo ma dang / /sle sman ta ka'i shun lpags dang / /in+d+ra ba ru na'i lo ma/ /shri sha 'ol ma se me tog//

chu blugs rma bsku sman mar dang / /lde gu'i phye ma ji bzhin du/ /sman ni 'di dag nyid kyis bya/ /rlung rgyas mar ni shas cher bya/ /bad kan gnas shes ma smin la/ /dro dang rtsub pa shas cher sbyar/ /de bzhin mkhris pa'i gnas zhugs la/ /khrag

mkhris lan mar ldan bya/ /shin tu bsil zhing srab pa dang / /gos srab nang du bzhag pa ni/ /nus pa chung ba yang dang yang / /gzhan dang gzhan ni sbyar bar bya/ /'dres pa'i nad la las 'di ni/ /'dren mar bya ba bsngags pa yin/ /me ltar tsha lan brgyar

ni/ /bkrus pa'i mar gsar 'ba' zhig phan/ /mar gyi nying khu blugs pa'am/ /shing mngar bskol ba'i chu grang ngam/ /ut+pal pad+ma kha ra'i chu/ /'o ma bu ram shing khu blugs/ /btung ba bsku dang blugs pa dang / /tig ta chen po'i sman mar phan/ /rmen

bu khrag mkhris sel ba yi/ /gso ba ci rigs legs byas la/ /rlung dang bad kan 'joms par byed/ /glan dang dkri ba la sogs phan/ /rmen bu me dbal gzer bcas la/ /til mar rtsa ba bcu dang bskol/ /ba gcin dron mo

chu dron blugs/ /yang na shi kru'i lde gu 'am/ /nag ta ma la'i shun pa'am/ /la phug skam po ba ru ra'i/ /lde gu dro 'jam bsku pa phan/ /dan da shing tsha tsi tra ka /arka snu ha'i 'o ma dang / /bu ram go bye rus nag mtshur/ /lde gus rdo yang 'bigs

byed na/ /bad kan las gyur rmen bu'i nad/ /phyi rol gnas pa smos ci dgos/ /yun ring gnas pa'i rmen bu la/ /la phug rgya sran ku lang+tha'i/ /khu ba thal sman se 'brur bcas/ /gro yi zan dang nas kyi zan/ /rgun chang sbrang rtsi bu ram chang / /kha ra

chang gi dngas mar bcas/ /kha lud khu bar bcas pa dang / /'bras bu gsum gyi sbyor lde gu/ /pi pi ling dang sbrang rtsir bcas/ /thang shing dang ni sle tres dang / /brag zhun gyi ni sbyor ba dang / /gla sgang go bye'i sbyor ba'am/ /sbrang rtsi yi ni sbyor ba dang / /mgo

bkru sman dud rngub pa dang / /sngar bshad skran ni bshig pa dang / /lcags gser lan tshwa bsregs pa dang / /rdo bas btsir bar bya ba yin/ /sman 'di yis ni 'jig par byed/ /sbyor ba sna tshogs de dag ni/ /byas kyang zhi bar ma gyur cing / /shin tu sra bar gnas

gyur la/ /nad stobs che bar gyur pa ni/ /de 'og 'di la thal sman nam/ /lde gu 'am gser gyis bsregs na phan/ /smin par byed pa brnags byas la/ /dbral nas de nas dbyung bar bya/ /'di la khrag ni brnag 'dod pa/ /yang dang yang du gdon par bya/ /

khrag bsal 'og tu slar yang ni/ /rlung dang bad kan sel sman gtang / /tsha zhing smin pas brnags gyur la/ /phyi nang rma ltar gso bar bya/ /skyer pa srin sman kam bi l+ya/ /bskol ba'i til mar rma la phan/ /bad kan mkhris pa shas che la/ /dUr ba'i

khu ba mar bskol phan/ /gso ba'i nad kun phyogs dang steng / /khrag byung ba ni phyogs gcig yin/ /me dbal de ni khrag mkhris dang / /ma 'dres pa las byung mi 'gyur/ /'di yi rten ni khrag nyid yin/ /de bas khrag ni mang du dbri/ /nad gzhi mang po me

dbal la/ /bkru sman ma gyur mar mi sbyin/ /de yis nad ni sra gyur pas/ /pags pa khrag dang sha 'tshed byed/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /gso ba'i gnas kyi le'u bcwa brgyad pa'o// //de nas mdze nad gso ba'i le'u bshad par

bya'o/ /mdze nad kun la thog ma nyid/ /snum blud pas ni gso bar bya/ /de la rlung shas che ba la/ /rtsa ba bcu pa sle tres dang / /sha rang ka ta e raN+Da/ /mi sha sring gi mar ram ni/ /til mar bskol te blud pa phan/ /nim pa pa to pu tse shel/ /skyer pa pha

ta byi tsher pa/ /par pa ta dang kyi lce ba/ /srang re chu bre brgyad kyi ni/ /nang bskol brgyad cha lus pa ru/ /gla sgang rtsa mkhris kyi lce ba/ /dug mo nyung dang pi pi ling / /tsan+dan zho ni gnyis gnyis dang / /zhun mar srang ni bcu gnyis bskol/ /tig ta'i sman mar

de 'thungs na/ /mkhris pa mdze dang me dbal dang / /'brum phran lus tsha skom dad che/ /mgo 'khor g.yan pa skya rbab 'bras/ /rma 'grams 'bras kyi phreng ba dang / /thor bu khong 'bras skran dang ni/ /zad byed smyo byed myos pa dang / /snying nad rab rib ngo

khabs dang / /sha bkra mig ser pho ba'i nad/ /mtshan par rdol dang brjed byed dang / /dmu rdzing zla mtshan mi chod dang / /sbyar dug gzhang 'brum khrag mkhris sel/ /gzhan yang mkhris pa las gyur nad/ /shin tu gso dka' rnams la phan/ /lo ma

bdun pa par pa ta/ /dong ga shu dag pu tse shel/ /shug pa pa ta 'bras bu gsum/ /ser po gnyis dang thal tres gnyis/ /nim pa tsan+dan pi pi ling / /shing mngar sle tres bi sha la/ /dug mo nyung dang pu shel tse/ /rtsa mkhris mur ba ba sha ka /nye'u

shing pu sha pa to la/ /gla sgang byi tsher kyi lce ba/ /skyu ru ra khu nyis 'gyur dang / /de rnams mar gyi brgyad 'gyur chu/ /bskol ba tig ta chen po ste/ /yon tan yang ni sngar bas lhag /bad kan las gyur nim pa dang / /lo ma bdun pa tsi tra ka /

ru rta dong gra tsha ba gsum/ /sa la pi la ya'i mar blud/ /kun la go bye'i mar ram ni/ /yungs kar dUr ba ra'i mar blud/ /byi dang ga dang a ru ra/ /go bye'i lde gu mar bskol blud/ /dong ga'i rtsa ba dag dang mar/ /lan brgya'i bar bskol mar

yang blud/ /seng ldeng bskol ba'i chu bsten na/ /mdze nad myur du sel bar byed/ /'di dag nyid kyis ci rigs par/ /snum chos bsku ba byas pa'ang phan/ /snum gyis zhen la me dbal ni/ /skabs su bshad pa'i sman sbyar gtang / /dpral ba lag pa

rkang pa las/ /'di la gtar ga'ang gdab par bya/ /mdze nad tshabs chung zhal zhal gdab/ /rwa sogs kyis kyang khrag dbyung bya/ /mdze nad 'joms pa'i snum gyis ni/ /'di la bar bar brta bar bya/ /khrag phyung bkru sman gyis sbyang bya/ /lto stong gyur pa

mdze can la/ /ci nas rlung gis 'di yi ni/ /lus mi 'jig pa de ltar bya/ /nim pa sle tres ba sha ka /'bras bu gsum dang pa to la/ /kaN+Da ka ri ka rany+dza/ /lde gu chu dang mar bskol ba/ /sman mar rdo rje can zhes bya/ /des ni me dbal mig ser

rims/ /khrag nad lud pa mdze nad 'joms/ /'bras bu gsum dang tsha ba gsum/ /dur byid kaN+Da ka ri gnyis/ /dan da dong ga pu tse shel/ /shu dag bong nga tsi tra ka /pa tar bcas pa zho gnyis gnyis/ /snu ha'i 'o ma srang gcig dang / /bre gang mar

bskol lto sra ba'i/ /snum chos bkru sman dag tu sbyar/ /mdze dang sha bkra mdzer pa dang / /rgyu rlugs rde'u 'gags skran 'joms byed/ /'di ni rdo rje chen por bshad/ /dan da bre bzhi chu bre ni/ /bcu drug bskol te de mar bskol/ /ko sha ta ki srang gcig

gdab/ /de blud steng 'og sbyong byed yin/ /a bar da ka srang brgyad cu/ /bre bcu drug bskol brgyad cha lus/ /khu ba de ni de'i rtsa ba/ /mar ni bre gang bskol bar bya/ /blud na de bzhin zhag gcig gis/ /bar du chod de legs zhu nas/ /khre rgod rang skyur bskol

ba blud/ /mdze nad sha bkra 'bras kyi phreng / /sel zhing bu mang dran 'dzin 'gyur/ /nI li ti ka'i tshil sbrang rtsi/ /dzA ti'i khu ba mar bcas pa'am/ /seng ldeng a sa na'i chur bcas/ /dbang po bsdams brtan mdze nad 'joms/ /sA lu nas dang gro dang ni/ /ci tse

khre dang mung+ga dang / /sran chung dang ni tu ka ri'i/ /tshod ma kha bo skam sa'i sha /'bras bu gsum dang pa to la/ /seng ldeng nim pa go bye sbyar/ /chang ni sman dang sbyar ba'am/ /dar ba so ma ra dzar bcas/ /bza' dang btung ba mdze la phan/ /skyur tsha lan tshwa can

rnams gnod/ /zho dang 'o ma rlan can sha /bu ram ma sha til mar spang / /pa to la'i rtsa 'bras bu gsum/ /bi sha la ni re re ni/ /cha gsum gyis dbri zho phyed gsum/ /kyi lce ba dang pu tse shel/ /zho phyed dong gra bzhi char bcas/ /de ltar srang gcig brdungs pa

dag /bskol ba'i chu ni 'thungs gyur na/ /nad kyi tshogs ni sbyong bar byed/ /sman de zhu nas skam sa yi/ /ri dwags bya yi sha khu dang / /'bras rnying chan dang sbyar ba bza'/ /sbyor 'di zhag drug bsten na ni/ /mdze nad kun dang skrangs pa'i nad/ /pho ba'i nad

dang gcin sri dang / /gzugs 'khums gso dka'i nad rnams dang / /snying nad chu sor gzer rims sel/ /byi dang ga yi snying po dang / /a ru ra dang skyu ru ra/ /srang re dan da srang gsum dang / /bu ram srang ni bcu gnyis dag /ri lur byas 'di byin gyur na/ /

mdze dang sha bkra dbugs mi bde/ /lud pa dmu rdzing gzhang 'brum dang / /gcin nad mcher pa rmen bu'i nad/ /thor bu srin nad skran rnams 'joms/ /grub pa'i sbyor 'di gnod sbyin ni/ /nor bu bzang pos dge slong zhig /srog 'dor nyid la bshad ces grags/ /

tig ta nim pa 'bras bu gsum/ /shug pa bong nga pi pi ling / /mur ba dang ni pa to la/ /ser po rnam gnyis pu tse shel/ /shu dag in+d+ra ba ru ni/ /dug mo nyung bcas cha mnyam pa/ /dan da dur byid bram sha mi/ /phyi ma bzhin du nyis

'gyur bcas/ /phye ma sbrang rtsi mar sbyar zos/ /mdze dang za gu tshor ba chung / /sel ba'i sman gyi mchog yin no/ /'bras bu gsum dang pi pi ling / /byi dang ga dang sbrang rtsi ni/ /til mar mar sbyar lde gu'am/ /ka ka u dum bA ra dang / /nim pa gla sgang byi

dang ga /tsha ba gsum gyi lde gu ni/ /dug mo nyung gi khu bar bcas/ /blud na lpags nad thams cad 'joms/ /dug mo nyung dang tsi tra ka /nim pa thang shing seng ldeng dang / /lo ma bdun pa a sa na/ /khu bskol mar dang a ru ra/ /sbrang rtsi ldan zos mdze

nad 'joms/ /seng ldeng nim pa sle tres dang / /pa to la dang byi tsher bskol/ /seng ldeng la sogs lnga pa ste/ /khyab 'jug gis ni lha min bzhin/ /mdze nad 'phral du 'joms par byed/ /skyer pa nim pa seng ldeng gi/ /shun lpags bskol bas mdze

nad sel/ /skyer pa nim pa 'bras bu gsum/ /pa tol rtsa pu tse shel/ /shu dag btsod ni bskol ba yis/ /dam chos la brten 'khor ba ltar/ /khrag mkhris las gyur mdze nad gcod/ /sman 'di nyid dang ba yi mar/ /bskol bas rlung gyur mdze nad

rnams/ /mchog tu sel bar byed pa yin/ /seng ldeng nim pa skyer pa dang / /sle tres thang shing sna rer bskol/ /pa tha skyer pa tsi tra ka /dan da dug nyung pu tse shel/ /ba gcin yang na chu dron bcas/ /zla ba gcig blud mdze nang dang / /gzhang 'brum za khu skrang

nad dang / /skya rbab ma zhu srin nad 'joms/ /rgya skyegs dan ti 'bras bu gsum/ /mur ba pa tra tsi tra ka /a pa marga byi dang ga /lo ma bdun pa tsha ba gsum/ /btsod dang skyer pa ma sha ka /nim pa thang shing rtsa ba lnga/ /gnyis po phye ma ba gcin sbyar/ /zla ba

gcig 'thungs phan zas bza'/ /mdze yi nad kun 'joms par byed/ /skyer pa pi pi ling dong gra/ /byi dang ga dang ba to ri/ /tsi tra ka dang bya rnams/ /go rims bzhin du cha res bskyed/ /ba gcin sbyar ba'am ri lu ni/ /byin na mi bzad mdze yang 'joms/ /

tsha ba gsum dang 'bras bu gsum/ /til dang go bye'i phye ma ni/ /mar dang sbrang rtsi kha rar sbyar/ /ri lu byas pa cha bdun pas/ /mdze yi nad rnams 'joms byed cing / /bcud kyis len dang ro tsar 'gyur/ /so ma ra dza tsi tra ka /skyer pa du ba ra'i rus pa/ /

go bye srin sman 'bras bu gsum/ /bsten na mdze nad ma lus 'joms/ /so ma ra dza byi dang ga /go bye tsi tra ba ra hi/ /a ru ra dang lang ga li/ /til nag po dang pi pi ling / /bu ram dang ni ri lur bya/ /mdze yi nad rnams 'joms par byed/ /so ma ra dza pi pi

ling / /de yi rtsa ba byi dang ga'i/ /snying po lcags rkyag skyu ru ra/ /til mar lde gu mdze nad 'joms/ /a ru ra dang go bye til/ /bu ram ri lus mdze nad 'joms/ /so ma ra dza byi dang ga /bu ram ri lu byas pa'ang phan/ /seng ldeng brag zhun byi dang ga /sbrang rtsi

mar dang ldan za zhing / /phan dang ran par zos na ni/ /'brum phran sha bkra shu ba 'joms/ /kha ra lcags phye byi dang ga /tsi tra ka dang skyu ru ra/ /pi pi ling gi lde gu yis/ /mdze nad shin tu gso dka' 'joms/ /gla sgang tsha gsum 'bras bu gsum/ /rtsa ba

lnga gnyis thang shing btsod/ /nim pa shing tsha lo ma bdun/ /shing tsha tsi tra ka dang ni/ /mur ba bi sha li'i phye ma/ /nas phye dgu cha sbrang rtsi ni/ /cha gcig sbyar ba 'di rtag tu/ /'thungs na mdze nad 'joms byed cing / /'or nad skya rbab sha bkra can/ /pho nad gzhang

'brum rgyu rlugs dang / /mtshan bar rdol dang 'brum phran dang / /g.yan pa shu ba'i nad rnams 'joms/ /tu pa ra yi rus pa'am/ /ga bya so ma ra dza dang / /tsi tra ka'i rtsa brag zhun rnams/ /bcud len cho ga ltar bstan phan/ /de ltar nad bsal nang gi ni/ /nad

sbyangs nad ni phyi rol gyi/ /pags par gnas na sman blugs phan/ /nad kyi dri ma ma dag pa/ /sman rnon byugs na mdze nad ni/ /bslangs pas slar ni 'phel bar 'gyur/ /gting zug sra zhing kor kor po'i/ /mdze la dugs bya snyi ba dang / /

'bur bar gyur nas mtshon gyis ni/ /zhal zhal btab cing byug par bya/ /gang zhig pags pa kun nyams shing / /mtshon gyis btab tu mi rung ba/ /de la khrag ni phyung nas su/ /thal sman rnon po bsku bar bya/ /mdze nad rab sra rtsub pa dang / /tshor ba med

brtan yun ring lon/ /sngags bcas dug khu blud par bya/ /dug gi sman ni rjes su sbyar/ /mdze nad rengs zhing tshor ba med/ rdul mi 'byung zhing g.ya' ba la/ /lci skam rgya mtsho'i lbu ba'am/ /mtshon gyis bzhar la lde gu byug /gla sgang dong gra 'bras bu

gsum/ /po son cha dang ka rany+dza/ /lo ma bdun pa dug mo nyung / /ru rta skyer pa pri yang ku/ /nyungs kar sbyor bas lus bkru zhing / /lde gus slon sman bkru sman dang / /bzhar zhing lus ni bskus gyur na/ /pags pa'i nad dang mdze nad dang / /skrang dang skya rbab

mdze nad 'joms/ /ka ra bI ra nim pa dang / /dug mo nyung dang dong gra dang / /tsi tra ka'i rtsa ba gcin bskol/ /bskus na mdze nad 'joms par byed/ /ka ra bI ra kar rtsa ba/ /dug mo nyung dang ka rany+dza'i/ /'bras bu skyer pa'i shun lpags ni/ /so man yi myu gu

bcas/ /bskus na mdze 'joms grub pa yin/ /shri sha'i shun lpags ras bal gyi/ /me tog dong ga'i lo ma dang / /mon sne'u dme ru bzhi po ni/ /btags pa'i lde gus mdze nad 'joms/ /nim pa ser po rnam gnyis dang / /bye'u rug pa dang pa to la/ /

ru rta a shwa gan+d+ha dang / /thang shing shi kru nyungs kar dang / /g.yer ma 'u su gla ba dang / /tsa rong cha mnyam phye mar byas/ /dar bar sbyar ba'i til mar gyis/ /bskus pa'am lus byugs dril gyur na/ /mdze nad g.yan pa zlum por bcas/ /'brum phran skrangs

pa'i nad rnams sel/ /gla sgang dngul rdo dang ni skyer pa dang / /nag tshur kam bi l+ya dang ru rta dang / /seng phrom mu zi pog dkar byi dang ga /ldong ros ba bla ka ra bI ra'i shun/ /phye mar byas pa'i til mar gyis bskus pa'i/ /steng du phye ma'i don du 'di blugs na/ /

shu ba g.yan pa 'brum bu phra mo dang / /rkang shu la sogs 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /yungs kar snu ha'i shing dum btags/ /lde gu me ma mur btsos te/ /'dod chags shugs kyis ngo tsha bzhin/ /bskus na glang shu 'jig par byed/ /ldong ros ba bla na le

sham til mar/ /arga'i lo ma'i lde gus mdze 'joms byed/ /de bzhin tsi tra marda ka rany+dza/ /ru rta sbyar ba ba gcin btags pa'ang phan/ /gu gul yungs kar na le sham/ /nag tshur dang ni byi dang ga /shri be+e sha ga sra rtsi pog /ba bla ldong ros mu zi dang / /

ru rta dang ni kam bi l+ya/ /ser po gnyis dang bcas pa ni/ /'khor los btsir ba'i til mar bsres/ /'di ni mtshon gyis bzhar te bskus/ /nyi mar bsregs na mdze nad sel/ /ta la'i lo ma na le sham/ /ru rta ldong ros nag tshur bcas/ /zangs kyi snod

dang til mar dang / /zhag bdun legs par spangs pa des/ /zhag bdun bsku zhing nyi mar bsreg /sha bkra 'joms par byed pa yin/ /sha bkra sar pa zla ba gcig /bsten zhing sbyang ba byas na sel/ /a pa marga'i thal ba'i chu/ /lan bdun legs

par gzags pa ru/ /pri yang ku yi mar bskol bas/ /bskus na sha bkra sel bar byed/ /ka ka dzang gi rtsa ba dang / /ras bal sa bon 'dab ma dang / /la phug sa bon dar bar sbyar/ /mig dmar gza' la bskus na ni/ /sha bkra sel ba grub pa yin/ /

dzi ban ti dang skyer pa btsod/ /kam bi l+ya dang spangs ma ni/ /'o ma mar dang til mar bskol/ /sra rtsi bog dang sbra tshil ni/ /btab pa bskus na de yis ni/ /rkang lag zhig pa sel bar byed/ /pags pa gcig pa'i mdze dang ni/ /'brum phran 'bras ni ber ba

yi/ /mdze nad 'jig par byed pa yin/ /lo ma bdun pa rtsa ba dang / /shi ri sha yi shun lpags dang / /ka ra bI ra arka dang / /su ma na dang tsi tra ka /thal tres nim pa'i shun lpags dang / /ka rany+dza dang yungs kar dang / /tsi tra mar dang 'bras

bu gsum/ /byi dang ga dang tsha ba gsum/ /ser po gnyis dang til mar dang / /ba gcin bcas par bskol bas ni/ /pags pa'i nad dang rma 'grams dang / /rlung dang bad kan las gyur pa'i/ /mje yi nad ni sel byed de/ /'di ni rdo rje dang 'dra bas/ /

rdo rje can zhes bya ba yin/ /e raN+Da dang dngul rdo dang / /gla sgang nim pa ka dang ni/ /ga bra'i rtsa ba kam bi l+ya/ /byi dang ga dang nir gun thi/ /go bye in+d+ra ba ru ni/ /thang shing khron bu gu gul dang / /ldong ros shri sha pi ti dang / /lan tshwa tang pal bca' sga rnams/ /

cha mnyam snu ha'i 'o ma dang / /arga'i til mar lan cig bskol/ /lde gu rdo rje chen po ste/ /rdo rje can pas yon tan lhag /sha bkra dang ni gzhang 'brum dang / /'bras kyi phreng ba 'joms par byed/ /ru rta ka ra bI ra dang / /bring gar dza arga dang / /shu dag shing

mngar rgyam tsha gcin/ /til mar bskol ba dug bcug pa/ /bskus pas mdze nad sel ba'i mchog /spra tshil li khri gu gul dang / /spangs ma dngul rdo yungs mar bskol/ /g.yan pa glang shu myur du sel/ /rgya skyegs tsi tra mar da dang / /shri pi ta dang tsha

ba gsum/ /ru rta yungs kar la phug gi/ /sa bon ser po rnam gnyis kyi/ /lde gu dar bar sbyar bskus na/ /shu ba thams cad sel bar byed/ /tsi tra ka dang shi kru'am/ /sle tres thang shing a pa mar/ /seng ldeng d+ha ba'i lde gu'am/ /dur byid dan da pra

ban ti/ /rgya skyegs dngul rdo sug smel lam/ /pur+Na rna ba'i lde gu ste/ /tshig rkang drug bshad lde gu drug /zho ga chu dang sbyar ba yis/ /bskus na bad kan rlung las ni/ /gyur pa'i mdze nad sel bar byed/ /ba li ka dang ma nu dang / /a kar nA ga ge sar dang / /

gan+t+ra b+ha dra gla ba dang / /tsan+dan dang ni pu shel tse/ /cha res bskyed pa'i lde gu yis/ /bad mkhris mdze nad sel bar 'gyur/ /tig ta'i sman mar brgya bkrus mar/ /bskus na mdze yi cha ba sel/ /til mar tsan+dan shing mngar dang / /stag tsher ba dang ut+pal/ /

bcas par bskus na'ang phan pa yin/ /rnags shing yan lag 'drul ba dang / /lus tsha 'brum bu phra mo 'byung / /pags pa myags dang bcas pa la/ /bsil ba'i sman chus blugs shing byug /gtar ga bkru sman btang ba dang / /tig ta'i sman mar byin

na phan/ /seng ldeng nim pa ba sha ka /dug mo nyung dang 'bras bu gsum/ /byi dang ga dang sle tres dang / /pa to la dang ba gcin sbyar/ /phyi dang nang nas btang gyur na/ /srin pu las gyur mdze nad 'joms/ /rlung shas che la thog mar ni/ /mar btang bad

kan shas che la/ /skyug sman mkhris pa las gyur na/ /gtar ga btab cing bkru sman gtang / /nang sbyangs khrag ni byung ba dang / /gnas ni dag par gyur pa la/ /bsku ba gang zhig byas gyur pa/ /de ni mod la med par 'gyur/ /nad gzhi bsal zhing khrag ni phyung ba dang / /

phyi dang nang nas zhi ba'i gso ba bya/ /sman mar dang ni dus su byin gyur na/ /mdze yi nad ni gso sla nyid du 'gyur/ /mdze can nad ni lan mang sbyangs gyur pa/ /de yi srog srub lan mang 'bad byas te/ /nad ni lhag par phyung bas nyam chung bas/ /

rlung ldang myur du gsod par byed par 'gyur/ /zla ba phyed cing skyug sman gtang ba dang / /zla ba re re nas ni bkru sman gtang / /mgo bo sbyang ba zhag ni gsum gsum nas/ /zla ba drug drug nas ni gtar ga bya/ /gang zhig slon dang 'khru bar dka' 'gyur zhing / /

mdze can nad shas che bas khyab gyur pa/ /de ni nges par gso dka' nyid gyur pas/ /de bas nad ni ma lus dbyung bar bya/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /gso ba'i gnas kyi le'u bcu dgu pa'o// //de nas sha bkra dang srin bu'i nad

gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /gang zhig mdze nad pas kyang 'jigs 'gyur zhing / /myur du gso dka' nyid du 'gyur bas na/ /khang pa 'bar bar gyur pa lta bur ni/ /sha bkra'i nad zhi ba la 'bad par bya/ /khyad par du ni dang por lus la ni/ /

sbyang bar bya ba nye bar sbyar bar bya/ /sha bkra la ni so ma ra dza'i khu/ /bu ram chang ngam sha khu bkru sman ni/ /snu ha'i 'o mar sbyar ba blud par bya/ /de 'thungs nas ni lus bskus nyams stobs dag /ci yod pa las nyin mtshan bsten par bya/ /skom dad skyes na zhag gsum

thug pa blud/ /sha bkra'i lus la chu bur byung gyur na/ /de ni tsher ma dag gis brtol bar bya/ /chu bur gzags par byas nas nang re bzhin/ /so ma ra dza dang ni a sa na/ /pri yang ku dang shu ti chur bskol blud/ /rgya skyegs shing thal bu ram phran sbyar ba'i/ /chu ni nyams

stobs ci yod pa la blud/ /phal gu skyu ru ra shun dug nyung shing / /khu ba so ma ra dzar bcas pa blud/ /dro bar 'dug nas chu bur byung ba la/ /lan tshwa med zas dar bar bcas pa sbyin/ /ba gcin tsi tra ka dang tsha ba gsum/ /sbrang rtsir sbyar ba mar gyi snod du gzhag /

zla phyed lon nas sha bkra can la blud/ /'di la mdze nad gso ba'i cho ga bya/ /yang na bring ga ra dza lcags snod bcug /til mar nang du brngos pa sbyin bya zhing / /a sa na yi sa bon 'o mar bskol/ /de rjes blud na sha bkra 'joms par byed/ /dong ga arga pu ti ka

rany+dza/ /snu ha dzA ti'i lo ma ba gcin btags/ /lde gus bskus na sha bkra gzhang 'brum dang / /shu ba g.yan pa rma 'grams sel bar byed/ /glang chen gzig gi lpags bsregs til mar dang / /sbyar ba bskus na sha bkra sel mchog yin/ /sbur ba dri ngan dong

ga'i 'o ma dang / /sbyar te bskus pa gcig pus sha bkra sel/ /chu bur bskyed phyir go bye cham chom brdungs/ /nub mo ba gcin la sbangs nyin grib bskam du/ /de ltar lan gsum byas te zhib tu btags/ /snu ha'i 'o mar sbyar bskus sha bkra 'joms/ /

sbrul nag bsregs pa las byung snag tsha ni/ /ba ru ra yi mar dang sbyar te bsku/ /de bzhin rma bya'i mkhris pa bsregs pa'am/ /ba li ka bsregs rma bya'i mkhris bsregs phan/ /so ma ra dza'i sa bon phul gang dang / /ba bla cha bzhi dag ni bsres nas su/ /ba yi

gcin dang sbyar te btags bskus na/ /sha bkra lpags mdog 'dra bar byed pa'i mchog /glang chen rtug pa legs bsres thal ba ni/ /glang chen gcin dang bsres te gzags gyur pa/ /bre bcu drug tshad so ma ra dza yi/ /sa bon bcu chas btab bskol sbyin bag

gyur/ /mang du bdar ba de yis bskus na ni/ /sha bkra'i nad ni rnam par 'joms 'gyur zhing / /mdze yi nad dang sme ba nag po'am/ /sha lhag skyes pa'i rma ni sbyong bar byed/ /go bye tsi tra ka dang snu ha dang / /arka'i rtsa ba dang ni 'ol ma se/ /de bzhin tsha ba gsum dang

dung dang ni/ /spangs ma ru rtar bcas dang lan tshwa lngar/ /thal ba gnyis dang lang ga li btags phye/ /snu ha arka'i 'o mar bskol nas ni/ /ska bar gyur pa lcags snod nang du gzhag /de ni thur mas bskus na mdze nad dang / /sha bkra sme ba nag por gyur pa dang / /

mdzer pa gzhang 'brum pags pa'i rmen bu sel/ /sbyang byas gtar ga btab pa dang / /rtsub chos phye zan zos gyur pa'i/ /sdig pa zad par gyur pa yi/ /'ga' zhig gis ni sha bkra 'byung / /khong pa'i srin yod snum dugs byas/ /bu ram 'o ma nya sogs

kyis/ /bad kan srin bu bslangs nas ni/ /nub mo de ni bde bar gnas/ /bye'u rug stsogs sdeb gcin dang / /chu phyed bcas pa bskol nas ni/ /khu ba de nang pi pi ling / /po son cha dang byi dang ga /til mar swardzi k+Sha rar bcas/ /mas gtong bas ni gtang bar

bya/ /de nyid de la de nyid dam/ /dur byid lde gu po son cha/ /pi pi ling ni khu bar bsres/ /bkru sman de la brud par bya/ /de ltar steng 'og sbyang byas nas/ /tsha ba lnga ldan thugs stsogs blud/ /tsha dang kha dang bska ba yi/ /sman ni bskol chus blugs par bya/ /dus

su byi dang ga'i til mar/ /'jam rtsi de la gtang bar bya/ /mgo bo'i sin bu mgo nad ni/ /gso bar bshad pa'i rim par bya/ /tsha dang kha ba shas che zhing / /snum nyung kha zas sbyin par bya/ /byi dang ga dang pi pi ling / /pi pi ling rtsa na le

sham/ /na le sham ni dkar po dang / /swardzi ka ni thal bar bcas/ /nas thug dar bar btsos pa blud/ /gi ri gar ni shri sha ka /pa ri pa tra ke pu ka /pa la sha 'bras pa tu ra/ /su ti ka ni so sor bskol/ /khu ba sbrang rtsir bcas pa'am/ /bye rug pa sogs sbrang

rtsir sbyar/ /rta sbangs phye ma byi dang ga /bskol ba'i nang sbangs mang du bza'/ /sbrang rtsir bcas pa'i lde gu'am/ /'bras bu gsum khur sbangs pa sbyin/ /mgo bo'i srin bu'i nad la ni/ /de yi phye ma bud par bya/ /mu sha kar+Na'i 'dab ma ni/ /zhib tu btags pa

'bras phyer bcas/ /btsos pa'i khu ba sbyin par bya/ /de yi rjes la rang skyur ram/ /dar ba sla ba tsha ba lnga/ /lan tshwar bcas pa blud par bya/ /nim pa a pa marga dang / /nir gun thi lo 'ang de bzhin bya/ /byi dang ga yi phye ma dang / /bgres pa'i 'bras phye'i

khur ba sbyin/ /go bye'i mar ni rnying pa la/ /byi dang ga ni shun pa bsal/ /cha phyed bcug ste nyi mar gzhag /btung ba 'jam rtsi sbyar bar bya/ /thang shing shri beSh+Ta yi snum/ /so sor de bzhin sbyar bar bya/ /bshang bar skyes la lhag par yang / /bkru sman dang ni

'jam rtsi gtang / /bad kan las gyur mgo bo'i nad/ /bkru sman slon dang zhi sman gtang / /khrag las gyur pa'i srin bu la/ /gso ba mdze yi tshul du bya/ /spu 'byi byed la gso ba ni/ /'khor ling skra 'byi cho ga bya/ /'o ma sha dang mar dang bu ram dang / /zho dang

'dab ma can gyi tshod ma dang / /mdor na mngar dang skyur ba'i khu ba rnams/ /srin bu gzhom par 'dod pas yongs su spang / /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las gso ba'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu pa'o// //de nas rlung nad gso ba bshad

par bya'o/ /ma 'dres rlung las dang por ni/ /mar dang rkang dang tshil dang ni/ /til mar blud cing snum gyi ni/ /sbyor bas legs par gso bar bya/ /de nas snum zhen ngal bso ste/ /'o mas slar yang snum chos bya/ /rlan can grong dang chu la gnas/ /sha khu snum dang

ldan pa gtang / /'o thug kri sar skyur dang bcas/ /lan tshwar ldan blud 'jam rtsi gtang / /sna sman skyo byas kha zas ni/ /snum byas sbyin cing dugs byas la/ /legs bskus snum dang ldan pa la/ /gseg ma la sogs dugs bya'o/ /snum gyis zhen byas dugs

byas pas/ /g.yo zhing rengs dang gzer bcas pa/ /ji ltar 'dod bzhin 'gugs pa ni/ /bde blag nyid du nus par 'gyur/ /ji ltar shing skam dag kyang ni/ /snum bskus bsros par gyur na ni/ /las su bya bar rung gyur na/ /srog chags lus ni smos ci

dgos/ /spu brtse gzer na snyoms pa dang / /lus skem rengs pa'i nad la stsogs/ /dugs byas myur du zhi 'gyur zhing / /mnyen pa nyid du'ang 'gyur ba yin/ /snum btang bas ni lus zungs rnams/ /bskam pa myur du rgyas par byed/ /nyams stobs me drod

'phel 'gyur zhing / /de yi srog kyang ring nas byed/ /lan mang snum dang dugs kyi ni/ /cho ga legs par sbyar bar bya/ /de ltar snum gyis mnyen byas ltor/ /rlung gi nad ni gnas mi 'gyur/ /gal te nad gzhan bcos pa'i phyir/ /las 'di zhi bar ma gyur

na/ /'jam zhing snum dang ldan pa yi/ /snum gyis de ni sbyang bar bya/ /zhun mar seng phrom btsos pa dang / /sap+ta la dang bskol ba'am/ /'o ma e raN+Da yi mar/ /bskol ba nad sel dge ba blud/ /snum skyur dro dang lan tshwa sogs/ /zas kyi dri ma tshogs

gyur nas/ /bu ga 'gags te rlung bkag pas/ /de phyir de ni bde rgyu bya/ /nyam chung bkru sman byar 'os pa/ /de la drod skyed smin byed pa'i/ /kha zas sbyin pa'am de bcas pa'i/ /mas gtong bkru sman sbyar bar bya/ /sbyang zhing me drod bskyed gyur nas/ /slar

yang snum dang dugs byas phan/ /ma zhu'i gnas su zhugs pa'i rlung / /slon byas zas rim byin nas ni/ /ba ra Na sogs drug pa'am/ /shu dag stsogs chu dro sbyar blud/ /me drod bskyed nas de'i 'og tu/ /rlung can gcig pu'i gso ba bya/ /

lto ba'i phyogs zhugs bil ba ni/ /gzhon dang nya shas g.yos byas sbyin/ /lte ba'i 'og zhugs 'jam rtsi gtang / /zas kyi sngon du snum btang phan/ /khong par zhugs la thal sman sogs/ /phye ma drod skyed smin byed phan/ /snying gnas sa la par+Ni dag /'o ma dang ni

bskol ba phan/ /mgo bor gnas la mgo snum bsku/ /sna sman dud rngub snum can dang / /rna ba sogs la brta byas phan/ /pags par gnas la bsku byug dugs/ /rlung med gnas su gnas pa dang / /kha zas yi ga 'byed pa phan/ /khrag gnas bsil sman bsku

ba dang / /bkru sman khrag ni dbyung ba phan/ /sha tshil brten pa bkru sman dang / /mas gtong drag dang zhi bya'i sman/ /rus pa rkang la gnas pa la/ /phyi dang nang nas snum gyis gso/ /khu chur gnas la sems dga' dang / /kha zas stobs skyed ro tsa phan/ /khu ba rgyu

ba 'gags gyur na/ /bkru sman btang bas gso bar bya/ /'khrus shing zas rim bsten gyur nas/ /sngar bshad pa yi gso ba bya/ /rlung las mngal chags bskams gyur dang / /byis pa skems par gyur pa la/ /kar tang pa la shing mngar rnams/ /'o ma

sbyar bskol blud pa phan/ /rgyus pa tshigs dang rtsar zhugs la/ /snum tsha dkri ba'i dugs byas phan/ /yan lag 'khums lam sha dang / /rgyam tsha til mar bskol bas bsku/ /khrag gzags drags la yan lag ni/ /tshor ba med la khyim dud pa/ /rgyam tsha

til mar sbyar bas bsku/ /dkri ba'i dugs ni sbyar bar bya/ /gzhan dbang can gyis gzir gyur cing / /mig 'gyur mi shes 'dar ba med/ /pho mtshan mi ldang rngul mi 'byung / /phyi rol rtsol ba med 'gyur la/ /khri yi bcings pas ma non pa/ /de la myur du gso

dpyad bya/ /der ni thog mar snum zhen bya/ /dugs byas sna sman rnon pos ni/ /bu ga sbyang phyir btang ba dang / /bi da ra yi sde bskol dang / /zho dang 'o ma sha khu dang / /mar bskol ba yi dngas ma blud/ des ni rlung nad tshabs che ba'am/ /'phral du khyab par mi 'gyur

ro/ /rgya sran nas dang rgya shug stsogs/ /thang shing la sogs sde tshan ni/ /rlan can sha ni bskol ba dang / /skyur dang 'o ma dag dang ni/ /mngar ba'i sde tshan btab pa yi/ /snum chen dag ni bskol ba yis/ /blugs dang bsku dang lus spyi dang / /btung dang sna

sman 'jam rtsir bya/ /snum dang dugs ni legs sbyar ba/ /de dang des ni rlung nad 'joms/ /nad shugs bar ma dag la ni/ /bad kan sel zhing rno ba yi/ /spyi bo'i bkru sman lan mang gtang / /bud cing gtang bar bya ba yis/ /dbugs rgyu'i gnas ni dag gyur

nas/ /des ni dran pa rnyed par 'gyur/ /kha ru tsha dang a ru ra/ /tsha ba gsum bskol rlung chen sel/ /seng phrom srang brgyad 'bras bu gsum/ /bre gang rtsa ba chen po lnga/ /e raN+Da dang bri ha ti/ /dur byid srang re chu bre ni/ /bcu drug nang du bskol nas su/ /bzhi cha lus pa

de dang ni/ /mar bre gang dang chu bre bzhi/ /nas tshig 'khus thal srang gsum bskol/ /de bsten rlung nad ma rungs pa/ /yan lag phyogs gcig kun la zhugs/ /mngal gyi nad dang rgyu rlugs dang / /skran dang dmu rdzing 'joms par byed/ /ra mnye ba dang a shwa ka'ang / /

cho ga seng phrom lta bur bya/ /gso ba 'di ni gzhan dbang can/ /rlung nad ma 'dres pa la bya/ /nad gzhi 'dren mar 'dren mas bya/ /bad kan bcas pa'i gzhan dbang can/ /snying ga rtsib logs na ba la/ /g.yer ma shing kun a ru ra/ /ma nu dang ni lan tshwa

gsum/ /nas bskol khu ba sbyar ba blud/ /shing kun bca' sga rtsal ru tsha/ /se 'bru star bu bcas pa blud/ /bad kan rlung ni 'dres pa la/ /snying nad gso ba'i skabs bshad phan/ /da rgan phyir dgye nang gug gnyis/ /klad pa gzhogs phyed na ltar gso/ /til

mar gyis bkang snod du bsnyal/ /'dir ni nang gug rab gso dka'/ /so dang bzhin gyi mdog nyams shing / /yan lag lhod cing dran pa nyams/ /rab tu rngul ba'i gzhung rengs yin/ /de ni zhag bcu las mi 'tsho/ /de las gzhan shugs

sman gyur 'tsho/ /lus sgu ba dang 'on glen dang / /[(]'thing [,]'theng [)]dang zha bo gzhogs phyed nyams/ /'phye bo'am dbang po ma tshang 'gyur/ /'gram pa nyams pa 'gram pa snum/ /dugs byas nas ni rang gnas gzhug /kha gdangs pa la kos ko ni/ /bteg la mkhas pas

gzhug par bya/ /'tham par gyur pa lhag ma la/ /phyogs gcig gug pa lta bur gso/ /lce ldibs gnas skabs ji bzhin du/ /rlung nad kyi ni gso ba bya/ /glad pa gzhogs phyed na ba la/ /sna sman spyi bo'i til mar dang / /mig dang rna ba dgang bar bya/ /skrangs

par skyug sman gtang bar bya/ /tsha zhing dmar bcas gtar ga gdab/ /gzhogs phyed skams la snum chos dang / /snum dang ldan pa'i bkru sman gtang / /dpung pa 'jas la sna sman dang / /zas kyi rjes la snum sbyin bya/ /brla rengs pa la snum chos dang / /sbyang

byas phan pa ma yin te/ /bad kan ma zhu tshil mang bas/ /de phyir de la rtsub chos kyi/ /zad par bya bas gso bar bya/ /nas dang khre dang khre rgod sbyin/ /tshod ma lan tshwa med pa ni/ /til mar cung zad chur bskol ba'am/ /skam sa'i sha ni mar med dang / /sbrang rtsi chu

dang chang rnying sbyin/ /phyug po'i rlung la dug mo nyung / /yung ba'i sde tshan shu dag sogs/ /bskol ba rgyam tshar bcas pa'am/ /ba ra Na sogs phye sbyar blud/ /yang na dbyi mo 'bras bu gsum/ /pu tse shel dang pi pi ling / /sbrang rtsir sbyar ba'i lde gu sbyin/ /yang

na dbyi mo a ru ra/ /tsi tra ka dang thang shing dang / /sbrang rtsir sbyar ba'i lde gu sbyin/ /gu gul brag zhun a ru ra/ /ba gcin dang ni sbyar ba blud/ /gla sgang tsi tra tsha ba gsum/ /'bras bu gsum dang byi dang ga /gu gul cha mnyam phye ma sbyin/ /chil dang bad

kan ma zhu las/ /gyur pa'i nad ni thams cad sel/ /de ltar bad kan shas che zhing / /tshil bcas rlung ni nad sel byed/ /thal sman ba gcin sbyar dugs dang / /blugs dang lus la dril ba'ang bya/ /nyungs kar ka rany+dza'i 'bras bu/ /ba gcin sbyar bas bsku

bar bya/ /arka ag+ni man+tha dang / /nim pa'i rtsa ba thang shing dang / /bong pa dang ni grog mkhar sa/ /yungs kar sbrang rtsir bcas pa bsku/ /bad kan zad phyir drag shul ni/ /bzod na de la brten par bya/ /thang la mchong dang ci nus kyis/ /nyal po dag kyang

yongs su bsten/ /chu mi g.yo dang lteng ka dang / /chu rgyun bzlog pas chu bo rgal/ /'dir ni tshil dang bad kan dag /zad nas snum la sogs pa gtang / /gnas dang lus zungs sogs brtags la/ /lhag ma rnams kyang gso bar bya/ /sa ha ra dza thang shing dang / /

dong gra bskol ba til mar sbyar/ /rlung gis lus gzir la blud na/ /ci 'dod thogs pa med 'gro nus/ /ra sna dong gra tsi tra ka /zur pa ma nu pi pi ling / /btags pa'i phye ma mar bskol ba/ /rlung nad sel bar byed pa'i mchog /nim pa sle tres ba sha ka /kaN+Da

ka ri pa to la/ /srang ni bcu bcu'i tshad byas la/ /chu bre bcu drug nang du bskol/ /khu ba brgyad cha lus pa der/ /mar ni bre gang blugs te bskol/ /pa ta thang shing byi dang ga /dong gra ha ti pi pi ling / /skyer pa shu ti dbyi mo dang / /te dzo ba ti na le sham/ /ru rta dang

ni dug mo nyung / /thal sman rnam pa gnyis po dang / /ti mu sa dang kru trug tres/ /bse shing 'bras bu pu tse shel/ /shu dag pi pi ling rtsa ba/ /btsod dang bong nga la la phud/ /zho ni gnyis gnyis tshad byas pa/ /gu gul sbyar ba srang lnga dang / /lde gu btab ste bskol

ba'i mar/ /blud na rlung tshad tshabs che ba/ /rus tshigs rkang la zhen pa'ang 'joms/ /mdze nad de 'dra'ang sel bar byed/ /bu ga'i rma dang lba ba dang / /mtshan par rdol dang 'bras kyi phreng / /nam tshong yan chad nad kun dang / /skran dang gzhang 'brum za khu dang / /

gcong chen dbugs mi bde ba dang / /yi ga 'chus dang cham pa dang / /lud pa 'or nad snying nad dang / /skya rbab myos dang khong 'bras dang / /rlung dang khrag gi nad rnams 'joms/ /bil ba gzhon nu'i 'o ma dang / /mar gyi nying khu bskol nas ni/ /de

la srang ni gcig gam phyed/ /sna sman byas mgo'i rlung nad sel/ /de bzhin chu srin nag khra dang / /nya dang rus sbal 'ug pa'i chil/ /bskol ba ma 'dres rlung la ni/ /khyad par du ni gtang bar bya/ /til gyi tshigs ma rnying pa dang / /rtsa ba lnga pa so sor bskol/ /gcig

tu bsres pa til mar ni/ /'o ma brgyad cha'i nang du bskol/ /blud na rlung dang bad kan dang / /'dres pa'i nad ni thams cad 'joms/ /pra sa ra ni srang brgyad bskol/ /til mar 'o ma bre re dang / /med gnyis dang sha puSh+pa/ /btsod dang ru rta ra sna dang / /tsan+dan dmar po

dzi ba ka / ra sna ra mnye ba gnyis dang / /thang shing btags pa'i lde gu dang / /bskol blud rlung nad thams cad sel/ /sa ha ra dza'i rtsa ba yal gar bcas/ /srang brgya rtsa ba bcu ni de dang mnyam/ /nye'u shing srang ni lnga bcu chu bre drug cu ni/ /rtsa bzhi'i nang bskol bzhi cha lus

pa der/ /chu srin sder mo ru rta pu shel tse/ /tsan+dan sug smel pri ka pri yang ku/ /na li ka dang rdo dreg ba le ka /spang spos thang shing btsod dang a ru ra/ /tsa rong shu ti rgya spos du ru ka /srang re cha mnyam 'o mar bcas pa ni/ /til mar bre bzhi lhan cig bskol ba blud/ /

rlung nad gso dka' dag kyang 'joms par byed/ /lus 'dar lus la rlung 'jug lus rengs dang / /lus bskams pa yis shin tu gzir la sogs/ /skran dang smyo byed cham pa mngal nad 'joms/ /sa ha ra dza srang brgya yi/ /khu bar til mar bre bzhi bskol/ /de

rtsa lde gu srang bcu dang / /'o ma bzhi 'gyur bcug ste bskol/ /yang na rgya spos shu dag dang / /stir ru rta shu dag dang / /sug smel rdo dreg spang spos dang / /shu ti tsan+dan dmar po gzhug /bskol ba der ni kha ra'i phye/ /srang ni bco brgyad gzhug par bya/ /til mar sman

mar yin par bshad/ /des ni rlung nad ma lus dang / /rlung nad 'khyil dang smyo byed dang / /skran dang rlig rlugs la sogs sel/ /ba la srang brgya sle tres ni/ /bzhi cha ra sna brgyad cha ni/ /chu bre bzhi brgya'i nang du bskol/ /khu ba brgyad cha lus pa dang / /zho dang zho ga chu

bu ram/ /shing khu tsha dang til mar rnams/ /bre ni bzhi bzhi bskol nas ni/ /ra yi 'o ma cha phyed dang / /zur pa skyer pa sa ra la/ /sug smel btsod dang a ka ru/ /tsan+dan a ti pa la dang / /shug pa gla sgang mung+ga'i lo/ /ha re Nu ka shing mngar dang / /bya gri nA ga bye'u

rug pa/ /zangs rtsi ba dang dzi ba ka /gla rtsi lce pog pa la sha /dzA ti sho ka na li ka /gur gum rdo dreg bi ka dang / /dzA ti pa la kad pa la/ /ba li ka dang shing tsha dang / /kun du ru dang ga pur dang / /shri pa sa da du ru ka /li shi chu srin sen mo dang / /ru rta spang spos ka

ko la/ /pri yang ku dang sto ne ya/ /rgya spos shu dag bya ma ka /ma du nA ga gla ba dang / /nA ga ge sar srang re dang / /bskol te btsags par gyur pa ru/ /gan+d+ha b+ha dra'i lde gu ni/ /cho ga bzhin du bcug pa des/ /lud pa dbugs mi bde dang rims/ /brgyal dang slon skran

zad byed dang / /glo 'grams mcher nad skem pa dang / /brjed byed bkra mi shis pa sel/ /ba li til mar bzang po 'di/ /rlung gi nad ni 'joms byed yin/ /btung ba sna sman bsku dang 'jam rtsi ni/ /snum gyi sbyor ba dus su legs bsten na/ /des ni ma rungs

rlung nad myur zhi ste/ /bud med mo gsham bu yi snod byed 'gyur/ /gang tshe bad kan mkhris pa ni/ /zhu ba'i gnas 'dug snum dugs kyis/ /zhu nas mkhris pa snang gyur pa/ /de la 'jam rtsis bsal bar bya/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /gso

ba'i gnas las le'u nyi shu gcig pa'o// //de nas dreg nad gso ba bshad par bya'o/ /dreg nad can ni snum chos bya/ /rlung bsrungs nad gzhi nyams stobs las/ /dpag ste khrag ni cung zad tsam/ /lan mang du ni dbyung bar bya/ /dmar gzer na zhing tsha

ba la/ /srin bu pad pas khrag dbyung ngo / /g.ya' zhing na la tsag tsag tsha/ /shas cher tsha la rngabs rus dbyung / /gnas nas gnas su 'pho ba la/ /gtar ga'am zhal zhal gyis khrag dbyung / /lus zhum pa dang khong rtsub cing / /rlung shas

cha la khrag mid byung / /khrag zad pa la rlung gis ni/ /skrangs pa gting zab rings pa dang / /'dar zhing rtsa rgyus na dang zhum/ /rlung nad gzhan yang skyed par byed/ /snum chos byas rjes bkru sman ni/ /snum dang ldan pas 'khru ru gzhug /rlung shas che ba'i dreg nad

la/ /mar ni rnying pa blud par bya/ /ra mnye ba dang sra ba ni/ /pa ya s+ya dang dzi ba ka /zangs rtsi ba dang cha snyoms te/ /'o ma mar bskol dreg nad 'joms/ /rgun 'bru ma du ka bskol ba'i/ /khu ba khar mar bcas pa'am/ /de bzhin sle tres khu bar ni/ /'o ma bskol

ba blud par bya/ /til mar 'o ma kha rar bcas/ /legs par bsres pa blud par bya/ /ba la nye shing ra snang dang / /pi lu rtsa ba bcu par bcas/ /dur byid sti ra e raN+Da/ /bskol ba'i 'o mas rlung dreg sel/ /ba gcin 'o ma bzhos ma thag /bcas pa'ang nad

ni bde 'byung byed/ /mkhris par nye shing pu tse shel/ /pa to la rtsa'i 'bras bu gsum/ /sle tres dang ni sman mngar kha/ /'o ma'ang mar dang bskol ba blud/ /nad gzhi shas che'i bkru sman phyir/ /e raN+Da'i mar 'o mar sbyar/ /sbyor ba ji bzhin blud par bya/ /

zhu nas 'o ma 'bras chan sbyin/ /a ru ra ni mar brngos pa/ /khu ba blud par bya ba'am/ /dur byid phye ma rgun chu'am/ /'o ma sbyar ba blud par bya/ /yang na de yi nad gzhi ni/ /'jam rtsi 'o ma mar bcas sbyar/ /rlung dang khrag nad gso ba la/ /'jam rtsi las lhag

gang yang med/ /mchog tu gzhang dang rtsib logs brla/ /tshigs nad dmu rdzing nyam thag sel/ /bad kan shas che gla sgang dang / /rgun 'bru skyer pa bskol ba'am/ /'bras bu gsum bskol sbrang rtsir bcas/ /yang na sle tres ci rigs blud/ /ji ltar 'cham par snam

blud de/ /slon byas nas ni rtsub chos bya/ /'bras bu gsum dang tsha ba gsum/ /gan+d+ha b+ha dra shing tsha dang / /cu gang shu dag tsi tra ka /pi pi ling rtsa byi dang ga /spang spos ba sha ka'i shun phrags/ /ri sti dbyi mo lang ga ling / /cha mnyam lde gur byas pa la/ /nang

par lcags snod bskus te gzhag /nyi ma phyed dus de zos na/ /nad gzhi kun gyur dreg nad ni/ /gzer dang ldan la mchog tu phan/ /ko ki lak+Sha bskol ba'i khu/ /blud cing de yi tshod ma zos/ /snying rje goms pa'i skyes bu ltar/ /dreg nad sel bar byed pa yin/ /

rtsa ba lnga'am skyu ru ra'i/ /khu ba li li ta yi zhag /'khrig pa spong zhing 'thungs na ni/ /dreg 'theng shin tu gting zug sel/ /de ltar nang gi bstan nas ni/ /de 'og phyi rol gso ba bshad/ /rang skyur bre bzhir til mar dang / /sra rtsi pog ni bzhi char bskol/ /chu

nang gzar bus mang du dkrugs/ /rims tsha nad gzir sel mchog yin/ /til mar btsod dang spra tshil dang / /sra rtsi pog dang thal tres bcas/ /til mar skabs lus bskus na/ /dreg nad sel ba'i dam pa yin/ /rtsa ba bcu dang 'o ma bskol/ /yang na lde gu

chu dron sbyar/ /blugs na rlung shas che ba yi/ /gzer nad 'phral du sel byed yin/ /lus 'jug rengs dang gzer gyis nyen/ /snum bzhi po ni mngar ba'i sman/ /dro 'jam sbyar ba blugs par bya/ /tsha bar gyur la grang mo blugs/ /de bzhin ra lug pa yi ni/ /'o ma

til mar sbyar ba'am/ /'tsho byed sde tshan bskol ba'am/ /rtsa ba chung ngu lnga bskol blugs/ /rgun chu bu ram shing khu chang / /rang skyur zho dang zho ga chu/ /'bras bkrus chu dang sbrang rtsi'i chu/ /ka ra'i chu ni blud pa'ang phan/ /bud med gzugs sdug snyan par smra/ /lag

pa nu ma tsan+da bskus/ /reg na bsil zhing bde ba yis/ /tsha dang na dang rmya ba sel/ /mdog dmar tsha dang na bcas la/ /khrag phyung nas ni lde gus bsku/ /stag tsher pa dang shing mngar btsong / /skyer ba tsan+dan ka ra dkar/ /e raN+Da yi sa bon phye/ /sran chung shug

pa pu shel tse/ /lde gus tsha na shu ba mched/ /na zhing mdog dmar skrangs pa sel/ /kri sa ra ni rlung 'joms sman/ /snum bcas bskol ba'am mung+ga dang / /'o thug nyungs kar til tshigs ma/ /glan zhing dkris pas gzer 'joms byed/ /chur

gnas rlan can mthu rtsal gyis/ /zas tshol sha btags g.yos legs pa/ /'tsho byed sman dang snum bcas pas/ /glan zhing dkri ba byas gyur na/ /sra zhing gzer la na ba dang / /skrangs dang yan lag na ba 'joms/ /'tsho byed sman dang bskol ba yi/ /'o ma zhag

gis bskus na'ang phan/ /sa ha ra dza'i rtsa ba dang / /dzi ban ti mar ra'i 'o ma/ /lde gu bskus pa'am de bzhin du/ /til btags brngos pa 'o mar sbyar/ /zar ma 'o mar sbyar ba'am/ /e raN+Da yi 'bras bu ni/ /'o ma dag dang sbyar ba'am/ /shu ti'i 'o mar

sbyar ba yis/ /rlung shas che ba'i gzer 'joms byed/ /ba gcin thal sman chang dang bskol/ /mar gyis bskus na'ang de la phan/ /bad kan shas che rgun tsha dang / /bskol ba'i mar bsku blugs pa phan/ /shu dag ru rta khyim dud pa/ /shu ti ser po rnam gnyis kyi/ /

lde gus bskus na dreg nad ni/ /rlung dang bad kan shas che sel/ /de bzhin shi kru'i sa bon ni/ /'bras kyi khu ba'i rang skyur ni/ /yud tsam btags nas skyur gyur pa/ /blugs na bad rlung shas che sel/ /rtogs par sla la byug dang bsku/ /blugs dang

lus ni bcing bas gso/ /rtogs dka' mas gtong drag po dang / /bkru sman snum ni blud pas gso/ /bad rlung shas cher dro 'jam sbyar/ /de la byugs stsogs grang mo yis/ /lus tsha na zhing g.ya' zhing skangs/ /sra ba rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur/ /khrag

mkhris shas che'i dreg nad la/ /byug pa la sogs bsil bas bya/ /dro bas tsha zhing na la dmar/ /rdul 'byung gas par 'byung bar 'gyur/ /shing mngar srang brgya bskol ba yi/ /khu ba bzhi cha lus pa ru/ /til mar bre bzhi 'o ma mnyam/ /ti ra mur ba

ta ma la/ /nye'u shing a gar pa ya s+ya/ /tsan+dan has ba ti dang / /spang spos sle tres me da gnyis/ /ra mnye ba gnyis shu ti dang / /shug pa rnam gnyis dzi ban ti/ /dzi ba ka dang bi sha ba/ /shing tsha gan+da b+ha dra dang / /chu srin sin mo ba le ka /btsod dang pra puN+Da ri ka / shi ri

ba dang bi la sha /ku tan na ta srang re yi/ /lde gur bcas pa bskol bar bya/ /sbyor ba bzhi pos dreg nad kyi/ /mkhris pa'i rtsa ba rims nad sel/ /ba la'i khu ba lde gu dang / /til mar 'o ma cha mnyam bskol/ /lan brgya'i bar du bskol ba de/ /dreg nad rlung can sel

bar byed/ /bcud kyis len gyi dam pa ste/ /dbang po gsal bar byed pa yin/ /tshe ring lus 'phel skad snyan dang / /khu chu khrag gi nad sel byed/ /rgyu ba'i lam 'gags 'khrugs gyur pas/ /tshil lam bad kan shin tu ni/ /'phel bar gyur pa'i rlung nad la/ /

snum rtas dang por phan pa yin/ /der ni phyug po'i rlung nad kyi/ /gso bya dreg nad gso bar bya/ /khrag ni dngas par byed pa yi/ /snum dang sman gyi sbyor ba bya/ /srog stsogs rlung ni cig car 'khrugs/ /ji skad bstan dang nad gzhi bzhin/ /ji ltar nye bar sman rnams ni/ /

nang tshul ji bzhin sbyin par bya/ /ma zhu bcas la dugs dang smyung / /smin bya rtsub sman byug pa dang / /rlung stsogs kyis ni ma zhu bsal/ /byas la ma 'dres rlung gso bya/ /skem dang bya rmyang yan lag 'khums/ /rengs dang 'dar bu tshor ba med/ /'gram nyams kha yo

'theng po dang / /zha bo dreg nad kyis 'theng dang / /tshigs 'khrul gzhogs phyed na ba dang / /tshigs dang rkang rus la zhugs nad/ /'di dag gnas ni gting rings pas/ /de bas 'di dag gsar btab dang / /bla brnan med cing nyams stobs ldan/ /'bad na 'tsho yi

gzhan du min/ /mkhris 'dres rlung la grang dro yi/ /gso ba'i rim gyis mang du bya/ /'tsho byed sde dang bskol ba yi/ /sman mar dag kyang blud par bya/ /skam sa'i sha dang sA lu nas/ /bkru sman 'o mar bcas 'jam gtang / /rtsa ba lnga dang ba lar bskol/ /'o ma mas

gtong sbyor ba bya/ /sman mar bskol ba'i til mar gyi/ /'jam rtsi dus su gtang bar bya/ /shing mngar ba la til mar dang / /mar dang 'o ma bskol ba blugs/ /rtsa ba lnga yi khu ba'am/ /chu ni grang mo nyid blugs bya/ /bad kan bcas la

nas kyi zan/ /skam sa'i ri dwags bya yi sha /dugs dang mas gtong bkru sman no/ /slon sman bkru sman bcas pa gtang / /mar rnying til mar nyungs kar las/ /byung ba'i mar ni blud par bya/ /bad kan mkhris pa 'dres pa las/ /dang po mkhris pa gso bar bya/ /

khrag dang 'des pa dreg nad kyi/ /gso ba ji skad bshad par bya/ /dugs bsku sha khu 'o ma dang / /snum dang bcas pas sha bkra sel/ /phyug po'i rlung la gcin snyi dang / /tshil dang rlung 'joms sman gyis gso/ /rus pa rkang gnas snum chen gyis/ /khu chur

gnas la sngar bshad pa'i/ /zas dang 'dres la 'ju byed dang / /drod skyed skyug sman yang ba gtang / /gcin 'dres gcin ni 'phel ba dang / /dugs dang 'jam rtsi gong mas gso/ /bshang 'dres e raN+Da'i mar dang / /'jam rtsi snum ni 'khru byed phan/ /lus

zungs kun zhugs rlung nad la/ /bad kan mkhris par mi gnod dang / /gang yang rlung ni bder rgyu ba'i/ /sman de rlung nad de la gtang / /'khru bar mi byed snum pa dang / /rtsa rgyun sbyong bar byed pa dang / /mas gtong bas ni mngar ba dang / /snum gyi 'jam rtsis gso

bar bya/ /nyams stobs ci yod brtags nas ni/ /bkru sman 'jam po gtang bar bya/ /bcud kyis len ni thams cad kyi/ /sbyor ba dag kyang bsngags pa yin/ /mchog tu brag zhun sbyor ba dang / /de bzhin gu gul nyi tshe 'am/ /kha ra srang stong chig brgyar

bcas/ /pa wa sangs bshad lde gu'ang phan/ /thur sel 'dres la drod bskyed dang / /'khru gcod rlung ni bder rgyu byed/ /gcin gyi gnas ni sbyong byed pa'i/ /sman rnams de la gtang bar bya/ /de ltar srog la sogs pa yi/ /'dres pa'i gso ba mdor bshad

yin/ /sman pas de gso rgyas par ni/ /blo yis brtags te ci rigs bya/ /stod du rgyu ba'i spyi bor bsdu/ /thur sel de las bzlog par bya/ /me dang mnyam gnas mnyam par bya/ /khyab byed gsum du sbyar bar bya/ /bzhi bo bas kyang srog bsrung ste/ /der gnas

na ni lus gnas 'gyur/ /de ltar rlung ni lam gzhan zhugs/ /rang rang gi ni gnas su gzhag /khrag mkhris 'dres pa ma gtogs par/ /'dres pa'i nad ni thams cad la/ /bcud kyis len gyi cho ga bzhin/ /sgog skya bsten na sel bar byed/ /mkhris par

'dres la mkhris sel bas/ /rlung ni bde bar rgyu bar bya/ /khrag dang 'dres la de nyid dang / /'theng pa'i nad bshad sman bya'o/ /khrag mkhris rlung ni sel ba yi/ /bcud kyis len ni sna tshogs sbyar/ /nad gzhi ji ltar bstan pa bzhin/ /gso ba de ltar yang

dag bshad/ /nyam thag 'phral du sel ba 'di/ /tshe yi rig byed gnas 'bras bu/ /gso ba phan pa gnod sel dang / /sbyor ba sman dang rtsi dang ni/ /zhi bar byed dang sngags bya ste/ /de dag sman ming rnam grangs yin/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa

las/ gso ba'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// //yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ gso ba'i gnas te gnas bzhi pa rdzogs so// //de nas skyug sman gyi cho ga bshad par bya'o/ /de yang rgyun shes kyi bu la sogs

pa drang srong chen po rnams kyis 'di ltar bshad de/ skyug sman mchog ni po son cha/ /dur byid rtsa ba bkru sman mchog /gzhan dag nad kyi dbang las ni/ /khyad par du ni gyur pa yin/ /po son cha de mdog skya zhing / /shin tu sngo ba'ang ma yin pa/ /nyin zhag tshes

grangs shis pa la/ /sos ka dpyid kyi mtshams su btu/ /phyis nas 'jag ma'i snod du ni/ /bcug ste bcings la ba lang gi/ /lci bas snod du byugs nas ni/ /'bru yi nang du gzhag par bya/ /'jag mas dkris pas 'jam pa dang / /sbrang rtsi lta bu dri zhim la/ /

zhag brgyad 'das par gyur pa dang / /phyung ste de nyid nyi mar bskam/ /de 'og legs par bskams pa dang / /nang gi 'bras bu phyung nas ni/ /zho dang zho ga chu mar gyi/ /lde gur mnyes la slar yang bskam/ /de nas legs par sbas te gzhag /

dgos pa'i dus su sbyar bar bya/ /de nas de la tshad tsam du/ /blangs nas cham chom brdungs nas ni/ /shing mngar go bye bi da ra'am/ /bim ba lcang ma sle sman ta/ /bum ti a pa marga dang / /arga gang yang rung ba ni/ /bskol ba'i chu yi nang du ni/ /nub gcig

legs par spang bar bya'o/ /de nas sman gyi khu ba de/ /mnyes shing btsags la nang par ni/ /mdo nas bstan pa'i cho ga bzhin/ /legs par blud nas skyug tu gzhug /bad kan las byung rims tsham pa/ /skran dang khong 'bras rnams la ni/ /ji srid mkhris

pa snang gi bar/ /khyad par du yang skyug tu gzhug /po son cha yi 'bras bu ni/ /phye ma bskol ba'i khu bar ni/ /'bras bu gsum phye cha gsum btab/ /ko bi dar stsogs khur bcas/ /blud na rims dang dmu rdzing dang / /rmen bu 'bras dang 'brum chen dang / /

gtun 'dra'i rlung nad sel bar byed/ /mkhris pa bad kan gnas zhugs la/ /dzi mu ta sogs khu ba blud/ /snying tsha khrag mkhris dag la na/ /de 'bras 'o mar bskol ba yi/ /'o thug bcas pa blud par bya/ /bad kan las gyur slon bro dang / /cham pa mun

'thibs byed pa la/ /de bskol 'o ma las byung ba'i/ /zho yi spris ma'am zho blud bya/ /po son cha sogs lde gu dang / /bskol ba'i 'o ma las byung ba'i/ /mar sar bad kan gyis drod nyams/ /lus skam pa la skyug sman bya/ /po son cha yi khu ba ni/ /bsre

zhing cho gas btsags nas ni/ /gzar bur chags pa'i bar du bskol/ /byin la de bas skyug tu gzhug /lde gu de'am de'i khu ba/ /bza' dang btung bar sbyar te gtang / /po son cha yi 'bras bu'i khu/ /dug mo nyung sogs sde tshan btab/ /nim pa arka gang yang

rung / /bskol ba'i khu bar bcas pa ni/ /blud na nyams brtas las byung nad/ /gting zug kun kyang sel bar byed/ /po son cha yi me tog ni/ /zhib btags phreng bsgos bsnams nas ni/ /thug pa sha khu sogs ngoms blud/ /skyid de ba ni bder slon gzhug /

po son cha med me tog dang / /'bras bu gzhon nu de bzhin sbyar/ /dzi mu ta sogs de dang 'dra/ /dzi mu ta ni khyad par du/ /rims dang lud pa dbugs mi bde/ /skyigs bu la sogs nad la gtang / /'di yi me tog 'o mar btsos/ /'bras bu smin pa 'o thug

bcas/ /spu bcas 'o ma'i spris mar sbyar/ /sbu med zho yi spris mar sbyar/ /skya ba'am sngor gyur 'o mar bcug /zho ni skyur por gyur pa'am/ /mnan pa'i chang gi dngas mar ni/ /mnyes te zhu bar gyur pa blud/ /bad kan lud pa yi ga 'chus/ /skya rbab gcong

chen nad la gtang / /ku ba ko sha ta ki yang / /sbyor ba'i cho ga 'di nyid bya/ /smin zhing bskams par gyur pa yi/ /dzi mu ta yi 'bras bu dag /phye ma srang phyed 'o mar bsres/ /rlung mkhris nad kyis nyen la blud/ /dzi mu ta 'bras gnyis sam gsum/ /brdungs pa

de yi khu ba ni/ /dong ga la sogs dgu pa ni/ /gang yang rung ba la sbangs te/ /mnyes la bcags par gyur pa dag /bad kan mkhris rims can la blud/ /dzi mu ta yi phye ma'am/ /lde gu chu grang sbyar ba dag /mkhris rims can blud bad kan dang / /rlung 'dres

rims la chu dron sbyar/ /lud pa dbugs mi bde dang dug /slon rims bad kan gyis nyen dang / /mun 'thibs byed pa'i nad ldan la/ /ku ba kha bo'i skyug sman bsngags/ /de ni me tog 'bras bu med/ /myu gu gzhon nu 'o mar btsos/ /bad kan mkhris pa las

gyur rims/ /mkhris pa shas cher gyur la blud/ /'bras bu smin pa'i nang gi ni/ /'bras bu phyung ste 'o ma bcug /zhor gyur lud pa dbugs mi bde/ /blud de slon du gzhug par bya/ /'bras bu'i nang na zho ga chu/ /mdze dug skya rbab nyid la blud/ /de dang dar ba

bskol ba ni/ /rgyam tsha sbrang rtsir bcas pa blud/ /yang na de yi sa bon ni/ /ra yi 'o mar bcas pa dag /dug skran dmu rdzing rmen bu dang / /'bras dang rkang bam nad la blud/ /bad kan las gyur lud pa rims/ /lkog ma'i nad dang ma zhu la/ /

ku ba kha bo'i khu ba ni/ /phye dang sbyar ba'i skyo ma blud/ /skran dang rims rnying bying ba la/ /lde gu sha khur sbyar blud na/ /legs pa kho nar slon gyur zhing / /nyam chung bar yang 'gyur ma yin/ /ku ba kha bo'i me tog dang / /'bras bu phye mas bsgos pa yis/ /me tog phreng

ba mnam pa ni/ /skyid de ba yi skyug sman yin/ /skran lud dmu rdzing lkog ma'i nad/ /bad kan gnas la brten pa'i rlung / /bad kan kha dang mgrin par gnas/ /bad kan 'phel bar gyur pa dag /brtan zhing dkyel ni skyes pa la/ /ko sha ta ka'i skyug sman bsngags/ /
