'tsho byed nye'u shing zangs rtsi ba/ /kha sral phre'u ram nye gnyis/ /shra ba dang ni me da dang / /ma hA me da ma du li/ /'di dag re re'i phye ma dang / /ko sha ta ka'i phye mar bcas/ /sbrang rtsi kha rar sbyar ba ni/ /lud pa snying ni tsha la bsngags/ /de rjes chu dron blud pa ni/ /bad kan

mkhris tsha ldan la bsngags/ /'u su g.yer ma'i khu ba dang / /de yi khu bas dug 'joms so/ /bim pa ka sa marda 'am/ /ba sbu ba yi khu bar ni/ /ra dza go sha ta ka yi/ /rdog ma gcig gam gnyis mnyes pa'i/ /dngas ma snying gi nad la blud/ /de bskol 'o ma

las byung mar/ /po son cha stsogs bskol ba blud/ /ko sha ta sogs kha dang tsha/ /mdze dang skya rbab mcher pa'i nad/ /'or nad skran nad sbyar dug sogs/ /gting zug pa la bsngags pa yin/ /po son cha sogs drug so sor/ /bskol ba dang ni rlan can sha /

ko sha ta ka cha mnyam bskol/ /khu ba rgyam tshar bcas pa blud/ /po son cha sogs pi pi ling / /cha mnyam ko sha ta kar sbyar/ /yang na ko sha ta ka yi/ /khu ba bu ram shing khu blud/ /dug mo nyung ni skyid de ba/ /bad kan mkhris pa khrag bcas dang / /rims dang shu

ba snying nad dang / /dreg nad kyis 'theng mdze la bsngags/ /dug mo nyung gi sa bon de/ /nyungs kar ram ni ma du ki/ /bskol ba'i khu ba'am rgyam tsha'i chu/ /yang na kri sa ra ldan blud/ /de yi sa bon arka yi/ /'o mar zhag bdun sbangs pa ni/ /po son cha dang dzi mu ta/ /

ku ba kha bo dzi ban ti/ /dzi ba ka ni bskol ba yi/ /khu ba gang yang rung ba blud/ /skyug sman gyi ni gtso bo yi/ /cho ga phyogs tsam bshad pa yin/ /blo dang ldan pa tshul 'di yis/ /gzhan yang ci rigs sbyar bar bya/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/

cho ga grub pa'i gnas kyi le'u ste dang po'o// //de nas bkru sman bya ba'i cho ga'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /dur byid bska zhing mngar la rtsub/ /zhu rjes tsha bar gyur pa yin/ /bad kan mkhris pa zhi byed de/ /rtsub pas rlung ni 'khrugs par byed/ /de 'dir sman

gyi sbyor ba yis/ /rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan sel/ /cho ga'i khyad par la brten nas/ /nad kun 'joms par byed pa yin/ /dur byid rnam pa gnyis su bshad/ /de rtsa dmar nag dkar ba yis/ /rnam pa gnyis su bshad pa yin/ /de las tri byi ta mchog tu

bshad/ /nyes pa med cing bde bar 'khru/ /brgyal rmongs byed cing lkog ma ni/ /rtsub cing gnod par byed pa dang / /rno zhing myur du 'khru byed pa/ /lto sra nad gzhi shas che dang / /sdug bsngal gyis nyen nad pa la/ /sha ma dur bying bsngags pa yin/ /de ni zabs

su zug cing 'jam/ /thad kar 'phros pa ma yin pa/ /btus la snying po bor nas ni/ /shun pa skams te sba bar bya/ /de nas de'i 'og de'i phye ma/ /rgyam tsha dong ga cung zad btab/ /rlung nad la ni skyur las blud/ /mkhris par sbrang rtsi kha ra mar/ /'o ma rgun 'bru

bu ram shing / /khu ba tang pa la mngar ba yi/ /sman de'i 'bras bu gsum gyi ni/ /khu bar bcas pa blud par bya/ /bad kan nad la pi lu yi/ /khu ba ba gcin chang skyung rtsabs/ /tsha ba lnga sogs phye ma ni/ /bad kan 'joms dang ci rigs sbyar/ /dur byid lde gu khu ba

dang / /bskol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs khar/ /sbrang rtsi dri bzang gsum dang bcas/ /lde gu yid 'ong bkru sman yin/ /a dza gan+d+ha smig rkang dang / /ka ra dur byid bi da ri/ /phyer btags sbrang rtsi mar dang ni/ /lde gu byin na 'dus pa dang / /rims

dang lus rengs tsha ba dang / /skom dad kyis gzer legs par 'khru/ /bu ram shing ni tshal par bkas/ /nang ngos dur byid lde gus bsku/ /gcig tu sbyar te phur ma yis/ /btso ba'i tshul byas de bza' bya/ /shing tsha sug smel mnyam ni li/ /de mnyam dur byid

sha ka ra/ /phye ma sbrang rtsi rgun chu dang / /phye dang skyo mar sbyar te blud/ /rlung mkhris bad kan las gyur dang / /me drod chung ba'i nad dang ni/ /skyid de ba yi mi rnams la/ /gnod pa med pa'i bkru sman yin/ /byi dang ga yi snying po dang / /'bras bu gsum zhes

bya ba dang / /ya bak+Sha ra pi pi ling / /dur byid kun gyi cha phyed byas/ /sbrang rtsi mar ram bu ram gyis/ /lde gur byas pa byin na ni/ /skran dang mcher pa dmu rdzing dang / /gzugs 'khums lud pa yi ga 'chus/ /rlung dang bad kan las gyur nad/ /mang po gzhan

dag sbyong bar byed/ /pi pi ling rtsa byi dang ga /'bras bu gsum dang 'u su dang / /tsi tra ka dang na le sham/ /pi pi ling dang dug mo nyung / /zi ra ha ste pi pi ling / /ti mu sa dang lan tshwa lnga/ /zho ni gnyis gnyis phye mar byas/ /dur byid dang ni til mar gnyis/ /

srang ni brgyad brgyad char bsres dang / /skyu ru ra'i khu bre gsum dang / /bu ram srang ni lnga bcu me/ /chur bskol de las ran tsam ni/ /zos na mdze dang gzhang 'brum dang / /mig ser za khu skran dang ni/ /dmu rdzing mtshan bar rdol ba dang / /pho ba'i nad dang skya rbab

rnams/ /'joms shing cho ga bsrung mi dgos/ /bu skyed par yang de yis byed/ /bu ram dge ba can zhes bya/ /dus kun du ni 'phrod pa yin/ /tsha ba gsum dang dri sna gsum/ /gla sgang dang ni byi dang ga /skyu ru ra ni de thams cad/ /mnyam pa'i dur byid

kha ra dang / /sbrang rtsi'i ri lu byas zos na/ /gcin sri rims dang slon bro dang / /lud pa sha skem mgo 'khor dang / /zad byed lus tsha skya rbab dang / /me drod chung dang dug nad sbyong / /dur byid dug mo nyung sa bon/ /bi pi ling dang bca' sga rnams/ /sbrang rtsi rgun

'bru chur sbyar ba/ /dbyar gyi dus kyi bkru sman yin/ /dur byid gla sgang byi tsher ba/ /kha ra tsan+dan ba le ka /shing mngar pa ta la'i phye ma/ /rgun chu dang sbyar ston gyi yin/ /dur byid pa ta kru trug tres/ /zir shu dag sa ra la/ /khron bu'i phye ma chu dron sbyar/ /

dgun gyi dus su blud par bya/ /dur byid kha ra cha mnyam pa/ /so ga'i dus kyi bkru sman yin/ /dur byid spa 'bras kyi lce ba/ /pa ta la dang pu tse shel/ /khron bu legs par btags nas ni/ /ba gcin nang du zhag gsum sbangs/ /'di ni dus kun sbyor ba ste/ /

snum zhen dri ma nad rnams 'byin/ /sha ma dur byid byi tsher ba/ /gla sgang hasti pi pi ling / /dug mo nyung dang ni li ni/ /'bras bu gsum dang pu tse shel/ /phye ma sha khu'am mar ram ni/ /chu dron dang sbyar thams cad du/ /khong rtsub la yang gtang bar bya/ /rims

dang snying nad dreg nad dang / /rtug skam la sogs nad rnams la/ /dong ga'i bkru sman lhag par ni/ /'jam mngar bsil ba phan pa yin/ /byis pa rgan po glo rdol dang / /skyid de ba yi mi rnams la/ /'jam zhing skyon ni med pa'i phyir/ /mchog tu dong ga'i

bkru sman gtang / /'bras bu'i dus su legs smin pa'i/ /de yi 'bras bu btus nas ni/ /de ni yon tan ldan gyur pa/ /khur gcig bye ma'i nang du gzhug /zhag bdun lon nas phyung nas ni/ /nyi ma la ni bskam par bya/ /de nas rkang ni phyung nas su/ /snod ni gtsang

mar gzhag par bya/ /byis pa lo bzhi lon pa nas/ /lo ni bcu gnyis lon pa'i bar/ /lus tsha rtug 'gags kyis gzir la/ /rgun chur sbyar te blud par bya/ /dong ga'i rkang ni mnyes pa dang / /bskol ba'i chu ni grang mo blud/ /yang na chang dngas zho ga chu/ /skyu

ru ra yi khu ba'am/ /rang skyur dag dang bcas pa'am/ /dur byid lde gur sbyar ba sbyin/ /dan da'i khu bar de yi rkang / /bu ram rnying pa bcug nas ni/ /zla ba gcig gam zla phyed bar/ /mnan pa'i chang ni blud par bya/ /seng phrom rtsa ba'i shun pa ni/ /

nang gi shun lpags bor nas ni/ /bskams te phye mar byas nas ni/ /de la cha gnyis bskol te gzags/ /seng phrom cha ni gsum pa sbangs/ /rtsa ba bcu pa'i khu ba dang / /cha de slar yang sbang bar bya/ /slar yang bskams te phye mar bya/ /de las zho gnyis ba gcin

nam/ /chang gi dngas ma'am zho ga chu/ /rgya shug skyu ru ra'i khu ba/ /gang yang rung dang sbyar te blud/ /seng phrom bskol ba'i khu ba dang / /lde gur byas dang khar dang / /mar dang bskol ba'i lde gu de/ /bkru sman gyi ni dam pa yin/ /shrI khaN+Das nad kyi tshogs/ /

shas cher sogs pa'ang 'jig par byed/ /myur du 'khru zhing drags pas na/ /lto snyi nyam chung byis pa dang / /rgan po nad pa yun ring la/ /de ni gtang bar mi bya'o/ /skran dang dmu rdzing sbyang ba'i dug /pags nad gcin nad sbrang rtsi 'dra/ /skya rbab skran dang dug

gis phog /nad kyis sems 'khrugs gyur la gtad/ /de ni tsher ma rnon po ni/ /mang pos khyab par gyur pa mchog /lo gnyis pa'am lo gsum pa/ /khyad par du ni dgun gyi mthar/ /de ni mtshon gyis rnam bcad la/ /de las 'o ma blang bar bya/ /bil ba la sogs

rtsa ba lnga/ /bri ha ti ni rnam gnyis dang / /bskol ba'i khu ba dang mnyam pa'i/ /su ti'i 'o ma dang bsres la/ /de 'og me yi mdag mar bskam/ /ri lur byas pa zho ga chu'am/ /chang ngam ba gcin la sogs blud/ /dur byid sogs dgu 'bras bu gsum/ /khron bu

sab tal dang bcas/ /su ta'i 'o mas zhag bdun sbangs/ /sha khu'am mar dang sbyar te blud/ /tsha ba gsum dang 'bras bu gsum/ /dur byid dan da tsi tra ka /de bzhin bu ram chus sbyar blud/ /shang gi ni yi 'bras bu ni/ /phub ma med cing ma skams btu/ /de

bzhin sap+ta la'i rtsa ba/ /de dag rnon po 'khru byed yin/ /bad kan dmu rdzing sbyar ba'i dug /skran sogs nad la gtang bar bya/ /de gnyis ri lu zho gnyis tsam/ /chang dang rgyam tshwa sbyar ba ni/ /bad rlung las gyur snying nad dang / /de bzhin skran gyi nad la gtang / /dan da

dra ban ti'i rtsa ba/ /glang po'i so ltar brtan zhing sbom/ /dmar zhing gnag la rno zhing dro/ /myur du 'khru bar byed pa yin/ /lci zhing rlung nad 'khru byed cing / /mkhris pa bad kan 'ju bar byed/ /de ni sbrang rtsi pi pi ling / /lde gus bskus la 'jag ma dang / /'jim

pas bskus te mer bsreg cing / /nyi ma cung zad dro bskams pas/ /de yi rno ba bsal bar bya/ /de ni chang dngas zho ga chu/ /dar ba mnan chang pi lu yi/ /khu ba gang yang rung sbyar blud/ /nyam chung skran dang gcin snyi dang / /dmu rdzing sbyar ba'i dug rnams sbyong / /

ba lang ri dwags ra sha yi/ /khu bar sbyar bas skya rbab dang / /lto srin mtshan par rdol nad sel/ /de bskol khu ba lde gu dag /rtsa ba bcu yi khu bar bskol/ /mar gyis me dpal khong 'bras dang / /'brum phran mchan khung tsha ba sel/ /til mar bcas pas skran za khu/ /

gzhang 'brum rtug 'gags bad rlung sel/ /snum chen sbyar bas khu chu bshang / /'phyen 'gags rlung gi nad rnams sbyong / /dur byid la sogs dgu po ni/ /bkru sman gyi ni rab mchog yin/ /a ru ra yang dur byid kyi/ /cho ga bzhin du sbyar bar bya/ /de nas dus

su de'i phye ma/ /rgyam tsha dong gra cung zad gdab/ /rlung nad la ni skyur bas blud/ /bu ram srang brgyad a ru ra/ /nyi shu dan da tsi tra ka /srang re pi pi ling dur byid/ /zho ni gnyis gnyis lhan cig sbyar/ /ri lu bcu byas zhag bcu bar/ /ri lu re re zos rjes la/ /chu

dron blud cing cho ga 'dis/ /de dag thams cad zos gyur na/ /kun zos bsrung ba mi dgos par/ /'dis ni thams cad sel bar byed/ /mchog tu skya rbab pho ba'i nad/ /pags nad zlum po gzhang 'brum dang / /g.yan pa'i nad rnams sel ba yin/ /chung ngu'am

don ni chen po dang / /chen po las ni nyung zad dag /'dre dang dbye ba byas pa dang / /dus dang sbyor ba ldan par byed/ /shing tsha nA ga ge sar dang / /a mra ta ka se 'bru dang / /sug smel kha ra sbrang rtsi dang / /kha lung chang sogs de dang de/ /yi

rang rjes su 'thun pa yi/ /rigs pas bkru sman gtang bar bya/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /cho ga grub pa'i gnas kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// //de nas skyug sman dang bkru sman gyi nyes pa grub par bya ba'i cho ga bshad par bya'o/ /skyug

sman lto ni snyi ba'am/ /ltogs pa'am bad kan shas chung ba'am/ /shin tu rno ba'am grang ba'ang chung / /ma zhu ba'ang nyam chung la/ /blud na nad 'byung re ba nyams/ /de tshe thur byung nad slong 'gyur/ /de la slar yang snum chos bya/ /sngar gyi skyon bral skyug sman

gtang / /bkru sman ma zhu bad kan dang / /ldan pa'am shin tu rno ches pa/ /dro ba'am lan tshwa shas ches pa/ /yi gar mi 'ong mangs pa yis/ /gyen du brgal bar gyur pa dag /sngar bshad nyes pa de la ni/ /grub pa'i sbyor ba de bzhin bya/ /de yang snod du

ma chags na/ /gsum po de la blud mi bya/ /gzhan du goms pa'ang zhib pa yi/ /sman ni gnod pa med pa gtang / /snum chos dugs ni ma byas la/ /sman ni rnying zhing rtsub pa yis/ /nad bslangs phyin par ma nus pas/ /mgo 'khor skrangs dang skyigs bu

dang / /mun par mthong dang skom dad che/ /byin snying na zhing lus g.ya' dang / /bla dang kha dog mi sdug pa'i/ /nad ni skyed par byed pa yin/ /snum chos dugs byas sman nyung zhing / /me drod che bas zhu gyur pa'am/ /grang bas rengs ba'am ma zhu bas/ /nad

bslangs nas ni ma phyin pas/ /nad ni de dag nyid bskyad cing / /de nyid sbyor nyes thams cad yin/ /de la til mar rgyam tshas bsku/ /gshag ma rdo yi dugs bya zhing / /mas gtong drag byas skam sa'i sha /kha zas byin la 'jam rtsi ni/ /po son cha dang pi

pi ling / /thang shing til mar bskol ba gtang / /rlung 'joms rlung gi snum chos bya/ /slar yang bkru sman rnon pos sbyang / /nad gzhi che zhing khong rtsub la/ /me drod chung dang sman chung ba/ /rtug skam bcas pas bslangs pa dang / /nad kyis lam ni 'gags

par 'gyur/ /mi bzad sbo dang lte ba dang / /rgyab dang rtsib logs mgo bo na/ /phyi sa gcin 'gags dbugs mi bde/ /mi bzad pa ni skyed par byed/ /bsku dang dugs dang ring bu sogs/ /mas gtong drag po 'jam rtsi bya/ /rtug skam sel ba'i gso dpyad

las/ /thams cad sbo ba dag la phan/ /rtsa ba lnga pa nas tshig 'khus/ /shu dag pu ti ka rany+dza/ /rgyam tsha nas thug legs sbyar bas/ /gzer nad rtug skam lto sbos 'joms/ /thal sman se 'bru pi pi ling / /shing kun bca' sga star bu dang / /rgyam

tshar bcas pa'i chang ngam ni/ /mar ram chu dron sbyar ba blud/ /mkhregs shing yongs su 'dzag pa dang / /na zhing bcad snyam sems pa sel/ /sman 'thungs gyur pa'i shugs bkag na/ /rlung la sogs pa'i nad rnams ni/ /'khrugs te snying gi phyogs song na/ /

snying nad mi bzad skyed par byed/ /skyigs bu lud pa rtsib logs na/ /rmya zhing mig 'gul kha chu 'dzag /dran pa nyams shing lce 'cha' la/ /so ni krig krig 'cha' bar byed/ /de la sman pa ma rmongs pas/ /mkhris pas nyen la mngar ba dang / /bad kan gyis

nyen kha ba yi/ /skyug sman dag ni myur du gtang / /de nas de la smin byed pa'i/ /nad kyi lhag ma smin par bya/ /de yi me drod lus kyi stobs/ /rim gyis mngon par 'phel bar byed/ /shas cher slon gyur rlung gis ni/ /gang gi snying ni gzer gyur pa/ /de la snum

gyur lan tshwa sbyin/ /mkhris pa bad kan de las gzhan/ /sman ni 'thungs par gyur nas shugs/ /bkag par gyur pa'am bad kan gyis/ /'gags pa'am shin tu sbyangs gyur pa'i/ /lus la rlung ni 'jug 'gyur bas/ /rengs dang 'dar dang zug pa dang / /

lus snyom dkris snyam sems shing zug /de la rlung ni 'joms pa yi/ /snum chos dugs stsogs thams cad bsngags/ /sman thun che la rno ba ni/ /bkres nyen lto snyi la blud na/ /bad kan mkhris pa bshang ba ni/ /bsal nas lus zungs

'dzag par byed/ /de la sbyor drags mngar ba yi/ /sman gyis lhag ma slon du gzhug /skyug sman drags la bkru sman gtang / /'khrus drags skyug sman 'jam po gtang / /de la chu grang blud pa dang / /ro smad bcings pas gcad par bya/ /stang zil tsan+dan pu

shel tse/ /ra khrag kha ra'i chu dang ni/ /'bras yos phye ma'i skyo ma ni/ /sbyor drags sel ba'i dam pa yin/ /slon sman sbyor ba drags pa la/ /chu grang dag ni blugs par bya/ /rgun 'bru la sogs khu ba mar/ /sbrang rtsi kha ra'i skyo ma blud/ /sgregs pa bcas par shin

tu skyug /mur ba 'u su gla sgang dang / /stang zil ma du ka'i phye ma/ /sbrang rtsir bcas pa'i lde gu sbyin/ /slon mthar lce ni 'khums pa la/ /snum dang skyur dang lan tshwa dang / /ldan pas mkhur ba bkang ba dang / /yid 'ong yu sha sha khu phan/ /de yi mdun du mi gzhan

ni/ /'bras bu skyur ba za ru gzhug /lce phyir byung la til dang ni/ /rgun 'bru'i lde gu bskus nas gzhug /tshig bkug rlung gi nad la ni/ /mar dang sha dang g.yos pa yi/ /nas thug sla ba sbyin bya zhing / /snum dang dugs kyi sbyor ba bya/ /sman gyi sbyor ba drags pa

yis/ /srog ces bya ba'i khrag phyung na/ /gang phyir de ni srog 'phrog pas/ /srog len par ni yin par bshad/ /khrag de dang ni zas bcas pa/ /khyi'am bya rog la byin la/ /zos na srog ces brjod par bya/ /ma zos mkhris pa yin par bshad/ /yang na

ras dkar la bsgos te/ /bskams la chu dron gyis bkrus la/ /bkrus kyang dag par ma gyur na/ /mkhris pa'o dag na khrag yin no/ /skom dang brgyal dang myos pas nyen/ /de la srog ni myur bsrung phyir/ /khrag dang mkhris pa sel ba yin/ /gso ba 'tsho

ba'i bar du bya/ /ri dgas ba glang ma he ra/ /gson pa'i khrag ni phyung ma thag /srog ni 'byor par byed pa blud/ /des ni myur du srog tu 'gyur/ /de nyid 'jag ma dang mnyes pa'i/ /khrag ni 'jam rtsir gtang bar bya/ /dur byid tang pal shing mngar dang / /dUr ba pu

shel tse 'o ma/ /bskol ba mar gyi snying po dang / /stang zil dang ni bcas pa yi/ /'jam rtsi grang mo gtang bar bya/ /spyi bag 'jam rtsi rab grang ba'am/ /mar gyi snying po 'jam rtsi gtang / /gzhang phyir byung la sman khu yis/ /'khru ba gcad la gzhug par bya/ /

dran pa stor la rig byed tshig /gling bu glu dbyangs nyan du gzhug /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ cho ga grub pa'i gnas kyi le'u gsum pa'o// //de nas sman mas gtong ba'i cho ga bshad par bya'o/ /ba la sle tres ra sna 'bras bu gsum/ /

rtsa ba lnga pa rnam gnyis srang re'i tshad/ /po son cha brgyad ra sha srang lnga bcu/ /chu nang bskol te bzhi cha lus gyur pa/ /btsags pa la la phud dang po son cha/ /bil ba ru rta sha ta puSh+pa dang / /shu dag gla sgang pi pi ling rnams kyi/ /lde gu bu ram sbrang rtsi mar dang ni/ /til

mar rgyam tsha dag dang ldan gyur pa/ /dro 'jam cho ga bzhin du btang gyur pa/ /mas gtong mchog ste nad kun 'joms pa yin/ /nad med la phan tshe ring nyams brtas byed/ /'jam rtsi gong du lde gu ma smos pa/ /der ni kun la 'di nyid gzhug par bya/ /rtsa ba bcu pa'i khu

ba skyur dang ni/ /ra sha bcas pa snga ma btags pa dang / /snum chen gsum ldan mas gtong mchog yin te/ /rlung gi nad kun rab tu 'joms par bshad/ /pa la pa tol rtsa ba chung ngu lnga/ /kyi lce ba dang e raN+Da dang nas/ /bskol ba'i khu ba bre gang ra sha'i khu/ /

de'i phyed bcug la bskol te bre gang lus/ /pri yang ku dang gla sgang pi pi ling / /lde gur byas shing til mar zhun mar dang / /sbrang rtsi rgyam tsha dang ni ldan gyur pa'i/ /'jam rtsi btang na me drod 'phel ba dang / /nyams stobs skyed cing sha ni rgyas pa dang / /mig gi gsal

stobs 'phral du skyed par byed/ /e raN+Da'i rtsa srang gsum pa la sha /srang gsum rtsa ba lnga pa chung ngu dang / /ra sna ba la sle tres ba spru ba/ /a shwa gan+d+ha dong ga thang shing rnams/ /po son cha brgyad chu bre brgyad du bskol/ /brgyad cha lus par gyur

pa de nang du/ /shu dag shu ti ba sha'i 'bras bu dang / /pri yang ku dang shing mngar pi pi ling / /dug mo nyung gi sa bon gla sgang dang / /skyer pa'i khaN+Dar bcas pa zhib btags pa/ /zho gnyis tshad kyi rgyam tshar bcas pa dang / /sbrang rtsi til mar ba gcin dang sbyar ba'i/ /

mas gtong skyug byed me drod skyed pa dang / /rkang pa byin pa brla dang mjug to dang / /lto ba snying dang pho mtshan na ba dang / /lus lci rlung dang bshang gci 'gags dang skran/ /rde'u chags rgyu rlugs gzhang 'brum pho ba'i nad/ /bad kan rlung nad de dang de dag 'joms/ /shing

mngar seng phrom tsan+dan a ru ra/ /tsan+dan ut+pal ba yi 'o mar bskol/ /'tsho byed kha ra mar dang bcas pa yi/ /'jam rtsis mkhris pa'i nad rnams sel bar byed/ /ra sna ba sha ka btsos byi tsher ba/ /ba la rtsa ba chung lnga rtswa yi lnga/ /thal tres tsan+dan shug pa rnam gnyis

dang / /shing mngar seng phrom srang ni phyed phyed dang / /chu dang bskol ba'i khu ba de nyid ni/ /'o ma bre bzhi bskol te chu du'i bar/ /ji ban ti dang me da rnam gnyis dang / /nye shing ram nye ba gnyis bi da ri/ /ka she ru dang kha ra dkar po dang / /dzi ba ka dang pad+ma ge sar

dang / /stag tsher ut+pa la dang pad+ma dkar/ /seng phrom kha sral phre'u shing mngar dang / /nA ga ge sar muny+dza ta ka dang / /tsan+dan rnam gnyis btags pa mar dang ni/ /sbrang rtsi rgyam tsha dang ni ldan byas pa/ /bsgrangs pa'i ni ru ha ni gtang bar bya/ /slar phyung skam sa'i

sha khu'am 'o ma dang / /'bras chan byin la lus la chu blugs bya/ /lus tsha tshad 'khru mngal nad khrag mkhris dang / /snying nad skya rbab mi bzad rims dang ni/ /skran bcas gcin 'gags mig ser la sogs pa/ /mkhris pa las gyur nad ni thams cad 'joms/ /

ko sha ta ka dong ga thang shing dang / /mur ba gze ma arga dug mo nyung / /pa ta rgya sran bri ha ti chur bskol/ /khu ba srang ni nyi shu lus pa dang / /der ni nyungs kar sug smel po son cha/ /ru rta zhon gnyis gnyis tshad dang ni/ /sbrang rtsi po son cha yi mar dang ni/ /thal sman

nyungs mar srang ni gnyis gnyis bcas/ /mas gtong me drod chung dang yi ga 'chus/ /bad kan las gyur nad ni kun la phan/ /de nas ni ru ha de ni/ /snum 'jam skyid de ba dang ni/ /las kyis lus snyom gyur pa'i sman/ /srang ni gnyis gnyis so sor bshad/ /'o ma

las ni srang bzhir bya/ /sbrang rtsi til mar mar khyor re/ /gzar bus dkrugs pa mas gtong bas/ /rlung nad 'jam stobs kha dog skyed/ /til mar chang dang sbrang rtsi mar/ /khyor ni re re'i tshad du byas/ /bil ba la sogs rtsa ba ni/ /khyor gnyis rgya sran khu ba ni/ /

khyor do bcas pas rlung nad sel/ /pa to la dang nim pa dang / /lo ma bdun pa pu ti ka /ra sna'i khu ba srang gnyis gnyis/ /mar srang gnyis dang nyungs kar kyi/ /lde gur bcas pa kha ba lnga/ /bad kan mang dang srin nad dang / /mdze dang za khu'i nad rnams

'joms/ /til mar ba gcin zho ga chu/ /skyur rtsabs khyor ni re re dag /yungs kar btags pa'i lde gur sbyar/ /rtug 'gags lto sbos sel byed yin/ /pa yas s+ye dang bu ram shing / /sA la par+Ni bi da ri/ /ra sna khyor re pi pi ling / /lde gu sbrang rtsi mar sbyar

ba'i/ /mas gtong khu ba 'phel bar byed/ /de nas grub pa'i 'jam rtsi ni/ /nyes pa med cing 'bras bu che/ /stobs skyed lus 'phel bde bar byed/ /kun du sbyar bya bshad par bya/ /sbrang rtsi til mar cha mnyam pa/ /rgyam tsha zho gnyis shu ti bzhi/ /e raN+Da yi

rtsa ba bskol/ /mas gtong sbrang rtsi til mar can/ /bcud kyis len te gcin snyi dang / /gzhang 'brum srin bu skran nad dang / /rgyu ma rlugs pa'i nad rnams sel/ /'di ni shing mngar phye mar bcas/ /mig la phan zhing khrag mkhris sel/ /gla sgang lde gu sbrang rtsi dang / /

til mar sha khu mar bcas pa/ /'tsho bar byed pa zhes bya ste/ /gzhang gi nad dang brla nad dang / /chu so dang ni rmig pa dang / /pho mtshan zug pa'i nad rnams sel/ /sbrang rtsi mar dang zhag dang ni/ /til mar khyor ni re re'i tshad/ /rgyam tsha zho gcig

spa ma yi/ /'bras bu srang phyed bcas pa dag /de yang 'tsho ba yin par bshad/ /e raN+Da'i rtsa bskol ba yi/ /khu ba shu dag pi pi ling / /po son cha yi phye mar bcas/ /sbrang rtsi til mar rgyam tshar bcas/ /'di ni shing rta can zhes bya/ /de bskol shu dag shu ti

dang / /shing kun rgyam tsha thang shing dang / /ra sna sbrang rtsi sbyar ba yi/ /'jam rtsi nad sel zhes bya dge /rtsa ba lnga yi khu ba dang / /pi pi ling dang rgyam tsha dang / /shing mngar sbrang rtsir bcas pa yi/ /til mar grub pa'i 'jam rtsir bshad/ /rtsa ba bcu pa 'bras bu gsum/ /

po son cha ni bil bar bskol/ /ba gcin dang ni de btags shing / /pa ta gla sgang dug mo nyung / /lan tshwa po son cha til mar/ /thal sman lan tshwar bcas pa ni/ /rigs pa'i 'jam rtsi bad kan nad/ /skya rbab gsud pa'i nad rnams dang / /khu ba rlung ni 'gags pa dang / /

rlung 'khrugs pa la bsngags pa yin/ /gla sgang pa ta e raN+Da/ /sle tres ba la ba spru ba/ /ra sna btsod dang dong ga dang / /pu shel tse dang kyi lce ba/ /ba ru ra dang pu tse shel/ /rtsa ba lnga pa chung ngu rnams/ /srang re po son cha rdog brgyad/ /de ni chu bre bzhi nang bskol/ /

bzhi cha lus pa btsags nas ni/ /'o ma bre do dang bsres la/ /'o ma lus pa slar yang bskol/ /skam sa'i sha khu bzhi cha dang / /sbrang rtsi rgyam tsha shing mngar dang / /shu ti dur byid pi pi ling / /dug mo nyung dang skyer khaN+Da/ /btags pa dang ni bsres pa yi/ /'jam rtsi

dro 'jam btang na ni/ /sha dang me drod lus kyi stobs/ /khu ba 'phel bar byed pa yin/ /dreg nad rmongs bag gcin snyi dang / /gzhang 'brum skran dang bshang gci 'gags/ /mi bzad rims dang me dbal dang / /rgyu rlugs lto sbos 'khrug cing 'khru/ /chu so rked

pa brla dku na/ /gnye'u rengs rna ba mgo bo'i nad/ /zla mtshan nad dang smyo byed dang / /'or nad lud pa rde'u chags dang / /gcin 'khyil ba yi nad rnams 'joms/ /dbang po nyams shing zhum pa dang / /mig la phan zhing bu skyed byed/ /'tsho byed rgyal po bcud len yin/ /

ri dwags phra mo mgo chung ba/ /rtsa ba bcu pa bskol ba'i chu/ /spa ma'i 'bras bu shu ti dang / /gla sgang lde gu snum chen bcas/ /mas gtong rlung ni sel ba'i mchog /shin tu ro tsar byed pa yin/ /rma bya'i gshog pa mkhris pa dang / /rgyu ma rkang pa mchu rtug pa/ /

por ba'i sha ni 'ba' zhig dang / /rtsa ba lnga pa chung ngu ni/ /srang re dang ni ldan gyur pa/ /chu dang 'o mar bskol nas ni/ /'o ma lus par sbrang rtsi mar/ /bcas dang de bzhin bi da ri/ /shing mngar shu ti pi pi ling / /po son cha yi lde gur bsres/ /rgyam tsha cung zad

btab pa yi/ /'jam rtsi stobs 'phel ro tsa'i mchog /gong ma sreg la sogs pa yang / /cho ga 'di ni so sor bya/ /khron gyis gzas tshol thams cad dang / /mthu rtsal mchu yis zas tshol ba/ /chu la gnas pa'ang de bzhin te/ /nya la 'o ma spang bar bya/ /sram dang ne+e'u

le byi la dang / /reg 'jam byi ba rnams kyi sha /re re srang bcu rtsa ba lnga/ /'o ma'i nang du bskol nas ni/ /'o ma der ni po son cha/ /pi pi ling dang lan tshwa gnyis/ /kha ra til mar sbrang rtsi mar/ /'jam rtsi btang na bcud len mchog /rtsol bas dkrugs glo

'grams pa dang / /dbang po nyams dang gzi mdangs stobs/ /khu chu bshang gci 'gags pa dang / /dreg nad kyis 'theng nad rnams dang / /rta dang glang po shing rtas g.yeng / /rkang lag chag grugs gyur pa la/ /slar ni bde bar 'tsho byed cing / /ro tsa byed pa'i mchog

yin no/ /kha sral bu ram shing phran las/ /g.yos su byas pa'i 'o thug blud/ /snum zhing bsdams pa mi dgos pa'i/ /grub pa'i sman ni sbyar bar bya/ /nad 'joms srung dang bcas pa yi/ /snum gyi 'jam rtsi bshad bya ste/ /rtsa ba bcu pa ba la dang / /ra sna a shwa

gan+d+ha dang / /ba spru ba dang e raN dang / /sle tres ga bra'i rtsa ba dang / /ba sha ka dang bu ti ka /sa ha ra dza nye shing ba/ /ka ka na se srang re dang / /nas dang ma sha zar ma dang / /rgya shug rgya sran khyor re'i tshad/ /chu bre drug cu rtsa bzhir bskol/ /de las

bre ni bcu drug lus/ /'tsho byed sde ni srang re bcug /til mar bre ni bzhi dang bskol/ /'di ni 'jam rtsir btang gyur na/ /rlung nad thams cad sel bar byed/ /de bzhin skam sa'i srog chags sha /'tsho byed sde dang bcas par bskol/ /shu ti nas dang bil ba skyur/ /

til mar bskol bas rlung nad sel/ /rgyam tsha mdog dmar gyur gyi bar/ /mer bsregs mar gsur rlung nad 'joms/ /dzi ban ti dang po son cha/ /me da rnam gnyis sra ba ni/ /shing mngar ba la shu ti dang / /zangs rtsi ba dang pi pi ling / /ka ka ni sa nye shing ba/ /

kha sral k+Shi ra ka ka ri/ /zur pa karka ta sring gi /shu dag btags pa'i lde gu dang / /til mar mar dang 'o ma ni/ /bzhi 'gyur gyi ni nang du bskol/ /'jam rtsi nyams brtas rlung nad 'joms/ /stobs dang khu ba me drod 'phel/ /khrag dang khu ba'i nad sel byed/ /bu skyed

par yang byed pa yin/ /rgyam tsha ru rta po son cha/ /shu ti lcang ma shu dag dang / /ba le ka dang shing mngar dang / /ga bra'i rtsa ba kad pha la/ /thang shing dong gra ma nu dang / /me da dpyi mo tsi tra ka /zur pa bong dbyi dang ga /sha ma dur byid ha re Nu/ /sti ra bil ba ni li ni/ /

ti mu sa dang pi pi ling / /dan da ra sna cha mnyam pa/ /e raN+Da yi mar ram ni/ /til mar bskol ba'i 'jam rtsi yis/ /bad kan nad 'joms rgyu rlugs dang / /rtug skam skran dang gzhang 'brum dang / /mcher pa'i nad dang gcin snyi dang / /rlung 'khyil ba dang lto sbos dang / /

rde chags nad ni myur du sel/ /yang na bil ba la sogs pa'i/ /rtsa ba lnga pa til mar bskol/ /yang na bad kan sel sman sbyar/ /til mar dang btang bad kan 'joms/ /yang na po son cha brgyad 'gyur/ /skyur bskol 'jam rtsis bad kan sel/ /'jam rtsi 'jam pas

rmongs gyur la/ /rnon po nye bar sbyang bar bya/ /rno bas gnod la snum pa dang / /mngar zhing bsil ba 'jam pa gtang / /rnon po ba gcin pi lu dang / /tsi tra ka dang lan tshwa dang / /thal sman dang ni nyungs kar rnams/ /dus la bab par gtang bar bya/ /'o ma mar

stsogs 'jam po yis/ /nyams stobs dus dang nad gzhi rang bzhin dag /rnam par phye ste 'jam rtsi gtang bya ba/ /rang rang gi ni sman gyi sde tshan gyis/ /rang rang gi ni nang rnams bsal bar bya/ /tsha bas nyam thag la bsil ba/ /bsil bas nyen la dro 'jam sbyar/ /

de dang 'tsham pa'i sman ldan par/ /'jam rtsi brtags te gtang bar bya/ /sbyang bar bya ba'i nad rnams la/ /rtas byed 'jam rtsi mi gtang zhing / /mi gang mdze gcin nad kyis nyen/ /tshil rgyas nad la gtang mi bya/ /nyam chung glo 'grams pa dang brgyal ba dang / /lus skem

rid dang sbyangs pa'i lus can dang / /gang yang dri mas tshe 'di gzung 'gyur la/ /sbyong bar byed pa'i mas gtong gtang mi bya/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /cho ga grub pa'i gnas kyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o// //de nas sman mas gtong ba'i cho gas nad

phyin te sos par bya ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /snum chos dugs ni ma byas dang / /lto lci ba la sman grang snum/ /tsha nyung sman tshad chung ba'am/ /sman ni ska ba btang gyur na/ /de yis nad ni bslangs gyur dang / /stobs chung ba yi nad ma phyin/ /sbyor ba nyes pa skyed

'gyur zhing / /'phyen dang phyi sa gcin sri dang / /lte ba chu so na zhing tsha/ /dang gar chags shing gzhang skrangs dang / /g.yan pa'i thor bu mdog mi sdug /mi dga' me drod chung bar 'gyur/ /tshad 'khru'i nyes pa bar ma la/ /sngar bshad sman gyi khu ba gnyis/ /de

las gcig ni dro ba yi/ /btung ba blugs pa bsngags pa yin/ /po son cha yi reng bu'i dugs/ /dus shes pa yis bkru sman gtang / /bil ba'i rtsa ba dur byid dang / /thang shing nas dang rgya shug dang / /rgya sran chang dang ba gcin bcas/ /mas gtong 'gags pa

sel bar byed/ /nad gzhi shas che lus rtsub dang / /lto sra nus pa chung btang na/ /mas gtong nad gzhi bslangs nas ni/ /rlung gi lam ni 'gag par byed/ /rlung ni lam log zhugs pa des/ /lto sbos nad rnams gzir bar byed/ /gzhang

dang lto ba tsha ba dang / /rlig pa chu so na byed cing / /snying gar 'gags pas gzer ba dang / /phan tshun du ni 'gro bar byed/ /de la lus bsku dugs byas pa'i/ /lus la reng bu gzhug par bya/ /bil ba stsogs sam bi lu dang / /nyungs kar ba gcin bcas mas ga

tong / /tsi tra thang shing til mar ni/ /bskol ba'i 'jam rtsi gtang bar bya/ /shugs ni bkag par gyur pa'am/ /btsir drags par ni byas pa'am/ /lan tshwa snum shas chung la tsha/ /sman chung ba yis mas gtong ba/ /'jam pas rlung gis gyen du 'phul/ /

kha dang sna nas 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de yis brgyal dang snying nad dang / /skom dang tsha ba la sogs 'byung / /brgyal ba'i nad ni mthong gyur na/ /de yi gdod la chu grang gtor/ /ngal bsos bar du g.yab pa dang / /dbugs rngub 'byung ba byed du gzhug /kha sbubs

bzhag ste rgyab rtsib logs/ /lto ba lag pa dron pos mnye/ /skra nas bteg ste sprugs pa dang / /sbrul dang mche ba can 'jigs bstan/ /mtshon dang thog bab rgyal po'i mis/ /skrag bcas mas gtong thur du 'byung / /lag pa gos kyis mgul par bsdam/ /

ci nas 'chi bar mi 'gyur bya/ /srog dang gyen rgyu rlung bkag pas/ /thur sel shin tu bder rgyu ba/ /grub pa yis ni mas gtong ba/ /myur du 'dren par byed pa yin/ /ru rta gla gor zho sha yi/ /lde gu skyur rtsabs sbyar te blud/ /dro dang rno dang 'khru ba yis/ /mas

gtong lugs bzhin 'byung bar byed/ /dur byid a ru ra ba gcin/ /sbyar blud lugs bzhin 'byung bar byed/ /zhu ba'i gnas 'dug dugs byas la/ /rtsa ba bcu pa rgya shug nas/ /rgya sran pa gcin bskol ba yi/ /mas gtong drag po sbyar bar bya/ /sle tres

smyug ma'i lo ma dang / /pu ti ka rany+dza'i shun pa/ /'o ma zur pa thang shing dang / /puti ka ni ba gcin bskol/ /til mar bu ram rgyam tshar bcas/ /bkru sman lde gur bcas pa gtang / /mas gtong brang na gnas pa la/ /bil ba la sogs lnga bskol gtang / /mgor

gnas snar blugs dud pa rngub/ /nyungs kar lde gus mgo bo bsku/ /mas gtong drod ches rno skyur drags/ /ska ches dugs ni drags pa dang / /nad gzhi chung zhing lto snyi la/ /yang dang yang du gtong ba yi/ /sbyor ba drags pa nyes 'gyur bas/ /lto ba'i nad ni skyed

par byed/ /de la bkru sman drag sbyar bas/ /gso dang mtshungs pa nyid du bya/ /mas gtong thal sman skyur rno dro/ /lan tshwa can nam mkhris can la/ /gzhang tsha 'brud cing gnod pa dang / /yongs su 'dzag par byed par 'gyur/ /khrag ni btsos pa lta bur 'byung / /mkhris

pa'ang mdog mang 'byung bar byed/ /lan mang shugs drag 'byung ba dang / /yang dang yang du brgyal bar 'gyur/ /de la khrag mkhris 'khru ba sel/ /gso ba rab tu bsngags pa yin/ /tsha ba sogs la dur byid kyi/ /lde gu rgun chur sbyar ba blud/ /de yis bshang rlung

mkhris pa ni/ /bsal nas tsha ba la sogs 'joms/ /dag gyur nas thug grang mo ni/ /khar dang ni bcas pa blud/ /'khru ba drags par gyur pa yi/ /bshang ba zad la kha zas ni/ /ma sha'i khu ba zan dron sbyin/ /zho dang chang ni blud par bya/ /de ltar grub pa'i

mas gtong nyes/ /bshad nas snum gyi mas gtong bshad/ /rlung can grang zhing chung ba dang / /mkhris pa rab tsha bad kan 'jam/ /'grangs ches pa la lci ba dang / /bshang ba stsogs la stobs chung gtang / /de ni snum rlung 'dres gyur zhing / /zil gyis mnan pas 'byung mi

'gyur/ /rengs dang brla na sbos pa dang / /rims dang gzer dang yan lag na/ /rtsib logs na dang 'dar ba ni/ /snum rlung 'dres la 'byung zhes bya/ /de snum lan tshwa dro dang skyur/ /ra sna bi da dro yi mar/ /rang skyur chang dang rgya shug dang / /rgya sran nas dang bskol

ba'am/ /rtsa ba lnga pa ba gcin bcas/ /mas gtong drag pos legs bsal bya/ /de dag nyid kyi til mar dang / /dgongs kar zan zos 'jam rtsi gtang / /skom dang lus tsha rmongs bag dmar/ /mdog nyams rims 'debs mun par mthong / /

mkhris pa dang 'dres yin zhes bya/ /kha mngar mas gtong byas te sbyangs/ /lus snyom sgyid zhan rims drag 'debs/ /cham pa lus lci yi ga 'chus/ /brgyal bcas na bas bad kan dang / /'jam rtsi snum ni 'dres shes bya/ /de la bska dang kha dang tsha/ /chang dang

ba gcin la bskol ba/ /po son cha dang til mar dang / /skyur bcas mas gtong ba yis bsal/ /slon dang brgyal dang yi ga 'chus/ /snyom gzer gnyid che yan lag na/ /ma zhu'i mtshan mar lus tshar bcas/ /de ni 'grangs ches 'dres shes bya/ /de la tsha dang lan

tshwa'i phye/ /bskol ba'i smin byed sman dang ni/ /bkru sman 'jam po gtang ba dang / /ma zhu la phan thams cad phan/ /gcin rtug 'phyen ni 'gags pas nyen/ /lus lci lto sbos snying ga na/ /snum dang bshang 'dres yin zhes bya/ /de la snum dugs ring bur

bcas/ /dur byid bil ba sogs bskol la/ /mas gtong drag dang 'jam rtsi gtang / /rtug pa 'gags pa sel bas kyang / /cho ga bzhin du legs par bsal/ /rtog pa'am gzhang ni skrang pa'am/ /thug pa legs par 'thungs pa yis/ /rkub tu snum

ni btang gyur pa/ /sdod pa med par shugs kyis rgyu/ /de nas ro stod mgrin pa dang / /stod kyi bu ga dag tu'ang 'byung / /de la dur byid rgya shug nas/ /rgya sran ba gcin bskol ba dang / /de dang bskol ba'i til mar ni/ /mas gtong 'jam rtsir bcas pa gtang / /lkog

mar byang ba dgag par bya/ /lkog ma bsdams shing skyug sman dang / /slon bro sel ba'i gso bas kyang / /bzlog pa dag ni de la bya/ /snum tshos ma gyur mi gtang ste/ /des ni gzhang khar chags 'gyur zhing / /de las nad bcas rmongs bag dang / /g.ya' dang skrang

pa skyed par byed/ /de la mas gtong rnon po dang / /arka'i lor bskol til mar gtang / /dbugs ma phyung bar bcing pa'am/ /ma lus par ni btang ba yis/ /rlung zhugs nas ni 'khrug byed cing / /gzer dang na ba skyed par byed/ /de la gzhang kha bsku dugs bya/ /

rlung 'joms pa yi kha zas gtang / /myur du bcug cing phyung ba'am/ /glo bur du ni bteg pa yis/ /rked pa gzhang dang brla byin pa/ /chu so rengs shing na bar 'gyur/ /de la rlung 'joms kha zas dang / /dugs bsku 'jam rtsir bcas pa phan/ /btsir ba'i tshe na bar du

grol/ /rlung gis gzhang la gnod gyur nas/ /brang dang mgo bo gzer zhing na/ /brla yi nad ni skyed par byed/ /de la bil ba la sogs dang / /po son cha dang dur byid sogs/ /ba gcin dang ni sbyar ba gtang / /btsir drags pa yis khong par ni/ /mi 'dug lkog ma

'byung bar 'gyur/ /de la mas gtong bkru sman dang / /mgul pa bsdam sogs las rnams bya/ /bkru sman sogs pas dag byas nas/ /lus dang nyams stobs me drod chung / /sgo nga gzhon nu'am til mar ni/ /snod ni gang ba ji bzhin du/ /gnod par gyur pa

thams cad las/ /sman pas 'bad de bsrung bar bya/ /kha zas mngar dang yid 'ong sbyin/ /de 'og skyur dang lan tshwar bcas/ /de nas mngar dang kha ba sbyin/ /de 'og bska dang tsha ba sbyin/ /ro ni snum dang rtsub pa dang / /phan tshun gnyen por gyur pa bzhin/ /rim pa nye bar

sbyar ba yi/ /rim pa de ni rnal du dbab/ /kun bzod nyams stobs brtan pa ni/ /rnal mar gyur pa yin zhes bya/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ cho ga grub pa'i gnas kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// //de nas sman gyi cho ga bshad par bya'o/ /sa phyogs

skam zhing cha mnyam pa'i/ /gzhi mnyam gtsang zhing sa gzhi bzang / /dur khrod shing chen lha gnas dang / /g.yang sa grog ma can ma gtogs/ /'jam zhing chu ni g.yas na 'bab/ /'jag ma dUr ba dang ldan pa/ /thong lcags kyis ni ma snad pa/ /ljon shing grib mas ma

phog pa/ /kha dog bcud la sogs dang ldan/ /sman skyes pa ni bsngags pa yin/ /'bus ma zos shing mes ma tshig /'byung ba sogs kyis gnod ma gyur/ /nyi grib chu la sogs ma nyen/ /ji bzhin dus su bsten gyur pa/ /rtsa ba che zhing gting du zug /

byang gi phyogs su bsten pa bzang / /de nas dge ba la spyod cing / /dad ldan gtsang sbra smyung ba byas/ /sman ni legs par gnas pa btu/ /'o mar bcas pa dus su sbyar/ /bu ram mar dang sbrang rtsi dang / /pi pi ling dang byi dang ga /'bru rnams ma gtogs 'o ma med/ /

lo gcig 'das par ma gyur sbyar/ /'o ma ba ni yar ma yi/ /gcin dang lci ba skon med yin/ /na tshod stobs ldan lus zungs dang / /rwa 'dzugs rmig pa la sogs bzang / /lan tshwa ma gtogs ro lnga'o/ /sman khu yi ni skye gnas yin/ /sman khu lde gu bskol dang grangs/ /

phan dang zhes ni bya ba ste/ /sman ni rnam pa lnga ru brtags/ /snga ma bzhin du mthu stobs che/ /'phral du btus te brdungs nas ni/ /tshags la btsir te btsags pa gang / /de ni khu ba zhes bshad do/ /lde gu gsher gyis sbrus btags pa'o/ /de bskol ba ni bskol ba yin/ /

bsgrangs pa mtshan mo gzhag pa yin/ /khaN+Da 'phral du sbyar btsags pa/ /de dag gi ni tshad brtag pa/ /nad stsogs stobs las sbyar bar bya/ /de yang drang srong gis bshad pa/ /tshad kyi nges pa yod min gyi/ /nad dang lto tshad nyams dang ni/ /dus dang yul ni rnam

brtags te/ /de ltar sman ni gtang bar bya/ /sman gyi khu ba srang bzhi ni/ /'bring tshad tsam du bshad pa yin/ /lde gu zho gnyis dag dang bsres/ /de ni chu srang gsum gyi tshad/ /bskol ba'i sman ni srang gcig bya/ /bre phyed chu bskol bzhi cha lus/ /bsgrangs pa srang

gcig srang drug ni/ /de las gzhan pas srang bzhi yin/ /sman mar bskol tshad ma smos par/ /lde gu snum dang gsher rdzas ni/ /bzhi 'gyur du ni skyed de sbyar/ /shau na ka yis bshad pa ni/ /snum bskol chu ni 'ba' zhig dang / /khu ba bskol pa rim bzhin du/ /

lde gu'i cha ni bzhi dang drug /brgyad ni rim bzhin sbyar bar bya/ /lde gu sor mor ma 'byar dang / /snum ni mer bcug sgra med dang / /gang tshe kha dog sogs phun tshogs/ /de tshe der ni myur du dbab/ /mar ni lbu ba dngas ma dang / /til mar lbu ba byung ba dang / /lde gu nal

nal por 'gyur zhing / /chu nang 'bying zhing gyes mi 'gyur/ /tshos pa'i tshad ni rnam gsum ste/ /'jam tshos 'byar bag 'byar la rtsub/ /'jam tshos tshig ma lde gu 'dra/ /'byar bag sbrang rtsi lta bu yin/ /cung zad tshig cing mdog gnag par/ /snang 'gyur de ni tha

ma yin/ /de las 'das par don mi byed/ /mtshos me drod nyams par byed/ /'jam tshos snar btang rtsub pas bsku/ /btung dang 'jam rtsi 'byar bag bya/ /sha na kar sha lag mthil dang / /spar gang phul bre a da ka /dro na ba ha rim bzhin du/ /bzhi 'gyur yin

par shes par bya/ /rlon pa nyis 'gyur sbyar bya zhing / /gsher pa phul gang stsogs de bzhin/ /btags te sbrus nas gsher med pa'i/ /snum bskol ba la chu gzhug bya/ /gang du tshad ni ma bshad pa/ /der ni cha mnyam sbyar bar bya/ /sha na gnyis la ba da ka /de

gnyis kar sha go la dang / /ba ru ra dang drang 'khru med/ /a k+Sha bi tsu su par+Na/ /lag mthil kham tshad byi la'i sder/ /tin du ka dang lag pa'i tshad/ /sgra gzhan don ni gcig pa yin/ /shu ti brgyad pa pi tsu yin/ /srang gcig bil ba pra kun dza/ /sbar gang a mra bzhi

po yin/ /gcig gi ming gi rnam grangs yin/ /srang gnyis khyor gang de gnyis la/ /snyim gang de gnyis ma ni ka /a da ka dang snod ka nas/ /dro na kum pa bum chen yin/ /tu la srang ni brgya yin te/ /de nyi shu la khur du bshad/ /gangs can 'bigs byed ri yis ni/ /

sa gzhi phal cher khyab pa yin/ /de las dang por bsil zhing phan/ /'bigs byed sman ni me'i rang bzhin/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /cho ga grub pa'i gnas kyi le'u drug pa'o// //yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ cho ga grub pa'i

gnas te gnas lnga pa lus gso ba'i yan lag rdzogs so// //de nas byis pa gso ba'i cho ga'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /de yang rgyun shes kyi bu la sogs pa drang srong chen po rnams kyis 'di ltar bshad de/ byis pa btsas ma thag phru ma/ /

bsal te rgyam tsha mar bskus sbyang / /de 'og btsas pas sdug bsngal la/ /ba la'i til mar blugs par bya/ /de yi rna ba'i drung du ni/ /rdo gnyis brdungs par spyad par bya/ /de nas de yi rna ba ni/ /g.yas par sngags 'di brjod par bya/ /yan lag yan lag las byung

khyod/ /snying las mngon par bskyed pa yin/ /bdag nyid bu zhes bya ba khyod/ /lo brgyar yang dag 'tsho 'gyur zhing / /lo brgya thub cing ston brgya 'tsho/ /tshe ring por ni thob gyur cig /rgyu skar phyogs dang mtshan mo dang / /nyin mos khyod ni bsrung bar shog /bde bar gyur na

lte ba ni/ /sor bzhi'i 'og tu srad bus bcing / /de yi 'og tu bcad nas ni/ /lte ba la ni brtod de bzhag /de 'og lte bar ru rta yi/ /til mar gyis ni bsku bar bya/ /'o ma can shing bskol chu'am/ /dri zhim bcud ldan chu dag ni/ /gser ram dngul ni bsregs pa

yis/ /bsros pa'i dro 'jam chu yis bkru/ /de nas mdzub mo g.yas pa ni/ /dkris pas rkan ni bteg nas kyang / /mgo bor ras bal snum can g.yogs/ /blo dang tshe dang stobs bskyed phyir/ /shu dag pra ma bi sha li/ /shang kha puSh+pa'i lde gu ni/ /mar dang sbrang

rtsir bcas pa dag /sngags btab ha re Nu tsam sbyin/ /gser dang shu dag mu men dang / /ma nu a ru ra'i phye ma/ /gser dang skyu ru ra'i phye ma/ /sbrang rtsi mar bcas lde gu sbyin/ /de nas mngal chu rgyam tsha ni/ /mar dang bcas pa skyug tu gzhug /skye dgu'i bdag po cho ga

yis/ /btsas pa'i cho ga byed du gzhug /snying la gnas pa'i rtsa rnams ni/ /btsas nas kha ni dbye ba'i phyir/ /nyi ma gsum mam bzhi pa la/ /bud med kyi ni nu zho 'byung / /de bas nyin zhag dang po la/ /dus gsum du ni sbrang rtsi mar/ /byi tsher ba dang sbyar ba la/ /

sngags kyis btab ste byis par byin/ /gnyis pa dang ni gsum pa la/ /lak+Sh+mi dang bskol mar blud bya/ /de nas dang po'i nu zho ni/ /bkag pa de la mar sar ni/ /zho gnyis tsam gyi tshad sbyin zhing / /nu zho dus gnyis blud par bya/ /ma nyid kyi ni nu zho blud/ /de yis lus

ni 'phel byed yin/ /de med ma ma shin tu byams/ /skyon med 'khrig pa spangs pa dang / /rigs dang rang bzhin de dang mnyam/ /nad med na tshod dar la bab/ /bu ma shi shing brkam chags med/ /gnyis kyi 'o ma blud par bya/ /de gnyis zas dang spyod lam ni/ /phan

pas 'bad de gso bar bya/ /mya ngan khro dang smyung ba dang / /lus dub nu zho nyams pa'i rgyu/ /bu ram chang ma gtogs chang dang / /rlan can sha khu 'o ma dang / /'o ma can sman mya ngan stsogs/ /go bzlog nu zho'i rgyun yin no/ /mi mthun zas ni zos pa dang / /ltogs

dang sems ni nyams pa dang / /lus zungs gnod bcas sbrum ma yi/ /'o ma byis pa'i nad skyed byed/ /nu zho med na ra'am ba'i/ /'o ma bri ha ti sogs rtsa'am/ /stir gnyis bskol kha rar bcas/ /yon tan de ldan blud par bya/ /drug pa'i mtshan mo khyad par du/ /

bsrung dang gtor ma'i bya ba bya/ /de yi gnyen gyis mel tshe bya/ /shin tu dga' ba nyid kyang bya/ /zhag bcu rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / /rang rig 'tsham pa'i cho ga ni/ /byed du gzhug cing btsas ma bslang / /lus la ldong ros ba bla dang / /gi waM tsan+dan a kar btags/ /

rgyu skar lha 'am nye du las/ /dras pa'i yi ge mnyam pa yi/ /ming ni byis pa la gdags bya/ /de nas rang bzhin dbye las bshad/ /gzugs kyi tshe ni yongs su brtag /mkhas pas byis pa'i mal stan ni/ /byang ngam shar du mgo bstan la/ /sngas dang gos ni

gtsang zhing bkrus/ /'jam zhing gnyer ma med pa yi/ /gos la gdon ni 'joms byed pa'i/ /sman gyi dud pas bdug par bya/ /bya rog bsad pa snum gsum dang / /bcas pa'i dud pas bdug par bsngags/ /bse ru la sogs gson po yi/ /rwar btags

nor bu bzang po spu/ /bram+hi 'tsho byed in+p+ri sogs/ /sman ni bzang po gdags par bya/ /mchog tu rtag par shu ngag ni/ /lag gnyis mgul dang spyi bor gdags/ /des ni tshe dang yid gzhungs dran/ /bde ba skyed byed gdon las bsrung / /zla

ba bdun nam brgyad pa na/ /nad med nyin zhag shis pa la/ /ma ma'i pang du spro bsrings la/ /dgun gyi dus su rna ba dbug /khye'u'i dang po g.yas pa dbug /bu mo'i g.yon pa dbug par bya/ /sman pas khab ni g.yas pas gzung / /g.yon pas rna shal bzung nas ni/ /

rna ba'i khyon gyi dbus las ni/ /mkhur tshos kyi ni phyogs dag tu/ /pags pa dag ni phug nas su/ /nyi ma'i 'od zer snang ba ru/ /mi 'gyur brtan por bzung nas ni/ /rgya skyegs kyi ni khu bas bsku/ /dbus su rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i/ /bu ga drang por cig car dbug/

de nas rtsa ni g.yas pa'i phyir/ /steng 'og ngos gnyis gtang mi bya/ /nag po gnad 'dra dmar po ste/ /rtsa de phug na dmar zhing na/ /skrang zhing tsha la sra ba dang / /gnye'u rengs gzhan dbang can nad skyed/ /de rnams nad gzhi ji bzhin du/ /gso ba dag ni myur du bya/ /gnad

du phug na khrag med cing / /nad dang dmar sogs 'byung mi 'gyur/ /khab rjes skud pa snum can ni/ /rjes su gzhug pa nyid du byas/ /til mar rlon pas bsku ba dang / /rgya cher de ni bskyed par bya/ /rna shal phug nas phan zas byin/ /de 'og sdong bu sbom po gzhug /

zhag gsum bzhag nas rma 'tshobs nas/ /rim gyis de ni bskyed par bya/ /de nas de yi so skyes nas/ /nu zho 'thung las rim gyis bzlog /sngar bshad 'o ma sbyin bya zhing / /kha zas yang dang rtas byed byin/ /nu zho spangs nas bi ya la'i/ /rkang dang shing mngar 'bras

yos dang / /ka ra dkar po la du sbyin/ /bil ba gzhon nu sug smel dang / /kha ra 'bras yos drod skyed sbyin/ /'khru gcod da ta ka'i me tog /kha ra 'bras yos skyo ma sbyin/ /gnod pa skyed par mi byed pa'i/ /sman gyis de yi nad bsal bya/ /shin tu drags

nad ma gtogs gzhan/ /rno sman bkru sman kun tu spangs/ /tshul min skrag par mi bya ste/ /skrag na gdon ni 'jug par 'gyur/ /gos kyi rlung dang gzhan reg dang / /'gom pa la ni de bsrung bya/ /bram+hi nyungs kar shu dag dang / /rgyam tsha ru rta sha ri ba/ /pi pi ling bcas

bskol ba yi/ /sman mar dran dang yid gzhungs skyed/ /tshe 'phel gdon ni mi bzad 'joms/ /'byung po smyo byed zlog par byed/ /so ma ra dza shu dag dang / /sbal pa nye shing sle tres dang / /shang ka puSh+pa bram+hi dang / /pra ma so ma srang re ni/ /lde gu brgyad cha mar bre

gang / /'o ma bzhi 'gyur nang du ni/ /bskol ba de blud dpal yon dang / /tshe blo yid gzhungs dran pa skyed/ /ra yi 'o ma a ru ra/ /tsha ba gsum dang pa ta dang / /shi kru shu dag lce myang tsha/ /bskol ba'i sman mar dbyangs can de/ /tshig dang blo gros dran pa dang / /

ngag gsal me drod skyed par byed/ /shu dag sle tres a ru ra/ /nye shing ba dang shang gi ni/ /a pa marga bskol ba yi/ /sman mar yon tan snga mar mtshungs/ /shu dag dkar po ru rta gser/ /arga'i puSh+pa gser dang bcas/ /lcags rkyags dang ni dung dang gser/ /

ka rany+dza dang shu dag gser/ /rkang pa re res bshad pa bzhi/ /sbrang rtsi mar dang bcas lde gu/ /lo gcig byin na lus dang blo/ /kha dog nyams stobs skyed par byed/ /shu dag shing mngar lce myang tsha/ /dong gra shu ti a ru ra/ /ru rta zur pa pi pi ling / /mar bcas

lde gu dag dag byed/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ gnas kyi phyi ma'i le'u ste dang po'o// //de nas byis pa'i nad gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /'o ma zas dang gnyi gas 'tsho/ /byis pa rnam pa gsum du bshad/ /de dag gnod

med las bder 'gyur/ /gnod pa las ni nad rnams 'byung / /gang zhig chu dang gcig tu 'dres/ /nyes pa yod pa ma yin te/ /'o ma de ni skyon med yin/ /rlung gis gnod gyur chu steng 'phyo/ /bska zhing rtsub la lbu ba can/ /de yis bshang gci sri bar byed/ /

mkhris las gnod gyur dro skyur tsha/ /ri mo ser snang des tsha skyed/ /bad kan gyis ska lan tshwar bcas/ /sbyin bag can la chu nang 'bying / /ldan pa'i mtshan ma 'dren ma ste/ /'das pa'i mtshan ma gsum dang ldan/ /rang gi mtshan ma ci 'dra

las/ /de 'thungs pas ni nad skyed 'gyur/ /byis pa rtag tu mi bzad par/ /ngu ba la ni nad shes bya/ /de ni phyogs gang shas cher 'dzin/ /gang du reg par mi bzod pa/ /de na nad yod shes par bya/ /mgo nad mig 'byed las shes bya/ /snying nad lce mchu sos

gnon dang / /dbugs dang khu tshur bsdams shes bya/ /khong nad bshang gci sri dang slon/ /nu ma sos 'debs rgyu ma 'khrug /lto sbo rgyab ni 'gugs dgye dang / /lto 'gugs pas kyang shes par bya/ /chu so mtshan nad bshang gci sri/ /skrag cing phyogs lta las shes

bya/ /de nas ma ma nad gzhi dang / /skyon ni ji bzhin gso bar bya/ /de la nu zho rlung can la/ /rtsa ba bcu bskol zhag gsum blud/ /yang na ru rta tsi tra ka /pa ta shu dag pu tse shel/ /ga bra'i rtsa ba la la phud/ /thang shing dang ni sa ra la/ /bri sh+tsi ka ni pi pi ling / /

na le sham ni bskol ba blud/ /de nas rlung nad 'joms pa yi/ /sman mar gang yang rung ba blud/ /de rjes chang gi dwangs ma blud/ /snum 'gyur bkru sman 'jam po gtang / /de 'og 'jam rtsi'i las bya zhing / /dugs sogs rlung nad 'joms pa bya/ /bil ba ra sna ti

mu sa/ /thang shing sa ra la bcas phye/ /mar dang sbyar ba'i lde gu'am/ /de bskol kha ra dkar btab sbyin/ /mkhris pas gnod la sle tras dang / /nye shing nim pa pa to la/ /tsan+dan sha ri ba bskol ba/ /ma ma dang ni byis par blud/ /yang na gla sgang 'bras bu gsum/ /

rtsa mkhris pu tse shel blud bya/ /thal tres la sogs shug pa sogs/ /pa to la sogs sde bskol blud/ /sman ni 'di bskol mar dang ni/ /mkhris pa sel ba'i bkru sman dang / /bsil sman gyis bsku byug sogs bya/ /bad kan can gyi bdag nyid la/ /shing mngar

rgyam tsha bcas pa'am/ /rgyam tsha shing mngar pi pi ling / /mar sbyar byis pa la blud bya/ /de nas po son cha'i me tog /btags pa sbrang rtsir bcas pa yi/ /lde gus nu ma byis pa'i mchu/ /bskus pa byin pa der slon gzhug /ma ma rnon pos slon du gzhug /de nas shag

sogs rim pas spyad/ /gla skang la sogs bskol ba blud/ /de bzhin go snyod rgya spos dang / /thang shing dug mo nyung bskol blud/ /yang na gla sgang bong nga dkar/ /shu dag tsha ba lnga bskol blud/ /nu zho nyes gsum dri ma can/ /dri mnam 'khru zhing du dang 'dra/ /ma bre gang

shing sla la rgyun bar chad/ /lbu ba can du 'khru bar 'gyur/ /bshang ba kha dog sna tshogs 'byung / /na zhing gcin ser dkar zhing ska/ /rims nad skom dad yi ga 'chus/ /sgregs pa skam po 'byung zhing glal/ /lus na yan lag rkyong ba dang / /mkhun zhing 'dar la

mgo 'khor dang / /sna mig kha ni shu ba sogs/ /nad ni gzhan dag de las 'byung / /'o ma'i be+e snabs zhes bshad de/ /gnod pa'i nad ni mi bzad yin/ /de la ma ma byis pa la/ /slon sman btang bas myur du gso/ /thug sogs rim par bshad pa ni/ /shu dag

la sogs sde tshan rnams/ /skyer pa stsogs pa'ang bong nga dkar/ /ba ta dang ni pi pi ling / /gla sgang pu tse shel bskol blud/ /pa tha bca' sga pu tse shel/ /sle tres rtsa mkhris sha ri ba/ /thang shing gla sgang mur ba dang / /dug mo nyung bcas bskol ba blud/ /nu zho'i nyes

pa sel ba'i mchog /rjes 'brel nad la ji bzhin du/ /dus shes pa yis gso bar bya/ /so 'byung ba dag nad rnams ni/ /thams cad kyi yang rgyu yin no/ /mchog tu rims dang 'khru ba dang / /lud pa slon dang mgo nad dang / /bang mig 'dzag pa'i nad dang ni/ /shu ba

rnams ni skyed par byed/ /byi la'i sgal tshigs bye ba dang / /rma bya'i gtsug ni 'byung ba dang / /byis pa'i so ni skye ba na/ /mi na ba ni cung zad med/ /de la nad ni ji bzhin dang / /nad stobs ji bzhin 'jigs ji bzhin/ /yul dang dus stsogs rnam phye ste/ /sman gyi

sbyor bas gso bar bya/ /gnod dang gnod bya de nyid dang / /rims sogs nad kyang de nyid 'byung / /de bas sman ni de nyid de/ /gzhon sha can dang lus chung phyir/ /zas kun sten par mi byed pas/ /'di yi tshad ni chung ngu sbyin/ /mar dang 'o ma la

brten pas/ /byis pa rtag par khong snum yin/ /de bas 'phral du skyug sman ni/ /'jam po blo dang ldan pas blud/ /'o ma 'o ma zas bsten la/ /nu zho ngoms par byas pas slon/ /zas za ba la mar bcas pa'i/ /thug pa sla bar blud par bya/ /bkru sman gyis gso

mas gtong dang / /tshad chung tshad phran dag gis bya/ /bkru sman la sogs ji skad bshad/ /ma ma nyid la gtang bar bya/ /mur ba rgya shug tsha ba gsum/ /'bras bu gsum dang 'dzam bu'i shun/ /thang shing pa ta nyungs kar bcas/ /sbrang rtsir bcas pa'i lde gu sbyin/ /nu zho'i

nyes pa sel mchog yin/ /pi pi ling ngam skyu ru ra/ /da ta ka yi me tog gi /phye ma sbrang rtsir bcas pa yi/ /lde gus rnyil ni byug par bya/ /'ur bya sreg pa'i sha skam gyi/ /phye ma sbrang rtsis sbrus pa yis/ /byis pa'i so yi myu gu ni/ /myur du skyed par byed pa yin/ /shu dag bri ha

ti gnyis dang / /pa ta gla sgang pu tse shel/ /bong nga mngar ba'i sman sde dag /bskol ba'i mar gyis so skyed grub/ /skyer pa thang shing sa ral/ /bri ha ti gnyis nye shing ba/ /kr-iSh+Na par+Ni shri ya se/ /sbrang rtsi mar sbyar lde gu ni/ /pho ba'i me drod skyed pa'i mchog /rlung ni bde bar

rgyu bar byed/ /'khru ba'i rims dang dbugs mi bde/ /mig ser skya rbab lung pa 'joms/ /byis pa'i nad ni thams cad la/ /phan zhing mdog dang nyams stobs skyed/ /btsod dang seng phrom da ta ki /ku ta nan ta ba la gnyis/ /sa ha che chung gnyis dang ni/ /mung+ga bil ba gzhon

nu gnyis/ /ras bal sa bon bcas pa dag /chu bskol ba dang mar dang ni/ /thal sman zho ga chur bskol bas/ /so skyes las byung sna tshogs nad/ /'di yis myur du 'joms byed de/ /'od srungs rgad pos bshad pa yin/ /byis pa'i so skyes nad la ni/ /sngags kyis

mngon par gdab mi bya/ /so skyes pa yi nad gang yin/ /gso bas rang nyid nyer zhir 'gyur/ /nyin par gnyid drags chu grang dang / /nu zho bad kan can bsten pas/ /byis pa'i dngas ma rgyu ba yi/ /rtsa rgyun bad kan gyis bkag pa'i/ /yi ga 'chus dang cham pa dang / /

de nas byis pa lus skams shing / /mdog snum mig ni dkar bar 'gyur/ /rgyam tsha tsha gsum sha rang ga /ba ta ko ri ka tam pa/ /mar dang sbrang rtsi sbyar skams dang / /yi ga 'chus pa sogs la gtang / /pu tse shel dang a sho ka /tsha ba lnga bcas

phye ma pan/ /da ta ki dang skyu ru ra/ /rgya shug phye ma mar bcas phan/ /sA la par+Ni shu dag dang / /bri ha ti gnyis ram nye ba/ /pi pi ling dang rgya spos dang / /lcang ma ut+pal ba spru ba/ /ga bra'i rtsa ba gla sgang rnams/ /srang re yi ni tshad byas nas/ /mar ni bre gang bcas bskol ba/ /

rtsa rgyun sbyong ba'i dam pa yin/ /a shwa gan+d+ha bye'u rug pa/ /bri ha ti dang pi pi ling / /bskol ba'ang yon tan de dang 'dra/ /shing mngar seng phrom pi pi ling / /shug pa tsan+dan ut+pa la/ /bal bu'i lo ma sha ri ba/ /bskol ba'i mar gyis skems pa yi/ /nad ni 'joms par

byed pa yin/ /shring gi ma du lung ga dang / /ga bra'i rtsa ba pi pi ling / /thang shing a shwa gan+d+ha dang / /ra mnye ba gnyis ra sna dang / /zangs rtsi ba dang dzi ba ka /ma sha mung+ga par+Ni dang / /byi dang ga ni lde gur bcas/ /ri bong mgo bskol khu ba dang / /bskol ba'i mar ni blud gyur

na/ /lus skems rgyas par byed pa'i mchog /shu dag sle tres ka yas+tha/ /spang spos tsa rong ra thug gcin/ /chang bskol til mar bskus pa phan/ /rgya skyegs khu ba cha mnyam dang / /til mar bre gang zho ga chu/ /bzhi 'gyur a shwa gan+d+ha dang / /skyer pa thang shing ru rta dang / /

ha re Nu ka ba li ka /tsan+dan mur ba pu tse shel/ /ra sna nye shing shing mngar mnyam/ /bskol ba'i til mar rgya skyegs sogs/ /zhes bya bskus na phan par 'gyur/ /stobs skyed rims dang zad byed dang / /smyo byed brjed byed dbugs mi bde/ /rlung gi nad rnams sel bar

byed/ /gnod sbyin srin po 'byung po 'joms/ /sbrum ma la yang bsngags pa yin/ /bong nga kar ka ta sring gi/ /pi pi ling dang sbrang rtsir sbyar/ /lde gu byis pa la sbyin pa/ /bong nga dkar po gcig po yis/ /lde gus lud pa rims slon bro/ /

bla brnan gyi ni nad sel byed/ /nu zho 'thung zhing slon pa la/ /de la zhun mar sbrang rtsi dang / /kaN+Da ka ri bri ha ti/ /'bras bu'i khu ba tsha ba lnga/ /sbyar ba'i lde gu sbyin par bya/ /pi pi ling dang lan tshwa lnga/ /ba ri bar byi dang ga /de bzhin lde gur sbyar ba sbyin/ /de bzhin tsha ba

gsum reg 'jam/ /sha ri da ta rma bya sram/ /ji snyed pags pa spu bsregs la/ /snag tsha sbrang rtsi mar sbyar phan/ /seng ldeng bal bu ardzun/ /ru rta pan ta na yi khu/ /'o ma mar dang bcas bskol bas/ /slon bro nye bar sel bar byed/ /gang gi so dang bcas skyes dang / /

gang gi dang por ya so skyes/ /bkra mi shis pa de la ni/ /zhi ba bya zhing bram ze la/ /yon dang bcas par sbyin par bya/ /de bzhin skem byed mchod par bya/ /bad kan 'khrugs pas rkan gyi shar/ /rkan gyi 'dzer pa zhes bya ste/ /des na rkan gyi phyogs kyi ni/ /spyi bo dma' ba

'byung bar 'gyur/ /rkan lhung nu zho 'gras pa dang / /ska ba 'thung zhing bshang ba sla/ /skom dang kha g.ya' mig na zhing / /gnya' ba 'degs dka' slon par 'gyur/ /de la rkan 'degs nas tshig 'khus/ /thal ba sbrang rtsir sbyar ba bsku/ /yang na bca' sga pi pi ling / /

ba lang gcin khu rgyam tsha bsku/ /dong gra skyer pa shing tsha yi/ /lde gu n+ya go d+ha'i lo mar/ /gtums la ba lang lci bas byug /de rjes me mar myur du bsreg /khu bas rkan dang kha bsku zhing / /mig tu yang ni blugs par bya/ /ru rta shu dag a ru ra/ /sbrang rtsir bcas pa'i lde gu

ni/ /nu zhor bcas pa byis pa blud/ /rkan gyi 'dzer pa las thar 'gyur/ /dri mas gos sam rdul ba las/ /gzhang khar bad kan khrag las 'byung / /rma ni nang dmar g.ya' ba dang / /bla brnan mang po 'byung bar 'gyur/ /la las ma mo'i nyes par bshad/ /gzhan

dag lus srul pos byas zer/ /rgyab kyi thor bu gzhang sdebs zer/ /la las de ming med ces bshad/ /de la ma ma bad mkhris dag /sel ba'i sman gyis nu zho sbyar/ /tsan+dan dkar chu bsil ba dang / /ldan pa'i skom ni nang nas blud/ /de dang skyer pa'i khaN+Da ni/ /

sbrang rtsir bcas pa'i rma bsku bya/ /rgya shug 'bras bu gsum blag sha'i/ /shun pa bskol ba'i chu blugs bya/ /nag chur gi wang spangs ma dang / /dngul rdo ba bla ldong ros ni/ /skyur dang btags pas bsku bya zhing / /yang na shing mngar skyer khaN dang / /dung ni zhib

tu btags pa'am/ /dung gi lte ba sha ri ba'am/ /a sa na yi shun pa ni/ /phye ma btags pa gdab par bya/ /dmar zhing g.ya' ba'i shas che la/ /srin bu pad pas khrag dbyung bya/ /gzhang sdebs nad la mkhris pa yi/ /rma la phan pa thams cad bsngags/ /

pa ta gla sgang ser po gnyis/ /ga bra'i rtsa ba byi dong ga /pur+Na rna ba bil bar bcas/ /brish+tsi ka li tsha ba gsum/ /mar bcas bskol ba tshad tsam bldags/ /sa zos nad las thar bar 'gyur/ /nad ni gang gi sman gang yin/ /de yis nu ma bskus nas ni/ /

yud tsam 'dug la de rjes bkru/ /blud na nad ni de des sel/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ gnas phyi ma'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// //de nas byis pa'i gdon gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /sngon gyi skem byed bsrung ba'i phyir/ /

gdon ni skyes pa'i gzugs can lnga/ /bud med kyi ni gzugs can bdun/ /lha chen po yi sprul pa yin/ /skem byed sa ga lug thug gdong / /khyi gdong yi dwags zhes bya dang / /bya gdon srul mo grang ba yi/ /srul mo long ma lus srul po/ /de bzhin bzhin gyi

rgyan can ma/ /nam gru nam gru skem ma'o/ /de rnams kyis ni bzung ba'i tshul/ /rtag tu ngu dang rims kyis 'debs/ /spyi'i tshul skrag dang glal ba dang / /smin ma 'degs shing rmya ba dang / /lbu ba slon zhing gyen du blta/ /ma mchu sos 'debs gnyid yar dang / /ngu

zhing mkhun la nu zho la/ /mi dga' skad ni 'gyur ba dang / /glo bur du ni sen mo yis/ /rang gi ma ma'i yan lag 'brad/ /de la skem byed kyis zin rtags/ /mig gcig mchi ma 'dzag pa dang / /yang dang yang du mgo bo rdegs/ /

phyogs gcig nyams shing lus rengs la/ /rdul bcas skye ba rengs pa dang / /so 'cha' nu zho la mi dga'/ /sngangs shing ngu la skad gsang nyams/ /kha yo kha chu skyugs pa dang / /mi bzad par ni gyen du blta/ /tshil khrag dri bro yid mi dga'/ /

bshang ba khu tshur la bcang zhing / /mkhur tshos mig dang smin ma gcig /g.yo zhing mig ni gnyi ga dmar/ /des ni yan lag nyes nyams pa'am/ /'chi ba kho nar byed par 'gyur/ /skem byed brjed byed mtshan ma ni/ /dran pa nyams shing yang

dang yang / /skra 'bal rke ba 'gugs pa dang / /rnam par 'dud cing glal bzhin du/ /bshang dang gci ba 'byin par byed/ /lbu bar skyug cing gyen du lta/ /rkang lag smin mas gar yang byed/ /nu ma rang lce so yis 'debs/ /kun tu g.yo zhing

gnyid yang rims/ /khrag ni rnag gi dri bro ba'o/ /lug thug gdon gyi rtags kyi nang / /sbo zhing rkang pa lag pa dag /'dar zhing lbu ba skyugs pa dang / /skom dad che 'khru chang pa sdom/ /skad gsang dma' zhing mdog mi sdug /mkhun cing slon par byed

pa dang / /lud pa skyigs bus 'debs gnyid yar/ /so yis mchu gnon yan lag sdud/ /rengs shing lug thug dri bro la/ /gyen du lta zhing dgod pa dang / /bar du 'gugs shing rims kyis 'debs/ /brgyal zhing mig gcig skrangs pa yan/ /

khyi yi gdong gi rtags gyur pa/ /'dar zhing ba spu ldang ba dang / /rngul zhing mig ni 'dzums pa dang / /rgyab tu gug cing lce dang so/ /mchu dang rkan sgra 'byin zhing skyugs/ /bshang ba'i dri 'byung khyi skad 'byin/ /yi dwags kyi ni gdon gyi rtags/ /ba spu ldang

zhing yang yang sdang / /glo bur du zhing rims kyis 'debs/ /'khru zhing slon byed lud pa lu/ /glal skom mi ro'i dri dang ldan/ /lus ni bskyod cing g.yo ba dang / /skem zhing rengs la mdog mi sdug /khu tshur sdom shing mchi ma 'dzag /bya gdon

lus lhod 'khru bar byed/ /lce rkan lkog mar rma 'byung zhing / /thor bur na zhing tsha la gnag /tshigs dag tu ni yang yang 'byung / /mtshan mo skye la nyin mo 'bri/ /kha'am bshang sgo 'gags pa dang / /'jigs shing bya yi dri dang ldan/ /

rims kyis 'debs par byed pa yin/ /srul mo'i slon zhing 'dar ba dang / /lus snyom mtshan mo gnyid yar dang / /skyigs bu lto sbos 'khru ba dang / /skom zhing gcin ni sri ba dang / /lus lhod ba spu gshor ba dang / /kha ltar dri ni mnam

pa yin/ /grang ba'i srul mo 'dar ba dang / /ngu zhing zur gyis blta ba dang / /skom zhing 'khru la rgyu ma 'khrog /zhag ltar dri ni mnam pa dang / /yan lag logs gcig grang ba dang / /cig shos dro ba nyid yin no/ /srul mo long ma'i slon

pa dang / /rims dang lud pa gnyid chung dang / /bshang ba sla zhing mdog mi sdug /dri nga bskus pas myur du skam/ /mthong ba nyams shing mig na g.ya'/ /mig skrangs glo bar gyur pa dang / /skyigs bu mi dgod nu zho 'gras/ /mdog mi

sdug cing nga ro rtsub/ /mdog nyams nya yi dri dang ldan/ /yang na dri ni skyur bcas yin/ /bzhin rgyan can gyis rkang pa dang / /lag pa gdong ni mdzes pa dang / /rtsa ni nag por snang ba yis/ /lto ba khyab cing rims kyis 'debs/ /yi ga 'chus

shing yan lag na/ /ba gcin lta bu'i dri 'byung 'gyur/ /nam gru gnag cing sngo ba dang / /mig dang rna ba sna med cing / /mig 'gul skyigs bu lud pa lu/ /kha ni yo zhing dmar ba dang / /lug thug drir ldan rims 'debs skem/ /

bshang ba sngo zhing sla ba yin/ /nam gru skem mos lus kun ni/ /rims kyis 'debs par 'gyur ba dang / /skra 'byi zas la mi dga' dang / /skad gsang zhum zhing mdog mi sdug /bshang ba kha dog sna tshogs dang / /lto

bar rtsa yi mdud pa chags/ /ngu zhing bya rgod dri ldan la/ /yun ring na bar byed pa yin/ /lto ba rmen bu zlum po 'byung / /bshang ba kha dog sna tshogs 'byung / /lce yi dbus ni dma' ba dang / /rkan ni gnag 'gyur de spang bya/ /kha zas

mang du zos kyang ni/ /byis ba gang zhig lus skem byed/ /skom pas nyen cing mig nyams pa/ /de ni nam gru skem mos gsod/ /'tshe ba la dga' mchod par 'dod/ /gdon rnams 'dzin pa'i rgyu yin no/ /de la 'tshe ba'i bdag nyid can/ /byin

tshe sna nas 'dzag pa dang / /lce nyams mig ni gting du 'bros/ /'degs byed mig ni mchi mar bcas/ /nyam chung tshig ni dman pa dang / /dri nga ba ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /skem zhing rang gi bshang dang gci/ /lag pas nyed cing smod mi byed/ /

lag pas bteg ste 'bad pa yis/ /bdag dang de bzhin gzhan la rdeg /mtshon dang shing stsogs kyis rdeg cing / /'bar ba'i me la 'jug par byed/ /chu nang 'bying zhing khron par ltung / /gzhan yang de 'drar byed bar 'gyur/ /skom dad che

zhing tsha bas rnag /slon par byed par 'gyur ba dang / /bu ga kun nas khrag 'dzag cing / /'chi ltas byung ba de spang bya/ /dga' ba 'dod pas gzir gyur pa/ /dben par bud med 'dod smra dga'/ /dri dang me tog phreng rgyan dga'/ /mgu

zhing zhi ba gso ba dka'/ /lces ni kha la nyug pa dang / /mchu rkan gre ba skams pa dang / /dogs pas lta zhing ngu ba dang / /sems khong chud cing zhum pa dang / /zas 'dod ltogs par gyur kyang ni/ /byin na za bar mi 'dod la/ /gtor ma

'dod pas zin pa ste/ /de ni gso sla yin par bshad/ /gsod 'dod pa la grub pa yi/ /sngags bzlas sbyin sreg byas pas gzhom/ /cig shos la ni ci 'dod par/ /dga' dang gtor ma sogs sbyin pas/ /de nas gso rung gdon la ni/ /byis pa

khang pa dben par bzhag /zhag gsum chag chag phyag dar byas/ /rtag tu me ni gzhag pa yi/ /bu ti'i me tog bsil ma dang / /'dab ma sa bon nyungs kar gtor/ /gdon 'joms til mar sbar ba yi/ /mar mes gdon ni 'joms par byed/ /

nad g.yog nyal po chang dang sha /yongs su spangs par gyur pa yi/ /mar ni rnying pas bskus nas ni/ /ba la nim pa star ka ri/ /dong gra thang shing ka tang ga /'dzam bu dang ni ta ma la/ /ka tri na dang lcam pa dang / /a ba marga ma ta li/ /ma du shi

kru zhes bya dang / /ka ka dza ka shwe ta che/ /bil rkang 'o ma can gyi shing / /ka dam ba bcas ka rany+dza/ /chu ni dro 'jam dag gis bkru/ /stag dang gzig dang seng ge sbrul/ /dom gyi pags pa mar dang bcas/ /bdugs pas khrus byas 'og tu bdug /pu ti

nyungs kar sha raM ga /shu dag go bye la la phud/ /ru rta mar sbyar bdug pas ni/ /gdon kun las ni thar byed yin/ /yungs kar nim pa'i lo ma dang / /shu dag ka ra bI ra'i rtsa/ /dro ba mar sbyar bdug pas ni/ /gdon ni thams cad sel bar byed/ /ba

lang rwa dang rus pa spu/ /pags pa byi la'i rtug pa dang / /nim pa'i lo ma pu tse shel/ /mar dang bri ha ti gnyis dang / /ras bal sa bon po son cha/ /nas dang ra spu thang shing dang / /nyungs kar rma bya'i sgro dang pog /skra dang phub ma pha bang dang / /rdza

mar ra thug gcin dang sbangs/ /zhib btags pa yi bdugs pas ni/ /'byung po'i gdon ni thams cad dang / /mi bzad rims nad 'joms par byed/ /byi tsher a mra'i tshi gu dang / /rgya spos mngar sde na le sham/ /kr-iSh+Na par+N-i gla sgang rnams/ /lde

gur byas pa mar dang ni/ /'o ma rtsa ba bcu bskol khur/ /bcas bskol de ni gdon 'joms mchog /ra sna aM shu ma ti gnyis/ /ba la rtsa ba chen po lnga/ /gla sgang btags te mar dang bskol/ /tsha ba gsum dang tsi tra ka /

thal tres pa tra byi dang ga /shing mngar shing kun pa ya s+ya/ /thang shing pi pi ling rtsa ba/ /dug mo nyung dang bcas pa yi/ /lde gu mar dang bskol bas ni/ /rtag tu byis pa la phan zhing / /nad dang gnod pa thams cad 'joms/ /me drod stobs

dang kha dog skyed/ /sha ri ba dang mu ra dang / /bram+hi shu dag shang khi ni/ /nyungs kar a shwa gan+d+ha dang / /bye'u rug pa bcas mar bskol/ /de ni btung dang bsku ba yis/ /gdon rnams thams cad 'joms par byed/ /mar gad 'byung po'i

rigs pa ru/ /'og nas bshad pa dag dang ni/ /de bzhin gtor ma sbyin sreg dang / /khrus ni sngags rgyud shes pas sbyar/ /pu ti ka rany+dza'i shun pa/ /bar pa ra yi rtsa ba dang / /ku ba kha bo bi sha la/ /ka tra ka dang bil ba dang / /ka pi ta

bskol des mtshan mo/ /byis pa bkrus na shis pa yin/ /gdon dang bral yang bla brnan nad/ /rjes su 'brel pa thams cad la/ /byis pa'i nad gsor bshad pa yi/ /sman gyis ji bzhin gso bar bya/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus

pa las/ /phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u ste gsum pa'o// //yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ byis pa gso ba'i yan lag rdzogs so// //de nas 'byung po'i gdon gyi nad dmigs shes pa bshad par bya'o/ /shes

dang rnam shes tshig dang ni/ /spyod dang snying stobs rang bzhin dag /gang gi rang bzhin 'gyur bar snang / /de la 'byung po'i gdon yod bshad/ /'byung po'i gzugs dang rang bzhin dang / /smra dang 'gro sogs spyod pa dang / /gang zhig

'dre bar byed pa rnams/ /de la de ni zhugs par bshad/ /de ni lha dang lha min stsogs/ /dbye ba rnam pa bco brgyad bshad/ /de 'dzin rgyu ni 'phral gtam ni/ /sngon chad shes rab 'chal ba yi/ /blo yis nyes pa byas gyur nas/ /de yi chags pa stsogs

bskyed nas/ /brtul zhugs spyod dang chos lugs nyams/ /mchod 'os rnams ni brnyas pa dang / /gzhung lugs nyams pa de dag ni/ /sdig dang bdag ni gsod byed ni/ /gdon ni glags skabs tshol byed pas/ /lha la sogs pa'ang rjes gnod

byed/ /glags ni sdig la sogs pa dang / /mi dge'i las ni smin pa dang / /gcig pur khang stong gnas pa'am/ /dur khrod sogs par mtshan mo gnas/ /gcer bur rgyu ba'am bla ma smod/ /'khrig pa tshul min spyod pa dang / /gtsang sbra med par

lha mchod dang / /mi gtsang gzhan dang 'dres pa dang / /sbyin sreg sngags gtor mchod sbyin rnams/ /phyin ci log tu byed pa dang / /mdor na nyin re sogs spyod par/ /spyod pa brten pa las 'das pa'o/ /lha yi gdon gyis yar ngo yi/ /tshes

gcig bcu gsum dag la 'dzin/ /lha min gdon ni yar ngo yi/ /bcu gsum mar ngo bcu gnyis la/ /dri za'i gdon ni bcu bzhi dang / /bcu gnyis dag la'ang 'dzin par byed/ /klu gdon tshes lnga la 'dzin byed/ /gnod sbyin gdon ni yar ngo yi/ /tshes

bdun bcu gcig dag la 'dzin/ /tshangs pa srin pos yar ngo yi/ /tshes brgyad bco lnga dag la 'dzin/ /srin po sha za sogs mar ngo'i/ /tshes gcig tshes dgu bcu gcig la/ /mtshun lha gnam stong tshes bcu dang / /brgyad dang dgu pa dag

la 'dzin/ /rgan pa la sogs gzhan dag ni/ /phal cher dus de'i thun mtshams la'o/ /lha yi gdon gyis dbang byas pa/ /gdong ni pad+ma kha bye 'dra/ /lta stangs zhi zhing khro ba med/ /tshig nyung dul dang bshang gci nyung / /kha zas la ni 'dod pa med/ /

lha dang bram ze 'byung ba dka'/ /gtsang zhing saMskr-i ta'i skad smra/ /yun ring nas ni mig 'dzums shing / /lus dri zhim zhing mchog ster byed/ /gos phreng dkar po chu bo dang / /ri mtho khang pa mtho la dga'/ /gnyid med tshugs pa med pa yin/ /

lha min gdon gyis zin pa ni/ /yon por blta zhing rang bzhin ngan/ /lha dang bla ma bram ze dang / /'jigs med khengs shing dpa' ba dang / /khro zhing rtsol ba che ba dang / /nga ni drag po khyab 'jug dang / /skem byed brgya byin yin zhes bshad/ /sha dang chang la dga'

zhes bya/ /dri za'i gdon gyis zin pa'i rtags/ /rang spyod la dga' lus dri zhim/ /snying dga' glu dang gar yang byed/ /khrus dang skyed mos tshal la dga'/ /gos phreng byug pa dmar la sred/ /sgeg dang rtsed mo la dga'o/ /klu yi gdon gyis zin pa'i rtags/ /

mig dmar khro zhing mi 'gyur lta/ /yon por 'gro zhing blta ba dang / /nyin mtshan dbugs rgod lce las ni/ /kha chu 'dzag cing kha 'gram lhag /bu ram 'o ma khrus la dga'/ /kha sbub tu ni nyal bar byed/ /gdugs mthong na ni 'jigs pa yin/ /gnod

sbyin gdon gyis zin pa'i rtags/ /mig dmar bgrad cing skrag la 'gul/ /lus ni dri zhim gzi mdangs ldan/ /gtam dang glu dang khrus dang ni/ /phreng ba byug pa la dga' zhing / /nya yi sha sred dga' ba dang / /dga' mgu stobs chen nad med la/ /lag rtse

bskyod cing su zhig la/ /ci zhig sbyin zhes smra bar byed/ /gsang tshig smra zhing sman pa dang / /bram ze la ni brnyas par byed/ /khro ba chung zhing mgyogs 'gro ba'o/ /tshangs pa srin pos zin pa'i rtags/ /dgod cing gar la dga' ba dang / /spyod pa gtum zhing glags

skabs tshol/ /gshe zhing myur du 'gro ba dang / /sman pa bram ze lha la sdang / /rang la shing dang mtshon sogs brdeg /kye zhes bya ba'i sgra sgrogs shing / /bstan bcos rig byed 'dod pa yin/ /srin po'i gdon gyis zin pa'i rtags/ /khro gnyer bcas shing khro bar

lta/ /rta bas bag tu ni byed pa dang / /rdeg cing rab tu rgyug pa dang / /ngu zhing gdong ni 'jigs rung ston/ /zas ma zos kyang stobs dang ldan/ /gnyid med mtshan mo rgyu ba dang / /ngo tsha gtsang sbra med cing dpa'/ /gdug cing tshig rtsub

smra ba dang / /khro zhing phreng ba dmar po dang / /bud med sha chang khrag la dga'/ /sha'am khrag ni mthong ba na/ /mchu ni ldag par byed pa dang / /zas za'i tshe na dgod pa yin/ /sha za'i gdon gyis zin pa'i rtags/ /sems ni bde

bar mi gnas shing / /yongs su rgyug par byed pa dang / /mi gtsang la dga' glu gar dang / /dgod dang chang dang sha rlon dga'/ /spyos na gdong ni zhum pa dang / /rgyu med par ni ngu ba dang / /bdag nyid sen mos 'brud pa dang / /

khong rtsub lus nyams skad gsang dma'/ /sdug bsngal ba ni brda sprod cing / /'brel dang mi 'brel tshig mang smra/ /dran pa nyams shing gnas stong dga'/ /mi brtan gcer bu dri ma can/ /srang bar 'khyams shing gos gyon zhing / /rtswa

yi phreng ba rgyun tu thogs/ /shing 'dzeg rta la zhon par byed/ /de bzhin phyag dar phung por 'dzeg /mang du za bar byed pa yin/ /yi dags gdon gyis zin pa'i rtags/ /spyod tshul dri ni yi dags 'dra/ /sngar zhing zas la mi dga' dang / /

rtsa gcod byed pa zhes kyang bya/ /grul bum gdon gyis zin pa'i rtags/ /tshig mang smra zhing kha gdong gnag /dal gyis 'gro bar byed pa dang / /rlig pa skrang zhing 'phyang ba yin/ /mi ni byang stems zin pa'i rtags/ /shing rdo bong ba stsogs thogs

shing / /tshal pa gyon te 'gro ba dang / /gcer bur rgyug cing 'jigs bag tu/ /lta la rtswa yis rgyan du byed/ /dur khrod gnas ni stong pa dang / /srang bar shing gcig brten pa dang / /til zas chang dang sha la ni/ /rtag tu mig ni tshags pa

dang / /tshig rtsub de ni smra ba yin/ /g.yengs byed kyis ni zin pa'i rtags/ /chu 'dod zas ni mi slong dang / /sngangs shing mig ni dmar ba dang / /tshig rtsub smra bar shes par bya/ /ro langs gdon gyis zin pa'i

rtags/ /dri dang phreng ba la dga' zhing / /tshig bden smra la yongs su 'dar/ /gnyid che bar ni shes par bya/ /yi dags mtshun lha'i gdon gyi rtags/ /mig mi gsal zhing bzhin ras zhum/ /rkan ni skam par byed pa dang / /mig

dang rdzi ma bskyod pa dang / /gnyid che me drod chung ba dang / /g.yon phyogs nas ni gos gyon zhing / /sha dang bu ram til la dga'/ /tshig 'khrul pa ni yin zhes bya/ /bla ma drang srong rgan dang grub/ /dmod pa sems kyi rjes mthun pa/ /

spyod lam kha zas rang bzhin las/ /ci 'dra gdon ni de yin bshad/ /gzhon nu'i tshogs kyi rjes 'brang zhing / /gcer bu skra ni gyen du brdzes/ /yid mi bde zhing dus tshigs ni/ /yun ring gyur pa'i gdon de spang / /yan lag brgyad pa'i

snying po bsdus pa las/ phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o// //de nas gdon gso pa bshad par bya'o/ /'byung po'i 'tshe ba mi 'dod dang / /bzlas dang sbyin sreg gtor ma dang / /brtul zhugs tshul khrims mnyam

'jog dang / /sbyin shes brtse la sogs pas bsal/ /shing kun ba bla tsha ba gsum/ /gla rtsi sgog skya arka'i rtsa/ /spang spos a za lo mi dang / /la ba 'bam po ku ku ti/ /shu dag gan+d+ha pri yang ku/ /sar pa gan+d+ha til mar ni/ /

ka ka an da ra mnye ba/ /snu ha ka ka ta shring gi/ /sle tres ma hA na ba li/ /yungs kar dang ni lig bu mig /gdon 'joms sman ni gzhan dag dang / /bong bu rta dang khyi lug dang / /rnga mo go da dred dang ni/ /sre mo reg 'jam byi la gung / /ba

lang seng ge stag dang ni/ /rgya mtsho yi ni srog chags kyi/ /pags pa mkhris pa sen mo so/ /sde tshan 'di dang mar rnying ngam/ /til mar dang ni bskol ba dag /btung dang snar ni blugs pa dang / /bsku ba'i don du sbyar bya zhing / /'di dag phye

mas bdug par bya/ /'di yi ri lu byas nas ni/ /mig sman sna sman bya ba dang / /'di yi lde gus byugs pa dang / /bskol ba'i khu ba blugs par bya/ /sbyor ba 'di yis smyo byed dang / /brjed byed bcas pa'i gdon zhi byed/ /nyungs

kar ha ti pi pi ling / pi pi ling rtsa che ba gsum/ /skyu ru ra dang go da dang / /sre mo byi la rtsa sha yi/ /mkhris pa dang btags sna sman dang / /bsku byug byugs sogs byas gdon 'joms/ /nyungs kar shu dag shing kun dang / /pri yang

ku dang ser po gnyis/ /gi ri kar+Ni dkar nag gnyis/ /'bras bu gsum dang shwe ta dang / /nim pa'i lo ma ka rany+dza/ /shri sha gnyis dang sa bon dang / /thang shing dang ni tsha ba gsum/ /mar dang ba gcin de bzhi 'gyur/ /bskol ba

don grub ces bya ste/ /btung dang snar blugs las sbyar na/ /gdon ni thams cad myur 'joms byed/ /mchog tu lha min gdon sel byed/ /brjed byed dug dang bkra mi shis/ /smyo byed gshed byed rims rnams 'joms/ /sman de nyid ni

ra thug gi/ /gcin dang sbyar te blud pa dang / /snar blugs mig sman byugs pa dang / /khrus dang dril ba la sbyar ba/ /sngar bshad yon tan de 'dra zhing / /rgyal po'i sgor yang don grub byed/ /nyungs kar shu dag tsha ba gsum/ /a

shwa gan+d+ha ser po gnyis/ /shing kun kun dong rtsa ba dang / /karany+dza yi sa bon dang / /shri sha yi me tog dang / /ka bid tha yi 'bras bu dang / /rgyam tsha ru rta rgya spos dang / /gi ri kar+Ni dkar po dang / /so na ka yi rtsa bar gnas/ /ra

gcin dag dang legs bsgos shing / /ba lang mkhris pa bu ram dang / /ri lu byas pa'i sbyor ba de/ /mig bskus snar blugs bsku byas na/ /smyo byed rma ni red pa dang / /mtshan mo mi mthong mun 'thibs byed/ /bgegs dang

lus chur nub pas brgyal/ /dug bskus mda' yis phog pa dang / /gdug pa sbrul gyis zin pa sel/ /ras bal sa bon rma bya'i sgro/ /me tog sman ma bri ha ti/ /shing tsha spang spos po son cha/ /byi la'i rtug pa phub ma dang / /shu dag mi

skra sbrul lpags dang / /glang po'i so dang glang gi rwa/ /shing kun dang ni na le sham/ /tsha mnyam bdugs par byas pa yis/ /skem byed smyo byed sha za'i rigs/ /srin po lha yi gdon 'joms mchog /gan+d+ha b+ha dra tsha ba gsum/ /gur kum

pi pi ling rtsa ba/ /kaN+Da ka ri skyer pa dang / /thang shing dang ni yungs kar gnyis/ /ba li ka dang dug mo nyung / /tsan+dan dkar po rgyam tsha dang / /'bras bu gsum dang pu shel tse/ /shu dag spangs ma pu tse shel/ /tsan+dan dkar po ba la dang / /

shing mngar sug smel ldong ros dang / /shug pa rgya spos shri pa sa/ /ma du ka yi snying po dang / /bong nga gnyis po pri yang ku/ /dbyi mo ru rta skyer khaN dang / /cha mnyam zhib btags lde gu dang / /mar rnying gcin kun cha mnyam bskol/ /gdon

khus 'debs shes bya bar brjod/ /de blud gdon 'joms mchog yin no/ /rgya spos shing mngar ka rany+dza/ /rgya skyegs da ta pa to la/ /shu dag shing kun pa ta la/ /nyungs kar kaN+Da ka ri dang / /ser po gnyis dang pu tse shel/ /rgya shug gan+d+ha

pri yang ku/ /tsha ba gsum dang 'bras bu gsum/ /thang shing sle tres byi dang ga /ko sha ta ki ka kan ta/ /shi kru nim pa dug mo nyung / /shri shi'i me tog sa bon dang / /gla sgang ru rta dan da dang / /gi ri kar+Ni tsi tra ka /bil ba cha mnyam

lde gur byas/ /mar rnying can gyi sde tshan bcas/ /bskol de yun ring bzhag pa de/ /khus 'debs chen po zhes bshad do/ /rim pa kun gyis sbyar na ni/ /gdon rnams kun dang smyo byed dang / /mdze dang rims ni myur du 'joms/ /gdon

ni nyi ma gang gang la/ /'dzin pa'i nyi ma de dang der/ /mchog tu sbyin sreg gtor ma sogs/ /sman pas rab tu 'bad de bya/ /khrus dang gos dang sha dang tshil/ /chang dang mar dang bu ram stsogs/ /gang zhig gang la sred gyur pa/ /de tshe

de ni de la sbyin/ /rin chen dri dang phreng ba dang / /sa bon mar dang sbrang rtsi dang / /zas kun kun la sbyin bya ste/ /'di ni spyi yi cho ga'o/ /lha dang bla ma drang srong rgan/ /grub pa lha yi gnas su sbyin/ /de yang lha yi gdon la ni/ /byang gi phyogs

su gtor ma sbyin/ /lha min gdon la ci 'dod par/ /mtshams kyi gnas su nub tu sbyin/ /dri za'i gdon la ba lang ngam/ /gos dang rgyan bcas gtor ma sbyin/ /mtshun lha klu gdon 'bab chu'i 'gram/ /klu la shar lho mtshams su sbyin/ /

gnod sbyin rang gi gnas sam ni/ /chu gnyis 'dus pa'i gnas su sbyin/ /srin por lam gyi bzhi mdo'am/ /tshang tshing 'jigs su rung bar sbyin/ /srin po lho yi phyogs su sbyin/ /tshangs pa'i srin por shar du sbyin/ /sha za la ni khang stong

du/ /nub phyogs su ni gnas te sbyin/ /phreng ba gtsang zhing dkar po dang / /dri dang 'o thug 'bras chan dang / /zho dang gdugs ni dkar po dag /lha rnams kyi ni gtor mar 'dod/ /shing kun nyungs kar shu dag dang / /tsha ba gsum ni srang

phyed phyed/ /mar bre gang dang ba yi gcin/ /bzhi 'gyur dang ni lhan cig bskol/ /de btung snar blugs bskus pa yis/ /lha yi gdon las thar bar byed/ /shu dag shing kun sgog skya rnams/ /ra gcin sbyar ba snar blugs dang / /mig

bskus lha yi gdon las thar/ /lha min gtor ma 'bras bu ni/ /mang po dag dang pu shel tse/ /klu yi gdon la dzA ti dang / /'bras yos bu ram snum khur dang / /'bras chan bu ram bcas pa dang / /zas mchog 'o ma

sbrang rtsi dang / /sa nag nA ga ge sar dang / /shu dag pad+ma pu shel tse/ /ut+pal pad+ma dmar po yi/ /'dab mar bcas pa'i gtor ma sbyin/ /seng phrom lo ma dkar po dang / /rgya sbos nA ga ge sar dang / /nyungs kar chu grang la btags pas/ /

snar blugs mig tu bskus pa'ang phan/ /gnod sbyin gdon la 'o ma zho/ /mar dang 'bras chan bsres pa dang / /gu gul pad+ma thang shing dang / /pu shel tse dang gos dang gser/ /dbyig ni gtor mar sbyin par bya/ /mar dang 'o ma ba gcin ni/ /cha mnyam

bskol ba btung ba dang / /snar blugs lus la bskus na phan/ /a ru ra dang ser po gnyis/ /sgog skya shu dag na le sham/ /nim pa'i lo mar gcin btags/ /lde gus sna sman mig sman bya/ /tshangs pa srin po'i gtor ma ni/ /nas bre bzhi ni btsos

pa yis/ /chu bre bcu drug til btags bsres/ /gdugs dang gos dang byug pa sbyin/ /seng ldeng srang ni nyi shu dang / /tsha ba gsum dang 'bras bu gsum/ /shing kun shu dag shu ti dang / /nyungs kar nim pa'i lo mar bcas/ /sgog skya srang ni phyed phyed

dang / /zhun mar phul ni bdun dag dang / /ba gcin sum 'gyur bskol ba de/ /btung dang snar blugs bskus na phan/ /srin po'i gdon la til phye dang / /me tog dkar po 'bras chan bsres/ /sha btsos rjen pa nim pa la/ /khrag dang bcas pa'i

gtor ma sbyin/ /nag ta ma la shri sha yi/ /shun lpags me tog 'bras bu dang / /de bzhin pa ta la nag po/ /bil ba'i rtsa ba tsha ba gsum/ /shing kun nyungs kar dug mo nyung / /sgog skya skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu/ /ra gcin dang ni sbyar ba'i sman/ /

snar blugs mig tu byugs na'ang phan/ /'di dag nyid dang mar gyis ni/ /bzhi 'gyur ba gcin bskol ba ni/ /btung dang snar blugs bskus pa yis/ /srin po'i gdon ni zlog par byed/ /sha za la ni bu ram chang / /til tshig til gyi phye ma

zho/ /la phug lan tshwa phye zan mar/ /'byung po 'bras chan gtor ma sbyin/ /ser po rnam gnyis rgyam tsha btsod/ /shu ti dong gra pri yang ku/ /shing kun sgog skya tsha ba gsum/ /'bras bu gsum dang pa ta li/ /shu dag gi ri kar+Ni dkar/ /shi ri
