sha yi me tog dmar/ /ba gcin bzhi cha bcas par bskol/ /btung dang bsku ba byas na phan/ /yang na de nyid ra gcin btags/ /mig bskus snar ni blugs pa phan/ /lha dang drang srong mtshun lha dang / /dri za'i gdon la sna sman stsogs/ /rnon

po btang bar mi bya zhing / /'di la zhun mar btung la sogs/ /sman ni 'jam po spyad par bya/ /sha za ma gtogs thams cad la/ /mi mthun sbyin par mi bya ste/ /mthu stobs che ba de khros nas/ /nad pa sman pa bcas gsod byed/ /'phags

pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug /mgon po phyag ni bcu gnyis pa/ /nad kun gso bar mdzad pa yi/ /sngags bzlas na ni nad kun sel/ /de bzhin smyo byed brjed byed dang / /gzhan yang sems 'khrul byed pa 'joms/ /rig sngags

rgyal mo rma bya che/ /gtsang byas de la rtag tu bsgrags/ /'byung po'i bdag po lha chen dang / /de yi 'khor gyi tshogs mchod cing / /de yi sngags grub bzlas na yang / /gdon ni thams cad sel bar byed/ /gang yang 'og nas bshad pa yi/ /

le'u gnyis las smos pa dang / /gang 'dir bshad pa de dag kun/ /phan tshun sbyor ba byas na phan/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// //de nas smyo byed gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /

smyo byed nad gzhi re re dang / /'dus stsogs dug las gyur pa drug /smyo byed ces bya lus dang ni/ /sems kyi nad lam log pa ru/ /zhugs pas smyos par gyur pa yin/ /bza' btung gnod pa dag dang ni/ /snying dang ma goms dri mar bcas/ /

mang nyung ma snyoms bsten pa dang / /yid zhum snying stobs chung ba dang / /nad kyi shugs kyis dkrugs pa dang / /rid cing spyod pa ma snyoms dang / /mchod 'os mchod par mi byed dang / /sems las kyis ni sems nyams dang / /dug dang nye ba'i dug las gyur/ /'di yis

snying stobs zhan pa yi/ /snying gi nad la gnod byas te/ /blo ni dri ma can byas te/ /yid rgyu ba yi lam bkag nas/ /smyo byed dag ni skyed par byed/ /de yis blo dang rnam shes dang / /dran pa 'khrul zhing lus kyi ni/ /bde dang sdug bsngal las nyams te/ /shing rta

kha lo sgyur ba ni/ /med pa lta bur rtsom pa ni/ /kun kyang bsam pa med par spyod/ /de la rlung gyur lus sbeg cing / /rgyu med ngu zhing tshig rtsub smra/ /dgod dang 'dzum dang gar byed dang / /glu len rol mo byed pa dang / /lus bskyod pheg ni rdob pa dang / /gling bu

pi wang la sogs kyi/ /sgra yi lad mo yang yang zlos/ /rgyun du kha nas lbu ba 'dzag /phan tshun rgyug cing mang du smra/ /rgyan min pas ni rgyan du byed/ /bzhon pa min pas 'gro ba rtsom/ /kha zas la ni gdu bar byed/ /de rnyed na ni mi 'dod byed/ /mig zlum mig ni

dmar ba dang / /kha zas zhu nas nad ldang 'gyur/ /mkhris las spyo zhing khro ba dang / /khu tshur bong ba rdeg cing rgyug /grib ma chu ni grang mo 'dod/ /gcer bur 'dug cing lus mdog ser/ /med par me ni 'bar ba dang / /skar ma mar me mthong ba'o/ /bad kan slon

zhing yi ga 'chus/ /kha zas rtsol dang smra ba nyung / /bud med 'dod cing dben la dga'/ /kha chu snabs ni 'dzag pa dang / /'jigs rung gtsang sbra la mi dga'/ /gnyid che gdong ni skrangs pa dang / /nub mo shes cher smyo ba dang / /zos ma thag tu ldang ba yin/ /

'dus pa'i rgyu dang mtshan ma ni/ /kun ldan de yi bdag nyid can/ /smyo byed mi bzad par shes bya/ /de ni sman pas yongs su spang / /nor dang chung ma la sogs bral/ /brnag dka' ba las sems gdung bas/ /smyo zhing zhum la yang yang brgyal/ /

kyi hud kyi hud smre sngags 'don/ /glo bur du ni ngu zhing brgyal/ /de yi yon tan mang du sems/ /mya ngan gyis gdungs sems khong chud/ /gnyid yar rnam par 'khyams pa yin/ /dug gis gdong ni sngo ba dang / /gzi nyams dbang po stobs chung ba/ /

shugs kyi bar du'ang 'khrul bar byed/ /mig dmar de ni spang bar bya/ /de nas rlung gyur smyo byed la/ /dang po snum gyi btung ba blud/ /lam 'gags gyur la dang por ni/ /snum bcas sbyang ba 'jam po bya/ /bad kan mkhris gyur dang po ni/ /snum dang

dugs bya skyug sman dang / /bkru sman mas gtong byas pa dang / /mgo bo'i bkru sman dag kyang bya/ /de ltar lus ni dag byas na/ /yid ni dran pa rnyed par 'gyur/ /de lta na yang rjes 'brangs na/ /sna sman mig sman rnon po gtang / /sems dga'

dbugs 'byung skrag pa dang / /'jigs dang rdeg dang sdigs mo byed/ /lus dris byugs dang bsku ba dang / /dud rngub sman mar blud pa dag /sbyar te de ni dga' 'gyur na/ /yid ni tha mal pa la sbyar/ /shing kun dang ni rtsab ru tsha/ /tsha ba gsum ni srang

gnyis gnyis/ /mar bre bzhi ni ba gcin bcas/ /bskol bas smyo byed 'byung po dang / /brjed byed gdon ni sel mchog yin/ /bram+hi'i bskol khu bre do dang / /mar bre gang dang tsha ba gsum/ /sh+ya ma dur byid bim pa dang / /shang ka puSh+pa dong ga dang / /sap+ta la

dang byi dang ga /zho ni gnyis gnyis lde gu bskol/ /pram+ti'i sman mar zhes bshad de/ /mar ni srang res bskyed de btang / /che tshad srang bzhi'i mar pos na/ /smyo byed brjed byed mdze yi nad/ /sel zhing mo gsham bu skyed byed/ /skad snyan tshig gsal dran pa dang / /

yid gzhungs dpal ni skyed par byed/ /'bras bu gsum dang byi dang ga /pa tra e la thang shing dang / /e la ba lu ka dang ni/ /thal tres rnam gnyis ser po gnyis/ /s+thi ra rnam gnyis pri yang ku/ /rgya spos ru rta bri ha ti/ /nA

ga ge sar dong ga btsod/ /se'u 'bru bal bu'i lo ma dang / /dzA ti kha 'bus byi dang ga/ /dan da shu dag ut+pa la/ /tsan+dan dkar po zho gnyis ni/ /zhun mar bre gang bcas bskol ba/ /dge ba'i sman mar zhes bshad 'dis/ /'byung po'i gdon dang

smyo byed dang / /brjed byed lud pa sdig can 'joms/ /skya rbab g.yan pa skem dang dug /rmongs bag gcin snyi dbyig dug rims/ /khu ba med pa'am bu med pa'am/ /dran pa gdon gyis brlabs pa dang / /yid gzhungs med cing tshig 'khrul dang / /dran

nyams me drod chung la phan/ /stobs skyed bkra shis tshe ring zhing / /mdangs skye skal ldan lus rgyas che/ /bu skyed byed pa'i mchog yin no/ /'di la thal tres rnam gnyis sogs/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig chu dang bskol/ /de yi khu ba mar dang ba/ /lan cig

skyes 'o bzhi 'gyur dang / /med rnam gnyis ra mnye ba/ /bung tshang rdo dang kha sral phre'u/ /bu ram shing dang par+Ni gnyis/ /bskol ba yi ni sman mar 'di/ /dge ba chen po zhes bya ste/ /brtas byed 'dus pa'i nad 'joms shing / /snga ma bas kyang yon tan lhag /

spang spos bu ta ke shi dang / /chu rtsa shu dag kha sral pre'u/ /kyi lce ba dang ram nye ba/ /tsa rong dza ya pu tse shel/ /sle tres tsa tra pa ra ha/ /a ti tsa ta sa ta la/ /ma hA pu ru sha dan dang / /na gu li gnyis skyu ru ra/ /bri ka la ka dam pa/ /sA la par+Ni bcas

bskol mar/ /sha za chen po'i mar zhes bya/ /des ni nyin bzhi pa'i rims dang / /smyo byed brjed byed gdon 'joms shing / /blo dang yid gzhungs dran pa skyed/ /byis pa rnams kyi lus 'phel byed/ /bdud rtsi dang ni 'dra ba yin/ /bram+hi in+d+ra byi dang ka /shing kun

spang sbos mur ba dang / /ra sna sgog skya bong nga dkar/ /shu dag bye'u rug bi sha la/ /nA ga dan ti byi tsher ba/ /dzo ti sma ti tsha ba gsum/ /a ru ra dang sa nag rnams/ /glang po'i gcin btags ri lur byas/ /grib bskams snar blugs mig bsku zhing / /

lus bskus spos bdugs smyo byed sel/ /nyungs kar dang ni sbyar ba yi/ /sna sman rnam pa sna tshogs phan/ /nyungs mar gyis ni lus bsku dang / /nyungs kar phye ma snar bud bya/ /mdo gnas bstan pa'i cho ga bzhin/ /dung rnon shing kun bcas pa phan/ /

wa dang reg 'jam 'ug pa dang / /byi ba ra thug dza ti ka'i/ /gcin dang rtug pa spu dang ni/ /pags pa mkhris pa sen mo dang / /spos bdugs mig sman lus bsku dang / /byugs dang blugs pa bshad par bya/ /bad kan rlung gyur la phal cher/ /

khyi dang ba lang nya sha ni/ /rul ba'i bdug pas bdug par bya/ /mkhris gyur la ni tig ta'i mar/ /'tsho byed snum ni gnyis kyi mar/ /bza' dang btung ba bsil ba dang / /mngar ba dang ni yang ba bsngags/ /ji skad bshad pa'i gtar ga gdab/ /

yang na sha tshon gyis 'grangs bya/ /de 'og rlung med gnas bsnyal nas/ /sems myos pa las thar bar 'gyur/ /khron pa'i chu ni nyung bar gzhug /ltogs pa nyid du byas te bskams/ /de la chos dang nor ldan pa'i/ /gtam snyan mdza' bos sems

dga' bya/ /yang na sdug dang bral ba'am/ /rmad du byung ba bstan pa'am/ /bcings la yungs mar gyis bskus te/ /nyi tshan la ni gan rkyal gzhag /kha sral phre'u'am lcags tsha'am/ /til mar chu tshan gyis reg bya/ /yang na lcag gis

gzhus nas ni/ /bcings te g.yang sar skyur bar bya/ /yang na rdo dang mtshon med pa'i/ /mun khang mi ni med par gzhug /mche ba ston pa'i sbrul dang ni/ /glang dang seng ge glang po ches/ /de ni skrag tu gzhug pa'am/ /yang na rgyal po'i skyes bu

yis/ /dam du bcings te phyir phyung nas/ /rgyal po'i bka' yis bsdigs pa dang / /'di bsad bya zhes skrag tu gzhug /lus kyi sdug bsngal 'jigs pa bas/ /srog gi 'jigs par rab 'jigs pas/ /de phyir kun tu 'khrul

pa'i yid/ /nye bar zhi ba nyid du 'gyur/ /grub pa'i sbyor ba 'di dag ni/ /nad dmigs dus sogs ltos te bya/ /sdug dang nor dang bral ba las/ /gang gi yid la gnod gyur pa/ /de la de 'dra rnyed gyur pa'i/ /spro bsring dbugs dbyung ba yis gso/ /

'dod dang mya ngan 'jigs pa dang / /khro dang 'jigs pa chang las gyur/ /gnyis dag gis ni gcig la gcig /de dag nyid kyis zhi bar bya/ /bshad pa'i mtshan ma las lhag pa/ /gdon dang rjes 'brel yin zhes bya/ /gal te smyo byed gdon

las gyur/ /gdon gsor bshad pa'i sman sbyar bya/ /til btags phye ma nas dang zan/ /snum zhing mngar ba'i kha zas dang / /'bras ni khrag tu sbrus pa dang / /sha ni btses pa rjen pa dang / /'bru chang sbyar chang mnan pa'i chang / /a ti mug+ti'i me tog

dang / /dzA ti sa ha ra dza yi/ /me tog bcas pa'i gtor ma ni/ /lam gyi bzhi mdo ba lang lhas/ /chu bo 'dus pa dag tu sbyin/ /gang zhig sha dang chang spangs shing / /phan la brtson zhing gtsang sbra che/ /snying stobs can la lhan cig skyes/ /glo

bur smyo byed 'byung mi 'gyur/ /dbang po'i don ni gsal ba dang / /de bzhin blo dang yid gsal ba/ /lus zungs tha mal par gnas pa/ /smyo byed dang bral mtshan ma yin/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u ste

drug pa'o// //de nas brjed byed gso ba bshad par bya'o/ /brjed byed dran pa nyams pa ste/ /de ni snying stobs blo 'khrul dang / /sems las mya ngan 'jigs sogs kyis/ /gnod gyur sems las byung ba yin/ /lus sems gtogs pa'i nad kyis ni/ /

smyo byed bzhin du 'khrug 'gyur bas/ /snying stobs nyams zhing snying dang ni/ /'du shes rgyu ba'i rtsa sbubs khyab/ /mun par zhugs snyam sems shing rmongs/ /'jigs su rung ba'i bya ba byed/ /so 'cha' lbu ba skyug pa dang / /lag pa rkang pa g.yob pa dang / /gzugs

med par yang mthong ba dang / /'khrul zhing sa la 'gyel ba dang / /smin ma mi g.yo nad shugs dang / /bral nas sad par gyur pa dang / /de ni dus gzhan dag tu yang / /de bzhin du ni spyod pa yin/ /rlung la sogs dang 'dus pa yi/ /dbye bas brjed byed rnam

pa bzhi/ /de ni skye bar gyur pa'i tshul/ /snying 'dar khong stong mgo 'khor la/ /mun par mthong zhing sems khong chud/ /smin ma mi sdug mig 'gyur dang / /sgra mi thos shing rngul 'byung la/ /kha chu snabs ni 'dzag pa dang / /mi 'ju yi ga 'chus shing brgyal/ /

lto sbos nyams stobs zad pa dang / /gnyid med skom zhing yan lag na/ /rmi lam glu len gar byed dang / /til mar chang ni 'thung ba dang / /de nyid gcin du 'byung ba rmi/ /de la rlung gyur brla 'gul zhing / /yang dang yang du 'gyel ba dang / /yang dang yang du dran pa

stor/ /'du shes rnyed nas mi gsal du/ /mig 'bur yang yang dbugs 'byin zhing / /lbu bar skyug cing 'dar ba dang / /so 'cha' mgo ni rdebs pa dang / /rlung gis gre ba rgyas par byed/ /yan lag kun du rdebs pa dang / /sor mo mi snyoms 'gugs pa

dang / /mig dang pags pa sen mo ni/ /gnag cing rtsub mor snang ba dang / /gzugs ni mi brtan rtsub pa dang / /mi sdug bzhin ras ngan pa yin/ /mkhris pa las gyur brjed byed ni/ /dran pa yang yang nyams pa dang / /mig mdog pags pa lbu ba ser/ /

sa la rdeg par byed pa dang / /'jigs rung 'bar zhing khro ba yi/ /gzugs mthong skom dad che ba yin/ /bad kan las gyur ring nas 'dzin/ /yung ring nyid nas sad par byed/ /g.yo 'gul nyung zhing kha chu mang / /kha mig pags pa sen mo dkar/ /gzugs

rnams dkar por mthong ba yin/ /mtshan nyid kun dang ldan pa spang / /de nas blo sems dran pa dang / /snying ga'i sbubs ni sad byed pa'i/ /slon sman la sogs las rnams ni/ /rnon po yis ni sbyang bar bya/ /rlung gyur 'jam rtsi mang du bya/ /

mkhris gyur phal cher bkru sman gtang / /bad kan phal cher skyug sman ni/ /btang bas brjed byed gso bar bya/ /rnam pa kun tu legs dag cing / /legs par spro ni bsring ba la/ /brjed byed las ni thar bya'i phyir/ /zhi bar bya ba'i sbyor bar nyon/ /

ba lci khu ba 'o ma dang / /zho dang gcin dang mar bskol ba/ /brjed byed rims dang smyo byed dang / /mig ser sel bar byed pa blud/ /rtsa ba bcu pa 'bras bu gsum/ /dug mo nyung shun ser po gnyis/ /a pa marga lo ma bdun/ /ni li ni dang pu tse shel/ /dong ga puSh+kar

mU la dang / /phal gu'i rtsa ba byi tsher srang / /gnyis gnyis chu bre bcu drug nang / /bskol ba la ni bzhi cha lus/ /ga bra'i rtsa ba du ba ri/ /pa ta dan da dur byid dang / /tsha ba gsum dang ro hi She/ /mur ba rtsa mkhris bu di kha/ /ha ti pi pi ling dang ni/ /ma du yan te thal

tres gnyis/ /lcang ma dang ni tsi tra ka /zho ni gnyis gnyis mar bre gang / /de bzhin snga ma'i gsher rdzas bskol/ /'di ni ba yi rnam lnga che/ /brjed byed rims dang dmu rdzing dang / /mtshan par rdol ba sel mchog yin/ /'or nad gzhang 'brum mig ser dang / /skya rbab skran dang lud

pa dang / /gdon rnams 'joms par byed pa yin/ /bram+hi shu dag ru rta dang / /shang ka puSh+pa mar rnying bcas/ /bskol ba'i mar ni yid gzhungs byed/ /smyo byed bkra mi shis pa dang / /brjed byed sdig pa 'joms par byed/ /'tsho byed sde tshan srang re dang / /til mar zhun

mar bre re bsres/ /'o ma bre ni bcu drug bskol/ /'thungs na brjed byed las thar byed/ /'o ma bu ram shing khu ba/ /bre bzhi dang ni tang pal gyi/ /khu ba brgyad 'gyur dag dang ni/ /'tsho byed sde tshan zho gnyis gnyis/ /zhun mar bre gang bcas bskol blud/ /des

ni rlung mkhris las gyur pa'i/ /brjed byed myur du sel bar byed/ /de bzhin 'jag ma'i bid ri/ /ku sha bu ram shing 'o ma/ /bskol ba 'thungs pa'ang de dang 'dra/ /ku sman ta yi khu ba mar/ /bco brgyad 'gyur dang shing mngar gyi/ /lde gur bcas pa

bskol bas ni/ /brjed byed sel bar byed pa dang / /blo dang tshig gsal skad snyan byed/ /ba ni ser skya'i mkhris pa yi/ /sna sman btang yang mchog tu phan/ /khyi dang wa dang byi la dang / /seng ge sogs kyi mkhris pa bsngags/ /go da sre mo glang po

che/ /ba lang dred dang pri sha ta'i/ /mkhris pa til mar bskol ba dag /lus bsku snar ni blugs na'ang phan/ /'bras bu gsum dang tsha ba gsum/ /nas tshig 'khus thal ko nyon tshe/ /pha ni dza ka sra rtsi pog /a pa marga ka rany+dza'i/ /sa bon til mar ra

gcin dang / /bcas pa bskol ba snar blugs pa'am/ /phye ma sna nas bus pa'ang phan/ /sre mo 'ug pa spre'u dang / /bya rgod khyi rta bya rog sbrul/ /chu dang sgro dang rtug pa yi/ /dud pas 'di la bdug par bya/ /til mar sgog skya bcas pa'am/ /

'o ma nye'u shing bsten yang phan/ /bram+hi 'am ru rta'i khu ba'am/ /shu dag sbrang rtsir ldan pa'ang phan/ /nad gzhi mnyam du 'khrugs pa las/ /lus dang sems la brten 'gyur nad/ /skyes par gyur pa gang yin de/ /brjed byed gnad ni chen por

gnas/ /de bas gso dka' 'di la ni/ /bcud kyis len gyis gso bar bya/ /des nyen me dang chu la sogs/ /ya nga ba las rtag tu bsrung / /thar pa na ni yid 'khrul bas/ /khyed kyis 'di ltar byas so zhes/ /mi brjod yul ni

yid 'ong bas/ /nyams pa'i sems ni brta bar bya/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u ste bdun pa'o// //yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ 'byung po'i gdon gso ba'i yan lag rdzogs so// //

de nas mig mchu'i nad dmigs shes par bya ba bshad par bya'o/ /nad kun nad gzhi las bshad pa'i/ /gnod pas nad ni 'khrugs pa dang / /mchog tu mig la gnod pa dang / /phal cher mkhris pa skyed pa yis/ /rtsa las gyen du rgyus nas ni/ /

mig gi yan lag mig mchu grwa/ /dkar nag mthong byed rgyal mo'am/ /mig kun la gnas nad skyed byed/ /de la rlung ni mig mchu yi/ /rtsa la zhugs par gyur pa dag /nyal nas ldang tshe mig mchu ni/ /har bag na dang bcas par byed/ /mig ni rdul gyis

gang snyam sems/ /'dzums par dka' zhing mchi ma 'dzag /mnyes na bde ba snyam du byed/ /de ni 'dzums dka' yin zhes bshad/ /rlung gis mig mchu bskyod nas ni/ /yang dang yang du 'byed cing 'dzums/ /'di ni 'dzums pa zhes bshad do/ /gra mtshams

lhod cing tshor ba med/ /rtag tu 'dzums shing mig nyams pa/ /gang yin de ni rlung gnod yin/ /mkhris pas mig mchu'i mtha' mar ni/ /'brum bu ku mu ta yi ni/ /sa bon 'dra slar gang gyur pa/ /'brum phran ku mu ta zhes bya/ /tsha zhing 'drul la nad dang bcas/ /

dmar zhing reg na mi bzod pa/ /mkhris pas mig mchur skyes pa de/ /mkhris pas skyes pa yin zhes bshad/ /mkhris pa rdzi ma'i nang gnas shing / /g.ya' zhing tsha bar byed pa dang / /de rjes rdzi ma 'byi ba ste/ /rdzi ma 'byi ba zhes bshad do/ /bad kan las gyur mig

mchu'i nad/ /'brum phran dkar po yungs kar 'dra/ /mthug skrangs g.ya' na mig rdul khebs/ /spyi bag can 'dzag po dag kyang / /har bag 'drul ba rdu mas khebs/ /bad kan gyis bslangs mig mchu'i nad/ /bad kan las gyur rmen bu dkar/ /na zhing smin ma med

g.ya' sra/ /rgya shug tsam mam de las ni/ /cung zad chung ba chags pa yin/ /khrag las 'brum phran dmar ba dang / /de mtshungs 'brum phran gyis khyab pa/ /brtsegs pa zhes bya des skyed dmar/ /reg mi bzod pa mig mchu slongs/ /mig mchu'i nang du sha lhag

ni/ /sra zhing snum la tsha zhing na/ /mdog dmar de ni khrag 'dzag cing / /bcad bzhin 'phel byed mig 'brum yin/ /mig mchu'i mtha' 'am dbus su ni/ /g.ya' zhing tshal na bcas brtan/ /mung+ga tsam gyi khrag 'brum dmar/ /'brum phran mig nad ces bya'o/ /

nad kyis mig mchu'i phyi rol skrangs/ /nang du bu ga phra mos khyab/ /'dzag bcas nang na chu yod de/ /pad+ma'i rtsa 'dra pad rtsa yin/ /nad gzhi gsum dang khrag 'khrugs pas/ /mig mchu'i nad ni ldang ba dang / /rgyu med par ni gnyid 'gyur gang / /de ni mig mchu

'khrugs zhes bya/ /nad kyis mig mchu dri ma khrag /skrangs rnags na bcas mig mchu sngo/ /g.ya' zhing skrangs la dmar ba dang / /mig mchu 'byar ba 'byar zhes bya/ /mig mchu'i nad ni sra zhing rtsub/ /'brum phran bye ma 'dra zhes bya/ /gnag cing 'dam 'dra

'dam bu'o/ /mdog 'dra sha ni mang pos rgyas/ /na shas che ba zhes bya'o/ /byis pa so skyes tshe na 'byung / /des ni byis pa'i mig skrang zhing / /mig dmar lta bar mi nus la/ /mig mchu gzer zhing spyi bag 'dzag /rna ba sna dang mig nyed byed/ /gang yin de ni sgra ngan

yin/ /rdzi 'gags rdzi ma 'dus shing zhum/ /mig mchu'ang de 'drar gyur pa dang / /rtsub cing nang du kha bltas la/ /spu gzhan yang ni tsher ma ltar/ /rtse mo rnon po skyes gyur cing / /des bdar mig ni skrangs pa dang / /tsha zhing rlung la sogs mi bzod/ /bton na cung

zad bde bar byed/ /mig phugs grwa mtshams phyi rol du/ /thor bu sra zhing mtho ba dang / /dmar zhing mchi ma rnag khrag 'dzag /yang yang rgyas pa slon pa yin/ /nad gzhi gsum dang khrag las ni/ /mig mchu'i nang na sha'i dum bu/ /rmen bu sra la nad med la/ /

phyi rol mi mnyam g.yo mdzer pa/ /de ltar nyi shu rtsa bzhi po/ /mig mchu la gnas nad yin no/ /de la dang por sman gyis gso/ /de 'og gnyis dang 'brum bu spang / /rdzi ma 'gags pa gsor rung tsam/ /lhag ma mtshon gyis gso bar bya/ /de dag las kyang rdzi

ma 'phyi/ /gtsags par bya la mig mdzer gcad/ /chags dang pad rtsa ku mu ta/ /brtsegs dang 'brum phran slon pa 'dral/ /mig mchu'i sha sngo bye ma 'dra/ /'byar dang bskyed bya zhes pa bzhi/ /'dam chas shas cher byas pa dang / /sgra ngan

bcas pa mtshon gyis bzhar/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u brgyad pa'o// //de nas mig mchu'i nad gso ba bshad par bya'o/ /'dzums pa dka' la mar rnying ni/ /rgun 'bru'i lde gu chur bskol bar/ /kha ra btab

dang sna sman dang / /dud pa mig sman snum can gtang / /ku mu ta la zhal zhal btab/ /de steng rgyam tsha gdab par bya/ /shing mngar dang ni skyu ru ra/ /pa to la bskol chu blugs bya/ /rlung med gnas la g.yog mkhas kyis/ /sbyang byas gan rkyal nyal ba la/ /

mig mchu bzlog ste dro 'jam chur/ /bsros pa'i gos kyis dugs byas la/ /gos kyis legs par dkris nas ni/ /g.yon pa'i mtheb mdzub kyis bzung zhing / /'gul zhing 'gyur ba med par ni/ /de nas mig mchu kun tu ni/ /dkyil 'khor lta bu'i mtshon gyis

ni/ /'phred du gdab cing mtshan ma byas/ /de nyid kyis sam lo rtsub bam/ /she pa li yi lo ma'am/ /yang na rgya mtsho'i lbu bas brud/ /khrag ni ras bal ye'us phyi/ /khrag bcas legs par brud shes nas/ /rang rang sman ni sbrang rtsi dang / /bcas pa

de la bsku bar bya/ /de 'og chu dron gyis bkrus la/ /mar gyis blugs par bya ba dang / /rna ba'i steng dang 'og gi bar/ /nas kyi zan dang sbrang rtsi dang / /mar dang bcas pas dkri bar bya/ /zhag ni gnyis pa la dgrol te/ /ji lta bar ni sman blugs shing / /bzhi

par sna sman la sogs bya/ /zhag ni lnga pa dag la dgrol/ /mnyam zhing sen mo ltar dmar la/ /skrangs g.ya' drud sogs nad med pa/ /mig mchu sbyar legs yin zhes bya/ /de las bzlog pa slar bzhar bya/ /bzhar drags pas ni na ba dang / /rdzi ma 'byi zhing mig

mchu 'gyur/ /de la snum dang dugs la sogs/ /rlung la phan pa'i sbyor ba bsngags/ /mar sar gyis ni bsku bya zhing / /seng phrom dkar po mar sar gyis/ /legs par bsku ba byas nas ni/ /e raN+Da yi rtsa ba yi/ /lde gus byugs te phur mas btso/ /tshos

pa bkrus te bskams nas ni/ /btags pa thum po byas nas ni/ /ra 'am bud med 'o mar ni/ /mnyes pa mig tu blugs par bya/ /de nyid sA lu thug po che'i/ /lde gu bskus te de ltar byas/ /zho dang zho ga chus spangs pa/ /mig ni bzhar drags gyur la blugs/ /

yang na zho ga chu nyi tshe/ /blugs shing skam sa'i sha khu sbyin/ /'brum phran sra zhing mtho ba ni/ /'bras kyi rtse mos brtol bar bya/ /de rjes btsir te cho ga ni/ /lhag ma snga ma bzhin du bya/ /zhal zhal gdab dang 'dral ba la/ /rim 'dis mig mchu'i nad kun sbyar/ /

khrag mkhris las gyur mngar ba yi/ /sde tshan dang bskol mar gyis gso/ /snum gyur nas ni gtar ga gdab/ /dur byid bkru sman btang ba mchog /bzhar zhing khrag ni phyung nas kyang / /shing mngar bskol ba'i chus bkru zhing / /tsan+dan dkar po 'o mar bskol/ /

mig mchu la ni blugs pa phan/ /rdzi ma 'byi la khab kyis ni/ /ba spu'i bu ga gtsags pa'am/ /srin bu pad pas khrag dbyung ngo / /yang na 'o ma'am bu ram shing / /khu bas slon bya mngar bsil sman/ /bskol ba'i mar ni gtang bar bya/ /nag tshur dkar po'i phye

ma ni/ /bye'u rug pa'i khu bar bsres/ /zangs kyi snod du bcug pa ste/ /rdzi ma 'byi ba'i mig sman mchog /mig mchu'i sha brud bca' sga dang / /rgyam tsha'i phye ma gdab par bya/ /chu dron gyis bkrus seng ldeng dang / /na le sham dkar tu pa ri/ /chu bskol ba'am ser po

gnyis/ /shing mngar dang ni 'bras bu gsum/ /khu ba sbrang rtsir bcas pa blugs/ /bad kan las gyur zhal zhal byas/ /nag tshur rgyam tsha pi pi ling / /ldong ros stang zil zhib btags la/ /sbrang rtsir bcas pa bsku bar bya/ /skyug sman mig sman sna sman ni/ /bad

kan sel ba thams cad phan/ /chags pa la yang 'di dag bya/ /ma zhi me btsa' gdab par bya/ /sgra ngan la ni seng ldeng dang / /nim pa'i lo ma 'bras bu gsum/ /mar dang sbyar ba'am pi pi ling / /shing mngar rgyam tsha bskol ba ni/ /ma mas

blud de slon du gzhug /rgun 'brum dang ni a ru ra/ /pi pi ling bskol ba kru sman sbyin/ /ser po rnam gnyis pi pi ling / /gla sgang lde gus nu ma bsku/ /nyungs kar mar bcas dud pas bdug /sbyang ba byas nas pa to la/ /gla sgang dang ni rgun 'brum dang / /sle tres

'bras bu gsum bskol blud/ /byis pa'i mig mchu brud pa'am/ /srin bu pad pas khrag dbyung bya/ /a sman ta ka skyu ru ra/ /'dzam bu'i lo ma bskol ba blugs/ /byis pa 'o ma mar bsten pas/ /phal cher bad kan nad 'byung bas/ /de bas dang por skyug sman nyid/ /

nad kun la ni bsngags pa yin/ /lce myang tsha dang pi pi ling / /a pa marga'i 'bras bu mar/ /'o ma shu dag sbrang rtsir bcas/ /po son cha ni shing mngar bcas/ /'o ma kha zas 'o ma dang / /zas la brten pa'i byis pa la/ /rim bzhin blud pas nad kun ni/ /sbyang par bya phyir

slon sman gtang / /mchog tu sgra ngan nad la phan/ /sap+ta la yi khu ba mar/ /bskol ba gnyis ka sbyong byed sbyin/ /seng phrom shing mngar ser po gnyis/ /nim pa'i lo ma pu tse shel/ /zangs kyi phye mar bcas reng bu/ /sgra ngan gyi ni nad la phan/ /yang na lcags kyi

phye ma bsregs/ /'o ma sbrang rtsi mar bcas phan/ /sug smel sgog skya ka ta ka /pha ni dza ka na le sham/ /dung bcas chu dang bdar ba dang / /kad pha la bcas ri lu'ang phan/ /rdzi ma'i 'gags nad 'phel ba la/ /sbyang ba byas par gyur pa ni/ /smin ma'i 'og gi cha gnyis dang / /

rdzi ma'i cha gcig bar bar ni/ /nas kyi tshad tsam nas kyi dbyibs/ /'phred du dbral la ras rlon pas/ /de yi khrag ni bsal nas ni/ /khrag ni chung bar gyur pa dang / /bar mtshams mung+ga tsam bzhag la/ /khab ni yon pos btsem par bya/ /dpral ba ras kyis bcings nas

ni/ /de bzhin skud pas btsem par bya/ /shin tu dam dang lhod min par/ /der ni legs par btsem par bya/ /de nas sbrang rtsi'i mar gyis byug /'di la bcing bar mi bya'o/ /na na n+ya gro d+ha sogs pa'i/ /khu ba 'o mar bcas pa blugs/ /zhag lnga pa la skud pa ni/ /

bsal te yug snam phye ma ni/ /rma la legs par gdab par bya/ /sna sman mig sman rnon po gtang / /zhag bcu'i mthar yang ma sos na/ /mig mchur brten gnyer bzlog ste bsreg /rdzi ma'i lhag ma tsher zungs kyis/ /phyung la de yi gnas dag ni/ /me yi mdog 'dra'i

khab rtses bsreg /phyi rol rlon pa bsregs pa dang / /thor bu bcad par gyur pa la/ /me 'am thal sman rnon pos bsreg /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u dgu pa'o// //de nas mig zur dang mig gi 'bras bu dkar nag gi

nad kyi dmigs brtag pa bshad par bya'o/ /rlung 'khrugs pas ni chu rgyu ba'i/ /rtsar song nas ni chu 'dra ba'i/ /mchi ma mig mchu mig phugs kyi/ /mtshams nas mchi ma 'dzag par 'gyur/ /des ni nad med rtsa dmar la/ /skrangs 'gyur de ni chu 'dzag yin/ /bad kan las gyur

spyi bag mang / /dkar ba bad kan 'dzag pa yin/ /bad kan gyis skrangs rtse mo rno/ /lan tshwa'i chu bur 'dra ba 'byung / /rtsa ba che zhing g.yo la snum/ /mdog 'dra 'jam zhing spyi bag can/ /che zhing smin dka' g.ya' dang bcas/ /gzer med bcings pa lta bu yin/ /khrag

las mchi ma khrag 'dzag dmar/ /shas cher dro ba khrag 'dzag yin/ /mig mchu gra mtshams dkar po ru/ /'brum phran tsha zhing gzer dang bcas/ /dmar zhing mung+ga 'dra lags/ /khrag 'dzag de ni tshigs can yin/ /rnag 'dzag dri ma khrag dang bcas/ /mig phugs kyi

ni gra mtshams nas/ /yang dang yang du rnag 'dzag cing / /sha lpags 'drul bas mchi mar bcas/ /rnag sla 'dzag pa rma phra zhing / /skrangs shing g.yo ba che ba dang / /mig phugs mtshams skrangs rnag 'dzag cing / /nad bcas rnag gi chu ser 'dzag /mig phugs kyi

ni mtshams nang na/ /skrangs zug tsha bcas chu ser nad/ /mig zur ram ni mig phugs su/ /g.ya' zhing rdzi ma'i bu ga nas/ /rnag 'dzag srin dang rmen bu 'byung / /na bcas srin gyi rmen bu can/ /bcings pa lta bu'i srin rmen bu/ /rnag gi chu

ser tshigs can dag /mtshon gyis gso bya lhag ma lnga/ /'dzag pa chu ser bcas pa spangs/ /mkhris pas dkar po'i thig le ni/ /nag pa'am sngo ba'am ser po skyed/ /gur gum me long dri mas gos/ /ltar snang na dang tsha ba med/ /'khru zhing skom dad rims dang bcas/ /

nad gzhi nya phyis can zhes bya/ /bad kan las dkar sha lhag dkar/ /ring nas 'phel ba mig mdzer dkar/ /nad med pa la skrangs pa dang / /mdog dkar lhun chen 'jam pa dang / /lci snum chu yi thigs pa 'dra/ /bad kan mdud pa zhes byar bshad/ /thig le

'bras phye ltar dkar ba/ /mtho ba 'bras phye 'dra zhes bshad/ /dkar po'i ri mo dmar pos khyab/ /tsha zhing na dang bcas pa dang / /skrangs shing mchi mas gos pa med/ /khrag gyur rtsa yi nges par bshad/ /rtsa'i nyes yal bar bor na ni/ /dmar ris de nyid 'phel bar

'gyur/ /khrag bcas rtsa ni brtse bar byed/ /de yis mig gis blta mi nus/ /rtsa yi dra bas g.yogs shing stug /mtho ba rtsa yi dra ba yin/ /khrag gis mig mdzer 'jam zhing mnyam/ /pad+ma 'dra ba sha lhag yin/ /nad med ri bong khrag ltar dmar/ /thig le ling

thog dmar po yin/ /'jam shing nad med myur du 'phel/ /dkar por khyab byed dmar nag ni/ /khyab pa'i mdzer pa zhes bya'o/ /dri ma khrag bcas rtsa'i mdzer pa/ /rtsa rgyus dang 'dra rtsa mdzer yin/ /khrag skam gong bu ltar gnag cing / /sha ni che zhing rgyas pa gang / /de ni

sha lhag mdzer pa yin/ /tsha zhing reg na rtsub pa dang / /rtsas g.yogs mig 'bras nag dang nye/ /'brum phran nyungs kar lta bus rtsa/ /nya phyis rtsa brtse rtsa'i nyes pa/ /'bras phye 'dus pa'i ling tog dmar/ /drug po sman gyis gso bar bya/ /lhag ma bdun po mtshon

gyis gso/ /de yang sar pa sman gyis gso/ /mdzer pa bshad pa lnga po gang / /rgyus pa dang ni rtsas g.yogs pa/ /nag por phyin zhing pags gas 'dra/ /mthon po gcad par bya ba yin/ /mthong byed steng du phyin pa spang / /nag po'am mthong byed la mkhris pas/ /

pags pa brtol te ling tog ni/ /zug dmar mchi mar bcas pa skyed/ /de yis mig 'bras dkyil 'khor rnag /'dzam bu smin pa 'drar snang zhing / /dma' ba rma yi ling tog ste/ /de ni gso dka' rim gnyis dag /brtol ba gso ba tsam yin no/ /der ni zug pa la

sogs mang / /nag po khab kyis phug snyam byed/ /rim pa gsum ni brtol ba dang / /rma yis khyab pa gsor mi rung / /bad kan las gyur dung ltar dkar/ /shas cher mi na gso sla dkar/ /dmar zhing mchi ma spyi bag 'dzag /'brum phran dmar zhing shin tu na/ /

ra yi ril ma 'dra zhing 'bur/ /khrag skyes ra ril 'dra ba spang / /nad khrag bcas pas rtsa'i ling tog /de yis mig 'bras nag po khebs/ /na zhing tsha la dmar ba yi/ /rtsa yis kun tu rgyas gyur la/ /rgyu med mchi ma grang dro dang / /ska sla 'dzag pa de spang bya/ /nad gzhi

khrag las mthong bcas rnag /'bras bu dkar por sgyur byed de/ /sprin dkar gyis ni g.yogs 'dra zhing / /nim pa ba ni bkas pa 'dra/ /shin tu mi bzad na zhing dmar/ /tsha zhing skrangs pas gzir ba dag /smin pas nyen pa'i ling tog ste/ /mi bzad na ba spang bar

bya/ /gang gis mtshan ma nyams pa'am/ /nang sngo ba'am dmar bcas pas/ /shin tu 'bur ba'am gting ring pa 'am/ /mchi mar bcas shing rtsa'i rmas khyab/ /rnying pa'am mtho dma' can dag gam/ /dbus chang ling tog spang bar bya/ /nag po'i nad ni gsor rung dang / /

mi rung dbye ba rnam lnga yin/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u bcu pa'o// //de nas mig zur dang mig gi 'bras bu dkar po dang nag po'i nad gso ba bshad par bya'o/ /mig nad bcings pa sman pa yis/ /dugs byas

rtse mo 'bras 'dras dbug /rtse mo dkyil 'khor 'dra bas bzhar/ /de 'og rgyam tsha pi pi ling / /sbrang rtsi sbyar bas bsku bar bya/ /de nas snga ma bzhin du bcings/ /pa to la'i lo skyu ru ra/ /bskol ba'i sman khu thigs pas blugs/ /tshigs can

lcags kyu'i cha spyad kyis/ /phyi yi mtshams kyi tsha gsum gzung / /'phel gtsags kyis ni phyed gcad bya/ /gzhan du mchi ma rgyu la gnod/ /sbrang rtsi rgyam tshas bskus nas ni/ /mig mdzer lta bur gso bar bya/ /chu ser rnag 'dzag gtar ga gdab/ /de nas de ni

bcing bar bya/ /mig rnags cho gar bshad pa yi/ /las kun cho ga ji bzhin bya/ /rgyam tsha sge'u gsher nag tshur dang / /lcags dang zangs ni zhib btags pa'i/ /phye ma'i mig sman btang ba'am/ /sbrang rtsir bcas pa'i khu ba blugs/ /srin gyi rmen bu lci ba yis/ /dugs

byas brtol te phyi bar bya/ /nag tshur rgyam tsha 'bras bu gsum/ /sbrang rtsir sbyar bas bsku bar bya/ /nya phyis mkhris mchi 'dzag ltar gso/ /bad kan 'dud pa 'bras phye gnyis/ /gtar ga ma gtogs bad kan gyi/ /mchi ma 'dzag pa bzhin du gso/ /tsha ba gsum dang

kad pha la/ /ba lung khu ba'i mig sman gtang / /rgyam tsha dzA ti kha 'bus pa/ /thang shing bca' sga btags pa'i phye/ /chang gi dngas mas ri lur byas/ /mig sman skrangs dang g.ya' ba sel/ /rtsa nyes rtsa brtse ling tog dmar/ /rtsa dra khrag 'dzag lta bur gso/ /rtsa yi

nyes la khyad par du/ /mar dang sbrang rtsi'i mig sman bsku/ /rtsa brtse ba la sbrang rtsi dang / /skyer pa'i khaN+Da zhib btags bsku/ /ling tog dmar po zho ga chu/ /sbrang rtsi kha ra'i thigs pa blugs/ /shel dang gur gum shing mngar dung / /sbrang rtsi sbyar ba'i mig sman gtang / /

yang na sbrang rtsi dung sbyar ba'am/ /kha ra rgya mtsho'i lbu ba phan/ /mdzer par bshad pa rnam lnga las/ /dud pa lta bu'i rnyog can dang / /gang yang dmar zhing zho 'dra ba/ /de sman ling tog bzhin du bya/ /cig shos gan rkyal bzhag dugs byas/ /kha lung dang ni rgyam tsha dag /sbyar

ba'i mig sman bskus nas ni/ /mig btsums nas ni mnye bar bya/ /de ltar mig ni 'khrugs bcas pa/ /sha lhag skyes pa bskyod nas ni/ /mgo bo mi 'gyur dam du gzung / /mig mchu mchog tu mi 'gul bya/ /mig zur du ni blta bzhin du/ /mig phug mtshams

nas mdzer pa mtho/ /gang du gnyer ma 'dus gyur pa/ /der ni lcags kyus dam bzung ba'am/ /ha cang mi che mu tsi tra'am/ /khab bam skud pas blangs nas ni/ /kun nas dkyil 'khor 'dra bas 'dral/ /de nas bton te dral nas kyang / /mig phug mtshams

su bsnyen nas ni/ /cha bzhi lus par gcad bya ste/ /mig phug rtsa dang mchi ma ni/ /'dzag pa'i rtsa la mi gnod bsrung / /mig phug zur bcad mchi ma 'dzag /mig gi rtsa sbubs rma can 'gyur/ /mig 'gram mdzer pa cher skyes la/ /mig phug zur du bltas te bya/ /

legs par bcad de tsha ba gsum/ /rgyam tsha sbrang rtsir bcas pa bsku/ /zhun mar dron mo blugs pa dang / /sbrang rtsi mar sbyar bskus te bcings/ /de nas zhag gsum la sogs nas/ /bkrol nas ka rany+dza'i sa bon/ /'o ma bskol ba de bzhin blugs/ /ser po rnam

gnyis pa to la/ /shing mngar dang ni rgya skyegs shing / /ka rany+dza yi me tog ni/ /kha 'bus sbrang rtsir bcas bskol blugs/ /zhag bdun nas ni de dgrol bya/ /legs par bcad na nad med 'gyur/ /bcad drags mchod las nad 'gyur/ /sman khu blugs dang mig sman sogs/ /

phyi ba dang ni brta bas gso/ /kha ra ldong ros e li ya/ /rgyam tsha bca' sga zho re dang / /skyer pa'i khaN+Da srang phyed dang / /sbrang rtsi sbyar ba'i mig sman gyis/ /bad kan las gyur rab rib dang / /chu ser gyis gang ling tog dang / /mig mdzer bcas pa'i sha lhag sel/ /'bras bu

gsum ni gang rung ba'i/ /shun pa chur btags lde gur byas/ /kham phor sbyar ba'i nang du bsregs/ /de nas tshig nas phye mar btags/ /sman ni lhag ma'i khu ba yis/ /so sor legs par bsgos nas ni/ /snag tsha de bskams slar yang btags/ /rgyam tsha nyis 'gyur bcas

pa yi/ /mig sman gsum po de dag ni/ /phyi ba'i mchog tu mu khyud 'chad/ /rtsa yi dras g.yogs rtsa gang zhig /sra bas phyi ba'i sman dag gis/ /ma zhi 'brum phran de la ni/ /mig mdzer cho ga bzhin du gso/ /ling tog nad gzhi'i dbang las ni/ /snum

rtsub 'bras bu gsum sbyin zhing / /tig ta chen po'i sman mar sbyin/ /gtar ga bkru sman khu ba yi/ /thigs pa blugs pa la sogs bya/ /snad pa'i ling tog dur byid chu/ /lan gsum bskol ba'i mar blud bya/ /de 'og gtar ga'am pad pa yis/ /mig las khrag ni dbyung bar

bya/ /ut+pal rgun 'brum ra mnye ba/ /shing mngar bi da ri bskol ba/ /kha ra ra yi 'o ma 'am/ /chu bskol thigs pa blugs par bya/ /mig dmar mchi ma nad zhi nas/ /de rjes phyi ba'i mig sman phan/ /dzA ti kha 'bus rgya skyegs dang / /yug snam tsan+dan ri lur byas/ /khrag

dang mkhris pa dngas byed cing / /snad pa las gyur ling tog sel/ /phag dang rnga mo glang po che/ /ba lang ra rta bong bu'i so/ /rgya mtsho'i lbu ba mu tig dang / /na le sham ni bzhi par sbyar/ /so yi ri lus snad pa yi/ /ling tog gis khyab sel bar byed/ /ta ma'i lo ma ba lang

so/ /rgya mtsho'i lbu ba bong bu'i rus/ /zangs ma dung gcin ri lur byas/ /ling tog thams cad sel bar byed/ /rin chen so dang rwa dang ni/ /khams dang sug smel tsha ba gsum/ /sgog skya ka rany+dza'i sa bon/ /rma la phan pa'i sman rnams ni/ /rma bcas rma med gting zug

dang / /pags gnas ling tog 'joms sman yin/ /sna sman snum blud sha khu ni/ /blud pas dma' ba bstod par bya/ /nad med ling tog dma' ba ni/ /phur ma btsos dang brta bas bstod/ /ling tog dkar po skyes pa dang / /shing mngar thal tres seng phrom chu/ /blugs

pas seng phrom gtums pa ni/ /chu dron la spangs thigs pa blugs/ /shing mngar bri ha ti'i rtsa ba/ /rgyam tsha dong gra zangs ma ni/ /skyu ru ra'i 'bras chu dang btags/ /lde gu zangs ma'i snod la bsku/ /nas mar skyu ru ra'i lo ma/ /dud pas de 'og mang du bdugs/ /de nas ri

lur bya ba ni/ /de ni chu dang sbrang rtsir btags/ /mthon ka chen po zhes bya ste/ /ling tog dkar po sel mchog yin/ /ling tog brtan zhing mthug pa la/ /khrag ni lan mang dbyung bar bya/ /mgo dang lus kyi bkru sman gtang / /phur ma btsos pa'ang lan mang gtang / /pi pi

ling dang na le sham/ /rgyam tsha shri sha'i 'bras bu'am/ /'bras bu gsum bskol rgyam tshar bcas/ /blud pas gnas las bstod par bya/ /dung dang rgya shug ka ta ka /rgun 'brum shing mngar sbrang rtsi dang / /mur so yi dri ma yi/ /shri sha yi ni me tog bcas/ /tshigs

bcad phyed kyis bshad pa 'di/ /mig sman sbyor ba gtang bar bya/ /skyu ru pa ni dza'i khu bar/ /lang ka li yi thal ba ni/ /nub gcig spangs te bskams pa'i phye/ /ling tog bskyod pa'i mig sman yin/ /mung+ga spun pa med btags pa/ /dung dang sbrang rtsir bcas pa'ang phan/ /

sbrang rtsi ma du ka'i snying po'am/ /ba ru ra rkang sbrang rtsir bcas/ /ba lang rta bong rnga mo'i so/ /dung dang rgya mtsho'i lbu ba dang / /ardzu ne'i chus ri lur byas/ /bskyod pa'i ling tog 'jig par byed/ /bstod pa'am zug rngur bcas pa yi/ /ling tog spu la sogs pas phyi/ /

rtsa yi ling tog mthong gnod med/ /snad pa'i ling tog lta bur gso/ /shing mngar stag tsher ra mnye ba/ /bri ha ti dang a ka ru/ /skyer pa'i mig sman ra'i 'o ma/ /btags pa'i lde gu nas dang mar/ /bcas pa'i dud pas bdug par bya/ /skyu ru ra yi lo ma dang / /ri lur byas

pa mig sman mchog /ma sos ra yi ril ma 'dra/ /mdzer pa lta bur mtshon gyis gso/ /ra'i ril gsor ni mi rung dang / /ling tog de 'dra de bzhin gzhan/ /nad ma zhi na snum blud cing / /gtar ga gdab pa la sogs bya/ /smad byas de ni bsal byas shing / /dkar zhing

mtho ba gso bar bya/ /rgya star go bye lung thang dang / /ta la smyig ma ka ri ra/ /bsres pa'i thal chu btsags pa dang / /rnga mo'i rus pa'i phye ma bsre/ /mig sman ling tog gso dka' dang / /mdog mi sdug pa 'joms par byed/ /gso sla la yang 'di nyid ni/ /bsten

pas sel bar nus pa yin/ /ra yi ril ma ngos gnyis nas/ /khab kyis phug ste chu gzags nas/ /mthe bos mnyam du btsir nas ni/ /rma yi nang ni sha phye dang / /tshil ni rlon pas bkang nas ni/ /dkri zhing dkri zhing dgang bar bya/ /zhag bdun nas ni rma

'byor nas/ /mig 'bras nag po mnyam brtan la/ /mig sman snum can gtang bya zhing / /mar dang 'o ma'i sna sman blugs/ /de lta na yang rgyas gyur na/ /dbug dang bcad sogs bya ba byas/ /bcad drags pa yis mig nang du/ /zhugs par mi 'gyur ci rigs bya/ /ling tog

la ni rtag par rang gi sman/ /bskol ba'i mar blud sna sman bsten pa dang / /ci nas mthong ba nyams par mi 'gyur bar/ /mig sman rnon po rtag tu bsten par bya/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u bcu gcig pa'o// //de nas

mthong bar byed pa'i mig nad kyi nad dmigs shes par bya ba bshad par bya'o/ /nad ni rtsa yi nang zhugs pa/ /rim pa dang por gnas nas ni/ /gzugs ni mi gsal mthong 'gyur zhing / /rgyu med par yang gsal bar mthong / /rim pa gnyis par phyin pa na/ /med pa dag

kyang mthong 'gyur zhing / /yod cing nye bar bsgribs na mthong / /ring nas phra ba mthong bar 'gyur/ /nye dang ring bar gnas pa'i gzugs/ /phyin ci log tu shes par 'gyur/ /nad kyis zlum po'i dbyibs 'dra par/ /zlum po nyid du mthong bar 'gyur/ /mthong byed dbus gnas

gcig gnyis mthong / /mang du gnas na du ma mthong / /mthong byed nang du zhugs pa ni/ /che chung go ni bzlog par mthong / /'og tu gnas pas nye mi mthong / /steng du gnas pas ring mi mthong / /ngos la gnas pas g.yas g.yon min/ /nad 'di rab rib ces byar bshad/ /

nad ni rim pa gsum par brten/ /sngon po nyid du 'gyur ba yin/ /de yis steng mthong 'og mi mthong / /gos srab kyis g.yogs ltar mthong zhing / /kha dog ji bzhin 'gyur ba dang / /rim gyis mthong ba nyams par 'gyur/ /de lta na yang yal bar dor/ /rim pa bzhi par

phyin nas ni/ /mthong byed mtshan mo nyams byed cing / /mig gi rgyal mo khebs par byed/ /de la rlung gyur rab rib ni/ /long long por ni mthong ba dang / /g.yo zhing rnyog can rtsa dmar snang / /chad 'ga' gsal bar mthong ba dang / /dra ba skra shad sbrang bu dang / /'od mthong de ni

yal bar bor/ /sngon por gyur la mig dmar la/ /bzhin la sna ni med par mthong / /zla ba med sogs du mar mthong / /yon po'ang drang por mthong bar 'gyur/ /sngon po 'phel na mthong byed ni/ /rdul gyis khebs pa lta bur mthong / /gsal zhing dmar ba'am rgya che ba'am/ /

phra ba'am mthong ba nyams par 'gyur/ /de ni mthong ba nyams pa yin/ /rlung gis mig gi rtsa 'khums 'gyur/ /mthong byed gting du zhugs pa dag /'di ni gting ring zhes byar bshad/ /mkhris gyur rab rib glog dang ni/ /srin bu me khyer me sgron 'od/ /rma bya

sreg pa'i sgro dang 'dra/ /phal cher sngon por mthong bar 'gyur/ /mthong byed mig ni 'khar g.ya' 'dra/ /de lta bu ni mthong ba dang / /nyi zla 'khyims dang me dang ni/ /smig rgyu 'ja' tshon mthong bar 'gyur/ /bung ba ltar sngo mthong ba med/ /'bras bu snum pa mthong nyams yin/ /mkhris pa mig

ni chung zhes bshad/ /chung mthong de ni thung ngu yin/ /ser zhing dngos po ser por mthong / /mkhris pas tshig par gyur zhes bya/ /bad kan rab rib phal cher ni/ /snum zhing dkar bar mthong ba dang / /dung dang zla ba kun+da dang / /kun+da'i me tog lta bus khyab/ /sngon po 'od med nyi

zla dang / /sgron mes khyab pa lta bur mthong / /mig 'bras dkar por snang bar 'gyur/ /bad kan mthong nyams des mngon khyab/ /snum zhing mthong ba nyams 'gyur la/ /chu yi thigs pa pad+ma yi/ /'dab ma'i steng na gnas ltar g.yo/ /dro na zhum par 'gyur ba dang / /grang

bas yongs su khyab par byed/ /zla ba me tog kun+da dung / /shel ltar snang zhing dkar ba yin/ /khrag gi rab rib dmar ba dang / /mun par gyur pa mthong ba yin/ /sngon po dmar ba gnag par ni/ /mig gis de ltar mthong ba yin/ /mtshan ma nyams pa de 'drar mthong / /

'od med mthong ba nyams pa yin/ /ldan pa 'am ni 'dus pa yi/ /rab rib la sogs mtshan ma ni/ /'dren ma yin par shes par bya/ /glo bur du ni rab rib dag /gsal dang mi gsal 'khrugs par byed/ /lhag ma dag gis mthong byed ni/ /dmar zhing

sna tshogs dag tu snang / /gang gis mthong byed nad kyis khyab/ /sre mo'i mig 'drar snang bar 'gyur/ /de ni nyin mthong mtshan mo min/ /ne+e'u le long ba zhes de bshad/ /nyi ma nub par gyur pa na/ /'od mi snang tshe rengs 'gyur zhing / /mthong byed nyams par byed pa ni/ /nad kyi long

ba gnyis pa yin/ /nyi ma'i zer gyis phog pa na/ /mthong ba'i lam nas dri ma ni/ /zhu zhing med par gyur nas ni/ /nyin mo gsal bar mthong bar byed/ /tsha bas gdungs te mod la ni/ /chu grang nang du zhugs gyur na/ /nad gzhi gsum dang khrag 'khrugs te/ /drod ni gyen 'gro

de nas mig /tsha zhing na dkar dri ma can/ /nyin mo long long por mthong zhing / /mtshan mo long bar gyur pa dag /de ni dro bas tshig ces bya/ /shas cher skyur zos nad dang ni/ /khrag dang bcas pas mig khyab 'gyur/ /'drul zhing g.yo la dri ma can/ /de ni skyur gyis tshig

ces bya/ /mya ngan rims dang mgo nad kyis/ /rlung sogs gdungs par gyur pa las/ /rlung sogs 'khrugs shing dud 'thul mthong / /de ni dud pa can zhes bya/ /snying stobs chung bas glo bur du/ /ngo mtshar can gyi gzugs mthong ba'am/ /nyi ma 'od can sogs mthong

nas/ /mig la brten pa'i rlung la sogs/ /gzi brjid nyams pas mig gi ni/ /mthong ba nyams par byed par 'gyur/ /bai DUr+ya'i mdog mkhrang bag dang / /rang bzhin gnas ltar nad med 'gyur/ /'di ni phrad pa las byung ba'i/ /mtshan ma nyams pa zhes byar bshad/ /

'di las bad kan ma gtogs mtshan/ /nyams dang thung ngu gting zhen spang / /mig sngon drug dang ne+e'u le'i/ /long ba 'tsho tsam lhag ma ni/ /bcu gnyis po ni gso bar bya/ /de ltar mig nad nyi shu ni/ /rtsa bdun dag tu bstan pa yin/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus

pa las/ phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u bcu gnyis pa'o// //de nas rab rib gso ba bshad par bya'o/ /rab rib sngon po nyid 'gyur zhing / /sngon po ma bcos long bar 'gyur/ /de bas mig nad la rab rib/ /mi bzad myur du gso bar bya/ /'tsho byed srang brgya chu pre

ni/ /bcu drug nang bskol bzhi cha lus/ /khu ba 'o ma bre do dang / /mar ni bre gang lhan cig btso/ /stag tsher ba dang ra mnye ba/ /seng phrom rgyam tsha pi pi ling / /shu ti shing mngar rgun 'brum dang / /thang shing kha ra 'bras bu gsum/ /zho ni gnyis gnyis btab bskol te/ /

mtshan 'thungs rab rib sel mchog yin/ /rgun 'brum btsod dang tsan+dan dkar/ /ra mnye ba gnyis dzi ba ka /kha ra nye'u shing me da dang / /shing mngar ut+pal puN+Da rI/ /zho ni gnyis gnyis mar rnying ni/ /bre gang 'o ma de mnyam bskol/ /de yis mig sngon rab rib dang / /mar

gyis mgo nad rab rib 'joms/ /nim pa skyer pa pa to la/ /pu tse shel dang pu shel tsi/ /'bras bu gsum dang ba sha ka /byi tshe rab dang kyi lce ba/ /par pa ta ni srang re yin/ /skyu ru ra ni bre gang dang / /chu bre bcu drug nang du bskol/ /bre bzhi lus par gla sgang dang / /rtsa mkhris

shing mngar dug mo nyung / /ba lu ka dang tsan+dan dang / /pi pi ling srang phyed phyed dang / /mar bre gang dang bcas bskol ba/ /des ni rna mig sna nad dang / /khong 'bras rims dang mdzer pa dang / /'brum phran shu ba mdze nad sel/ /mchog tu ling tog rab rib dang / /mtshan long dro bas

tshig pa 'joms/ /'bras bu gsum ni srang brgyad dag /chu bre bzhi bskol bzhi cha lus/ /'o ma de dang cha mnyam dang / /'bras bu gsum gyi lde gu ni/ /srang gcig zhun mar bre phyed bskol/ /kha ra'am sbrang rtsir bcas pa'am/ /'bras bu gsum gyi khu bar bcas/ /'thungs

na rab rib thams cad 'joms/ /shing mngar ra mnye ba gnyis dang / /kaN+Da kA ri pi pi ling / /a ru ra dang ut+pa la/ /kha ra rgun 'brum srang rer bcas/ /ra yi 'o ma mar bre re/ /'bras bu gsum dang ba sha ka / bring ga ra dza'i khu bar bskol/ /'di ni 'bras bu gsum chen mo'i/ /

mar de mig nad kun sel mchog /'bras bu gsum dang mar ram ni/ /'bras bu gsum dang shing mngar bcas/ /sbrang rtsi yis ni sbrus gyur pa/ /mtshan mo zos par gyur na ni/ /zla gcig phan pa'i zas bsten zhing / /skyu ru ra yi chu 'thungs na/ /mkha'

lding lta bu'i mig thob ces/ /drang srong mu khyud kyis bshad do/ /ta bya shing mngar lcags dang gser/ /kha ra sbrang rtsi mar rnying dang / /'bras bu gsum dang ci 'dod sbyar/ /bsten pas rab rib 'joms mchog yin/ /yang na 'bras bu gsum bskol mar/ /rab rib can gyis bsten

bya'am/ /snum khur phye'am sran tshod ni/ /'bras bu gsum gyi phye bcas pa'am/ /'o thug 'bras bu gsum bcas pa/ /bsgrangs te kha ra sbrang rtsi btab/ /zas ma zos pa'am nang par ni/ /rgun 'brum kha ra sbrang rtsi dang / /a ru ra ni so sor bza'/ /rtag tu rab rib can

gyis bsten/ /lig bu mig cha drug cu bzhi/ /zangs dang dngul dang gser gyi cha/ /re re gcig tu sbyar ba ni/ /kong bu kha sbyar nang du gzhug /'dres par gyur gyi bar du bud/ /de nas de yi ro drug gi/ /tshogs kyi khu ba lan bdun dang / /so sor de la blugs par bya/ /mu tig dung

dang be+e DUr+ya/ /tsha ba gsum dang de nas bsre/ /phye ma'i mig sman de gtang bya/ /rab rib thams cad sel byed yin/ /rgun 'brum pad+ma'i rtsa ba yi/ /khu ba 'o ma chang dang zhag /char pa de bzhin lig bu mig /bskol zhing bsku ba byas nas ni/ /phye ma de ni dung dang gzhug /mthong

ba gsal byed mig sman yin/ /mig nad thams cad la bsngags zhes/ /lus 'phags rgyal pos bshad pa yin/ /spangs ma srang gnyis rgya shug gi/ /sol bar bsregs la ra yi ni/ /'o ma mar dang sbrang rtsi yi/ /nang du lan ni bdun bdun bcug /ta bya dang ni na le sham/ /

lig bu mig dang pu tse shel/ /spang spos rgyam tsha a ru ra/ /seng phrom ldong ros pi pi ling / /sug smel rgya mtsho'i lbu ba dang / /stang zil zho ni gnyis gnyis dang / /shing mngar srang gcig bcas pa ni/ /kong bu kha sbyar nang bsregs btags/ /mig sngon mtshan mo long

bar bcas/ /dmar ris de bsten pa yis 'joms/ /phye mas mchog tu rab rib nad/ /nyi mas mun pa lta bur sel/ /spang spos dri bzang gsum dang lcags/ /gur gum ut+pal sngon po dang / /kha ra spangs ma a ru ra/ /rgya mtsho'i lbu ba 'ching bu dkar/ /na le sham dang

pi pi ling / /stang zil shing mngar dung dang bcas/ /tha skar zla ba'i tshe na ni/ /phye ma mig gnyis la bskus na/ /mig mdzer rab rib dmar ris dang / /g.ya' dang mig sngon sogs zhi byed/ /na le sham dang rgyam tsha ni/ /cha re pi pi ling dang ni/ /rgya mtsho'i lbu ba cha gnyis dang / /

skyer pa'i kha N+Da cha dgu ni/ /nag pa la bab tshe na btags/ /mig bskus bad kan rab rib 'joms/ /spangs ma bsregs te lan mang du/ /ba gcin ra thug khu ba dang / /skyur rtsabs bud med nu zho dang / /dug gi khu ba sbrang rtsi mar/ /bcug par gyur pa gang yin pa/ /phye mar byas des

mi yi mig /mkha' lding mig ltar gsal bar 'gyur/ /bring ga ra dza 'bras bu gsum/ /dug dang shing mngar khu ba dang / /mar dang ra yi 'o mar ni/ /zha nye lan ni bdun bdun du/ /bsregs shing bsregs shing btsos pa yi/ /mig sman thur mar byas pa de/ /mig sman bskol

ba 'am ma bskol ba'am/ /byugs na rab rib mig mdzer nad/ /chu ser 'dzag dang 'byar bag can/ /g.ya' dang tshor ba med pa dang / /ri mo dmar por snang ba 'joms/ /dngul chu ro nye cha mnyam bya/ /de gnyis stang zil mnyam byas la/ /ga pur cung zad btab pa yi/ /mig

sman rab rib sel mchog yin/ /bya rgod dus su shi ba'i mgo bo ni/ /nyi ma 'char ka'i mdog 'dra gang yin de/ /ba lang lci bas bsregs thal lig bu mig /cha mnyam btags par gyur pa'i phye ma yi/ /sbyor 'dis mig gi gsal stobs bya rgod lta bur byed/ /sbrul nag mgor ni

lig pu mig /mar bcas dud pa ma shor bsregs/ /spang spos gan+d+ha b+ha dra dang / /lhan cig btags pas mig 'bras ni/ /rdol yang mig ni srung bar byed/ /sbrul nag shi ba'i ro dang ni/ /sdig pa shi ba'i ro bzhi ni/ /'o ma'i bum par zhag nyi shu/ /rtsa gcig bcug

ste bsrul la bsrub/ /de las mar sar gang byung bas/ /khyim bya gsos te de yi ni/ /rtug pas mig ni bskus gyur na/ /long bas kyang ni legs par mthong / /sbrul nag po yi zhag dang dug /stang zil ka ta ka'i 'bras bu/ /khu bar byas pa'i sbyor ba

yis/ /long ba'ang myur du mthong bar byed/ /na le sham ni rdog ma bcu/ /drub mar cang ni srang phyed dang / /spangs ma srang gcig shing mngar ni/ /zho gnyis 'o ma'i nang du sbangs/ /du ba ma shor bsregs mig sman/ /khu ba mnyam med ces bya ste/ /rab rib 'joms pa'i

mchog yin no/ /ba ru ra yi tshi gu na le sham/ /skyu ru ra dang spangs ma shing mngar ni/ /chu thag byas pa'i ri lu grib mar bskams/ /rab rib myur du 'joms par byed pa yin/ /na le sham dang skyu ru ra/ /rgya mtsho'i lbu ba spangs ma dang / /dngul rdo dang ni drub mar bcas/ /go

rims bzhin du cha res bskyed/ /drub mar cha ni drug pa ste/ /sbyor 'dis rab rib ling tog mdzer/ /gnag dang mig sngon g.ya' ba sel/ /rin chen dngul dang shel dang gser/ /lig bu mig dang zangs dang lcags/ /tsan+dan dmar po yug snam dmar/ /phye ma'i mig

sman nad kun sel/ /til mar ba ru ra yi mar/ /bring ga ra dza a sa na'i/ /khu ba lcags kyi snod du bskol/ /snar blugs mig ni gsal stobs skyed/ /nad kyi tshul las de la lan mang du/ /snum blud gtar ga bkru sman sna sman dang / /mig sman mgo bo'i bkru sman mas gtong

dang / /nyams brtas byugs dang blugs pas ci rigs gso/ /'di ni spyi yi gso ba yin/ /da ni re re'i mnyan par gyis/ /de la rlung gyur rab rib la/ /rtsa ba bcu bskol khu ba mar/ /'o ma bzhi 'gyur 'bras bu gsum/ /lde gu bskol ba blud par bya/ /de 'og 'bras bu gsum

dang ni/ /rtsa ba lnga'i khu 'o ma dang / /e raN+Da yi til mar bcas/ /bkru sman nye bar gtang bar bya/ /dzi ban ti yi yal gar bcas/ /srang brgya chu bre bcu drug bskol/ /brgyad cha lus pa de nang du/ /til mar 'o ma bre re dang / /ba la gsum dang dzi ban ti/ /nye'u shing rtsa ba srang

re dang / /shing mngar srang ni bzhi dang bcas/ /lcags kyi snod du bskol bar bya/ /lcags snod nyid du zla gcig gzhag /sna sman nam tshod yan chad kyi/ /rlung nad mkhris pa'i nad 'joms shing / /mchog tu mig la gnas pa sel/ /skra gdong gnya' ba phrag nad

sel/ /rgyas shing gzi mdangs mdzes par byed/ /e raN+Da dkar rtsa ba dang / /thang shing bri ha ti'i 'bras bu/ /shu dag rgya spos tsi tra dang / /bil ba'i rtsa ba til mar dang / /'o mar bcas bskol snar blugs na/ /nam tshong yan chad rlung dang ni/ /bad kan gyi ni nad kun sel/ /

stag dang phag dang bya rgod dang / /sbrul dang khyim bya'i tshil dang ni/ /shing mngar so sor sbyar te bskol/ /mig sman bskus par bsngags pa yin/ /de rjes mig sman lig bu mig /sha khu 'o ma mar rim bzhin/ /snga ma bzhin du blugs na ni/ /rab rib 'joms byed

mchog yin no/ /de ltar byas kyang ma zhi na/ /de 'og brta ba'i cho ga spyad/ /shu ti ru rta spang spos dang / /shing mngar ram nye ba gnyis dang / /stag tsher ba dang sa ra la/ /pi pi ling dang thang shing ni/ /mar gyi brgyad 'gyur 'o mar bskol/ /mig brta ba yi mchog yin no/ /ri

dag e ne ya'i tshil ni/ /'o mar bskol te gzar bus dkrugs/ /de yi dngas ma shing mngar dang / /tsan+dan pu shel tse de bzhin/ /shwa bid reg 'jam go da dang / /khyim bya sreg pa rma bya'i tshil/ /re re zhing ni cho ga dag /'di dag gis ni brta bar bya/ /gsal bar bya dang

snum dang ni/ /sman phur btsos pa'i thigs pa'ang blugs/ /'dir ni rlung 'gyur cham pa bzhin/ /ni ru ha dang 'jam rtsi bya/ /mkhris pa las gyur rab rib la/ /'tsho byed 'bras bu gsum dang ni/ /bskol ba'i mar ni blud bya zhing / /snum gyis zhen par gtar ga gdab/ /

kha ra dur byid sug smel phye/ /sbrang rtsi sbyar ba'i bkru sman gtang / /rab bsil sman chu blugs byug sogs/ /gdong dang mig dang spyi bor bya/ /thal tres shug pa pu shel tsi/ /mu tig seng phrom tsan+dan dkar/ /ri lu'i mig sman bskus na phan/ /de bzhin gan+d+ha b+ha dra

dang / /nA ga puSh+pa ut+pa la/ /ga pur shing mngar yug snam phan/ /skyer khaN+Da dang sbangs ma dang / /karka ta yi sring gi dang / /skyu ru ra yi 'bras bu shel/ /ga pur cha ni lnga lnga dang / /cha gsum cha re sbyar ba yin/ /mig sman rab rib 'joms par

byed/ /'tsho byed kha ra ut+pa la/ /'o ma mar bskol sna sman gtang / /bad kan las gyur sle tres dang / /'bras bu gsum dang pi pi ling / /mar bskol snum blud gtar ga gdab/ /de rjes dan+da dur byid bskol/ /gla gor zho sha a ru ra/ /bca' sga pi pi ling phye

gdab/ /bkru sman dag ni gtang bar bya/ /rtsa ba bcu pa'i khu bar ni/ /ba le ka dang ser po gnyis/ /thang shing pi pi ling 'o ma/ /til mar bskol ba'i sna sman gtang / /dung dang gla rtsi pri yang ku/ /rtsa ba gsum dang 'bras bu gsum/ /dri med ri lus mig gsal byed/ /

lcags nag phye ma tsha ba gsum/ /rgyam tsha 'bras bu gsum mig sman/ /ri lu nag pos mig gsal byed/ /ri bong bong bu seng ge glang / /rnga mo'i so dang dpral ba'i rus/ /ba lang dkar spun le sham/ /rgya mtsho'i lbu ba tsan+dan dung / /nu zho ra yi 'o mar btags/ /ri lus

rab rib ling tog sel/ /khrag gyur mkhris pa lta bur gso/ /bsil chos bya zhing gtar ga gdab/ /rgun 'brum spang spos seng phrom dang / /shing mngar tsan+dan spangs ma dung / /pad+ma shug pa ut+pal/ /ra yi 'o mas ri lur byas/ /khrag gyur rab rib myur du sel/ /

ldan pa 'dus pa las gyur pa/ /nad gzhi cha ni ji bzhin gso/ /ma du ka dang byi dang ga /na le sham dang sgron shing dang / /'o ma til mar bskol ba'am/ /btags pa'i sna sman gdong bsku bya/ /rgya spos ut+pal a nan+ta/ /shing mngar su ni shan kai /til mar bskol

ba'i sna sman dang / /mgo bsku 'jam rtsi bya ba bsngags/ /pu shel tsi bskol khu ba'i nang / /rgyam tsha pi pi ling phye gdab/ /de btsags slar yang mar bcas par/ /bskol la ska gyur bsgrangs nas ni/ /sbrang rtsi bcug pa'i mig sman ni/ /'dus pa las gyur rab rib sel/ /

nub mo rgyu ba'i sems can gyi/ /rus pa rkang gis gang ba dang / /lig bu mig dang bcas pa ni/ /'bab chu'i nang du zla gcig gam/ /zhag ni nyi shu'i bar du gzhag /de nas phyung ste skams nas ni/ /lug ru yi ni me tog dang / /shing mngar bcas pa'i phye mar byas/ /

mig bskus 'dus pa las gyur pa'i/ /rab rib sel bar byed mchog yin/ /mig sngo gso ba'ang 'di nyid las/ /gtar ga gdab par mi bya ste/ /nad des long bar gyur pa yin/ /srin bu pad pas khrag dbyung bya/ /bu ram rgya mtsho'i lbu ba dang / /pi pi ling dang na le

sham/ /gur gum sbrang rtsi lig bu mig /spris g.yogs 'tsho ba tsam mig sman/ /'dus gyur ne+e'u le lta bur long / /rab rib skabs bshad cho gar sbyar/ /mar dang sbrang rtsi ba lang gi /lci ba'i khu ba skyer khaN+Da/ /yug snam bal bu'i phye mar sbyar/ /mig

sman mtshan me long la phan/ /na le sham ni zho dang sbyar/ /mtshan mo mi mthong mig sman mchog /ut+pal yug snam ka rany+dza/ /pad+ma ge sar ba lang gi /lci ba'i khu ba dang sbyar ba'i/ /ri lus mtshan mo long ba sel/ /ha re Nu ka pi pi ling / /rgyam tsha dang ni lig

bu mig /ra gcin ri lur byas pa phan/ /pri yang ku dang tsha ba gsum/ /ldong ros ba bla 'bras bu gsum/ /rgya mtsho'i lbu ba ra'i 'o ma/ /ri lu byas pa'i mig sman gyis/ /mtshan mo long ba'i mig nad sel/ /mcher pa'i nang du pi pi ling / /bcug ste ma tshos bar

btsos la/ /de bskams sbrang rtsir btags pa ni/ /mtshan mo mi mthong mig sman mchog /ma he'i mchin pa mcher pa dang / /til mar mar ni lhan cig bza'/ /'tsho byed sna bcu lo ma ni/ /mar dang lhan cig bskol ba bza'/ /a ti mug ta e raN+Da/ /nye'u shing

lang ga li'i lo ma/ /mar dang brngos pa bza' bar bya/ /dro na puSh+pa mar dang brngos/ /bza' dang btung bar sbyar ba'ang phan/ /dud 'thul mkhris pa skyur bro bas/ /tshig la mar ni rnying pa dag /snum gyur bsil ba'i bkru sman gtang / /bsil sman gyis ni kun tu byug /ba

lang lci khu 'o ma mar/ /bskol ba yi ni mig sman nam/ /bal bu'i lo ma yug snam bskal/ /phye ma btab pa'i mig sman phan/ /med seng phrom a nan+ta/ /skyer pa btsod dang shing mngar ni/ /mar gyi brgyad 'gyur 'o ma bskol/ /til mar bskol

ba'i sna sman phan/ /'o ma mar sar gyis brta bya/ /des ma zhin gtar ga gdab/ /sems las nad dang mya ngan 'jigs/ /zas rtsub tsog tsog por 'dug dang / /skyug sman bkru sman sna sman dang / /sman thigs blugs sogs nyes pa dang / /kha zas phyed zhu slon pa dang / /bkres

skom la sogs brnags pa dang / /mig nad ma bcos yun ring las/ /rab rib nad ldan brta bar bya/ /de la nad gzhi sogs brtags te/ /rang gi sman ni ji bzhin sbyar/ /nyi ma gzas zin me 'od glog la sogs/ /bltas pas mig ni nyams par gyur pa dag /

de la bsil sman sogs kyis brta bya zhing / /de bzhin gser bdar mar gyi mig sman gtang / /mi yis ji srid 'tsho yi bar du ni/ /rtag tu mig bsrung ba la 'bad par bya/ /nyin dang mtshan mo 'dra bar gyur pa yi/ /mi la nor yod gyur kyang don med yin/ /'bras bu gsum

bsten gtar ga spyang bya dang / /sems dga' mig sman sna sman bcas bsten na/ /bya sha za zhing rkang pa'i rim gro dang / /zhun mar btung bas rtag tu mig bsrung bya/ /kha zas mi 'phrod za ba rtag tu spang / /rab phra 'tsher dang g.yo ba mi lta zhes/ /skyes bu'i mig ni mchog

tu bsrung ba'i thabs/ /drang srong chen po mu khyud 'dzin gyis bshad/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u bcu gsum pa'o// //de nas mthong ba nyams pa gso ba bshad par bya'o/ /bad kan las gyur spris g.yogs pa/ /

rba klong la sogs bla brnan ni/ /drug po med par gyur pa dang / /legs smin mthong ba med pa dbye/ /de smin ma gyur mi snyoms la/ /zho ga chu 'dra srab pa ni/ /thur ma yis ni drangs gyur kyang / /slar yang gyen du 'byung bar 'gyur/ /nad ni mi bzad skyed byed cing / /mthong

byed slar yang 'gebs par byed/ /de ni zas bcas bla brnan bcas/ /bad kan can gyis myur du skyed/ /bad kan gyis ni mthong nyams pa/ /bad kan dkar bas dkar ba yin/ /de ni nad gzhan gyis zil gnon/ /kun tu sngo ba'i nad du 'gyur/ /de la rlung gyur mig

g.yo zhing / /rba klong g.yo zhing dmar skyar 'dug /gseg ma arga'i 'o ma ni/ /thig phran khyab 'dra mthug pa yin/ /gra ma lta bu'i mig 'bras ni/ /'bras kyi gra ma 'bras khyab yin/ /gra ma bcad pa gra ma tshig /bcad pa ltar snang na ba yin/ /rma sgro rma bya'i mjug sgro

'dra/ /khar ba'i mdog tu snang ba yin/ /gdugs 'dra kha dog sna tshogs pa/ /spris g.yogs gdugs can zhes bya'o/ /gtar ga mi bya cham pa dang / /lud pa can ni dbye mi bya/ /ma zhu sngar ma skyugs pa dang / /rna mig mgo gzer can mi dbye/ /de nas thun mong dus

su ni/ /sbyang byas zas zos pa la ni/ /sa phyogs gsal bar snga dro ni/ /sman pa pus mnyam khri la 'dug /nad pa 'dug cing bsdam byas la/ /kha yi dbugs kyis dugs bya zhing / /mthe bos mig ni mnyes byas nas/ /nad ni g.yos par mthong ba dang / /mi 'gul bar

ni mgo nas bzung / /rang gi sna la blta bzhin du/ /nag po sor phyed ma gtogs shing / /mig 'gram bzhi cha dor ba ru/ /mdzub mo gung mo mtheb mo yis/ /mig thur dam du bzung nas ni/ /rang grub bu gnas 'phred du/ /gzugs shing gyen mnye drang por byas/ /

mig g.yon lag pa g.yas pas dbug /mig g.yas lag pa g.yon pas dbug /legs par phug na sgra 'byung 'gyur/ /nad med chu ni nyung zhing 'byung / /de rjes nad pa spro bsrings la/ /mig tu nu zho blugs par bya/ /de nas thur ma'i rtse mo yis/ /gnod pa med par

dal gyis ni/ /mig gi 'bras bu dbyi byas la/ /sna nas dal gyis phul bar bya/ /mig na gnas pa'i bad kan ni/ /sna nas brngubs pas bsal bar bya/ /nad mi 'gul ba'am 'gyur na ni/ /mig gi phyi rol nas dugs bya/ /de nas gzugs ni mthong gyur nas/ /thur

ma rim gyis dbyung bar bya/ /mar la sbangs pa'i ras bal gzhug /mig dkris nas ni de 'og tu/ /de las logs ni cig shos dbab/ /gnyis ka phye na gan rkyal bzhag /rlung med mal du mgo bo dang / /rkang bsku phan pa'i zas bsten bya/ /

sbrid pa lud pa sgregs pa dang / /mchil ma 'dor dang chu 'thung dang / /thur du gtong ba khrus byed dang / /so shing 'cha' bar byed pa dag /zhag bdun bar du spang bya zhing / /snum 'thung cho ga bzhin du bsdam/ /chu dron gyis ni nyer spyod/ /ci nus smyung bya na gyur na/ /mar khu dro

'jam blugs par bya/ /nas chan sla ba'am thug pa ska/ /tsha gsum skyu ru ra mar sbyin/ /zhag gsum nas ni de bkrol la/ /rlung 'joms pa yi sman gyi ni/ /khu ba mig tu blugs par bya/ /zhag bdun nas ni mig de nyid/ /rnam pa kun tu dgrol bar bya/ /ji srid mi

gsal brtan gyur pa/ /bsdams la 'bad de gnas par bya/ /gzugs ni phra dang 'tshor ba dag /mod la blta bar mi bya'o/ /dbug nyes mi mthun zos pa las/ /skrang dang na dang dmar la sogs/ /mig nad gdung ba 'byung bar 'gyur/ /nad tshul de bzhin de gso bya/ /nad

dang dmar bzhi bya'i phyir/ /dUr ba nas dang yug snam dang / /thal tres mar dang ldan pa yi/ /lde gus gdong ni bsku bar bya/ /de bzhin til dang yungs kar bcas/ /kha lung khu bas sbrus pa'ang phan/ /thal tres lo ma pa ya s+ya/ /btsod dang shing mngar ra yi ni/ /'o

mar sbyar ba'i lde gu ni/ /dro 'jam bde bar byed mchog yin/ /seng phrom rgyam tsha rgun 'bru dang / /shing mngar ra yi 'o mar bskol/ /thigs pa mig tu blugs pa ni/ /na dang dmar ba 'joms par byed/ /shing mngar ru rta ut+pal/ /rgun 'bru rgya skyegs kha rar bcas/ /rlung

'joms sman bskol 'o ma ni/ /mar gyi bzhi 'gyur bskol ba dang / /shug pa la sogs lde gus btab/ /las kun la ni bsngags pa yin/ /des ma zhi na snum chos dang / /dugs byas gtar ga gdab par bya/ /gdung ba'i gso ba dag kyang bya/ /dbug 'drub mig sman 'jam

po bsku/ /tu pa ri'i rtsa na le sham/ /ba bla skyer pa'i khaN+Da bsku/ /mig phyed bu ram ri lu ni/ /char pa'i chu dang bdar ba gtang / /dzA ti da ba shi ri sha//karka ta sring gi me tog /mu tig 'bras bu bai DUr+ya/ /ra yi 'o mar btags pa ni/ /zangs ma'i snod la sla bar bsku/ /zhag bdun

nas bskol slar yang ni/ /'o ma dang btags lde gur byas/ /ri lu grib ma la bskams pa/ /mig bskus phye ba mthong ba ni/ /gsal zhing stobs ni skyed par byed/ /byi ru ldong ros lig bu mig /rgya mtsho'i lbu ba na le sham/ /sna nas btang ba'i sman sbyar na/ /bshad

pa'i yon tan mtshungs par bstan/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u bcu bzhi pa'o// //de nas mig nad thams cad kyi nad kyi dmigs brtag pa bshad par bya'o/ /rlung gis mig nad mchi ma 'dzag /sna rgyas cung zad skrangs

pa dang / /mur 'gram dpral mig smin ma kha/ /na zhing zug la 'phar ba dang / /rngu ma skam zhing mchi ma grang / /sla nyung na ba ldang dub can/ /'byed dang 'dzums par dka' ba dang / /srin bu 'gro ba snyam du sems/ /mig ni bus pa lta bur snang / /zug rngu phra mos khyab snyam

byed/ /snum dang dro bas nyer zhir 'gyur/ /mchi ma 'dzag pa zhes bya'o/ /de ma bcos na gdung bar 'gyur/ /rna ba sgra 'byung mgo 'khor dang / /dpral ba mig dang smin ma sogs/ /gtsub shing gis ni gtsubs snyam byed/ /de yang bag med yal bar bor/ /gdung bas

bcom gyur nad de yis/ /sna tshogs tshul ni 'byung 'gyur zhing / /mig mthong nyams byed rma 'byung 'gyur/ /mur 'gram kha dang mjing pa las/ /rlung ni gzhan du 'jug 'gyur zhing / /mi bzad na la gnag pa dang / /dmar zhing skrangs la mig mi sdug /zhum zhing kun nas

mchi ma 'dzag /de ni rlung gis gzhan gyur yin/ /de bzhin mig ni yon po dang / /chung ba rlung gis phyin ci log /mkhris pa'i mchi 'dzag mtshan ma ni/ /tsha grang du ba 'byung snyam sems/ /mig chu'i phyi rol gnag pa dang / /nang na rnag 'drul mchi ma tsha/ /ser zhing mig dmar

ser por mthong / /rma la lan tshwas btab snyam sems/ /me mdag gtor ba 'dra ba dang / /mcher pa'i gong bu lta bur snang / /mig nad gdung bar gyur pa yin/ /bad kan las gyur mchi 'dzag ni/ /tshor ba med skrangs rab tu g.ya'/ /gsher zhing snum la

shas cher dkar/ /mig gdung spyi bag 'dzag pa yin/ /gdung ba des ni nag po dma'/ /'bras bu dkar po mtho ba dang / /cham pas thebs shing sna rgyas la/ /mig ni rdul gyis gang snyam byed/ /khrag gyur dmar ris mig tu dmar/ /mig 'bras dkar po dmar ba dang / /

khrag 'dzag dmar po mthong ba dang / /mkhris pa'i mchi 'dzag mtshan nyid yin/ /gdung ba mig ni mtha' dmar zhing / /phyung ba dang ni mtshungs par na/ /me tog ban du ka ltar dmar/ /shin tu na zhing reg mi bzod/ /lung tang khrag tu nub pa 'dra/ /gnag cing me ltar snang ba

yin/ /gdung ba rang gi ji bzhin du/ /thams cad 'dzag pa las lhag na/ /mur 'gram so dang mkhur tshos dang / /mgo bo lhag par na bar byed/ /rlung mkhris shas cher drud snyam sems/ /zug cing na la phul snyam sems/ /shin tu rtsub cing mig mchu mig /'dzums

dang 'byed par dka' ba dang / /na zhing skams par gyur pa dang / /grang 'dod smin zhing skam dang bcas/ /mig skam smin pa zhes bya'o/ /nad gzhi gsum ni khrag bcas la/ /skrang 'gyur de ni rab skrangs shing / /na dang tsha dang 'dzag dang bcas/ /u dum bA ra'i 'bras smin 'dra/ /

mig 'bras dkar por 'byung bar 'gyur/ /mchi ma grang zhing dro ba dang / /spyi bag ska sla res kyis 'byung / /skrangs chung cung zad skrang zhes bya/ /de bzhin mtshan nyid gzhan gyis smin/ /mig smin pas nyen skrang ba yi/ /rtsom che mchi ma rnyog can 'dzag /bad kan gyis bsgos

mig 'bras ni/ /dkar po dmar zhing 'drul ba dang / /tsha zhing mthong ba nyams pa dang / /nad ni mal na mi gnas yin/ khrag mkhris shas che'i nad kyis ni// zas kyi dngas ma skyur por 'gyur/ /mig gi rtsar ni song nas ni/ /mig ni dmar por byed par 'gyur/ /skrang tsha

smin zhing mchi ma 'dzag /shin tu lang long por mthong na/ /skyur gyis bskyed pa'i nad ces bya/ /de ltar kun gtogs nad bcu drug /de la gdung bas bcom pa ni/ /mig smin bcas pa spang bar bya/ /rlung gyur zhag lngas mig la gnod par byed/ /bad kan las gyur gdung

bas zhag bdun gyis/ /de bzhin khrag gyur zhag gsum gyis 'joms byed/ /mkhris gyur 'phral du log spyod kyis gnod byed/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u bco lnga pa'o// //de nas mig nad thams cad gso ba

bshad par bya'o/ /mchi 'dzag sngar byung tshul nyid la/ /mkhur bkang sna sman rnon po gtang / /rlung 'khrugs ma gtogs nad gzhan la/ /smyung ba dag kyang bya ba yin/ /tsha dang dmar dang gos pa dang / /skrang sogs zhi phyir kun la ni/ /sug smel gan+d+ha b+ha dra dang / /na le

sham dang btsag yug snam/ /lde gur byas pas bsku bar bya/ /rlung gyur rgyam tsha skyer khaN+Da/ /shing mngar rgya spos tsan+dan nam/ /rgyam tsha dong gra skyer khaN+Da/ /mar gyi nying khu bdar ba'am/ /yang na seng phrom sbyar ba gtang / /khrag mkhris gyur la spang spos dang / /shug pa

shing mngar ra mnye ba/ /bad kan las gyur pri yang+ku/ /ldong ros sbrang rtsi sbyar bas bsku/ /'dus pa las gyur kun gyis bsku/ /na le sham ni dkar po cha gcig dang / /ldong ros cha bzhi seng phrom cha bcu drug /zhib tu btags te ras gtsang phur mas gtums/ /nad ldang

mod la mig tu gdab par bya/ /rgya sran nag po ba lci ra'i ril khu/ /legs btsos sen mos shun pa bshus gyur pa/ /de yis mtshan mo lan cig bskus pa yis/ /mig nad 'khrugs pa myur du zhi bar byed/ /shu ti shing mngar spangs ma a ru ra/ /zhib btags ras kyi thum po lhod

par bcing / /zangs kyi snod du skyur rtsabs nang du bcug /mig tu bzhag na mig nad sna tshogs sel/ /skyer pa srang gcig chu bre phyed du yang / /khu ba brgyad cha lus par sbrang rtsi btab/ /de bzhin mig tu bskus par gyur na ni/ /nad gzhi thams cad 'khrugs pa'i mig nad sel/ /

shi kru'i lo ma'i khu ba sbrang rtsir bcas/ /mig tu blugs na rlung dang mkhris pa dang / /bad kan 'dus pa las gyur mig nad rnams/ /mig nad mang po dag kyang myur du sel/ /e raN+Da ni gzhon nu'i lo ma dang / /rtsa ba brdungs te ra yi 'o mar bskol/ /blugs

sam zan dron mig tu glan pa yis/ /rlung gyur mchi 'dzag nad ni mod la 'joms/ /rlung gyur ba la bil ba stsogs/ /bskol ba'i sman thigs blugs pa'am/ /e raN+Da'i rtsa bri ha ti/ /ma du shi kru dro 'jam blugs/ /sha rang gaSh+Ta ba la ka /rgya spos u dum wA ra'i shun/ /chu dang

'o ma bcas bskol ba'i/ /thigs blugs gzer ni sel mchog yin/ /btsong dang skyer pa rgya skyegs dang / /rgun 'brum ut+pal shing mngar gnyis/ /bskol te bsgrangs par khar gdab/ /mig blugs khrag mkhris mig nad sel/ /shing mngar ka she ru'i phye ma/ /ras ma 'jam

pos lhod par bcing / /char chu'i nang du sbangs pa ni/ /khrag mkhris las gyur mchi 'dzag sel/ /shing mngar skyer pa stag tsher ba/ /thum po nu zho kha rar bcas/ /ra yi 'o mar sbangs pa blugs/ /tsha na mdog dmar mchi 'dzag sel/ /seng phrom dkar po shing mngar bcas/ /mar

brngos legs par btags pa ni/ /ras la gtums te nu zhor mnye/ /khrag mkhris snad pa'i mig nad sel/ /dong gra nim pa 'bras bu gsum/ /seng phrom ba sha ka'i khu ba/ /dro 'jam blugs pas bad kan sel/ /'dus par 'di dag bsres pas phan/ /rlung la mar

ni rnying pa dang / /mkhris par kha rar bcas pa dang / /bad kan la ni tsha ba gsum/ /bskol dang thal sman bcas pa blud/ /de 'og khrag kyang dbyung ba dang / /de nas snum gyur bkru sman gtang / /dro bas tsha ste gzer ba la/ /skam sa'i srog chags sha btags pas/ /

mgo dang gdong bsku tsha ba la/ /'o ma mar bcas grang mos bsku/ /rab rib gso ba'i cho ga yang / /brtags te ji bzhin gso bar bya/ /cho ga 'di dag thams cad ni/ /gdung ba la sogs rnams la phan/ /gdung ba yong ye ma zhi na/ /smin ma'i steng du me btsa' gdab/ /

ba zho snum med kyis dngul snod/ /byugs te sngon por gyur pa dang / /skams nas zho ga chu ri lur/ /byas pas rlung gyur mig nad 'joms/ /dzA ti'i me tog kha 'bus dung / /shing mngar ba la 'bras bu gsum/ /char chu dang btags ri lur byas/ /khrag mkhris las

gyur mig nad sel/ /rgyam tsha 'bras bu tsha ba gsum/ /rgya mtsho'i lbu ba dung snying po/ /e la ba lu sra rtsi pog /ri lus bad kan mig nad sel/ /shing mngar pra puN+Da rI ka /skyer pa srang ni brgyad brgyad dag /chu bre bcu drug nang bskol btsags/ /slar bskol ska bar

gyur pa ni/ /ra gan dud pa srang bcu dang / /na le sham phye zho gnyis gzhug /de la ri lu'am phye mar byas/ /bskus na mchi 'dzag thams cad dang / /dmar na drud pa byed snyam 'joms/ /'phral du mig ni gsal bar byed/ /sbyor 'di phyug bdag ces bya ste/ /sman

pa rnams kyi gsang ba mchog /mig smin skam pa mar blud cing / /'tsho byed kyi ni sman mar ni/ /blud cing mig ni brta bya dang / /til mar chung ngu'i sna sman gtang / /'di la 'o ma rgyam tshar bcas/ /dro 'jam thigs pa blugs pa'ang phan/ /bca' sga bud med nu zhor

btags/ /mar sbyar mig tu bskus na'ang phan/ /yang na rlan can sha yi zhag /dong gra rgyam tsha cung zad btab/ /skra ni mar bskus me long gis/ /mnyes te kham phor kha sbyar bcug /bsregs te lcags snod mar dang bcas/ /snag tsha de ni mig sman mchog /skrang

bcas cung zad skrangs pa la/ /snum chos byas te gtar ga gdab/ /snum byas rgun 'brum a ru ra/ /dur byid mar bcas bkru sman gtang / /seng phrom dkar po mar la brngos/ /phye mar byas te ras la gtums/ /chu dron la mnyes thigs pa blugs/ /gzer 'joms

pa yi mchog yin no/ /skyer pa pra puN+Da rI ka /bskol ba'i thigs pa blugs pas phan/ /mchi 'dzag na zhing drud snyam byed/ /sbyar sman 'di dag gtang bar bya/ /lcags kyi snod du zangs ma ba gcin sbyar/ /mar bdug mig bskus gzer ni 'joms par byed/ /

zangs ma'i snod du ba zho'i spris ma bdar/ /rgyam tsha pi pi ling dang bcas pa mchog /zangs ma'i snod du nu zho dung bdar la/ /dong ga'i lo ma mar bcas dud pas bdug /sbyar sman zhes bya mig tu bskus na ni/ /drud snyam byed sogs mi bzad nad myur

sel/ /u dum wA ra'i 'bras bu ni/ /lcags snod nang du nu zho bdar/ /sha ma'i lo ma mar dud bdug /mchi 'dzag gzer dmar drud pa 'joms/ /shi kru'i lo ma'i khu ba ni/ /zangs ma gnyis kyi bar du bdar/ /mar dud bdugs pas skrangs pa dang / /g.ya' dang mchi

'dzag nad rnams 'joms/ /til gyi chu dang khar ba ni/ /kham phor bdar te nim pa yi/ /'o ma mar bskol dud pas bdug /gzer ram mchi 'dzag drud snyam sel/ /sbyar sman gyis ni mig bskus te/ /sman shugs zug gzer dang bral nas/ /bud med nu zho'i thigs

pa blugs/ /lan gsum phan chad de mi bsku/ /bal bu'i lo ma pi pi ling / /rgya spos lcags phye stang zil dang / /dzA ti kha 'bus nag tshur dang / /rgyam tsha ba gcin btags pa yi/ /lde gus zangs kyi snod bskus la/ /zhag bdun bzhag ste ba gcin dang / /btags

te ri lur byas nas ni/ /de 'og grib ma la bskams te/ /bud med nu zho dang bdar bsku/ /drud snyam byed dang mchi ma 'dzag /skrang dang g.ya' ba sel bar byed/ /kaN+Da ka ri'i shun pa dang / /shing mngar zangs ma'i phye ma ni/ /ra yi 'o mas lde gur byas/ /sha mi

skyu ru ra'i lo ma/ /mar gyis bskus pa'i dud pas bdug /bskus na skrangs dang gzer nad sel/ /skyur gyis bskyed la mkhris pa yi/ /mchi ma 'dzag pa'i cho gas gso/ /bad kan khrag mkhris kyis bskyed dang / /'dus pas bskyed dang sgra ngan dang / /rdzi ma 'gags dang

mig smin skam/ /rnag gi chu ser pad+ma'i rtsa/ /mig mchu'i sha dang skyur skyed cung / /mchi 'dzag gdung ba rlung ma gtogs/ /bcwa brgyad po dag chag par bshad/ /yun ring du ni na ba yin/ /'di dag gso ba so so yi/ /le'u'i nang du bshad pa yin/ /de'i 'og mig tshag

spyi yi bshad/ /de nas mig tshag nad pa ni/ /snum chos slon ni byas nas kyang / /gtar ga gdab ste khrag dbyung bya/ /bkru sman btang zhing mig chu ni/ /dag par gyur gyi bar du bzhar/ /spangs ma srang gcig na le sham/ /dkar po srang ni nyi shu dang / /skyur rtsabs srang ni

sum cu dag /btags te zangs ma'i snod du gzhug /lo mang lon pa'i mig tshag pa'am/ /chu ser 'dzag sogs zhi bar byed/ /gos dang tsha dang mchi ma 'dzag /g.ya' skrangs de blugs pa yis sel/ /bye'u rug ka rany+dza'i sa bon/ /dzA ti'i me tog kha 'bus pa/ /

brdungs te bskol la btsags nas ni/ /khu bar byas pa de dang ni/ /stang zil dang sbyar mig sman ni/ /mig tshag g.ya' dang chu ser 'dzag /g.ya' zhing 'drul ba sel mchog yin/ /skyer pa'i khaN+Da sra rtsi pog /ra gan dud pa ldong ros dang / /rgya mtsho'i lbu ba

rgyam tsha dang / /na le sham dang btsag yug snam/ /sbrang rtsi btags pa'i mig sman ni/ /mig tshag 'drul g.ya' sel bar byed/ /rgya spos a ru ra'i khu bar/ /dngul rdo btags pas mig tshag sel/ /thang shing snum dang bcas pa ni/ /ra gcin nang du sbangs pa'ang

phan/ /rgyam tsha 'bras gsum pi pi ling / /dung gi snying po pu tse shel/ /zangs ma'i phye ma bcas ri lu/ /mig tshag ling tog sel bar byed/ /yang na nag tshur phye ma ni/ /bye'u rug pa'i khu bar sbangs/ /zangs ma'i snod du zhag bcu bzhag /de yis mig tshag chu ser 'dzag /

rdzi ma 'byi ba sel bar byed/ /ldong ros dang ni skyer pa'i khaN+Da dang / /de mnyam zangs ma'i phye ma zhib tu btags/ /phye ma mig sman thur ma gcig gis kyang / /rdzi ma bskyed cing mig tshag 'dis sel byed/ /rgya skyegs bring ga skyer pa ni rgun+thi/ /khu bar ras kyi dum bu lan

bdun sbangs/ /sdong bu mar me de bus las byung ba'i/ /snag tsha mig tshag sel bar byed mchog yin/ /mig mchu mang du zhal zhal bya/ /de bzhin gtar ga bya ba dang / /bkru sman yang yang bya ba ni/ /mig tshag can gyi nad pas bsten/ /rnag gi chu 'dzag ma zhi'i mthar/ /thur

ma phra mos bsreg par bya/ /de ltar mig nad dgu bcu bzhi/ /nad gzhi mtshan nyid gso ba dag /phan tshun 'dres pa med par ni/ /ma lus par ni bshad pa yin/ /skyes bu nad med pa yis kyang / /nas dang gro rnying drug cu pa/ /sA lu khre rgod rnyid pa

dang / /mung+ga la sogs bad mkhris 'joms/ /zhun mar mang du btab pa dang / /tshod ma de 'dra skam sa yi/ /sha dang se 'bru kha ra dkar/ /bsten zhing char chu btung ba dang / /gdugs bcang lham ni bgo ba dang / /cho ga bzhin du nad sbyang ba/ /rnam pa kun tu bsten par bya/ /

shugs bkag pa dang ma zhur za/ /phyed zhu za dang rtug 'gags za/ /tsha dang phyi sa 'gags byed pa'i/ /zas dang spyod lam sman kun spang / /rkang pa gnyis kyi dbus na rtsa sbom po/ /gnyis gnas de yis mig ni nang du khyab/ /de bskus byug dang dril ba la sogs

pa/ /rkang par byas na mig tu 'gro bar 'gyur/ /dri ma tsha dang snad pa la sogs pas/ /de gnod gyur na mig la gnod par 'gyur/ /de bas mig la phan 'dod lham dang ni/ /bsku dang dril dang byug pa sogs bsten bya/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ phyi

ma'i gnas kyi le'u bcu drug pa'o// //de nas rna ba'i nad kyi dmigs shes pa bshad par bya'o/ /cham pas btab dang chu la rtse/ /rna ba brud pas rlung 'khrugs shing / /sgra yi log pa'i sbyor ba dang / /ldang ba'i rgyu gzhan gyis 'khrugs nas/ /rna ba'i rtsar ni rlung zhugs te/ /rna ba'i bu gar

shugs drag gzer/ /gzhogs phyed na zhing rengs pa dang / /grang ba dag ni mi 'phrod cing / /ring nas rnags shing smin nas kyang / /chu ser cung zad 'dzag par byed/ /rgyu med rna ba stong snyam sems/ /zhum dang rgyas pa snyam du byed/ /mkhris gyur tsha bcas na zhing gzer/ /

grang 'dod skrang zhing rims kyis 'debs/ /myur du smin zhing smin nas kyang / /chu ser ser por 'dzag par byed/ /chu ser des ni gang gang du/ /reg pa de dang der rnags 'gyur/ /bad kan las gyur mgo 'gram pa/ /mgrin pa lci zhing nad shugs dal/ /g.ya' zhing

grang la dro ba 'dod/ /smin nas rnag dkar ska ba 'dzag /snad la sogs pas gnod gyur pa/ /rna ba gzer bar byed par 'gyur/ /khrag dang mkhris pa ltar na dang / /mtshan nyid cung zad lhag pa yin/ /nad gzhi 'dus pas gzer ba dang / /skrangs bcas rims 'debs mi bzad

na/ /res kyis grang dang dro ba 'dod/ /'on pa lta bu nyid du 'gyur/ /smin nas rnag ni dkar dang nag /dmar dang ska ba 'dzag par 'gyur/ /sgra thos rtsar ni rlung zhugs pa/ /rgyu med par ni sna tshogs pa'i/ /sgra ni yang dang yang du thos/ /de ni rna ba'i sgra zhes bya/ /rlung ni bad kan

dang 'dres pa'i/ /rna sgra yal bar bor na ni/ /skad gsang mthon por smras pa thos/ /rim gyis 'on pa nyid du 'gyur/ /rlung gis bad kan bskams gyur pas/ /de la rna bar gos gyur na/ /na zhing lci la 'gags gyur pa/ /de ni rna ba 'gags zhes bshad/ /bad kan

las ni rna ba g.ya'/ /skrang sra de yi ming gis bshad/ /mkhris pas bad kan tshig gyur pa/ /nad bcas pa'am nad med kyang / /rnag ska 'dzag cing mang du 'drul/ /rna ba rnag can byed par 'gyur/ /rlung sogs pa yis rna ba'i sha /khrag la gnod gyur 'drul bar za/ /

srin bus bskyod cing mi bzad na/ /rna nad srin bu can zhes bya/ /rna ba phug pa'i rma las byung / /rma ni snga ma'i mtshan nyid can/ /khong 'bras 'gyur ba'am gzhan du'ang 'gyur/ /thor bu 'brum bu skrangs las 'byung / /de las rna ba rnags pa dang / /'on par byed pas gnod par

'gyur/ /mngal du rlung gis rna ba'i sha /zhum 'gyur 'khums pa zhes bya'o/ /mngal du sha mdzer sra na med/ /pi pi ling 'dra mang po'ang gcig /nad med pi pi ling zhes bya/ /'dus pa las gyur gas pa ni/ /mdog 'dra na zhing sra ba dang / /skrang 'gyur de ni ma gsos

na/ /smin nas nyungs mar lta bur ni/ /'dzag cing 'tsho ba dka' bar 'gyur/ /rma 'tsho bas kyang nges par ni/ /rna ba'i sha ni zhum par 'gyur/ /rtsa la gnas pa'i rlung gis ni/ /rna shal skam pa de ming can/ /rna shal pi wang rgyud ltar pra/ /sra ba rgyud can zhes bya'o/ /

gzhon sha can ni yun ring du/ /btang snyoms bor nas 'phral du bskyed/ /rna shal skrangs shing nad bcas la/ /dmar zhing 'byar bar gyur pa ni/ /de ni rlung gis 'byar zhes bya/ /gnod 'gyur rgyan lci khur sogs kyis/ /khrag dang mkhris pa 'khrugs

gyur pas/ /dmar zhing tshan smin pa dang / /skrang dang 'brum bu 'brum phran dang / /dmar zhing tshal rnags pa yin/ /rlung dang bad kan gyis rna shal/ /skrang zhing nad med sra ba dang / /brtan zhing mdog 'dra g.ya' ba dang / /de ni mnye ba zhes byar bshad/ /phug nyes rna ba brgyangs

pa las/ /g.ya' bcas tsha grang smin zhing na/ /'dus pa las gyur skrangs ba de/ /sdug bsngal 'phel byed ces bya'o/ /bad kan khrag gyur srin bu phra/ /g.ya' zhing gnag la rnag bcas pa/ /srin bu phra mos bldags zhes bya/ /de ma gsos na rna shal za/ /de las

'dus gyur pi pi ling / /gzer can gas 'khums gsor mi rung / /rgyud can gcig pu 'tsho ba tsam/ /lhag ma rnams ni gso bar bya/ /de ltar rna ba'i nad kyi ni/ /dbye ba nyi shu rtsa lngar bshad/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u

bcu bdun pa'o// //de nas rna ba'i nad gso ba bshad par bya'o/ /rlung las gyur pa'i rna nad la/ sha khu blud cing rlung 'joms pa'i/ /sman bskol mar ni mtshan mo blud/ /rna ba dugs byas de rjes la/ /a shwat+tha dang e raN+Da/ /bil ba arka'i lo ma

dang / /til mar rgyam tshar bcas pa dang / /phur ma btso ba byas pa yi/ /khu ba dro 'jam tsam mam ni/ /la phug gu gul rna ba dgang / /rlung 'joms sde tshan skyur rnams dang / /gcin gyi nang du snum chen ni/ /bskol ba de ni rna ba'i nad/ /mi bzad pa yang myur du sel/ /rtsa ba chen

po lnga yi shing / /gang yang rung ba gse mas dkri/ /til mar gyis bskus 'bar ba'i rtse/ /snum 'dzag 'phral du nad sel byed/ /de bzhin thang shing ru rta dang / /sgron shing las kyang de bzhin bya/ /rlung nad cham pa la bshad pa'i/ /gso bas 'dir yang phan pa yin/ /

mgo bo bkru dang chu grang btung / /nyin mo'ang yongs su spang bar bya/ /mkhris gyur kha ra dkar por bcas/ /mar gyis snum byas bkru sman gtang / /rgun 'brum shing mngar nu zho bskol/ /rna ba bkang ba'ang bsngags pa yin/ /shing mngar tsan+dan dUr ba dkar/ /pu shel

tse dang ra mnye ba/ /seng phrom pad+ma'i rtsa ba dang / /pad+ma'i sdong bu dzi ba ka//btsod dang thal tres bskol ba dang / /shing mngar khu ba bre gang dang / /'o ma bre do bcas pa dag /til mar phul gang bskol ba dang / /'di yis rnar blugs rna dgang bsku/ /yang na sbrang rtsi nyi tshes dgang / /
