gzer dang tsha dang na ba sel/ /shing mdang la sogs mar dang bcas/ /rna ba kun tu byugs na'ang phan/ /bad kan las gyur pi pi ling / /mar bskol snum gyur skyug tu gzhug /bad kan sel ba'i sna sman dang / /mkhur bkang dugs dang dud pa brngub/ /sgog skya sge'u

gsher shi kru dang / /la phug chu shing mu rang ga /bskol ba'i khu ba dam pa ni/ /dro 'jam rna bar blugs na'ang phan/ /arka'i myu gu skyur khur btags/ /til mar rgyam tshar bcas pa gang / /snu ha'i shing bu brus par ni/ /bcug la arka'i lo mas g.yogs/ /phur

ma btsos pa'i tshul du bsreg /de yi khu ba gzer 'joms mchog /ma du lung ga'am ka pid ta'i/ /khu bas bkang ba byas na'ang phan/ /yang na tshas bkang de rjes la/ /rgya mtsho'i lbu ba'i phye mas gdab/ /ra lug gcin dang 'od ma'i shun/ /til mar bskol bas

bkang na phan/ /yang na nyungs mar shing kun dang / /e raN dong gra bskol ba blugs/ /khrag gyur mkhris pa lta bur gso/ /gtar ga myur du gdab par bya/ /smin zhing rna ba khrag 'dzag la/ /dud pa mkhur bkang sna sman sbyar/ /sbu gu'i cho ga dag dang ni/ /rma red cho ga

gang yin bya/ /gos par ye'us dus gnyis su/ /rna ba phyi zhing dag par bya/ /gu gul dud pas bdugs nas kyang / /sbrang rtsi yis kyang dgang bar bya/ /bye'u rug khu ba bskol ba dang / /bu ram khu bas bskol ba yi/ /ras bal ye'u rab phras byug /de yi phye ma gdab

par bya/ /gzer dang rnags dang lci ba la/ /cho ga 'dis ni bzlog par bya/ /pri yang+ku dang am pash+tha/ /shing mngar dang ni da ta ki /ut+pa la yi lo ma dang / /btsod dang seng phrom rgya skyegs dang / /ka pid ta yi khu ba dang / /til mar bskol te de blugs

na/ /rnag 'dzag pa ni myur 'chad byed/ /sgra bcas 'on pa dag la ni/ /rlung gi gzer 'joms sman gtang bya/ /bad kan las gyur bad kan ni/ /slon sman sogs kyis dang bor bsal/ /e raN+Da dang shi kru dang / /la phug gzhon nu'i lo ma dang / /khu ba til mar bzhi

'gyur dang / /lo ma brgyad 'gyur bcas pa dang / /shing mngar ram nye ba'i lde gu/ /bcas par bskol ba rnar blugs dang / /bsku dang rna ba bkang ba yis/ /sgra bcas 'on dang gzer ba 'joms/ /shing kun bong nga dkar po dang / /shu ti skyer shun sa rdzi ka /til mar

tsha dang bcas bskol bas/ /bkang na gzer dang chu ser 'dzag /sgra bcas 'on pa sel bar byed/ /rna ba sgra dang bcas pa la/ /nyungs mar gyis ni bkang na phan/ /la phug skam pa'i dum bu yi/ /thal ba shing kun bca' sga dang / /shu ti ru rta shu dag dang / /thang shing shi kru

skyer khaN+Da/ /ya bak+Sha ra rtsabs ru tsha/ /rgyam tsha rngul tsha sardzi ka /stag pa'i tsher ma kha ru tsha/ /gla sgang rgun tsha bzhi 'gyur dang / /kha lung khu ba de dang 'dra/ /chu shing khu ba mnyam bskol ba'i/ /til mar bkang bas rna ba'i nad/ /g.ya' dang sgra bcas 'on pa dang / /rnag

'dzag gzer zhing srin bu can/ /shin tu gso dka' thal sman gyi/ /til mar gyis ni myur du 'joms/ /kha dang so yi nad la'ang phan/ /de nas tshor ba med pa la/ /nye ba la ni gtar ga gdab/ /skrang zhing rnags la thos pa ni/ /mi gsal gyur la skyug sman btang / /byis

pa rgan dang yun ring du/ /lon pa'i 'on pa spang bar bya/ /sgra bcas rnags par gyur pa la/ /snum dang dugs byas dag par bya/ /rna ba sbyangs nas de rjes la/ /rna ba sbyangs pa'i til mar dag /kha lung khu ba rgyam tsha dang / /tsha dang sbrang rtsir bcas pa'ang blugs/ /dag byas

rtsub par gyur na ni/ /mar gyi nying khus dgang bar bya/ /rim 'di rna spabs gang la'ang bya/ /g.ya' dang skrang la rna sman sogs/ /bad kan sel bar byed pa phan/ /skrang la tshwa dang dro bas byug /rna ba rnag 'dzag 'bu can la/ /rna ba chu 'dzag gso bar bya/ /mchog tu rna

nad srin can la/ /nyungs mar dron po blugs par bya/ /rna ba'i 'bras la khong 'bras kyi/ /gso ba dang ni skyug sman gtang / /snad pa'i khong 'bras gso ba ni/ /mkhris gyur rna gzer gso bar bya/ /'brum pa thor bu sna ltar bya/ /rna ba gas pa ma smin la/ /rna ba'i khong 'bras

ltar gso zhing / /nad gzhi ji bzhin las kyang bya/ /rna shal skam la rlung gzer ltar/ /rna sman bsku ba la sogs bya/ /dugs bya snyi bar gyur pa na/ /rna shal til mar bskus shing mnye/ /shing mngar pi la ya'i sa bon/ /a shwa gan+d+ha nas bcas bsku/ /de nas

rgyas byed snum gyis ni/ /bsku ba rtag tu bsten par bya/ /nye shing a shwa gan+d+ha dang / /e raN+Da dang pa ya s+ya/ /dzi ba ka dang 'o mar bcas/ /til mar bskol bas bsku ba ni/ /rna shal rgyas byed mchog yin no/ /'tsho byed sde tshan lde gu dang / /rlan can sha ni bskol ba

dag /rna shal 'phel zhing rgyas byed yin/ /rna shal rab zad bcad pas ni/ /lhag ma sbyar la gso zhing bskyed/ /de bzhin rgyud 'dra 'tsho tsam bya/ /'byor ba la yang cho ga 'di/ /gnod gyur bsil sman bsku ba dang / /srin bu pad pas khrag dbyung bya/ /'dzam bu a mra'i lo ma

dang / /ba la shing mngar seng phrom til/ /btsod dang ut+pal ka dam pa/ /thal tres til mar bcas pa dang / /skyur rtsa bas bcas par bskol ba 'di/ /til mar bsku bar bya ba dang / /me dbal skabs bshad mar gyis bsku/ /mnye ba go ta karka ta/ /zhag dang bcas pa'i

til mar dang / /ta la'i lo ma arka dang / /a shwa gan+d+ha bye'u rug pa/ /so ma ra dza 'bras bu dang / /rgyam tsha lang ka lir bcas bskol/ /til mar bsku bar bya ba dang / /rna sman rnon po gtang bar bya/ /dbug nyes pa la a sman ta/ /'dzam bu a mra'i lo ma ni/ /bskol ba'i

khu ba blugs par bya/ /rna shal til mar gyis bsku zhing / /shing mngar btsod dang stag tsher ba/ /yung ba'i phye ma zhib po gdab/ /rgya skyegs byi dang ga bskol ba'i/ /til mar gyis ni bskus na phan/ /srin bus zos la ba'i lci bas/ /

lan mang du ni dugs byas la/ /byi dang ga yi snying po ni/ /lug gi gcin sbyar lde gus bsku/ /dug mo nyung dang ing gu dang / /e raN+Da yi sa bon dang / /dong ga'i shun pa lde gus bsku/ /yang na de dag nim pa yi/ /lo ma na le sham dang bcas/ /sbrang rtsi'i lde gus rma la

bsku/ /rna ba chad la sbyang byas te/ /skyon med khrag dang de 'tsham pa'i/ /bcing ba dag gis sbyar bar bya/ /sbyar nas 'phral bcad sbyang bar bya/ /de nas skra mthar mdud byas te/ /rna shal bcad dang zhal zhal bya/ /bcad pa dang ni bsrung bar bya/ /mtshams ni mnyam

par sbyar bya zhing / /mthon dman med pa nyid du bya/ /zhun mar dang ni sbrang rtsis byug /ras bal gyis ni glan pa dang / /skud pas dam lhod ran par bcing / /rma yi khrag ni bcad pa yi/ /sman gyi phye mas gdab bya zhing / /spyod pa de la bsten par bya/ /zhag bdun

nas ni ma btses pa'i/ /til mar bskus la ras bal dgrol/ /legs 'byor spu skyes pa dang / /mtshams 'byor mnyam zhing brtan pa dang / /tshad ldan nad ni med pa dang / /rim gyis rna ba skyed par byed/ /nya lcibs kha sral phre'u dang / /pri ha ti 'bras ser po gnyis/ /

ba la ha ti pi pi ling / /a shwa gan+d+ha nyungs kar ser/ /ko sha ta ka'i rtsa ba dang / /ka ra bI ra ru shig /lo ma bdun pa bil ba la/ /sa nag sbrang ma'i gnas dang ni/ /bye'u chu skyes srin bu'i sha /de bzhin seng phrom sdong bu rnams/ /'di dag lde gu til mar bcas/ /ma he'i

mar dang glang po rta'i/ /gcin dang bcas par bskol ba ni/ /bskus na rna ba 'phel byed mchog /de nas na tshod ldan pa yi/ /sbyang ba byas nas rna chad gso/ /sna dang mnyam pa'i sha lpags ni/ /mkhur tshos las ni bcad nas kyang / /rna dang nye ba'i sha lpags ni/ /srab mo

nyid du bzhar bar bya/ /de nas ras bal bcas pa yi/ /khab kyis mkhur ba btsem par bya/ /sna bcad mtshon gyis bzhar nas ni/ /mkhur tshos las bcad pags pa yis/ /sna ni lags mor btsem par bya/ /kha yi dbugs ni dbyung ba'i phyir/ /snar ni sbu gu can

gzhug bya/ /de rjes til mar slon par bsku/ /rma ni sbrang rtsir sbyar bas bsku/ /khrag bcad pa yi sman gzhan yang / /zhib tu btags pa'i phye mas gdab/ /de nas mar dang sbrang rtsis bsku/ /bcings la spyod pa bstan par bya/ /de nas gnas skabs shes byas nas/ /

rma gsar gso ba'i cho ga bya/ /rma 'byor sna yi nye 'khor gyi/ /sha lhag legs par gcad par bya/ /de nas shin tu zhib tu btsem/ /dma' ba dag kyang bskyed par bya/ /bcad ma thag la ci rigs par/ /bzhag ste cho ga 'di nyid bya/ /mchu bcad pa la sbu gu dag /ma gtogs

sna sbyar bzhin du bya/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u bco brgyad pa'o// //de nas sna nad kyi dmigs shes pa bshad par bya'o/ /ba mo rlung dang rdul dang ni/ /smra drags gnyid log gnyid yar drags/ /sngas ni mtho dang

dma' drags dang / /chu gzhan 'thungs par gyur pa dang / /chu mang 'thungs dang nyal po dang / /skyugs dang mchi ma bkag pa yis/ /rlung shas che ba'i nad 'khrugs nas/ /sna ni sra ba nyid 'gyur zhing / /cham pa skyed par byed pa yin/ /'phel na zad pa skyed par byed/ /de la rlung

gyur cham pa ni/ /kha skam sbrid pa drag tu 'byung / /sna 'gags zug cing na ba dang / /mur 'gram so dang klad pa dang / /smin ma nas ni sna rtse'i bar/ /srin bu rgyu ba snyam du sems/ /skad 'gags ring nas smin pa dang / /mchil snabs grang bar 'dzag pa yin/ /mkhris gyur

skom dad rims kyis 'debs/ /mgo 'khor sna nang 'brum pa 'byung / /sna rtse gnag cing dro la rtsub/ /mchil snabs dmar ser 'dzag pa yin/ /bad kan lud pa dbugs mi bde/ /slon zhing lus lci yi ga 'chus/ /kha mngar bro zhing g.ya' ba dang / /mchil snabs snum

dkar ska ba 'dzag /'dus gyur mtshan nyid kun dang ldan/ /rgyu med 'phel dang 'grib par byed/ /nad khrag sna yi rtsar zhugs nas/ /cham pas 'debs par byed 'gyur ba/ /brang na tshor ba med pa dang / /mig dmar dbugs kyi dri mi zhim/ /mig dang rna ba

sna g.ya' zhing / /'di ni mkhris gyur mtshan nyid ldan/ /cham pa thams cad ma gsos na/ /gnod pa mi bzad skyed byed 'gyur/ /ji skad bshad pa'i bla brnan ni/ /'phel bas dbang po kun gnod byed/ /me drod nyams nyes dbugs mi bde/ /lud pa brang dang rtsib logs zug /

glo bur du ni shas cher 'khrugs/ /kha dri nga zhing skam par byed/ /sna nang 'drul zhing skam pa dang / /yang yang sna 'gags dag par byed/ /snabs ni rnag 'dra dkar zhing dmar/ /dud pa can ni 'dzag par 'gyur/ /'di la srin bu snum zhing ring / /dkar zhing phra ba 'byung bar

bshad/ /de smin mtshan ma lus yang zhing / /sbrid pa zhi bar gyur pa dang / /snabs ni sbyin zhing ser ba dang / /dri dang ro ni tshor ba yin/ /snar ni rnon po brngubs pa dang / /nyi 'od skud pa rtsa sogs dang / /rlung 'khrugs byed pa gzhan gyis kyang / /sna yi mtshul par zhugs gyur

pas/ /bskyod de rlung ni 'khrugs gyur pa/ /sum mdor zhugs 'gyur 'gags nas ni/ /ldog nas mi bzad sbrid pa ni/ /snabs 'dzag bcas par skyed par byed/ /sna yi bu ga skam byed cing / /rlung gis bad kan skyed par byed/ /sna nang gra mas gang snyam sems/ /dbugs

'byung dka' bar gyur pa de/ /sna skams pa zhes bya bar bshad/ /sna rgyas pa ni 'byung 'gyur ba/ /sna ni bkag pa 'drar sems shing / /rlung gis 'gag par byed par 'gyur/ /dbugs 'byung dbugs rngub 'gags pa las/ /bu ga gdangs pa lta bu yin/ /mkhris pas sna

khung rnags gyur pa/ /sha lpags tsha zhing gzer dang bcas/ /de ni sna yi shu bar bshad/ /bad kan las gyur chu ser ni/ /chu 'dra rgyun du 'dzag pa dang / /mchog tu mtshan 'dzag de ming can/ /bad kan 'phel bas sna khung du/ /bu ga 'gags shing cham pa skyed/ /dbugs

ni ngar ngar por 'byin zhing / /cham pa las kyang nad tshabs che/ /sna las lug ltar rnag 'dzag cing / /rgyun du sbyin bag ser po dang / /smin ma'i rnag ni 'dzag 'gyur zhing / /de yi sna ni snabs bcas yin/ /khrag gi sna ni tshig snyam sems/ /phyi dang nang du reg mi bzod/ /du

ba lta bu'i dbugs 'byin pa/ /bsregs 'dra de ni 'bar ba yin/ /rkan gyi phugs su nad 'khrugs pas/ /rlung ni kha dang sna nas 'byung / /mchil snabs dri nga 'byung 'gyur ba/ /de ni sna nad rul pa yin/ /'dus pa'am snad pa las gyur pa'i/ /rnag dang khrag ni sna nas 'dzag /

mgo bo tsha zhing na byed pa/ /de ni rnag khrag can zhes bshad/ /rlung gis mkhris pa bad kan dag /sna ni skams par gyur pa las/ /bad kan skams te gong por gyur/ /de ni bsgongs pa zhes bya'o/ /'brum bu thor bu nad gzhi yi/ /mtshan nyid ci 'dra dag las dbye/ /kun

las dbugs 'byung dka' ba dang / /rgyun du chu 'dzag sbrid pa 'byung / /sna 'gags lta bur smra ba dang / /sna nas rnag 'dzag klad pa na/ /de ltar rnam pa bco brgyad las/ /cham pa ma rungs 'tsho ba tsam/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u

bcu dgu ba'o// //de nas sna nad gso ba bshad par bya'o/ /sna nad kun las dang por ni/ /rlung med khang par 'dug nas ni/ /snum chos dugs dang skyug sman dang / /dud pa brngub dang mkhur bkang bsten/ /gos ni lci zhing dro ba bgo /mgo bo shin tu mthug pas dkri/

kha zas yang skyur lan tshwa snum/ /dro ba dang ni bska ba bza'/ /bu ram 'o ma skam sa'i sha /lan tshwa tsha ba gsum shas che/ /nas dang gro ni mang po dang / /zho dang se 'bru'i khu ba bsten/ /la phug gzhon nu'i khu ba dang / /ku lang+tha yi khu ba'ang bsngags/ /rtsa bcu'i khu ba dro 'jam

mam/ /chang snying dngas ma blud par bya/ /tsa rong ag+ni man+tha dang / /shu dag zi ra go snyod snom/ /bal bu'i lo ma tsha ba gsum/ /dbyi mo da trig star bu dang / /zir tsi tra srang gnyis gnyis/ /shing tsha gan+d+ha b+ha da dang / /sug smel zho ni gnyis gnyis dang / /bu ram rnying pa srang

lnga bcu/ /bskol te ri lur byas pa ni/ /zos na cham pa dbugs mi bde/ /lud pa lu ba 'joms byed cing / /skad snyan yi ga 'byed mchog yin/ /shu ti'i shun pa ba la dang / /so na ka dang e raN+Da/ /bil ba'i rtsa ba dong grar bcas/ /zhag mar spra tshil

dud pa brngub/ /yang na phye dang mar dang bcas/ /kham phor sbyar ba'i nang du bcug /bsregs pa'i dud pa brngub par bya/ /khrus dang mya ngan khro ba dang / /shas cher gnyid log chu grang spang / /rlung gyur cham pa rlung 'joms pa'i/ /sman ni bskol ba'i khu ba'am/ /lan tshwa lnga ni bskol

ba'am/ /bi da ri sogs sde bskol blud/ /dugs dang sna sman la sogs bya/ /gzhogs byed nar bshad gso ba'ang bya/ /khrag mkhris las gyur thug pa ni/ /mar sar mngar ba'i sman bskol blud/ /sman chu blugs shing byug pa dang / /nus bsil grang mo dag gis

bya/ /da ba'i shun pa 'bras bu gsum/ /shi ri par+Ni pri yad+ku/ /shing mngar seng phrom til mar gyi/ /bcu 'gyur 'o ma skyer bar bcas/ /bskol ba'i sna sman gtang bar bya/ /bad kan las gyur smyung ba dang / /yungs kar lde gus mgo bsku'am/ /thal sman bcas pa'i

mar blud de/ /slon gzhug rgyam tsha tsha ba gsum/ /byi dong ga dang dug mo nyung / /zi ra ra gcin sbyar ba yi/ /sna sman dag ni gtong bar bya/ /'dus gyur tsha dang rno sbyar ba'i/ /mar gyi sna sman blugs pas gso/ /gcong chen srin gso'i rim gyis ni/ /cham pa ma rung 'tsho tsam

bya/ /tsha ba gsum dang e raN+Da/ /thang shing ru rta byi dong ga /bong nga dkar po ing gu dang / /dur byid par ta ka'i sa bon/ /nyungs kar nye'u 'phral rus pa dang / /ag+hi man+d+ra'i me tog dang / /pi lu shi kru'i sa bon dang / /rta sbangs khu ba gcin dang ni/ /glang po'i gcin dang gcig tu

sbyar/ /zar ma'i skud dkris reng bu yi/ /dud pa kha dang sna nas brngub/ /smin dang sbrid pa 'byung zhes pa/ /sna sman rnon po bud pas phan/ /bca' sga ru rta pi pi ling / /rgun 'brum byi dong ga'i lde gu/ /mar ram til mar bcas bskol ba'i/ /sna sman sbrid pa rnags pa sel/ /

sna skams pa la ba la'i mar/ /btung sogs sha khur sbyar ba bza'/ /snum gyi dud pa dugs kyis gso/ /sna rgyas la yang cho ga 'di'o/ /sna rnags 'bar la mkhris 'joms sman/ /chu 'dzag sna sman sogs rnos bya/ /rnags can la ni bad kan gyi/ /gso ba dang ni 'dra bar

bya/ /rgya skyegs dang ni karany+dza/ /na le sham dang byi dang ga /shing kun bu ram pi pi ling / /lug thug gcin sbyar sna sman ni/ /slon byas 'og tu gtang bar bya/ /shi kru dan+da bri ha ti/ /tsha ba gsum dang lce myang tsha/ /bye'u rug pha dang byi dang ga/ /til mar bskol ba'i sna sman yang / /

btang na mchog tu phan pa yi/ /rnag dang khrag can sar pa ni/ /khrag gi cham pa lta bur gso/ /shin tu 'phel la rma 'khyims ltar/ /'brum bu rmen bu tsha ba la/ /dan ti dur byid lce myang tsha/ /ldong ros dang ni bi pi ling / /tsi tra ka yi lde gu ni/ /mar dang sbrang rtsir sbyar ba yi/ /

reng bu snar ni gzhug par bya/ /shi kru la sogs sna sman yang / /rnag can gso ba'i skabs su bshad/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu pa'o// //de nas kha nad kyi dmigs shes pa bshad par bya'o/ /nya dang ma

he phag gi ni/ /sha dang la phug rjen pa dang / /ma sha'i sran tshod 'o ma zho/ /cha dang bu ram shing kun dang / /'brum phran kha sbubs nyal bsten dang / /so shing gis snad goms pa spong / /dud ba mkhur bkang skyugs pa dang / /gtar ga dbug ni nyes pa yi/ /bad kan

shas che'i nad 'khrugs pas/ /kha yi nang gi nad skyed 'gyur/ /de la rlung gis mchu gas 'gyur/ /mchu ral ba yi nad ces bshad/ /rlung gis mchu la gnod gyur pa/ /mchu sra nad tshabs che ba yin/ /mchu gas rdol bar 'gyur ba dang / /gnag cing rtsub pa mchu 'khrugs

yin/ /mkhris pa tsha ba mi bzod ser/ /'brum phran nyungs kar 'dra bas khyab/ /myur smin mang du rnags pa yin/ /bad kan las gyur grang ba yis/ /mi bzod lci zhing skrang ba dang / /'brum phran dkar pos khyab pa yin/ /'dus gyur sna tshogs par snang zhing / /dri nga'i spyi bag

'dzag pa dang / /glo bur shas cher skrang zhing zhum/ /na dang min rnag mi snyoms/ /khrag las gyur pa khrag 'dzag cing / /khrag gi mdog dang 'dra ba dang / /'di la 'bra go lta bu yi/ /khrag zad chu bur 'byung ba yin/ /sha gyur sha yi gong po 'dra/ /

rim gyis srin bu skye zhing 'gul/ /tshil gyur g.ya' zhing 'drul ba dang / /skrang 'jam til mar lta bur 'dzag /snad pa las gyur gas pa dang / /yang dang yang du 'bye 'gyur la/ /slar yang 'drub par 'gyur ba dang / /mchu ni g.ya' bar byed pa yin/ /rlung dang bad kan 'dres

pa las/ /chu yi chu bur lta bur 'byung / /mkhur ba'i 'bras 'byed skrang zhing brtan/ /mkhur ba tsha zhing rims dang bcas/ /rlung gyur so nad dro la sred/ /grang bas reg na lhag par na/ /gzer zhing bcag pa snyam du sems/ /grang bas zhig pa de bshad do/ /rlung dang chu

yis so brtse pa/ /grang dang skyur ba mi bzod par/ /skyur ba zos pa nyid kyis 'gyur/ /nad bcas 'gul bar byed pa yin/ /so gas so ni zegs pa dang / /na zhing zug la g.yo ba yin/ /so 'gul so ni g.yo ba dang / /za ba'i tshe na lhag par na/ /so sto so ni mi

sdug par/ /so rnams skye bar 'gyur ba yin/ /so lhag so ni skyes pa ste/ /de ni 'phel ba zhes kyang bshad/ /skye bar 'gyur ba'i tshe na ni/ /na zhing skyes nas de zhi byed/ /ma bkrus so yi dri ma'am/ /bad kan rlung gis skams pa las/ /dri nga brtan gyur so dreg yin/ /

de ni yal bar bor ba las/ /so ni dum bur zegs gyur pa/ /grugs shing so ni gogs pa yin/ /khrag dang mkhris pa rlung gis so/ /sngon por gyur pa so sngon yin/ /nad kyi rlung ni shas cher 'gyur/ /rtsa bar bcas pa'i so la brtan/ /so dbus skams te stong par byas/

so ni zas kyi dri mas gang / /rul bas srin bu phra mo ni/ /skye bar 'gyur te de 'og tu/ /rgyu med brnag dka' ldang dub can/ /sbom che gnag la shas cher na/ /bcad pa 'drar snang rnag khrag 'dzag /de ni so srin can zhes bya/ /bad kan dang ni khrag gis rnyil/ /rnags

shing rul bar 'gyur ba dang / /mnyen la zags shing gnag pa de/ /grang bas nyen pa yin par bshad/ /khrag mkhris rnags pa las byung ba/ /rnyil ni tsha bar byed pa dang / /khrag gis skrangs pa mtho ba dang / /g.ya' zhing khrag ni 'dzag pa dang / /khrag chad nas ni rgyas

par 'gyur/ /so na 'gul zhing nad tshabs chung / /kha dri mnam gyur nyer bdar yin/ /so ni gnyis sam gsum thad kar/ /bad kan las gyur rgya shug tsam/ /skrangs pa sra zhing mi bzad na/ /myur du smin pa so 'bur yin/ /rnyil ni nad bcas khrag gis ni/ /phyi dang nang

du skrang zhing lci/ /na zhing tsha la gas pa las/ /rnag khrag 'dzag so'i khong 'bras yin/ /so rtsar khrag mkhris las gyur nad/ /skrang zhing nad dang bcas pa dang / /kha chu 'dzag cing rnyil 'drul ba/ /khong stong gi ni nad ces bya/ /'dus pa las gyur rims dang bcas/ /

rnag dang bcas pa'i khrag 'dzag la/ /so yi sprel mtshams zhig pa ni/ /khong stong chen po zhes bshad do/ /bad kan gyis ni so yi mthar/ /sha mdzer ltar skrang 'gram pa dang / /rna ba na byed spyod lam nyams/ /de ni sha lhag ces byar bshad/ /rnyil ni bdar bar 'gyur pa

las/ /nad tshabs chen por 'byung 'gyur zhing / /gang zhig so ni 'gul gyur pa/ /de ni snad pa las byung yin/ /rnyil la brten par byed pa'i nad/ /gsor rung yal bar bor ba gang / /nang du de ni nad 'dzag pas/ /des ni rgyun lam phra ba skyed/ /de ni yang yang rnag 'dzag

cing / /pags pa sha dang rus pa 'bigs/ /de yang rang rang mtshan nyid ni/ /ji skad bshad pas lngar shes bya/ /lce ni sha kha'i lo ltar rtsub/ /tshor ba med gas rlung gnod yin/ /mkhris pas tsha zhing nad bcas 'gyur/ /mdzer pa dmar pos khyab pa yin/ /bad kan las

gyur shal ma li'i/ /tsher mas khyab gyur lci zhing mthug /bad kan mkhris pas 'og tu skrang / /mtho zhing gyong bar byed pa dang / /smin na nya yi dri 'dra la/ /sha 'drul chu ser can zhes bya/ /lce rtsa'i 'og dang 'brel pa ni/ /skrang zhing lce yi rtse mo 'dra/ /mdzer pa byung zhing

kha chu 'dzag /lce ni rengs shing rtsub pa dang / /g.ya' dang nad bcas tshig mi thon/ /za bar mi nus lce lhag yin/ /de dang 'dra bar lce steng na/ /gnas pa'i nye ba'i lce zhes bya/ /rlung 'khrugs pa ni rkan gyi shar/ /'brum phran sra zhing nad bcas

'gyur/ /mang zhing mthug la 'dzag par bcas/ /rkan gyi 'brum phran zhes de bshad/ /bad kan khrag gis rkan phugs su/ /nya yi lgang pa 'dra zhing 'jam/ /'phyang zhing skrangs la spyi bag can/ /kha zas sna nas 'byung bar byed/ /lkog 'gags skom dang lud pa dang / /

slon byed lkog ma'i sha lhag yin/ /rkan gyi dbus su nad med sha// 'dus pa rkan 'dus zhes bya'o/ /rkan gyi dbus su pad+ma 'dra/ /khrag las skyes pa chu bur yin/ /bad kan 'khrugs pas ring nas 'phel/ /nad med rus sbal 'dra zhes bya/ /bad kan tshil gyis rgya sran

'dra/ /nad med brtan pa 'bur ba yin/ /mkhris pas rnags pa smin zhes bya/ /rnag 'dzag nad dkyel che ba yin/ /rlung mkhris las gyur tsha nyon mongs/ /rkan skam de yi ming can yin/ /lce dang 'brel ba lkog ma'i nad/ /sha yi myu gu myur 'phel zhing / /mi bzad

lam ni 'gog byed pa/ /myur gsod byed pa gag pa yin/ /de ni rlung gyur lkog ma kha/ /skam byed 'gram pa rna nad skyed/ /mkhris pas rims skom rmongs bag can/ /lkog 'gags dud pas bdugs snyam sems/ /myur smin myur du 'phel ba dang / /dmar zhing reg na mi

bzod byed/ /bad kan gyis dkar 'byar bag can/ /khrag gyur 'brum bus khyab pa dang / /me mdag 'dra zhing rna nad skyed/ /mkhris pa las gyur mtshan nyid mtshungs/ /'dus gyur rnag phugs gting ring zhing / /mtshan ma kun dang ldan pa yin/ /bad kan shas cher skrangs pa

dang / /rmen bu rgya shug 'dra zhing mtho/ /gra ma tsher mas gar snyam byed/ /lam 'gag byed pa rtsa ba yin/ /zlum zhing mtho la tsha ba dang / /lkog ma'i ngos gnas 'dus pa yin/ /'gram pa'i mtshams nas mgul pa'i nad/ /ras bal sa bon lta bur zlum/ /spyi bag nad tshabs

chung bar skrang / /sra ba mchu rtse can zhes bya/ /phyi dang nang du mi bzad skrang / /lkog ma'i lam gyi gtan pa 'dra/ /mgo lci snum dang kha chu 'dzag /rims skyed lkog mchu 'dzings pa yin/ /skrangs pa shas cher mi na zhing / /chu zheng de 'dra gdu bu yin/ /nad kyi lkog ma

sha mdzer ni/ /gcig gam mang skyes nad tshabs chung / /dbugs 'byin dka' zhing zas mid dka'/ /rtsa ba che ba lkog ma'i mtshon/ /sha yi mdzer pa mang pos khyab/ /rab skam tsha la mgo bo na/ /mdung ltar shin tu nad skyed byed/ /mdzer pas khyab pas mdung 'dra yin/ /

lkog ma kun ni myur khyab cing / /myur skye myur smin shas cher na/ /rul ba'i rnag 'dra 'dzag gyur pa/ /skrangs pa lkog ma'i khong 'bras pa yin/ /lce yi mtha' ma lkog ma sogs/ /skrang zhing smin pa med pa'i nad/ /brtan pa khrag gis skyed byed pa/ /nad med lkog ma'i rmen bu yin/ /

rlung dang bad kan tshil gyis ni/ /lkog ma'i phyi rol lba ba skyes/ /de ni 'phel bar gyur pa'i tshe/ /rlig pa ltar 'phyang na ba med/ /de ni rlung gyur dmar ba'am gnag /na zug rtsa ris nag por bcas/ /'phel bas lkog ma kha skam zhing / /lce yis ro mi tshor

bar byed/ /bad kan las lci reg na grang / /brtan zhing skya la g.ya' dang bcas/ /'phel na rkan dang lkog mar chags/ /kha ni mngar ba bro bar byed/ /tshil gyur bad kan lta bur na/ /de ni 'phel 'bri lus 'dar byed/ /'phel bar byed pa'i tshe na ni/ /lkog mar sgra bcas skad

gsang nyams/ /bad kan gyis ni rlung rgyun bkag /lkog skam skad gsang nyams pa dang / /dka' bas dbugs 'byin mon zhugs snyam/ /rlung las skad nyams gang yin 'gyur/ /rlung ni kun tu 'gro byed pas/ /kha nang rma ni 'pho bar byed/ /dmar la rtsub pa skyed byed cing / /

lce yis grang ba me bzod lci/ /gas shing tsher mas khyab 'drar snang / /kha mnam gdangs par dka' ba ni/ kha yi shu ba zhes byar bshad/ /bad kan gzhang 'brum skran sogs kyis/ /'og tu gnod par byas pa'i rlung / /gyen 'byung kha

ni dri mi zhim/ /de ni steng gi rkub ces bya/ /mkhris gyur kha shu kha rnag cing / /tsha na kha ni tsha bro la/ /rma la lan tshwas byugs snyam sems/ /khrag las gyur pa'ang de dang 'dra/ /bad kan las gyur kha mngar bro/ /g.ya' zhing rma ni 'byil bag can/ /

mkhur tshos nang du brten nas ni/ /'brum bu gnag cing skya ba 'byung / /de ni mnye zhing bcad pa dang / /bskyod na 'phel bar byed pa yin/ /nad ni khrag bcas gyur kha shu/ /kha shu nad ni khrag bcas 'gyur/ /'dus pa mtshan nyid kun dang ldan/ /de nyid so shing la sogs

la/ /mi dga' kha dri mi zhim 'gyur/ /mchu dang mkhur tshos so rtsa dang / /lce dang rkan dang mgul pa dang / /kha dang thams cad dag gi ni/ /nad ni bdun cu rtsa dgu yin/ /bcu gcig gcig dang bcu dang ni/ /bcu gsum de bzhin drug dang brgyad/ /bcu gnyis bco brgyad

dag dang ni/ /de dag go rims bzhin du sbyar/ /so sto sha dang khrag gyur mchu/ /chu bur chu ni med pa dang / /rkan gyi rus sbal 'brum phran dang / /ming khong stong stong che chung 'dzings/ /skad nyams so sngon steng gi rkub/ /mdung 'dra gdu bu chu ser can/ /'dus gyur mid pa mchu

nad dang / /khrag dang 'dus gyur gag pa dang / /so gogs so ni chag pa dang / /smin pa'i nye ba'i lce dang ni/ /lkog ma'i lba ba skad nyams dang / /dbugs mi thon pa lo gcig lon/ /so brtse gsang ba 'tsho ba tsam/ /lhag ma mtshon dang sman gyis gso/ /yan lag brgyad

pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// //de nas kha nad gso ba bshad par bya'o/ /mchu ral ba yi mtha' brud de/ /btsems la rma ltar gso bar bya/ /shing mngar seng phrom kra ku ni/ /thal tres ut+pal shra pa ni/ /mon sne'u

dme ru pa to la/ /til mar bskol bas bsku bar bya/ /rlung 'joms mngar ba'i sde tshan dang / /bskol ba'i til mar sna sman gtang / /rlung gyur mchu nad sra rtsi phog /spra tshil gu gul thang shing na/ /snum chen bskol ba'i ras bal dag /sbangs pa'i ye'us glan par bya/ /shing

mngar phye mar bcas pa dang / /de nyid kyis ni bsku bar bya/ /e raN+Da yi lo ma ni/ /'o mar bskol bas sbubs dugs bya/ /mchu ral skabs bshad sna sman dang / /mgo bo brta ba dag kyang bya/ /mkhris pas snad pa'i mchu nad la/ /srin bu pad pas khrag

dbyung bya/ /seng phrom sbrang rtsi sra rtsi pog /shing mngar bcas pa'i phye ma gdab/ /sle tres shing mngar rma shing dang / /bskol ba'i mar gyis bskus na'ang phan/ /mkhris pa'i khong 'bras ltar yang gso/ /khrag las gyur pa sar pa la/ /de dag nyid kyis gso bar

bya/ /bad kan las gyur mchu nad la/ /pa to'i thal ba tsha ba gsum/ /sbrang rtsi dang ni sbyar bas bsku/ /gtar ga byas nas phye ma gdab/ /bad kan 'joms par byed pa yin/ /dud brngub sna sman mkhur bkang bya/ /tshil gyur dugs byas dbral nas ni/ /me yis nges

par bsreg par bya/ /pri yang ku dang 'bras bu gsum/ /seng phrom sbrang rtsir sbyar bas sku/ /chu yi chu bur brtol nas sbyang / /sman rnon sbrang rtsis bsku bar bya/ /gting ring ba'am rab 'phel la/ /thang sman dag gam me btsas gso/ /mkhur ba'i chu ser smin skabs su/ /

skrangs pa'i nad ltar gso bar bya/ /so grang ba la dugs byas la/ /so rtsa brud de til mar bsregs/ /gla sgang rgyam tsha sbrang rtsi dang / /se'u 'bru'i shun pa 'bras bu gsum/ /skyer pa'i khaN+Da 'dam bu'i rkang / /bca' sga sbyar bas bsku bar bya/ /'o ma can bskol mkhur ba

bkang / /e raN+Da'i mar sna sman gtang / /so brtse de bzhin bye ba la/ /rlung 'joms gso ba thams cad bya/ /til dang shing mngar sbrang rtsi ni/ /'o mar bskol ba'i mkhur bkang bcang / /so 'gul ba la rtsa ba bcu'i/ /khu ba mar bskol mkhur ba bkang / /sbangs ma

seng phrom pi pi ling / /'bras bu gsum dang rma shing dang / /rgyam tsha yis ni bdar bar bya/ /snum bag gis ni sna sman dang / /mkhur bkang gnas skabs ji bzhin bsten/ /so lhag skyes la thal sman gyis/ /bskus te gogs par gyur pa dang / /srin can so ltar phyung nas

ni/ /de tshe de dang 'dra bar gso/ /khrag ni chod par ma gyur na/ /bsregs la rma ltar gso bar bya/ /so dreg chags la so rtsal/ /gnod pa med par bsal bar bya/ /thal sman sbrang rtsir bcas pas ni/ /de yi 'og tu bsku bar bya/ /so gogs pa la'ang 'di nyid dang / /so

brtser bshad pa'i gso ba bya/ /srin can so ni mi 'gul la/ /dugs byas nas ni khrag dbyung bya/ /snum gyis bsku zhing mkhur bkang dang / /sna sman kha zas rlung 'joms sbyin/ /khong stong bu ram spra tshil gyis/ /gang ba'i thur mas

bsreg par bya/ /lo ma bdun pa arka yi/ /lo mas bkang na srin gzer 'joms/ /shing kun nag chur kad pa la/ /sardzi ka dang byi dang ga /ru rta'i phye ma ras la gtums/ /sor glan zug gzer myur du 'joms/ /yang na 'di nyid bskol ba yi/ /til mar mkhur

bar dgang bar bya/ /yang na bri ha ti rnam gnyis/ /bu ga dam pa e raN+Da/ /bskol ba'i khu bas mkhur ba bkang / /de ltar gso ba mang po yis/ /nad ni zhi bar ma gyur na/ /skam pa phra mo dag gis sam/ /so dbyung ba yi cha spyad kyis/ /dang po rtsa ba nas bslangs te/ /gtan nas

de ni dbyung bar bya/ /til mar shing mngar phyer bcas pa'am/ /sbrang rtsis de 'og mkhur bkang bya/ /de 'og shing mngar bid ri/ /srid ka dang ka she ru/ /til mar bcu 'gyur 'o ma dang / /bskol ba'i sna sman gtang bar bya/ /rid cing nyam chung rgan po dang / /rlung nad kyis nyen so mi dbyung / /

ya so dbyung bar mi bya ste/ /de ni bla brnan mang po skyed/ /de yang 'byin na snum pa dang / /mngar dang bsil ba'i rim pas gso/ /grang bas nyen la khrag dbyung zhing / /sbrang rtsir bcas pas bsku bar bya/ /gla sgang ardzu na'i shun pa/ /pri yang ku dang skyer khaN+Da/ /bca' sga sgrang rtsir sbyar ba

bsku/ /de bskol bas ni mkhur bkang dang / /mngar sman til mar bskol snar blugs/ /rnyil ni nye bar bdar ba la/ /chu tshan mkhur bkang bas dugs bya/ /dkyil 'khor 'dra ba'am sha kha yi/ /lo mas mang du brud par bya/ /rgya skyegs rma shing pri yang ku/ /rgyam tsha ru rta btsag

yug snam/ /na le sham dang bca' sga dang / /shing mngar skyer pa'i khaN+Da dang / /mar gyi snying po sbrang rtsi dang / /sbyar ba de 'og bsku bar bya/ /mar khu'am til mar mkhur spo ba/ /dro 'jam de yi rjes la bya/ /mngar ba'i sde dang bskol ba'i mar/ /mkhur bkang sna sman

byas na phan/ /so 'bur ba la dugs byas la/ /bcad dang dbug dang brud par bya/ /shing mngar bca' sgas rdzi ka /rgyam tsha'i phye ma bsku bar bya/ /so yi khong 'bras tsha dro rno/ /rtsub pa'i mkhur bkang bsku bar bya/ /pu tse shel dang ba spru ba/ /ru rta nas tshig 'khus phyir

bdar/ /bsil sman gyis ni smin mi gzhug /smin nas dral la gting ring bsreg /khong stong bcad de brud nas ni/ /gla sgang seng phrom 'bras bu gsum/ /shu ti rma shing skyer khaN+Da/ /rgya skyegs shing mngar kad phal/ /sbrang rtsir sbyar bas bsku bar bya/ /de nyid khu bas

mkhur ba bkang / /shing mngar seng phro ma dUr ba dkar/ /thal tres tsan+dan na a ga ru/ /ka ra dkar po btsag yug snam/ /pad+ma dkar po stag tsher ba/ /bskol ba'i til mar sna sman gtang / /sha lhag skyes pa bcad nas ni/ /shu dag te dzo ba ti dang / /pa ta nas tshig

'khus thal ba/ /sardzi ka dang sbrang rtsis bsku/ /'bras bu gsum dang pa to la/ /nim pa bskol bas mkhur ba bkang / /snad pa las byung nad la ni/ /dkyil 'khor rtse mo 'dra bas sbyangs/ /de nas thal sman sna sman gtang / /mkhur bkang la sogs bsil sman gtang / /lus

kyi gong 'og nas sbyang bya/ /de 'og mgo bo'i bkru sman bya/ /so yi rtsa ni sos nas kyang / /phyung ste nad dang ldan pa yi/ /bu ram spra tshil bkang bas bsreg /dzA ti seng ldeng spra tshil dang / /gze ma bskol ba'i khu bas bkru/ /'o ma can shing chus mkhur bkang / /de bskol til

mar sna sman gtang / /rlung gyur lce ni rtsub pa la/ /rlung gi mchu nad gso bar bya/ /mkhris pa las gyur lce nad la/ /bzhar te khrag ni dbyung bar bya/ /bsku dang mkhur ba bkang ba dang / /sna sman mngar ba dag kyang bya/ /de bzhin bad kan las gyur la/ /nyungs kar tsha ba gsum la

sogs/ /sman ni rnon pos gso bar bya/ /lce las chu ser 'dzag pa gsar/ /mtshon mi reg par de bzhin gso/ /lce lhag skyes pa lce bteg ste/ /lcags kyus lce lhag drangs nas ni/ /rtse mo dkyil 'khor 'dra bas bcad/ /rno dang dro bas bdar

sogs bya/ /nye ba'i lce la khrag gzags te/ /nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal bas bdar/ /sha lhag skyes la bad kan 'joms/ /sna sman mkhur bkang bdar bar bya/ /ga gon sa bon lta bur ni/ /'phel zhing rtsa ni mi mngon dang / /rtse mos lce yi rtsa ba slebs/ /lcags

kyu yis ni bzung nas kyang / /rtse mo dkyil 'khor 'dra ba yis/ /rtse mo rtsa ba ran par gcad/ /bcad drags khrag zags 'chi bar byed/ /bcad chung nad ni 'phel bar byed/ /bong nga ba ta na le sham/ /shu dag ru rta pa ri la/ /rgyam tsha sbrang rtsir bcas pa yis/ /bcad pa dag ni bdar

bar bya/ /pa ri be la kun ta ta'o/ /pu tse shel dang bong da dkar/ /ba ta nim pa ra sna dang / /shu dag chu yis mkhur bkang bya/ /'dus dang so 'bur rus sbal 'dra/ /de bzhin bzhar te gso bar bya/ /rkan rnags ma smin pa la ni/ /nag tshur sbrang rtsi skyer khaN+Da/ /bsku bar

bya'o bsil dang mngar/ /sman bskol khu bas mkhur bkang bya/ /smin nas na ya'i gzhi ltar dras/ /dro dang rno bas bsku bar bya/ /ba sha ka dang pa to la/ /nim pa la sogs rno ba yi/ /sman gyi khu bas mkhur ba dgang / /rkan skam skom dad gdung med pa/ /zas zos rjes la

zhun mar ni/ /bca' sga bi pi ling bskol blud/ /skyur bas mkhur ba spo ba bcang / /skam sa'i sha khu snum pa dang / /zhun mar 'o ma'i sna sman gtang / /lkog ma'i nad la gtar ga gdab/ /sna sman la sogs rnon po bya/ /skyer pa'i shun pa skyer khaN+Da/ /dug mo nyung bskol khu

ba blud/ /a ru ra yi khu ba ni/ /sbrang rtsir ldan pa sbyin par bya/ /'bras bu gsum dang cha ba gsum/ /nas tshig 'khus thal skyer pa dang / /tsi tra ka dang skyer khaN+Da/ /pa ta te dzo ba ti dang / /nim pa tsha dang ra gcin bskol/ /mkhur ba spo dang ri lu dang / /phye ma gdab pa dag kyang

bya/ /lcang ma gi ri kar+Ni dang / /gla sgang thang shing bca' sga dang / /shu dag dan da mur ba yi/ /lde gu dro bskus skrangs nad sel/ /de nas phyi nang dugs byas te/ /sor gdub cha spyad dag gis sam/ /rgyam tsha ldan pa'i sen mo yis/ /rlung gyur gag pa bzhar bar bya/ /rtsa ba lnga

bskol mkhur bkang dang / /til mar mkhur sbo sna sman gtang / /mkhris pa las gyur gtar ga gdab/ /kha ra sbrang rtsi pri yang ku/ /seng phrom rma shing bcas pa bdar/ /de bskol khu ba mkhur bar bcang / /rgun 'brum pa ru sha ka bskol/ /mkhur ba bkang ba'ang phan pa yin/ /

khrag las gyur pa'ang de bzhin du/ /gtar ga gdab ste gso bar bya/ /bad kan las gyur khang pa yi/ /dud pa tsha ba'i sman bcas gdab/ /a pa marga'i 'bras bu dang / /gi ri kar+Ni byi dang ga /rgyam tsha tsan+dan til mar bskol/ /sna sman mkhur bkang bya ba bsngags/ /de

bzhin 'dus dang rtsa ba dang / /mchu rtse lkog ma'i mtshon la'ang bya/ /khong 'bras khrag gzags 'bras bu gsum/ /gi wang yug snam skyer khaN+Da/ /seng phrom rgyam tsha rma shing dang / /pi pi ling bsku mkhur bkang bya/ /rlung las gyur pa'i wa ba la/ /dugs byas nas ni khrag

dbyung zhing / /til dang zar ma leb rgan rtsi/ /pi la ya dang btsod 'bras kyis/ /rma 'drub nas bskus dkri bar bya/ /shi kru seng phrom tar ka ri/ /tang pa la ha ti pi pi ling / /ba spu pa dang a ru ra/ /arka'i rtsa ba po son cha/ /e kai Shi kar bcas pa ni/ /chang ngam rang sgyur

btags pas bsku/ /lde gus yang dang yang du bsku/ /sle tres nim pa dug mo nyung / /han sa ba ti ba la gnyis/ /thang shing dang ni pi pi ling / /bskol ba'i til mar blud par bya/ /bad kan la yang 'di dag ni/ /bya zhing lhag par dugs bsku bya/ /a za gan+d+ha bong nga dkar/ /

a za shing gi bi sha l+ya/ /ku ba kha bo 'ol ma se/ /shi ri sha dang rgya skyegs shing / /thal chu'i lde gus bsku bar bya/ /thal ba drag po gcin bskol btsags/ /khre rgod za zhing btung bar bya/ /dug mo nyung sogs lan tshwa lnga/ /til mar lhan cig bskol ba blud/ /bad kan 'joms

pa'i dud pa dang / /slon sman sna sman la sogs bsten/ /tshil gyur ba la gtar ga gdab/ /bad kan 'joms pa'i cho ga bsten/ /'di la a sa la sogs pa'i/ /khu ba gcin ni snga dro blud/ /des ma zhin thams cad ni/ /smin byas rma ltar gso bar

bya/ /kha shu la ni 'bras bu gsum/ /ba ta rgun 'brum dzA ti yi/ /'o mar bskol ba'i sbrang rtsir bcas/ /kha ni bsku zhing bcang bar bya/ /yang na zin thig la sogs spe/ /bza' zhing bsten pa nyid du bya/ /rlung gi kha shur pi pi ling / /rgyam tsha sug smel phye ma gdab/ /yang

na rlung 'joms sman bskol ba'i/ /til mar sna sman mkhur bkang phan/ /khrag mkhris gyur la khrag mkhris 'joms/ /bad kan las gyur de 'joms bsten/ /'brum phran sra zhing brtan pa la/ /sha kha'i lo ma sogs kyis bzhar/ /'dus pa las gyur gso ba ni/ /nad

gzhi ji bzhin shas cher bya/ /chu bur gsar zhing ma 'phel ba/ /bcad las rdzi ka'i thal ba/ /bca' sga sbrang rtsi gdab par bya/ /de bskol mkhur ba bkang bar bya/ /sle tres nim pa'i lde gu ni/ /sbrang rtsi til mar bcas pa'ang rung / /nas zan za zhing til mar rnos/ /sna

sman dang ni bsku byug bya/ /kha dri nga la slon sman dang / /dud pa sna sman rnon po gtang / /btsod dang seng phrom da ta ki /shug pa bri yang ku yi chus/ /kha yi nang ni bkru ba dang / /phye mas kha ni dag par bya/ /grang nyen nye bar bdar bshad pa'i/ /sna sman la sogs bsten par bya/ /

'bras bu gsum dang rtsa mkhris tsi tra ka /shing mngar nyungs kar gla sgang tshab gsum/ /ya bak+Sha ra ser po rnam gnyis dang / /da trig tsan+dan lcang ma star bu dang / /a shwat+tha dang 'dzam bu'i myu gu dang / /da nan dza ya ka ra bI ra'i shun/ /seng ldeng snying po bskol te ska bar gyur/ /de yi

phye ma btab ste ri lu bya/ /de ni kha nang rtag tu bzhag gyur na/ /mchu dang rkan sogs nad ni mi bzad 'joms/ /mchog tu kha skams pa dang gag pa dang / /ro mi tshor sel lus 'phags bdag pos bshad/ /seng ldeng srang brgya chu bre bcu drug bskol/ /khu ba de dang tsan+dan a ga ru/ /

gur gum pa la ba ri pe la dang / /thang shing seng phrom rgun 'brum pu shel tsi/ /btsod dang tso tsa shug pa byi dang ga /pri ka rgya spos kad pa la chu srin sder/ /sug smel d+he ma ka dang rma shing bcas/ /zho ni gnyis gnyis til mar bre gang bskol/ /de ni btung dang sna sman mkhur bkang

bya/ /kha yi nad kun 'joms byed bya rgod ltar/ /mig gsal rna ba phag 'drar gsang bar byed/ /tsa kra mar da skyer pa seng phrom gyi/ /lde gu gdong la byugs par gyur na ni/ /do khabs sme ba dri ma la sogs sel/ /zla ba lta bu'i mdangs dang ldan par 'gyur/ /sa ha ra dza srang stong chu

bre ni/ /bcu drug nang bskol brgyad cha lus pa ru/ /seng ldeng 'dzam bu shing mngar e raN+Da/ /a mra a ti ma ra ut+pal sngo/ /zhib btags til mar bre gang nang du bskol/ /de ni kha yi nang du bcangs gyur na/ /kha yi nad kun 'joms shing khyad par du/ /so yi phreng ba 'gul

ba brtan par byed/ /seng ldeng snying po srang ni nyis brgya dang / /a ri me da sa ni srang brgya dag /chu bre drug cu bzhi bskol bzhi cha lus/ /btsags te slar yang ska ba'i bar du bskol/ /de nang dbyi mo rma shing ba le ka /tsan+dan rnam gnyis seng phrom stag tsher ba/ /shing mngar rgya

skyegs a dza ri rnam gnyis/ /da ta ki dang kat+pa la'i 'bras bu/ /ser po rnam gnyis 'bras bu gsum dang ni/ /dri sna bzhi dang gla sgang a ru ra/ /btsod dang spang spos n+ya gro d+ha'i myu gu/ /shug pa btsod dang e la ba lu ka /zho ni gnyis gnyis btab ste bsgrangs pa ru/ /dzA ti

pa tra dzA ti phal dang / /li shi a ko la dang ka ko la/ /srang reg pur srang bzhi gzhug par bya/ /de las ri lu byas la rtag tu ni/ /khar bzhag na ni kha nad thams cad sel/ /bskol dang reng bu'i sman ni go bzlog pa/ /btags pa 'di yi til mar bskol bar bya/ /kha nad kun sel

bar ni de bshad do/ /so brtan byed pa'i mchog kyang 'di nyid yin/ /ri lu 'di ni seng ldeng sbyar til mar/ /a ri me da sa dang bskol ba dag /nyin re bsten par byed na nad med pa'ang / /so ni nges par brtan par byed pa yin/ /rgun 'brum sle tres dzA ti'i myu gu dang / /skyer pa byi

tsher 'bras bu gsum bskol ba'i/ /sbrang rtsir bcas pa 'di ni mkhur bar bcangs/ /kha yi nad du gtogs pa thams cad sel/ /skyer pa ba ta ru rta gla sgang btsod/ /yung ba seng phrom te dzo ba ti dang / /pu tse shel gyi phye ma sbrang rtsir sbyar/ /bskus na

rnyil nad nyam thag g.ya' ba dang / /rnag dang 'dzag pa'i nad rnams 'joms par byed/ /khyim gyi dud pa tha skyer khaN+Da/ /tsha ba gsum dang nas tshig 'khus thal ba/ /tsi tar ka dang lcags phye 'bras bu gsum/ /te dzo ba ti sbrang rtsir sbyar ba ni/ /nag po khar bcangs so dang mgul

nad sel/ /skyer pa'i shun pa ldong ros lce myang tsha/ /ba bla nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba'i phye/ /sbrang rtsi mar sbyar phye ma ser po can/ /khar bzhag so dang mgul ba'i nad rnams sel/ /ba gcin a ru ra bskol thim gyur pa/ /shu ti ru rta ba le ka'i phye zos/ /nang gi kha nad

phra mo yan chad ni/ /rgyal por brten na gnod pas mi tshugs bzhin/ /nang du bzhag na nad rnams sel bar byed/ /lo ma bdun pa gla sgang bu shel tse/ /a ru ra dang tig ta pa to la/ /shing mngar dong gra tsan+dan pu shel tse/ /bskol ba 'thungs na kha yi shu ba 'joms/ /pa to la

dang bca' sga 'bras bu gsum/ /bi sha l+ya dang tig ta kyi lce ba/ /sle tres bskol ba sbrang rtsir bcas blud dam/ /khar bzhag kha yi nad kun ma lus 'joms/ /skyer pa bskol ba'i khu ba ni/ /ska gyur yug snam btsag dang bcas/ /sbrang rtsir bcas pa kha nang bzhag /shu ba rma

'khyims sel bar byed/ /nim pa shing mngar pa to la/ /ba sha ka dang dzA ti dang / /seng ldeng a ri med sa/ /'bras bu gsum po re re la'ang / /de bzhin du ni gtang bar bya/ /seng ldeng lcags phye 'bras bu gsum/ /ma ta yan ti a rdzu na/ /a ti ma ra bskol ba ni/ /mkhur bcad

kha nad so nad sel/ /kha dang so rtsa mgul nad phal cher ni/ /bad kan khrag las mang du 'byung ba yin/ /de bas nad de bsal bar bya ba'i phyir/ /nad khrag lan mang du ni dbyung bar bya/ /mgo dang lus kyi skyug sman bkru sman dang / /kha dang tsha dang mkhur bkang bcang bar bya/ /de bzhin

bad kan khrag ni sel ba yi/ /gso ba'i nad ni phal cher bsngags pa yin/ /nas dang rtsa 'bru phub ma med byas la/ /thal sman mang du spangs shing snum med bza'/ /khu ba bstan pa la sogs gang gzhan ni/ /bad kan sel bar byed pa phan pa yin/ /srog ni rlung gi lam

la gnas pas na/ /bag med pa yis 'gag par 'gyur ba yin/ /de bas lkog ma'i nad kyi gso ba ni/ /shin tu myur bar bya ba kho na yin/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// //de nas mgo bo'i nad

kyi dmigs shes par bya ba bshad par bya'o/ /du ba nyi tshan kha ba dang / /chu dang rtse dang gnyid drags dang / /gnyid yar rdul dang mdun gyi rlang / /mchi ma bkag dang dus drags dang / /chu 'thungs chang 'thungs drags pa dang / /srin bus shugs ni bkag pa dang / /sngas dang

bsku byug dril phyis la/ /mi dga' rgyun du thur du blta/ /ma goms dri dang zas gnod zos/ /mang du smras pas mgo bo yi/ /nang du nad ni skyed par byed/ /de la rlung ni 'khrugs pa las/ /mur 'gram gnyis su shin tu zug /'gram so phug pa snyam du sems/ /smin ma'i

mtshams dang dpral ba ni/ /ltung ba snyam sems rab tu na/ /rna bar sgra yis gnod par byed/ /mig ni phyung ba snyam du sems/ /mgo bo 'khor ba lta bur sems/ /tshigs rnams bye ba snyam du byed/ /rtsa yi dra ba shin tu 'phar/ /mjing pa 'gram pa 'byar snyam byed/ /gsal ba

mthong bar mi bzod cing / /sna chu 'dzag cing glo bur du/ /na ba dang ni nad gzhi byed/ /mnye zhing snum bskus dugs byas dang / /bcings pas bde bar 'gyur ba yin/ /mgo bo tsha ba'i nad ces bya/ /klad pa'i gzhogs phyed na ba ni/ /gzhogs phyed nad ces bya bar bshad/ /zla

gcig zla phyed nas ldang de/ /rang nyid zhi bar 'gyur pa yin/ /shas cher 'phel na mig dang ni/ /rna ba dag kyang ma rung byed/ /mkhris gyur mgo bo tsha ba dang / /dud pas bdugs snyam sems rims 'debs/ /rdul zhing mig tsha brgyal ba dang / /mtshan mo grang bas rtse 'jil 'gyur/ /

bad kan las gyur yi ga 'chus/ /mgo lci tshor ba med cing grang / /rtsa mi 'phar zhing sgyid snyom la/ /nyin mo nad chung mtshan mo ldang / /rmya zhing mig ni skrangs pa dang / /rna ba g.ya' zhing slon pa yin/ /khrag gyur mkhris pa las cher na/ /'dus gyur mtshan

nyid kun dang ldan/ /'dren ma'i zas kyis spyi bo yi/ /khrag dang sha ni 'drul byas pas/ /'dus pa'i nad ni 'khrugs 'gyur zhing / /mgo bo'i srin bu skye bar 'gyur/ /des ni mgo bo'i khrag 'thung zhing / /sems ni 'khrul par byed pa yi/ /mi bzad nad ni skyed par byed/ /lud

pa rims dang nyams stobs zad/ /mgo bo rtsub skrangs dbug snyam na/ /tsha zhing mgo 'gul rnags pa dang / /thod pa rkan dang mgo bor ni/ /g.ya' zhing skem la tshor ba med/ /snabs kyi mdog ni dmar ba la/ /rna ba sgra bcas srin skyes nad/ /rlung shas che bas mgo 'dar

zhing / /de yi ming can nad skyed byed/ /mkhris shas che ba'i rlung sogs kyis/ /mur 'gram skrang zhing khrag bcas la/ /mi bzad tsha zhing nal dmar/ /glal zhing rims 'debs skom mgo 'khor/ /kha nang kha bro gdong ser zhing / /myur du gsod byed mur 'gram can/ /zhag gsum

nas ni srog 'joms shing / /myur du gso na 'tsho ba yin/ /rlung mkhris rjes 'brel mur 'gram mig /smin ma dpral ba na ba dang / /'phar bar byed pa skyed par byed/ /nyi ma 'char bar gyur pa nas/ /nyi ma phyed kyi bar du 'phel/ /de phan chad ni bde bar 'gyur/ /ltogs na de ni lhag par na/ /

grang dang dro la nges pa med/ /de ni nyi ma 'khor zhes bya/ /de ltar mgo bor gtogs pa'i nad/ /rnam pa bcur ni bshad pa yin/ /gzhan yang thod pa la brten nad/ /dgu po mgo bo bzhin bshad bya/ /klad pa rlung ni 'khrugs gyur pa/ /nang na gnas pa'ang nad skyed byed/ /mdog gnag nad chung

skrangs pa yin/ /de ni nye ba'i mgo zhes bya/ /'brum phran thor bu khong 'bras ni/ /nad gzhi ji bzhin brjod par bya/ /thod par ljan ljin mang po dang / /khrag dang mkhris pa'i 'bu las ni/ khre dang nyungs kar lta bur 'byung / /'brum phran srin gyi nad skyed 'gyur/ /rlung dang mkhris pa

'khrugs pa las/ /pags ba rtsub cing gas pa dang / /g.ya' zhing skra 'byi tshor ba med/ /gyur pa mi bzad yin zhes bya/ /mkhris ba rlung dang 'dres pa ni/ /ba spu'i nang du zhugs gyur pa/ /skra ni 'byi bar byed pa yin/ /de nas bad kan khrag bcas pas/ /ba spu'i bu ga 'gag byed de/ /

de yis gzhan dag mi 'byung ba/ /'khor ling skra 'byi zhes bya ste/ /gzhan dag skra 'byi zhes byar 'dod/ /spyi cer skye ba'ang de bzhin du/ /skra 'byi de la rim gyis 'byung / /de ni rlung gyur mes tshig 'dra/ /mkhris gyur rlan can rtsa yis khyab/ /bad kan pags pa'i mdog dkar mthug /

pags pa rang gi ji bzhin snang / /'dus gyur mtshan nyid kun dang ldan/ /sen mo'i mdog 'dra gsor mi rung / /mes bsregs lta bur spu med gang / /tsha bcas de yang gsor mi rung / /mya ngan khro dang ngal las byung / /lus kyi drod ni mgor zhugs pas/ /nad des skra ni btsos nas

ni/ /de la skra dkar skye bar 'gyur/ /de ni rlung gyur yid tsam gnag /sra zhing rtsub la chu mdog can/ /mkhris pa tsha zhing mdog ser yin/ /bad kan las gyur snum zhing 'phel/ /sbom zhing mdog ni dkar ba yin/ /'dus gyur mtshan ma 'dren ma yin/ /mgo bo'i nad las

byung ba gzhan/ /mdog ngan reg na mi bzod yin/ /'dus pa las ni gyur pa yi/ /spyi cer skra dkar gsor mi rung / /lus kyi 'gyur ba las byung ba/ /bcud kyis len gyis gso bar bya/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o// //

de nas mgo bo'i nad gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /rlung las gyur pa'i mgo nad la/ /rlung nad gso ba'i cho ga bshad/ /'di ni mtshan mo zhun mar blud/ /de rjes 'o ma dron mo blud/ /ma sha rgya sran mung+ga 'ang rung / /mar dang ldan pa de bzhin sbyin/ /til mar til gyi lde gu ni/ /'o ma

dang ni lhan cig blud/ /glan dang bcing ba'i dugs dag ni/ /sha dang 'u su las byas phan/ /rlung 'joms rtsa ba bcu la sogs/ /bskol ba'i 'o ma snum can blud/ /sna sman dud brngub snum can dang / /mgo dang rna ba brta bar bya/ /ba ra Na sogs sde tshan brdungs/ /'o ma chu phyed bskol

ba yi/ /'o ma lus pa de bsgrangs la/ /bsrubs te snying po blangs nas ni/ /de nas mngar ba'i sde tshan bskol/ /mar gyi sna sman blugs pa bsngags/ /'dir ni 'o ma'i sde tshan bskol/ /mar dang kha rar bcas pa blugs/ /ras bal sa bon shing tsha

dang / /gla sgang dzA ti kha 'bus pa/ /chu dron btags pa'i sna sman ni/ /mgo bo'i nad kun 'joms byed yin/ /khrag dang mkhris pa las gyur pa/ /kha ra gur gum mar bskol gtang / /ru rta rgya spos ut+pa la/ /tsan+dan mar sbyar mgo bskus phan/ /rlung shas che la 'jigs yod

pas/ /gtar ga 'di la mi bya'o/ /des ma zhi na bad rlung la/ /me btsa' ji skad bshad pa bya/ /gzhogs phyed na la'ang de bzhin te/ /nad dang 'brel pa'i gso ba bya/ /shi ri sha yi sa bon dang / /a pa marga'i rtsa ba dang / /kha ru tsha bcas sna sman gtang / /yang na sa la par+Ni

'am/ /tsa kra marda gang yang rung / /skyur ku dang sbyar lde gus bsku/ /nyi ma ltar 'khor de yi tshe/ /gtar gas khrag ni dbyung bar bya/ /mkhris pa las gyur mgo nad la/ /snum chos byas nas gtar ga gdab/ /mgo dang gdong byugs sman chu blugs/ /slon khrus mas gtong

bsil bar bya/ /'tsho byed dang bskol 'o ma dang / /mar ni sna sman btung ba blugs/ /khrag las gyur pa 'ang 'di nyid bya/ /mur 'gram can la gtar ga spang / /bad kan mgo nad mar snying dang / /snum chos byas la tsha bas slon/ /dugs dang byug pa sna sman sogs/ /rtsub dro

rno ba'i sman gyis gso/ /'dir ni smyung ba'ang bsngags pa yin/ /'dus pa las ni 'dren mar gso/ /srin gyur sna sman khrag blugs te/ /de yis 'bu ni brgyal bar 'gyur/ /khrag gi dri yis ra ro nas/ /kha dang sna nas 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de nas sna sman dud brngub rnos/ /de

ni nye bar dbyung bar bya/ /nyungs kar nim pa ing gu dang / /pi lu'i mar dang sbyar ba yi/ /byi dang ga dang sa rdzi ka /dan+da shing kun ba gcin bskol/ /sna sman so sor gtang bar bya/ /byi dang ga ni ra gcin dang / /sbyar ba'i sna sman 'bu 'joms mchog /nya rul bcas pa'i sna

sman dang / /dud pa dag kyang brngub par bya/ /srin bus khrag ni 'thungs pa'i phyir/ /'di la khrag ni dbyung mi bya/ /mgo 'dar rlung gi mgo nad kyi/ /gso ba me btsa' ma gtogs bya/ /nye ba'i mgo nad skyes pa yi/ /rjes dang skyes ma thag la ni/ /rlung nad kyi ni gso ba bya/ /

smin nas khong 'bras gso las bya/ /'brum phran 'brum bu khong 'bras la/ /smin dang ma smin ji bzhin bya/ /srin las srin bu pad pa yis/ /gtar ga byas te nim pa'i chu/ /blugs shing rta spangs khu ba ni/ /lan tshwa shas cher btab pas bsku/ /nim pa pa to la'i lo ma/ /yungs

mar bcas pa zhib btags bsku/ /ba gcin 'ba' cha rnying par sbyar/ /khyim bya'i rtug pa dag gis bsku/ /gyo mor ru rta brngos pa dang / /til gyi phye mar bcas pa yis/ /glog pa bskus na g.ya' ba'am/ /chu 'dzag tsha ba sel bar byed/ /ma la dzi dang tsi tra ka/ /ka ra bI ra ka rany+dza/ /

til mar spu gris bregs pa yi/ /rjes bskus 'khor ling 'byi ba sel/ /des ma zhin mgo bo yi/ /sbyang bya slon sman sogs pa bya/ /mi bzad pa la dang por ni/ /dpral ba'i rtsa la gtar ga bya/ /mgo bo'i bkru sman sna sman gtang / /shing mngar pi la ya'i sa bon/ /ru rta ma

sha nyungs kar bcas/ /sbrang rtsir bcas pa'i lde gus bsku/ /rgya skyegs dong ga'i lo ma dang / /tsakra marda skyu ru ra/ /sbrang rtsir sbyar bas bskus kyang phan/ /khre rgod rtsa bsregs thal ba ni/ /chu dang sbyar bas bskus na phan/ /'khor ling skra 'byi'i nad la ni/ /nye bar gtar ga

gdab pa dang / /zhal zhal byas te na le sham/ /ldong ros spangs ma nag tshur bsku/ /yang na 'ba' cha'i thang shing ngam/ /'ol ma se yi 'bras bu'i rtsa/ /yang na lang ka li'i rtsa ba'am/ /ka ra bI ra'i khu ba 'am/ /kaN+Da kA ri'i khu ba ni/ /sbrang rtsir bcas pas bsku ba

'am/ /d+ha du spyor yi lo ma 'am/ /bse shing 'bras bu'i khu bas bsku/ /til gyi me tog gze ma dang / /mar dang sbrang rtsir bcas pa'am/ /glang po'i so bsregs til mar bsres/ /'khor ling 'byi ba'i sman mchog yin/ /skra dkar skye la lug gi rwa'i/ /snag tshas de

bzhin bsku bar bya/ /ji srid skra ni skyes kyi bar/ /chu blugs pa ni spang bar bya/ /spyi cer skra dkar gnyer ma mang / /skra ser skyes la sbyang byas nas/ /sna sman gtong dang mgo bkrus la/ /byug pa rnams kyis gso bar bya/ /bri ha ti sogs til

mar bskol/ /'tsho byed bskol ba'i sna sman blugs/ /nim pa'i mar gyis zla ba gcig /sna sman btang ste 'o ma blud/ /shri sha e raN+Da dang rams/ /bring ga rA dza'i khu bar sbangs/ /se'u lu til dang ba ru ra/ /pri yang ka ka ti'i sa bon/ /cha mnyam lcags la bskol nas ni/ /

nyi ma'i 'od la skams nas ni/ /mar 'dzag pa yi sna sman gtang / /'o ma 'thungs pas skra dkar sel/ /sa ha ra dza bye'u rug pa/ /bring ga ra dza'i khu ba ni/ /bre gang til mar phul gang dang / /shing mngar srang gcig btab ste bskol/ /a sa na'am rdo snod dam/ /lug gi

rwa yi nang du gzhug /ka ra bI ra pa ya s+ya/ /'o ma dang ni zhib btags pa/ /skra dkar phyung ba'i rjes bskus shing / /sbangs na skra dkar sel bar byed/ /bi la ya dang shing mngar dang / /'tsho byed sde tshan til nag dang / /sa nag 'o ma'i lde gu yis/ /gdong bskus gnyer ma

spu ser sel/ /til dang pad+ma ge sar dang / /shing mngar sbrang rtsi skyu ru ra/ /lde gu 'di yis mgo bskus na/ /skra 'phel gnag par 'gyur ba yin/ /spang spos ru rta til nag dang / /thal tres ut+pal sngon po dang / /'o mar btags te sbrang rtsir sbyar/ /skra ni 'phel bar byed

pa'i mchog /lcags phye bring ga ra dza dang / /'bras bu gsum dang sa nag po/ /bu ram shing khur zla gcig gzhug /skra dkar rtsad nas skyur bar byed/ /ma sha khre rgod skyur rtsabs dang / /nas thug lcags phye tsha mang btab/ /zhag gsum bzhag ste btags pa yis/ /bya dkar

yang ni nag por byed/ /shing mngar tsan+dan stag tsher ba/ /pi pi ling dang ut+pal dang / /skyu ru ra khu til mar bskol/ /sna sman bsku ba byas gyur na/ /skra dkar dang ni klad pa yi/ /nad kun 'joms par byed pa yin/ /nye'u shing dzi ban+ti'i khu ba/ /'o ma mar dang til mar dang / /

'tsho byed bskol ba'i sna sman gyis/ /nam tshong yan chad nad kun sel/ /rma bya'i sgro mkhris rgyu ma dang / /rkang pa rtug pa chu bor ba'i/ /sha dang ba la rtsa ba bcu/ /ra sna shing mngar srang gsum gsum/ /chu bskol khu ba mar bre gang / /'o ma bre gang bcas bskol ba/ /mngar

ba'i sman sde'i lde gu btab/ /de btung mas gtong bsku ba dang / /sna sman dag tu bsten pa yis/ /nam tshong yan chad nad kun sel/ /sman 'di dag gi lde gu dang / /dzi ban+ti dang 'bras bu gsum/ /med rgun 'brum dbyi mo dang / /pa ru sha ka sa mang ga /

ga pra'i rtsa ba tang pa la dang / /karka ta sring kha sral phre'u/ /'bro go pad+ma'i rtsa ba dang / /pad+ma'i sdong po kha rdzun/ /shing mngar nye'u shing dzi ba ka/ /bi da ri dang bu ram shing / /thal tres rnam gnyis bri ha ti/ /mur ba gze ma zangs rtsi ba/ /sring ga ta dang ka she ru/ /ra sna s+thi ra lca ba dang / /sug

smel zur ba ma nu dang / /ba spru ba dang cu gang dang / /ra mnye ba dang byi tsher ba/ /ma du ka dang star ga dang / /a bi shu ka muny+dza ka /zho ni gnyis gnyis phyir btags dang / /mar bre gang dang 'o ma ni/ /bzhi 'gyur dag dang bskol ba'i mar/ /'di ni rma bya chen mo ste/ /rma bya las ni yon tan

lhag /lus zungs dbang po nyams skad 'gags/ /lud pa dbugs mi bde nyen 'joms/ /zla mtshan khu ba'i skyon la'ang phan/ /mo gsham la yang bu skyed byed/ /byi ba khyim bya dang pa dang / /ri bong dang yang de bzhin sbyar/ /nam tshod yan chad gtogs pa'i nad/ /nyis brgya

sum cu rtsa gcig yin/ /de dag phan tshun ma 'dres par/ /rgya cher rab tu bshad pa yin/ /drang srong rnams kyis skyes bu'i mgo/ /rtsa ba 'og ni yal gar bshad/ /de phyir rtsa ba la gnod pa'i/ /nad ni myur du gso bar bya/ /gang la dbang po kun rten zhing / /gang la srog ni

gnas byed pas/ /des na yan lag dam pa yi/ /srung ba la ni 'bad par bya/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o// //yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /stod gso ba'i yan lag rdzogs so// //

de nas rma gso ba bshad par bya'o/ /rma ni lhan cig skyes glo bur/ /red dang ma red dbye ba gnyis/ /lus kyi nad gzhis skyed lhan cig /phyi rol rgyus byung glo bur ba'o/ /nad dang 'dres pa red pa yin/ /de med dag pa ma red yin/ /rma red kha rgyas zhum

pa dang / /shin tu sra ba'am shin tu snyi/ /shin tu mtho 'am shin tu dma'/ /shin tu grang ngam shin tu tsha/ /dmar zhing skya'am gnag pa nyid/ /rnag ni dri mnam yongs su 'dzag /sha dang rtsa rgyus 'drul ba dang / /g.yos shing mched la rab tu na/ /g.yo zhing tsha la skrang

ba dang / /g.ya' ba la sogs bla brnan bcas/ /yun ring du ni 'tsho ba dka'/ /rma red mtshan mar shes par bya/ /de ni khrag bcas nad bco lnga/ /de la rlung las gyur ba'i rma/ /gnag cing smug dmar thal mdog dang / /thi ba'i rus pa lta bur snang / /zho ga chu'am 'bras bkrus

chu/ /'dra ba'i chu sla nyung ngu 'dzag /sha zad shas cher na zhing zug /rtsub cing tsheg tsheg tsha ba yin/ /mkhris gyur myur rnags ser ba dang / /sngo zhing ser skya'am kham par 'dug /gcin dang thal chu rgya skyegs khu/ /til mar 'dra chu mang du 'dzag /rma la thal sman btab

ltar na/ /dmar zhing tsha la rnags pa yin/ /bad kan las gyur mdog skya g.ya'/ /chu ni ska ba mang du 'dzag /rma kha sbom zhing na ba dang / /rtsa rgyus kyis khyab nad tshabs chung / /khrag gyur byi ru'i mdog ltar dmar/ /khrag dang bcas pa'i rnag 'dzag cing / /rta bres kyi ni dri ltar

bro/ /mkhris pa'i mtshan ma dag dang ldan/ /gnyis sam gsum mam thams cad las/ /gyur pa'i mtshan ma 'dren ma yin/ /lce yi mdog 'dra 'jam zhing mnyen/ /rma kha smug cing 'brum phran can/ /mnyam pa dbus ma cung zad mtho/ /bla brnan med rma dag pa yin/ /pags

pa sha dang rtsa rgyus dang / /tshigs dang rus pa nang grol gnad/ /brgyad po der ni rma gnas pa/ /phyi ma bzhin du gso bar dka'/ /gso sla snying stobs me drod sha/ /na tshod nyams stobs ldan pa'i rma/ /zlum zhing dkyus ring rim gsum pa/ /zur bzhi pa ni gang yin dang / /de bzhin

dpyi rkub pho mtshan mchu/ /rgyab dang kha nang mkhur tshos byung / /gso dka' mig dang so dang ni/ /sna dang mig zur lte ba dang / /srubs mtshams lto ba rna ba dang / /rtsib logs mchan khung nu mar byung / /lbu ba rnag 'dzag rlung 'byung zhing / /zug rngur bcas shing stong nas 'dzag /mtshan

bar rdol zhing kha nang bltas/ /de bzhin rked pa'i rus par gnas/ /mdze can dug gis phog pa dang / /lus skem gcin nad sbrang rtsi 'dra/ /rma steng rma ni byung ba gang / /rma de gso bar dka' ba yin/ /me dbal rims dang tshad par 'khru/ /lud pa lu dang skom dad che/ /gnyid

med pa dang dbugs mi bde/ /me drod chung bar gyur pa yi/ /rma ni 'tsho ba par mi 'gyur ro/ /mgo bo'i thod pa chag gyur cing / /klad rgyas mtshan ma snang de bzhin/ /chu ba rul zhing rtsa chad dang / /rma phugs ring dang srin bus zos/ /rus pa chag dang zug rngur bcas/ /dug

bcas pa dang ma rtogs dang / /bcing ba nyes dang snum ches dang / /rtsub pas spu sogs bdar ba dang / /bskyod dang khong pa ma dag dang / /'grangs drags nyams smad drags pa dang / /chang 'thungs nyin par gnyid log dang / /nyal po la brten mtshan gnyid yar/ /rma

ni log par gsos pa dag /gsos kyang 'drub par mi 'gyur ro/ /gang zhig nang ni thi pa'i mdog /'dra zhing rnags pa med pa dang / /brtan zhing 'brum bu rnyid bcas pa/ /'tsho bar 'gyur bar de bshad do/ /de nas 'dir skrang gnas skabs su/ /gang la nye ba de las sbyang / /

sbyangs pas skrangs par gyur pa dang / /rma ni myur du 'tshob par 'gyur/ /skrangs pa'i skabs su rgyun du ni/ /nye bar spyod pa bsil bas gso/ /de yis nad med chu lta bur/ /mod la zhi bar 'gyur ba yin/ /rma skrang sra bar gyur pa dang / /nad bcas mdog ni mi sdug dang / /dug

can la ni khyad par du/ /pad pa sogs shes khrag dbyung ngo / /nad khrag bral nas mod la ni/ /skrang dang mdog dmar nad zhir 'gyur/ /khrag dbyung nas ni cung zad lus/ /reg na nus pa rab bsil ba/ /shin tu zhib par de nyid btags/ /bu ram shing khu 'o mas sbrus/ /lan brgyar

bskus pa'i mar dang bcas/ /gzhan ma skam par yang dang yang / /rjes su mthun par bskus na phan/ /byugs dang blugs pa de bzhin bya/ /u dum bA ra n+ya gro dang / /blag sha lcang ma a shwad+tha'i/ /shun pa mar dang bcas bskus na/ /skrangs pas

sel ba'i mchog yin no/ /rlung shas che zhing mkhrang ba dang / /sra zhing nad tshabs che ba dang / /khrag 'dzag pa dang rma skrang ba/ /'di lta bu yi rma la ni/ /rlan can sha btags la dugs bya/ /zar ma til ni brngos pa dang / /'o mas dbal ni bsad pa dag /de btags bskus na tsha

na sel/ /rma skrangs brtan zhing nad tshabs chung / /bad kan rlung 'joms snum bsku zhing / /de yi rjes la 'od ma yi/ /sbu gus rim gyis dugs bya'o/ /zhu bar bya phyir lag mthil lam/ /mthe bo yis ni mnye bar bya/ /nas dang gro dang mon sran sde'u/ /btsos te btags pa'i

lde gus bsku/ /gal te de yis ma zhum na/ /de nas de ni dkri bar bya/ /ma smin pa ni zhi 'gyur la/ /smin na rnags pa nyid du 'gyur/ /rgya shug til dang zar ma dang / /rgyam tsha phabs dang ru rta'i phye/ /zho skyur zan dron gyis glan zhing / /dugs byas nas ni dkri bar bya/ /legs smin

skrangs pa phyogs gcig 'dus/ /btsir bas nye bar btsir gyur pa/ /dral bar 'os la dral bya zhing / /shin tu 'jam por gyur pa'ang dral/ /gu gul zar ma ba lang so/ /khron bu phug ron rtug pa dang / /thal sman 'phrod dang thal sman de/ /smin pa'i sman gyis brtol bar bya/ /nang na

rnag 'byung sgo phra zhing / /mtho bar gyur dang gnad la gnas/ /snum med btsir ba'i sman gyis ni/ /kun nas rab tu btsir bar bya/ /bsku ba bskams na btsir ba yi/ /las la btang snyoms nyid du bya/ /de yi rma sgor mi bsku ste/ /de 'dras nad ni 'byung mi 'gyur/ /sran ma nas

dang gro dang ni/ /ma sha shu dag bra bo dang / /sman ni spyi bag can dag gis/ /pags pa'i rtsa ba rab tu bsdams/ /gcin snyi mdze yi rma dang ni/ /shas cher red pa'i rma dag la/ /dong ga bye'u rug pa sogs kyis/ /lan ni bdun bdun bkru sogs bya/ /ma dag nim pa pa to

la'i/ /lo ma bskol bas bkru bar bya/ /rma dag pa la n+ya gro d+ha/ /la sogs shun lpags bskol bas bkru/ /shing mngar til dang pa to la/ /dur byid dan da ser po gnyis/ /nim pa'i lo ma rgya mtshar bcas/ /lde gus bskus na rma sbyong byed/ /rma ni kha phrag nad mtshams

gnas/ /da rgyam tsha lang ka li/ /dud byid sbrang rtsir sbyar ba yi/ /reng bur byas pas rma sbyang bya/ /rlung gis gnod cing khrag bcas shing / /mi bzad na la nas dang gro/ /spra tshil shri ba kra ka dang / /thang shing mar bcas dud pas bdug/ /khrag mkhris dag gi shas che la/ /

shin tu bsil ba'i sman gyis bsku/ /skam zhing sha nyung gting ring rma/ /sha skyed pa yi sman bya ste/ /shug pa n+ya gro d+ha sogs dang / /ba la a shwa gan+d+ha til/ /bskus te sha ni bskyed par bya/ /sha za'i sha ni cho ga bzhin/ /g.yos su byas te sbyin par bya/ /sems dga' ba dang

sha za yi/ /sha zos na ni sha 'phel 'gyur/ /sha snyi 'bur bar gyur pa la/ /dzA ti'i me tog nag tshur dang / /ldong ros ba bla gu gul dang / /tsi tra ka sogs lde gus bsku/ /sha 'bur bar ni sra ba dang / /g.ya' zhing ring nas 'tsho ba dang / /rma ni na zhing sbyang dka' la/ /thal sman

las kyis sbyang bar bya/ /rde'u dbyung rma ni gcin 'dzag dang / /gang gzhan khrag ni 'byung ba dang / /gang zhig bcad nas sbyar ba dang / ji skad bshad pa'i cho ga yis/ /gso bar byed bzhin mi 'grub na/ /de ni me yi las kyis gso/ /skyon med rma la rma 'byor ba'i/ /sman dang sha

skyed gang yin sbyar/ /a shwa gan+d+ha seng phrom dang / /shing mngar btsod dang kad pha la/ /da ta ki yi me tog gi /phye ma rma 'tshob byed pa'i mchog /rnag dang sha ni med pa dang / /sha yi gnas su ma 'drubs par/ /til dang shing mngar bcas pa yi/ /lde gus rma ni 'tshob par bya/ /

snum dro mngar dang kha ba dang / /bska bas thams cad sel bar byed/ /nim pa'i lo ma sbrang rtsir bcas/ /bskus pas rma sbyor mchog yin no/ /snga ma gnyis dang zhun mar sbyar/ /myur du rma 'tshob byed pa yin/ /til 'drar nas kyi lde gu ni/ /de dang 'dra bar la la 'dod/ /

khrag mkhris dug dang glo bur dang / /gting ring tsha dang bcas pa'i rma/ /'o ma rma 'byor sman dang ni/ /bskol ba'i mar gyis rma 'tshob bya/ /bad kan rlung gyur rma 'byor sman/ /til mar bcas pas rma 'tshob 'gyur/ /nag tshur seng phrom a ru ra/ /li khri

dngul rdo sra rtsi pog /spangs ma po son cha'i phye ma/ /til mar bcas pa rma 'tshob mchog /mnyam zhing sha ni brtan pa dang / /pags par gnas la phye ma phan/ /u dum wA ra a shwat+tha/ /'dzam bu seng phrom kad pha la/ /ka ku seng phrom phye mas gdab/ /pags pa myur du

skyed par byed/ /rgya skyegs ldong ros btsod dang ni/ /ba la dang ni ser po gnyis/ /sbrang rtsi mar sbyar lde gu yis/ /bskus na pags pa dag byed mchog /skyer pa a mra'i rus pa dang / /nA ga ge sar bri yang ku/ /tsan+dan ser po dngul chu rnams/ /lde gu ba lang lci khu dang / /sbyar ba

bskus par gyur na ni/ /pags pa mdog 'drar byed mchog yin/ /ba so dud pa ma shor bsregs/ /skyer khan+Da dang til mar sbyar/ /bskus na spu ni skyed par byed/ /de bzhin rkang bzhi'i sen mo spu/ /rus pa pags pa rwa rmig bsregs/ /snag tsha til mar dang sbyar bas/ /bskus

na spu ni skyed par byed/ /smin ma la ni cha spyad kyi/ /las bshad phan dang gnod pa bsten/ /rlung gyur rma la rtsa ba lnga/ /gnyis dang rlung 'joms sde tshan phan/ /mkhris gyur shug pa n+ya gro dang / /sde tshan gnyis dang mkhris 'joms gtong / /bad kan las gyur dong ga'i sde/ /bad

kan 'joms par byed pa gtang / /'dren ma las gyur 'dren mar byas/ /'di dag gis bkru byugs pa dang / /sman mar til mar sman khu dang / /phye ma ril bu bdun po ni/ /rma la ci rigs sbyar bar bya/ /dzA ti nim pa pa to la'i lo ma/ /skyer pa yung ba thal tres pu tse shel/ /

spra tshil spangs ma shing mngar a ru ra/ /ka rany+dza yi sa bon btsod dang btsos/ /mar bskol 'dis ni rma kha chung ba dang / /nad la brten zhing rnag ni 'dzag pa dang / /rma yi phugs ring nad bcas phugs ring ba'i/ /rma ni dag cing 'tshob par byed pa yin/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying

po bsdus pa las/ /phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu rtsa lnga ba'o// //de nas 'phral du byung ba'i rma'i gso ba bshad par bya'o/ /rma gang snad pas 'phral du ni/ /byung gyur glo bur rma zhes bya/ /de ni mtha' yas kyang yan lag /gnas pa rnam pa brgyad du bshad/ /bshus

dang bcad dang rnam par bcad/ /rab tu 'phyang dang lhung ba dang / /phug dang gshags dang grugs pa'o/ /de la bshus pa chu ser ram/ /khrag ni nyung zad 'byung 'gyur zhing / /pags pa chos pas tsha 'gyur yin/ /de las tshos gyur bcad pa yin/ /de las chos pa rnam bcad yin/ /

rab 'phyang rus par lhag ma lus/ /lhung ba lus las phogs pa yin/ /zug rngu phra mo 'bigs pas phug /khong pa ma gtogs bsnun pa yin/ /snga ma las gzhan gshags pa yin/ /khrag dang rkang ni 'dres gyur pa/ /mtshon gyis drag tu bsnun pa yis/ /rus bcas rgya cher

snad grugs pa/ /de la 'phral du byung ba'i rma/ /zug gzer shin tu che ba la/ /shing mngar mar dang bskol ba'am/ /ba la'i til mar dro 'jam blugs/ /snad pa'i tsha ba zhi bya'i phyir/ /bsku ba la sogs snum pa dang / /bsil dang mngar ba'i sman gyis ni/ /de yi mdo la blugs

par bya/ /'phral gyi rma ni rgya che la/ /sbyar ba'i phyir ni sbrang rtsi dang / /mar gyis mchog tu bsku bya zhing / /mkhris 'joms bsil ba'i gso ba bya/ /nad kyi rtsom pa che ba la/ /steng dang 'og nas sbyang bar bya/ /smyung ba bya zhing 'bras chan sbyin/ /rgyun du gtar ga gdab par bya/ /

bshus dang grugs pa 'di nyid de/ /cho ga 'di nyid lhag par sbyar/ /de gnyis khrag ni nyung shas 'dzag /smin pa'ang myur ba nyid du 'gyur/ /phal cher rma ni shas cher 'byung / /gzhan las khrag ni 'byung gyur la/ /de yis khrag ni zad gyur pas/ /rlung 'khrugs nad ni skyed pa las/ /

rlung 'joms sman dang bskol ba yi/ /snum blugs pa dang sman chu blugs/ /dugs dang bsku dang dkri ba dang / /snum gyi 'jam rtsi rnams kyang bya/ /de ltar zhag bdun par bshad pa'i/ /'phral gyi rma byung cho ga bshad/ /zhag bdun nas ni shugs zad nas/ /sngar bshad pa yi cho gas

spyad/ /'dir ni phal cher spyi'i cho ga /re re'i gso ba bshad bya ste/ /shus la na ba myur bsal phyir/ /rma la phan pa'i phye mas gdab/ /bcad pa rma sel lde gus bsku/ /rnam par bcad dang rab 'phyang la/ /cho ga bzhin du btsem pa dang / /bcing ba dang ni

btsir bar bya/ /mig bcang ba ni gsor mi rung / /ma zhar phyir ni 'phyang ba la/ /rang gi gnas su legs gzhag cing / /rtsam 'chol bar byas nas ni/ /pad+ma'i 'dab mas g.yogs nas ni/ /lag pas dal gyis mnan par bya/ /de nas shing mngar dzi ba ka/ /zangs rtsi ba dang ut+pa

la/ /mar dang 'o ma bcas bskol ba'i/ /sman thigs blugs dang sna sman dang / /brta ba'i cho ga dag kyang bya/ /mig nad thams cad sel mchog yin/ /mig phugs zhugs la mgul pa bsdam/ /slon dang lud pa sbrid pa 'byung / /yang na dbugs 'byung dbugs brngub bsdam/ /

rma byung mig gi gso ba bya/ /rna ba bogs pa btsems nas ni/ /bu ga til mar dag gis dgang / /ltag pa'i sum mdo chod gyur te/ /rlung ni 'byung bar gyur pa la'ang / /mnyam du bzhag ste bar mtshams ni/ /med par btsems te bcing bar bya/ /de la ra yi mar sar gyis/ /

blugs pa dag ni rab tu bsngags/ /gan rkyal bzhag ste kha zas sbyin/ /legs par spyod lam bsdams te nyal/ /yan lag thad kar gnas pa yi/ /rma byung yan lag legs gzhag ste/ /btsems la dkri zhing bcing bya zhing / /gos ni mthug pos bcing bar bya/ /pags

pa'i 'ur mthil bcing bas ni/ /phrag pa'i rma la bcing bar bya/ /rlig pa 'phyang la rkang par ni/ /sbu gus chu ni gtor nas kyang / /rlig pa bcug ste ras bal dang / /bcas pa'i khab kyis btsem par bya/ /'ur mthil bcing bar byas pa la/ /rked pa nas ni srad bus gdags/ /

der ni rma ni 'dul gyur pas/ /snum dang dugs kyi las mi bya/ /pri yang ku dang a ga ru/ /sug smel dzA ti par pa ta/ /tsan+dan ldong ros skyer pa dang / /sle tres dang ni spangs ma dang / /til mar bskol bas rma 'tshob byed/ /yan lag ma las chad pa la/ /til mar bskol bas

bsregs nas ni/ /sgye'u bcing bas bcing bar bya/ /de nas rma ltar gso bar bya/ /phug pa zug rngu phyung bas gso/ /grugs dang chag grugs gso bar bya/ /mgo bo'i zug rngu dbyung ba la/ /skra yi ye'u gzhug par bya/ /gzhan du klad rgyas 'dzag pa yis/ /rlung 'khrugs

de ni gsod par 'gyur/ /rma 'tshob nas ni rim gyis ni/ /skra ni dal gyis dbyung bar bya/ /klad rgyas 'dzag la srog chags ni/ /gzhan gyi klad pa sbyin par bya/ /gzhan las zug rngu phyung nas ni/ /rma der ring bu snum can gzhug /phugs ring kha ni chung ba dang / /rma gang rnag

dang khrag 'dzag la/ /'khor los btsir ba'i til mar blugs/ /de ni sbu gu chung ngus gtang / /khong pa brtol te khrag gis gang / /brgyal zhing snying ga rtsib logs na/ /rims 'debs lus tsha lto spo skom/ /zas la mngon par mi dga' zhing / /bshang ba gcin dang 'phyen

'gags la/ /mig dmar rngul 'byung dbugs mi bde/ /kha nang khrag gi dri bro zhing / /lus kyang dri mi zhim par 'gyur/ /ma zhu'i gnas na gnas pa'i khrag /khrag tu yang ni skyug par byed/ /shin tu shas cher lto spo zhing / /gzer nad kyis kyang gnod par byed/ /zhu ba'i gnas na gnas

pa'i khrag /gzer bcas lus ni lci bar byed/ /lto ba man chad grang ba dang / /bu ga las kyang khrag 'byung 'gyur/ /gnas ni zhig par ma gyur kyang / /khrag ni 'dzag par gyur pa yis/ /bu ga las ni 'gengs byed de/ /lgang pa'i ngos nas 'gengs dang 'dra/ /khrag nad

yod pa de la ni/ /rkang lag kha dang dbugs grang zhing / /mig dmar gdong ni skya pa dang / /lto sbo ba ni spang bar bya/ /ma zhur gnas la skyug sman gtang / /zhu ba'i gnas la gnas pa la/ /bkru sman dang ni ni ru ha/ /snum med dro bas sbyang bar bya/ /nas dang rgya shug rgya sran gyi/ /

khu ba snum ni med pa dang / /nas thug kha zas bza' ba dang / /lce myang tsha dang ldan pa sbyin/ /khrag ni mang du 'dzag pa dang / /khong pa snad la khrag blud bya/ /rgyu ma 'byar dang chad par nyen/ /khong pa snad pa gnyis su bshad/ /dang por brgyal sogs chung ba yin/ /gnyis pa shas

cher gnod par byed/ /rgyu ma 'byar ba the tshom bcas/ /rgyu ma chad pa 'tsho mi 'gyur/ /gang gi bshang dang gcin dang 'phyen/ /rang gi lam las byung gyur la/ /bla brnan med par rdol gyur kyang / /'tsho bar 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /ma rdol rgyu ma byung ba ni/ /

gzhug par bya zhing gzhan du min/ /grog ma'i mgo bo bcad nas ni/ /de yang gzhug ces pa la smra/ /rdul dang khrag dang rtsa yis gos/ /'o mas legs par bkrus nas ni/ /sen mo bregs te mar gyis bskus/ /rim gyis legs par gzhug par bya/ /skam po 'o mas

spangs nas ni/ /mar sar mang po bsku bar bya/ /sor mos mgul pa mnye ba dang / /chu yis kyang ni gtor bar bya/ /de ltar rgyu ma nang zhugs nas/ /de yi tshe na btsir bar bya/ /rma kha chung dang sbom pa yis/ /rgyu ma khong par ma chud na/ /de yi tshad tsam lto ba ni/ /dbral te

nang du gzhug par bya/ /gnas su legs par 'dug gyur nas/ /de rjes rgyu ma'i rma btsem bya/ /gnas su legs par ma bzhag na/ /de ni 'khrugs pas 'chi bar 'gyur/ /de rjes ras kyis dkris nas ni/ /mar gyis bsku zhing blugs par bya/ /de nas ngan da til mar dang / /

sbyar ba'i 'o ma dro 'jam blud/ /des ni bshang ba snyi ba dang / /rlung ni bde bar 'byung bar 'gyur/ /ji skad bshad pa'i spyod pa bsrung / /lo gcig bar du 'bad par bya/ /lto las tshil ni byung gyur na/ /thal ba'am ni sa dag gam/ /ro bska ba yi rtsa ba dag /zhib tu btags pas

btab nas ni/ /de nas srad bus dam du bcing / /sman pa mkhas pas gcad par bya/ /mtshon rnon me la bsregs pa yis/ /lan cig kho na gcad par bya/ /gzhan du byas nas gcod pa'i tshe/ /na zhing sbo 'am 'chi bar 'gyur/ /sbrang rtsir bcas pas rma bcings la/ /kha zas zhu

nas 'o ma mar/ /dan te rgya skyegs gze ma dang / /shing mngar kha ra bskol ba blud/ /shing mngar bcas pa sngar gyi ni/ /cho gas na dang tsha ba sel/ /tshil gyi rmen bur bshad pa yi/ /til mar bskus na'ang phan pa yin/ /bal bu'i lo ma shug pa dang / /spang spos ha re Nu ka

dang / /a ga ru dang tsan+dan dang / /pad+ma'i sa bon ser po gnyis/ /u shi ra dang shing mngar bcas/ /bskol ba 'phral gyi rma la ni/ /'tsho bar byed pa'i dam par bshad/ /mtshon gyis bsnun pas mi mngon pa/ /g.yang sa mthon po nas lhung ba/ /rlung mkhris 'joms sman

'drangs pa dang / /mnye dang bsku dang sbyang ba bya/ /lus tshigs bye dang mnyes pa dang / /gnad du bsnun pas nyen pa la/ /snod chen til mar gyis bkang bar/ /gzhug cing sha khu sbyin par bya/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu rtsa drug

pa'o// //de nas chag grugs gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /lhung dang snad sogs kyis rus tshigs/ /tshigs dang tshigs min chag gyur gnyis/ /tshigs byung gyur na brkyang dang bskum/ /nus pa med pa nyid du 'gyur/ /gzhan dag shin tu skrangs pa dang / /

gnas skabs kun tu rab tu na/ /bskyod pa chung ngu'ang mi nus shing / /btsir na sgra dang bcas pa yin/ /de ltar chag grugs mdor bsdus pa'i/ /mtshan nyid yin te de dbye ba/ /chag pa'i dbye bas du mar 'gyur/ /de dag kun gyi gso ba ni/ /ji ltar 'tsham pa bzhin du ni/ /de bzhin de

ni nye bar bstan/ /mang du phra mor chag pa dang / /reg na sgra ni 'khrol ba dang / /gang du rus pa chag pa yi/ /bar du rus pa phra mo zhugs/ /yang na snad pas chag pa las/ /cung zad lus par gyur pa dang / /gang yang bteg pa'i tshe na ni/ /rma ltar rkang du nub pa dang / /nus zhan

sbig par gyur pa dang / /rlung can nyung zad spang bar bya/ /dpyi yi rus mig chag pa dang / /gang yang tshigs bye lhung pa dang / /ro smad zhib tu grugs pa'am/ /chag par gyur pa gang yin dang / /thod pa'i mtshams ni ma 'byor ba'am/ /de bzhin dpral ba phye mar gyur/ /gang yang mur

'gram chag pa dang / /ltag pa nu ma'i par chad spang / /rus pa legs par chag gyur kyang / /bzhag nyes bcings ni nyes pa dang / /gang zhig bskyod pas gnod gyur pa/ /de yang spang bar bya ba yin/ /gdod nas rus pa'i tshigs dag ni/ /nyes par skyes gyur de yang spang / /

rus pa gzhon nu gug pa dang / /sbu ba can chag par gyur pa dang / /thod pa gyes par gyur pa dang / /gzhan yang mang du gas pa rnams/ /de nas dma' ba bstod par bya/ /mthon po mnan par bya ba yin/ /nung du nub pa drang bar bya/ /'og tu song ba steng du drang / /

'degs dang mnan dang smad pa dang / /pags pa bsdus te bcing ba dang / /de ltar bzhag pa'i thabs kyis ni/ /lus su gtogs pa'i tshigs thams cad/ /g.yo ba'am mi g.yo gang yang rung / /legs par bzhag ste mi 'gyur bya/ /ras ma mar ni mang bas dkri/ /

u dum bA ra ka dam pa/ /ardzu na dang a shwat+tha/ /sardza dang ni pa la sha /'od ma las byung shun zheng che/ /'jam pas legs par 'jar ba dang / /rten dang bcas shing mi 'gyur ba'i/ /shun pa'am dum bu dag dang ni/ /'jag mas legs par dkri bya zhing / /ras kyis steng du

glan par bya/ /bcing ba lhod par gyur pa yis/ /mtshams sbyor brtan por mi 'gyur ro/ /dam pos shin tu na zhing tsha/ /rnag dang skrangs pa 'byung bar 'gyur/ /sos ka'i dus su zhag gsum/ /dgun gyi dus su bdun nas dgrol/ /thun mong dus su zhag lnga nas/ /yang

na chag pa'i dbang las dgrol/ /de nas n+ya gro d+ha sogs pa'i/ /khu ba bsil ba'i chu blugs bya/ /de ni nang bcas rtsa ba lnga/ /'o ma bskol ba blugs par bya/ /mkhas pas til mar 'khor los btsir/ /rlung 'joms sran dang bcas pa ni/ /dro 'jam tsam ni bsku bar bya/ /dus

dang yul gyi dbye bas bya/ /khu ba shin tu grang mo ni/ /rgyun du blugs shing lde gus bsku/ /ba gsar 'o ma mar dang bcas/ /mngar ba'i sman dang bskol ba dag /rgya skyegs khu bar bcas pa ni/ /chag grugs can la nang re blud/ /chag grugs rma dang bcas pa ni/ /rma la shing

mngar mar shas che/ /lde gu bskus pa'am yang na ni/ /lhag ma chag grugs lta bur gso/ /rma yi sha ni 'phyang ba la/ /sbrang rtsi mar gyis bskus nas ni/ /sman pas rma ni kha sbyar nas/ /bcing ba dag kyang legs par bya/ /de ni mnyam zhing legs bzhag nas/ /pri yang ku dang kad

pa la/ /seng phrom btsod dang da ta ki /phye mas legs par bdar bya'am/ /seng phrom da ta ki'i phye ma/ /btab na myur du 'tsho bar 'gyur/ /de ltar chag grugs gso ba yin/ /lus zungs brtan la dgun gyi tshe/ /sha chen nad gzhi chung ba'i rma/ /gso sla gzhan ni gso bar

dka'/ /na tshod dang po bar ma mtha'/ /zla gcig gnyis dang gsum rim gyis/ /cho ga ji skad bshad bsten na/ /rma 'byor brtan par 'gyur ba yin/ /rked pa rje ngar brla chag na/ /spang leb la ni nyal na phan/ /de bzhin bsdams phyir phur pa lnga/ /byas nas nye bar brtod

bya ste/ /rje dar ngos gnyis la gnyis gnyis/ /rkang mthil drang po gcig bzhag brtod/ /sta zur ram ni sgal tshigs sam/ /gdong dang de bzhin phrag pa rus/ /tshigs byung chag grugs byung gyur na/ /cho ga 'di bzhin spyad par bya/ /tshigs ni byung nas yun ring la/ /snum bsku

dugs kyis mnyen byas te/ /'di bshad thabs dang rang gi blos/ /rang gi gnas su legs par gzhug /tshigs min chag ste 'drubs pa dang / /bcings nyes pa yis gsos pa la/ /brdungs te chag grugs bsrang bar bya/ /de nas chag grugs bzhin du gso/ /chag

nas ci nas ma rnags pa/ /de ltar sman pas 'bad par bya/ /sha dang rtsa rgyus 'drul na ni/ /tshigs ni 'drubs par mi 'gyur ro/ /chag grugs can la rlung nad kyi/ /skabs bshad snum ni sbyar bar bya/ /stobs bskyed sbyor ba bzhi po dang / /'jam rtsi'i las kyang bsten par

bya/ /sA lu'i chan ngang sha khu mar/ /'o ma rgyas byed bsil ba bsten/ /chag grugs can la rus pa'i mtshams/ /'byor byed tshad tsam sbyin par bya/ /de ni mtshams sbyor byed pas na/ /rmya bar byed pa bsngags pa yin/ /lan tshwa tsha dang thal sman dang / /snum dang nyal po nyi

tshan dang / /rtsol ba bsten par mi bya zhing / /chag grugs zas rtsub bsten mi bya/ /til nag phub ma med pa ras sra'i nang du gtums/ /chu yi nang du zhag bdun nye bar spangs gyur cing / /'di ni bteg ste nyin re legs par bskams nas ni/ /de bzhin 'o ma chu dang shing mngar

nang du bskol/ /slar yang 'o mar snga ma bzhin du spangs te bskams/ /phub ma med cing rdul med zhib tu btags nas ni/ /spang spos ba la ka dang btsod dang chu srin sen/ /shu ti ku tan nad ru rta ba la gsum/ /tsan+dan gur gum dang ni thal tres a ga ru/ /

sgron shing sra rtsi pog dang thang shing shug pa'i sde/ /de yi phye ma dri zhim 'o ma lhan cig btags/ /dri yi sman ni ma lus 'o mar bskol ba btsir/ /rdo dreg ra sna aM shu ma ti dang / /ka she ru dang gan+d+ha bri yang ku/ /rgya spos gan+d+ha b+ha dra seng phrom dang / /pa ya s+ya dang mur ba 'o

mar bcas/ /spang spos sogs dang til mar de bskol ba/ /dri yi til mar mchog 'dis rus pa dag /brtan zhing myur du zhi bar byed mchog yin/ /rlung dang mkhris pa las gyur nad kyis khyab/ /sbyor ba sna tshogs bsten pas sel ba yin/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus

pa las/ phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o// //de nas mtshan bar rdol gyi le'u bshad par bya'o/ /glang po rta la zhon te 'gro/ /gnas dang mal sar tsog pur 'dug /gzhang 'brum nad kyi rgyur bshad dang / /gzhan la'ang brten par gyur pa

dang / /mi dge smin par gyur pa dang / /'phral du dam pa la smad pas/ /phal cher 'brum phran dang por 'byung / /rkub kyi phyi'am nang du ni/ /rma ni sor tshad gnyis sam gcig /sha khrag gnod par gyur las 'byung / /chu sor gcin gyi gnas nye bar/ /byung bas 'dzag pa'i

rang bzhin can/ /de ni mtshan par rdol zhes bya/ /kun kyang ma gsos 'drul byed cing / /mo mtshan chu so gzhang gi bar/ /shas cher 'jig par byed pa dang / /bshang gci 'phyen dang khu chu ni/ /bu ga'i nang nas rim gyis 'byung / /nad gzhi re re ldan pa 'dus/ /glo bur ba dang

brgyad du bshang / /ma smin 'brum bu zhes byar bshad/ /smin pa mtshan bar rdol yin no/ /rtsa ba mi mngon nad tshabs che/ /shas cher g.yos shing rma 'khyims 'khrugs/ /mtshan bar rdol 'gyur shes par bya/ /de las gzhan du de mi byed/ /de las rlung gyur 'brum bu ni/ /

dmar zhing gnag la na ba dang / /zug cing 'phar bar byed pa yin/ /mkhris gyur rnga mo'i mgrin ltar ring / /dmar zhing srab la shas cher tsha/ /thal mdog dud pa 'thul bcas yin/ /bad kan las gyur brtan zhing snum/ /rtsa ba che zhing mdog skya g.ya'/ /rlung mkhris las

gyur mdog gnag cing / /dmar zhing tsha la mi bzod na/ /bad rlung las gyur cung zad gnag /smin par dka' ba'i mtshan nyid can/ /'dus gyur rkang pa'i mthe bo 'dra/ /nad ni sna tshogs 'byung 'gyur zhing / /gzer dang skam dad yi ga 'chus/ /rims dang slon sogs

kyis gnod byed/ /yal bar bor la smin pa dang / /rma nyid du ni 'gyur ba yin/ /de la rlung gyur 'brum bu ni/ /kha phra mang pos khyab byed de/ /ko tshags bzhin du kha mang zhing / /rim 'phel chu ser sla ba dang / /lbu ba can ni rgyun du 'dzag /ko tshags kha brgya pa zhes

bya/ /mkhris pa las gyur rnga mo'i mgrin/ /bad kan las gyur spyi bag ni/ /mang 'dzag yongs su 'dzag ces bya/ /rlung mkhris las gyur bshang sgor ni/ /yongs su mched pa kun khyab cing / /der ni ra ba'i 'obs kyis ni/ /bskor ba lta bur 'byung bar 'gyur/ /rlung
