dang bad kan las gyur grang / /gzhan du drang por song 'gas byed/ /bad mkhris las gyur sngar bshad pa'i/ /gzhang 'brum la brten de ldang zhing / /de las gzhang 'brum rtsa bar g.ya'/ /skrang dang tsha ba la sogs skyed/ /de ni myur smin rdol gyur na/ /gzhang 'brum rtsa ba rnag

can yin/ /rgyun mi chad par 'dzag byed de/ /gzhang 'brum 'di ni mtshan bar rdol/ /'dus pa las gyur dung 'dra ba/ /dung ni 'khyil pa'i dbyibs dang 'dra/ /'di yis gzhang ni zhig byed cing / /mi bzad lam ni zhig par byed/ /gang tshe sha la brkam pa yis/ /rus pa'i

dum bu zos gyur pas/ /thad kar song bas lam log zhugs/ /rdol zhing snad par byed pa yin/ /de tshags pas rnags pa dang / /sha ni 'drul bar byed pa yin/ /der ni srin bu skye 'gyur zhing / /gzhang ni kun tu za bar byed/ /ring por mi thogs des 'jig byed/ /de

ni lam log rma skyes yin/ /de las na tsha g.ya' la sogs/ /rma gso ba las shes par bya/ /de las drug po gso dka' yin/ /'dus gyur rma skyes spang bar bya/ /sel ba'i gnyer mar phyin pa dang / /srubs mtshams la ni brten

pa'ang spang / /de nas 'brum bu'i tshe nyid ni/ /'di ni 'bad de gso bar bya/ /sbyang dang gtar ga chu blugs sogs/ /ci nas smin par mi 'gyur bar/ /'di ni 'bad de gso bar bya/ /smin nas slar yang snum chos dang / /dugs byas nas ni lus spying bya/ /gzhang 'brum

lta bur bsdams nas ni/ /gting ring legs par brtag bya zhing / /rtsa ba'am ni rtse mo'am/ /phyi bltas nang du bltas pa brtags/ /de la nang bltas btsal nas ni/ /gtsags bus legs par gcad par bya/ /phyir bltas ma lus par bcad la/ /thal sman dag gis gso bar

bya/ /de nas thal sman btab pa'am/ /yang na sman pas me btsa' gdab/ /rnga mo'i mgrin la thal sman bsku/ /ko tshags kha brgya sbubs gcig pa/ /bcug nas legs par gcad par bya/ /de 'drubs nas ni lhag ma'ang gcad/ /gzhan du gzhang ni zhig nas 'chi/ /'obs ltar khyab

pa'ang de bzhin du/ /thal sman pa gcin sbu gus gso/ /gzhang 'brum mtshan bar rdol la sngar/ /gzhang 'brum la ni sman phye gdab/ /rma skyes pa la re thag bcad/ /zug rngu dbyung ba'i cho ga bzhin/ /zug rngu phyung ste srin 'joms pa'i/ /bza' dang byug pa sbyar bar bya/ /glan dugs

sbu gu can la sogs/ /snum chos legs sbyar nad la phan/ /ko tshags 'dra dang thams cad la/ /ba lang dogs dang kun tu bzang / /gshol phyed pa dang gshol gyis bya/ /brtags te nye bar sbyar bar bya/ /ngos su 'debs par byed pa'i mtshon/ /ba lang ngogs zhes bya bar bshad/ /kun

tu gtong ba kun tu bzang / /ngos la gcod pa gshol phyed pa/ /ngos gnyis su ni gshol gyis bcad/ /'dzag pa'i lam ni ma lus pa/ /thams cad me yis bsreg par bya/ /slar yang 'di lta'i gnod mi bskyed/ /sman pas de yi bar bar du/ /de yi lto sbyang la 'bad bya/ /byi la'i rus

pa 'bras bu gsum/ /khu ba lde gur byas pas bsku/ /dzo ti sma ti ma la yu/ /sle sman ta ka bi sha l+ya/ /dur byid pa ti ba tra ka /ka ra bI ra sra rtsi pog /shu dag su d+ha k+Shir dang / /arka'i lo ma til mar bskol/ /mtshan bar rdol la bskus na ni/ /'di ni phan byed mchog tu bshad/ /

shing mngar seng phrom pi pi ling / /sug smel ha re Nu ka dang / /ser po gnyis dang pri yang+ku/ /rgyam tsha thal tres shug pa dang / /pad+ma'i snying po da ta ki /spra tshil ru rta sra rtsi pog /kha lung 'o mar bcas pa dang / /til mar lhan cig bskol ba yis/ /bskus na 'brum bu mdze dang rma/ /

gcin nad sbrang rtsi 'dra ba 'joms/ /byi dang ka snying 'bras bu gsum/ /pi pi ling rtsa pi pi ling / /sbrang rtsi til mar sbyar ba yi/ /lde gu zos na srin bu'i nad/ /mtshan bar rdol dang mdze nad dang / /gcin snyi ba dang smas pa dang / /rma 'khyims 'tsho bar byed pa yin/ /sle tres sug smel

byi dang ka /dug mo nyung dang ba ru ra/ /skyu ru ra dang a ru ra/ /gu gul rim gyis cha res bskyed/ /sbrang rtsir sbyar ba 'di zos na/ /'brum bu sbom dang mtshan bar rdol/ /nad ni sel bar byed pa yin/ /pi pi ling dang tsi tra ka /byi dang ga dang dug mo nyung / /cha mnyam phyed kyi 'bras bu gsum/ /

kun dang cha mnyam gu gul dang / /sbrang rtsir sbyar ba'i lde gu yis/ /nad ni thams cad 'joms par byed/ /gu gul srang lda pi pi ling / /'bras bu gsum ni srang re dang / /shing tsha sug smel zho gnyis gnyis/ /sbrang rtsir sbyar ba'i lde gu ni/ /zos na mtshan bar rdol ba dang / /mdze dang

skran nad 'joms par byed/ /de nyid dang ni bca' sga'i phye/ /legs par bsres par gyur pa dang / /rtsa ba bcu yi khu bar bsres/ /mchog tu rlung gi nad sel byed/ /seng ldeng snying po 'bras bu gsum gyi phye/ /a sa na bskol khu ba dang bsres dang / /cha mnyam gu gul sbrang rtsi lde gur

byas/ /mdze 'brum gcin snyi mtshan bar rdol nad sel/ /'di ni mtshan bar rdol gso'i bye brag bshad/ /sman gyi mtshan nyid lhag ma gang yin pa/ /rma yi dbang byas yongs su bsten pa dang / /gso thabs dgos pa legs par brtags te sbyar/ /rta zhon stobs 'gyed shugs ni/

'gegs pa dang / /chang 'thungs nyal po ma zhum goms dang / /drag shul las ni sna tshogs rma 'drubs na/ /lo gcig bar ram de las lhag pa spang / /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o// //de

nas rmen bu dang thor bu dang rkang bam dang 'bras kyi phreng ba'i nad dmigs shes pa bshad par bya'o/ /nad ni bad kan shas che ba/ /khrag dang sha dang tshil la brten/ /zlum zhing mtho bar skrangs pa de/ /mdud pa 'dra bas rmen bur bshad/ /de ni nad gzhi khrag sha tshil/ /rus rtsa rma las gyur

pa dgu/ /de la rlung gyur rgya che zhing / /zug cing bye ba snyam sems na/ /gnas nas gnas gzhan dag tu 'pho/ /rgyu med par ni 'phel zhing 'bri/ /'jam zhing lgang pa lta bur rgyas/ /brtol na khrag ni sla ba 'dzag /mkhris gyur tsha zhing mdog ser la/ /dmar zhing myur du smin

pa yin/ /brtol na khrag ni dron mo 'dzag /bad kan las gyur nad med sra/ /reg na grang zhing dkar la g.ya'/ /smin na rnag ni ska ba 'dzag /nad 'khrugs khrag las gyur rmen bu/ /srin bu dang ni bcas par 'gyur/ /sha dang rtsa la gnas pa yi/ /rmen bu tshor ba chung ba dang / /

mkhris pa'i mtshan nyid 'dra ba yin/ /sha che'i gnod gyur sha las ni/ /sha skyed zas la rmen bu 'byung / /snum zhing che la sra ba dang / /rtsa yis khyab cing bad kan 'dra/ /tshil skyed pa yis tshil 'phel ba/ /sha 'am pags par phyin gyur pa/ /rlung gi rmen bu shin tu snum/ /'jam

dang brtan par byed pa yin/ /bad kan dang ni mtshan nyid mtshungs/ /lus 'phel 'bri ba mtshungs pa yin/ /de brtol tshil mthug dmar ba dang / /dkar dang gnag pa 'dzag par 'gyur/ /rus pa chag dang snad pa las/ /mtho dang dma' bar gyur pa de/ /rus pa'i rmen bu zhes

bya'o/ /rkang gis song ba'am drag shul gyis/ /dub par gyur nas chu brgal bas/ /rlung gis rtsa grang khrag bcas pa/ /rlung gis btsir te 'khums nas ni/ /yon por byas te bskams pa dang / /mi 'phar nad byung rmen bu chags/ /de ni rtsa yi rmen bur bshad/ /rma ni ma 'drubs

'drubs ma thag /ro ni thams cad zos gyur pa'am/ /rlon pa dkris pa med pa'am/ /yang na lus ni snad gyur pas/ /rlung ni nad khrag ma phyung ba/ /ma sbyangs rma ni bsrubs pa las/ /tsha zhing g.ya' dang bcas gyur pa/ /rma yi rmen bur de bshad do/ /gsor rung nad

gzhi khrag tshil gyur/ /sra zhing 'gyur dang sbom pa dang / /gnad dang mgul pa stor gnas yin/ /mdud pa cher chags thor bu ste/ /rmen bu de yi mtshan nyid can/ /nad gzhi la sogs gyur drug yin/ /phal cher bad kan tshil rgyas yin/ /brtan pas smin par mi 'gyur

ro/ /rtsa la gnas pa'i khrag nad kyis/ /'khums pa'i rjes la gnod 'gyur zhing / /smin pa de tshe rgyas par 'gyur/ /sha yi gong po bcas par 'gyur/ /sha yi myu gus khyab gyur zhing / /skyes pa de las nad khrag ni/ /rgyun mi 'chad par mang du 'dzag /de ni khrag gi thor bu

yin/ /de las sha khrag las gyur spang / /bzhi po gzhan dag gso bar bya/ /dang por chu sor gnas pa'am/ /ro smad la brten bad kan rgyas/ /sha khrag nad kyi rkang par ni/ /dus su skrang bar byed 'gyur zhing / /rim gyis stug po nyid du 'gyur/ /de ni rkang bam zhes bya'o/ /

rlung gyur gas shing gnag pa dang / /rgyu med na zhing rtsub cing na/ /mkhris pa las gyur ser ba dang / /tsha dang rims kyis 'debs pa yin/ /bad kan snum lci nad tshabs chung / /sha yi mdzer pa chen pos khyab/ /de ni mang du 'dzag pa dang / /lo gcig 'das pa spang bar bya/ /kha cig

lag pa sna dang mchu/ /rna ba rkang pa ltar 'byung gzer/ /rkang bam skyes par gyur pa de/ /rlan can gnas su mi bzad skye/ /nad ni tshil mgrin mjing pa mig /mchan khung chu sor gnas pa dag /mdog 'dra sra zhing snum pa dang / /bar ta skyu ru ra 'dra dang / /gting zug 'bras ni

cher 'byung ba/ /ring zhig lon na smin par byed/ /de las kha cig nad med smin/ /kha cig 'dzag dang g.ya' ba yin/ /kha cig skam zhing kha cig skye/ /yun ring du ni gnas par byed/ /drur ba bzhin du 'bri zhing 'phel/ /'brum chen 'bras phreng zhes bya'o/ /de ni rims bcas

skyugs pa dang / /chom lud rtsib logs zug pa yang / /rma la mi 'phrod bsten pa yis/ /skrang dang smin pa khyad par med/ /sha sogs nang du rnag zhugs 'gyur/ /ring du 'gro bar byed pa yin/ /de ni ring du 'gro bas 'gro/ /sbubs ltar 'dzag

pa sbu gu yin/ /drang po sbu gu gcig yin te/ /de nyid sna tshogs 'gro bas 'gro/ /de ni nad gzhi re re 'dus/ /zug rngu'i rgyus 'byung lngar 'gyur ro/ /rlung gyur nad bcas rma sgo sra/ /mdog mi sdug cing lbu ba 'dzag /nub mo lhag par 'dzag pa yin/ /mkhris gyur skom tsha

rims kyis 'debs/ /ser bro rnag ni dri mnam 'dzag /nyin par lhag par 'dzag pa yin/ /bad kan ska zhing spyi bag 'dzag /g.ya' zhing sra bar gyur pa dang / /mtshan mo lhag par 'dzag pa yin/ /'dus gyur mtshan ma kun ldan spang / /nang na gnas pa'i zug rngu ma phyung

zhing / /sbu gu skyed par byed pa gang yin de/ /lbu ba can la sla zhing dro ba dang / /khrag bcas rnag ni nad bcas rtag tu 'byung / /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o// //de nas rmen bu la sogs pa'i nad gso ba

bshad par bya'o/ /rmen bu ma smin pa la ni/ /rang rang skrangs pa'i nad ltar gso/ /kaN+Da ka ri bri ha ti/ /tsi tra ka dang pi pi ling / /bskol ba'i mar gyis lus sbyang bar/ /'dod pa dag gis snum chos bya/ /sbyang byas sman rnon lde gus bsku/ /rmen bu lan mang dugs byas te/ /

yang dang yang du mnye bar bya/ /'di ni mchog tu rlung la bya/ /khrag dang mkhris pa las gyur pa'ang / /gtar ga bsil ba'i sbyor kun bya/ /bad kan las gyur rlung ltar gso/ /'on kyang smin na de bcad de/ /khrag yod pa ni mes bsreg bya/ /ma lus par bcad lus gyur na/ /

slar yang 'phel bar byed par 'gyur/ /sha yi rma las gyur rmen bu/ /de bzhin 'tsho ba tsam du bya/ /tshil las gyur pa'ang 'di nyid dang / /til dang 'o ma'i lde gus bsku/ /ras ni nyis rim dag gis dkri/ /tog lcags la sogs bsregs pas bsro/ /yang na mtshon gyis

dbral nas ni/ /tshil phyung nas ni legs par bsregs/ /rtsa yi thor bu sar pa la/ /sa ha tsa ra'i til mar blud/ /rlung 'joms sman gyis dkri dugs bya/ /'jam rtsi dang ni gtar ga bya/ /thor bu rmen bu lta bur ni/ /rang gi ji bzhin byas rab phan/ /rkang bam rlung gyur 'phel

ba la/ /snum zhing dugs bcas dkri ba dang / /long mo'i sor gnyis gong du ni/ /gtar ga gdab par bya ba dang / /e raN+Da'i mar 'o ma dang / /ba gcin sbyar ba zla gcig blud/ /zhu nas 'bru rnying bca' sga dang / /'o ma dang sbyar kha zas sbyin/ /de bzhin dur byid 'o ma blud/ /des ma

zhin mes bsreg bya/ /mkhris gyur long mo'i 'og tu ni/ /khrag dbyung mkhris pa sel kun sbyar/ /bad kan las gyur mthe bo las/ /khrag gtar nas kyi kha zas ni/ /sbrang rtsir bcas pa'i sman khu blud/ /'phel ba'i tshe na pi pi ling / /a ru ra ni bsten par bya/ /yungs kar bri

ha ti gnyis kyi/ /rtsa ba'i lde gus byug par bya/ /yang na 'u su'i lde gus byug /'bras kyi phreng ba steng 'og nas/ /sbyang zhing dan da tra ban ti/ /dur byid ko sha ta ki dang / /de ba ta la'i mar bskol blud/ /bad kan tshil ni 'joms pa yi/ /dud pas mkhur bkang sna sman btang / /gtar

gas khrag ni dbyung ba dang / /skyer pa'i khaN+Das gcin yang blud/ /rmen bu ma smin pa la ni/ /rgyam tsha bca' sga na gu li/ /bsku zhing sra bar rgyam tsha yi/ /thum bus dugs byas mnye bar bya/ /sha mi la phug shi kru yi/ /sa bon nas dang yungs kar bcas/ /dar ba skyur po btags

bskus na/ /rmen bu'i mdud pa zhi bar byed/ /smin par 'phrigs na khrag dbyung zhing / /bad kan mkhris pa sel bas gso/ /ma smin pa ni phyung nas kyang / /thal sman me btsas gso bar bya/ /dzo tiSh+ma ti lang ga li/ /shu ka na sa'i 'bras bu dang / /ka ka tig ta kar ko Ti/ /de

bta la'i sa bon dang / /bi sha l+ya dang ni rgun ti/ /ko sha ta ki pa ta rnams/ /srang ni phyed dang dug zho gnyis/ /ka rany+dza'i mar bre gang dang / /ni rgun ti yi khu ba ni/ /bre bzhi bskol bar gyur pa 'di'i/ /btung dang bsku byug snar btang na/ /'bras kyi phreng ba gsor mi rung / /yun ring

lon zhing rnag 'dzag sel/ /long ka li yi sdong bu yi/ /lde gu til mar de bzhi 'gyur/ /nir gun ti yi khu bar bskol/ /sna sman sogs btang 'bras phreng sel/ /tsan+dan thang shing na le sham/ /dur byid gla sgang ser po gnyis/ /srang re dug ni srang phyed

dang / /ba gcin sbyar te zhib tu btags/ /bram+b+hi'i khu ba arga yi/ /'o ma ba lang lci khur bcas/ /yungs mar bre gang bcas bskol ba/ /btung ba la sogs par bsten na/ /mdze dang rma ni 'khyims pa dang / /'bras kyi phreng ba myur du sel/ /shu dag rgya skyegs a ru ra/ /pu

tse shel dang tsan+dan dang / /til mar bskol ba blud na ni/ /'bras phreng rtsa bar bcas pa sel/ /sha ra pung ka'i rtsa ba ni/ /'bras kyi chu dang btags gyur pa/ /sna sman bsku bas 'brum bu dang / /dug srin 'bras kyi phreng ba 'joms/ /ut+tam ka ra'i rtsa ba dang / /bi lu'i lo ma

seng phrom dang / /sa ha tsa ra a ru ra/ /shing mngar shu ti tsi tra ka/ /thang shing til mar 'o ma mnyam/ /sna sman bsku byug byas pa'ang phan/ /ba lang ra lug rta rmig bsregs/ /nyungs mar sbyar te bsku ba'am/ /sbrul nag bya rog rang nyid shi /ing gu dang ni sbyar ba bsku/ /de

ltar ma zhi nad kyi ni/ /logs gzhan byin pa la gnas pa'i/ /chu so'i steng ngam 'og nas ni/ /tshil phyung nas ni mes bsreg bya/ /gyen du 'greng ba'i rkang pa gzhal/ /de yi tshad kyi rting pa ru/ /de las rmen bu dbyung bya zhes/ /drang srong mu khyud kyis bshad do/ /rting pa nas bzung

sor ni bcu gnyis na/ /dbang po'i chu so yod spang nad kyi ni/ /g.yon du dbral te nya sgong 'dra dbus nas/ /dra ba drang zhes legs thos kyis bshad do/ /mi yi long mo rna ba'i bar du gzhal/ /de yis brgyad pa rting pa'i cha bgos te/ /byin snying gnad kyi drang thad ma gtogs dpral/ /

tshil ni dbyung bar bya zhes gzhan dag 'chad/ /rlung gyur sbu gur dugs byas la/ /dbral te a pa marga yi/ /sbu gus til dang rgyam tshar bcas/ /btags pa'i lde gus legs par bsku/ /mkhris pa las gyur til dang btsod/ /nA ga dan ti ser po gnyis/ /bad kan las gyur rgyam

tsha til/ /dan da nim pa lan tshwas bsku/ /zug rngu las byung dbral te dbyung / /til dang mar dang sbrang rtsis bsku/ /mtshon dbral mi rung chu tshod kyis/ /legs par btsal te nang du dbug /thal sman la spangs skud pa yis/ /rma tshol kha ni shas cher dral/ /rma red kha ni

dog pa dang / /phugs ring la yang sbyar bar bya/ /reng bu gang dang til mar gang / /de ni rma 'khyims la yang bsngags/ /e raN+Da'i 'bras lde gus bsku/ /sbu gu'i rma sbyor byed mchog yin/ /rgya shug 'bras bu shun pa dang / /lan tshwa rgya skyegs bcas pa dang / /gla

gor zho sha'i lo ma dang / /pri yang ku dang nu zho dang / /arka snu hi'i 'o mar sbyar/ /reng bus rma 'khyims myur 'tsho bar byed/ /rgyam tsha'i tsha dang rtsabs ru tsha/ /lce myang tsha ni legs par bsregs/ /gla gor zho sha khyim dud pa/ /a mra ta ka seng ldeng gi /lo ma dzi na skyer pa gnyis/ /lde

gus bsku ba sogs bsten na/ /skyabs med mi brtan skyes bu yi/ /'byor pa bzhin du 'grib par byed/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u sum cu pa'o// //de nas nad phra mo'i dmigs shes pa bshad par bya'o/ /bad rlung

las gyur 'brum phran ni/ /snum zhing mdog 'dra mdud pa can/ /nad med mung+ga 'dra ba ni/ /byis pa las skyes ra'i 'gram pa/ /de gnyis las byung shar gnas mthug /nas 'dra nas zhes bya ba yin/ /'bras byer zlum po rtse mo med/ /rnag nyung rtag mtho 'bras byer yin/ /

rmen bu lnga 'am drug 'byung zhing / /rus sbal ltar mtho rus sbal yin/ /rna ba'i steng ngam kun tu ni/ /'brum phran sra zhing mi bzad na/ /ut+pal rtsa 'dra pa nas/ /skrang shing cung zad na la brtan/ /'gam pa'i mtshams su de gnyis las/ /'byung ba rdo yi bong bu yin/ /

shal ma li yi tsher ma 'dra/ /'brum phran nad bcas mthug po ni/ /nang na tshil yod lang tsho la/ /byung ba bzhin ni ma rung byed/ /bad kan rlung gyur pad+ma yi/ /tsher ma 'dra bas khyab gyur cing / /dkar zhing nad ni med pa dag /pad+ma'i tsher ma can zhes bya/ /mkhris pa las gyur 'brum phran

zlum/ /u dum bA ra'i 'bras smin 'dra/ /shas cher tsha zhing rims 'debs byed/ /gas pa kha bye zhes bya'o/ /lus kyi nang dang gdong la ni/ /tsha zhing nad dang rims skyed cing / /sran chung tsam la de'i mdog can/ /'brum phran mthug po srin chung

zhing / /de bas 'brum bu nad tshabs che/ /sdug bsngal byed pa 'brum bu yin/ /rlung mkhris las gyur 'brum bu'i nang / /pad+ma'i snying po lta bu yi/ /'brum phran gyis ni phug pa yin/ /de dag nyid skyed bong bu yin/ /zlum zhing rgya che mtho ba dang / /mdog dmar 'brum phran dag

gis khyab/ /phal cher rlung las mchan khung du/ /nye bar skyes pa mchan khung 'brum/ /mkhris pa las gyur 'brum phran ni/ /phra zhing mthug pa 'bras yos 'dra/ /de 'dra'i chen po cig byung ba/ /dri can zhes ni grags pa yin/ /tsha ba'i rdul gyis lus gdungs la/ /'brum

phran nad bcas stug po ni/ /dbyibs dang chad mdog skye tshe 'dra/ /de ni ske tshe zhes bya'o/ /mkhris pa shas che'i nad kyis ni/ /me dbal lta bur dal gyis mched/ /skrang zhing snum la srab cing dmar/ /rim skyed dra ba'i bong bu yin/ /mkhris pa shas che'i 'brum bu ni/ /rim skyed sha la

gnod byed pa/ /mchan khung phyogs byung me'i mdog can/ /'dra ba de ni me skyed yin/ /zhag lnga'am ni zhag bdun na/ /zla ba phyed nas srog 'phrog byed/ /nad gzhi gsum skyes 'brum bu zlum/ /nam tshong yan chad skyes sa skor/ /mchan khung chu sor bi da ri'i/ /rtsa ba ltar sra bi da ri/ /tshil

dang bad rlung las gyur pa'i/ /rmen bu rtsa rgyus sha la gnas/ /brtol na mar zhag sbrang rtsi 'dra/ /'dzag gyur de la rlung shas che/ /sha skam rmen bur byas nas ni/ /gseg ma lta bur skyed par byed/ /khrag ni dri mnam rangs pa dang / /kha dog sna tshogs 'byung ba yi/ /

nad kyis de la khrag 'dzag pa/ /de ni 'brum bu gseg ma can/ /lag pa rkang mthil tshigs dang ni/ /nam tshong yan chad grog mo yi/ /mgo ltar rim gyis rmen bu ni/ /phra mo mang pos khyab byed la/ /na zhing tsha la g.ya' zhing 'drul/ /kun tu skyes te grog mo'i mgo /

rkang mthil gshags mas brud pa'am/ /tsher ma sogs kyis snad pa yi/ /'brum bu bur pa ltar mtho ba/ /skyes te mdzer pa 'dra zhes bya/ /shugs bkag pa yis rlung dag ni/ /gzhang dang rkang pa la gnas pa/ /phyi dang nang du rgyu byed pa/ /lam rgyu de las bshang ba ni/ /dka'

bas 'byung bar byed pa'i nad/ /gzhang 'gags pa zhes bya bar 'dod/ /rlung mkhris kyis ni sen mo yi/ /nang gi sha smin nad skyed pa/ /ma snad nad dang tshim pa dang / /nye ba'i sen mo zhes bya'o/ /snad pas gnag cing rtsub pa dang / /sra ba sen mo ngan zhes bya/ /'dam ni gnod byed la reg

las/ /nang na g.ya' zhing rnag bcas pa/ /sor mo'i 'bras 'byer zhes bya'o/ /pags pa til 'dra gnag pa la/ /nad med byung gyur rme ba ste/ /de nyid 'bur ba mdzer pa yin/ /mdzer pa las kyang chen por gyur/ /dkar nag pags pa'i mdzer pa yin/ /de 'dra'i 'brum bu skyes pa ni/ /dmar po rgya skyegs nor bu yin/ /

dkar ba'am gnag par lhan cig skyes/ /zlum pa'am mtshan ma zhes bya'o/ /mya ngan khro dang rlung mkhris sogs/ /'khrugs te gdong ni srab 'gyur zhing / /thig le nag po ngo shig can/ /gdong las gzhan 'byung khabs zhes bya/ /rlung gyur ngo shig rtsub par snang / /reg na rtsub

cing gnag pa yin/ /mkhris gyur mtha' ma cung zad sngo/ /bad kan las gyur mtha' dkar g.ya'/ /khrag gyur mtha' ma zangs mdog can/ /skam zhing tsha ba tsag tsag byed/ /rlung gis bad kan bslangs gyur pa/ /pags par phyin te bskams gyur nas/ /de las pags

pa skya 'gyur zhing / /rim gyis tshor ba med 'gyur la/ /g.ya' ba chung zhing 'drul ba med/ /bem po de ni tshor med yin/ /skyug sman nyes dang ma zhu dang / /bad mkhris lus la gnas bslangs pas/ /rab g.ya' zlum po gor gor po/ /dmar po mang du 'byung 'gyur zhing / /rjes 'brel

ldan pa zlum por bshad/ /de ltar nad ni phra mo yi/ /dbye ba sum cu drug tu bstan/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u sum cu gcig pa'o// //de nas nad phra mo'i gso ba bshad par bya'o/ /ra yi 'gram pa ma smin pa/ /srin

bu pad pas khrag dbyung ngo / /nas 'dra dugs ni byas nas su/ /thang shing ru rta ldong ros dang / /ba bla'i lde gu bskus te bzhu/ /rdo yi bong bu'ang de ltar gso/ /smin pa ra 'gram rma ltar gso/ /bzhin gnod seng phrom 'u su dang / /shu dag btags

pa'i lde gu'am/ /n+ya gro d+ha yi lo ma'am/ /rgya star lo ma tsha sbyar bsku/ /des ma zhi na skyug sman dang / /sna sman dpral bar gtar ga gdab/ /pad+ma'i tsher ma nim pa yi/ /khu ba'am nim pa mar bskol bar/ /sbrang rtsi dang ni bcas pa blud/ /nim pa dong gar sbyar bas byug /

kha bye sogs nas dra bong bar/ /sa skor bcas pa mkhris pa yi/ /me dbal lta bur gso bar bya/ /me skyed pa ni spang bar bya/ /dra ba'i bong bu smyung ba dang / /gtar ga gdab dang rtsub chos dang / /lus kyi sbyang ba skyu ru ra'i/ /sbyor ba'i bsil sman byugs pas gso/ /bid

ril khrag gtar zhing / /bad kan rman bu lta bur gso/ /gseg ma lta bu'i 'brum phran la/ /tshil gyi rmen bu lta bur gso/ /grog ma'i mgo 'dra bu ga mang / /cher skyed skrang zhing gnad la gnas/ /rkang pa lag par byung ba spang / /cig shos la ni khrag byung la/ /rgyam tsha dong

ga sle tres dang / /ci tse rgya sran rtsa ba dang / /da nad til btags nas phyes bsku/ /smin pa la ni nad can sha /thams cad legs par sbyang bar bya/ /mtshon gyis bcad la de rjes la/ /thal sman yang na me yis bsreg /mdzer pa 'dra la gtsags bu yis/ /ma lus bcad la

snum gyis bsreg /gzhang 'gags pa la nor bu ni/ /'gags pa lta bur gso bar bya/ /nye ba'i sen mo sbyangs pa yis/ /tsha ba bsal te mtshon gyis gso/ /sen mo ngan la'ang de bzhin bya/ /rkang pa'i chu ser dag la'ang / /'bras bu skyur po nag tshur bcas/ /til

dang gi wang nim pa yi/ /lo ma'i lde gus bsku bar bya/ /sme ba mdzer par bcas pa ni/ /me shel thal sman dag gis bsreg /yang na me btsa' gdab par bya/ /de bzhin bags mdzer rgya skyegs nor/ /mtshon gyis bcad de de bzhin gso/ /mtshan ma can sogs

gsum po la/ /nye ba'i phyogs la gtar ga gdab/ /'o ma can shing myu gu shun/ /'o mar btags pas bsku bar bya/ /ngo shig ardzu na'i shun pa'am/ /btsod dang sbrang rtsi sbyar ba yi/ /lde gu'am rta dkar rmig pa ni/ /bsregs pa'i snag tsha mar sbyar bsku/ /tsan+dan

dmar po btsod dang ni/ /ru rta seng phrom pri yad+ku/ /sran chung n+ya gro d+ha'i myu gu/ /lde gus ngo shig sel byed cing / /bzhin mdangs gsal bar byed pa yin/ /zir gnyis dang til nag dang / /yungs kar 'o mar bcas pa ni/ /btags pa'i lde gus gdong bskus na/ /ngo shig

sel zhing zla 'drar byed/ /sran chung phub ma med brngos pa/ /'o ma sbrang rtsi mar btags bsku/ /tsher ma rno ba'i shal ma li'i/ /'o mar btags pas bskus na phan/ /rgya shug tshi gu bu ram bcas/ /sbrang rtsi ri bong khrag sbyar bsku/ /ru rta kha lung khu ba yi/ /nang sbangs sbrang rtsir

bcas pa'am/ /rkang mar rtsa ba ra'i 'o ma/ /sbrang rtsir bcas pa'i lde gu'ang phan/ /rkang mar rtsa ba lang rus/ /sbrang rtsi mar dang bcas pas bsku/ /'dzam bu a mra'i lo ma dang / /ser po rnam gnyis zho ga chu/ /bu ram sar pa sbyar ba'am/ /tin du ka yi lo ma yi/ /khu bar

btags pa yang mdog gsal byed/ /ut+pal sngo dang ru rta dang / /tsan+dan ser po pri yang ku/ /rgya shug tshi gu'i lde gu yis/ /gdong ni bskus zhing dril gyur na/ /pad+ma'i mdog dang 'dra bar byed/ /sman ni 'di dag btags pa dang / /shing mngar dang bcas bskol snum ni/ /nad

gzhi ji bzhin ma lus la/ /btung dang bsku ba la sogs bya/ /nas dang seng phrom sra rtsi pog /spra tshil sbrang rtsi pu tse shel/ /mar dang bu ram ba gcin ni/ /gzar bur chags kyi bar du bskol/ /de bskus pa yis sme ba dang / /ngo shig mdzer pa myur sel byed/ /gdong ni pad+ma

'drar byed cing / /rkang pa pad+ma'i 'dab 'dar byed/ /gur gum shing mngar pu shel tse/ /tsan+dan ser dang rgya skyegs dang / /tsan+dan dkar dang n+ya gro d+ha'i/ /rkang pa gzhon nu shug pa dang / /de bzhin pad+ma ge sar dang / /ut+pal sngon po btsod dang bcas/ /srang re chu bre bzhi nang du/ /bskol

te bzhi cha lus ba ru/ /rgya skyegs btsod dang le brgan rtsi/ /shing mngar gur gum zho gnyis gnyis/ /phye ma til mar srang brgyad dang / /de yi nyis 'gyur 'o ma bskol/ /de ni sna sman tshul bsten na/ /sme ba ngo shig skra dkar dang / /gnyer ma gdong gi

dri ma sel/ /gdong gi sha rgyas mdog gsal byed/ /btsod dang seng phrom sha ba ri/ /rgya skyegs ldong ros du pa ri/ /gur gum ru rta ser po gnyis/ /gi wang tsan+dan rnam gnyis dang / /n+ya gro d+ha yi lo ma dang / /dngul chu rma shing tsan+dan ser/ /d+ha du ra yi shun pa yi/ /sa bon pad+ma ge

sar dang / /spra tshil spangs ma shug pa sogs/ /zhag dang 'o ma rkang dang mar/ /'o ma can shing 'o ma ni/ /bskol ba'i mar ni bskus gyur na/ /ngo shig gnyer ma sogs 'joms shing / /bzhin ni pad+ma'i mdangs 'drar 'gyur/ /bring ga ra dza'i khu bar ni/ /'o ma chu bskol sna

sman bsngags/ /pags pa tshor med la rlung gi /gso ba dang ni me btsa' bya/ /pags nad zlum por bad mkhris bshad/ /mdze nad sel ba thams cad phan/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u sum cu gnyis pa'o// //de

nas gsang ba'i nad kyi dmigs shes pa bshad par bya'o/ /bud med nyal po spangs pa las/ /mod la bsten par gyur pa'am/ /nad dang bcas shing dogs pa las/ /dri ma can nam zla mtshan nam/ /skye gnas gzhan dang mi 'dod dang / /bgrod min gsar du btsas pa dang / /

dga' ba'i mthar ni dug can sogs/ /chus reg pa'am ma bkrus dang / /bskyed pa'i bsam pas sman rnon po'i/ /lde gu la sogs bskus pa dang / /khu tshur so dang sen mo dang / /gra ma dug can gyis reg dang / /shugs dgag pa dang yun ring du/ /reg pa rtsub pas bdar ba

'am/ /nad gzhi 'khrugs pas gsang bar zhugs/ /sos 'dzin lta bu la sogs nad/ /nyi shu rtsa gsum 'byung bar 'gyur/ /sos 'dzin lta bu 'dir lnga ste/ /nad gzhi re re khrag las gyur/ /'dus pa'i nad las gyur pa'o/ /de la rlung gyur pho mtshan skrangs/ /nad mang

rtag ldang pags 'gas pa'o/ /mkhris pa las gyur skrang rims 'debs/ /u dum+WA ra'i 'bras smin 'dra/ /bad kan gyis mkhrang snum pa dang / /g.ya' zhing skrangs la lci ba yin/ /khrag gyur 'brum bu nag po 'byung / /khrag 'dzag rims kyis 'debs par byed/ /'dus gyur

mtshan nyid kun dang ldan/ /rlig 'bras gnyis kyang skrang bar byed/ /mi bzad na zhing lhung pa dang / /gas shing srin bu skye ba yin/ /de las khrag gyur 'tsho ba tsam/ /'dus pa las gyur 'chi bar byed/ /nad 'khrugs pa las pho mtshan gnas/ /sha khrag las ni pho mtshan

gyi/ /phyi'am yang na nang du ni/ /mdzer pa g.ya' bar byed pa 'byung / /khrag ni spyi bag 'dzag par byed/ /mo mtshan de 'dra gdugs ltar 'dug /de ni 'brum nad ma gsos na/ /pho mo'i khu khrag nyams byed gsod/ /pho mtshan gyi ni phyi'am nang / /bad kan khrag gyur 'brum phran ni/ /

tshad dang dbyibs ni yungs kar 'dra/ /stug po'i yungs kar zhes byar bshad/ /bad kan khrag gyur 'brum bu ni/ /ring zhing mang por gyur pa la/ /dbus nas gas pa gang yin pa/ /de ni nges par 'joms shes bya/ /na zhing ba sbu brtse bar byed/ /khrag mkhris las ni 'dzam bu

yi/ /rus pa ltar 'dug khong stong can/ /'bras byer gcin snyi 'drar shes bya/ /khrag mkhris las gyur 'brum phran ni/ /ma sha mang+ga 'dra mchog yin/ /pad+ma'i steng du ge sar bzhin/ /'brum bu 'brum phran gyis khyab pa/ /de ni pad+ma can zhes bya/ /lag pa gnyis kyis rab

mnyes pa/ /de ni mnyes pa'i 'brum bur gyur/ /mtshan ni mnyes par gyur pa las/ /rlung 'khrugs gyur pa mnyes pa yin/ /mi mnyam sra zhing yon por ni/ /rlung 'khrugs gyur pa gtun shing yin/ /rlung gis mnyes pa la sogs pa'i/ /nad 'khrugs mtshan gyi pags

pa ni/ /ldog cing tsha la nad bcas shing / /la lar shu ba dag tu 'gyur/ /'dus shing mdud pa chags pa ni/ /de yi nor bu thur du 'phyang / /pags pa ldog pa'i nad ces bya/ /bad kan bcas las g.ya' zhing sra/ /rma 'tshob dka' zhing pags pa gas/ /gas pa'i nad

ces bya bar bshad/ /rlung gis pags pa gnod 'gyur zhing / /nor bu 'byar zhing gcin 'gag 'gyur/ /de las rgyun phra nad med 'byung / /nor bu'i kha ni 'gags gyur pas/ /de ni nor bu'i nad ces bya/ /bad kan las gyur mtshan gyi nad/ /gra

mas gang snyam mdud pa'i nad/ /gra mas gnod pa'i khrag gi nad/ /tshor ba nyams pa de ming can/ /rlung dang khrag mkhris las gyur pa/ /bu ga'i rtse mo phra ba yis/ /mtshan gyi nang ni kun tu khyab/ /de ni kha brgya pa zhes bya/ /khrag mkhris las gyur pags pa rnams/ /tsha zhing

rims bcas pags pa smin/ /'dus pa las gyur sha rnams ni/ /thams cad ngan pas smin pa yin/ /'brum bu gnag cing dmar ba yi/ /'brum bu dag gis gnod 'gyur shing / /pho mtshan shin tu na ba gang / /de ni khrag gi 'brum bu yin/ /sha yi mdzer pa sngar

bshad do/ /khong 'bras nad gzhi gsum las skyes/ /'dus pas mtshan ni rnags gyur cing / /sha ni nag por gyur pa dang / /kun nas zhig par byed pa gang / /de ni til nag ces brjod bshad/ /sha las gyur pa'i 'brum bu rnags/ /khong 'bras til nag ces bya ba/ /

bzhi po 'di dag spang bar bya/ /lhag ma rnams ni myur du gso/ /kha zas gnod pa zos pa dang / /mal stan mi bder nyal ba dang / /nyal po bsten ni drags pa dang / /nang na nad khrag sman gnod dang / /sa bon nyes pa rnam smin las/ /mngal gyi nad ni

nyi shur 'gyur/ /rlung gis mngal la gnod gyur pas/ /na zug yangs shing tshor ba med/ /grog mas khyab pa snyam du sems/ /sra zhing rtsub pa sgra dang bcas/ /zla mtshan sla zhing wu ba can/ /nyung zhing gnag pa 'dzag par byed/ /chu so rtsib logs lhod pa dang / /na zhing rim gyis

skran bskyed la/ /rang rang nyes pa de dang de/ /de ni rlung can yin zhes bshad/ /de nyid shas cher spyad na skrang / /bcas pa nyal po drags zhes bya/ /shin tu gzhon la 'khrig pa spyad/ /rgyab dang chu so byin par ni/ /na zhing mngal la gnod byed pa/ /de ni spyad sngas pa zhes bya/ /

shugs 'khyil ba yi mngal du ni/ /rlung gis gnod par gyur pa las/ /zla mtshan lbu ba can 'byung ba/ /'khyil ba lta bur snang gyur pa/ /nad 'di 'khyil pa can zhes bya/ /gang tshe rlung ni rtsub pos bu/ /skye zhing skye zhing gsod byed pa/ /skyes nas gsod pa zhes

byar bshad/ /'grangs drags mi mnyam gnas par ni/ /'dod pa spyad pas rlung 'khrugs shing / /gzhan gyis gnod par gyur pa las/ /mtshan gyi bu ga sha rus la/ /gnod gyur mngal ni yon bor 'gyur/ /na gyur nang du kha bltas yin/ /kha zas rlung can bsten pa yis/ /

zla mtshan rlung gis gnod gyur zhing / /bud med mo mtshan zhum gyur par/ /byed pa de ni khabs mig yin/ /dus su shugs bkag rlung 'phel bas/ /bshang dang gci ba 'gag byed cing / /mo mtshan skam par byed pa dang / /shas cher na ba mngal skams yin/ /zhag drug

gam ni zhag bdun nas/ /rlung gis mngal gnas khu ba 'byin/ /nad bcas pa'am nad med pa/ /de ni khu ba slon zhes bya/ /bud med mngal dang sa bon gyi/ /nyes pa rlung gis gnod gyur zhing / /'khrig par mi dga' nu ma med/ /ma ning yin te gsor mi rung / /mngal gyi nang

du rlung gis ni/ /gnod gyur mo mtshan khong khar gnas/ /bye ba'am lhod par gyur pa dang / /rlung can bzhin du na gyur pa/ /sha ni mtho bar gyur pa ste/ /mo mtshan che nad tshabs che bya/ /mkhris pa mngal na gnas pa yi/ /nang gi nad gzhis gnod gyur pa/ /tsha ba'am rnag

par byed 'gyur zhing / /dri mnam rims kyis 'debs pa dang / /shin tu tsha zhing ro ltar mnam/ /zla mtshan sngo nag ser por 'dzag /nad de mkhris pa can zhes bya/ /zla mtshan cher 'dzag khrag can yin/ /bad kan skyed par byed pa yis/ /mo mtshan gnod gyur na ba med/ /grang

zhing dkar la g.ya' ba dang / /spyin bag tu ni 'dzag par byed/ /nad de bad kan las gyur yin/ /rlung mkhris 'khrugs pas zla mtshan zad/ /tsha zhing lus skems mdog mi sdug /de ni khrag zad pa zhes bya/ /mkhris pa shas che nyal po bsten/ /sgrid pa sbregs pa bkag pa

las/ /mkhris par bcas pa'i rlung gis ni/ /mngal du gnod pa skyed par 'gyur/ /skrang zhing nyam thag reg mi bzod/ /zla mtshan sngo dang ser por 'byung / /pho ba'i lto ni lci ba dang / /'khru zhing yi ga 'chus par byed/ /chu so brla ni na zhing zug /

rims skyed yongs rgyas nad ces bya/ /rlung dang bad kan nad kyis khyab/ /mngal nas skye zhing spyi bag 'dzag /nye bar 'dzag pa zhes bya'o/ /srin bu skyes shing g.ya' bas 'dod pa las/ /rab gdungs de ni rnam par g.yeng zhes bya/ /dus min spyod par gyur pas rlung / /bad

kan khrag dang 'dres gyur te/ /zla mtshan lam ni 'gag byed de/ /mngal du lte ba skyed par byed/ /de ni pad+ma'i snying po yin/ /nad gzhi gsum ni mo mtshan gyi/ /mngal nas rang rang gnod pa skyed/ /'dus pa las gyur nyes pa yin/ /de ltar bud med mngal nad kyis/ /

khu ba 'dzin par mi byed de/ /des na mngal du bu mi chags/ /mi bzad nad kyang skye 'gyur zhing / /khrag 'byung gzhang 'brum skran la sogs/ /rlung sogs nad ni kun skyed byed/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u sum cu gsum pa'o// //

de nas gsang ba'i gnas kyi nad gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /sos 'dzin 'dra ba gsar byung la/ /pho mtshan dbus na gtar ga gdab/ /bsil ba'i gso bas sbyang bar bya/ /khyad par du ni bkru sman gtang / /smin na til gyi lde gu ni/ /sbrang rtsi mar dang bcas pa bsku/ /

'dzam bu a mra klu shing dang / /nim pa kam po dza'i myu gu/ /rgya shug bil ba sa li ka /rgya skyegs til ni sha yi shun/ /'o ma can gyi shing gi shun/ /'bras bu gsum ni chur bskol ba'i/ /khu ba des ni bkru ba dang / /de bskol til mar gyis rma 'tshob/ /spangs ma seng

phrom btsag yug snam/ /sug smel ldong ros ba bla dang / /nag tshur rgya skyegs skyer khaN+Da/ /rgyam tsha ha re Nu ka yi/ /phye ma sbrang rtsi sbyar bas bsku/ /sos 'dzin lta bu'i rma 'tshob byed/ /kham phor sbyar bar 'bras bu gsum/ /bsregs pa mar bcas rma 'tshob byed/ /'di ni spyi

yi gso ba yin/ /re re skrang pa lta bur gso/ /sman pas ci nas rnags par ni/ /mi 'gyur de ltar 'bad par bya/ /rnags na rgyus pa rtsa dang sha/ /zhig pas pho mtshan ma rungs 'gyur/ /'brum pa bcad dang bsregs pa yi/ /gso ba so sa 'dzin lta bur bya/ /brud nas yungs

kar phye zhib dang / /bskol sman phye mas gdab par bya/ /til mar de nyid kyis bsku zhing / /rma 'tsho ba pa yi gso ba bya/ /mnye gso ba ni 'di nyid bya/ /de dag gnyi gar gtar ga gdab/ /khong stong la ni gtar ga bya/ /rnags la rma ni dag par bya/ /tin du ka dang 'bras bu gsum/ /

seng phrom lde gu til mar bsku/ /'bras byer la ni gtar ga gdab/ /gso ba'i rim pa 'di nyid bya/ /mchog ces bya ba'i 'brum bu ni/ /brtol te lcags kyus blangs te bcad/ /lde gu phye ma sman khu ni/ /sbrang rtsir bcas pas gso bar bya/ /mnye dang pad+ma can la ni/ /mkhris

pa'i me dbal gso bar bya/ /pags smin tshor ba med pa la'ang / /pho mo'i gso ba 'di nyid bya/ /mnye la dugs ni bya ba dang / /ba la'i sman mar dro 'jam blugs/ /mngar ba'i sman sbyar dkri dugs bya/ /gtun shing 'dra la gtar ga gdab/ /bad kan rmen bu lta bur gso/ /

pags pa ldog la mar gyis bsku/ /sa lba la sogs snum gyur pas/ /zhag gsum mam ni zhag lnga ru/ /dkri ba'i las ni spyad par bya/ /dugs bya de yi 'og tu ni/ /snum gyur pags pa drang bar bya/ /nor bu rim gyis btsir nas ni/ /chud nas nye bar dkri bar bya/ /nor bu yang yang snum chos bya/ /

kha zas snum can sbyin pa'ang phan/ /gas pa la yang cho ga yi/ /rim pa ji bzhin byas pa'ang phan/ /'gags pa sbu gu kha gnyis pa/ /rgya skyegs kyis ni dkris pa la/ /snum bskus bu gar bcug nas ni/ /rlung 'joms snum ni blugs par bya/ /sbu gu zhag ni

gsum gsum nas/ /legs par bskyed de spang bar bya/ /sbu gu'i sbyor bas ma grub na/ /mkhas pas mdoms kyi srubs can ni/ /bor te mtshon gyis dral nas kyang / /de 'og rma gsar cho ga bya/ /rmen bur sbu gu'i dugs byas la/ /

snum zhing dro bas dkri bar bya/ /kha brgya pa ni bzhar nas kyang / /bska ba sbrang rtsi sbyar bas bsku/ /khrag gi 'brum bu khrag gi ni/ /khong 'bras bzhin du gso bar bya/ /kun la rma yi gso ba ni/ /gnas skabs ji bzhin sbyar bar bya/ /mngal gyi

nad la mang du ni/ /snum chos dugs dang mas gtong sogs/ /rlung 'joms pa yi gso ba bsngags/ /rlung las gyur la mchog tu sbyar/ /bud med kyi ni mngal gyi nad/ /rlung ma gtogs par 'byung mi 'gyur/ /de bas rlung ni bsal byas la/ /nad gzhan gyis ni gso sman

bya/ /ba la'i til mar blud bya zhing / /'dren ma skye de'i 'o ma blud/ /snum chos dugs ni byas te mngal/ /nyes par gnas pa mnyam du gzhag /yon po lag pas drang por bsrang / /zhum pa slar ni bskyed par bya/ /byung ba slar ni gzhug bya zhing / /gyes pa yongs su bzlog

par bya/ /mngal ni gnas nas g.yos gyur pa/ /bud med zug rngur gyur par 'dod/ /bud med la ni slon sman sogs/ /'jam po yongs su sbyar bar bya/ /rnam pa kun tu dag gyur nas/ /'jam rtsi bsku byug sman khu blugs/ /byugs dang ye'u gzhug la sogs/ /gso

ba'i las ni lhag ma spyad/ /rgun 'brum tang pal 'bras bu gsum/ /ka sa mar da ser po gnyis/ /sle tres nye'u shing sher+ya ka /shu ka na sa ba spru ba/ /pa ru sha ka zho gnyis gnyis/ /mar ni bre gang bcas par bskol/ /de blud mngal gyi rlung nad dang / /bu skyed

byed pa'i mchog yin no/ /zi ra go snyod pi pi ling / /shu dag rgyam tsha ba sha ka /nas tshig 'khus thal ti mus/ /tsi tra ka dang kha rar bcas/ /btags te chang gi dngas mar sbyar/ /mar brngos de ni byin gyur na/ /mngal nad rtsib logs snying nad dang / /skrangs dang gzhang

'brum sel bar byed/ /kha lung khu ba ka sha'i rtsa ba/ /zi ra nag po go snyod dang / /sen rtsi rgyam tsha'i phye ma ni/ /chang dang sbyar te blud par bya/ /ra sna gze ma ba sha ka /bskol ba gzer 'joms mchog yin no/ /sle tres dan dang 'bras bu gsum/ /bskol ba'i khu ba'ang

blugs par bya/ /rgya spos kaN+Da ka ri dang / /ru rta rgyam tsha thang shing rnams/ /bskol ba'i khu ba til mar bskol/ /sbangs pa'i ye'us mngal nad sel/ /mngal nad mkhris pa las gyur pa/ /chu blugs bsku byug ye'u yis/ /gso ba bsil zhing mkhris 'joms pa/ /snum

chos don du mar gyis bya/ /nye'u shing rtsa ba srang bzhi brgya/ /brdungs te btsir ba'i khu ba dang / /'o ma de mnyam mar bre ni/ /bzhi yi nang du bskol bar bya/ /'tsho byed sde tshan nye'u shing dang / /pa ru sha ka rgun 'brum dang / /pi la ya dang ba la gnyis/ /shing mngar zho ni gnyis

gnyis phye/ /bskol te bsgrangs par sbrang rtsi dang / /pi pi ling ni srang brgyad brgyad/ /ka ra dkar po srang bcu gzhug /de las srang ni phyed phyed sbyin/ /mngal khrag khu ba'i nad sel zhing / /ro tsa bu skyed byed mchog yin/ /glo rdol zang byed khrag mkhris dang / /lud pa dbugs

mi bde ba dang / /mig ser rlung dang khrag dang ni/ /me dbal dang ni snying nad dang / /brjed byed kyis nyen da rgan dang / /myos byed skem byed 'joms par byed/ /de bzhin 'o ma zhun mar dang / /'tsho byed sde tshan bskol ba ni/ /bu skyed mkhris pa las gyur pa'i/ /mngal nad sel

ba'i dam pa yin/ /ba la bre ni sum cu gnyis/ /bskol ba'i til mar mar bre bzhi/ /'o ma bzhi 'gyur pi pi ling / /ka ka ma si ka ra dkar/ /dzi ban ti dang ram nye ba/ /s+thi ra nye shing zi ra gnyis/ /mon sran gre'u pa ya s+ya/ /ma sha par+Ni sra ba ni/ /pi lu'i lo ma lhan

cig bskol/ /blud na rlung mkhris las gyur pa'i/ /mngal nad sel zhing bu skyed byed/ /khrag gi mngal nad khrag mdog las/ /rjes su 'brel ba brtags nas kyang / /nad gzhi bsags pa'i tshul las ni/ /khrag bcad pa yi sman gtang bya/ /shing mngar sbrang rtsi chu shing rtsa/ /

ta la'i sa bon skyer pa'i rtsa/ /pri yang ku dang 'bras drus chu/ /sbyar ba blud na khrag 'dzag pa/ /mdog skya dmar po sel bar byed/ /pa tha 'dzam bu a mra yi/ /tshi gu dang ni brag zhun dang / /skyer pa'i khaN+Da aM baSh+Ta/ /btsod dang shal ma li'i thang chu/ /dug mo nyung gi shun

lpags dang / /gur gum bil ba bong nga dkar/ /seng phrom gla sgang btsag yug snam/ /shing mngar tsan+dan dmar po dang / /kad pa la dang tsa ma ka /ka Tang ka dang dug mo nyung / /byi tsher ba dang da ta ki/ /ma du ka dang stang zil ni/ /skar ma rgyal la

bab pa na/ /btus shing btags te sbrang rtsi dang / /'bras kyi chur sbyar blud na ni/ /gzhang 'brum tshad par 'khru ba dang / /gang yang khrag tu 'khru ba dang / /gang yang srin bu'i nad rnams dang / /byis pa'i nad gang yin pa 'joms/ /mngal gyi nad dang zla mtshan nad/ /gnag cing

dkar dang dmar ba sel/ /phye ma rgyal gyi rjes 'gro ba/ /phan zhes rgyun shes bu yis bshad/ /bad kan las gyur mngal nad la/ /rtsub dang dro ba'i sman kun sbyar/ /skyu ru'i lo ma da ta ki /shing mngar ut+pal lig bu mig /'dzam bu a mra'i tshi gu dang / /seng phrom sa nag kang

pa la/ /se'u 'bru shing tsha tin du ka /u dum bA ra bil ba gzhon/ /zho ni gnyis gnyis btags pa'i phye/ /ra gcin 'o ma nyis 'gyur dang / /til mar bre gang bskol bar bya/ /de bsku ba dang 'jam rtsi dang / /ras bal ye'us gzhug par bya/ /skrang zhing phyir log mtho zhing

sra/ /de bzhin spyi bag 'dzag pa dang / /phyir 'bur nang du zhum pa dang / /'brum bu gzer dang bcas la phan/ /nas zan a ru sbyar chang dang / /bu ram chang dang til mar bsten/ /pi pi ling dang lcags phye dang / /a rur sbyor sbrang rtsi phan/ /nag tshur rgyam tsha 'bras bu gsum/ /a

mra 'dzam bu'i tshi gu bcas/ /da ta ka'i phye sbrang rtsir sbyar/ /spyi bag 'dzag pa dag par byed/ /rgya skyegs 'dzam bu da ta ki /so ma ra dza la mang gi/ /sra rtsi pog gi phye ma yis/ /dri mi zhim dang spyi bag 'dzag /rnags shing sra ba sel bar byed/ /dong ga la sogs sde tshan ni/ /

bskol ba'i khu ba blugs par bya/ /sra zhing rtsub par gyur pa la/ /mnyen pa'i cho ga bya ba dang / /sha brdungs pa yis glan pa dang / /kri sa ra dang 'o thug gzhung / /dri ngar til mar dri zhim pa'am/ /lde gu dri zhim bsku ba'am/ /dri bzangs kun gyi phye ma'am/ /rul ba'i dri ni sel byed

gzhug /bad kan can la phal cher sman/ /tsha ba ba gcin mas gtong phan/ /mkhris pa shing mngar 'o mar bcas/ /rlung gyur skyur bcas til mar phan/ /'dus pa las gyur nad la ni/ /thun mong gis ni gso ba phan/ /de ltar mngal ni dag gyur na/ /sa bon skyon med tha mal

bar/ /rnam par shes pa 'jug pas na/ /bud med la ni bu chags 'gyur/ /skyes pa yi ni dbang po yang / /las rnam lnga yis dag bya zhing / /mdog las nad gzhi brtags nas ni/ /nad bcas de 'joms sman gyis gso/ /ru rta rgya spos shu dag bcod/ /'bras bu gsum dang kar dkar/ /

shing mngar me da ser po gnyis/ /la la phud dang pu tse shel/ /shing mngar ram nye pa ya s+ya/ /a shwa gan+d+ha nye'u shing pa/ /zho ni gnyis gnyis btags pa'i phye/ /mar bre gang dang 'o ma ni/ /bzhi 'gyur bcas pa bskol bar bya/ /blud na mngal dang khu ba yi/ /nyes pa thams

cad sel byed cing / /tshe ring lus ni rgyas byed la/ /yid gzhungs pa dang bkra shis dang / /bu skyed par ni byed mchog yin/ /'bras bu'i sman mar zhes byar bshad/ /zla mtshan rgyu tshe 'thungs gyur na/ /bu ni 'chi bar byed pa yang / /'tsho zhing sbrum ma rnams la bsngags/ /'di ni

mchog tu byis pa yi/ /lus rgyas gdon 'joms byed pa yin/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u sum cu rtsa bzhi pa'o// //yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /mtshon spyad kyis gso ba'i yan lag rdzogs so// //

de nas dug nad gso ba bshad par bya'o/ /sngon ni lha dang lha ma yin/ /bdud rtsi 'dod pas bsrubs pa na/ /bdud rtsi 'byung ba'i sngon rol du/ /skyes bu shin tu 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /mche ba bzhi pa gzi brjid 'bar/ /skra ser mig ni me 'bar ba/ /de mthong 'gro ba sdug bsngal gyur/ /

des na 'di ni dug ces bya/ /tshangs pas hUM zhes brjod pa dang / /bslu ba'i bdag nyid can spangs te/ /gzugs de rgyu dang mi rgyu ba'i/ /gzugs la de ni zhugs par gyur/ /brtan dug nus pa mi bzad par/ /sdong bu la ni gnas pa gang / /ka la ku ta dbang po'i bu/ /btsan dug ha la ha

la sogs/ /rgyu ba'i dug ni mi bzad gyur/ /sprul dang phag dang mche ba can/ /rgyu ba dang ni mi rgyu ba'i/ /bcos ma ma yin dug tu bshad/ /bcos ma sna tshogs sman la ni/ /sbyar ba sbyar ba'i dug ces bya/ /de ni sbyor ba'i dbang las ni/ /shin tu ring

nas gsod pa'am/ /skrang dang skya rbab dmu rdzing dang / /smyo byed gzhang 'brum la sogs bskyed/ /rno dro rtsub cing dang ba dang / /khyab cing myur gsod yang ba dang / /'dar zhing bra la ro mi gsal/ /'ju bar mi byed pa yin no/ /rno sogs yon tan dang ldan pas/ /de ni mdangs las go

bzlog yin/ /mi ni rlung mkhris shas che ba/ /srog ni 'phral du 'phrog par byed/ /dug gis lus su phyin pa dang / /dang por khrag la gnod par byed/ /bad kan mkhris pa rlung rjes la/ /nad gzhi grogs dang lhan cig 'byung / /de nas snying la gnas nas ni/ /lus la gnod

par byed par 'gyur/ /mi rgyu'i dug ni btang gyur na/ /lce gnag lus ni rengs pa dang / /brgyal dang slon dang sdang dang ngal/ /gnas skabs dang por 'byung bar 'gyur/ /gnyis par 'dar zhing rngul ba dang / /tsha zhing lkog ma na ba dang / /dug gis ma zhu'i gnas phyin na/ /snying ni

na bar byed par 'gyur/ /gsum par rkan ni bskams pa dang / /ma zhu'i gnas su shin tu gzer/ /de'i mig nyam chung ser ba dang / /skrang ba nyid du 'gyur ba dang / /zhu ba'i gnas phyin zug pa dang / /skyigs bu lud pa rgyu ma 'khrug /dug gi shugs ni bzhi pa la/ /mgo bo lhag

par lci bar 'gyur/ /lnga par mchil snabs 'dzag pa dang / /lhu tshigs na ba 'byung 'gyur la/ /mdog mi sdug cing nad kun 'khrug /zhu ba'i gnas kyi 'og tu na/ /drug par 'du shes nyams pa dang / /shin tu 'khrul bar byed par 'gyur/ /bdun par phrag gong sgal tshigs dang / /

dpyi tshigs bye na 'chi 'gyur yin/ /dug gi shugs ni dang po la/ /slon zhing chu grang dag gis gtor/ /mar dang sbrang rtsir bcas pa yi/ /dug gi sman ni myur du blud/ /gnyis par skyug sman bkru sman gtang / /snga ma bzhin du dug sman blud/ /gsum par dug gi sman blud cing / /de

bzhin mig sman sna sman gtang / /bzhi par snum dang bcas pa yi/ /dug gi sman ni btang na phan/ /lnga par shing mngar khu ba dang / /sbrang rtsir sbyar ba blud na phan/ /drug par 'khru ba lta bur gso/ /bdun par sna sman dud pa dang / /spyi bor rgya gram byas nas ni/ /sha'am khrag ni gzhug

par bya/ /ko sha ta ki lang ga li/ /pa tha lcam pa a ru ra/ /sA lu sle tres shi ri sha /gi ri kar ni yung ba dang / /ha yang sbrang rtsi ba spru ba/ /bri ha ti gnyis tsha ba gsum/ /sha ri ba dang ba la ste/ /'di rnams bskol ba'i khu ba dang / /bskol ba'i nas thug bsgrangs par ni/ /sbrang

rtsi mar dang bcas pa gzhug /gnas skabs gzhan la dug 'joms pa'i/ /sman dang gso ba thams cad bya/ /shing mngar tsan+dan ma du ka /pad+ma ge sar de bzhin bya/ /dngul rdo rgya spos ru rta dang / /ba bla ldong ros pri yang ku/ /tsha ba gsum dang 'bu su hang / /nA ga puSh+pa ge sar

bcas/ /shing mngar spang spos ha re Nu/ /gi wang mon sne'u rme ru dang / /shi ri beSh+Ta sra rtsi pog /shu ti gur gum ba la dang / /bal bu ta ma la'i lo ma/ /stag pa dang ni pu shel tse/ /ser po gnyis ni sbrang rtsir sbyar/ /bu mo khrus dang smyung ba byas/ /gos dkar bgos pa byas nas ni/ /

dge sbyong bram ze mchod byas te/ /dug sman mchog ni sbyar bar bya/ /de tshe sman pas sngags 'dis ni/ /bdag nyid bsngags te brjod par bya/ /skyes bu seng ger phyag 'tshal lo/ /sred med bu la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ji ltar khyab 'jug g.yul ngor ni/ /gzhan gyis pham par ma mthong ste/ /

bden pa'i tshig ni 'di yis kyang / /bdag la dug med grub par shog /na mo be+e DUr+ya ma de/ /hu Tu hu Tu rak+Sha maM/ sarba bi She b+h+yaHgau ri/ gan+d+ha ri/ tsaN+Da li/ matang gi swA hA/ /'thag pa'i sngags gnyis pa ni/ /ha ri mA ye swa hA/ /ba ha mA ye swA hA/ /ma lus dug dang ro langs dang / /gdon gyi las dang sdig pa

dang / /gsod byed nad dang mu ge dang / /'thab par 'dod dang 'jigs pa la/ /sman btung sna sman mig sman bsku/ /gdu bu la sogs la sbyar bya/ /'di ni zla shar zhes bya ste/ /zhi dang bde legs byed mchog yin/ /dug rnying dug sel sman gyis zil mnan pa/ /nags me rlung dang nyi tshan

gyis bskams pa'am/ /rang bzhin gyis ni yon tan mi ldan pas/ /nyams pa'i dug ces bya ba'i dug tu 'gyur/ /'di ni nus pa chung bas mi rtogs te/ /bad kan dang 'dres lo ni mang por gnas/ /des nyen gyur pa mdog ngan 'khru bar byed/ /nad khrag skom dad yi ga 'chus

pas nyen/ /brgyal zhing slon la rnam rmongs skad 'dzer dang / /dug gis dmu rdzing mtshan mas gnod par 'gyur/ /ma zhu'i gnas brten bad kan rlung nad skyed/ /zhu ba'i gnas brten mkhris dang rlung nad skyed/ /mi yi yan lag zhig cing skra 'byibs/ /ji ltar bya ni spu btogs lta bur byed/ /dngas ma'am khrag la

gnas par byed na ni/ /lus zungs las byung nad ni sna tshogs skyed/ /mdun gyi rlung dang ma zhu grang / /yul dmus gnod zas nyin par nyal/ /lus zungs gnod par byas pa na/ /de bas gnod pa'i dug ces bshad/ /gnod pa'i dug nyen dugs byas la/ /steng dang 'og nas

sbyang bar bya/ /gnod pa'i dug ni sel ba'i sman/ /sbrang rtsi sbyar te lde gu sbyin/ /pi pi ling dang bya ma ka /spang spos seng phrom sug smel dang / /ku tan na ta sardzi ka /ru rta shing mngar tsan+dan dang / /yug snam btsag dang sbyar ba'i sman/ /gnod pa'i dug sel zhes bya ste/ /

gzhan yang zlog par byed pa yin/ /dug mdas phog par gyur pa dag /yang dang yang du mun 'thibs byed/ /mdog ni mi sdug gyur pa dang / /myur du yid 'byung sdug bsngal 'thob/ /'dis ni srin bus khyab pa ltar/ /lus tsha tsag tsag por 'gyur ro/ /gdong mo rgyab dang

phrag pa mgo /lhu tshigs rnams su na bar byed/ /khrag ni nad can gnag pa 'dzag /skom dang brgyal tsha rims kyis 'debs/ /mig ni gnag cing slon pa dang / /btud mar lud pa dbugs mi bde/ /rma dmar mtha' mar ser ba dang / /dbus ni gnag cing shin tu na/ /'phral

du skrangs shing rnags pa dang / /sha yang nag por gyur nas ni/ /gnag cing shin tu 'drul bar byed/ /spyi bag can du 'dzag par byed/ /gnad du phog par ma gyur pa/ /myur du snying la phan byed bya/ /zug rngu phyung la lcags bsregs pas/ /rma ni legs par bsreg par

bya/ /yang na mu ka ka dang ni/ /gi ri kar+Ni dkar po dang / /kad pa la yi shun pa dang / /btsod dang shir sha bya rgod sen/ /bsregs pa'i thal bas bsku bar bya/ /shu ka na sa bong nga dkar/ /kaN+Da ka ri'i rtsa bas bsku/ /dug 'thung sos btab gso ba dag /ci rigs par ni de la

bya/ /rma yi sha ni rnags pa la/ /mkhris pa'i me dbal lta bur gso/ /bde phyir khyo la bud med dang / /rgyal po la ni dgras bslab ste/ /zas dang sbyar ba'i dug bsres pa/ /nye 'khor skye bor ster bar 'gyur/ /sna tshogs lus kyi dri mar bcas/ /mi mthun sman dang thal ba

dang / /nus pa chung bar gyur pa'i dug /sbyar ba'i dug ni sbyar ma yin/ /des nyen mdog skya rid pa dang / /me drod nyams shing lud pa dang / /dbugs mi bde dang rims kyis nyen/ /rlung ni mi mthun rgyu ba dang / /gnyid che yid ni zhum par byed/ /gcin snyi lto ba mchin pa dang / /mcher

pa na zhing skad gsang dma'/ /nyam chung sgyid ni zhan pa dang / /skrangs shing rtag tu sbo ba dang / /rkang pa lag pa skam zhing zad/ /rmi lam du ni ce spyang dang / /byi la sbrul dang ne+e'u le dang / /spre'u mthong zhing phal cher ni/ /nags tshal mtsho ni skams par mthong / /bdag nyid nag

por mthong 'gyur zhing / /ser po nag por mthong bar byed/ /mig sna rna ba med pa dang / /de yi dbang po nyams par mthong / /'di dang gzhan yang gnod pa yi/ /bla brnan mi bzad mang pos gtses/ /'ga' zhig 'phral du ma gsos na/ /sbyar dug gis nyen 'chi bar 'gyur/ /dbyig

dug slon byas kha zas ni/ /de la phan pa'i bza' btung sbyin/ /sbyangs nas gser ni bsten bya zhing / /mdo nas bstan pa bzhin du bya/ /gser dang zangs kyi phye ma ni/ /sbrang rtsi kha ra dkar po sbyar/ /lde gus dug ni mi bzad dang / /dbyig dug thams cad sel bar byed/ /mur ba sle tres

pi pi ling / /rgya spos dbyi mo pa to la/ /gla sgang shu dag tsi tra ka /byi dang ka ni dar ba dang / /chu dron zho ga chur sbyar ba/ /skyur khu dang sbyar blud na ni/ /dbyig dug gi bcom me drod sbyong / /zur ba ma nu phug ron gyi/ /sha bskol khu ba bsgrangs pa ni/ /dbyig dug skom dang lud pa na/ /

skyigs bu dbugs mi bde rims sel/ /dug gi rang bzhin dus dang zas/ /nad gzhi lus zungs tshogs 'dus pa/ /dug gi nyam nga zhes bshad de/ /bkres skom nyam ni chung ba dang / /khro dang mya ngan 'jigs dang ngal/ /ma zhu ba dang 'khru ba dang / /mkhris

pa rlung ni 'phel ba dang / /til gyi me tog 'bras bu snum/ /sa yi rlangs pa 'brug sgra dang / /gling bu pi wang rol mo yi/ /sgra dang mdun gyi ser bu dang / /ut+pal dri dang myos pa yis/ /dug gi nyam nga 'phel bar byed/ /dbyar ni char gi dus yin pas/ /bu ram lta bur rlan can 'gyur/ /

lus la khyab byed dbyar 'das nas/ /ri byi 'char bas de med byed/ /de bas sprin bral dus su ni/ /nus pa chung ba nyid du 'gyur/ /de ltar rang bzhin goms pa dang / /gnas dus shugs stobs che chung ba/ /brtags te mkhas pas shes byas la/ /de rjes gso ba'i las spyad

bya/ /bad kan can ni slon dang dro/ /rtsub dang rno ba'i sman bsku zhing / /bska dang kha dang tsha ba yis/ /zas kyi dug ni bsal bar bya/ /mkhris can bkru sman sman chu blugs/ /shin tu bsil ba'i sman bsku zhing / /bska dang kha dang mngar ba dang / /mar bcas kha zas sbyin

pas gso/ /rlung gi bdag nyid can mngar dang / /skyur dang lan tshwa mar bcas pa'i/ /bza' ba mar bcas bsku byug dang / /de bzhin sha ni bza' bas gso/ /bkru sman bsku byug kha zas sman/ /mar med bsngags pa ma yin no/ /dug kun gnas skabs thams cad du/ /dug

'joms mar dang 'dra ba yi/ /sman ni gzhan dag yod min te/ /mchog tu rlung shas che la phan/ /bad kan gnas zhugs gso bar sla/ /mkhris pa'i gnas brten 'bad pas gso/ /rlung gi gnas su zhugs pa'i dug /shin tu gso dka' gsor mi rung / /yan lag brgyad

pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u sum cu rtsa lnga'o// //de nas sbrul gyis zin pa gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /mdor nas yi steng na sbrul/ /gsum ste gdengs ka can lus 'khyil/ /khra bo yin te de yi ni/ /dbye ba mtha' yas gyur

pa dag /skye gnas dbye bas rgyas par ni/ /dgos pa med phyir ma bshad do/ /mchog tu rtsub dang tsha ba dang / /skyur dro mngar bsil dag las ni/ /gdengs ka can la sogs pa'i dug /rim gyis rlung sogs 'khrug par byed/ /gzhon dang rgan po bar ma dang / /dbyar dang

dgun dang sos kar ni/ /'di dag dug ni 'phel 'gyur zhing / /gzhan dag dus tshigs rnams su 'gyur/ /'khor lo gshol dang g.yung drung gdugs/ /lcags kyu'i mtshan mar ldan pa yin/ /gdengs ka can ni myur 'gro ba/ /thams cad gdengs ka can zhes bya/ /lus

'khyil sna tshogs pa yi ni/ /zlum por 'dug pa lus 'khyil zhing / /ring zhing 'gros ni bul ba yin/ /ri mo sna tshogs ldan pa dang / /snum zhing kha dog sna tshogs pas/ /chu zheng bris 'gyur khra bo yin/ /go d+ha'i bu ni go d+ha can/ /dug ni gdengs ka can mnyam la/ /rkang bzhi

po yi sbrul gzhan ni/ /'di dag nyid ni 'dres pa las/ /'dren ma'i mtshan nyid can te des/ /'dus pa'i nad ni ldang bar byed/ /zas kyi don dang 'jigs pa dang / /rkang pas reg las dug rab 'khrugs/ /rkang gi rgyu dang 'dres pa dang / /lha dang drang srong gshin rjes bskul/ /sbrul gyis

zin par gang bshad pa/ /phyi ma bzhin du dug shas che/ /'jug pa'i rgyu ni shes byas nas/ /gso ba ji bzhin bya ba yin/ /phal pa sdig can ngang tshul bas/ /lam bkag nas ni gnas pa yin/ /gang du kha chu gsher ba tsam/ /lus la snang bar byed 'gyur zhing / /mche ba'i rma ni

mi mngon gang / /de ni mchus gnod byed ces bya/ /mche ba gcig las rjes gnyis mngon/ /khrag med gyur pa bldags zhes bya/ /mche ba'i rjes ni khrag bcas gnyis/ /rnam par bcad pa'o de gsum ni/ /sha bcad shin tu phug pa dang / /khrag dbyung so yis zin zhes bya/ /mche

ba'i rjes ni bzhi snang ba/ /de bzhin sos 'dzin btsir bar bshad/ /de las dang po dug med gnyis/ /phyi ma gnyis po gsor mi rung / /sbrul gyi dug ni khrag dag la/ /ma brten lus la gnod mi byed/ /khrag ni cung zad la brten yang / /til mar thigs pa bzhin du mched/ /sngar ma

sbrul gyis reg pa las/ /'jig pas rlung ni 'khrug par byed/ /lan 'ga' skrang bar byed pa de/ /sbrul gyis lus ni bcom zhes bya/ /bgrod dka' mun par zug gyur pa/ /la la rtog pas zin pa dang / /dug gi shugs dang slon dang rims/ /brgyal

ba'am tsha ba skye ba'am/ /na zhing rmongs bag 'khru bar 'gyur/ /de ni rtog pa'i dug ces bya/ /dug bcas nad kyis zug pa dang / /skrang dang g.ya' dang rims bcas pa/ /la la tsha zhing rmen bur 'gyur/ /de las bzlog pa dug med yin/ /gdengs ka can shugs dang po la/ /nad

khrag nag por 'dzag par 'gyur/ /mig dang gdong sogs gnag pa dang / /srin bu rgyu ba snyam du sems/ /shugs gnyis par ni rmen bu skye/ /gsum par mgo ni lci bar 'gyur/ /bzhi par mig 'byed dka' ba dang / /so sa btab rnags shing mchil ma slon/ /lnga par tshigs

'bye snyam sems dang / /rgyud gzhan tshigs ni 'jig pa dang / /lus tsha skyigs bu 'byung ba yin/ /drug par snying na lus lci zhing / /brgyal zhing 'khru la zas mi 'ju/ /bdun par khu ba'i gnas phyin nas/ /phrag gong rgyab dang sgal tshegs dang / /rked pa zhig pa snyam sems

zhing / /spyod lam thams cad las nyams 'gyur/ /de nas lus bskyil bas zin na/ /nad khrag ser por 'gyur ba dang / /de yi lus ser tsha ba skyed/ /gnyis par skrang bar 'gyur ba yin/ /gsum par sos btab rnags pa dang / /rngul dang skom dang skye bar 'gyur/ /bzhi

par khong tsha rims kyis 'debs/ /lnga par lus kun khyab par tsha/ /sprul ni khra bos zin gyur na/ /khrag ni skya bor 'gyur ba dang / /des ni lus mdog skya bor 'gyur/ /gnyis par lus ni lci bar 'gyur/ /gsum par sos btab rnags pa dang / /mig dang kha sna las 'dzag

'gyur/ /bzhi par mgo lci gnye'u rengs 'gyur/ /lnga par lus tshigs na ba dang / /grang ba'i rims kyis 'debs par byed/ /lhag ma gnyis po snga mar mtshungs/ /shugs ni lnga par gso ba dag /bya yi de las phan chad min/ /chu yis g.yeng dang chags pas zad/ /skrag

dang ne+e'u les 'phen pa dang / /grang lhags nyi tshan rlung dang nad/ /bkres skom dal bas gzir ba dang / /phyogs gzhan nas ni rings par 'ongs/ /dug spangs pags pa brjes pa dang / /'jag ma sman dang tsher ma can/ /nags na rgyu ba gang yin dang / /rig pa la sogs brten

phyogs gnas/ /sbrul de dug ni chung bar 'dod/ /dur khrod bsti gnas shing gcig sogs/ /tshes lnga dang ni dus tshigs dang / /tshes brgyad tshes dgu thun mtshams dang / /nam phyed dang ni nyi ma'i gung / /bra nye smin drug mchu dang skag /sa ga chu stod khrums stod dang / /snubs

dang bra nye yud tsam la/ /gnad du bzung ba spang bar bya/ /zin pa'i mod la bzhin skya zhing / /skra ni 'byi bar byed pa dang / /lce 'khums yang dang yang du brgyal/ /dbugs grang gang yin de mi 'tsho/ /skyigs bu dbugs mi bde zhing slon/ /lus can zin pa'i mod la ni/ /snying nas

gzer bar 'gyur ba dang / /cig car 'byung ba de mi 'tsho/ /'du shes stor zhing lbu bar skyugs/ /rkang pa lag pa bzhin gnag cing / /sna zhom yan lag zhig pa dang / /tshigs lhod bshang ba 'khru ba yi/ /dug 'thungs pa dang sprul gyis zin/ /dug can mda' yis phog gyur

pa/ /tshul ni 'di dag snang gyur na/ /srog zad par ni 'gyur ba yin/ /sna sman rnon po mi tshor zhing / /rma nas khrag ni mi 'byung la/ /dbyig pas bsnun na rjes mi mngon/ /gshin rje'i thad du 'gro ba yin/ /de las gzhan du sman pa yis/ /'bar ba'i khyim nas 'byung ba bzhin/ /

lkog mar phyin pa'i srog bsrung zhing / /dug ni myur du bsal bar bya/ /lus can dug gis zin gyur pa/ /grangs brgya'i bar du gnas nas ni/ /lus zungs khrag sogs la gnod cing / /lus la khyab par byed pa yin/ /dus 'di'i bar du gdug pa yi/ /mche bas zin pa bcad

sogs las/ /bya zhing ci nas lus la ni/ /dug gi yal ga ma 'phros bya/ /zin pa'i mod la myur du ni/ /sbrul ni de nyid za ba'am/ /sa 'am bod bar gcod byed na/ /rings pa kho nar sman pa yi/ /mchil mas byug par bya ba'am/ /rna spabs kyis ni so rjes bsku/ /mche bas btab

pa'i gong du ni/ /sor bzhir ras ma las byas pa/ /gso ma'am 'od ma la sogs bcing / /sngags shes pa yis grub sngags bzla/ /chu lon gyis ni chu lta bur/ /bcings pas dug ni 'phros mi 'gyur/ /dug gi bcings sogs nyen pa yi/ /rtsa las rgyu bar

mi 'gyur ro/ /btsir nas sos btab dbyung bya zhing / /tshigs dang gnad du ma chud de/ /sa bon nyams pa'i myu gu bzhin/ /dug shugs de ni 'byung mi 'gyur/ /lus 'khyil so rjes mkhris bskyed pas/ /de ma gtogs pa gzhan dag ni/ /lcags dang gser la sogs pas sam/ /

mgal me yis ni myur du bsreg /me yis thal bar byed 'gyur na/ /ci phyir de ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /sa dang lci ba sman sogs kyis/ /kha bkang nas ni gzhib par bya/ /chings ma'i nang nas sha che'i phyogs/ /mchog tu zhal zhal bya ba dang / /yan lag mche bas zin bcas pa/ /

dug sman gyis ni yang yang bsku/ /tsan+dan pu shel tse ldan pa'i/ /chu yis kyang ni blugs par bya/ /dug gis khyab par gyur pa la/ /gtar ga gdab pa gso mchog ste/ /khrag ni phyung bar gyur pa na/ /ma lus dug ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /dug bcas khrag ni dri mi zhim/ /mer bsregs

sgra ni tseg tseg zer/ /nad gzhi ji bzhin dag gyur pa/ /khrag ni snga ma bzhin zhes bya/ /rtsa ni snang bar ma gyur na/ /rngabs rwa srin bu pad pas gtar/ /khrag phyung ba yi lhag ma ni/ /dug gi drod kyis zhugs gyur pa/ /shin tu bsil ba'i sman bsku dang / /blugs pa yis ni bsal

bar bya/ /dug gi shugs kyis ma zhu bas/ /brgyal dang myos dang snying 'dzag 'byung / /de ni bsil sman blugs pa dang / /rlung yab spu ldang byed pas bsal/ /khrag na sla bar gyur na dug /'phral du shugs ni zhi bar 'gyur/ /dug gi rno bas snying 'dar byed/ /de bsrung phyir ni zhun mar dang / /

mar dang bcas pa'i sbrang rtsi 'am/ /dug sman mar dang sbrus pa blud/ /de yi snying ni 'gag byed pas/ /snying gar bad kan sogs par byed/ /lus lci nad ni bslangs pa dang / /snying 'phar de ni slon du gzhug /gsher rdzas skyur rtsabs rgya sran dang / /til dang chang sogs ma gtogs pa/ /

dug sel ba yi slon sman gtang / /des ni lus la khyab mi 'gyur/ /sbrul dang nyes pa rang bzhin dang / /gnas dang shugs kyi khyad par ni/ /phra mo yan chad legs brtags la/ /gso ba khyad par can bya'o/ /srin bu ba ri'i rtsa ba dang / /gi ri kar+Ni dkar po'i chu/ /btung ba gdengs

ka can bzhin sbyar/ /sna sman ru rta sbrang rtsi gtang / /sbrul nag gis ni zin pa la/ /khrag gtar nas ni bca' ba dang / /na go la ni sbyar ba bsku/ /yang na rtsa rnon dug gis bsku/ /btung bar btsod dang sbrang rtsi dang / /khang pa'i dud pa mar sbyar blud/ /gdengs ka can dang ri mo can/ /mi

bzad dug gis zin pa la/ /tan du li ya tad pal dang / /gi ri kar+Ni rnam gnyis dang / /kha lung khaN+Da se'u 'bru ni/ /btung dang sna sman mig sman bya/ /a shwa gan+d+ha rgun 'brum dang / /gi ri kar+Ni sa nag dang / /ha ti pi pi ling dang ni/ /bye'u rug pa'i lo ma dang / /bil ba se 'bru ka

pid tha/ /cha ni phyed phyed sbrang rtsir sbyar/ /dug sman yin te khyad par du/ /lus 'khyil sbrul gyi dug la phan/ /lo ma lnga dang 'bras bu gsum/ /shing mngar nA ga puSh+pa dang / /e la ba lu dzi ba ka /zangs rtsi ba dang pu shel tse/ /kha ra shug pa ut+pa la/ /sbrang rtsi dang sbyar kha ba can/ /

zhes bya lus 'khyil dug 'joms so/ /bskus na skrang dang shu ba mched/ /'brum bu rims dang lus lci sel/ /tang pal n+ya gro d+ha'i myu gu/ /dzi ba ka dang zangs rtsi ba/ /ka ra dkar po shing mngar btsod/ /khu ba lus 'khyil dug la blud/ /'od ma'i shun pa sa bon dang / /bca'

sga pa to la'i sa bon/ /shir sha'i sa bon pu tse shel/ /'bras kyi rtsa ba bong nga dkar/ /shu dag ba gcin bcas par btags/ /yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya ste/ /go nas yi dug 'joms so/ /ru rta bong nga pu tse shel/ /ha re Nu ka khyim dud pa/ /rgya spos sbrang rtsi tsha ba gsum/ /

sbyar bas ri mo can dug sel/ /'dam bu khra bo 'dras zin na/ /sa brkos 'og tu thun gnyis gzhug /phyung ste bzhar la mar sar dang / /'bras dang sa yi lde gus byug /'bras bu gsum gyi phye btab pa'i/ /mar ni rnying pa blud par bya/ /zhu zhing bkrus nas nas zan ni/ /sran tshod dang ni

bcas pa sbyin/ /ka ra bI ra arka yi/ /me tog lang ka li'i rtsa ba/ /pi pi ling dang na le sham/ /pa ta skyur rtsabs lde gur byas/ /'di ni sbrul gzhan gyis zin pa'i/ /sbrul gyi dug kun sel ba yin/ /shir sha'i me tog khu ba dang / /na le sham

dkar zhag bdun sbangs//btung dang sna sman byas gyur na/ /sbrul gyi mche bas zin pa sel/ /rgya spos ru rta srang gnyis gnyis/ /mar dang sbrang rtsi srang bzhi bzhi/ /'di blud 'jog pos zin pa yang / /bde ba skyed par byed pa yin/ /de nas gdengs ka can gyi shugs/ /dang por

khrag ni dbyung bar bya/ /dug sman sbrang rtsi zhun mar dang / /bcas pa myur du blud par bya/ /gnyis par slon sman btang nas ni/ /de bzhin dug sman blud par bya/ /gsum par dug sman sbyar bya zhing / /mig sman dang ni sna sman gtang / /bzhi bar skyug sman btang nas ni/ /sngar bshad pa yi

nas thug blud/ /lnga pa drug par bsil sman gyis/ /bsku zhing sman chu yang yang blugs/ /slon sman rnon po gtang bya zhing / /dug sel nas thug blud par bya/ /bdun par dug sman rnon po yi/ /mig sman dang ni sna sman gtang / /de nas spyi bor rgya gram du/ /zab mo'i mtshon gyis batra la

nas ni/ /der ni sha'am khrag gam ni/ /pags pa dag ni gzhug par bya/ /lus 'khyil shugs ni gsum pa la/ /slon sman btang la nas thug blud/ /drug par sman ni rtul po'am/ /shug pa la sogs sde tshan blud/ /khra bo'i shugs ni dang po la/ /zhal zhal zab tu gdang bya

zhing / /ku bas khrag ni bton nas ni/ /snga ma bzhin du dug sman blud/ /drug par mig sman rnon po dang / /sna sman phye ma bud pa gtang / /ma smas pa yi shugs las ni/ /gdengs ka can skabs bshad ltar gso/ /sbrum ma byis pa rgan po la/ /gtar ga mi gdab 'jam pos

gso/ /shing tsha ldong ros rgya spos nyung / /ku sha'i khu ba chu srin sen/ /ta ma la yi ge sar dang / /'bras bu chu grang sbyar ba blud/ /'di yis dbang po'i rdo rjes ni/ /lha min lta bur dug 'joms byed/ /bil ba'i rtsa ba bye'u rug pa'i me tog /rgya spos thang shing ka rany+dza'i 'bras bu/ /

ser po rnam gnyis 'bras bu gsum dang ni/ /tsha ba gsum po ra gcin zhib btags la/ /btung dang sna sman mig sman sbyar ba yis/ /sbrul dang lu dbyi ba sdig pa sogs/ /dug dang dbyig dug ma zhu gsud dang rims/ /mi ni gdon gyis zin pa bde bar byed/ /sos btab bsku

ba la sogs kyis/ /ma lus ston par gyur kyang ni/ /nyams pa'i dug ni ji bzhin dang / /slar yang shugs ni skye bar byed/ /dug dang bral nas rlung 'khrugs na/ /snum la sogs pas gso bya zhing / /til mar chang dang rgya sran chu/ /ma gtogs rlung ni sel ba sbyin/ /mkhris

par mkhris pa'i rims sel ba'i/ /sman khu sman mar 'jam rtsis gso/ /bad kan sbrang rtsir bcas pa yi/ /dong ka la sogs sde yis gso/ /sprul gyi rus pas gnod 'gyur dang / /de bzhin rtog pa'i dug gis nyen/ /ka ra rgun 'brum pa ya s+ya/ /shing mngar kha ra sbrang rtsir sbyar/ /

sngags kyis btab pa'i chu dang bcas/ /gtor zhing spro bsring dga' bar bya/ /ke ke ru dang mu tig margad dang / /bai DUr+ya dang rdo rje mthon ka che/ /ras bal sa bon dug gis gnod pa'am/ /kha ba can gyi ri las skyes pa yi/ /so ma ra dza dang ni ba spru ba/ /de bzhin dro na ma hA dro na dang / /

sbrul la yod pa'i nor bu ma na si/ /nus pa dang ni ldan par gyur pa yi/ /dug ni dug gzhom bya phyir bcad par bya/ /nub mo'i dus su rgyu che khyad par du/ /gdugs dang khar gsil sgra dang bcas pa bcang / /de yi grib ma sgra yi skad phyung na/ /sbrul gyi tshogs ni 'byer bar byed par

'gyur/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u sum cu drug pa'o// //de nas srin bu'i dug nad gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /sbrul nyid kyi ni bshang gci dang / /kha chu sgo nga lus rul skyes/ /nad ni re re 'dus pa dang / /ldan pa'i

srin bu'i dug rnam bzhi/ /rlung gi srin bus zin gyur na/ /shas cher na zhing zug par byed/ /me yi srin bus 'dzag pa chung / /tsha zhing dmar la shu ba mched/ /ba lu'i 'bras bu smin pa'am/ /'bra go'i 'bras bu smin pa 'dra/ /bad kan shas ches nad tshabs chung / /u dum

wA ra smin pa 'dra/ /shas cher 'dzag pa'o 'dus pa yi/ /mtshan nyid thams cad ldan pa dang / /shugs ni sbrul dang 'dra ba dang / /skrang ba 'phel zhing khrag dri ma mnam/ /mgo dang mig lci brgyal mgo 'khor/ /dbugs mi bde na spang bar bya/ /kun tu skrang ba lte ba

can/ /tsha ba g.yo zhing yi ga 'chus/ /sdig pa'i dug ni rno ba ste/ /dang por me ltar sreg par byed/ /steng du myur du mched byed cing / /mche ba 'og tu 'dug pa yin/ /zin ma thag ni rab na gnag/ /gas pa snyam du sems shing zug /de ni lci ba sogs rul dang / /dug gis phog

sogs rul ba dang / /sbrul rul pa las skyes pa yi/ /dug tshabs chung dang 'bring dang che/ /tshabs chung ser zhing dkar dang gnag /rtsub dang phra zhing gzig mdog can/ /spu drang tshigs ni dmar ba dang / /dmar zhing lto ba dkar ba yin/ /bar ma lto ru tshigs gsum pa/ /rked pa ser

skya dmar ba yin/ /dug che ser skya phra ba dang / /ri mo can la khrag 'dra zhing / /me 'dra tshigs ni gnyis sam gcig /lto ba dkar zhing dmar ram gnag /des zin lce ni skrangs pa dang / /lus rengs rims kyis nyen pa dang / /bu ga las ni khrag nag slon/ /dbang po'i don ni mi shes

shing / /rdul zhing brgyal la kha skom dad/ /rmongs shing nad kyis nyen pa dang / /sha ni zhig par byed pa ste/ /phal cher srog ni 'dor bar byed/ /mchu sbom pa yi kha yis ni/ /'debs shing gsor rung sdig pa las/ /lhag par na byed lus rengs shing / /mtshan gyi sbubs ni ldang ba

dang / /lus ni rngul bar byed 'gyur zhing / /sos 'debs chu grang snyam du sems/ /de nyid rnga mo dud ka dang / /mtshan mo rgyu bas mtshan mo can/ /srin bu rlung mkhris shas che zhing / /rnga mo byi ba bad kan can/ /rnga mo dud pa zhes bya ba/ /phal cher rlung shas che ba yin/ /nad ni gang dang gang gi

ni/ /mtshan ma shas che ba las brtags/ /de dang de las gso ba'i sman/ /yon tan mi mthun pa yis gso/ /snying gzer stong rlung gis rengs shing / /rtsa mi snang zhing rus tshigs na/ /mgo 'khor lus bcings snyam du sems/ /mdog gnag rlung las gyur pa'i dug /dran nyams

dbugs ni tsha bar byed/ /snying tsha kha ni kha bro la/ /sha 'gas skrang par byed pa dang / /khrag ser ba ni mkhris pa can/ /slon zhing snying na yi ga 'chus/ /kha chu 'dzag cing chom pas 'debs/ /grang bcas kha ni mngar bar bro/ /bad kan shas che'i dug nad yin/ /'ba' chas

rma ni bsku ba dang / /rlung sel til mar gyis bsku dang / /sbu gu ma smin 'bru dugs dang / /brtas par bya ba'i cho gas phan/ /mkhris pa can la sman chu blugs/ /shin tu grang ba'i lde gus bsku/ /bad kan can la bzhar zhing bcad/ /dugs dang skyug sman btang bas gso/ /srin

bu rnam pa gsum po la/ /gso ba rnam pa gsum pos phan/ /dugs dang bsku dang sman chu blugs/ /phal cher dro 'jam gtang bar bya/ /gzhan du brgyal dang mche ba yis/ /rnag dang 'drul bar byed ma gtogs/ /mi skra yungs kar ser po dang / /bu ram rnying pa'i dud pas

bdug /dug dang mche ba'i dug kun la/ /mchog tu phan par 'drob skyong 'chang / /dug sel sman ni thams cad dang / /sbyang ba'i las kyang bya ba yin/ /srin bu sdig pa mi bzad dug /'bus zin sbrul gyis zin ltar gso/ /tan du li ya cha mnyam pa'i/ /dur byid dang ni zhun

mar blud/ /'bu yi dug gis gangs can ltar/ /bskyod par nus pa ma yin no/ /'o ma can shing lde gus bsku/ /sbyangs byas srin bu'i dug sel byed/ /mu tig lde gus bskus na yang / /skrang dang dug dang tsha ba sel/ /shu dag shing kun byi dang ga /rgyam tsha ha ti pi pi ling / /ba tha

bong nga tsha ba gsum/ /'drob skyong gis ni bshad pa yin/ /yan lag bcu pa'i dug sman ni/ /'drob skyong gis ni bshad pa dag /blud na srin bu'i dug kyang sel/ /sdig pa'i dug gis 'phral zin la/ /'khor los btsir ba'i til mar bsku/ /sa la par+Ni bskol ba yi/ /dro

'jam yang na gzhan dag blugs/ /rgyam tsha dang ni bcas pa yi/ /zhun mar yang dang yang du blugs/ /yang na skyur rtsabs dro 'jam mam/ /rgyam tsha 'o mar bcas pa blugs/ /mar dang brngos pa'i go snyod dang / /rgyam tshar bcas pas dkri bar bya/ /mche bas zin pa dugs

byas la/ /zhal zhal btab ste 'bras bu gsum/ /ser po gnyis dang tsha ba gsum/ /shir sha'i me tog bsku bar bya/ /rgyam tsha kha lung ba gcin skyur/ /bye'u rug pa'i rtse mo btags/ /'ba' cha'am lci ba dro 'jam tsam/ /bskus na'ang

phan par 'gyur ba yin/ /btung ba zhun mar sbrang rtsir bcas/ /yang na 'o mar kha ra btab/ /phug ron rtug pa a ru ra/ /rgya spos bca' sga kha lung gi /khu ba dang sbyar blud pa ni/ /sdig pas zin pa'i sman mchog yin/ /rnga mo'i so ni chu bal bcas/ /sdig pa'i

dug ni 'joms par byed/ /shing kun ba la kha lung gi /khu ba dang sbyar lde gu dang / /mig sman ri lur byas na ni/ /sdig pa'i dug ni sel mchog yin/ /ka rany+dza dang ardzu na/ /gi ri kar+Ni se lu dang / /shir sha'i me tog dug mo nyung / /zhog chu dang btags bskus na/ /sdig

pa'i dug ni sel bar byed/ /gang zhig rmugs shing rngam pa 'thon/ /bla zhing mi bzad na gyur pa/ /de la yung dang a ru ra/ /btsod dang bong nga pi pi ling / /bil ba gzhon nu na le sham/ /bA ta ka yi khu bar btags/ /lde gus byugs na phan pa yin/ /sbrang ma gdug pa'i dug

kun la/ /zho dang mar ni blud bya zhing / /gtar ga gdab cing sna sman dang / /mig sman gyi ni cho ga bya/ /dro zhing snum dang skyur ba dang / /rlung 'doms kha zas sbyin par bya/ /dong gra byi ba'i rtug pa dang / /kha lung khu ba sla ba dang / /rgyam tsha pu shel tse sbyar ba'i/ /lde gus dang ma'i dug

myur 'joms/ /sdig pas zin pa'i tha mar ni/ /dug ni shas cher langs gyur par/ /zin pa'i rma la dug gis bsku/ /uts+tshe TiM ka'i gso ba'ang 'di/ /glang po che yi rtug pa'i steng / /ro hi sha'i rtsa se'u'i chu/ /sde gur byas btags bskus na ni/ /'di ni sbrang ma'i dug

'joms mchog /shir sha'i sa bon arga yi/ /'o mas lan gsum bsgos pa ni/ /pi pi ling gi phye mar bsres/ /dug sman 'dis ni srin bu'i dug /sbrul dang lu dbyi ba yi/ /dug ni sel bar byed pa yin/ /shir sha ka rany+dza yi sa bon dang / /gur gum ru rta ldong

ros bcas pa yi/ /dug sman 'dis ni mtshan rgyu'i sdig pas zin/ /sel bar byed pa yin par rgyal bas gsungs/ /srin bu las ni rab gdug pa/ /ba ni bcu drug yin par bshad/ /gzhan dag nyi shu rtsa brgyad 'dod/ /kha cig de bas mang bar 'dod/ /nyi ma'i 'od kyi rjes 'brang ba/ /stong phrag

yod ces gzhan dag 'chad/ /bla brnan gzugs ni mang gyur pa/ /dug can pa ni gcig pur 'dod/ /de yi gzugs dang ming dag ni/ /shin tu 'dres pas shes par dka'/ /gnas kyi nges pa yod min pas/ /de phyir nad las bshad par bya/ /nad gzhi so so'i gso ba dka'/ /'dus pa

las gyur gsor mi rung / /des zin mkhris gyur tsha ba dang / /skom dad chu bur rims kyis 'debs/ /rmongs bag rab tsha dmar ser mdog /rnags shing rgun 'bru'i 'bras bu 'dra/ /bad kan las gyur sra zhing skya/ /ba ru sha ka'i 'bras bu 'dra/ /gnyid che grang rims lud pa lu/ /shin tu

g.ya' bar byed pa yin/ /rlung gyur rtsub cing gnag pa dang / /tshigs na rims kyis 'debs par byed/ /de yi dbye ba nad kyi ni/ /rang gi mtshan nyid las shes bya/ /gsor mi rung ba snying tsha zhing / /lud pa skyigs bu mgo nad dang / /'brum phran dkar dang ser dang gnag /dmar dang

skya ba las 'byung 'gyur/ /'dar zhing skrangs la tsha ba dang / /skom dad lang zhing sna 'chus la/ /mchu gnag so ni g.yo ba dang / /rgyab dang mid pa bcom snyam sems/ /'dzam bu'i 'bras bu smin 'dra ba'i/ /khrag ni mchus bldags rma las 'dzag /'dus gyur mtshan nyid kun

ldan zhing / /ming ni mang por gyur pa yi/ /de dug rnon po bar ma dang / /dman pa'i dbye ba gsum du 'gyur/ /ma bcos zhag bdun zhag bcu dang / /zla ba phyed kyi rims kyis gsod/ /ba dang mchu rings thams cad kyang / /glang shu kor kor por byed cing / /dkar dang gnag dang dmar dang

ser/ /gnag pa'am 'jam zhing mtho ba dang / /dbus su gnag pa'am sngo ba la/ /mtha' ma dra ba lta bus khebs/ /mched cing skrang bar byed pa dang / /tsha zhing mang du na ba dang / /rims 'debs myur du rnags shing 'drul/ /rul zhing gas par byed pa dang / /rnag gis gang du reg gyur

pa'i/ /phyogs der yang ni rma skyed byed/ /dbugs dang mche ba bshang gci dang / /khu chu kha chu sen mo khrag /brgyad po gnod byed khyad par du/ /dug ni kha la gnas pa yin/ /ba ni lte ba yan chad 'dzin/ /srin bu stod smad kun tu gnod/ /de gnod byas pa'i gos la

sogs/ /lus la reg na nad skyed byed/ /ba dang srin bu las gyur dug /nyin phyed bar du tshor mi 'gyur/ /de nas dang po'i nyin zhag la/ /khab kyis gtsags pa snyam du sems/ /mdog mi gsal zhing g.yo ba dang / /cung zad g.ya' zhing nad dang ldan/ /gnyis par mtha' ma shin

tu mtho/ /'brum bu phra mos khyab pa 'dra/ /mdog gsal gyur na dbus dma' zhing / /g.ya' zhing rmen bu lta bur snang / /gsum par rims bcas spu ldang zhing / /'khor ling dmar por snang ba dang / /kham phor gzugs 'dra phal cher ni/ /ba spu'i bu ga 'dzag par 'gyur/ /nyin zhag

bzhi par cher skrangs shing / /mgo 'khor lus tsha dbugs mi bde/ /lnga par dug ldang las gyur pa'i/ /nad ni de dang de dag bskyed/ /drug par gnad du khyab par byed/ /bdun par srog ni 'joms par byed/ /de ltar dug ni rnon po dang / /bar ma dman pa dbye bar bya/ /de nas nyin zhag nyi shu ni/ /gcig

na yong ye zhi bar 'gyur/ /de 'og ba yis zin pa ni/ /mtshon gyis rma ni gnod par bya/ /'dzam bu'i mchu la sogs pas bsreg /mkhris pa las gyur bsreg mi bya/ /rtsub cing spu ni gyes pa dang / /gnad dang tshigs la sogs la gnas/ /zin nas kun tu khyab gyur pa/ /gcad par mi bya

bsreg mi bya/ /bsreg pa dug sman rgyam tsha dang / /sbrang rtsir sbyar bas bsku bar bya/ /de rjes 'o ma can shing bskol/ /sman khu shin tu bsil mo blugs/ /rngabs rwa sogs sam gtar ga yis/ /thams cad la ni khrag dbyung bya/ /de nas bsil sman bsku blugs bya/ /sle sman ta ka a

shwad+tha/ /ba ru ra dang pri yang ku/ /shug pa ser gnyis sbrang rtsir sbyar/ /ba dang srin bu la sogs pa'i/ /dug 'joms las ni thams cad byed/ /ser po rnam gnyis rma shing btsod/ /pad+ma ge sar rgya spos ni/ /sbrang rtsi mar sbyar tsam pa ka /snga ma bas kyang yon tan lhag /lci khu btsir

dang kar dkar/ /a pa marga ldong ros dang / /ba bla skyer pa bya ma ka /yug snam sbrang rtse mar de bzhin/ /rgya spos na le sham sug smel/ /ru rta shing mngar sbrang rtsi mar/ /sbyar ba'i sman ni man+da ra/ /rgya spos seng phrom pu tse shel/ /shu dag pa tha sug smel dang / /gur gum spos dang

ldang de bzhin/ /nad gzhi mang la dug 'joms pa'i/ /sbyang ba byas pas gso bar bya/ /shing mngar dang ni po son cha/ /ko sha ta ki ang ko la/ /sin du bar 'bras chur sbyar/ /'thungs na bad kan las gyur dug /myur du slon par byed pa yin/ /shir sha'i lo ma med dang / /rtsa

ba 'bras bu ang ko la'i/ /rtsa bar bcas pa'ang de bzhin no/ /'bras bu gsum dang ni li ni/ /dur byid la sogs bkru sman gtang / /skrang dang tsha sogs zhi gyur na/ /rma yi lte ba dbog par bya/ /ba bla le brgan rtsi'i me tog /khron bu byi ba'i rtug pa dang / /dur byid rgyam tsha dan dang

sbyang / /lte ba 'byin par byed pa yin/ /de bzhin u ta ma ka ra'i/ /rtsa ba smin pa'i shun bcas pa'i/ /rgyam tsha ru rta pu tse shel/ /dan da pa ya s+ya sbyar ba'am/ /ra dza ko ta ka'i rtsar/ /dar ba'i tshigs ma'ang sbyar bar bya/ /lte ba bcad pa'i dus su ni/ /dug sel ba yis brta bar bya/ /

snum chos ma lus bya ba ni/ /zhun mar nyid kyis bya ba yin/ /til mar gyis ni rtswa sogs la/ /me mched lta bur dug 'phel byed/ /be kang ka ta ba li ka /thal tres gla sgang spri ka dang / /tsan+dan nya lcibs son ka /ut+pal rgya spos shing mngar dang / /shing tsha shug pa na gu li/ /po son

cha'i rkang lhan cig sbyar/ /skyer pa gla sgang sar pak+Shi/ /bca' sga pi pi ling rtsa ba/ /pi pi ling dang tsi tra ka /ba ru na dang a ka ru/ /bil ba nim pa pa ta li/ /ru rta nA ga ge sar dang / /se'u lu lhan cig sbyar ba dang / /bil ba tsan+dan ut+pal/ /rgya spos bca' sga pi pi ling / /lcam

pa nim pa ru rta dang / /chu srin sder mo dzi ban ti/ /ga bra'i rtsa ba pa ta li/ /dzi ban ti dang po son cha/ /shing tsha sbyar ba de dag ni/ /mig sman snar blugs byug pa dang / /sman chu blugs pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /mkhris pa bad kan rlung gyur pa'i/ /lu ta'i dug ni ji snyed pa/ /tshul

khrims la gnas ngan 'gro bzhin/ /'di yis dug nad kun 'joms byed/ /seng phrom shug pa pad+ma ge sar dang / /tsan+dan dmar ser pri yang ku'i me tog /pad+ma pu shel tse dang pa ya s+ya'i/ /sbyor ba kun gyis ba yi dug kun 'joms/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying

po bsdus pa las/ phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u sum cu bdun pa'o// //de nas byi ba dang a laM ka'i dug gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /khu chu can dang mi brtan bu/ /rgod dang sgra can pags pa dang / /rnying pa'i so dang khu byug dang / /ser skya dang ni nag po dang / /dmar

ser khra bo dkar po dang / /thib skra dkar phyi ba dang / /phus pa dang ni bra byi ste/ /byi ba'i dbye ba bco brgyad yin/ /gang du 'di yi khu chus phog /khu bas phog dang reg pa ni/ /lus kyi lus la reg pa der/ /khrag la gnod cing mdog skya la/ /thor bu rmen bu dri mnam dang / /shu

ba kor ling yi ga 'chus/ /mgo 'khor skrangs rims rab tu na/ /nyam chung 'dar zhing lhu tshigs na/ /spu ldang dran nyams khrag 'dzag dang / /yun ring du ni gnas par byed/ /bad kan can gyi byi ba yi/ /phru gu mang reg skom slon 'gyur/ /byi ba 'khrig spyod dug gso dka'/ /yang

dang yang du ldang bar byed/ /yan lag kun skrangs mdog mi sdug /rnags shing 'on la rims kyis 'debs/ /mgo lci kha chu khrag 'byung zhing / /slon pa gso dka'i mtshan nyid yin/ /phus pas zin pa de dri bro/ /lgang pa skrangs shing chu mdog nyams/ /sbrang rtsi 'dra ba'i rmen bus

khyab/ /khye'i dug bad kan shas cher 'khrugs/ /'du shes rgyu ba'i rtsa mang gnas/ /gnod cing 'khrug par byed pa dang / /lus zungs la ni mi bzad gnod/ /kha chu 'dzag dang long dang 'on/ /kun tu rgyug par byed pa dang / /mjug ma 'gram pa phrag gong lhod/ /mgon gdong ni dud pa

yin/ /de yi so yis zin na rma/ /tshor ba chung zhing khrag rnag 'dzag /mgo snying na zhing rims 'debs rengs/ /de rjes skom dang brgyal bar 'gyur/ /'di yis gdug cing mche ba can/ /ce spyang dom dang dred dang gung / /stag dang spyang ki la sogs pa/ /gzhan dag kyang ni shes par bya/ /

g.ya' zhing zug la mdog mi sdug /tshor ba med gnas rims mgo 'khor/ /tsha zhing dmar lan zhing gnag /skrang zhing rmen bu skye zug 'khums/ /rma ni 'gags shing 'brum bu 'byung / /lte ba can du zlum por 'gyur/ /kun tu dug bcas mtshan ma 'di/ /dug med de las

bzlog pa yin/ /gang gis bzung ba de'i spyod tshul/ /sgra sgrogs rgyu med par de'i gzugs/ /chu dang me long sogs mthong 'chi/ /ma bzung bar yang sgra dang ni/ /mthong bas sdang bar byed pa ni/ /chu yis skrag ces bya ba ste/ /zin pas de yang spang bar bya/ /byi ba'i dug gis zin ma

thag /rma ni mde'u bsregs pas bsreg /yang na me long dag gis bya/ /gzhan du lte bar mi bzod na/ /bsregs nas rma las khrag dbyung zhing / /zhal zhal byas la shir sha dang / /yung ba rgya spos gur gum dang / /sle tres kyi ni lde gus bsku/ /khyim gyi dud pa skyer pa dang / /

rgyam tsha dang ni btsod dag gi/ /lde gus byi ba'i dug sel zhing / /lte ba 'bur ba'ang 'joms par byed/ /de nas skyur bas bkrus nas ni/ /gi ri kar Ni pa lin di/ /bil ba'i rtsa ba sle tres dang / /chu dang btags pa'i lde gus bsku/ /dug dang skrang sel sman gzhan dang / /yang na gtar ga

myur du gdab/ /ni li ni bskol shi ri sha//ang ko la yi khu bas slon/ /ko sha ta ki shir sha dang / /dzi mu ta ka'i 'bras bu dang / /po son cha ni phye mar btags/ /zho sbyar blud la dug slon gzhug /shu dag ru rta po son cha'am/ /dzi ban ti ni ba gcin btags/ /cho ga snga ma bzhin
