blud na/ /dug gi nad ni thams cad sel/ /dur byid ni li ni dang ni/ /'bras bu gsum gyi bkru sman bsngags/ /shir sha'i snying po'i 'bras bu yis/ /mgo bo'i bkru sman dag kyang phan/ /ba lci'i khu ba tsha ba gsum/ /phye ma zhib btags lde gus phan/ /ba lang lci ba ka pid ta'i/ /phye ma sbrang

rtsi'i lde gu bza'/ /taN+Du li yi rtsa ba dang / /bskol ba'i mar ni blud na'ang phan/ /gi ri kar Ni ser po gnyis/ /shing mngar btsod dang sle tras phan/ /thal tres rtsa pa mar bskol ba/ /ka ping ta yi rnam lnga'ang phan/ /sin du ba ra rgya spos dang / /shi kru bil ba'i rtsa ba dang / /shu dag gze ma

ba spru ba/ /dzi mu ta dang bcas pa ste/ /de rnams khu ba sbrang rtsir bcas/ /blud nas 'bras chan sA lu zho/ /byin na byi ba'i dug nad sel/ /shar pung ga'i phye ma ni/ /dar bar sbyar ba blud pa'ang phan/ /aM ko la yi rtsa ba ni/ /ra thug gcin sbyar lde gus ni/ /btung

dang bsku ba la sbyar na/ /byi ba'i dug kun sel bar byed/ /ka pid ta yi snying po dang / /til ka dang til dang ni/ /aM ko la yi rtsa ba ni/ /ba yi 'o ma'am gcin sbyar blud/ /til ka'i gdong yal ga yi/ /ba yi 'o ma sbyar ba blud/ /yang na sher+ya ka'i rtsa ba/ /sbrang rtsi 'bras bu sbyar

ba blud/ /ku ba kha bo zhag gcig ni/ /chu la sbangs pa'ang blud par bya/ /sin du ba ra'i rtsa ba dang / /byi ba'i rus pa bong nga dkar/ /rgya spos chur btags sna sman sogs/ /sbyar bas byi ba'i dug sel byed/ /byi ba'i dug ni lhag lus pa/ /sprin mthong bas ni ldang byed pa'am/ /nad ni

'phel bar byed pa'i rgyu/ /ji lta bar ni 'phel bar byed/ /de la gnas skabs thams cad du/ /gso ba thams cad sbyar bya zhing / /rang gi gso bar gang bshad dang / /de bzhin nyams pa'i dug sel sbyor/ /a lang ga yi so yis zin/ /mar bskol ba yis bsreg par bya/ /dug sman

de dang de bsku zhing / /mar gyi snying po blud par bya/ /'di la arka'i 'o mar bcas/ /bkru sman dag kyang myur du gtang / /aM ko la'i rtsa byang phyogs chu/ /srang gsum mar ni srang gcig blud/ /d+ha du ra yi 'bras bu dang / /gi ri kar Ni ba spru ba/ /bskol ba'i khu ba blud par bya/ /til btags

lde gu arka lcags/ /'o ma bu ram bsres byin na/ /sprin sogs rlung gis gtor ba bzhin/ /a laM ka yi dug 'joms byed/ /sngags bcas sman dang rin chen bcas/ /zhi bar byed pa dag kyang sbyar/ /rkang bzhi pa dang rkang gnyis pa'i/ /so 'am sen mos snad gyur pa/ /skrang zhing

rnags la mdog dmar zhing / /tshan chu ser 'dzag pa la/ /a shwa kar+Na kad pha la/ /han sa pa ti go ji ha/ /yug snam ser po gnyis kyis bsku/ /so dang sen mo'i dug 'joms byed/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u ste sum cu brgyad pa'o// //

yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /mche ba gso ba'i yan lag rdzogs so// //de nas bcud kyis len gyi le'u bshad par bya'o/ /tshe ring dran dang yid gzhungs dang / /nad med gzhon dang lang tsho dang / /gzugs bzang mdog dang skad gsal dang / /lus dang dbang

po'i stobs skyed cing / /tshig grub ro tsa mdangs ldan pa/ /bcud kyis len gyis 'thob par 'gyur/ /dngas ma la sogs yon tan can/ /thob gnas yin phyir bcud kyis len/ /na tshod dang po'am bar ma'i tshe/ /dbang po thul bas de sbyar te/ /snum chos bya zhing gtar ga gdab/ /

rnam pa kun tu sbyangs byas gtang / /ma sbyangs pa yi lus la ni/ /bcud kyis len dang ro tsa ba'i/ /sbyor ba dri ma can gyi ni/ /gos kyi tshon ltar don med 'gyur/ /bcud kyis len gyi sbyor ba ni/ /rnam pa gnyis su drang srong 'dod/ /spyil bor 'dug pa gtso bo ste/ /rlung dang than pas nyen

cig shos/ /khang pa rlung med 'jigs pa med/ /chos ldan yo byad 'byor pa'i grong / /sa phyogs shis pa'i byang phyogs su/ /khang pa sum rim skar khung chung / /dud pa nyi tshan sbrul dang rdul/ /bud med glen mas ma bgrod par/ /yo byad sman pa sta gon byas/ /khang pa legs par byi dor

bya'o/ /de nas tshes grangs bzang khrus byas/ /mchod 'os mchod la 'jug par bya/ /der ni sbyang byas dag gyur nas/ /bde zhing stobs ni skyed pa dang / /tshangs par spyod dang brtan par ldan/ /dad par ldan zhing dbang po thul/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims bde ba dang / /brtul zhugs chos la

mchog tu gzhol/ /lha ni rjes su dran par ldan/ /rigs pas gnyid log gnyid mi log /sman la dga' zhing tshig 'jam pas/ /bcud kyis len ni brtsam par bya/ /de nyid snum chos dugs byas nas/ /a ru ra dang skyu ru ra/ /rgyam tsha bca' sga pi pi ling / /shu dag yung ba byi dang ga /

bu ram chu dron sbyar ba ni/ /blud na legs par 'khru bar 'gyur/ /de nas lus ni dag 'gyur zhing / /thug sogs rim par spyad nas kyang / /zhag gsum mam ni zhag lnga'am/ /zhag bdun bar du zhun mar bcas/ /nas thug dag par gyur gyi bar/ /sbyin zhing bshang rnying dag par bya/ /

de ltar lto ni sbyangs byas nas/ /goms par shes pas gang zhig la/ /gang zhig 'tsham pa de kun brtags/ /bcud kyis len ni sbyin par bya/ /a ru ra stong de'i sum 'gyur/ /skyu ru ra dang bcas pa dang / /rtsa ba lnga bo lnga rnams ni/ /srang ni nyis brgya lnga bcu

dag /chu ni bcu 'gyur nang du bskol/ /khu ba bcu cha lus pa ru/ /a ru rnam rgyal skyu ru ra/ /brdungs la rus pa phyung nas ni/ /khu ba de yi nang du ni/ /shing tsha sug smel pi pi ling / /ga dur skyer pa a ru ra/ /tsan+dan ma du ka par Ni/ /shaM ka puSh+pa ka na ya/ /shu dag gla ba shing mngar

dang / /byi dang ga ni phul re'i tshad/ /khar dkar srang stong chig brgya/ /zhun mar bre ni bcu gnyis dang / /til mar bre ni brgyad bcas pa/ /lde gur gyur gyi bar du bskol/ /phab la bsgrangs par sbrang rtsi ni/ /srang ni sum brgya nyi shu gzhug /de nas gzar bus dkrugs nas ni/ /mar

gyi snod du gzhug par bya/ /gang zhig zas gcig la mi gnod/ /de ni 'di yi tshad du bshad/ /zhu ba'i tshe na drug cu pa/ /'o mar bcas pa'i kha zas sbyin/ /bcud kyis len 'di tshangs pas bshad/ /dge zhing dpal yon can yin zhing / /mkha' la gnas dang byis pa rtse/ /de bzhin

dka' thub pas bsten byas/ /lus snyom ngal dang skra dkar dang / /gnyer ma'i skyon ni spang 'gyur zhing / /yid gzhungs dran dang stobs ldan zhing / /tshe ring bar yang 'gyur ba yin/ /skyon med a ru ra dang skyu ru ra/ /stong dang pi pi ling ni stong dang bcas/ /rgya skyegs shing gzhon thal ba'i chu

sbyar ba/ /snod du bzhag ste legs par sbangs nas ni/ /slar phyung grib mar bskams te phye mar byas/ /kha ra dkar po bzhi cha mar dang ni/ /sbrang rtsi bzhi 'gyur bcas pa mar gyi ni/ /bum par bcug ste sa brkos par bzhag la/ /zla ba drug lon nas ni slar phyung ste/ /snga dro'i dus su me

drod ji bzhin bza'/ /rtag tu mthun pa'i zas ni bza' bar bya/ /de ltar ma lus zos na lo brgya 'tsho/ /nad med pa dang skra dkar gnyer ma med/ /lus kyi stobs 'phel rgyas par 'gyur ba dang / /mchog tu dran gsal yid ni gzhungs par 'gyur/ /skyon med rgya skyegs shing rlon pa/ /

thor to bcad la gzhog pa yi/ /sdong bu khru gnyis brkos pa'i nang / /skyu ru ra ni sar pas dgang / /rtsa ba'i bar du 'jag mas dkri/ /pad+ma skyes pa'i 'dam gyis bsku/ /de nas rlung med gnas su ni/ /lci ba sar pa gtsang mas btso/ /tshos shing skyu ru ra spangs nas/ /sbrang rtsi mar

bcas mi yis bza'/ /de rjes 'o ma mar bcas pa/ /ci 'dod par ni btung bar bya/ /de nyid kyis ni zla gcig bar/ /bsten zhing spang bar bya ba rnams/ /de ni 'bad de spang bar bya/ /chu ni grang mo lag pa yis/ /reg pa tsam yang mi bya'o/ /de ltar zhag ni bcu gcig 'das/ /skra

so sen mo lhags par 'gyur/ /de nas nyin zhag cung zad nas/ /gzugs bzang bud med la phod cing / /stobs ni glang po dang 'drar 'gyur/ /mchog tu yid gzhungs snying stobs dang / /blo ldan lo stong 'tsho bar 'gyur/ /rtsa ba bcu pa ba bla dang / /gla sgang thal tres dzi ba ka /ut+pal

dang par+Ni gnyis/ /karka ta sring pi pi ling / /med sug smel ta ma la/ /'tsho byed rgun 'brum a ka ru/ /ma nu zur ba ba spru ba/ /ram nye ba gnyis sle tres dang / /ka ka na sa a ru ra/ /ba sha ka'i rtsa bid ri/ /srang re gcig tu bsres nas ni/ /skyu ru ra'i 'bru lnga brgya ni/ /

chu bre bcu drug nang du bskol/ /de yi khu ba bzhi cha lus/ /skyu ru ra yi rus pa bsal/ /mar dang til mar srang bcu gnyis/ /nang du legs par brngos nas ni/ /ka ra dkar po srang lnga bcu/ /btags te lde gu'i tshul du bskol/ /snum phyed kyis ni sbrang rtsi gzhug /smig rkang

srang ni bzhi dag dang / /pi pi ling ni srang gnyis dang / /dri bzang bzhi ni srang gcig gzhug /de la tshad tsam bza' bya zhing / /khang par gnas shing 'phrod zas bsten/ /'di ni drang srong 'pho bas bstan/ /drang srong 'pho bas gang zos pa/ /rgas pas nyen par gyur pa yang / /bud med kyis

ni mig tu sdug /cho ga bzhin du bsten gyur na/ /lud pa dbugs mi bde rims dang / /skems dang snying nad dreg nad dang / /gcin dang khu chu la gnas dang / /skad 'gags pa yang sel bar byed/ /byis pa rgan dang glo 'gram gcong / /red pa'i nyams stobs 'phel bar byed/ /

yid gzhungs dran dang mdangs ldan dang / /nad med nyid dang tshe 'phel dang / /rlung ni bde bar rgyu byed cing / /bud med la phod stobs dang ni/ /dbang po gsal zhing me drod skyed/ /shing mngar smig rkang pi pi ling / /lce myang tsha dang bcas pa dang / /lcags ni sna re

gser dang ni/ /shu dag sbrang rtsi zhun mar ram/ /kha ra dkar po 'bras bu gsum/ /lo gcig bsten na bcud len 'gyur/ /nad kun 'joms shing dran pa dang / /yid gzhungs blo ni skyed par byed/ /ma du ka par+Ni yi khu ba 'am/ /shing mngar phye ma 'o mar bcas pa ni/ /lhan cig

sbyar ba me drod ji bzhin sbyin/ /sle tres shang ka puSh+pa'i me tog bcas/ /lde gur sbyar ba me drod ji bzhin du/ /bsten na tshe ni sbyin par byed pa dang / /nad 'jig stobs skyed mdog ni gsal byed cing / /me drod skang gsal yid gzhungs skyed par byed/ /bcud kyis len gyi sbyor ba 'di dag

las/ /shang+ka puSh+pa'i sbyor 'di yid gzhungs mchog /spangs ma pu tse shel dang pa ya s+ya/ /shing mngar thal tres tsan+dan 'bras bu gsum/ /shu dag tsha ba gsum dang ser po gnyis/ /pa to la'i rtsa rgyam tsha zhib tu btags/ /mar dang 'o ma bre ni bcu drug dang / /shang+ka puSh+pa'i

khu ba sum 'gyur bskol/ /blud na glen pa'ang tshig la dbang 'gyur zhing / /thos 'dzin spobs pa che zhing nad med 'gyur/ /pad+ma'i rtsa ba sdong bu dang / /ge sar nang gi sa bon rnams/ /gser bcas mar dang 'o ma ni/ /bre ni bcu drug nang du bskol/ /pad+ma lnga yi thig le zhes/ /sa

steng dag tu grags pa yin/ /tshul bzhin bsten na skyes bu ni/ /nyams stobs zad pa 'phel bar byed/ /gang zhig ut+pal sdong bu lo/ /rtsa ba ge sar ldan bskol ba/ /ut+pal bzhi par grags pa yin/ /gser dang bcas pa'i bcud len gyi/ /sbyor ba bsten na ba lang yang / /

yid gzhungs 'gyur na mir ci smos/ /bram+hi shu dag shang ka puSh+pa dang / /rgyam tsha mang tsha k+Sha ra bi sha la/ /bram+hi so bar tsal pi pi ling / /re re nas ni gsum gsum tsam tshad dang / /gser ni nas gnyis dug ni til 'bru tsam/ /zhun mar srang gcig 'di dag zhib tu sbyar/ /

legs par btang ste zhu bar gyur nas ni/ /mar bcas kha zas lo gcig bar du bsten/ /dran dang yid gzhungs blo ni 'phel 'gyur zhing / /nad dang rgas pa dag las 'das pa dang / /snyom dang ngal dub sel byed lo brgyar 'tsho/ /dpal dang gzi brjid mdangs dang ldan par

'gyur/ /khyad par du ni mdze nad sha bkra skran/ /dug dang dbyig dug rims dang smyo byed dang / /srid srung rig byed sngags byas gshed byed dang / /rlung nad stobs chen 'dis ni zhi bar byed/ /na ga ba la ston gyi tshe/ /skar ma rgyal la bab par btu/ /de yi rtsa ba zho gnyis

tsam/ /phyer btags 'o ma sbyar te btung / /yang na mar dang sbrang rtsir sbyar/ /bldag cing zas med 'o mas 'tsho/ /de ltar lo gcig zos gyur na/ /lo brgyar 'tsho zhing stobs ldan 'gyur/ /gze ma 'bras bu skyes pa rtsa bar bcas/ /grib mar bskams te zhib tu btags

nas ni/ /rang gi khu bar sbangs pa de las ni/ /che tshad khyor gang tsam du byas gyur gang / /de dang 'o mar sbyar nas bza' bya zhing / /zhu nas 'o ma srang ni nyis brgya zos/ /gzugs bzang skal ldan lo brgya thub pa dang / /'dod spyod khyu mchog pa lang tshogs gnas 'dra/

bar hi yi sdong bu rlon pa ni/ /'o mar sbyar bzos shing 'o ma btung / /zla gcig bar du kha zas 'o mas 'tsho/ /rgas pa'i tshogs las nges par rgyal bar 'gyur/ /yang na de yi sdong bu'i phye zhib mo/ /rang gi khu ba dang ni legs sbyar ba/ /mar dang sbrang rtsir sbyar ba'i lde gu bza'/ /

yang na de bskol mar ni btung bar bya/ /de bzhin a ti ba la bid ri/ /shing mngar dang ni mon sne'u dme ru dang / /dzi ban ti dang ra sna a ru ra/ /sa la par+Ni sle tres skyu ru ra/ /shang ka puSh+pa man du ka par+Ni/ /a shra gan+d+ha dang ni nye'u shing rnams/ /sbyar ba btang na yid

gzhungs blo dang ni/ /rgas sra na tshod brtan zhing stobs skyed byed/ /tsi tra ka yi me tog ni/ /ser po dkar nag las shes bya/ /cho ga bzhin du bcud len sbyar/ /go rims bzhin du yon tan che/ /de yi rtsa ba grib mar skam/ /phye mar btags pa sbrang rtsi mar/ /'o ma

chu dang zla gcig bar/ /brtul zhugs can gyis bsten byas la/ /phan pa'i zas ni za byed na/ /lo brgyar 'tsho zhing nad med la/ /yid gzhungs stobs dang mdangs ldan zhing / /lus rgyas me drod 'bar bar 'gyur/ /til mar lde gu zla gcig

bar/ /bsten na rlung nad gso dka' 'joms/ /gcin sbyar sha bkra mdze nad 'joms/ /dar bar sbyar bas gzhang 'brum sel/ /go bye legs par smin pa ni/ /'bras kyi phung po'i nang du gzhug /sos ka'i tshe btus dgun tshe phyung / /mngar zhing snum dang bsil ba yi/ /

sman sbyar de yi rdog ma brgyad/ /brgyad 'gyur chur ni bskol nas ni/ /khu ba de yi brgyad cha lus/ /'o ma dang sbyar grang mo btung / /de rjes nyi ma re re zhing / /go bye rdog ma re res bskyed/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig bar du ni/ /gsum gsum gyis bskyed de phan chad/ /bzhi bcu'i

bar bskyed de 'og tu/ /bskyed pa bzhin du dbri bar bya/ /bdun phrag bdun gyi bar du ni/ /stong gi bar du gtang bar bya/ /bdag nyid bsdams shing 'o ma mar/ /sA lu drug cu'i 'bras chan bza'/ /de bzhin dus ni sum 'gyur bya/ /sbyor ba'i mtha' yang spyad par bya/ /sngon

gyi legs smon 'thob 'gyur zhing / /khyad par du ni me drod skyed/ /gcin snyi srin bu gzhang 'brum mdze/ /tshil las gyur pa'i gzhang 'brum 'joms/ /go bye'i 'bras bu skyon med pa/ /brdungs shing zhib tu btags pa ni/ /bum par bcug steng sa nag bskus/ /sa brkos

pa yi nang du gzhug /kun nas ba yi lci bas bskor/ /de sbyar me la btsos nas ni/ /de las 'dzag pa'i khu ba gang / /blangs pa nyin zhag gzhan la ni/ /de yi brgyad 'gyur sbrang rtsi dang / /nyis 'gyur mar dang sbyar ba ni/ /cho ga snga ma bzhin bsdams te/ /bsten na yon tan

de nyid thob/ /go bye'i 'bras bu smin te lhung gyur pa/ /bre bzhi'i tshad tsam dang ni so phag dang / /bdar ba'i phye ma dag dang chu dang mnye/ /bkrus te rlung la legs par bskams nas ni/ /brdungs te chu bre bcu drug nang du bskol/ /bzhi cha lus pa btsags te bsgrangs pa yi/ /khu ba

de dang 'o ma bre bcu drug /bskol te bzhi cha lus par gyur pa dang / /de dang mnyam pa'i zhun mar bcas par bskol/ /de'i nang kha ra'i phye ma ci ran gzhug /de ni gzar bus dkrugs pas gcig tu gyur/ /'bras kyi phung por zhag bdun legs par sba/ /bdud rtsi 'dra ba de bsten skyes

bu gang / /chu 'am 'o ma sha khu 'thungs gyur na/ /dran dang yid gzhungs blo gros stobs dang ldan/ /snying stobs dang ldan gser gyi mdog dang 'dra/ /tshe ring ba yang des ni thob par 'gyur/ /chu bre bcu drug nang du go bye ni/ /sum brgya bskol te bzhi cha lus pa ru/ /til mar bre bzhi

der ni bcug nas kyang / /tig ta bong nga gnyis dang 'bras bu gsum/ /brag zhun skyer shun da lis phye ma gdab/ /bskol na mdze nad ma lus 'joms par byed/ /go bye skyu ru ra 'am tsha 'am ni/ /zho yi spris ma til mar 'o ma 'am/ /bu ram 'o thug mar ram sbrang rtsi'am/ /

nas zan ngag gam til btags lde gur byas/ /sran tshod dag dang lhan cig sbyar ba ni/ /lus rgyas yid gzhungs tshe ring byed mchog yin/ /go bye'i 'bras bu rnon po ni/ /smin pa me dang 'drar gyur pa/ /cho ga bzhin du sbyar ba ni/ /bdud rtsi dang ni 'dra bar 'gyur/ /bse

shing 'bras bu ma bcos pa'i/ /bad kan nad dang nad rnying ni/ /'brel pa gang yin de med cing / /me yi drod kyang myur du skyed/ /rlung dang tsha bar 'dug pa ni/ /khyad par du ni spang bya zhing / /rgya sran zho dang tsha dang ni/ /til mar bsku dang me bsten spangs/ /du ba ri yi shing zhes

bya/ /nub phyogs rgya mtsho'i ngos nas skye/ /chu rlabs g.yo bas bskyod pa dang / /rlung gis lo ma g.yengs pa yin/ /de yi 'bras bu dbyar gyi tshe/ /legs par smin pa btu bar bya/ /'bras bu de las rkang phyung nas/ /bskams te phye mar btags nas ni/ /til

bzhin btsir bar bya ba'am/ /le brgan me tog bzhin du bskol/ /de yi mar bsags gyur pa ni/ /chung zad pa yi bar du bskol/ /phab ste ba yi lci ba yi/ /nang du zla phyed tsam du gzhug /de 'og de las phyung nas ni/ /snum zhing dugs byas dri ma bsal/ /zas

kyi dus ni bzhis chod par/ /nang par zho gnyis tsam zhig btung / /mar de nyi ma shis pa la/ /sngags 'di yis ni dag par bya/ /rkang pa gnyis po brtson pa che/ /lus zungs thams cad skyong byed par/ /'khor lo dbyig pa dung thogs la/ /mi 'pho bas ni

khyod la bsgo/ /de gang 'di yi nad steng dang / /'og gi nad ni du ma sel/ /dgongs ka snum dang lan tshwar bcas/ /nas thug grang mo btung bar bya/ /mar de zhag lnga'i bar du btung / /spang bar bya ba thams cad spang / /zla phyed mud ga'i khu ba btung / /mdze nad kun las

thar bar 'gyur/ /de nyid seng ldeng khu ba ni/ /sum 'gyur dang ni legs par bskol/ /snga ma bzhin du zla phyed gzhag /legs par bsdams te zla gcig btung / /de yis lus ni bsku ba dang / /ji skad bshad pa'i zas zos pa'i/ /sbyor ba 'di yis myur du ni/ /mdze can mi ni

gso bar bya/ /de nyid seng ldeng med par ni/ /zhun mar sbrang rtsi ldan par btung / /zla phyed bar du sha khu btung / /lo ni nyis brgyar 'tsho bar 'gyur/ /de nyid zhag ni lnga bcu'i bar/ /sna sman du ni btang gyur na/ /lus rgyas thos pa 'dzin pa dang / /lo ni sum brgyar 'tsho bar 'gyur/ /

pi pi ling ni pa la sha'i/ /thal chur sbangs shing mar dang brngos/ /rdog ma gsum gsum snga dro dang / /zas kyi sngon du bza' bar bya/ /bcud len yon tan 'dod pa yis/ /sbrang rtsi dang ni sbyar te bza'/ /pi pi ling bcu nyin re zhing / /rim gyis bskyed par gyur pa dag /de bzhin

'o mar sbyar te bza'/ /de bzhin du ni dbri bar bya/ /sman zhu nas ni drug cu pa'i/ /'bras chan 'o ma mar bcas bza'/ /pi pi ling ni stong gi bar/ /btang na 'di ni bcud len 'gyur/ /stobs dang ldan la de btags sbyin/ /stobs dbri ba la bskol te blud/ /de bzhin ra yi 'o

ma dang / /nyis stong gi ni bar du gtang / /pi pi ling gi sbyor ba 'dis/ /lud pa dbugs mi bde mgul nad/ /gcong chen gzhang 'brum pho ba'i nad/ /gcin snyi skya rbab mi bzad rims/ /'or nad slon dang skyigs bu dang / /mdzer pa dreg nad 'joms par byed/ /

pi pi ling ni srang phyed lde gur byas/ /lcags kyi snod bskus nas ni nub gcig bzhag /de dang chu ni snyim gang nang par btung / /lo gcig bza' btung spyod pa ci 'dod bsten/ /bca' sga sle tres shing mngar byi dang ka /ba la a ti ba la 'bras bu gsum/ /gla sgang thang shing

yung ba a ka ru/ /mu zi pad+ma ut+pal kru trug tres/ /da ta a shwa kar Na a sa na/ /ba la'i lo ma'am snying po de bzhin du/ /pi pi ling bzhin lcags snod bsku sogs bya/ /lo brgya 'tsho zhing rgas dang na las thar/ /'o ma snyim gang gi ni bcud len sman/ /sbyar ba 'di

yis lcags snod bskus pas ni/ /sngar bshad yon tan bas kyang lhag bskyed cing / /tshe yang de las nyis 'gyur skyed par byed/ /a sa na dang seng ldeng gi/ /khu bar so ma ra dza sbangs/ /sbrang rtsi ru rta mar dang ni/ /a ru ra dang lcags phyer bcas/ /lde gu lo gcig bar

zos na/ /rgas dang mi 'phrod zos pa las/ /nad ni yongs su 'dor bar byed/ /mdze nad mi bzad pa yis ni/ /lus ni nyen gyur gang yin pas/ /so ma ra dza til nag gnyis/ /lo gcig bar du bsten na ni/ /de ni zla rgyas lta bur 'gyur/ /gang gi so ma ra dza sbun pa

med/ /btags pa 'o ma lhan cig zhor mnan pa'i/ /snying po phyung la sbrang rtsi'i lde gu bldag /de rjes de nyid kyi ni dar ba btung / /mdze yi nad kyis yan lag nyams pa dang / /sna chad sor mo brul ba la sogs pa/ /shing bcad rjes la ljon shing skye ba ltar/ /de ni nges par

skye bar 'gyur ba yin/ /sgra gcan bdud rtsi brkus pa na/ /rke bcad pa las 'dzag gyur pa'i/ /bdud rtsi'i thigs pa sar lhung ba/ /sgog skya nyid du gyur pa yin/ /lha min lus las byung bas na/ /de phyir bram zes de mi bza'/ /mngon du bdud rtsi las byung bas/ /

de ni bcud kyis len mchog yin/ /grang ba'i dus na'ang sgog skya bsten/ /dpyid dus bad kan shas cher bza'/ /sos ka'i dus su'ang spyad bya zhing / /dbyar ni rlung gis gzir tshe bza'/ /dgun ni snum zhing bsil ba dang / /mngar bas nye bar bsres pa dang / /

de ni phreng ba rgyan dag dang / /'khor dang lhan cig bsten par bya/ /de yi lde gu dpyid kyi tshe/ /kha ba can gyi yul skyes pa/ /shun pa bshus nas mtshan mo ni/ /chang sogs la ni spang bar bya/ /de yi khu ba nang par ni/ /ras ni gtsang mas btsags

nas kyang / /chang ni legs par langs gyur pa/ /cha gsum dang ni sbyar ba'am/ /chang gzhan dag gam til mar ram/ /rang skyur ram ni zho ga chu/ /de tshe nyid sbyar nad par ni/ /tshad dang ldan par sbyin bya zhing / /'o ma zhun mar zhag dang rkang / /skam sa'i sha khu

so sor ni/ /bskol ba nad gzhi ji bzhin blud/ /yang na sman khu 'ba' zhig blud/ /dang por mkhur gang tsam 'thungs na/ /mid pa'i sbubs ni dag par byed/ /rgyun tu blugs pa'i dugs byas na/ /na zhing zug pa dag la phan/ /skyug cing brgyal ba'i nad la ni/ /'phral

du chu grang dag kyang blud/ /ngal ba med cing lus kyi ni/ /gzi mdangs brtan pas lhag ma sbyin/ /tsha ba bsal bar bya ba'i phyir/ /shin tu bsil bas bsku bya zhing / /mu tig ga bur phreng ba can/ /chu thigs phre'u bsten par bya/ /'di yi tshad chen phul gang ste/ /nyi

tshe la ni de yi phyed/ /sgog skya srang gcig btags pa ni/ /zas dang bcas pa'ang bsten par bya/ /zhu nas sA lu rnying pa'i chan/ /dung dang kun+da ltar dkar ba/ /yu sha 'o ma skam sa yi/ /sha khu dang ni lhan cig bza'/ /skams par gyur na chang dang ni/ /chur sbyar ba ni

blud par bya/ /chang mi btung na rang skyur ram/ /rgun 'brum chu ni blud par bya/ /de yi lde gu mar dang bcas/ /mar ni snod du gzar bus dkrugs/ /zhag bcu gzhag gam de bzhin du/ /zhag dang mnyam sbyar spyad par bya/ /sgog skya shun pa bshus pa'i snying po ni/ /bsregs

sha dag gam bza' ba sna tshogs sam/ /sha btubs pa'am mar dang tshar bcas bza'/ /kha zas nyung ba ci 'dod spyad par bya/ /khrag dang mkhris pa'i nad ni ma gtogs pa/ /nad gzhi ma lus ldan par 'gyur ba'am/ /rlung nad nyi tshe dang ni ldan gyur la/ /sgog pa las lhag

gzhan sman yod ma yin/ /chu dang bu ram 'o ma sred/ /sha chang skyur la mi dga' zhing / /ma zhu ba ni spong mi nus/ /sgog skya nges par gnod pa skyed/ /mkhris pa ldang ba'i 'jigs pa yi/ /tha mar bkru sman 'jam po gtang / /de ltar bcud len yon tan ni/ /yongs

su rdzogs pa 'thob par 'gyur/ /sos ka'i tsha bas gdungs drags las/ /rgya skyegs khu ba ltar 'dzag gang / /gser sogs 'byung khungs drug gi bcud/ /de ni brag zhun zhes byar bshad/ /de ni kun kyang kha zhing tsha/ /shas cher me drod zhu rjes tsha/ /gcod par byed de de

las ni/ /lcags las byung ba rab tu bsngags/ /ba gcin dri bro gnag pa dang / /gu gul 'dra zhing gseg ma med/ /spyi bag snum zhing skyur ba dang / /bska zhing 'jam la lci ba yi/ /brag zhun de ni mchog yin no/ /nad dang nad pa rjes mthun par/ /sman dang brag zhun

cha mnyam byas/ /lcags kyi snod du sbyar bar bya/ /dang por chu ni nyi tshes bkru/ /de 'og bskams la bskol dang bsre/ /brag zhun sman dang mnyam byas la/ /brgyad cha'i nang du bskol bar bya/ /khu ba brgyad cha lus btsags pa/ /dro 'jam nang du brag zhun gzhug /de dang 'dres

gyur bskams nas ni/ /sman chu'i nang du slar yang gzhug /de ltar rang rang sman 'phrod ni/ /bskol ba'i khu bar lan bdun sbangs/ /de nas tig ta'i sman mar gyis/ /snum chos byas nas sbyar byas te/ /'bras bu gsum gyi khu ba dang / /shing mngar pa to la'i khu ba/ /brag

zhun dag ni re re yang / /zhag gsum bar du blud par bya/ /de nas de la sbyor ba ni/ /dus dang sbyar te blud par bya/ /de ltar brag zhun mi rnams la/ /shin tu phan par byed pa yin/ /yon tan ma lus skyed byed cing / /'phral du gnod par mi byed do/ /zhag bdun phrag gcig

phrag gsum dang / /phrag bdun zho gnyis srang phyed gcig /dman dang bar ma chen po yi/ /brag zhun go rims bzhin du sbyar/ /lus ni shin tu sbyangs byas la/ /brag zhun sbyang ba gtang bar bya/ /zangs dang lcags dang dngul dang gser/ /kun dang yang na re rer sbyar/ /'o ma dang ni

ni lhan cig gtang / /bcud len 'bras bu myur du 'grub/ /rgya sran mon sne'u dme ru dang / /phug ron sha ni rtag tu spang / /gang zhig brag zhun gyis ni mngon sum du/ /ma bsal nad ni sa steng yod ma yin/ /dus su cho ga bzhin du bsten gyur na/ /nad med

nyams stobs rgya chen skyed par byed/ /khang par gnas pa'i khom ldan can/ /phun sum tshogs dang ldan la phan/ /de las gzhan du de rnams la/ /nyi ma rlung gi tshe na bsten/ /rlung dang nyi tshan bcas sbyor ba/ /bde ba'i longs spyod med na yang / /gang zhig lus la mi gnod pa/ /

mchog tu de ni bshad par bya/ /chu grang 'o ma sbrang rtsi dang / /mar ni re re gnyis gnyis dang / /gsum mam yang na thams cad ni/ /zas sngar 'thungs na rgas sra byed/ /bu ram sbrang rtsi bca' sga dang / /pi pi ling ngam rgyam tsha dang / /a ru ra ni gnyis gnyis dag /rtag

zos bde zhing lo brgyar 'tsho/ /a ru ra ni mar nang bsres/ /bza' zhing mar de 'thungs na ni/ /rgas sra lus ni yun ring gnas/ /stobs ni 'phel bar byed 'gyur te/ /ji ltar dam pa byas gzo ba/ /lan cig phan 'dogs ji lta bzhin/ /skyu ru ra khu sbrang rtsi dang / /kha ra mar

dang lde gu byas/ /bsten zhing 'phrod pa za ba'i mi/ /rgas pa'i gnod pa 'jig 'gyur te/ /nyis bsrung bstan bcos rgya chen mtshungs/ /skyu ru ra dang byi dang ka /a sa na yi snying po'i phye/ /lcags phye til mar sbrang rtsi yi/ /mar bcas lde gu bsten na ni/ /na tshod mdzes pa ma nyams

'gyur/ /lcags phye byi dang ka yi phye ma dang / /mar dang sbrang rtsi bsres la lo gcig tsam/ /a sa na yi za ma tog nang gzhug /bsten na stobs ldan tshe ring skra gnag 'gyur/ /byi dang ga dang go bye bca' sga rnams/ /mar dang sbrang rtsir bcas pa gang gis zos/ /rgas pa'i chu bo nad

kyi rba rlabs can/ /na tshod ldan pa'i skyes bu de brgal 'gyur/ /seng ldeng a sa na yi khu ba dang / /'bras bu gsum dang sbrang rtsi mar sbyar ba/ /cho ga bzhin du bsten pa'i mi rnams ni/ /tshe ring 'gyur ba 'di las ngo mtshar med/ /dzi ba ka yi khu ba sor mor chags/ /kha ra sbrang

rtsi mar dang 'bras bu gsum/ /skyes bu dam pas bsten par gyur na ni/ /rgas dang nad ni nges par bzlog par 'gyur/ /ba spru ba ni sar ba srang phyed dang / /'o mar btags pa zla phyed zla ba gnyis/ /zla drug lo gcig bar du 'thungs na ni/ /rgas shing rnying pa'ang slar ni gzhon par

'gyur/ /mur ba ang shu ma ti bri ha ti/ /ba la pu shel tse dang pa ta dang / /a sa na dang thal tres a ka ru/ /pri yang ku dang tsan+dan re re yis/ /cho ga'ang ba spru ba dang mtshungs pa yin/ /nye'u shing lde gu khu bar bskol ba dang / /zhun mar kha rar bcas pa za byed pa/ /de ni 'tsho ba'i

lam du zhugs gyur tshe/ /nad kyi rkun pos choms par mi 'gyur ro/ /a shwa gan+d+ha 'o mar bcas pa ni/ /mar ram til mar chu dron sbyar ba dang / /zla phyed bsten na nyam chung lus rgyas shing / /ji ltar lo tog gzhon la char bab mtshungs/ /nyin re til nag srang ni re re dag /zos pa'i

rjes la chu grang 'thungs gyur na/ /lus ni shas cher rgyas pa nyid 'gyur zhing / /'chi ba'i bar du so ni brtan par 'gyur/ /gze ma sle tres skyu ru ra'i phye ma/ /mar dang sbrang rtsi cha mnyam lde gu zos/ /ro tsa lus brtan nad kyi sdug bsngal zhi/ /lo brgya 'tsho zhing skra ni nag por 'gyur/ /til

nag a ru ra dang skyu ru ra/ /ba ru ra dang bcas pa brdungs nas bsten/ /mi de rma bya bzhin du mdangs ldan zhing / /yid du 'ong ba'i bde ba thob par 'gyur/ /brag zhun mar dang sbrang rtsi byi dang ga /a ru ra dang lcags phye dngul chu dang / /ta bya bsten na lus zungs rdzogs 'gyur te/ /yar

ngo zla phyed rdzogs pa'i zla ba 'dra/ /gang zhig bring ga ra dza'i khu ba zla ba gcig /nyin re rgyun du bsten par byed pa dang / /'o ma 'thungs te stobs dang brtson 'grus ldan/ /lo brgyar 'tsho ba dag kyang thob par 'gyur/ /shu dag kyang ni zla ba gcig bsten zhing / /'o ma'am mar ram til

mar bcas pa bsten/ /gdon gyis mi tshugs pa yi lus 'gyur zhing / /yid gzhungs tshig ni shin tu gsal bar 'gyur/ /ma du ka pa r+Ni yi mar dang brngos/ /zla gcig bar du zas ma zos par bsten/ /gzugs ni rgya cher 'tsho zhing spobs pa che/ /gzhon zhing mdangs ldan yon

tan ldan par 'gyur/ /'bras bu gsum dang tsang gi ri dang ni/ /lcags phye srang ni lnga bcu las byas shing / /ko sha da ka'i khu ba'i nang du btags/ /ri lu sum brgya byas nas ri lu de/ /grib mar bskams te rim gyis ma lus par/ /bkru sman bya zhing

thug sla'i rim pa dang / /thug ska gar po sha khu 'bras chan dang / /mar la bsten zhing zla gcig lus bsdams la/ /zla gcig 'das nas rang dga' nyid du spyad/ /'bad pas dus kun tu ni ma zhu spang / /lo gcig bar du sbyor ba 'di bsten na/ /gang zhig gso dka'i nad kyis nyen pa'ang / /

shin tu stobs che skyes bu'i bya ba rdzogs/ /lus rgyas 'jam zhing mig dang rna ba gsal/ /gzhon pa nyid dang lo ni lnga brgyar 'tsho/ /seng ldeng shir sha ba dang a sa na/ /rma bya a ru ra dang skyu ru ra/ /go bye byi dang ga btags chu 'gyur ni/ /bco brgyad nang bskol lcags kyi dum bu gzhug /

lcags kyi snod du zhag gsum nyi ma yi/ /'od kyis bsros la de rjes me la ni/ /lcags kyi phye ma zhing par byas te bskol/ /de btsags khu ba cha gcig 'o ma ni/ /cha gcig de bzhin gso ma'i khu ba gcig /nye'u shing bskol ba'i khu ba cha gsum dang / /'dir ni mar sar cha ni bzhi

dang sbyar/ /'di dag gcig tu lcags nag snod du bskol/ /khar rdul med de bzhin sbrang rtsi dang / /de bzhin mar dang bsres par gyur pa dang / /'phrod pa'i zas dang skom dang spyod lam bcas/ /srang re rtag tu bsten par gyur na ni/ /dpal dang ldan zhing nyes pa bsal ba dang / /

nags kyi ma he lta bu'i stobs ldan zhing / /rta ltar na mgyogs la lus ni brtan pa dang / /skra ni bung ba'i mdog ltar gnag pa dang / /kha ni dri zhim bud med mang bsten nus/ /tshig gsal yid gzhungs phun sum tshogs pa dang / /zla gcig bsten na me drod che ba yin/ /de ni mi

yi seng ge'am me'am ni/ /btso ma gser gyi mdog 'dra'i lus 'dzin 'gyur/ /mi yi seng ge'i sbyor ba 'di/ /zos na nad kyis mi nyen te/ /'khor lo 'bar ba'i lag pa yis/ /lha min tshogs ni 'jigs dang 'dra/ /bring ga ra dza'i myu gu'i cho ga 'dis/ /brdos shing mar

bcas zos la bsdams dang bcas/ /lto sbyangs pa la a sa na'i khu ba/ /'o ma 'thungs shing zas kyi bya ba byed/ /zla gcig bar du bsten par gyur na ni/ /bde zhing lo ni nyis brgya'i bar du 'tsho/ /lan cig smras pa'i tshig kyang zin gyur zhing / /dran dang dbang po nyams pa med

par 'gyur/ /gang zhig sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /til mar bsten par byed pa dag /de yis yon tan de thob cing / /lus ni nag po nyid du 'gyur/ /bcud kyis len ni dus dang rjes mthun zhing / /bsten nus 'bras bur bcas pa bshad pa yin/ /gzhan dag phan yon bcas

pa yod mod kyis/ /rnyed par dka' bas bdag gis ma bshad do/ /bcud kyis len gyi cho ga las/ /nyams pas gal te nad skye na/ /bcud kyis len de spangs nas ni/ /de yi sman ni ji bzhin bya/ /bden par smra zhing khro ba med/ /dbang po bsdams shing bdag nyid thul/ /

zhi zhing dam pa'i spyod la dga'/ /rtag tu bcud len yin zhes bya/ /yon tan 'di dag ldan gyur pas/ /gang zhig bcud len bsten gyur pa/ /de ni dga' zhing tshe ring la/ /'jig rten 'di dang gzhan du bde/ /spyod pa bstan bcos rjes 'jug cing / /gam na gnas

pa'i sems dang mthun/ /don la blo ni ma 'khrugs pa/ /bcud kyis len ni rdzogs pa yin/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u sum cu rtsa dgu pa'o// //yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/ /rgas pa gso ba'i yan lag

rdzogs so// //de nas ro tsa gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /skyes bus rtag tu yul bsten pas/ /ro tsa bar ni 'dod bya ste/ /dga' dang brta dang bu rgyud ni/ /yon tan ldan pas de la gnas/ /bu tsha'i rgyud ni skyed byed cing / /'phral du yang dag dka' byed

gang / /gang gis rta ltar rab stobs ldan/ /bud med la ni thogs med 'gro/ /bud med la rab chags 'gyur ba/ /gang dang gang gis 'phel 'gyur ba/ /de ni ro tsa byed pa ste/ /lus kyi stobs kyang skyed pa'i mchog /chos dang grags dang tshe ring dang / /'jig rten gnyis ka'i

bcud len 'gyur/ /gcig tu skyon ni med pa yi/ /tshangs par spyo la bdag yi rang / /snying stobs chung ba nyon mongs pas/ /gnod par gyur pa'i nad bu can/ /lus mi zad pa bsrung ba'i phyir/ /ro tsa'i cho ga brjod pa yin/ /nad med lang tsho ldan pa

dag /ro tsa ba ni sten byed pa/ /dus tshigs kun la nyin re zhing / /nyal po bya ba dgag pa med/ /de nas snum gyur sbyang byas pa/ /ni ru ha dang 'jam rtsir bcas/ /mar dang til mar sbrang rtsi dang / /sha khu 'o ma kha rar bcas/ /'o ma sha dang sha khu bza'/ /sbyor ba shes pas

dang por gtad/ /de nas ro tsa byed sbyor ba/ /khu ba bu tsha 'phel byed bya/ /me tog dri mnam grib ma med/ /'bras bu med par gyur pa'i shing / /yal ga gcig pa'i shing gcig bzhin/ /bud med med mi de dang 'dra/ /gom 'gros 'khyor zhing tshig mi gsal/ /

rdul gyis g.yogs pa ltar snang zhing / /bzhin ras snabs kyis gos pa yang / /snying ni dga' bar byed pa yin/ /reg pa dang ni mthong stsogs la/ /bu mnyam bde ba yod min na/ /gang zhig chos dang grags par ldan/ /nga rgyal rigs 'phel smos ci dgos/ /lus sbyang byas te ci nus par/ /

ro tsa'i sbyor ba brtsam par bya/ /'dam bu gung shing 'jag ma sogs/ /pu shel tse dang bi da ri/ /kaN+Da ka ri'i rtsa ba dang / /ba la 'tsho byed zangs rtsib/ /ram nye ba gnyis med gnyis/ /nye'u shing par+Na rnam gnyis dang / /a shwa gan+d+ha kha sral phre'u/ /a ti ba la ba spru ba/ /bi

da ri ti ba ya s+ye/ /ra sna gze ma dzi ban ti/ /shing mngar sa la par+Ni rnams/ /re re'ang srang ni gsum gsum cha/ /mon sran gre'u bre bzhi dang / /chu bre sum cu gnyis nang bskol/ /khu ba bre bzhi lus pa ru/ /mar bre bzhi dang bid ri/ /skyu ru ra dang bu ram shing / /bre ni bzhi bzhi gzhug

par bya/ /'o ma mar gyi bzhi 'gyur dang / /bir kha sral ram nye gnyis/ /shing mngar phal gu pi pi ling / /rgun 'brum 'bra go bi da ri/ /ma du ka dang nye'u shing pa/ /'di dag btags te bcug nas ni/ /de bskol btsags pa'i nang du ni/ /ka ra dkar po smig rkang ni/ /sman ni bre re gzhug pa

dang / /pi pi ling ni srang bzhi dang / /na le sham ni srang gcig dang / /shing tsha sug smel ge sar rnams/ /re re srad ni phyed phyed phye/ /sbrang rtsi srad ni bcu drug sbyar/ /de las nyin re srang re bza'/ /'o ma dang ni sha khu btung / /des ni rta ltar spyod gyur cing / /mchil pa lta bur 'dod

pa spyod/ /bid ri dang pi pi ling / /sha li 'bras rtsa pi ya li/ /kha sral phye ma phul re dang / /de bzhin sbrang rtsi srang brgyad dang / /kha ra'i phye ma srang lnga bcu/ /mar sar srang ni bcu drug sbyar/ /de las zho ni gnyis gnyis bza'/ /bud med brgya la spyod par nus/ /khra sral phre'u zho

'am ni/ /ma sha 'o mar bskol te bsgrangs/ /mar dang sbrang rtsir bcas pa dag /zos la ba sar 'o ma btung / /mtshan mo thog thag gnyid ma log /dub pa med par nyal po spyod/ /ra thug rlig pa 'o mar btsos/ /til dang lan mang bsres pa dang / /kha rar bcas zos gang yin de/ /bud med

brgya la'ang gsar snyam sems/ /bid ri yi phye ma ni/ /rang gi khu bar lan mang sbangs/ /zhun mar sbrang rtsi bcas bldags na/ /bud med bcu la spyod par nus/ /pi ling skyu ru ra yi phye/ /rang gi khu bar legs par sbangs/ /sha kha mar dang sbrang rtsir bcas/ /zos rjes 'o ma 'thungs pa gang / /mi de

brgyad cu lon na yang / /lang tshor gnas shing 'dod spyod nus/ /shing mdar phye ma zho gnyis dang / /mar dang sbrang rtsi de mnyam pa/ /zos rjes 'o ma 'thungs gyur na/ /mi de rtag tu 'dod spyod nus/ /kar ka ta yi sring gi phye/ /'o mar sbyar te 'thungs pa dang / /kha ra 'o ma mar bcas pa'i/ /zas zos bud med

la phod 'gyur/ /pa ya s+ya dang 'o ma bskol/ /mar dang sbrang rtsi bcas za zhing / /ba ni yar ma'i 'o ma 'thung / /de yi sa bon zad mi shes/ /kha sral phre'u bu ram gyi/ /sa bon phye ma kha rar bcas/ /'o ma bzhos ma thag btung na/ /lug bong lta bur spyod par 'gyur/ /u tsa da yi phye ma

dang / /nye'u shing sbyar ba'ang de bzhin no/ /zho spris zla ba ltar dkar ba'i/ /tshags kyis btsags pa zos nas ni/ /kha ra drug cu'i 'bras chan zos/ /rgan po'ang gzhon nu bzhin du spyod/ /gze ma ma sha a ru ra/ /kha sral sa bon nye'u shing pa/ /'o ma bcas 'thung rgas pa yang / /bud med

brgya la spyod par nus/ /gang yang snum zhing mngar ba dang / /stobs 'phel nyams ni brtas byed dang / /yid ni dga' bar byed pa gang / /de dag thams cad ro tsar bshad/ /de bas rdzas ni 'di lta bus/ /brtas byas bud med la 'jug bya/ /rang gi shugs kyis spyod pa dang / /

bud med yon tan gyis dga' spyad/ /chos kyi dpag bsam shing myu gu/ /dbang po'i bde ba kun bsten bya/ /yul ni yid du 'ong ba lnga/ /'dod pa'i lha yi mda' yin no/ /yid 'ong yul ni re res kyang / /tshim zhing dga' byed mchog yin no/ /bud med lus la 'dus nas gang / /gnas pa de ni smos ci

dgos/ /gang gi ming thos na yang snying dga' zhing / /mthong na ngoms par 'gyur ba med pa dang / /dbang po kun 'dren lcags kyur 'gyur ba yin/ /bud med khyo yi rjes 'jug 'phyon ma min/ /sgyu rtsal 'jo sgeg na tshod lus kyis brgyan/ /dga' ba'i phyir ni ngo tsha dben par spyod/ /tshig snyan smra zhing

mtshungs par mngon dga' bcas/ /bud med de ni ro tsa'i don mchog byed/ /'dod pa'i bstan bcos las bshad skyon med pa'i/ /yul dang dus dang nyams stobs rjes mthun zhing / /sman dpyad bstan bcos sbyor dang mi 'gal ba/ /'dod pa'i spyod pa ma lus spyad par bya/ /bsku byug lus

dril sman chu blugs dang dril/ /me tog phreng ba sna tshogs rgyan dang ldan/ /glu dang snyan dngags la sogs gtam la mkhas/ /rang bzhin na tshod mtshungs shing dbang gyur grogs/ /rang gi khang pa'i nye 'khor khrus rdzing bu/ /pad+ma'i ge sar sbrang rtsis myos pa yis/ /sbrang ma bya dang bcas pas

gyur pa ni/ /sngo zhing gzhi mnyam ri yi 'dab na ni/ /nags tshal khyim dang nye bar 'gyur ba dang / /mthong na dga' ba'i shing ni sna tshogs skye/ /mnyan na bde ba'i khu byug sgra snyan sgrogs/ /lus bde bud med rgyan ldan dus dbang 'gyur/ /sems bde ma lus 'khor gyis bskor ba dang / /

so rtsi dang ni chang dang chung ma ni/ /yid 'ong mtshan mo zla zer bcas par 'dug /yid ni dga' bar byed pa gang dang gang / /de dang de ni ro tsar byed pa yin/ /chung ma'i kha ni ut+pal ltar dri zhim/ /pi wang snyan pa'i sgra ni nyan byed dang / /mal stan yid 'ong me tog gcal bkram pa/ /

lcug ma me tog myu gus brgyan pa 'dra/ /yul dang dus la gnod pa gang yang med/ /yul gyi yid la gnod pa chung ngu'ang med/ /ro tsa'i sbyor ba nye bar ldan gyur pa/ /'dod pa'i 'dod pa yongs su rdzogs par byed/ /gla sgang par pa ta ni rims la phan/ /skom dad che la bong pa

bsregs pa ni/ /chu yi nang du gsur pa'i dngas ma phan/ /slon la 'bras yos chu so'i nang brag zhun/ /gcin snyi skyu ru ra dang ser po gnyis/ /skya rbab nad la lcags kyi phye ma mchog /rlung dang bad kan la ni a ru ra/ /mcher pa'i nad la pi pi ling mchog yin/ /glo rdol ba la

rgya skyegs khu ba bsngags/ /dug gi nad la shir sha rab tu bsngags/ /tshil dang rlung nad la ni gu gul phan/ /khrag mkhris la ni ba sha ka rab bsngags/ /'khru ba'i nad la dug mo nyung phan zhing / /gzhang 'brum go bye dbyig dug la gser phan/ /tsho ches pa la skyer khaN+Da bsngags

shing / /srin bu'i nad ni byi dang ga yis 'joms/ /gcong chen la chang ra sha'am 'o ma phan/ /mig gi nad la 'bras bu gsum rab phan/ /dreg nad la ni sle tres rab bsngags shing / /pho ba'i nad la dar ba gsar pa mchog /mdze la seng ldeng snying po bsten pas mchog /nad kun la ni brag

zhun rab tu bsngags/ /smyo byed nad la mar ni rnying pa phan/ /brjed byed nad la bram+hi'i rtsa ba phan/ /mya ngan la ni chang ni blud pas phan/ /gnyid med pa yi nad ni 'o mas sel/ /cham pa zho ni sbyar ma dag gis sel/ /rid pa'i nad la sha ni sbyin par bya/ /rlung gi nad la sgog skya rab tu bsngags/ /yan

lag rengs pa'i nad ni dugs kyis sel/ /phrag pa phrag gong lag ngar na ba la/ /thang chu kha bor yi sna sman gtang / /glad pa'i nad la mar sar hwags kyis sel/ /dmu rdzing rnga mo'i gcin dang 'o mas sel/ /mgo ba'i nad kun la ni sna sman bsngags/ /khong 'bras gsar du byung la gtar ga gdab/ /

kha yi nad kun la ni mkhur bkang phan/ /mig nad sna sman mig sman brtabs sel/ /rgas pa la ni 'o ma zhun mar phan/ /brgyal la chu gang blugs dang grib ma phan/ /drod chung ngal dang sge'u gsher tsha ran phan/ /dub la chang 'thungs lus ni khrus byas phan/ /sdug bsngal bzod dang brtan la rtsol

pa phan/ /gcin sri ba la gze ma phan pa yin/ /lud pa lu la kaN+Da ka ri phan/ /rtsib logs gzer la puSh+kar mU la phan/ /rgas sra ba la skyu ru ra phan zhing / /rma la 'bras bu gsum dang gu gul phan/ /de ltar nad rnams kyi ni sman gyi mchog /bshad pas nad

rnams zhi bar nus pa yin/ /de ni yul dang dus kyi stobs las ni/ /ci rigs par ni brtags te sbyar bar bya/ /de ltar rgyun shes bu las gzhung gi mdo/ /legs par bshad pa des ni ma ngoms pas/ /me bzhin 'jug sogs blo mthun dad pas 'dud/ /the tshom 'di ni me bzhin 'jug gis dris/ /

skal ldan kha cig bdag nyid mkhas/ /sman dang nad g.yog phun sum tshogs/ /sman pa rgan po'i lung gis ni/ /rjes su 'jug kyang nad bcas shing / /nad kyis srog ni zad par snang / /gzhan dag de las go bzlog snang / /de phyir phan dang gnod pa yi/ /'bras bu nges pa ma mchis

na/ /'dir ni bstan bcos kyis ci bstan/ /de ltar me bzhin 'jug sogs slob ma'i tshogs/ /rtog pa skyes la rgyun shes bu yis ni/ /de nyid ma lus rnam par bshad gyur pa/ /gso byas ma byas mnyam por bya mi rigs/ /yan lag drug cu ldan pa yi/ /gso byed bde

'gyur yod mod kyi/ /nad kyi 'dam du bying ba la/ /lag nas 'dren thabs sman yin no/ /'tsho dang 'chi bar 'gyur ba la/ /kun la sman yod ma yin zhing / /thabs la ltos pa ma yin la/ /gzhan du thabs la ltos pa'i nad/ /thabs kyis bsgrubs na 'grub 'gyur bas/ /rgyu

med par ni gtan tshigs min/ /gang yang khyed kyi phun tshogs ni/ /kun dang ldan pas gsos na yang / /'chi 'gyur zhes smra de ma yin/ /thabs ni thabs min 'gyur yod min/ /gal te de lta'i thabs ldan zhing / /blo ldan gso ba byas gyur kyang / /sngon las nyes pa ma grub pas/ /

yan lag bcu drug ldan med yin/ /me dang chu sogs dugs dang ni/ /rengs sogs mi 'grub su zhig zer/ /brta dang nyams smad 'o ma dang / /'bras ngan mi byed su zhig 'dod/ /ma sha kha sral la sogs la/ /ro tsa mi nus su zhig zer/ /bshang gci bskyed dang mang bar ni/ /nad la the tshom su zhig

zer/ /sngags dang rgyud ni med pa ru/ /gang gis dug ni 'jug par 'gyur/ /gag pa la sogs gso ba ni/ /med par gang zhig bde bar 'gyur/ /'on kyang dus min 'chi la sogs/ /grub mtha' kun tu nges par grags/ /'bad pa chen po dag gis ni/ /ji ltar gzhan gyis bzlog

par nus/ /tsan+dan la sogs tsha sogs pa/ /lung las grags pa bzhin du sel/ /rims la smyung dang brta ba dag /bstan bcos nyid las grags pa yin/ /yan lag bzhi pa'i yon tan 'byor/ /legs par brtags nas sbyar bya zhing / /gzhan du nad kyi tshogs 'joms

pa/ /gso ba the tshom bcas mi bya/ /'di ni dus min 'chi zhags pa/ /brtan po bcom par byed pa yin/ /nad kyis skrag cing 'jigs pa la/ /sngags med pa yi srung skud yin/ /'di ni 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal rnams/ /sel byed bdud rtsi mngon sum yin/ /snad ngan

gnas na 'phral du ni/ /ha la ha lar 'gyur ba yin/ /bstan bcos nges pa mi shes shing / /tshig tsam la ni rjes gzhol ba'i/ /gshin rje'i zhags pa thogs pa bzhin/ /sman pa ngan pa ring du spang / /sman pa gzhung la legs mkhas shing / /lung la mkhas pa'i bzang po dang / /

las la goms shing dge ba ni/ /bzang por 'dod pa dam pa yin/ /de ltar rgyud kyi yon tan ldan/ /rgyud kyi skyon ni spangs gyur pa/ /gso ba'i bstan bcos ma lus pa/ /khyab ste yongs su gnas pa yin/ /drang srong chen po'i gzhung rjes 'jug /rgya che'i dri ma med pa'i gnas/ /rgya mtsho

chen po ltar zab cing / /bsdus don nye bar mtshon byed yin/ /sman dpyad yan lag brgyad pa'i rgya mtsho bsrubs pa las/ /yan lag brgyad bsdus bdud rtsi'i tshogs thob gang / /de las don chen rtsol ba zhan pa rnams/ /dga' bar bya phyir rgyud 'di logs shig byas/ /'di ni lud chen las

grags shing / /'bras bu mngon du ston byed pas/ /sngags dang 'dra bar legs sbyar gyi/ /log dpyod nam yang mi bya'o/ /'di bklags rtogs dang nyams blangs pas/ /tshe ring ba dang nad med dang / /chos dang nor dang bde dang grags/ /nges par 'thob par 'gyur ba yin/ /'di

ni bltas na bsdus don rtogs nus pas/ /rang gi goms las sman pas bskyod mi nus/ /rgya chen rgyud gzhan dag las goms gyur pas/ /mi bskyod gyur gang de ni ngo mtshar med/ /gal te tsa ra ka ni bslabs gyur des ni legs thos sogs/ /las bshad

nad kyi ming tsam yang ni shes par 'gyur ma yin/ /tsa ra ka la ma bslabs gso ba dag ni ma goms pa'i/ /nyon mongs des ni nad pa rnams kyi gso ba ji ltar bya/ /mngon par zhen pa'i dbang gis legs par bshad par gyur pa'ang / /shin tu rmongs pas mngon par spyad par mi

byed gang yin de/ /de ni dang por sman dpyad bstan bcos skyon med bklags gyur zhing / /skyes bu tshe yis ji srid thub kyi bar du bslab par byed/ /rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan zhi bya'i phyir/ /til mar mar sar sbrang rtsi rim bzhin bsten/ /de ltar tshangs pa'am tshangs pa'i

bu yis bshad/ /tshig gi dbye bas bshad kyang khyad 'phags med/ /ston pa po yi dbang gis ni/ /sman gyi nus pa khyad 'phags yin/ /de bas phrag dog spangs nas ni/ /bar ma nyid la bsten par bya/ /drang srong gis bshad phyir dga' na/ /legs thos tsa ra kar

ma zad/ /lug stsogs kyis byas ci mi slob/ /de bas legs bshad gzung bar bya/ /'di ni tshe yi rig byed rgya mtsho yi/ /snying po las ni snying po blangs nas su/ /rnam par sbyar las dge ba gang thob pa/ /de yis 'gro bas de nyid mthong bar shog /yan lag brgyad pa'i

snying po bsdus pa las/ phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u ste bzhi bcu tham pa'o// //sman pa'i bdag po dge 'dun gsang ba zhes bya ba'i bu sman pa chen po pha khol zhes bya bas yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po mdzad pa las/ rgyud phyi ma'i gnas te drug pa'o// //sman dpyad yan lag brgyad pa'i
snying po bsdus pa zhes bya ba ji snyed pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzA ran d+ha ra dang / zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// //

rgya gar skad du/ /aSh+TAng+ga hr-i da ya nA ma bai DUr+ya ka b+haSh+ya ma/ bod skad du/ yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i sman dpyad kyi bshad pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa

dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman gyi bla be+e DUr+ya 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'dod chags la sogs ma lus pa yi nad/ /rgyun du 'brel pas lus la kun tu khyab/ /'dod dang gti mug khro ba sel ba yi/ /sman pa sngon med de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sngon

gyi drang srong rgyun shes kyi bu la sogs pas bshad pa/ /tshe ring ldan par 'dod pa na/ /chos dang nor yang bde bar sgrub/ /tshe yi rig byed lung bshad pa/ /rab tu gus pas bya bar gyis/ /gnas dang po sman dpyad kyi cho ga tshe ring bar bya ba la sogs pa'i dpyad ni/ /tshangs pa chen po dran

nas/ tshangs pa chen po'i bu skye dgu'i bdag ces bya ba la bshad do/ /skye dgu'i bdag gis sman dpyad lobs nas/ lha'i sman pa tha skar gyi bu gnyis la bshad do/ /lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis kyang sngon drang srong chen po rgyun shes kyi bu dang / nab so skyes dang / thang la

gnas dang / dka' gnyis spyod dang / mu khyud dang / 'dro ba skyong gi bu dang / shol 'dro zhes bya ba la bshad do/ /drang srong chen po 'di rnams kyis kyang / /drang srong me bzhin 'jug la sogs pa la bshad do/ /drang srong me bzhin 'jug la sogs pas sman dpyad kyi gzhung

lobs nas/ drang srong re res kyang sman dpyad zhib mo rgyas pa so sor byas pa'i gzhung rtsing zhib sna tshogs su gyur pa las/ phyis sman pa chen po pha khol zhes bya bas sman dpyad kyi gzhung mang po mtha' dag ma lus pa las btus pa/ /rtsing zhib ran cing bslab pa'i mdo yan lag brgyad du bsdus

pa'i sman dpyad kyi gzhung bris so/ /de la sman dpyad kyi mdo yan lag brgyad ces bya ba ni/ nam tshong man chad lus kyi nad sna tshogs gso ba'i dpyad dang / byis pa chung ngu'i dpyad dang / gdon nad sna tshogs kyi dpyad dang / nam tshod yan chad mig dang rna ba dang glad pa'i nad

sna tshogs kyi dpyad dang / /mtshon gyis smas pa'i rnag gso ba'i dpyad dang / /sdig sprul zos dug dang rtsi dug gis pog pa'i dpyad dang / rgas sra zhing tshe ring bar bya ba'i dpyad dang / bud med la phod par bya ba'i dpyad dang / /yan lag mdo rnam pa 'di brgyad

yin no/ /de lta bas na sman dpyad kyi gso ba'i cho ga thams cad ni mdo brgyad po 'dir 'dus so/ /de la mi'i nad thams cad kyi nad gzhi ni rnam pa gsum ste/ rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan yin no/ /rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan 'di gsum ma snyoms te/ gyur na nad

yin te lus 'joms par byed do/ /'di gsum 'phrod snyoms la gyur pa med na lus kyi nyams tha mal par gnas te/ 'tsho bar byed do/ /rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan 'di gsum lus la khyab par gnas mod kyi/ /de la yang gnas kyi bye brag ni snying ga yan chad bad

kan gyi gnas so/ /snying ga man chad lte ba yan chad kyi bar ni mkhris pa'i gnas so/ /lte ba man chad zas zhu ba'i sa dang / ro smad man chad rkang pa yan chad rlung gi gnas so/ /yang de la na tshod kyi bye brag las bstan na/ byis pa'i tshe na ni bad kan no/ /dar la bab

pa'i tshe ni mkhris pa'o/ /rgas phan chad ni rlung gi rang bzhin no/ /nyin mtshan yang rnam pa gsum du blta ste/ snga dro ni bad kan no/ /nyi ma phyed kyi dus ni mkhris pa'o/ /snur smad man ni rlung ngo / /mtshan mo'i nam stod ni bad kan no/ /nam gyi gung la mkhris pa'o/ /

nam gyi smad man chad ni rlung gi dus so/ /yang de la zas zos ma thag pa'i rjes la cung zad cig gi bar du ni bad kan gnas so/ /de nas zas de zhu bar byed kyi bar du ni mkhris pa'o/ /zas zhu nas dngas snyigs phyed phan chad ni rlung gi dus so/ /de la kha zas zos pa rnams

me'i drod kyis 'ju ba'i bye brag rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan las rnam pa bzhir blta ste/ de la rlung skyes nas zas zos pa yang na myur du 'ju/ /yang na ring du mi 'ju bar byed de/ 'ju ba mi snyoms so/ /mkhris pa skyes nas zas zos pa'i me drod rno ches par 'gyur ro/ /bad kan

skyes na zas 'ju bar byed pa'i me drod chung par byed do/ /rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan 'di gsum shas mnyam na zas 'ju ba'i me'i stobs kyang snyoms pa yin no/ /de la rlung gi shas che na lto sra'o/ /mkhris pa shas chen lto 'jam zhing snyi'o/ /bad kan gyi shas chen lto sra che

pa yang ma yin/ /snyi ba nyid kyang ma yin pa de ni bar ma ran pa yin no/ /rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan gsum shas snyoms te snyoms pa ni nad gzhi snyoms te nad med pa'o/ /ye lus kyi nad gzhi dang po ni/ /ma'i mngal du zla mtshan dang / khu ba chags pa de tshun chad nas lus skye

ba la sogs par 'gyur ba ni nad kyi mgo ste de nas byung ba yin te/ de nas dpe srin bu gdug pa'i dug dang 'dra'o/ /yang rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan gyi bye brag las lus kyi rang bzhin ni rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan re re la yang / /che ba dang 'bring po dang chung ngu so sor blta'o/ /

rlung dang bad kan dang mkhris pa gsum 'phrod snyoms na/ /lus zungs 'phrod snyoms pa yin te nad med pa'i mchog go/ /rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan gsum las gang yang rung ba gnyis shig lhag par phye na/ nad gzhi rnam gnyis las nad du 'gyur te/ smad par bya ba'i rang

bzhin yin no/ /de la rlung gi rang bzhin ni rtsub pa/ /yang ba/ grang ba/ /sra ba/ phra ba/ g.yo ba yin no/ /de la mkhris pa'i rang bzhin ni 'jam bag can/ /tsha tsag cag byed pa/ /dro ba/ yang ba/ dri nga bar mnam pa/ khong 'khru ba/ /gsher te sla ba yin no/ /de la bad

kan gyi rang bzhin ni lci ba/ bsil ba/ 'jam pa/ snum zhing rtul ba/ brtan pa/ nal nal po 'byar bag gi rang bzhin yin no/ /rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan 'di gsum las gnyis kyi shas chen ldan pa'i nad ces bya'o/ /sum char las nad du gyur pa ni 'dus pa'i nad

ces bya'o/ /de la lus zungs bdun zhes bya ba ni/ bcud dang sa ma dang / khrag dang / sha dang / tshil dang / rus pa dang / rkang dang / khu chu dang bdun no/ /'di bdun dang snyigs ma bshang gci dang / rdul sogs pa la rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan gsum gyis gnod

par byed pa yin no/ /rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan gsum snyoms na lus thams cad rtas par byed do/ /rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan rnams ma snyoms na lus la gnod par byed pa yin no/ /de la sman no cog gi dang / zas zos so cog gi

ro ni mdo rnam pa drug ste/ mngar ba dang / skyur ba dang / tsha bro ba dang / kha ba dang / tsha ba dang / bska ba dang rnam pa drug go/ /ro rnam pa drug kyang rtsi sman tha dad pa la brten to/ /ro drug gi stobs kyang go rims bzhin du mthu che ba yin no/ /de la dang po'i mngar ba dang

skyur ba dang / tsha bro ba 'di gsum gyis ni rlung sel to/ /kha ba dang / tsha ba dang / bska bas ni bad kan sel to/ /bska ba dang kha ba dang mngar bas ni mkhris pa sel to/ /de la tsha ba dang skyur ba dang / lan tshwas ni mkhris pa dang khrag rgyas pa'i tsha ba'i nad skyed do/ /sman

gyi bye brag ni rnam pa gsum du blta ste/ la las ni nad zhi bar byed/ la las ni nad ldang bar byed de/ tha mal ni nyams tha mal par gnas par byed do/ /yang sman gyi mthu ni rnam pa gnyis te/ tsha ba dang / bsil ba'i yon tan yin no/ /sman zhu ba'i rjes ni rnam

pa gsum ste/ mngar ba dang / skyur ba dang / tsha ba'i rang bzhin no/ /sman gyi yon tan ni rnam pa bcu ste/ lci ba dang / rtul ba dang / bsil ba dang / snum pa dang / 'jam pa dang / bska ba dang / mnyen pa dang / brten pa dang / rab tu phra ba dang / skam

bag can no/ /'di las bzlog na nyi shur sbyar ro/ /nad gso ba'i bye brag ni dbyar dgun gyi bye brag dang / sman gyi bye brag dang / sman sbyor zhing gtong ba'i las la mkhas pa dang / 'di gsum sbyar zhing logs par sbyor ba ni/ nad med par byed pa'i rgyu

gcig pu ste/ mchog yin no/ /rnam pa 'di gsum ltar ma 'byor te/ chung ngam log par sbyar tam/ lhag par sbyar te ches na nad kyis nyen pa yin te/ nad du shes par bya'o/ /nad ces bya ba ni rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan ma snyoms pa las nad du

'gyur ro/ /nad med pa ni rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan gyi nad gzhi 'phrod cing snyoms na nad med pa'i rang bzhin no/ /nad ces bya ba ni mdor rnam pa gnyis te/ gcig ni bkres pa dang skom pa dag gi nad rtag pa rang bzhin gyis gnas pa yin no/ /'phral du snang

pa dang / ma 'phrod pa ma snyoms pa las nad du gyur pa ni/ glo bur gyi nad yin te/ 'di dang rnam pa gnyis so/ /nad 'di gnyis kyang lus dang sems kyi bye brag gis nad kyi gnas kun rnam pa gnyis su rig par bya'o/ /de la 'dod chags dang / gti mug gnyis kyi

yid yin te/ 'di gnyis nad gzhir bstan to/ /de la nad kyi thabs brtag pa ni rnam pa gsum ste/ blta ba dang / lag pa'i myang bas reg par bya ba dang / nad thabs dri ba dang gsum gyis brtag go/ /de la nad pa'i nad brtag pa yang rnam pa lnga ste/ sngar

nad gzhir gyur pa'i kha zas mi 'phrod pa'i lci yang zos rjes dpyad pa dang / nad gang yin pa'i tshul las shes par bya ba dang / nad kyi dngos po gang yin pa'i mtshan nyid rtogs pa dang / nad du 'gyur ba'i kha zas la sogs pa zos par gyur pas nad cher gyur pa dang /

nad mngon par rtogs te nad kyi ming ci yin bye brag phyed pa dang / 'di lta bus nad kyi tshul rtogs par bya'o/ /yang nad kyi tshul brtag pa yang rnam pa gnyis te/ yul sa'i bye brag dang / lus kyi bye brag las rnam pa gnyis su blta ste/ de la yul sa'i bye brag gi

chu dang shing rtsi nyung zhing / ri nyung skam sa che/ rus pa can rlung che ba'i yul de lta bu ni/ rlung nad lhag par che zhing khrag nad du 'gyur ro/ /yul spyi ser che ste/ chu mang ri shas che ste/ shing med pa'i yul 'di lta bu las ni bad kan lhag par che shing rlung du yang

'gyur ro/ /skams dang gsher sa de gnyis cha mnyam ste/ thun mong tsam du gyur na rlung dang bad kan dang mkhris pa la sogs pa'i nad kyang ches mnyam par 'gyur ro/ /de lta bas na yul sa las blta ba rnam pa gsum du bshad pa yin no/ /sman pas

nad kyi dmigs gso dka' sla las sman sbyar ba yang rnam pa gnyis te/ nad kyis btab nas skad cig thang cig nas lo zla ba la sogs pa'i yun ji srid lon pa dang / 'phral du nad kyis thebs pa'i tshabs che chung gi dmigs las brtags

te/ sman pas sman sbyar bar bya'o/ /sman pas sman gtang ba yang mdo rnam pa gnyis te/ stod du drang zhing slon pa la sogs pa nas bkru zhing sbyang bar bya ba dang / nad zhi bar bya ba'i sman gtang ba dang gnyis so/ /lus las byung ba'i nad rnams rim pas gso ba

ni mchog tu sman bzang ste/ sman langs pa nas gtang ba dang / bkru sman gtang ba dang / slon sman gtang ba dang / til mar dang sman mar dang / sbrang rtsi la sogs pa btang zhing gso'o/ /sems kyi nad gso ba ni shes rab kyi blo dang ldan pa dang brtan zhing dga' ba

dang ldan pa dang / gzhan gyis brnyas pa la sogs pa byas pas sems mi dga' zhing 'khrugs par gyur na/ bdag nyid kyi tshod ji tsam pa dang / ci 'dra ba la sogs pa rigs pa'i tshul gyis bsams te/ sems kyi nad gso ba 'di ni sems nad gso ba'i mchog yin

no/ /sman btang zhing nad gso ba'i dpyad thabs mdo rnam pa bzhi ste/ sman pa dang / sman dang / nad g.yog dang / nad pa dang rnam pa bzhi'o/ /nad gso ba'i mdo rnam pa 'di bzhi po'i re re la yang rnam pa bzhi bzhi ste/ bcu drug dang ldan na/ nad gso ba la sogs

pa sman dpyad thams cad byar rung ngo / /de la yon tan rnam pa bzhi dang ldan na sman pa yin te/ de dag gang zhe na/ sman pa chen po mkhas shing lugs che/ kun gyi stegs su gyur pa yin/ sman dpyad kyi gtsug lag bshad pa/ dpyad kyi lung legs par lobs

pa yin/ /sman sbyar zhing gtang ba'i las su bya ba rnams mthong ba dang / snyom las dang le lo mi byed cing brtson pa yin/ phyi'i bkru bshal dang sman sbyar ba la sogs pa la gtsang sbra che zhing nang gi 'dod chen med la snying rje yod pa'i gtsang sbra dang ldan pa 'di ni sman pa'i yon tan

no/ /de yang sman yon tan bzhi dang ldan pa dgos te/ sman sna tshogs so so'i brko skam pa la sogs pa so so'i cho ga bzhin byas par gyur pa dang / sman sna re re yang mthu stobs la sogs pa yon tan dang ldan pa dang / sman skye ba'i tshe na/ char pa chen po'am than

pa ches pa'am/ nyi lhags dang grib mas ha cang gnod par ma gyur cing / /sa bzang po nas skyes pa so so'i smin par ldan pa dag nad dmigs tha dad pa dang / 'phrod pa'i sman dmigs su phan pa dang ldan pa dang / 'di bzhi ni sman gyi yon tan yin no/ /nad g.yog gi

yon tan yang rnam pa bzhi ste/ nad pa la byams pa dang / phyi nang gi gtsang sbra che ba bsnyel mdongs yod cing gshor la brtson pa dang / nad pa'i nad kyi tshul las kha zas la sogs pa rung mi rung gi cho ga sman pas bstan pa bzhin mi brjed mi 'khrul zhing rgyus lobs

pa'o/ /nad pa yang yon tan bzhi dang ldan na nad gsor rung ste/ gso ba'i yo byad 'byor te phyug pa dang / sman pa'i dpyad nyan cing bka' blo bde ba dang / nad pa rang gi nad gang dang gang du na ba shes pa dang / sman dang dpyad byas na phog snya che zhing stobs dang ldan

pa bzhi'o/ /de ltar sman dpyad kyi yan lag bcu drug po 'di dag dang ldan na/ nad gso ba la sogs pa dang / rgan sran che zhing tshe ring bar bya ba la sogs pa kun kyang byar rung ngo / /sman pas nad pa zhig gso na/ nad gsor rung ba'i nad pa ni/ na tshod dar la bab

pa dang / sman dpyad kyi cho ga thams cad la phog snya nus shing bzod pa dang / rnam pa 'di gnyis su ldan pa'i mi sman gyi cho ga dang / kha zas mi 'phrod pa bsrung zhing dbang po zhi zhing thub par srung nus pa 'di lta bu'i nad pa ni gso sla ba yin no/ /yang nad pa'i nad gso ba la/

na tshod dar la bab cing phog snya nus kyang nad gnad du bab par gyur tam/ nad gzhi che ba la sogs par gyur na ni/ gso dka' ba yin no/ /nad pa'i na tshod dar la bab cing phog snya la sogs pa dang ldan la/ nad kyang gnad la bab par ma song / nad gzhi yang chung / na

pa'i nad dmigs nyid kyang gsal bar mi snang ste/ nad gang yin pa'i tshul la ma rtags tsam zhig sngar snang ngam/ nad kyi dmigs gang yin pa'i mtshan nyid gsal bar rtogs pa dang / rims la sogs pa nad gang yang rung ba'i bla brnan gyi

nad phran tshegs gzhan dag gis kyang ma btab na de ni gnod pa ma yin te gso sla ba'o/ /yang nad pa zhig na ste mi bde na/ mi'i rang bzhin dang / dbyar dgun gyi dus dang / yul skam sa dang / ser che ba la sogs pa gnod par byed pa'i khams la sogs pa las so/ /

mi bde ba'i nad kun kyang gcig tu mi mthun te/ tha dad par gyur pa 'di lta bu dang / sman dpyad bya ba'i yan lag bcu drug dang yang ldan par gyur pa 'di 'dra ba'i nad ni gso sla ba yin no/ /yang nad kyis btab pa zhig la dpyad du bya na/ mi de btsas pa'i tshe'i bla skar gang

yin pa dang / gza' gang yin pa dang sbyar te/ thog mar nad kyis btab pa'i nyi ma dang sbyar na bcas pa'i che'i skar ma la gnod par ma gyur pa dang / nad 'dom pa sna gnyis kyis ma dag ste/ nad sna gcig na ba dang / kha nas khrag 'byung ba dang / thur du yang 'byung ste

sgo gnyis ka nas khrag 'ong ba 'di lta bu dang / yang na kha dang sna la sogs pa kun nas khrag 'ong ba 'di lta bu ni gso dka' ba yin na/ 'di ltar ma 'dom ste/ kha'am smad 'ga' zhig nas khrag 'ong bar zad pa dang / nad snying dkyil che ba ma yin pa 'di lta bu ni gso

sla ba zhes bya'o/ /de la nad gso dka' ba zhes bya ba ni/ gtar ga sna tshogs gdab pa dang / chu'i srog chags pad pas nad khrag 'jib tu gzhug pa dang / nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba las sbyar ba'i sman gyis bsku ba dang / nad sna gnyis 'dom pa'i nad kyis

btab par gyur pa 'di lta bu'i nad ni gso dka' ba yin te/ sman dang / kha zas phan pa tsam zhig gis zin pa dang / tshe srog la thogs par zad de/ de lta bu ni gso dka' ba zhes bya'o/ /de la sngar gso sla ba'i dmigs bstan pa dang gso dka' ba'i dmigs bstan pa

rnam gnyis dang mi mthun pa nad gzhi yang che la nad sna yang 'dom pa dang / sman dang kha zas kyis btsos shing bsgyur du yang mi rung / tshe srog gis zin pa yang mi 'dra la gso ba'i dpyad du bya ba kun dang rab tu mi mthun par gnas pa dang / sems kyang 'khral 'khrul

du gyur te/ mi 'phrod cing gnod par 'gyur pa kun 'dod pa dang / gnyen nam mdza' sdug pa dang 'phrad 'dod ces zer ba lta bu dang / rmongs shing mi dran la/ myos te ma smras pa dang / 'dod pa rnams brjed pa dang / khro bar gyur te sman pa dang / nad g.yog dang / dpyad

du bya ba rnams la gshe zhing 'tshig pa dang / 'di lta bu'i nad gzhi cher gyur pa ni gso ba'i thabs dka' ba zhes bya ba ste/ sman pas nad pa la bltas nas 'chi ltas snang zhing / mig 'gyur la nyam thag par snang zhing sman pa la yang khro/ rgyal po la yang khro/

sman pa dang rgyal po dang mi mdza' mi mthun pa la yang khro zhing 'tshig /yo byad mi 'byor la/ sman pas gso ba'i dpyad byas na yang brel te mi khom zhe'am/ sman pas dpyad byas kyang nyan du mi btub pa dang / nad pa gtum la mya ngan la gnas shing dpyad byas pas

'jigs te phog snya chung ba/ drin mi gzo ba/ rgyal byed cing sman pa la brnyas pa/ tshe zad par gyur pa 'di ltar mthong na/ thabs med de sman pas thong shig /tshe ring bar bya ba'i sman dpyad kyi le'u dang po'i rgyud bshad zin to// //de nas tshe ring bar 'dod

pa'i rgyud las sman dpyad kyi rnam grangs kyi mdo bsdu ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /tshe ring bar 'dod na yang dpyad dang cho gar bya ba'i rnam grangs brgya nyi shu yod do/ /de dag gang zhe na/ ming gis bgrang ba las/ mdo dmigs kyis bshad pa'i gnas rnams sum cu dang /

byis pa rum du chags pa la dpyad du bya ba rnam pa drug dang / nad gzhi rnam pa bcu drug dang / nad gso ba'i dpyad nyi shu rtsa gnyis dang / bkru sman dang / skyug sman dang / sman mas gtong ba la sogs pa'i cho ga grub pa rnam pa drug dang / byis pa chung ngu'i dpyad

dang / gdon nad kyi cho ga dang / smyo ba dang / brjed byed kyi nad dang / mig nad dang / sna nad dang / kha nad dang / rna nad dang / glad nad la sogs pa'i dpyad dang / rma dang / mtshon gyis phog pa sna tshogs dang / rkang lag dang 'bur ba la

sogs pa gso ba'i dpyad rnam pa bzhi bcu yod do/ /de la tshe ring par 'dod na nyin re zhing rtag tu ji ltar bya ba dang / lo gcig cing dus tshigs tha dad pa drug yod pa la kha zas la sogs pa'i cho ga dang / dpyad ji ltar bya ba dang / rtag par bde zhing nad med par bya ba dang /

skom ci dang ci btung ba dang / kha zas so so'i bye brag shes par bya ba dang / kha zas dang / skom la sogs pa'i nang du dug btab pa thams cad la tshor zhing ngos zin par bya ba'i thabs bstan te/ zas bsdam par bya ba bshad pa dang / zas ran par bza' ba'i tshod

gzung ba bstan pa dang / sman sna so so'i mthu dang yon tan dang zhu ba'i rjes bstan pa dang / sman gyi khu ba mdar ba dang / skyur ba dang / kha ba la sogs pa'i bye brag ro la gnas pa bstan pa dang / bad kan dang rlung dang mkhris pa la sogs pa'i nad shes par bya ba

dang / nad de dag gi so so'i bye brag dbye ba dang / nad so so'i gso ba'i thabs gnyis pa bstan pa dang / rid pa dang rke zhing nyam chung ba brta ba'i thabs dang / snum bag dpyad kyi cho ga bya ba dang / skyug sman dang bkru sman la sogs pa'i nad sbyang bar bya ba dang / dugs dang

lums bya ba dang / mas bkru zhing bsal ba la sogs pas lus brtan par bya ba dang / sna nas gtang ba dang / sman gyi dud pa btang zhing brngub pa dang / bad kan rgyas sam so 'gul lam na ba lta bu la til mar ram sman gyi khu ba khar blugs shing dor ba dang / mig sman

blugs shing mig nad bkru ba dang / mig nad bkrus nas mig gso ba'i sman gtang ba dang / mda' la sogs pa'i mtshon gyis smas te mde'u khong du lus pa dang / tsher ma zug pa'am/ gre bar snad pa'am/ gra ma chag pa dbyung ba'i thabs dang / gtsags bu dang /

gtsags khab la sogs pa sna tshogs kyi bye brag dang / rtse'i bye brag dang / mtshon khong du lus pa dbyung ba'i cho ga dang / gtar spyad so sos nad dmigs gang dang gang la gdab pa dang / thal sman rnon po'i sman gis bsku ba dang / me btsa' gdab pa'i las bya ba

'di dag ni lus kyi nad gso ba'i cho ga mdo'i gnas kyi le'u sum cu bya ba yin no/ /de la byis pa rum du chags pa ni mngal du zhugs pa zhes bya ste/ de la kha zas dang spyod lam ji ltar bshad pa dang rum du chags pa de'i nad kyi bye brag dang / de'i rkang lag dang /

yan lag gi bye brag bstan pa dang / /nad kyi bye brag bstan pa dang / lus mdog dang / tshul la sogs par gyur te 'chi ltas byung ba dang / sman pa 'bod pa'am/ 'gugs pa'i bang chen la ltas su lta ba dang / 'di drug ni byis pa rum du chags pa'i bye brag bstan

pa'o/ /nad gzhi ni nad thams cad kyi gzhi zhes bya ba dang / rims nad mang po'i nad gzhi dang / khrag nad kyi nad gzhi dang / lud pa'i nad gzhi dang / dbugs mi bde ba'i nad gzhi dang / glo gcong la sogs pa dang / chang drags pa las nad du gyur pa dang / gzhang

'brum khrag tshad dang / tshad pa'i nad dang / chus 'gags pa'i nad dang / gcin snyi pa'i nad dang / khong 'bras dang / dmu rdzing dang / skya rbab dang / mdze nad dang / rlung nad kyis nyam thag pa dang / dreg nad dang / nad 'di rnam pa bcu drug gi nad gzhi ci dang ci las gyur

pa bstan pa ni nad gzhi bcu drug bshad pa'o/ /de la nad gso ba'i dpyad rnam pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis zhes bya ba ni/ rims nad sna tshogs gso ba dang / khrag nad rgyas te stod smad du 'byung ba gso ba dang / lud pa'i nad gso ba dang / dbugs mi bde ba'i nad gso

ba dang / glo gcong gi nad gso ba dang / rtag tu slon pa'i nad gso ba dang / chang nad gso ba dang / gzhang 'brum khrag tshang gso ba dang / zhu ba'i tshad pa dang / ma zhu ba be+e'u snabs su 'byung ba dang / rnam gnyis kyi tshad pa gso ba dang / pho ba'i nad gso ba dang /

gcin 'gags pa'i nad gso ba dang / gcin za gu'i nad gso ba dang / khong 'bras gso ba dang / skran nad gso ba dang / dmu rdzing gso ba dang /skya rbab kyi nad gso ba dang / 'or nad gso ba dang / me dbal gso ba dang / mdze'i nad gso ba dang

sha bkra'i dpyad dang / rlung nad kyi dpyad dang / dreg nad gso ba'i dpyad rnam pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag ni nad gso ba'i le'u zhes bya'o/ /cho ga grub pa rnam pa drug ces bya ba ni skyug sman gtang ba'i cho ga dang / bkru ba'i cho ga dang / skyug sman dang bkru bde grub par bya ba'i

cho ga dang / sman mas gtong ba'i cho ga dang / sman mas gtong ba'i cho gas nad phyin te gso bar bya ba dang / sman mas gtong ba'i thabs nor ram/ btang ma legs pa las ma rung ste nad du gyur pa gso ba'i thabs dang / sman gyi cho ga bstan pa ste rnam pa 'di drug ni sman dpyad kyi cho ga grub par bya ba yin

no/ /sman dpyad kyi cho ga bzhi bcu pa'i le'u bshad par bya ste/ de dag gang zhe na/ byis pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba ni byis pa btsas ma thag pa'i tshe nas dpyad dang cho gar bya ba'i rim pa rnam gsum dang / byis pa'i nad mi 'byung bar bya ba dang / nu zho'i dpyad dang / byis pa gdon gyis

btab na gso ba'i cho ga dang / sman gtang ba'i thabs dang / mi chen po'i gdon gyis btab na gdon gyi dmigs shes pa dang / gdon nad bsal ba'i cho ga dang / smyo ba'i nad bsal ba dang / brjed byed kyi nad bsal ba dang / rdzi ma dang / mig dang / mchu'i

nad ngo shes pa dang / nad dmigs gsal ba dang / mig gi mtha' ma'i gra mtshams dang / mig gi 'bras bu'i nad dmigs brtag pa dang / nad so sor bsal ba'i cho ga dang / mig rab rib tu gyur te mi mthong ba'i nad dmigs brtag pa dang / nad gso ba'i

cho ga dang / mig gis mthong ba nyams pa'i nad gso ba'i cho ga dang / mig nad sna tshogs kyi nad dmigs brtag pa dang / mig nad gso ba'i cho ga dang / rna nad kyi dmigs brtag pa dang / rna nad gso ba dang / sna nad kyi dmigs brtag pa dang / sna nad

gso ba'i cho ga dang / kha nad kyi dmigs brtag pa dang / kha nad gso ba'i cho ga dang / mgo nad kyi dmigs gang yin pa brtag pa dang / mgo nad gso ba'i cho ga dang / rma rnying gso ba'i cho ga dang / rma gsar pa gso ba'i cho ga dang / rkang lag chag grugs

su gyur pa gso ba dang / mtshan bar rdol ba'i nad dmigs brtag cing gso ba'i cho ga dang / 'bras dang thor bu la sogs pa nad dmigs brtag pa dang / gso ba'i cho ga dang / 'brum bu phra mo'i nad dmigs shes par bya ba dang / gso ba'i cho ga dang / gsang ba'i

gnas kyi nad dmigs brtag pa dang / gso ba'i cho ga dang / dug nad sna tshogs kyi dmigs brtag cing gso ba'i cho ga dang / sbrul gdug pas zin pa'i nad gso ba dang / srin bu gdug pas zin pa byi ba la sogs pa'i gdug pas zin pa so so'i gso ba'i cho ga

dang / nad med cing rgas sra ba bcud len sbyar ba'i cho ga dang / bu med pa la sa bon gso zhing ro tsa ba'i cho ga dang / dpyad rnam pa bzhi bcu ste/ de ltar dpyad kyi rnam grangs brgya nyi shu ni mdo rnam pa drug tu bsdus te bshad pa yin no/ /de la dang por mdo'i gnas su

sum cu bstan pa las go rims bzhin du rtag tu nyin bar gyi dpyad du bya ba bshad par bya ste/ nyams tha mal par gnas pas tshe bsrung bar bya ba dang / lus kyi rim gro bya ba'i phyir nam dmar ring shar tsa na langs te skad cig 'dug par bya'o/ /de nas phyi rol du

bshang gci la sogs pa byas nas/ nang par so shing gi rgyu shing ar ka dang / shing n+ya gro d+ha dang / seng ldeng dang / shing ka rany+dza dang / shing ka ku b+ha la sogs pa so shing ro kha ba dang / tshab dang / bska bar bro ba las thor to 'jam por byas la/ so rnyil la gnod

par ma gyur par bca' bar bya'o/ /gal te zas ma zhu'am/ slon bro'am/ dbugs mi bde ba'am/ lud pa lu'am/ rims nad dam/ kha yon por gyur pa'am/ kha skams te/ skom pa'am/ kha'i nang du thor bu byung ba'am/ snying na'am/ mig

na'am/ klad pa na'am/ rna ba na bar gyur na so shing ma bca' zhig /kha gdong bkrus nas mig la phan par bya ba'i phyir/ mig la phan pa'i sman stang zil zhes bya ba mig la rtag tu byug go/ /mig ni me'i rang bzhin yin pas na/ de'i khyad

par lhag par bad kan las 'jigs pa'i nad 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de bas na zhag bdun zhing mig gi sman skyer pa'i khaN+Da zhes bya ba mig tu lan cig blugs shing mchi ma dbyung bar bya'o/ /de nas rna ba dang glad pa mi bde ba rnams la til mar las sbyar ba'i sman

mar thigs pa gnyis tsam sna nas gtang ngo / /mgul pa dang / gre ba dang / lce'u chung dang / lce dang / lkog ma dang / so dang / snying la sogs pa'i nad bsal ba'am phan par bya ba'i phyir sman gyi khu bas mkhur ba bkang ste skad cig tsam bzhag la dor ro/ /sman bsregs

pa'i dud pa yang sbu gu nas sna dang / kha nas brngub par bya'o/ /so rtsi tam po la yang mur bar bya'o/ /gal te glo 'grams te kha nas khrag 'ong ngam/ mkhris pa skyes sam/ kha nas khrag mang du 'ong ba'am/ rlung gis lus rtsub por gyur pa'am/ mig na'am/ dug

nad dam/ brgyal ba'am/ chang nad kyis gzir ram/ lus skems par 'gyur ba 'di lta bu la so rtsi tam po la mur du mi rung ngo / /lus rtag tu mar gyis bskus na rgas pa dang ngal zhing dub pa dang / chad pa dang / rlung nad sel bar byed de/ lhag par mgo bo dang / rkang

pa mar gyis bskus na/ /mig nad kyi skyon med/ mig gsal ba dang / lus brtas pa dang / tshe la phan pa dang / gnyid legs par 'ong ba dang / pags pa'i mdog 'jam zhing brtas par 'gyur ro/ /gal te bad kan skyes te mi bde 'am/ skyug sman nam/

bkru sman btang ste bkrus sam/ zas ma zhu bar gyur na mar gyis byugs shing / lus bstsal zhing sbyangs na khang yang ba dang / las phod pa dang / zas zhu bar byed pa'i mi'i drod 'bar ba dang / tshil zad par byed pa dang / lus kyi stod smad skabs phyed la lus

grims par byed par 'gyur ro/ /gal te rlung dang mkhris pa'i nad yod dam/ byis pa 'am rgas pa zhig na lus bskyod cing bstsal bar byas te yang dgun lhags pa'i dus dang / dpyid kyi dus su sbyang ste/ de yang zas snum bag bza' zhing stobs kyi mthu dang ldan pas

stobs kyi shugs dang / tshad phyed tsam byung ste/ bstsal zhing bskyod par bya'o/ /dus gong ma gnyis ma yin pa dus gzhan gyi chen rin tsam mi dag par bstsal zhing shugs dbyung ba dang sbyar bar bya'o/ /de ltar bstsal zhing bskyod pa'i shugs phyung ba'i rjes la/ lus thog

thag ci ran cig bde bar nyal zhing bskyod cing bstsal ba'i shugs dbyung ba dang / sbyar bar bya'o/ /bskyod cing bstsal ba'i shugs ha cang drags ches na skom dad che ba dang / glo gcong du 'gyur ba dang / snying na ste mi dran pa mun thibs zhes byed pa dang / khrag rgyas pa dang /

mkhris pa rgyas pa dang / lud pa lu ba dang / rims dang / slon par 'gyur ro/ /lus kyi gnod pa drag shul las gyur pa de lta bu 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/ de dang 'dra ba gzhan yang mtshan mo mi nyal bar byed pa dang / lam rings kyis du ba ste chad pa dang / bud med la

drags te dub pa dang / gad mo dgod drags pa dang / smra ba mang zhing drags pa dang / stobs kyi tshan gyis mi nus bzhin ha cang shugs drag pos btsal zhing bsten na seng ges glang po che gzhom drags pa bzhin lus ma rung bar 'gyur ro/ /de ltar lus mar gyis byugs pa'i rjes la lde

gus byugs shing phyis te dril na/ bad kan sel ba dang / tshil rab tu zhu bar byed pa dang / lus dang yan lag brtan par byed pa dang / pags pa'i mdog dri ma med cing shin tu gsal bar 'gyur ro/ /de ltar lus lde gus dril nas lus khrus bya'o/ /khrus byas pa'i yon

tan ni pho ba drod che zhing kha zas 'ju ba dang / bud med la phod de ro tsa ba dang / tshe la phan pa dang / mdangs dang ldan zhing stobs skye ba dang / lus kyi pags pa g.ya' ba med pa dang / dri ma med pa dang / ngal zhing dub pa brtas pa dang / rdul med pa dang / snyom pa sangs pa dang

skom pa med pa dang / lus tsha ba las lus bsil ba dang / mi shis pa sel bar 'gyur ro/ /lus kyi khrus chu ni tshan por byas la/ mgul pa man chad lus la blugs shing bkrus na lus kyi stobs skyed par 'gyur ro/ /mgo bkru ba ni chu

ches na mi bzang ngo / /chu tshan de nyid kyis mgo bkrus na lus kyi stobs 'phrog pa dang / skra 'byi ba dang / mig la gnod par 'gyur ro/ /gal te kha 'gram pa la chags pa'i nad yod dam/ mig na'am/ kha nad kyis btab pa'am/ rna ba na'am/ tshad pa

na'am/ lto sbos sam/ cham pas btab pa'am/ kha zas ma zhu'am/ zas zos ma thag lta bu la bkrus na mi rung ste/ khrus ma byed cig /kha zas bza' ba ni zas zhu ba'i rjes la zos na phan te/ kha zas bza' ba de la yang / tshod ran par bzung ste bza'

bar bya'o/ /bshang ba 'ong bar gyur na mi brnag par bshang ngo / /bshang ba mi 'ong bzhin du yang stobs kyis mi btsir ro/ /bshang ba 'ong bar gyur na bshang ba ma byas par las gzhan ma byed cig /de bzhin du nad gang yang rung ste mi bde na/ nad ma

bsal bar las gzhan mi bsgrub bo/ /sems can thams cad ni ci bsgrubs pa thams cad kyang bde ba 'dod pa'i phyir bsgrub bo/ /bde ba de yang chos ma bsgrubs na mi 'thob bo/ /de bas na chos la rab tu bsgrub par bya'o/ /de bas na mi dge ba'i grogs

po ring du spangs la/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la mos pa bsten par bya'o/ /de bas na sems can la gnod par byed pa dang / rku ba dang / 'dod pas gzhan la g.yem pa dang / phra ma dang / ngag rtsub po dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / tshig kyal pa smra ba dang / /

gnod sems dang / brnab sems dang / log par lta ba'i sdig pa'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las mi dge ba rnams spang bar bya'o/ /sems can 'tsho bas phongs pa dang / nad dang mya ngan gyis gzir te nyam thag par gyur pa la ci nus pas phan gdags pa dang / chung

ngu grog sbur yan chad la yang bdag rang gi lus dang srog bzhin du blta bar bya'o/ /rtag par lha dang / dge slong rnams dang / bram ze dang / sman pa dang / na so rgan pa dang / rgyal po dang / gsar du 'ong ba rnams la mgron bya ba dang / slong ba rnams la mgron

bya ba dang / slong ba rnams la rgyab kyis mi phyogs pa dang / mi brnyas mi spyo ba dang / dgras mtshan du gnod pa chad byed kyang phan gdags pa lhur bya ba dang / dar ba dang gud par gyur na yang yid gcig ste/ sems lhag par dga' bar bya'o/ /mya ngan la gnas par mi

byed/ dal zhing 'byor par gyur pa'i rgyu las bstsal bar bya ba'i rigs kyi pha rol 'byor par gyur pa la phrag dog bya ba'i mi rigs so/ /smra ba yang dus su smra/ phan par smra/ ran par smra/ brdzun gyis mi slu zhing des pa dang / bzhin 'dzum zhing snga nas gsong por smra ba

dang / spyod lam bzang po dang ldan pa dang / snying rje che zhing 'jom pa dang / bdag 'ba' zhig bde bar byed pa ma yin/ thams cad la yid rton par byed pa yang ma yin/ kun la dogs par byed pa yang ma yin/ bdag gi dgra zhes bya ba su yang med pa dang / bdag ni

su'i dgra yang ma yin par bya ba dang / bdag la gzhan gyis brnyas so zhes tshig tu mi 'byin/ dpon po'am bla ma bdag la mi byams so zhes mi smra/ mi'i yid dang sbyar te/ brtags la ci nas kyang dga' bar 'gyur ba de ltar bya ste/ gzhan dga' bar byed

pa ni mdzangs pa zhes bya'o/ /dbang po rnams gzir zhing gnon par yang mi bya/ ha cang yang longs spyod btsal zhing nyams rangs su yang mi bya/ mdor na chos dang nor dang longs spyod dang 'di gsum med pa'i mdo stong par gyur pa'i las mi brtsam mo/ /las 'di

gsum dang mi ldan yang las 'di gsum dang mi 'gal ba'i las rnams bsgrub par bya'o/ /mdor na chos thams cad la bsgrub cing bya ba ni ran par sgrub cing 'jug go/ /skra ring po dang sen mo dang kha spu breg pa dang / dri ma 'byung ba'i sgo dgu dang / rkang

pa dri ma med par bya ba dang / khrus bya ba la dga' ba dang / spos mchog tu dri zhim po thogs shing cha lugs mdzes la 'god cing 'phyar ba ma yin pa dang / gos dang rgyan la sogs pa ha cang spang ches par mi bya/ rtag tu rin po che dang /

bsgrubs pa'i sngags dang / sman chen po dag kyang lus la bcang ngo / /phan tshun 'gro na yang lham gyon gdugs thogs la mig ran pa tsam du blta zhing 'gro'o/ /mtshan mo ni gar yang mi 'gro'o/ /mtshan mo mi 'gror mi rung ba brtan pa'i las shig byung na yang /

grogs dang bshams la chas shing lag cha thogs la song shig /yan man 'gro ba'i lam ka na mchod rten gyi grib ma'am/ bla ma mchod gnas shig 'dug gam/ rgyal mtshan gyi grib ma'am/ mi ro dang / thal ba dang / lud phung dang / gyo mo dang / bong pa dang /

gtor ma dang yas stags bor ba dang / khrus byas pa'i sa dang / chu bor ba 'di rnams la mi brdzi mi bgom bar bskor te 'gro bar bya'o/ /chu bo che las brgal bar mi bya/ me chen po'i nang du 'gro bar mi bya/ gru ngan pa bag tsha ba dang / shing bag tshab la mi 'gro

mi 'dzeg /bzhon pa rta mi srun pa la zhon te mi 'gro/ sbrid pa dang / gad mo dang / glal dang / bya rmyang la sogs pa'i tshe yang kha ha cang mi gdangs so/ /sna'i bu gar mdzub mos ha cang yang mi brud pa dang / bya ba'i dmigs med par sa la bab tu ri mo mi bri/

lus dang yan lag ha cang mi gcu/ tsog tsog por yang ma 'dug shig /lus kyis las sam/ ngag gis smra ba 'am/ sems kyis bsam pa'i las ci byed kyang rung ste ngal bar ma gyur par tshod bzung ste snga nas thong shig /yun ring du mal gcig nam 'greng zhig//rgyus

ma rig pa'i shing drung du nub mo ma 'dug cig /de bzhin du lam gyi sum mdo dang / mchod rten gyi drung dang / lam gyi bzhi mdo'i 'dus sa dang / lha khang gi drung dang ri dgas la sogs pa bsad pa'i sha dmar dang / slo spungs pa'i sa dang / 'brog dang 'di dag tu 'gro

bar mi bya'o/ /khang stong dang dur khrod du ni nyin par yang 'gro bar mi bya'o/ /nyi ma la ni mig tshugs su yang mi lta/ mgo bo la khur thogs te khyer bar mi bya/ shin tu zhib cing phra ba'am/ 'od 'tsher ba'am/ btsog pa'am/ mi sdug pa gang yang rung ste/

rtag par ma blta zhig /chang ni bag med la 'khrul ba'i gnas yin pas rang mi btso/ mi btsong / gzhan la yang mi blud/ bdag gis kyang mi btung bar bya'o/ /snga dro ser bu'i kha na 'dug pa dang / nyi tshan la 'dug pa dang / dur khrod na 'dug pa dang / ba mo'i

steng na 'dug pa dang / rlung rtsub por langs pa 'di lta bu'i gnas dang sa phyogs su 'dug par mi bya'o/ /sbrid pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ mjing pa yon par gcu ba dang / de dang 'dra bar mjing pa yon por sgregs pa gtong ba dang / mjing pa gcus te gnyid kyis log

pa dang / lus gcus te nyal po byed pa dang / 'di lta bu kun las nad du 'gyur te/ mjing pa dang lus gcu bar mi bya'o/ /chu 'gram gyi gad kar 'dug par mi bya ba dang / rgyal po dang mi mthun pa'am/ rgyal pos bkyon pa'i mi dang mi 'drul mi bsten pa

dang / sbrul dang gcan gzan dang / phyugs rwa can brdung ba'i gan du mi nye bar bag bya'o/ /nad par dmar rengs shar ba'i dus nam phan phun dang / nyi ma phyed dang nyi ma nub ste dmar thag chad pa dang / dus 'di gsum gyi tshe/ kha zas za ba dang / bud med dang nyal

ba dang / yi ge klog pa dang / snying la sems pa'i bag 'di lta bu mi bya'o/ /mi mdza' ba dang / dgra bo'i khyim du zas za ba dang / mi mang po zan za ba'i nang du chang 'thung zhing za ba dang / mi go 'dun mang po'i zan za ba dang / tshong pa'i zan za ba 'di lta bu rnams

bza' bar mi bya'o/ /lus la lag pas mi 'os par mi rdob pa dang / mchu 'bri zhing mi 'bud/ mgo dang lag pa drag tu mi sprug /sen mo rnams gcig la gcig mi drud do/ /chu dang me'i nang du 'gro bar mi bya/ bla ma btsun pa rnams 'khod pa'i gong ngam par

bar nas phar 'gro bar mi bya/ ro bsregs pa'i dud pa'i khar 'dug na nad du 'gyur te 'dug par mi bya'o/ /bud med rang dbang du gyur pa dang / bud med yid la 'jog pa thong shig /mdor na mi mdzangs pa'i ci bya 'o cog gi slob dpon ni
