mar gyis byug cing mnyes te/ chu dron pos khrus bya ba dang / nyams bag tu bde bar 'dug pa dang / nyams dga' bar bya ba 'di lta bus lus brta'o/ /yang lus kyi sha 'tshag nyams smad cing dbri bar bya ba ni/ gcin snyi ba'i nad dang / pho ba'i nang be'u snabs yod de mchin pa na ba dang / zas snum bag

ha cang zos sam/ lus kyi khong snum ches sam/ rims kyis btab bam/ brla rengs pa'i nad yod dam/ mdzes btab bam/ shu chen mched pa'am/ khong 'bras dang / mcher pa na ba dang / klad pa na ba dang / lkog ma na ba dang / mig na ba dang / lus sha bskyed de sbom por 'gyur ba dang / 'di

lta bu dang / dgun stod kyi tshe lta bu rtag tu zas bsnams shing kha zas dbri ba dang / smyung bar bya'o/ /de la sman gyis rtag tu bkru zhing sbyang ba ni lus ha cang sha che zhing spom pa dang / nyams stobs che ba'i mi dang / tsha ba mkhris pa rgyas pa'i mi dang / bad kan rgyas te che ba dang / pho ba'i nang na be+e'u

snabs yod pas zas mi 'ju ste mchin pa na ba dang / rims na ba dang / rtag tu slon zhing skyug bro ba dang / tshad pa rab tu 'khru ba'i nad dang / snying na ba dang / bshang gci 'gags pa ste 'ong du mi rung ba dang / lus dang khong lci ba dang / sgregs pa rtag tu 'ong ba dang / yi ga 'chus shing dong ga mi

bde ba la sogs pa la/ bkru sman dang skyug sman drag tu cher btang ngo / /sman gyis ran par bkru zhing sbyang ba 'bring tsam du btang ba'i dmigs ni/ sha che chung ran tsam gyi mi la ni sngar nad bzhu ba'i sman btang drod bskyed la/ de'i rjes la nad kyi dmigs gong ma ltar mi bde zhing na ba gang

yang rung ste/ de lta bu'i mi dang / yang la la sha chung zhing skem la nad dmigs gong ma ltar na ba de rnams la/ bkru zhing sbyang ba'i sman drag dal ran pa 'bring tsam du btang ba dang / nyam chung zhing rke ba la thun chung zhing 'jam por btang la/ de'i tshe na kha zas bsdam zhing skom thub par bya'o/ /

yong ni nad pa'i nyams stobs 'bring tsam cig la mi bde na/ de la dpyad bkru sman gyis bkru zhing sbyang mi dgos te/ de lta bu ni lus bsig cing bcag pa dang / nad dmigs dang sbyar te/ rlung dang ser bu las bsang ba gar legs par bya'o/ /nyams 'tshag 'bring la yang bkru sman

la sogs pa mi btang na/ nad pa nyam chung ba la bkru sman 'jam po yang btang du mi rung ba lta smos kyang ci dgos so/ /nad pa lus kyi nyams 'tshag smad cing bri ba lta bu nyams 'tshag gso zhing brta bar bya ba'i mi la ni/ zas bsdams pa dang / smyung ba la sogs pa cung zad tsam byar

rung ngo / /spyir gso zhing nyams 'tshag brta ba'i dpyad bya ba dang skyug sman dang bkru sman dang smyung bar byas te/ nyams 'tshag smad par bya ba yang yul dang stobs dang / dus dang / mi'i na tshod dang / nyams 'tshag dang sbyar te/ ha cang nyams 'bri ba dang / ha cang nyams brta ba yang mi bya'o/ /

de la lus kyi nyams 'tshag brta ba'i dpyad bya ste/ nyams mthu brtas par 'gyur bar mngon zhing nyams 'tshag brtas/ sha skyes stobs dang ldan par gyur na/ mig dang rna ba la sogs pa dbang po rnams gsal/ bshang gci'i dri ma mi sri bar 'byung / lus khong yang zhing

bshor/ kha zas yi gar 'ong na de lta bu nad med par gso zhing cho ga byar rung ngo / /yang kha zas bsdam zhing dbri ba dang smyung bar byas na/ phan par mngon pa'i rtags ni kha zas phra zhing bsdams sam/ smyung bar byas pa las kha zas zhu ste/ bkres shing skom par 'gyur ba dang / khong gsud pa'i

sgregs pa mnam po mi zhim pa med pa tha mal bar 'byung la khong ba'i nang sang sang por gyur la sems kyang gsal/ dang ga dang gre ba yang sang sang por gyur la/ na ba dang mi bde ba yang rtse zhil la/ khong yang zhing ci bya'o cog la sems spro ba yod/ myo myo po snyom pa'i bag med pa de lta bu ni kha zas

smyung ba byas pas phan par mngon pa yin no/ /nyams 'tshag brta ste sha bskyed pa'i cho ga tshod ma zin te ha cang drags pas sha ha cang cher skyes sam/ kha zas bri zhing smad pa dang / smyung bar byas pa drags pas ha cang skem por gyur pa 'di gnyis lta bu la sman dpyad kyi cho

gar bya ba ni/ sha cher skyes pa dang / kha zas smyung bar byas pa las nad cir gyur pa'i tshul mngon te/ lus sha ha cang che zhing tsho ba las ni nad 'brum bu dang / gcin snyi ba'i nad dang / rims nad dang / dmu rdzing lta bu gsus pa cher skyes pa'i nad dang / bshang gci 'byung ba'i mtshams

su mtshan bar rdol ba'i nad dang / lud pa lu ba dang / rims rmongs bus 'debs pa dang / gcin sri ba dang pho bar be+e'u snabs chags te zas mi 'ju ba dang / mdze la sogs pa'i nad mi bzad pa rnams 'byung ngo / /de la sha che zhing tshon po ni tshil zad par bya ba dang / rlung dang bad kan

bsal bar bya ba lta bu'i dpyang thams cad bzang ngo / /de la mi tshon po skem po grims par bya ba'i kha zas ni/ rgya sran ku lang+tha dang / dzur na dang / sha ma ka khre rgod dang / nas dang / sran chung mon sran rde'u dang / 'di rnams g.yos su byas pa bzang zhing / skom du ni sbrang rtsi chu dang sbyar ba

dang / zho ga chu dang / dar ba dang 'di rnams btung ngo / /yang sman a ri ta'i khu ba skom du bsnan pa btung ngo / /sems las bskyed pa dang / skyug sman dang bkru sman btang ba dang / lus bsig cing bcag pa dang / mtshan mo gdod mi nyal bar bya'o/ /sman ni a ru ra dang / ba ru ra dang / skyu ru ra'i 'bras

bu gsum zhib tu btags la/ sbrang rtsi'i 'de gus sbrus te bza'o/ /yang sman gu ru ce sle tres dang / a ru ra dang / gla sgang chen po 'di gsum btags te sbrang rtsi la sbrus pa bza'o/ /yang sman ra tsan dza na zhes bya ba skyer khaN+Da dang / rtsa ba chen po lnga zhes bya ba sa la par+Ni dang / kr-iSh+Na par+Ni dang /

bri ha ti dang / kaN+Da ka ri dang / gze ma dang 'di lnga btang ngo / /yang gu gul btang ba'i dpyad dang / sman brag zhun btang ba'i dpyad bya'o/ /sman ag+ni man+tha'i khu ba yang btang na yang sha 'bri'o/ /yang sman byi dang ka dang / sga dang / ya bak+Sha ra nas tshig 'khus pa'i tsha dang / lcags kyi cha tsha phye ma nag po dang / nas dang /

skyu ru ra dang / 'di rnams phye mar byas la/ sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te btang na/ sha che zhing tsho ba'i nad sel cing sha grims par 'ong ngo / /yang tsha ba rnam pa gsum po bca' sga dang / pi pi ling dang / na le sham dang / ka ti tang dang / ba ru ra dang / skyu ru ra dang gsum dang / shi kru dang / byi dang ga dang / bong nga

dang / s+thir dang / shing kun dang / lan tshwa nag po dang / go snyod dang / la la phud dang / 'u su dang / kru trug tres dang / skyer pa dang / chu rtsi mo dang / bri ha ti rnam gnyis dang / snga ma'i 'bras bu dang / pa tha dang / pi pi ling gi rtsa ba dang / chu las skyes pa ke'u ka dang / 'di rnams zhib tu btags

pa'i phye ma cha snyoms pa dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar dang / til mar gsum mnyam par byas te/ sman 'di rnams las nas phye cha bcu drug gis bskyed de sbyar ba 'di 'thungs na lus sha rab tu che zhing sbom po dang / lus sha chen po las byung ba'i nad thams cad dang / nad gzhan yang

'byang la sha yang grims shing phra bar 'ong / gzhan yang snying na ba dang / mig ser dang / sha bkra dang / dbugs mi bde ba dang / lud pa lu ba dang / lkog ma na ba dang 'di rnams sel te phan/ yid rno/ yid gzhungs sems dran pa la phan/ /khong pa'i drod skye/ zas 'ju ba la phan

no/ /ha cang kha zas bsdam zhing smyung ba bya ba drags pa dang / sman gyis bkru zhing sbyang ba drags pa na/ lus sha rab tu skem/ mgo 'khor/ lud pa skam por 'ong / skom dad che/ /kha zas yi gar mi 'ong ba dang / lus kyi khong na tshil dang snum bag zad pa dang /

khong pa'i nang gi drod nyams te zad/ gnyid med/ mig rtul/ rna ba mi gsang / khu chu zad/ gzi dang mdangs nyams te/ zas yi gar 'ong ba mi skyes/ skad 'gag /chu so zug /snying na/ klad pa na/ byin pa dang / brla na/ dku do dang rtsib logs na/ rlung

nad las gyur pa'i rims nad kyis 'debs/ /smra ba'i tshig mang / lus kyi stod du rlung nad 'jug skyug bro/ rus pa'i tshigs kun bcag pa snyam byed cing na/ bshang gci dri ma sri ba la sogs pa 'di lta bu ni kha zas bsdams pa dang / smyung ba dang / sman gyis bkru zhing sbyangs te/

skem por gyur pa las nad de 'dra bar 'gyur ro/ /yong ni lus sha brta zhing tshon por bya ba'am/ skem por bya ba yang rung ste/ skem por ni nad dkon la/ sman dpyad sla ste rung ngo / /tshon po na ba ni sman dpyad byar med de mi rung ngo / /ha cang tsho ches pa ni

tshil ches pas khong pa'i me'i drod kyang 'bri/ /rlung nad kyang sel te/ zas mngar bag dang / zas snum bag bza' zhing bsod pas tshim par byed pa dang / bde ba nyams bag tu byed pas ni sha skem po las tshon por 'gyur ro/ /de bas na na rga ba dang / kha zas mi 'phrod

mi mthun pa bza' bas lus skem zhing rid par gyur pa 'di lta bu la lus sha skyes shing brtas par 'gyur ba'i kha zas skom thams cad dang / sman btang zhing sems las med pa la rtag tu snying dga' bar 'dug pa dang / rtag tu skom 'thungs shing nyin par nyal ba ni phag bzhin du

tshon por 'gyur ro/ /lus brtas shing tshon por bya ba ni sha las lhag pa ni gang yang med do/ /de bas na mi tshon po sha phal gyis snying mi tshim pa dang / sha 'tshag brta zhing tshon por blta ba dang / gcan gzan dang / khra lta bus lus gsos shing bskyed pa'i sha lhag par

bzang ngo / /skem por bya ba la sha yang ba phan no/ /nas dang gro ni tshon po dang skem po gnyis ka'i dus su bzang ngo / /yong ni nad kyi rnam grangs mangs pas bkru sman btang ba la sogs pa dang / 'khru ba gcod pa la sogs pa dpyad mang po du ma yod kyis kyang mdor na nad

pa gso zhing brtas pa bya ba dang / kha zas bsdam zhing sha bri bar bya ba dang / sman gyis bkru zhing bsal ba dang / zhi bar byas pa gang yang rung dpyad kyi mdo rnam gnyis su 'dus te/ dper na nad kyi rnam grangs brgya nyi shu yod kyis kyang / nad thams cad

kyi gzhi ni rlung dang bad kan dang mkhris pa gsum du 'dus pa dang 'dra'o/ /nad pa brta zhing gso ba'i thabs dang / nad yang bar bya ba'i phyir zas dbri ba'am smyung bar bya ba dang / gso ba'i thabs rnam pa gnyis bshad pa'i le'u bcu bzhi pa rdzogs so// //
